appearance: Anu is a crepe pink otter with taffy pink fuzzy fur covered everywhere, and on their back is a pointy tail. Their face consists of black eyes with a black nose and mouth, they also have black freckles.

name: Anya
bio: Meet Anya! This curious Squishmallow loves swimming to the depths of the sea with her mer-gals where they go on all sorts of adventures. When she’s not on an underwater adventure, you can find her studying to become a real-life explorer, she wants to be an archaeologist.
appearance: Anya is a combination of a cat, unicorn and mermaid, and has features of each. The top half of her body is pale purple and she has large triangular ears. The inside of these are shimmery purple, matching her horn. Both the spiral on her horn and her nose and mouth are a soft periwinkle blue. She has closed eyes and two black whiskers on each cheek.

name: Aphrodite
bio: Aphrodite sells eau de parfums at the local department store. She loves spiritizing samples into the air and sometimes sprays multiple to create an Aphrodite original. Make sure to try "Blackjack"—it's a blend of Queen Royale, Intrigue No. 8, and Tres!
appearance: Aphrodite is a grey dog. She has long triangular ears with light pink inner ears. She has wrinkles on the top of her head and on each side of her body. She has a light pink belly. She has round, black eyes with a black nose and mouth with a tongue sticking out.

name: Apollo
bio: Apollo can light up any room he walks into! This happy-go-lucky electrician has a special way with wires, a smile to brighten the darkest of days, and the best recipe for Double Lemon Lemon Bars. His secret ingredient? Drawing smiley faces on the lemons before juicing them, of course
appearance: Apollo is a coral firefly. He has a coral head and below his head. He has a fuzzy baby pink segment and a yellow one beneath. He has two wings with two pink at the top and two mint at the bottom. He has pink antennae with yellow tips. He has round, black eyes, a smiling black mouth and large red blush.

name: Apple
bio: Apple is the heiress to an angry mob and like, totally pumped to take over the family business! Although she's still learning to hold a pitchfork without breaking a nail, what really lights her fire is making up fun chants and recruiting super rad townspeople—just like her sorority days in Beta Theta Boo!
appearance: Apple as their name suggests is an apple green bat with tall, pointed ears and bat wings. Their inner ears and wings are a holographic green with a fuzzy belly. They have round, black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth with two fangs poking out at the bottom.

name: Aqua
bio: Aqua may be a sloth but he loves to be the life of the party! He absolutely loves tacos and trying to enjoy snow cones before they melt. Look for him in the DJ booth!
appearance: Aqua is a sloth with a pale aqua body and a white patch on his face and belly. The banded markings around his eyes and his muzzle are pale gray. He has round eyes, a round nose and a cat-like smile, all of which are black.

name: Aqua Raccoon
appearance: This Squishmallow has a mint body with teal markings by his eyes with white above them resembling eyebrows. They have tall, pointed ears with white inner ears. Their muzzle and belly are white with a black nose, curved mouth, and black eyes with white rings around them.

name: Aquitaine
bio: Meet Aquitaine. Her studies in science and research have inspired her to create her own cosmetics line! Her skincare products are all vegan and cruelty-free, and she hopes one day all products will do the same. Will you help Aquitaine save the animals and skincare?
appearance: Aquitaine is a pink pig with light brown splotches. She has curly ears and round, black eyes with short lashes. Her inner ears, muzzle and belly are off-white. She wears a flower crown atop her head with hot pink, yellow and light pink flowers, along with green leaves.

name: Arabella
bio: Arabella is a very talented violinist, she can play almost any song just by hearing it! While she loves to play the violin and practices every day, she'd rather play outside. When it's nice out she sits on her porch and takes a break to play catch with her friends.
appearance: Arabella is a llama with a tie-dyed pattern of blue and pink spots. Her face and inner ears are white. She has round black eyes with thick, curly lashes and pink blush on her cheeks. She has a silver nose and mouth.

name: Araminta
bio: This caticorn is quick on her toes, can lead, follow, and teach all at the same time, and has a room full of costumes! Grab your dancing shoes, are you ready to take a class with Araminta?
appearance: Araminta is a caticorn, a cat with a unicorn's horn. She is mostly peach pink, with a round, white belly. Her horn and inner ears are rose gold. Her facial features, including her whiskers, are silver-blue in color.

name: Aranya
bio: Don't call Aranya a pumpkin carver! She prefers "gourd artist", or "produce prodigy." Aranya's sister manager Ocha thinks her success has gotten to her head, but on the inside, she's still that scrappy starving sculpturess with 8 knives and a dream... just now a shelf full of Pumpky Awards.
appearance: Aranya is a red spider with eight creepy, crawly legs. Her legs are orange, black, purple, and yellow and are different on either side. She has a black sparkly belly and wears a bow the same color. She has round, black eyes with short dual lashes, and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Archer
bio: Archer dreams of being a black belt but there's just one problem, he isn't very athletic! He tries his best and hopes that he will get better, just like his Sensei says. Until then, would you mind practicing with him?
appearance: Archer has a textured green body. He normally has a white belly, but some editions feature silver sequins instead. He has an embroidered snout with two teeth at the front and a further two on each side of his jaw. His round, black eyes sit on knobs atop his head. A row of green spikes run along his spine.

name: Archie
bio: Original:Have you met Archie? This shy 'Mallow has a special talent – he talks with his hands! Archie loves to play soccer and even started a club for 'Mallows to play and learn Sign. Someday you might see him play in the 'Mallows Cup!
appearance: Archie has a pale pink color on his body with bright pink gills on either side of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a white belly. He has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Arco
bio: Arco plays percussion on anything he can his claws on. His collection of instruments is growing steadily, and Arco's current pride and joy is his xylophone. This 'Mallow is getting a group together for weekend percussion jams—you're invited!
appearance: Arco is a lavender hermit crab with an orange shell. He has two claws and six legs on his left and right. He has a white belly, light pink blush on his cheeks, round black eyes, and a simple smile.

name: Arella
bio: Congratulations to Arella for making valedictorian! She worked so hard on her speech and is glad it went well. Everyone laughed at the funny parts! Next, Arella has a few interviews lined up with some health and fitness startups so she can put her nutrition degree to work!
appearance: Arella is a cinnamon with prominent ear tufts. She has white patches surrounding each eye with are edged with golden feathers. She also has a white belly with three rows of feathers outlined in gold. Her beak is the same shade. She has a winking expression. She wears a blue graduation cap.

name: Argie
bio: Argie never thought math could be fun because she always had a difficult time learning it. But now, Argie is taking a statistics class and having the best time ever! Statistics makes so much sense to her, and she loves solving the word problems, What's your favorite school subject?
appearance: Argie is a jar of purple jam with a lavender lid and label. Her label is edged in cream and has a grape motif on a white background at the center. She has round black eyes with short lashes, a smiling mouth and pink cheeks.

name: Ari
bio: Ari dreams of being a DJ. He loves electronic music, but plays other tunes because he enjoys making his friends smile. Ari hopes to headline a massive show, one day, at the Squishmallows Music Festival! What do you want to hear Ari play?
appearance: Ari is a bright green dinosaur with a protruding snout. His snout has bottle green nostrils and six sharp teeth poking out. He has a shiny green trio of spikes atop his head. His white belly is heart-shaped. His eyes are covered by a purple pair of sunglasses with a blue heart on each lens.

name: Ari the Leopard
bio: Say hello to Ari! Ari is a sweet 'Mallow who loves sweets! She keeps a drawer filled with sour gummies, chocolate bars, and all kinds of other yummy snacks! Ari picks one treat to have at the end of each day. What should she choose today?
appearance: Ari is a cream leopard with grey spots all over their body. Her stomach is a rainbow ombre. Her ears are also rainbow ombre and her muzzle is white. She has two round black eyes with eyelashes and a silver nose and mouth.

name: Aria
bio: Meet Aria, your next party guru. When she's not planning her next event, you can find her and her Uni-gals exploring. How does she unwind? By being silly with her family and friends.
appearance: Aria is a unicorn with a pattern of pastel rainbow stripes slanting diagonally. Her muzzle, belly and inner ears are white. Her horn is shiny silver with a hot pink swirl, the same color as her nostrils. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes and a candy pink mane.

name: Aria (Justice version)
bio: Aria is a dreamer at heart. She is whimsical and funny, and loves to spread happiness to anyone she meets.
appearance: Aria is a white unicorn that laying down on her tummy and she has rainbow hair, white ears with silver insides, a silver horn and she has silver hoofs. She has closed eyes and white nose with black nostrils.

name: Ariana
bio: Ariana plays the organ!  Right now, she's practicing a creepy new song for her town's Halloween festival. Ariana thinks the organ makes the prettiest sounds, but she can also make it sound dark and scary by playing the lower keys. Want to hear the song Ariana is working on?
appearance: Ariana is an African American witch Squishmallow with black hair and bright green tips tied in pigtails. On her head, she wears a witch hat with a purple stripe and a gold moon design. She wears a black cape with a gold buckle, a purple shirt and under her being a black and green striped pattern. She has black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Arilla
bio: Arilla curls up with her handheld game device all weekend long. Platform and farming games are her faves! Sometimes Arilla wears headphones and zones out to whatever video game she playing. If you need something, just give Arilla a tap on the shoulder.
appearance: Arilla is a mint armadillo that has an iridescent mint patch that goes down to her forehead. Her tummy is fluffy and white. Her face consists of two eyes, one open and the other winking, a mint nose and a simple black smile.

name: Arlene
bio: Movie actress Arlene is known by 'Mallows far and wide as the 'Queen of Holiday Romcoms'. Despite her busy filming schedule, Arlene makes sure to celebrate every Christmas with her brotherAlten. Together, they go caroling!
appearance: Arlene is a white milk carton. She has a bluish grey band around her middle reading "MILK for Santa" in a red font. She has a candy cane band on top her head with a holly and a candy cane. She has round, black eyes, with lashes and a magenta smile.

name: Arlie
bio: Meet Arlie, he wants to become a geologist! Arlie loves all thing sci-fi, especially movies about alien planets. He hopes he can uncover the next living planet, can he tell you about his latest theory?
appearance: Arlie is an apple green dinosaur with a textured tan belly. He has grey spines running down his back. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Armand
bio: Armand is a versatile actor who can do it all—cry in dramas, fall in comedies, even breathe underwater! Thanks to his special gills, Armand accepts leading roles for both land and water-based characters. Now he hopes this latest movie will get him a gold statue he’s always dreamed of.
appearance: Armand is an olive green monster with bronze horns with brown fin-like flaps with olive green lines on the sides of his body, and a shiny pale brown belly with fish-like scales. He has three bronze spots on the right side of his head. His eyes are black and a pale brown mouth with pointy white teeth.

name: Armando
bio: Armando loves playing chess, watching anime, and eating extra-spicy burritos. He's also a member of his high school activism club and was just elected president! This caring Carnotaurus can't wait to start and is already planning their first protest. Come join!
appearance: Armando is a terracotta colored Carnotaurus. He has two maroon horns on the top of his head, spines that go from his back to his tail, and a lighter marking that starts from his forehead to his back. He has a lighter colored belly, an open mouth with white sharp teeth, and black eyes in a winking expression.

name: Armie
bio: Meet Armie. Ever since he was a little 'Mallow he's been a train fanatic. He even has a model track that travels throughout his bedroom! Armie loves create videos showing off his favorite trains driving through the station. All aboard!
appearance: Armie is a sky blue cow with a patch of longer cream fur like a fringe. His belly is also cream and fluffy. He has an off-white muzzle and inner ears, which aren't fluffy. He has thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and are sparkling silver. Thin brown lines mark the sections. He has round, black eyes, teal nostrils and a small smile.

name: Arnel
bio: Arnel is a movie buff! You name it, he's probably seen it. He especially loves the deep cuts and black and white french films. Want to join? He'd love a movie buddy! But he's memorized all his favorite scenes by heart so don't be surprised if he talks through the whole thing.
appearance: Arnel has a red and white striped bag to represent the classical popcorn bucket. He has black rounded eyes and a black mouth. He's tan-colored and fuzzy on top to represent popcorn overflowing.

name: Arnold
bio: Arnold runs the perfume counter at the mall like a well-oiled machine, which is actually one of the top notes in his favorite cologne! Next time you stop by mention the phrase "the nose knows" and he'll give you a comprehensive scent analysis based on your personality, skin pH levels, and credit score!
appearance: Arnold is a grey sheep dog. He has fuzzy grey ears on his head and a large tuft of white fur on his head. He has a fuzzy white belly with and muzzle on his face. He has round, black eyes with a black nose and mouth with a pink tongue sticking out.

name: Aron
bio: Meet Aron, a young stock investor who loves to cook. His hands are strong like diamonds; he can whip up the best crème brûlée! His favorite foods are pasta, sushi, and cheese! Aron can whip up a delicious treat, or make a smart stock recommendation!
appearance: Aron is a gorilla, a type of primate. He has a shaggy, black mane and a black body with a grey belly. He has small, grey ears which sit low on his head and a grey-colored face. He has round, black eyes, a rounded oval nose with black nostrils and a small, grey smile.

name: Arona
bio: Arona flutters with holiday spirit. This 'Mallow knows there's no better way to celebrate than with a parade! Arona is planning the first Valentine's Day parade in her town with live music, floral arrangements, and lots of heart-shaped goodies. Want to join her parade committee?
appearance: Arona has a pink body and a cream-colored belly with pink stripes and hearts. Her wings have a black, white, and pink monarch pattern. The stems of her antennae are black, while the tips are pink. Her black eyes are winking; she has white cheeks and a black smile.

name: Arthur
bio: Arthur is quite the artsy dude. He spends all day painting large murals for local businesses or putting the finishing touches on a brand-new sculpture. At night he loves to go dancing with his friends, often times still covered in splatters of paint.
appearance: Arthur has a bright green body and a white belly. He has an embroidered snout with two teeth at the front and a further two on each side of his jaw. His round, black eyes sit on knobs atop his head. A row of dark green spikes run along his spine.

name: Artin
bio: Meet Artin. They dress up for any occasion! This 'Mallow has so much fun coordinating colors and shapes, they don't mind taking the time to look super stylish and on trend. As much as Artin has a passion for fashion, their future is in synchronized swimming. Artin is on their way to the global competition next month!
appearance: Artin is a light pink Loch Ness Monster with long pectoral fins and on the top of their head. They have a tail, lighter pink spots on their forehead and a baby pink belly made of corduroy. A red and pink heart is embroidered on their belly, their eyes and smile are black, and their blush is magenta.

name: Arturo
bio: Dancing, family, and tamales are some of Arturo's favorite things. He has a large family and whenever they get together there is a lot of noise, dancing, and laughter. His favorite thing about family visits is the yummy tamales that his aunt makes.
appearance: Arturo is a green watermelon with a bright red front ringed in white. His chest is covered in black seeds. He has round eyes and a bushy brown moustache. A brown sombrero with a green and red band sits atop his head.

name: Ascott
bio: Ascott is a grey squirrel. He wears a black nutcracker hat on his head with three grey stripes. He wears a grey nutcracker outfit on his body. He has grey ears and a large fluffy navy grey tail behind. He has a  creamy white face with round, black eyes with and a black nose and mustache.
appearance: Ascott is a grey squirrel. He wears a black nutcracker hat on his head with three grey stripes. He wears a grey nutcracker outfit on his body. He has grey ears and a large fluffy navy grey tail behind. He has a  creamy white face with round, black eyes with and a black nose and mustache.

name: Ash
bio: Ash is a true morning 'Mallow! He can't wait to get up and start creating new beats on his keyboard. A donut helps him start his day and get the music flowing! Sometimes, sprinkles get stuck on the keys, but Ash doesn't mind. Want to make music with Ash?
appearance: Ash is a golden-brown otter with rounded ears. His lower face and belly are white, and his inner ears are brown. He has round, black eyes, a large black nose and pink blush on his cheeks. He is holding a donut with hot pink icing and rainbow sprinkles between his front paws.

name: Asher
bio: Are you ready for an adventure? Asher will take you there—through his photos! This narwhal is a photographer who travels the globe taking photos for magazines and newspapers. How can you capture his attention? His favorite dish is shrimp ceviche!
appearance: Asher is a blue-green narwhal lying flat on his belly. He has fins on each side and a defined tail fin. His belly is white and he has black eyes and a smiling mouth. His horn is silver with a turquoise spiral.

name: Ashley
bio: Ashley loves table tennis, one day she wants to be part of the world’s best table tennis team! For now, she practices with her friends and hosts backyard tournaments. You can help her keep score!
appearance: Ashley is a pale green apple with a white belly. Atop her head sits a bright green leaf and a brown stem. She has round, black eyes with short curled lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Ashlyn
bio: Close your eyes, sprinkle a dash of glitter, and make a wish; Ashlyn is here to be your fairy godmother! Though she’s still a fairy in training, Ashlyn can’t wait to make Squishmallow dreams come true. What’s her biggest wish? This week it’s world peace and gooey triple chocolate chip cookies.
appearance: Ashlyn is a cheetah with a patchy grey coat covered in purple spots. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a purple nose and mouth. Her ears are round with a shimmery, rose gold color on the inside. Her butterfly-like wings and the crown atop her head are also rose gold. She has round, black eyes with spiked lashes.

name: Asley
bio: Asley has a rockin' hobby--she identifies and polishes rocks! There's no doubt Asley will grow up to be a geologist. Nothing amazes her more than well-cut rock samples or uncovering a mineral. Asley is polishing a new set of minerals today. Want to watch her work?
appearance: Asley is maroon vulture with a pointed yellow beak. She has a white ruff around her neck, separating her maroon  head from her dark brown body. She has fluffy dark brown wings and a grey colored belly.

name: Aspen
bio: Some folks sing in the shower—Aspen sings in the garden! After reading online that music can help plants grow, she’s been serenading her sprouts with everything from lullabies to love songs. She even started taking voice lessons to satisfy her pesky tomato vines. They’re a tough crowd!
appearance: Aspen is a jackalope, a mythical creature that is a jackrabbit with antelope antlers. She has a turquoise body and long, vertical ears with teal ears. She has two sparkling white antlers with two points each between her ears. She has a teal, belly and tail. She has round, black eyes and a turquoise nose and mouth.

name: Astra
bio: Astra loves coffee, cupcakes, and bubble-gum ice cream. She is a nurse who works in the hospital with mini mallows. She loves to have fun with her patients and tries to tell a new joke every day. Do you have a good joke for her to share?
appearance: Astra is a pale lavender bird with a fluffy white belly and a pink blush on each cheek. She has a triangular orange beak. The fluffy wings and crest of feathers atop her head are also white. She has closed eyes with short, curled lashes.

name: Astrid
bio: Original:Do you believe in fate? Astrid does! She is a dreamer and loves learning how about how the stars align; her most prized possession is her telescope and she is rarely ever without it.
appearance: Astrid is a purple unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly pink horn with a darker pink swirl wrapped around it. She has black, oval-shaped eyes with short eyelashes.

name: Astrud
bio: Anytime is a good time for a hike! Astrud and her bestie,Evita, meet up for hikes no matter the weather—these tough 'Mallows are prepared for anything. Astrud's favorite part is grabbing a hot peppermint latte at the little cafe near the trailhead. It keeps her perfectly warm and energized.
appearance: Astrud is a green bigfoot with a candy pink fuzzy mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and belly with two different colored swirls, such as red and pink, and white pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush beneath and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face.

name: Atlas
bio: Need some help for surviving life 101? Though she is still a student herself, from pasta to paying taxes, Atlas is a great teacher. She shares all the tips and tricks she comes across on her vlog. Go ahead and give her a follow!
appearance: Atlas is covered in a swirling tie-dye pattern consisting of hot pink, lime and electric blue. She has a white horn with a bright pink swirl which is the same color as her nostrils. Her fluffy mane and tail are hot pink. She has round black eyes with short lashes and a shimmery silver muzzle. The inside of her ears and her belly are white.

name: Atoosa
bio: Have you ever imagined what life would be like in space? Atoosa has! She’s an aerospace engineer and designed a space cruise ship to vacation among the stars! There’s an ice cream sundae bar, a galaxy arcade, and portholes to stargaze through. Next stop, new planets!
appearance: Atoosa has a pink body and rainbow stripes. She has a white belly and black round eyes, no whiskers, and a happy, pink cat mouth. She has fuzzy rainbow ears with a sparkly pink lining.

name: Atwater
bio: Atwater works at a boardwalk amusement park! She loves being seaside all day and helping little 'Mallows safely on and off the ferris wheel. Atwater has so much fun at work, but her favorite perk is riding the wooden roller coaster as many times as she wants. Grab some cotton candy and hang around with Atwater!
appearance: Atwater is a mauve monster with pink horns, fin-like flaps on the sides of her body, and a red and pink striped belly. She has a glittery pink heart by the right of their head, light purple freckles between their eyes, and heart-shaped pink blush. Her eyes are black with lashes and a winking expression with a wide mouth and a single square tooth poking out by the bottom right of their mouth.

name: Aubrey
bio: Aubrey loves movies about horses, camping, and singing in the rain. For her birthday this year, she even had a karaoke camp out. A few of her friends camped out in her backyard and they sang songs by the fire. What song would you like to sing?
appearance: Aubrey is a khaki avocado with a yellow-green, or chartreuse, front. A band of lime green creates another layer around the chartreuse. The large pit on her belly is golden brown. She has closed, happy eyes, a laughing mouth and a pink blush the same shade as the bow she wears on her left side.

name: Auggie
bio: Auggie recently enrolled in a 6-week workshop on stress regulation. He can't wait to learn about things like "breathing" and hopes to return to managing the local fabric store better—and calmer—than ever. No more stress cries in the crochet aisle for this cuttlefish!
appearance: Auggie is a pink cuttlefish with a sparkly flower-shaped head. He has ten tentacles with five pink and five magenta with a round white belly. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: August
bio: Give August a call next time you need fashion advice. This alpaca knows all the latest trends and prides himself in dressing his 'Mallow friends based on their individual style. August is waiting to hear back from the fashion school he applied to. Think he'll get accepted?Appearance[]August is a llama with a tie-dyed fur pattern of blue and pink spots. His face and inner ears are white. He has round black eyes with thick, curly lashes. He has a pink mouth. He has a pom-pom like rainbow hair style.
appearance: August is a llama with a tie-dyed fur pattern of blue and pink spots. His face and inner ears are white. He has round black eyes with thick, curly lashes. He has a pink mouth. He has a pom-pom like rainbow hair style.

name: Augustine
bio: Augustine teaches The Art of the Word Puzzle at the local college. Every class begins with an exciting topic like 'double meanings throughout history' and ends with some serious stumping. Don't be late, or you'll have to answer an Elizabethan riddle about clocks!
appearance: Augustine is a cream dog with a xanadu patcheover their right ear and a cream patch around their left eye. They have a teal patterned belly. Her ears are large and floppy, standing up from their head. She has a pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls, with a rounded teal nose and round black eyes.

name: Augusto
bio: Augusto just brought a panini press and now he can't stop crafting sandwiches! He gets really creative with builds, and sometimes even swaps out plain bread for waffles in a breakfast sandwich melt. Share some of your favorite sandwich ingredients with Augusto and he'll make something gooey and delicious just for you!
appearance: Augusto is a pale green dinosaur with a grey belly. A ridge of turquoise spines appears atop his head. He has two white horns on his head and a large white horn on his face. He has black, round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Aurora
bio: Aurora is from a mystical planet near the Milky Way. This magical unicorn loves learning about her galaxy and aspires to be an astronomer. When she's not learning about the magical world around her, she enjoys skiing down the slippery slopes of Mt. Jupiter.
appearance: Aurora is covered in a tie-dye pattern consisting of mainly blue and purple, with traces of pink. She has a silver horn with a bright pink swirl which matches her silver muzzle. Her fluffy mane and tail are candy pink. Her eyes are closed, with two short lashes on each. The inside of her ears have an iridescent sparkle and her belly is white.

name: Aurura
bio: Aurura brews the freshest cups of coffee right in her kitchen! No matter how long the process takes, this owl happily roasts whole beans over a small flame and grinds them to the perfect size. Watch Aurura gently pour over the steaming water--she's making this cup o' joe just for you!

name: Austin
bio: Austin loves drawing aliens and dreams of one day living in space! He loves pretending that he lives on the moon or is climbing rock mountains on Mars. Austin became obsessed with outer space in school after reading a book about aliens, will you help Austin plan his next space adventure?
appearance: Austin is a dark green avocado with a light green front. His stem and his pit, the large circle on his belly, are both light brown. He has round, black eyes and a smiling red mouth.

name: Autumn
bio: You could say that Autumn is not a morning person. Her adventure-seeking personality comes out as the darkness fills the skies. Autumn is one with nature, and travels all over the world from one Halloween to the next.
appearance: Autumn is a black cat with pointed, triangular ears. She has a light purple belly and inner ears. Her nose and mouth are pale pink and framed by two white whiskers on either side. She has round, black eyes ringed in white.

name: Autumn the Fox
bio: Autumn loves listening to music and playing the piano; her friends love her playful personality.
appearance: Autumn is a light pink fox with faded white parts. She has large, triangular ears, the inside of which are white and glittery. She has white markings on her face, including fluffy cheeks. She is looking to the left and has eyelashes and a red, heart-shaped nose.

name: Ava
bio: Ava is one cool chick who has an eye for design. She is one to always put things together. Ava's dream is to create a big dollhouse with her favourite Squishmallows!
appearance: Ava is a bright yellow bird with a white belly. She has a triangular orange beak and pale pink blush under her eyes. Her eyes are shut and each has two short eyelashes.

name: Ava the Avocado
bio: Ava loves to travel! Her favorite place to visit is Mexico. When Ava travels, she enjoys trying new foods and experiencing other cultures.
appearance: Ava is a green avocado with a light green front. Her 8" version has a light brown pit in the center of her body which is a pouch where her 5" version is stored. She has a pink or a gold flower on her head. She has round, black eyes with eyelashes, a smiling mouth, and pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Avana
bio: Meet Avana. This axolotl loves a good cry. She enjoys watching tearjerkers and sob stories any day of the week. She can't pinpoint exactly why if you ask her, but she'll share her top 10 movie list if you'd like!
appearance: Avana is a grey axolotl with darker grey spots and a fluffy white belly. She has shimmery silver gills with pink frilly edges on each side of her head and a shimmery silver crown on top of her head. She has small, stubby arms, round black eyes, and a cat-like smile.

name: Avery
bio: Original:Don't let his size fool you, Avery is a skilled left wingman for the Squishmallows rugby team and one day wants to be a coach! His whole family comes to watch and they bring popsicles to celebrate once the game is over.
appearance: Avery is a duck with an emerald green head and a brown body, separated by a white marking on his neck. He has fluffy brown wings the same color as his body and a paler, tan-colored belly. His round black eyes have a white ring around them, and his short bill is bright yellow.

name: Avi
bio: Avi just had so much fun whale watching! The group made super funny whale calls because they couldn't find any whales to watch, Avi got to eat a second lunch because the motion of the ocean made him lose his first, and there was even the most beautiful rainbow in the sky after a freak thunderstorm made them return to shore!
appearance: Avi is a yellow cup of mango boba tea with a glittery silver lid and a golden straw.  He has a mango embroidered on the right side of the cup. He has dark brown tapioca pearls, round, black eyes and a black color smile.

name: Avrill
bio: Meet Avrill. He loves to tinker and find out how everything around him works. Curiosity rules his world! In his free time, he likes to design airplanes and hopes to be an airplane engineer someday. He wants to make flying the best way to move, do you want to see his latest design?
appearance: Avrill is a teal dragon with a white nose and belly. He has small, white fangs below his nose. His horns and the inside of his wings are glittery silver. The inside of his ears and spines on his back are green. He has two large black eyes.

name: Axel
bio: Axel poses for all the most well-known designers. Axel was discovered at a shopping mall when he was a young beetle, and even though he always knew he was unique looking, he never imagined it would take him to the cover of magazines. Have you seen Axel's latest photo shoot?
appearance: Axel is a purple beetle with horizontal sections of different shades of purple and a white belly. His bottom half is a dark glittery purple and his top half is light purple. He has two curled antennaes atop his head. He has small wings stick out to either side of him. He has round, black eyes, a smiling mouth, and pink blush.

name: Axiel
bio: Axiel is a jeweler and creates stunning one-of-a-kind pieces that sparkle and glow. She gets to know her customer before designing something special for them and loves to see their reaction. Would you like her to make something for you?
appearance: Axiel is a lizard with a tie-dye pattern of green and red circles on a white base. She has a hot pink frill atop her head. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes.

name: Azi
bio: Azi knows what he likes! A perfect day for this playful 'Mallow would include a trip to the toy store, a drive out to the beach, and an all-you-can-eat candy buffet waiting for him at home. The only thing that would make it all better? Sharing it with his family, of course!
appearance: Azi is a pale grey shark with bole spots around his body and two fins on each side, they have two dorsal fins on his head and on their lower back with a tail at the bottom. He has a round, white belly. He has round black eyes and a wide red mouth with pointy teeth.

name: Aziza
bio: Aziza is a little alternative and loves to push buttons. Sarcasm, sleeping in, and being silly are just a few of her favorite things. If you need a second opinion or a new topic to debate, Aziza is the mallow for you!
appearance: Aziza is a light purple stingray with lavender spots. She has a white belly, round black eyes, and a black simple smile. She has two purple triangular fins and a thin tail with the same pattern. She has purple gills on either side of her belly.

name: Azizbek
bio: Do you know what time it is? Azizbek sure does. He repairs watches of all kind at a small kiosk downtown. If you listen closely, you can hear the ticking of all the watches hanging at his repair stand! Just don't bring Azizbek a digital watch. He only works with gears and dials.
appearance: Azizbek is a red onion with light magenta tripes on his top and bottom. He has multiple green leaves on top, some are green, and others are dark. His face has two wide open black eyes, a smiling black mouth and pale purple blush.

name: Azizi
bio: If you're looking for a sense of purpose or direction, Azizi is the dragon for you! This dragon was once all over the place and now helps other Mallows find their happy place. Azizi has studied traditions old and new to understand being organized, calm, and collected.
appearance: Azizi is a lime green dragon. They have a white snout, inner ears, and belly. Their spines, horns, and inner wings are a shimmering gold color. they have closed black eyes.

name: Babette
bio: Meet Babette! Everyone in Babette's neighborhood knows about Babette's jumping skills - so don't be surprised if you see a crowd watching when she starts performing her tricks! One-legged, double rope, criss-cross, she can do it all! Come join the fun, and cheer Babette on!
appearance: Babette is a hedgehog with a rainbow body. Her snout is white and her ears are lavender. She has a purple nose and black eyes. Her face and belly are white, the same as the spines which decorate her back.

name: Babs
bio: Meet Babs. She loves super heroes, sci-fi, and created her own superhero, Captain Blueberry! Captain Blueberry is a regular bird by day and solves crime by night. Now Babs just needs to create a sidekick, what should she call them?
appearance: Babs is a blue and white bird with fluffy blue wings and a pale grey beak. There are two shades of blue: royal blue on top of her head and on her body, and navy blue on the bottom part of her head. She has a white face mask which is shaped like an M, arching over each eye and dipping below her beak. Her belly is also white. She has black eyes and pink blush on each cheek, as well as a blue line which stretches horizontally across her face, in line with her eyes.

name: Baiden
bio: Original:Baiden has an after-school job at a farm, he helps with the planting and harvesting. It can be very hard work but Baiden loves to learn all about taking care of the soil and doing what he can for the best harvest possible.
appearance: Baiden is a bright red dragon with a white nose and belly. His horns, the inside of his wings and the spines on his back are all glittery silver. He has two large black eyes.

name: Baidolita
bio: Baidolita has an after-school job at the local hospital! They harvest fresh fruits and vegetables from the community garden and sometimes makes anatomy-themed crudité platters for the nursing staff. Ask about the time they plated a bounty on a parsnip to look just like the pancreas!
appearance: Baidolita is a fusion ofBaidenandNicolita. The left side resembles Baiden is bright red with a white nose and belly. The dragon horn, the inside of their wings and the spines on their back are all glittery silver. Their left eye is black. The right side resembles Nicolita is black with grey accents. The right side of their is grey, and their unicorn horn and right inner ear are glittery silver. Their mane that goes from the top of their head to her back and her fluffy tail are black. Their right eye is black with a yellow ring around them, their right muzzle is grey and right their nostril are yellow. They have purple stitching along their body.

name: Bailey
bio: Bailey is the bubblegum blowing champion in her town, she's set many records for blowing the biggest bubble, chewing her gum the longest, and even creating some of the yummiest bubblegum flavors! Do you think you can blow bigger bubbles than Bailey?
appearance: Bailey is a llama with a pattern of vivid, rainbow stripes, interspersed with white sparkles. She has silver inner ears and fluffy white fur on her head and belly. She has a white face with a defined muzzle and pale pink hearts decorating each cheek. She has cheerful, black eyes with a white shine and short, curled lashes.

name: Balia
bio: Meet Balia. This sweet and lovable social butterfly is always here to make sure you're having fun! She may be cuddly, but Balia is one tough 'Mallow who works for what she wants. When you're with Balia, you are sure to have a fun time and meet new people!
appearance: Balia is a tie-dyed butterfly, predominantly yellow, orange, and pink. She has shiny silver antennas with fluffy pink hearts on the end. Her wings are also pink with silver on the inner wing. She has black eyes with two short eyelashes on each, pink blushing cheeks and a smiling mouth. Her stomach is white with thin pink lines. She also has a big dark pink heart, medium lavender purple heart, and small teal blue heart stitched on her stomach.

name: Ballis
bio: Ballis can come off as very quiet and serious, but it's only because he's a little shy. He really likes people and loves making new friends. It takes him a while to open up, but he's totally worth the wait. He has the funniest dry sense of humor and gives the best advice!
appearance: Ballis is a french bulldog, or 'Frenchie', with a black tie-dye pattern, which also includes shades of brown and grey. His belly and his triangular ears are dark grey. He has a pronounced dark grey snout with classic bulldog jowls, as well as a rounded black nose and round, black eyes with white rings around them.

name: Balni
bio: Meet Balni. She's super-friendly and open-minded and never shies away from new experiences! She finds joy in the little things, like a sunny beach day, a silly dance, or making her friends laugh. Balni always includes everyone, so come along she'd love to meet you!
appearance: Balni is a black toucan with cyan markings on her eyes with a white belly. She has short wings with a fuzzy top and red tip. Her beak is green, yellow, and red, with a matching space bun hairdo held up by glittery, blue bands.

name: Balthazar
bio: Balthazar is a champion fencer who wields a different sort of stick in the off-season—a kebab stick! Friends and family love his Balthazar 'babs and always request the 'Roast and Toaster' over the holidays. It features crunchy chestnuts, gooey marshmallows, and is even held up by a mini gingerbread Balthazar!
appearance: Balthazar is a brown gingerbread boy wearing a silver headband with large white earmuffs. He has two swirls of white icing running down each side of his body. He has a pale pink belly with two peppermint buttons decorating it. He also wears a large, red bow tie above his buttons. He has round eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Bambalina
bio: Meet Bambalina. This cuddly cat loves crunchy peanut butter cookies, sleeping in, and making music. One day she wants to be a DJ; she'll play in between naps and her favorite sweet treats. Do you want to play some music with Bambalina?
appearance: Bambalina is a cat with black fur, and a black fuzzy belly. She has white whiskers, and a pink nose and pink inner ears.

name: Bambz
bio: Bambz is a little Pomchi with a big personality. She loves making new friends and watching films with her family. Bambz is going to be a movie producer when she's older and start a production company with her bestiesRheya,Fitch, andMonty. What kind of films do you think they should make?
appearance: Bambz is a black Pomchi dog with tall, pointed ears and brown eyebrows. She has a white muzzle and a round white belly. The insides of her ears are fuzzy and grey. Her nose, mouth and eyes are all black, although her eyes are rimmed with white. She has a red collar that goes around her body with a rainbow dog tag in the shape of a bone. The dog tag has the text "Bambz" on it in navy blue.

name: Bangta
bio: (no bio given on tag)
appearance: Bangta is a tan bunny with aReese's Peanut Butter Cupswrapper on the bottom half of her body. She has two closed eyes and two black whiskers on each side of her face.

name: Banjo
bio: Who loves analyzing data and researching sales trends? It's Banjo! This enchilada has a mind for numbers, so it's no wonder he ended up working as a market research analyst. Frozen desserts are in, the color orange is out, and Banjo can't wait to discover why!
appearance: Banjo is an enchilada. His body is made up of a tortilla in wrapped with red meat and cheese sticking out from the left side. His belly red sauce with a swirl of white sauce with green jalapenos. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Banks
bio: Banks recently started his own optometry practice. He examines and treats eyes for all 'Mallows and can even prescribe glasses. Banks keeps the office energy levels up and positive by hosting gatherings throughout the week. This Friday, he's throwing a bagel party!
appearance: Banks is a badger with a white head and a pale blue body. He has round ears with pale blue inside and a pure white muzzle. He has stripes running from his ears to his eyes which are tie-dyed with shades of blue, green and white. His round belly has the same pattern. He has round, black eyes and a broad black nose. He also has a large, fluffy, pale blue tail.

name: Banu
bio: Meet Banu. Though some mau call him grumpy, he just likes to keep to himself. He's a bit of an introvert who prefers small groups to large ones. Want to know his happy place? A cabin tucked away with his good friendNorman!
appearance: Banu is a gnome with a large nose, a bushy white beard, and a round, red belly. He wears a rainbow knit hat printed with a red pom-pom atop his head, and a grey and red plaid outfit on his bottom half. Banu's 8" 2022 version has a green belly and a red and black plaid outfit.

name: Baptise
bio: When Baptise was admitted to opera school, the other students could hardly believe it. How could a parrot sing opera? By mimicking, of course! This peculiar technique, along with his six-squawk vocal range, has put Baptise at the top of his class. Bravo Baptise!
appearance: Baptise has a green ombre to blue body with a yellow tummy and fluffy blue wings with a yellow top. Baptise face consists of mostly white part with black on the bottom and black beak with black eyes.

name: Bara
bio: Meet Bara. This biomedical engineer wants to make the world a better place. Bara just finished a big paper for her latest design. Sometimes she works long hours but she loves the value in her work. In her free time, Bara loves to go camping and off-roading in the desert.
appearance: Bara is a sky blue beaver with round ears. Her belly and inner ears have long, fluffy fur with shades of blue and white. She has a rounded, triangular muzzle in white, with a blue nose and mouth. Her eyes are closed and feature curled lashes. Each cheek has two curved, black whiskers. She has a large, flat, blue tail.

name: Baratelli
bio: The hills are alive with the sound of tap shoes and top hats! Baratelli loves the limelight, just watch him sing and dance! On weekends he enjoys trying as many food trucks as possible. Baratelli might be a rising star, but he's always looking for a dance partner. Is it you?
appearance: Baratelli is a sage green frog with a white colored belly. His eyes sit on top of his head, and are black rimmed in white. He has prominent nostrils above his smiling mouth, and a pale pink blush on each cheek. A sparkly, golden crown sits atop his head.

name: Barb
bio: Barb says hello! Barb is quite the gymnast and can do all kinds of tricks, from aerials to tricks on the trapeze. If asked nicely, Barb will even put on a show for her friends! While she's a humble 'Mallow, Barb loves to show off her moves.
appearance: Barb is a dog with a light purple colored body. Her muzzle and belly are white, and she has a lilac patch around her right eye. In her16"form, her belly and ears are fluffy. Her ears are pastel rainbow with a pink underside. In her12"Select Seriesversion, her ears are solid light purple and her body is pastel rainbow. This version also has a blue and light green sleep mask with cucumbers on her forehead. She has round, black eyes and a pink nose and mouth.

name: Barbara
bio: Congratulations to Barbara! This budding broadcast journalist was recently promoted from 'Camera intern' to 'Carrot Correspondent' and can't wait to start asking tough questions. Like, why are carrots orange? Are they jealous of broccoli? Tune in to find out!
appearance: Barbara is a pink cup of pink drink. They have a light pink lid on top of their head with a teal straw with a pink bow and a teal peep on the right side of their lid. The lower part of their lid is darker pink with teal spots. They have a light pink belly and has round, black eyes with lashes and a pink smile with dark pink cheeks.

name: Barella
bio: Barella takes pride in her home and garden. She prunes the kelp regularly and keeps her window clean and free of surface scum. So it’s no wonder Barella loses her temper when neighbors stray on her lawn. Make sure you swim over the stone path when you visit Barella!
appearance: Barella is a maroon betta fish. She has wavy pectoral fins and a dorsal fin on top of her head with shiny holographic spots on her fins and belly. She has black eyes with lashes and a black smile.

name: Barika
bio: Barika can't see colors but that isn't stopping her from living her dream. She wants to be a digital designer, she loves creating digital art. At first, she was too shy to share it but now she's very proud to share her ideas. Would you like to see her work?
appearance: Barika is a light pink bearded dragon, a type of lizard. She has a light pink belly with pink spots, iridescent rainbow fringes on each side of her head and five iridescent rainbow markings on her back. She has round, black eyes with eyelashes and a squiggly closed mouth with her tongue sticking out.

name: Barkev
bio: Did you know there's an abandoned motel under the local beach boardwalk? Barkev sure did! This hardworking historian loves learning about his hometown and even creates custom souvenirs if his favorite landmarks. Remember to grab an enamel pin---it's forged from the recycled steel of the torn-down roller rink!
appearance: Barkev is a neon orange aquatic mammal with small but wide flippers and a neon green spotted snout. He has a neon green belly. He has round, black eyes. He wears a hot pink bucket hat.

name: Barkevina
bio: Barkevina won't go anywhere without her bestie, Bluby. These two are simply inseparable. Check out their friendship bracelets! Barkevina always thought she was the only one with a sunny day happy dance, until she sawBlubybust a move. Wanna see her latest choreography?
appearance: Barkevina is a chocolate brown chihuahua with tall ears which taper at the tips. Her muzzle, inner ears and eye brows are light tan. She has a creamy white belly. She has round black eyes rimmed in tan and a nose the same color.

name: Barnabus
bio: Looking for a new hobby? Join Barnabus and make some cool sand art! Barnabus loves how calming and tidy sand art can be, he even has a little sandbox on his desk to play with. Next, he wants to get a big sandbox for his backyard so more can join in the fun!
appearance: Barnabus is a light grey owl with darker, circular splotches. He also has prominent ear tufts and white markings on his face and belly. Small, grey feathers decorate his chest and he has a golden, triangular beak.

name: Barnes
bio: Coloring, card games, and cooking are some of Barnes's favorite things to do. He drew his own snack menu for friends to order from during card games. He gets excited when it's time to put on his chef hat and make yummy snacks.
appearance: Barnes is a pale green turtle with a tuft of white hair atop his head. He has a white belly and two flippers (one on each side). He has a simple face with round black eyes and a smile. On his back is a bright green, tie-dyed shell.

name: Barnet
bio: Barnet wakes up bright and early, ready to check off everything on their to-do list! This ambitious ‘Mallow starts their day with a quick yoga flow and vitamin-packed smoothie before even heading to work. Barnet has a big presentation to make next week but they already know it’s going to be a hit!
appearance: Barnet is an orange-themed like fruit bat. They have yellow inner ears and wings with a green leaf on their head. Barnet's belly resembles an orange slice with yellow pulp/flesh. They have round, black eyes and a red smiling mouth with two small white fangs.

name: Baron
bio: Grab your bear necessities because you are going on a camping trip with Baron! Let Baron be your next guide at your favorite national park. He is the king of the mountains and beary social!
appearance: Baron is a chocolate brown bear with round ears. He has a pale tan belly, inner ears and a marking on his muzzle which is narrow between his eyes and widens around his black nose and mouth. He also has round, black eyes.

name: Barrie
bio: Congrats to Barrie who just graduated from design school! Barrie draws with pencils, Inks--- even a stylus digital pen. His favorite scenes to draw are magic and fantasy because he can use so many different colors and create make-believe creatures. Want to see Barrie's latest artwork?
appearance: Barrie is a tie-dye purple frog with a cream colored belly. His eyes sit on top of his head, and are black rimmed in white. He has prominent nostrils above his smiling mouth, and a gold blush on his cheeks. at the top of Barrie's head he a fluffy purple mohawk.

name: Bart
bio: Bart is an explorer who dreams of becoming an astronaut. At night he uses his wings to fly up into space to discover new stars and planets. He also loves photography and takes a lot of photos while in space, which he shares with his friends and family!
appearance: Bart is a black bat with long, upright ears and wings on either side of his body. His inner ears and belly are lime green. He has round, black eyes rimmed with white and his smiling mouth is adorned with two white, pointed fangs.

name: Bart the Fox
bio: Bart is on his way to become a certified diver, he dreams of one day leading an underwater expedition to discover Atlantis! If you need a diving buddy, Bart is your guy!
appearance: Bart is a fox with an orange and white body. The lower half of his face, including his muzzle, is white, as well as his belly. His ears and feet are black. He has black, oval-shaped eyes, a large nose and a smiling mouth.

name: Bartie
bio: Bartie andFredare almost inseparable, Fred is an extrovert while Bartie is an introvert. Even though he loves to play games in the snow, his favorite past-time is watching movies on repeat. He loves watching holiday classics, do you want to join?
appearance: Bartie is a light-skinned elf with pointed ears and short, orange hair. He wears a green Santa hat with a red pom-pom on the tail and a red band around the base. He wears a green shirt which has a red collar with triangular points, each tipped with a white bead. His bottom half has a pattern of red and white vertical stripes.

name: Bartok
bio: Bartok can't wait for the Mad Science Fair! He has a theory that if he consumes half a salamander spleen, 12 mints, and a gallon of cola, foam will erupt from his ears. There's a lot of heavy hitters going out this year, like the carnivorous peanut and the textbook vaporizer, but here's hoping he wins the Golden Beaker!
appearance: Bartok is a green cup of milkshake. On top of his head is swirled purple whipped cream with black and orange sprinkles. There is a striped black and green straw poking out from the left side of the whipped cream. He has a black band around his body with a purple sticker with a black bat as well as bubbles on the left side. He has a scar on the left side of his face. He has round, black eyes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Bashira
bio: Meet Bashira. She's training at a special comedy school to become a magician! Bashira loves interacting with the audience and making people smile. Her dream is to one day travel the world and perform in different cities, can she show you some cool tricks?
appearance: Bashira is a multi-colored, marbled dog. She is mostly purple and green with traces of other colors like blue and pink. She has fluffy, floppy, purple ears. She has a light purple muzzle and darker purple nose. She has round, black eyes and a white belly. She wears a teal bandana with a white paisley print around her neck.

name: Basma
bio: Meet Basma. She lives near the coast with her family and loves taking family trips. They enjoy seeing different landscapes across the globe, but her favorite is their wetland backyard. She hopes that more 'Mallows visit her hometown to know how important the environment truly is.
appearance: Basma is a grey whooping crane, a type of large wetland bird. She has a red stripe on the top of her head that turns to black and goes does to her beak where it goes to either side under her eyes making an upside-down T shape. She has a light tan beak and light grey belly. She has fluffy, short, grey wings with black tips and round, black eyes with eyelashes.

name: Basmina
bio: Meet Basmina. She loves writing haikus about nature and spirituality, and takes her notebook and pen with her on long walks to find inspiration! Something about the sound of the sea always gets her creative juices flowing! Would you like to join her?
appearance: Basmina is a blue beluga whale with a bulging forehead. She has a fin on each side of her body and one atop her head, as well as a fluke (tail fins). She has a rainbow striped belly, round, black eyes and a curved smile.

name: Bastian
bio: Bastian takes the art of pizza making seriously. He even built his own brick pizza oven! Now he can bake a ton of pies in the blink of an eye—and get crispy crusts, too. Tell Bastian your favorite toppings and he'll put something in the oven just for you!
appearance: Bastian is a light blue rabbit with long lop ears. He has a darker blue fuzzy belly and a nose and mouth the same color. His eyes are black, one of which is winking, and two black whiskers appear on each side of his face.

name: Beans
bio: Beans considers himself a "nomad-entrepreneur"! His roommates consider him late on his portion of the rent... but he promises he'll pay them back when his app takes off. He just needs to come up with the logo... and the name... and the investor and what exactly it does!
appearance: Beans is a dark green chinchilla with a grey pattern on his cheeks and belly, as well as inside his ears with two green scars on his belly. Three green whiskers of various lengths sprout from each cheek. He has round black eyes and a green nose and mouth. He wears an orange beanie with a black pom pom.

name: Beata
bio: Beata speaks from the heart in every speech they give. This latte travels all around giving motivational speeches to any 'Mallow who wants a little boost of positively and encouragement. Now Beata is writing their first book about motivational speaking. They'll give you a signed copy!
appearance: Beata is a pink Latte with whipped cream topped with caramel, pink heart sprinkles, and a red straw. Their face consists of two winking eyes with two eyelashes and they have a red smile and pink cheeks. Their body is all pink and has a little red rectangle that says "I ♥ you a Latte".

name: Beatrice
bio: Beatrice lives by the bell. She can't wait to hear it chime after class because it means she gets to play outside with her other fluffy friends during her favorite time of year: spring!
appearance: Beatrice is a lavender lamb with a cream-colored face in inner eyes. She has black eyes with lashes and pink blush with a pink nose and cat-like smile.

name: Beatriz
bio: Beatriz gets distracted easily. So when she has to study for a big test at school, she puts on her headphones and zones out to chill to lo-fi beats. It's just the right music to help her get focused. Midterms are coming up this week--wish Beatriz luck!
appearance: Beatriz is a chestnut penguin with a white underbelly and face. She has snowflakes printed on her body with a yellow beak, and closed eyes in a happy expression. On the right side of Beatriz's belly she has three maroon snowflakes.

name: Beau
bio: Meet Beau! Beau plays glow-in-the-dark mini golf with his squad every Halloween. This course is extra spooky at night--there's even a haunted windmill! The winner get candy, spider rings, and zombie stickers! Want to join the game?
appearance: Beau is a white ghost with black floppy ears. He has a word said "BOO" that is black with white lining. He has rounded black eyes rimmed in white with a black patch on his right side of his eyes.

name: Beauregard
bio: Beauregard works at a flying museum! After taking tickets in the morning, he suits up to perform fly-bys in My Darling Midge, a vintage propeller plane. Guests love seeing their ticket-taker fly through the air, and are sometimes inspired to do the same to themselves one day!
appearance: Beauregard is a badger with a sage green head and an olive green body. He has round ears with black inside and a white muzzle. He has stripes running from his ears to his eyes which are black. He has a velvet green belly. He has round, black eyes and a broad black nose. He also has a large, fluffy, green tail.

name: Bebb
bio: Meet Bebb. He can barely sit still he has so much energy! This makes him a wonderful running partner! He loves long jogs on his favorite jungle trail and is working on his mile time. Want to give it a try? Don't worry about how fast you go. Just enjoy the journey!
appearance: Bebb is a cyan dinosaur with a light blue belly. He has blue spines running down his back and he has a long tail. His eyes are black and he has a simple smiling mouth.

name: Bebe
bio: You've never seen a blue bird hit a home run like Bebe can! Bebe loves to play and cheer with friends at their school games! Their favorite thing to do is play 'who can whistle the loudest'; Bebe always is the loudest on the team! Join Bebe to root at their next home game!
appearance: Bebe is a bluebird with a triangular yellow beak and embroidered round pink cheeks. Their eyes are closed with two short lashes on each and their fluffy wings are a darker shade of blue.

name: Bebina
bio: Meet Bebina. She's a zoologist who travels through the jungle studying exotic animals! Bebina has been curious and passionate about protecting wildlife ever since she was a little 'Mallow. In her downtime, Bebina loves reading mistery novels, playing chess, and perfecting her paella recipe!

name: Beck
bio: Beck fidgets sometimes without realizing. Talking to a trusted friend every week helps him manage the fidgeting and interrupting—oh, sometimes Beck talks out of turn and he gets really enthusiastic. If this happens, just tell Beck to pause because he doesn't mind waiting to share his thoughts, even if it's a funny joke!
appearance: Beck is a pheasant with a yellow head and a mustard yellow body with black markings resembling feathers. He has a maroon belly and fuzzy wings. He has a tuft of fuzz on his head a long tail with black eyes, and an orange beak.

name: Becki
bio: Meet Becki. This talkative ‘Mallow never runs out of things to say. She loves chatting about current events, pop culture, and even a little hot gossip! She’s also a great listener! Have something you need to get off your chest? Becki is the ‘Mallow for you!
appearance: Becki is a pink cell phone that has blue buttons for the numbers and menu button, her cancel button is red and her call button is green. There also a blue line over the dial area. On her forehead she has three blue lines. She has a phone accessory that is blue. Her face is holographic and she has black round eyes with a red smile and cheeks.

name: Bee
bio: You might think Bee's favorite letter is B, but it's actually Y! This caring panda feels bad that Y is only sometimes a vowel and even formed the 'Y is Great Appreciation Society' to show it some love. YIGAS meets on the third Thursday of every month and Bee would love to see you there!
appearance: Bee is a white Panda with tan ears, eye markings, nose, mouth and stripe across their body which are made of a velvet fabric. Their eyes are black and rimmed in white.

name: Beebz
bio: Grab your mittens! This creative 'Mallow is an expert ice sculptor! Beebz craves beautiful statues made completely out of ice. She recently finished a life-sized frozen sculptor of her best friend,Tyrus. Want to see? Hurry up before it melts.
appearance: Beebz is a cheetah with a pastel, tie-dyed coat including colors like yellow, blue and white. She is covered in white spots with a pale pink outline. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a pale pink nose and mouth. She also has sparkling pink inner ears. She has 3 pink poms on her head.

name: Beelie
bio: Say good morning to Beelie! She likes long, slow mornings with coffee, muffins, and the newspaper. Sometimes she even takes naps under the business section! The height of her day is finishing the crossword puzzle. Do you love mornings too?
appearance: Beelie is a gnome with a rounded large grey nose and a white bushy beard. She wears a tall red hat and a red and white striped shirt with a grey belly.

name: Beemie
bio: Beemie might get stern when she's on a sailboat, but that's only because she's thinking about safety. This 'Mallow teaches her students everything she knows about sailing--- and wind! Make sure to take notes on all the different kinds of knots. Beemie ends each class with a quiz
appearance: Beemie is a pink dog with floppy fluffy rainbow ears. Her belly is fluffy with white fur and a red heart which says YOU'RE PAWSOME. She has a patch on her muzzle and forehead the same color. She has round, black eyes with eyelashes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Beena
bio: Beena is an even-keeled bird—until you cut her off in traffic! After watching her chase down every reckless motorist on their cross-country road trip—to give them each a piece of her mind—Beena's friends decided to chip in to get her an early birthday present: a prepaid bus pass!
appearance: Beena is a parakeet (budgie), a type of small parrot. She has an off-white head, a pink body and a white belly with two sakura flowers one pink and one white. Her wings are pink. She has a rounded, yellow beak with a white cere above it, as well as round, black eyes with lashes.

name: Begonia
bio: Begonia is a yellow bee with shimmering silver wings. Her belly is striped in black and pale yellow. She has two black antennae with coral fuzzy tips. She has a brown egg-shaped muzzle with a black mouth and nostrils. She has closed eyes with lashes.
appearance: Begonia is a yellow bee with shimmering silver wings. Her belly is striped in black and pale yellow. She has two black antennae with coral fuzzy tips. She has a brown egg-shaped muzzle with a black mouth and nostrils. She has closed eyes with lashes.

name: Behemoth
bio: Behemoth is a big party animal who craves chaos, loves airtime and is fond of the colour yellow; fiercely protective, Behemoth never hesitates to go out and back for those he calls true friends.
appearance: Behemoth is a red monster known as theBehemoth. He has a yellow belly, snout, and eyebrows. He has a yellow mane and long black horns with thin yellow stripes.

name: Beija
bio: Beija won a chance to see her favorite singerLalinda! This 'Mallow lucked out, winning VIP concert tickets from her local radio station. Beija gets to bring one friend along for an unforgettable night. If you're a Lalinda fan too, maybe Beija will choose you!
appearance: Beija is a red squirrel with a tan face and belly. She has three chestnut stripes on the top of her head and a big, fuzzy tail behind them. She has long chestnut ear with tan inner ears. Her nose and mouth are black with closed black eyes with lashes.

name: Beijo
appearance: Beijo is an elephant with an ombre shift from purple to pink on their body. They have silver, glittery ears, and a large trunk outlined in hot pink, their eyes are black.

name: Bela Ciao
bio: Bela Ciao is the illest rapper in the game–in fact, she just tested positive for GOAT flu! Symptoms include sick bars, sicker beats, and the sicket sextuplet-platinum single streak in Squishtory. Though she did recently come into contact with longtime rivalLil Gouda... something tells her he won't catch it!
appearance: Bela Ciao is a meatball hoagie. Her bread is brown with light tan streaks and her wrapper is silver. She has meatballs and cheese sandwiched between her breads. She has round, black eyes and a red smile.

name: Belana
bio: This creative cow loves to paint and has dreams of going to art school. She paints furniture and woodwork designed by her brotherRonnie. After school she wants to open a gallery to share their furniture.
appearance: Belana is mostly white with patches of light teal on her lower left side and on her right ear. She has small, pale blue horns and round black eyes. Her muzzle is light pink with teal nostrils.

name: Belina
bio: Need a good book to read? Ask Belina! She loves to read and has a different book club almost every day of the week! Her favorite books are mystery or sci-fi, but she's always up for suggestions!
appearance: Belina is a cheerful rainbow with red, pink, yellow, green and blue bands of color. Her lower half consists of fluffy white clouds. A pale yellow sun with orange and yellow rays peeks out on her right side, wearing a happy expression with sparkly eyes.

name: Belinda
bio: Belinda is a very thoughtful bear, she loves to make handmade gifts! Valentine's Day is one of her favorite days to bake cookies and share them with her friends.
appearance: Belinda is a teal blue bear. She has round ears with white insides, as well as a white muzzle and belly. Her facial features are all black, including her oval-shaped eyes and round nose.

name: Belissa
bio: Belissa loves trick or treating, she makes a glittery costume every year! One year she was a fairy princess with beautiful glitter wings, and another year she was a witch with a glittery broom and a matching hat. Can you guess what her costume is this year?
appearance: Belissa is a cupcake with swirled icing in layers of orange and yellow. She has a spooky, jack-o-lantern style face with triangular black eyes and a toothy mouth. Her lower half is purple with vertical black stripes.

name: Belita
bio: Belita is learning to be bolder! On the soccer field, in the boardroom—even at the grocery store. The “old Belita” might have never taken 8 helpings of her favorite sweet treat from the sample counter, but the “bold Belita” just did!
appearance: Belita is an emerald green  with long, upright ears. Her inner ears and wings are light yellow. She has a fuzzy light yellow belly. She has round, black eyes and short, curled lashes. Her red, smiling mouth is adorned with two pointed white fangs.

name: Bella
bio: Using Bella's spider sense is easy. She is not only a palm reader, but also a gifted magician. As the darkness creeps in, she goes from a regular Squishmallow to a girl with tricks up her sleeve.
appearance: Bella is a black spider with eight creepy crawly legs. She has a red belly and smile. Her eyes are round and black with a white rim around the outside.

name: Bellamy
bio: Bellamy is a teal axolotl-pegacorn with a rose gold horn on her head. She has shimmery rose gold gills with pink frilly edges on each side of her head. She has rose gold wings on each side of her body. She has small, stubby arms, round black eyes, and a cat-like smile.
appearance: Bellamy is a teal axolotl-pegacorn with a rose gold horn on her head. She has shimmery rose gold gills with pink frilly edges on each side of her head. She has rose gold wings on each side of her body. She has small, stubby arms, round black eyes, and a cat-like smile.

name: Belle
bio: Belle is adventurous and loves to try new things. Her favorite hobbies are knitting, travelling, cooking, and eating all the sushi rolls she possibly can!
appearance: Belle is laying on her tummy. She has four white legs and her body, ears, and tail are mint colored with white stripes. The insides of her ears are melon colored. She has two black eyes, one open with two white circles inside, and the other closed. She has two black whiskers on each side of her face and a black nose and mouth.

name: Belozi
bio: Meet Belozi. This dapper dresser loves to stand out, sometimes it's thanks to his looks, and other times it's for his kindness. He lives by two simple rules: putting your best foot forward and treating others with respect.
appearance: Belozi is a white and rainbow cow. He has patches of pastel rainbow stripes over his right ear, around his left eye, and covering his belly. He has bright, aqua horns and round black eyes. He wears a bow tie which matches his horns. The inside of his ears and his muzzle are both peach pink.

name: Belton
bio: Meet Belton. They work at the local bookstore and have a passion for old books and mythical stories. Sometimes when Belton is at the bookstore at night, they say they can hear the books talk! Do you want to dive into the historical, mythical world of the bookstore with Belton?
appearance: Belton is yellow bear with lemon ears and a white muzzle and belly. They have pink blushing on their cheeks.

name: Ben
bio: Ben is your walking textbook. He is a trivia expert who is quite knowledgeable in every topic from pop culture, history, technology and more. Looking for a partner for your next game night? Ben is your perfect Squishmallows match!
appearance: Ben is a blue-green dinosaur with a white belly. He has darker green spines running down his back. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Benedict
bio: Benedict grew up in a small family as an only child, and enjoys his privacy and quiet time. You can usually find Benedict kayaking or fishing alone, but if you aske him, he will welcome your company any time! Grab your floaties and jump in!
appearance: Benedict is a light purple hippo fading to blue from top to bottom. Two square teeth poke out from beneath his snout, and his round black eyes rest atop it. He has small, curled ears with white insides, as well as a white belly.

name: Benito
bio: If you've ever taken a subway train from the town square, you know Benito! He's always on the platform dancing to oldies or practicing some new magic tricks. Make sure you stop by and say 'Hey' to Benito next time you ride the subway!
appearance: Benito is an off-white cow with blueberry syrup and a blueberry sitting atop his head with medium slate blue ears and horns. He has a medium slate blue spot by his lower right, pink muzzle, blue nostrils, and black eyes.

name: Benjamin
bio: Benjamin is writing his very own comic-book character: Optimism Guy! Optimism Guy had a really hard 6th grade and just wanted to go play trains with brother but used his superpower of optimism―Get it?―to grow up and become a superhero. Benjamin can totally relate to Optimism Guy and hopes to be just like him one day!
appearance: Benjamin is a lime green koala with green ears and fuzzy green inner ears. His face is light green with five green fruit pulp/flesh. On top his head he has a brown stem with a dark green leaf. He has, round black eyes, a black egg-shaped nose and a smiling mouth.

name: Benkamin
bio: Benkamin plays sudoku to help him fall asleep. It's a cozy activity he loves pairing with hibiscus tea and a calming incense. That way, if the puzzle gets too tricky, he still has a relaxing time. Grab a book and snuggle up with Benkamin!
appearance: Benkamin is a blue beetle and a white belly, he has a darker blue stripe on his center and dark blue wings on his side. He has blue curled antennae on his head, black eyes, a black smiling mouth and pink blush on his cheeks.

name: Benny
bio: Benny is a bigfoot and one of the smartest creatures in the woods! He loves to run and play with his pals in the forest and beyond. When he is not running around you can often find him taking photographs with woodland friends.
appearance: Benny is a brown creature with a fuzzy mane on his head and long, shaggy ears. He has white pads on his feet which are shaped like hearts, and 3 toes. He has black eyes, a wide mouth which stretches across his face, and a white tooth sticking out of the right side of his mouth.

name: Benti
bio: Benti's favorite part about fall is all the candy that he gets to eat. His favorite is caramel apples with peanuts! Because of all the sugar, he has to work extra hard to keep his fangs pearly white. When he grows up, he wants to be a dentist just like his mom and dad.
appearance: Benti is a vampire with black hair and light pale teal skin with a round purple belly. His hair forms a widows peak on his forehead. He has pointed, elvish ears, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth with sharp white fangs. He wears a black cape lined in red with drawstring tied in a bow across his chest.

name: Bergen
bio: Don't tell his colleagues at The North Pole Post, but Bergen is leaving for The North Star Gazette! They wooed him with an attractive offer of unlimited candy canes and even threw in three weeks of playing in the snow time, too. How could a snowman cookie Christmas ornament say no to that?
appearance: Bergen is a brown cookie snowman. He has light blue frosting in front of his face with swirls of icing and red and blue candy above and below his face and a peppermint on his belly. He wears a red scarf. He has a red Santa on his head. He has round, black eyes, an orange carrot nose and a smiling mouth.

name: Bergit
bio: Bergit is here and camera ready, behind the camera that is. She's always looking for the perfect shot. Bergit even plans her vacations around snappable places like murals, nature, and architecture. Get ready for your close-up because her favorite subjects are her friends!
appearance: Bergit is a pink to yellow ombre boba tea with pink embroidered boba. She has a pink flower on her white lid, on the right hand side. She has wide open black embroidered eyes with eyelashes.

name: Berit
bio: Meet Berit; this moth loves to dream and interpret dreams for others. Yesterday she dreamt that she became a snowflake fairy princess and ruled a magical kingdom. She was about to host a snowball when suddenly she woke up. Do you have any dreams to share with Berit?
appearance: Berit is a beige moth with shiny silver antennae and a fuzzy white belly. She has lighter beige wings with a pattern of three orange spots and brown spots and lines. She has round black eyes, pink cheeks, and a smiling black mouth.

name: Berjon
bio: The busy season is here at Berjon's flower shop! Valentine's Day brings in more 'Mallows than usual, so Berjon works extra hard trimming roses and wrapping stems for bouquets. Berjon even threads in dried eucalyptus branches to give a simple flower arrangement a unique finish.
appearance: Berjon is an admiral blue hog with cyan color details inside their ears, on their snout. Their ears are heart-shape and flop forwards. They have two round, black eyes and distinct green nostrils with two white tusks. They also have navy blue hair. They have a fuzzy blue belly and two hearts one white and one blue.

name: Berko
bio: Berko is a park ranger. Ask him all about all the different plant life—it's his specialty! Berko wrote the booklet on all the edible plants and flowers in the park. He even knows all the best spots to watch the sunset. Come visit Berko on your next park adventure!
appearance: Berko is a bunny with long pastel orange colored floppy ears with shiny gold insides. He has a lighter fuzzy belly and a tiny tail. He has round black eyes and pinkish nose and mouth.

name: Bermayeh
bio: Everyone knows Bermayeh! They can't help but make friends everywhere they go, and most of the time, it starts with just a smile. Bermayeh throws parties all the time because they love bringing all their pals together. They are such gracious host, not even the shyest 'Mallow can't resist attending a Bermayeh bash!
appearance: Bermayeh is a bright blue bull with a patch of longer dark blue fur like a fringe. They have a fluffy, white belly, muzzle and inner ears, which aren't fluffy.
