They have thin, white, curved horns which sit wide from their head. They have round, black eyes, gold nostrils and a golden nose ring. They also have a long, blue tail with a dark blue fluffy end. They have two spots one on their right eye and one on the right side of their body. They also have a blue flower on their belly.

name: Bermuda
bio: Bermuda isn't good with money—she's great with money! This clever third-grade math teacher is crafty with coupons, smart about stocks, and could probably earn a PhD in credit card rewards. In fact, she just used her latest points to—purchase a motel?!
appearance: Bermuda is a sloth with a yellow body and a white patch on her face and belly. The banded markings around her eyes and her muzzle are yellow. She has a pale yellow belly with a pineapple embroidered on the right side. She has round black eyes, a brown round nose and a cat-like smile.

name: Berna
bio: Meet Berna. This narwhal is one clever lawyer. She's dedicated and hardworking, she loves thinking creatively to makes things happen. Berna hopes to help change the world, one day at a time.
appearance: Berna is a tie-dyed narwhal, predominantly blue shades ranging from cobalt to ice blue, with a white belly. She has two fins on each side and a dorsal fin on her back. An elongated, sparkly silver horn protrudes from her head. She has sparkling black eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.Her horn in real life is rather, flimsy

name: Bernard
bio: Bernard puts together the most elaborate picnics! He spreads out a big blanket on the lawn of his favorite seaweed forest and arranges homemade snacks, drinks, and utensils all on a little shell table. You're invited to join Bernard on his next picnic!
appearance: Bernard is a tie-dyed grey shark with a white belly. He has two dorsal fins with one atop his head and one on his back, alongside two pectoral fins on his sides and a tail fin under him. He has "You're Jawsome!" embroidered in grey on his belly with two red hearts beside "You're" and a red heart inside the O of "Jawsome". He has black eyes and an open mouth with white, sharp teeth and a red inner mouth.

name: Bernardo
bio: Are you ready for a spicy surprise? Be sure to catch Bernardo on the baby grand every Friday night. He sings and plays the piano, but with a little twist. He only sings in Spanish, and by the time you leave, you might sing in Spanish too!
appearance: Bernardo is a burrito with round, black eyes and a smiling mouth. His body is made up of a tortilla in a white wrap, which is flipped over to reveal shiny silver on the inside. Meat, tomato, lettuce and cheese spill out from the top of the tortilla.

name: Bernice
bio: Blissful, bubbly and bright. Three words to describe the best boba you'll meet! Bernice is sweet, but not too sweet, and always lends a helping hand to her friends.
appearance: Bernice is a cup of light brown boba tea filled with dark brown pearls. She has round, black eyes and a red smiling mouth. She has a pastel colored lid with a green straw poking out from the right side.

name: Bernie
bio: Bernie loves the mountains and helping other people more than anything else in the world. Bernie’s dream is to become an Emergency Medical Technician (EMT) in order to assist in mountain rescues. When he’s not saving lives, you will find Bernie enjoying the snowy weather. He keeps himself entertained by romping, rolling and pulling his friends on sleds!
appearance: Bernie is a reddish-brown dog with white markings. These appear as a wide stripe from the top of his head to his muzzle, which is also white, and on his belly. He has darker brown ears which are triangular and folded over. He has a black nose and mouth, as well as black eyes ringed in white.

name: Berrina
appearance: Berrina is a pink jar of strawberry jelly (jam) with a pale pink lid. Red jelly leaks from under her lid and drips down her face. She has a pale pink label with two strawberries, a smaller pink one and a larger red one, laughing. The label also has a yellow bubble that says 'EXTRA FUN' in green.

name: Berry
bio: Choose your own adventure books are Berry's favorite kind, she loves to have options! Last week she went on a treasure hunt and saved a guppy in distress! What kind of adventure book should she read next?
appearance: Berry is a pale teal lamb with a white face. Her nose is silver and shaped like a heart. She has closed eyes with curled lashes and a sweet, smiling mouth. Her belly and inner ears are white and fluffy.

name: Bertha
bio: Bertha is one sassy receptionist! (But also really shy and intoverted!) So while she might think of something super mmmmmhm to say! (She'll probably just think it.) Because if Bertha said it out loud, you couldn't even take it! (Neither could she.)
appearance: Bertha is a magenta elephant she has large, floppy ears which resemble butterfly wings that have light purple  inner ears with a butterfly pattern, which contains magenta dots and pale-purple pattern. She has an embroidered trunk. She has round, black eyes.

name: Bertie
bio: Bertie is one cool 'Mallow. In fact, they might be the coolest 'Mallow around! They like to keep their room super cold all the time, but they have plenty of comfy blankets for guests. Make sure you pack a jacket if you go to visit Bertie!
appearance: Bertie is a teal waffle with a diamond pattern all over. Bertie's body is folded into a taco shape with three scoops of ice cream—covered with dessert syrup and sprinkles—sticking out from between the layers; a vanilla scoop with purple syrup, a blue scoop with green syrup, and a strawberry scoop with red syrup & a cherry on top. There is also a wavy flat pink piece of fabric stretched out behind the ice cream scoops, likely meant to represent more ice cream. They have black rounded eyes, a red mouth, and pink blushing cheeks.

name: Bertwin
bio: Meet Bertwin. He loves coffee, reading, and combing his beard. He loves to read books about magic and mystery and is even working on his own novel. Bertwin gets pretty distracted so he needs a study buddy to help him stay focused on his writing; will you help him write?
appearance: Bertwin is a yellow bearded dragon, a type of lizard. He has a white belly and three brown markings on his back, above his tail. He has fringes that protrude from either side of his head. He has round, black eyes, and a cat-like smile.

name: Bessa
bio: Meet Bessa. Bessa loves activities that others might find frightening! White water rafting, skydiving, or even zip-lining, there is nothing too scary. Bessa's biggest dream is to one day break the land speed record and become the fastest 'Mallow alive! So don't blink or you might miss her!
appearance: Bessa is a pale grey pig with pink details inside her ears, on her snout and on her belly. Her ears are triangular and flop forwards. She has two round, black eyes and a curly tail.

name: Bessem
bio: Bessem puts the "show" in "real estate showing" in fact, she razzle-dazzles potential buyers with her famous Opera House Open Mics. If you're lucky, Bessem might even perform her own stand-up comedy set. Did you ever hear the one about the granite countertops?
appearance: Bessem is a mint bigfoot with a fuzzy pink mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has sparkly pink pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts, and 3 toes. She has black eyes, a wide mouth which stretches across her face, and a white tooth sticking out of the right side of her mouth.

name: Bessie
bio: Bessie organizes community events! Whether it's a block party for the grand opening of a new business, or fundraising for a 5K race, she makes sure the whole town is involved. Want to know what Bessie is planning next? It's the yearly toy drive!
appearance: Bessie is a bat mixed with a blueberry, she has a blue calyx sitting atop her head, tall, triangular ears and bat wings by her sides. Her inner ears, wing webbing, and belly are an off-white purple. Her eyes with lashes are closed and she has a blueberry embroidered on her belly, and her smile is red, with no fangs poking out the bottom like other bats.

name: Beth
bio: Beth is a registered dietician! She specializes in heart-healthy meals like pan-roasted pork chops and hopes one day to open a grease-free roadside diner: The Heart What It Wants. Remember to bring your running shows, you'll have to high-knee to your seat!
appearance: Beth is a bluish-grey bigfoot with a fuzzy mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and blue belly with hearts one blue and one gold, and blue pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush beneath and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face.

name: Bethany
bio: Bethany's favorite meal is breakfast, especially fresh biscuits and jam! Her mom makes them every Friday for dinner. On the weekends, Bethany helps her mom in the garden, tending to all the yummy berries she uses for jam.
appearance: Bethany is a purple koalacorn, a koala with a unicorn horn. She has furry, round ears that are multi-colored, mainly pink, purple, and blue. She has an oval nose which is black, and a small smile. She has round, black eyes with curled eyelashes. Her horn is either shiny rainbow or a shimmering pink, depending on the release, with a spiral pattern pointing upward.

name: Bethuna
bio: Meet Bethuna. She is a personal trainer with a giant sweet tooth. Bethuna's favorite dessert is a scoop of mint chocolate chip ice cream, and she'll usually enjoy it after a long run outside! And even though she has a sweet tooth, she doesn't let it stop her from hitting the gym every day!
appearance: Bethuna is a mystical creature with features similar to a dragon. She has a green body and her muzzle, belly and fuzzy mane are yellow. She has small, white fangs under her muzzle and two long, black horns with thin, yellow stripes. The edges of her wings are black and the insides of her wings and ears are shiny gold. Bethuna's body, belly, muzzle, and mane all glow under black light.

name: Bette
bio: Bette loves studying the local subway map. She appreciates the intricacies of its design and always marvels at just how many 'Mallows it moves a day. Though she currently attends nursing school, Bette sometimes thinks she should attend train conductor school!
appearance: Bette is an aqua flying fish with a pale teal belly. She has hologram wing-like fins on each side of her body as well as holographic pelvic fins on the bottom of her. Her face has wide open black eyes with eyelashes and a smiling mouth with light pink blush. She has a large teal stripe on top of her head.

name: Betty
bio: Betty loves a good thrill! Whether it's rock climbing or skydiving, this daredevil will do anything to satisfy her thirst for adventure! She tries to push people out of their comfort zones, yet respects her friends' decisions to not join her.
appearance: Betty is a black bat with long, upright ears and a purple belly. She has round, black eyes rimmed with white. Her red, smiling mouth is adorned with two pointed white fangs.

name: Beula
bio: Meet Beula. She loves DIY painting and making everyday things into beautiful art. Beula wants to be an art teacher when she grows up, so she can paint and share how much art means to her.
appearance: Beula is a periwinkle blue octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including cobalt, purple, periwinkle and light fuchsia). She has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Bevalee
bio: Have you seen Bevalee? This unicorn is a heart of gold and is always ready for competition. Even if she isn't always number 1, she loves to try! Bevalee loves to thrill of competing whether it's a sport, in class, or even shares at home. Her secret is keeping it fun!
appearance: Bevalee is a rainbow unicorn. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly white horn with a pink swirl wrapped around it. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes.

name: Bevin
bio: Bevin leaves for sleepaway camp tomorrow! She's never been away from home this long and is feeling nervous about being on her own. Bevin memorized the camp song so she can sing along with everyone. Maybe she'll make a friend on the bus ride there!
appearance: Bevin is a pastel rainbow-colored snow cone. The top of her head is fuzzy and horizontally striped with yellow, pink, teal, and purple. Her bottom half is a diagonally striped white, pink and teal cup with round, black eyes with eyelashes, a red smiling mouth, and light pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Bex
bio: Who has a sweet tooth and loves to help others? It's Bex! She is a nurse who works with mini 'Mallows and takes her job very seriously. She tries to brighten their day with the occasional sweet treat and even a song, what can she sing for you?
appearance: Bex is a fox with a tie-dyed pattern of blue and pink spots. She has a white mask marking across her face and a white belly. Her inner ears are sparkly and the color varies between sizes: bright blue for her16", and pastel pink for her8". She has a round, black nose and oval eyes with a white shine. She has long, curly lashes and is poking out her hot pink tongue. Her tail is fluffy and matches the color of her inner ears (meaning it differs depending on the size).

name: Bexley
bio: Ready for a math lesson? Make sure to call Bexley for some extra help. Bexley uses some of her favorite candies like jelly beans and marshmallows to help make math fun.
appearance: Bexley is a unicorn with a rainbow base coat, including colors such as blue, yellow and lilac. She is covered in very pale pink leopard spots. She has a white muzzle and inner ears, and her fluffy mane is candy pink. She has a shimmering silver horn with a hot pink spiral. The lower half of her body is encased in a pastel Easter egg, decorated in wavy lines. The egg's layers are blue, purple and green, with the middle row decorated with yellow spots.

name: Bianca
bio: Bianca just finished her first day of preschool! She had a great time learning numbers and singing songs but did get a little embarrassed during the name game. How are you supposed to introduce yourself as an independent grown-up girl when the only “B words” you know are bad, bark bark, and baby?
appearance: Bianca is a magenta gargoyle, a dragon-like creature. She has black specks all over her body and has a light pink belly. She has black horns with magenta wing-like ears sitting below them. She has two black wings on each side of her body with pink webbing. Her snout is pink, with black nostrils and she has small, white fangs. She has round black eyes with short lashes.

name: Biatrix
bio: Meet Biatrix. She's an amazing multitasker! Did you know she can play the piano while stirring sugar into her tea and reading her favorite book? She's even been known to knit socks for her friends in her sleep! With Biatrix, you never know what she'll do next!
appearance: Biatrix has a seemingly random tie-dye pattern with mainly blue, green, yellow and pink. She has multiple single-colored pink stripes around her body from top to bottom. She has two rainbow fins with a pink border. Her face has wide open black eyes with eyelashes and a smiling mouth with small dimples.

name: Bibiana
bio: Welcome Bibiana! Her favorite activity is weekend picnics with her family - her mom makes the best potato salad! Bibiana thinks about studying art history so she can grow up and work at a museum. Would you like to visit her art exhibits?
appearance: Bibiana is a light purple butterfly with black antennae that have purple pompoms on top. She has black wings with a pattern of purple sections and white dots. She has a pale purple belly with stripes the same color as her body. She has round eyes with short lashes, peach cheeks and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Bicepa
bio: Bicepa might look nice, but put her in the boxing ring and she'll—well, also be nice! This female boxer has a heart of gold and believes a good fight is a fair fight. Besides, it's not like she needs cheap shots to win anyways. Have you seen those shoulders?
appearance: Bicepa is a purple Chow Chow with short ears and a fluffy, curled tail. Her inner ears are pink, with a cream lavender belly. She has fur markings over her face. Her muzzle is lavender colored, and she has black eyes, a black nose, and curved mouth with her blue tongue sticking out.

name: Bijan
bio: Meet Bijan. He really knows how to go with the flow and improvise. He's a jazz musician! His eight tentacles make him an amazing drummer. His parents own a restaurant on the reef where they have weekly jazz nights and he's been playing there since he was just a little 'Mallow!
appearance: Bijan is a yellow dumbo octopus, a type of umbrella octopus (meaning their arms are connected by a web of skin). His tentacles flare out from his body in a flower-like shape and are burnt orange on top, golden tan on the bottom. He also has yellow fins on his head which resemble ears and have shiny, golden inner ears. They have a winking expression with lashes on both eyes, pink blush and a smiling mouth.

name: Billy
bio: Billy recently appeared on his favorite game show! He thought years of yelling at the TV would make him a master at “finding the most popular answer” but was disappointed to learn he’s more idiosyncratic than most. Isn’t everyone’s “Favored Fall Activity” feeding crows outside Horse Lodge #1112?
appearance: Billy is a sage green horse with a white stripe on his forehead. He also has a tan muzzle with dark green nostrils. His mane and tail are brown, and his fluffy belly is also tan. He also has round, black eyes.

name: Bimbi
bio: Bimbi graduates from clown academy this year! Bimbi is so excited to be a professional clown. They're perfecting a comedy routine, so they can start working right away, Not only does Bimbi have perfect comedic timing, they're also a talented tap dancer!
appearance: Bimbi is a tan humanoid clown with white marks on their eyes and mouth. They have a red fuzzy wig on their head with a small, purple top hat. They have rounded black eyes with a round, red nose and a black smile. Bimbi wears a green-yellow stripe waistcoat, with a yellow buttoned shirt including blue and purple suspenders; they also have a red button and a purple button on their shirt.

name: Bindy
bio: Meet Bindy. He is a very kind and caring walrus. He loves animals and always tries to help those in need. One day Bindy hopes to have his own rescue organisation, so all animals and Mallows can live happy lives!
appearance: Bindy is a brown walrus with flippers on each side of his body. His muzzle and belly are both light tan, and he has two white tusks protruding from his mouth. He has closed eyes, straight whiskers and a dark brown nose. The phrase "Follow your dreams" is written in a hot pink font on his belly.

name: Binoche
bio: Binoche has finals coming up and she is planning on crushing it! All Binoche wants is to keep her perfect GPA. Think she can do it? Binoche will take a break once finals are over, but for now, it's study time! Want to help Binoche review her index cards?
appearance: Binoche is a bluish-grey deer with a white face and fuzzy  belly. She also has white inner ears and bluish-grey speckles on her forehead. She has blue gingham antlers on top of her head and a black bow with a rose in the middle. She has mischievous with a black nose and mouth.

name: Binxie
bio: Ready to meet a hero of the night? Say hello to Binxie! Binxie works at a haunted house and uses her sonar skills to help navigate 'Mallows to the scare-free zones. Binxie loves a good scare but when things get too scary she's there to lend a helping hand.

name: Bittie
bio: Need a new swim cap? Let Bittie design one for you! Bittie is an aspiring swimwear designer, and is working on a new type of material that is both waterproof, and comfortable to wear! What design should Bittie use for your new cap?
appearance: Bittie is a Seacow, the combination of a cow and a manatee. They have the light brown body of a cow with a tan manatee snout, flippers for arms, and a split tail fin. Their snout is spotted with brown and they have small, brown nostrils. They have a patch of darker brown spread over and around their right ear. They have round, black eyes. They have brown splats on their light brown belly.

name: Blaine
bio: Blaine is a financial reporter for The Graveyard Gazette. He's releasing his first book next summer—an oral history on the rise of crypt-currency—and even landed an interview with the founder of Creep Coin! What should Blaine ask her first?
appearance: Blaine is a blue bat with tall, pointed ears and bat wings. His inner ears and wings are a holographic ocean blue with a light blue fuzzy belly. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with two fangs poking out at the bottom.

name: Blair
bio: Blair is an outgoing cat who expresses her creativity through makeup. She loves all things beauty and dreams of becoming a cosmetologist. She's the perfect friend to call when you have a big event to attend as she'll help you look your most beautiful!
appearance: Blair is a calico cat with a white body and blue and grey patches. She has one blue patch over her left ear, and two grey patches, one on her right ear and the other on her lower right body. She has closed eyes, black whiskers and a happy, pink cat mouth. Her tail is grey with a blue tip.

name: Blake
bio: Blake loves to dress up! You can find her in all different costumes, especially on playdates with her friendAva. She is always in character, whether on ship as a pirate, on land as a princess, or at sea as a mermaid.
appearance: Blake is a pale grey rabbit with long lop ears. She has a white belly and a pale pink nose and mouth. Her eyes are closed, and two black whiskers appear on each side of her face. There is a variation of Blake that has a plastic squeaker inside.

name: Blake B.
bio: Grab your bear necessities because you are going on a camping trip with Blake! Let Blake be your next guide at you favorite national park. He is the king of the mountains and beary social!
appearance: Blake is a chocolate brown bear with round ears. He has a lighter brown belly and a round, light brown muzzle. He also has round, black eyes and circular black glasses.

name: Blanca
bio: Even though she's a rainbow kangaroo, Blanca's favorite color is black. She loves to draw and paint in black and white and even designs her own artsy Easter baskets for her friends.
appearance: Blanca is a tie-dyed kangaroo, predominantly yellow, pink and blue, with tall, upright ears. She has a round snout which is tie-dye on top and white on the lower half. Her ears and belly are also white, with a pouch on her front. She has round, black eyes and a pale pink nose.

name: Blanche
bio: Blanche performs at the local diner six nights a week. Her favorite song to sing—"Mudslide on Route 9"—is about not knowing you were in the good times until you're out of them and always brings tear-inducing emotions. That's why she follows it with another favorite—"Pull It Together, Blanche"!
appearance: Blanche is a navy blue possum. She has a white head with a triangular tuft of navy fur atop it. She has a navy blue body with a dark blue velvet belly. Her round velvet ears are dark blue. She has round black, eyes a pink nose and mouth with dual black whiskers. Her tail is light pink.

name: Blas
bio: Blas rakes the fallen autumn leaves in front of his home every day. When he's done, it's time to jump in! Blas loves the crunchy sound of leaves as he files into a great big pile. Come join Blas and his 'Mallow pals for some fall fun!
appearance: Blas is a purple bat with tall, pointed bat ears and bat wings. His inner ears and wings are a glittery darker purple with a fuzzy belly. His eyes are closed in a happy expression with a smiling mouth and two white, sharp fangs poking out at the bottom of his mouth.

name: Blaze
bio: Ready for a haunted house extraordinaire? Blaze is the mallow for you! Blaze makes sure every spider web, headless horsemallow, and creepy cauldron are in the right place for the Malloween Mansion.
appearance: Blaze is a purple monster with round, black eyes, a smiling mouth and white fangs. Both his horns and his belly are striped in orange and light green. He also has a light green patch around his right eye. Two black bat wings sprout from his back.

name: Bliss
bio: This is one bear you can't wait to meet! Bliss always has a smile on her face, her cheerful grin is contagious! Bliss is a great pal and loves comedy and hearing good news from her friends. If you ever need someone to cheer you up Bliss is the bear for you.
appearance: Bliss is a mint green bear with rounded ears, the insides of which are sparkling silver. She has a white patch on her belly, and rosy pink cheeks. Her eyes are closed and have short, curled lashes.

name: Blizzard
bio: Blizzard loves building gingerbread houses, baking sugary goodies, and watching a snow storm. He loves to see the world sparkle when it's covered in snow.
appearance: Blizzard is a black bear. He has round ears with brown insides, as well as a brown muzzle and belly. His facial features are all black, including her oval-shaped eyes with white ring and a white dot on his eyes and round nose with a smile. He is also wearing a red scarf around his neck

name: Blossom
bio: (no bio given on tag)
appearance: Blossom is a white sheep that has her face is tan and inner ears are white. She has white legs and tan hooves, between which she is holding a rainbow. She has closed eyes with short lashes, with a heart-like nose and cat-like smile.

name: Blubo
bio: Blubo loves croissants. No matter the filling—Chocolate, raspberry, or hazelnut—she believes there no better pastry to start the day with. Her local café knows this, and even baked her a special “Blubo” croissant for her birthday. Filled with blueberry jam, it was almost as sweet as she is!
appearance: Blubo is a neon blue gummy bear with a dark blue tummy. She has neon blue ears with dark blue inner ears and neon blue tail behind. She has round blue eyes, a cyan muzzle and a blue nose and mouth.

name: Bluby
bio: You know Bluby is happy when she does her telltale happy dance! If you really want to make Bluby's day, just give her a heads up when sunny weather is in the forecast. Then watch Bluby dance all the way out to her favorite sunny spot!
appearance: Bluby is a blueberry with a darker blue calyx and a green leaf poking out from her top. She has a lighter blue belly, black eyes with eyelashes, and a red smile.

name: Bly
bio: Bly might not see the way her 'Mallow friends do, but she can look into your future. This clairvoyant kitty reads palms and paws, using her intuition to inform results of the reading. Got a question for Bly? She's ready to share wisdom.
appearance: Bly is a black cat with pointed, triangular ears. She wears a light purple scarf on her head with a a teal gem in the front, with the yellow gem holder on it. Her nose and mouth are pale pink and framed by two white whiskers on either side. She has round, black eyes ringed in white. She has small, black hands holding a teal crystal ball with text saying, "THE FUTURE LOOKS BRIGHT" in darker teal with yellow sparkles on it.

name: Blyne
bio: Life as a corporate tax attorney can get pretty stressful. That's why Blyne colors! This chronic workaholic loves winding with a fresh pack of crayons and a good coloring back. She especially enjoys giving animals fun and funky patterns—like polka dots on zebras!
appearance: Blyne is a tan cupcake with teal icing on her head decorated with a red cherry and multicolored sprinkles and a purple wrapper. She has black eyes with lashes, pink blush, and a red smile.

name: Bo
bio: Bo wanders the world spreading good vibes. She makes new friends, learns about their cultures, and shares stories about her adventures
appearance: Bo is tie-dyed in rainbow, predominantly pink, blue, and yellow. She has a round, white face with black eyes, nose and mouth. She also has two curved lashes on each eye. Her inner ears, horn, and wings are a shiny silver.

name: Bo Lynn
bio: Bo Lynn doesn't just sing about the forest—she sings with the forest! This down-to-earth country singer loves humming with the bees and crooning with the crows. Her next album is dedicated to Mother Nature and she hopes it inspires the world to protect her!
appearance: Bo Lynn is a mushroom with a bluish-grey stalk and a xanadu green cap with white spots. Her stalk makes up her body and includes a round, fuzzy pale green belly. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Bob
bio: Bob is an illustrator who lives by the beach! His gears are always turning as he dreams up new drawing. Bob collects one-of-a-kind toys that sometimes inspire his art, and he loves to showcase his work and collectibles in a large window facing the shore. Come check out Bob's artsy window display!
appearance: Bob is a metallic robot. He has a monitor with teal edges to display his face. He has teal antennae with red earpieces. His body also has another display with red edges with two meters inside. His face on his monitor has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Bobbie
bio: Bobbie is one clever 'Mallow! Bobbie and his BFFBowiespend hours in the library every weekend drawing sketches for new gadgets, and reading books about famous inventors. Bobbie andBowieknow there's no such thing as a bad idea, so don't be shy - so come join the brainstorm!
appearance: Bobbie is a Hedgehog with a fuzzy coffee brown body. His snout is sand-colored, and has a brown nose. His face, belly and ears are all white color. He also has two round black eyes.

name: Bobbix
bio: You can always find Bobbix at the shaded table in front of the boba tea shop! She scooters there every day after school for a quick snack with her classmates. Sometimes Bobbix even has homework sessions at her favorite table. Have a seat and join Bobbix for a boba tea!
appearance: Bobbix is a hot pink cat holding a green tea boba tea with heart boba and a magenta top and pink straw. She has a dark pink stripes on her head and sides, and her tummy is also white. On her back she has a hot pink tail. Her face consists of black eyes with two lashes and she has pink nose in a white muzzle with a pink mouth and she has black whiskers.

name: Bobby
bio: Meet Bobby! This bright bunny used to be embarrassed about the tie-dye pattern of their birthmarks but now Bobby knows that is part of what makes them special. Every year Bobby dyes eggs to match and shares them with other Squishmallows.
appearance: Bobby is a blue rabbit with long lop ears and tie-dye patterned fur ranging between icy blue and royal blue in hue. They have a white belly and a hot pink nose and mouth. Their round, black eyes have two short lashes, and two black whiskers appear on each side of their face. There is an Easter/Spring edition of Bobby with a multicolored egg on the right side of their belly.

name: Bobzi
bio: Meet Bobzi. This pup is one amazing chalk artist. They could spend all afternoon drawing beautiful and brightly colored landscapes on the blacktop. Bobzi doesn't seem to mind when the rain washes away their art. It's a chance to draw something new! Would you like to join them?
appearance: Bobzi is a Pekingese dog. They have a tan body and fuzzy, sandy-colored ears with a black underside. Their white belly is also fluffy. They have a scruffy black muzzle with black and white markings above their eyes that resemble eyebrows. They have black eyes and a grey nose and mouth.

name: Boden
bio: Boden enjoys spending his vacation camping next to his favorite lake. He brings an inner tube out to the water and floats in the waves all day. Once he accidently popped a tube with his horns, but thankfully Boden is an excellent swimmer. Want to join Boden on a relaxing lake float?
appearance: Boden is a dark brown buffalo with a long white horns. His inner ear, muzzle, and belly are all darker brown. He has rounded black eyes.

name: Bodie
bio: Bodie got a new computer for Christmas last year, but has only played with the box it came in since. With an imagination like his. It's easy to see why! Whether using it as a medieval shield, fancy top, or anything in between, the sky is the limit for Bodie and his box!
appearance: Bodie is mostly white with patches of yellow on his lower right side and on their left ear. He has small, pale yellow horns and round black eyes. The inside of his ears are a banana. his muzzle is light pink with yellow nostrils.

name: Bolivar
bio: Bolivar only watches monster movies! If you ask him about it, he will teach you all about how the movies were made. You'll often find Bolivar playing rock n' roll hits on the jukebox at his local diner--come by and introduce yourself! Bolivar loves making new friends.
appearance: Bolivar may resemble a crab from the front due to his large claws and six legs, but he is actually a scorpion - he has a long, segmented tail with a stinger on the end. He is brown, and has a darker brown belly divided into four sections by horizontal lines. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Bongo
bio: Bongo is a playful pug who loves to play and cuddle with his mom. His favorite toy is a cute little caterpillar, and Bongo takes the caterpillar with him almost everywhere he goes. It's his favorite toy, so he can't imagine a day without it!
appearance: Bongo is a black dog with floppy, curly ears. His muzzle, belly and markings around his eyes are grey. He has black eyes ringed in white and a triangular black nose. His pink tongue pokes out from his mouth. He has a sparkly bone with a golden outline decorating his belly.

name: Bonnie
bio: Want to start your own garden? Bonnie is the mallow for you! Bonnie spends her mornings outside in the garden, drinking tea and meditating. This panda princess is a free soul at heart and loves to be surrounded by nature!
appearance: Bonnie is a white bear with dark grey markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band around her body. She has a baby pink, heart-shaped nose, a black mouth and closed, happy eyes with straight lashes. She wears an iridescent blue crown atop her head.

name: Booga
bio: Booga discover fire! Booga try touch but Booga feel... what word... no word? Booga discover word for ouch feel... Booga think pain! Booga Booga Booga!
appearance: Booga is a grey ogre. They have a grey body with long grey ears with light grey inner ears. They have a tuft of grey fur on top of their head. They wear a brown caveman skirt with leopard prints and with a brown fuzzy band above with a grey belly. They have three grey spots on each side of their face. They have round, black eyes a black mouth with two square teeth poking out and pink blush.

name: Boone
bio: Boone teaches second grade and was named Teacher of the Year at her school! She is known for her patience and reading spooky poetry to her students. Every year, Boone treats her class to a Halloween carnival with hay rides and haunted houses! Want to tag along this year?
appearance: Boone is a black owl with prominent ear tufts that have orange inside. Orange feathers decorate her chest. She has black eyes and an orange triangular beak.

name: Bop
bio: Bop is the queen of nail design. She's so good that she has to paint her sisters' nails, her mom's nails and even her grandma's. She's known for her striped and spotted Easter egg nail design.
appearance: Bop is a pale pink rabbit with long lop ears. She has a white belly and a hot pink nose and mouth. Her eyes are closed, and two black whiskers appear on each side of her face.

name: Borsa
bio: Borsa just arrived to the big city with a suitcase and a dream---to star in a soap opera! This farmhand knows what he's taking a big risk, but he's been working on his gasps all summer long. Wish him luck on his first cattle call!
appearance: Borsa is a white cow with grey spots all around him a patch of longer tan fur like a fringe. He has a tan muzzle and white inner ears, and a fluffy, tan belly He has thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and thin brown lines mark the sections. He has round, black eyes, brown nostrils.

name: Botera
bio: Botera works in a car manufacturing factory, specializing in quality control. She leads an amazing team, and through the years, they've all become good friends. Even on her days off, Botera builds speedy two-seater kit cars. She imagines them like a giant puzzle!
appearance: Botera is a blue dog with floppy, triangular ears. She has a scruffy blue face and bluish-grey markings on her forehead, muzzle and belly. She wears a navy blue sherpa hoodie with white laces. She has round black eyes and a matching nose and mouth.

name: Boulder
bio: Grab some quarters and get ready for an intense day, Boulder is trying to beat their high score in pinball! Ever since their first game, Boulder has been obsessed with getting the highest score, ever! Do you ever get the end-of-ball bonus?
appearance: Boulder is a replica of Earth's moon, with a mottled grey body and dark grey craters (or spots). She wears a sleep mask which is shiny silver in color and has a fluffy white trim. The mask reads 'Good Night' in an elegant white font.

name: Bowie
bio: Bowie is one sleepy hedgehog, but she only likes to sleep because she has such big dreams! Bowie is an entrepreneur and one day plans on bringing fascinating innovations to the whole ‘Mallow world! Just after she wakes up from this nap…
appearance: Bowie is a tie-dye hedgehog with a white face, belly, and ears. She has a sparkly muzzle and brown nose along with black eyes. In some editions she isn't fluffy, instead having a tie-dyed body with a pattern of white spikes.

name: Boyd
bio: Boyd is a professionally trained opera singer; this monkey is the most beautiful baritone. You can recognize his voice from miles away! Boyd's friends beg him to give them singing lessons, and he loves to help them sing. One day he might open his own music school!
appearance: Boyd is a chocolate brown monkey with a tan muzzle and inner ears. He has a chocolate brown nose and a wide smile. His pastel pink belly is shaped like a heart. His eyes are obscured by baby blue sunglasses with a red heart on each lens.

name: Boyer
bio: Meet Boyer! Boyer is creative, charming and cool as a cucumber. Need someone to help you add the finishing touches to a project for school, or work? Boyer's attention to detail will help you make sure that everything looks top notch!
appearance: Boyer is a tan sheep with a black face and inner ears. They have black eyes rimmed in white and a pink nose and mouth. They have a tan belly with a red tag with bell. Boyer's easter mystery bag version has blue anime eyes instead.

name: Boyle
bio: Boyle travels all around staying at haunted hotels! So far, all the ghosts they’ve met have been very friendly and always let Boyle get a good night’s rest. Want to join Boyle on their next haunted hotel stay?
appearance: Boyle is a blue with triangular ears and wings on either side of their body. Their inner ears, wing membrane and fuzzy belly are pink. They have round, black eyes, bluish-grey muzzle and a curved smile which shows two pointed, white teeth.

name: Brad
bio: Brad isn't just an athlete--he's a mathlete too! This high school hero is an expert at hitting homers, scoring touchdowns, and solving equations. Brad's mastery of fractions even lead the varsity algebra team to state finals last year!
appearance: Brad is an olive green colored golden retriever with floppy ears. His ears are fluffy with olive green fur. He has a patch on his muzzle and forehead the same color. He has round, black eyes and a black nose and mouth. He has a moss colored fluffy belly.

name: Bradley
bio: Bradley is writing a mystery novel! It tells the story of an irreverent theater director tasked with unmasking the identity of an infamous bakery burglar. The cryptic letters of "The Gluten Guzzler" might be difficult to decode, but Jack Celiac has fought worse word puzzles in the paper for years!
appearance: Bradley is a lavender water buffalo with long light grey horns. He has dark green ears with light grey inner ears. He has a round dark grey belly. He has round, black eyes a grey muzzle and black nostrils.

name: Braedon
bio: Who loves history, grilled cheese, and being organized? Braedon does! This triceratops loves to discover historical fun facts and shares them with his friends. When he's in research mode, he feels invincible with his favorite sandwich by his side. Do you have a favorite sandwich?
appearance: Braedon is a teal Triceratops in the style of a stackable. He has a yellow pointed frill that adorns his head, two white horns on his head, and a wide, white horn on his snout. He has black eyes, and a black smile.

name: Brandi
bio: Have you met Brandi? She's the cheetah queen of the ring! Brandi loves kickboxing and riding her bike on the beach. After a day of teaching classes, she loves to catch the cotton candy sunset on her way home.
appearance: Brandi is a cheetah with pink spots and a base coat of marbled blue and white. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a light pink nose and mouth. She has glittery inner ears and wears a sparkling crown atop her head. She also has round eyes with short lashes.

name: Branko
bio: Branko is a big time theater director! He's currently working on a black-box revival of "Werewolf: The Musical" and thinks scaling back the sets will really scale up the performances. For example, the titular werewolf won't be howling at the moon—he'll be howling at a tenor with a flashlight!
appearance: Branko is a tan monster with teal icing on his face. He wears an orange bow tie, with a green skull and has a black belly with two pink buttons. He has lime green and orange striped horns and a tuft of orange fur on his head and two pink fuzzy eyebrows on his forehead. He has two black scars on each side of body. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with two square teeth poking out.

name: Braven
bio: Meet Braven. He's the conductor for the winter parade and he hopes all 'Mallows will join on the fun. Even if they don't celebrate the same holidays, Braven thinks spreading joy, kindness, and compassion is good for everyone. Do you want to join in the parade festivities?
appearance: Braven is a tan bear with round ears. He has a light tan belly, muzzle and inner ears. He also wearing his Nutcracker Outfit with the color of a blue jacket with golden swirls on him with a white shirt with golden buttons he wears a red pants and a black belt around him.

name: Bravo
bio: Guess who was invited to their first Valentine's Day party? It's Bravo! Social gatherings make Bravo feel shy, but tonight he's bringing a box of his favorite raspberry thumbprint cookies to help break the ice. Maybe Bravo will even make a new friend!
appearance: Bravo is a lavender hamster with a creamy white pattern on his cheeks and belly, as well as inside his ears. He has round black eyes and a bright pink nose and mouth. He is also holding a fuzzy lavender heart in his white hands.

name: Bren
bio: Storytime is all the time with Bren! This multitasking 'Mallow is always in the middle of a book, even when listening to audiobooks on her daily jogs. Bren is finishing up a book now while setting up for her squad's weekly game night. Get ready for an evening of cards and laughter!
appearance: Bren is a bigfoot with a fuzzy, light lime green mane and ears. She has a sea green body and feet with a lighter green belly, heart-shaped foot pads and toes. She has a white face with a wide black mouth, that stretches across her entire face, pink blush, and black eyes with eyelashes.

name: Brenda
bio: Brenda loves to be outside and enjoy the sun! She has a green thumb and sells flowers from her garden at the farmers market every week. Her favorite flowers are marigolds and phlox!
appearance: Brenda is a butterfly with a lilac-colored body. Her belly is an even lighter shade and is striated with pink lines, the same color as the blush on her cheeks. Her antennae and wings consist of shimmery pink and a soft, dreamy purple color. She has round eyes with short lashes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Brendan
bio: Brendan is a professional stage actor! He's currently receiving award-buzz for his titular turn in "The Sleepy Judge". Before going on stage, his acting coachLilazalways makes sure to sprinkle him with a pinch of parmesan for extra good luck... and remind him not to act too cheesy!
appearance: Brendan is a red box of fries. He has yellow fries covered with parmesan, herbs and garlic powder. His box has an illustration of a garlic bulb and cheese as well as the top half of the box is white. He has round black, eyes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Brenden
bio: Meet Brenden. He's allergic to food dye, likes kale salads, and hates to act his age. Brenden loves to have fun and remains all of his friends that age is just a number. When he's not moonlighting as a motivational speaker you'll find him watching design competition shows.
appearance: Brenden is a white and brown dog with triangular ears. His main body is white and he has two large brown patches which cover from his ear to his eye on either side of his face. He has round, black eyes, a black nose and mouth, and is poking out his pink tongue.

name: Brett
bio: Brett is a bluish-grey dog with floppy ears. His ears are fluffy with blue fur. He has a patch on his muzzle and the same color. He has round, black eyes rimmed in blue and a black nose and mouth. He has a bale blue colored fluffy belly.
appearance: Brett is a bluish-grey dog with floppy ears. His ears are fluffy with blue fur. He has a patch on his muzzle and the same color. He has round, black eyes rimmed in blue and a black nose and mouth. He has a bale blue colored fluffy belly.

name: Bri
bio: Bri loves travelling, tiaras, and having tea parties. Her parents travel a lot and sometimes she gets to go with them! When she gets back from a trip she plans a tea party to share her latest travel adventures with her friends.
appearance: Bri is a pink owl with prominent ear tufts. She has white patches surrounding each eye which are vaguely egg-shaped. She also has a white belly speckled with pastel pink feathers. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and a triangular, yellow beak. She wears a shiny, hot pink crown atop her head.

name: Brian
bio: Brian wants to be a graphic designer when he grows up and spends his time editing his friends' pictures and watching black and white movies.
appearance: Brian is a pale grey dog with floppy, darker grey ears. He has round white markings above his eyes which resemble eyebrows, as well as a white muzzle and belly. His eyes, nose and mouth are black.

name: Brianna
bio: Brianna is a grey raccoon with black markings around her eyes. Above these are white marks which resemble eyebrows. She has white spots all around her body. She has triangle ears with white insides, as well as a white muzzle and belly. Her facial features are all black, including her oval-shaped eyes with white rings around them and her round nose and smile.
appearance: Brianna is a grey raccoon with black markings around her eyes. Above these are white marks which resemble eyebrows. She has white spots all around her body. She has triangle ears with white insides, as well as a white muzzle and belly. Her facial features are all black, including her oval-shaped eyes with white rings around them and her round nose and smile.

name: Briannika
bio: This lovable 'Mallow is a true extrovert and can strike up a conversation with anyone. Briannika leads with an open mind and heart and believes everyone brings something valuable to the table. Briannika doesn't judge, so come hang for a bit and talk with her!
appearance: Briannika is a bird with a pastel, rainbow gradient on her body which fades from pastel pink to aquamarine. She has fluffy pink wings and a pink tail with a fluffy rainbow tip. Her white belly is also fluffy.  Three pink feathers sit atop her head. She has a small, yellow beak and round black eyes with curled lashes.

name: Bridgette
bio: Bridgette has a unique taste for sparkling drinks. Sometimes she tops her iced coffee with tonic water. Or will mix chocolate milk and root beer for a sparkling, sweet dessert. Give one of Bridgette's funky sodas a try and see for yourself!
appearance: Bridgette is a coin grey cow with patches of black on her lower left side and on his right ear. She has small, off-white horns and round black eyes. She has black bat wings on each side of her body. The inside of her ears and her muzzle are both a light purple with and nostrils are purple as well with white fangs.

name: Bridgie
bio: Have you ever seen a tulip do a kickflip? Bridgie will show you how. She and her best friendMauispend weekends at the skate park learning new tricks. When she's not on her board, Bridgie loves to watch scary movies or unsolved mysteries.
appearance: Bridgie is a pink tulip flower. Her petals are dark pink at the base with a gradient to light pink at the tips. The top of her head - the inside of her petals - is a lighter pink again. She has two large, pale green leaves which cup the bottom half of her body. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Brie
bio: Brie is a brilliant baker known for her the melty cheese brownies she makes every Halloween. When Brie isn't experimenting with brownie recipes, she's racking up a high score in a spooky pinball game! This makes her a little competitive, but she always plays with an upbeat spirit. Come join the game!
appearance: Brie is a green-skinned girl with vibrant emerald hair. Her hair is styled into pigtails with bangs, and her tips are lighter green. She wears a purple outfit with a red belt, a black cape, and a purple witch hat with a red band and silver buckle. She has round eyes with short, curled lashes, a smiling red mouth and pink plush.

name: Brielana
bio: Meet Brielana. She loves animals, fairy tales, and everything GOLD. She loves her job at the animal shelter, and even spends her off days visiting the animals and telling them a stories! Do you want to hear a story from Brielana?

name: Brielle
bio: Brielle and her friendPrinceare getting ready to go to space! At least that's what they're telling her mom, they've built a space station out of pillows in the living room! They might have to save the planet before dinner time, do you think they can do it?
appearance: Brielle is a lilac cat with large triangular ears. She has peach pink inner ears and a light pink nose. Her eyes are closed and she has two black whiskers on each cheek. Brielle is dressed in an astronaut's spacesuit. It covers all of her except her face and ears. It is mostly grey and has a panel of buttons, a blue, ringed planet emblem and a dark grey belt with a large S on the buckle.

name: Brigita
bio: Brigita loves bagels and ladybugs, she even has a dancing ladybug bathrobe. She makes the same breakfast everyday; a peanut butter bagel with a yummy green smoothie. She loves to dance around in her bathrobe while she makes breakfast, it makes mornings more fun!
appearance: Brigita is acheetah. Her coat is white and is covered in light green spots with a beige outline. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a tan heart-shaped nose and mouth. She also has sparkling gold inner ears. Her eyes are black with little white dots and are framed by eyelashes.

name: Brina
bio: Say hi to Brina the Bigfoot. This confident little creature likes going on new adventures. Brina’s favorite season is winter because her favorite sport is snowboarding. She waits all year to participate in the local snowboarding competition.
appearance: Brina is a candy pink bigfoot with a fuzzy mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and belly, and white pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush beneath and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face.

name: Brindall
bio: Meet Brindall. She doesn't like hummus, she loves it! She makes her own from scratch with garbanzo beans and fresh herbs from the garden. She makes the perfect dinner guest because she's guaranteed to bring a jar to share!
appearance: Brindall is a rainbow, tie-dye platypus with a white belly. She has a purple, duck-like bill. Her eyes are round and black.

name: Brinkley
bio: Meet Brinkley. She can absolutely shred on her electric guitar. Though she cannot see well, she learned to play by memorizing the strings of the guitar and the sounds they make. Make a request, she can play almost any song you can imagine.
appearance: Brinkley is a bunny with a pink gradient on her body, fading from peach to hot pink, and long, floppy ears. Her belly has thick, fluffy, white fur. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and a hot pink nose and mouth.

name: Brinya
bio: Got a birthday or special celebration coming up? Don't forget to invite Brinya! She loves get-togethers with friends and and goes crazy for a good surprise party. She'll even help you decorate! Brinya's always ready for some fun.
appearance: Brinya has vanilla frosting with some chocolate swirls and a heart sprinkle. She is a strawberry cake with two vanilla frosting and pink frosting with normal and heart sprinkles all over. Her face consists of black eyes and mouth with pink cheeks.

name: Brisby
bio: "Home On The Range" is one of Brisby's favorite songs, he loves spending time on the ranch with his family. If you get the chance you should join him camping in the mountains, whipping up some delicious s'mores.
appearance: Brisby is a chocolate brown horse with a white stripe on his forehead. He has black eyes, a pale pink muzzle and a mane which is either black or dark brown, depending on the edition. The inside of his ears and belly are tan in color.

name: Brissa
bio: Brissa loves dancing on roller skates and video games. Thanks to gaming, she's made friends around the world! She loves to share videos of cool skating tricks and hopes to visit many of her friends one day. Would you like her to teach you how to skate?
appearance: Brissa is a burger made of a hot pink bun with sesame seeds on top. Their face is on the top bun, a pair of black eyes and a smiling mouth. Between the bread is a layer of bright yellow cheese, followed by layers of black and orange, and wavy, sparkly green lettuce leaves.

name: Bristle
bio: You've never met a bear more creative than Bristle! She has a large family and loves to create memories that last a lifetime. Bristle has scrapbooks for birthdays, graduations, holidays, so she always remembers the good times!
appearance: Bristle is a pale grey with rounded ears, the insides of which are sparkling silver. She has a white muzzle and belly. Her eyes are closed and have short, curled lashes. Her nose and mouth are both a darker grey than her fur. She wears a pale green scarf with a wintery geometric print in white.

name: Bristol
bio: Bristol works at the kitchen appliance store at her local mall. It her first job, since babysitting her brother. Bristol is doing her best saving her paychecks and she has her eye on a turquoise dough mixer. It will take her homemade muffins to the next level!

name: Britta
bio: Meet Britta. She's going to school to study physics and astronomy because she loves all things space! She keeps a close-knit group of friends who love to hang out and play games, both IRL and online. If you need a friend to game with, Britta is the owl for you!
appearance: Britta is an owl with a pastel, rainbow gradient and prominent silver ear tufts. She has white patches surrounding each eye with are edged with silver feathers. She also has a fluffy white belly with three rows of feathers outlined in peach. Her beak is a darker peach shade. She has round eyes with thick, curled lashes.

name: Brittany
bio: Reading, photography and crafting are some of Brittany's favorite things to do. She even has a mini-gallery in her hallway and an amazing crafting corner to show off some of her work! Next on Brittany's list: some DIY birthday gifts for her friends, want to help her out?
appearance: Brittany is a blue narwhal with two fins on each side. A long horn protrudes from her head, patterned in the same pastel rainbow stripes as her belly. She has large, cartoon eyes with icy blue irises. She has an open, smiling mouth and a pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Brixton
bio: Everyone at the spa knows Brixton! She glides over there weekly for a paw massage and facial. When Brixton really has the time, she spends her whole day lounging in different saunas and drinking barley tea. Want to know Brixton's secret to glowing fur? Ice baths!
appearance: Brixton is a pink sugar glider with a white lower face and underbelly. She has hot pink markings over her eyes, hot pink inner ears, stripe that goes from her forehead to her back, and wings. Her wings have lighter pink tips with white inner wings. Her tail is pink, fuzzy, and long with a hot pink tip. She has black eyes, a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Brizby
bio: Meet Brizby. He gets nervous in large crowds, that is until he's on stage! Brizby and his friendImanare a super cool synth-pop duo! When they're rocking out on stage, all of Brizby's social anxiety melts away and he becomes a super star! Want to come to one of their shows?
appearance: Brizby is a tan jar of peanut butter with a brown lid and label with a peanut. He has round, black eyes, and a red smiling mouth, and pale pink plush.

name: Brizla
bio: Meet Brizla. She's always on the go! She is a pro at multitasking and checking things off her to-do list. Nobody knows quite how she does it! On top of it all, she always has a warm smile on her face and a never ending supply of hugs for her friends and family! How cool it that?
appearance: Brizla is a frappuccino, a fancy iced coffee. On top of her head is swirled whipped cream with caramel swirls and dots. There is a green poking out from the left side of the whipped cream. The cream sits above a brown rim, and her body is ombré, starting at tan and fading to brown. She has a print depicting ice cubes on her body. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, pink blush, and a red, smiling mouth. Brizla has the phrase 'MOM FUEL' embroidered at her centre, MOM in brown and FUEL in gold.

name: Brock
bio: Normal bio:Brock is the quarterback of the football team who has a heart of gold! When he's not making touchdowns on the field, you'll find him volunteering his time at the local hospital. He loves to read to the sick children and wants to become a nurse one day!Astronaut bio: Grab your helmet and join Brock and his palDarylon an intergalactic adventure. They want to see the universe! There's just one problem: Brock is afraid of heights! Can you help him overcome his fear before take-off?
appearance: Brock is a white dog with light orange patches over his right ear, around his left eye and on his belly. His ears are large and floppy, standing up from his head. He has a pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls, with a rounded black nose and round black eyes.

name: Brody
bio: Brody loves flying and dreams of one day becoming a Pilot! He's a very adventurous guy whose favorite past time is creating new tricks that he can teach his friends and family. When on land you'll find him playing his favorite video games!
appearance: Brody is a blue dinosaur with round eyes, a smiling mouth and a white belly. He has pale blue spikes which run down his back.

name: Bronk
bio: Bronk is an all star and loves a good competition Don't worry though, he's a good sport Bronk loves playing games and sports of all kind, but you'll be his very best friend if you offer to play a game of catch!
appearance: Bronk is a marbled, brown and white dog with chocolate brown patches over his right ear and around his left eye. His ears are large and floppy, standing up from his head. He has a pronounced white snout with classic bulldog jowls, with a rounded black nose and round black eyes. His16"form features a fuzzy white belly.

name: Bronte
bio: Meet Bronte. This chameleon loves to dance and can choreograph something to every type of music. She grew up as a ballet dancer and found love for hip hop and jazz soon after. Bronte even opened her own dance studio! If there is music playing, you know you can find Bronte on the dance floor.
appearance: Bronte is a lizard with a camouflage pattern in numerous shades of pink. She has a hot pink frill atop her head and a curly tail. She has huge, white eyes with shiny black pupils.

name: Bronwen
bio: Bronwen is a member of the fabled catfish aristocracy - and how boring is that? How utterly dull! She'd much rather join a clan of bohemian artists, or run away with the monkey circus. Maybe she could even live in one of those things called apartments - what a thrilling thought!
appearance: Bronwen is a teal betta fish with cat details. She has wavy pectoral fins and a dorsal fin on top of her head with shiny holographic spots on her fins and belly. She has two triangular cat ears on her head with teal inner ears. She has a white patch on her mouth. She has round, black eyes with lashes, two black whiskers and a pink nose and mouth.

name: Brooke
bio: Brooke doesn't need to curl up by the fire during the holidays, because her presence is warm enough. Her sweet spirit is best received in the kitchen. She loves to bake yummy treats for her lifetime Squishmallows pals.
appearance: Brooke is a creamy white bear with round ears. She has a snow white belly and pink blush on her cheeks. She has round, black eyes, along with a black nose and mouth.

name: Brownie
bio: Brownie's favorite winter activity is playing ice hockey on the lake! Him and his friends have bonfires after they play a game.
appearance: Brownie is a brown bear. He has round ears with tan insides, as well as a tan muzzle and belly. His facial features are all brown, including his circle eyes with yellow ring and a white dot on his eyes and round nose with a smile. He is also wearing a red scarf around his neck.

name: Bruce
bio: Want to explore the beauty of Alaska? Bruce is your guy! An active kayaker, Bruce leads travellers on amazing river tours and shows them all if his favourite hidden gems. Get ready for a photo opp!
appearance: Bruce is a brown walrus with flippers on each side of his body. His muzzle and belly are both tan, and he has two white tusks protruding from his mouth. He has closed eyes, straight whiskers and a dark brown nose.

name: Brunhilda
bio: You'd never guess from Brunhilda's tough exterior but she's the gentlest 'Mallow you'll ever meet Brunhilda worked her way up from teaching first grade to being the school principal She loves watching all the students grow up, and encourages them to laugh as often as possible.
appearance: Brunhilda is a muted blue squirrel. She has three navy blue stripes on her head with silver rhinestones. She has blue ears and a large fluffy navy blue tail behind. She has a velvet navy blue belly with round, black eyes with lashes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Bruno
bio: Bruno just inherited the family deli! He understands their signature sandwich sauce isn't for everyone but modifying your muffuletta to leave it out is a Marco No-Go amigo. Nonna Bella might not be around anymore, but mess with her pickled tripe honey and she'll make her presence known!
appearance: Bruno is a fusion between a rhino and a shark. He has two fins on each side of his body and two dorsal fins on the back with a grey tail. He has grey ears with white inner ears and black gills and a white belly. He has round, black eyes and a grey nose with white nostrils and a long white horn.

name: Brunswick
bio: What's a nine letter name for a blueberry bear who runs his crossword team like a navy? Brunswick! From stars in the sky to stars on '60s sitcoms. Brunswick has The Bosswords hitting the books hard this year. Look out for them at The Crossword Championship!
appearance: Brunswick is a bear mixed with a blueberry, he has a blue calyx sitting on top of his head with round ears. He has a pale white belly, inner ears and a marking on his muzzle which is narrow between his eyes and widens around his navy blue nose and mouth. He also has round, black eyes. He has a blueberry embroidered on his belly.

name: Brutus
bio: (no bio was given)
appearance: Brutus is a grey donkey with a white muzzle and belly. His long, floppy ears are pink on the inside, and his eyes are round and black. He has a light grey mane running down his back and a matching tail

name: Bryce
bio: Meet Bryce. This is one funny 'Mallow, even when he's not trying to be. He loves baseball, playing guitar, and riding roller coasters. He usually splits his time between baseball and guitar, but once in a while, he takes a trip to ride new roller coasters. Where should he go next?
appearance: Bryce is a dog with a light pink colored body. His muzzle and belly are white, and he has a pink patch around his right eye. His belly features two hearts, one pink and the smaller one blue. His ears are pastel rainbow and fluffy with a pink underside. He has round, black eyes and a pink nose and mouth.

name: Bubba
bio: Who's that playing center on the court? It's Bubba! Even though he's not very tall, Bubba never lets the haters get him down. He is lightning fast and his layup is the team's secret weapon. One day he might even go pro!
appearance: Bubba is a wisteria purple cow with a large, darker purple patch over his right ear. He has cream-colored horns and round, black eyes. His inner ears, muzzle and belly are white. His belly is patterned with purple splotches, the same color as the patch on his ear.

name: Bubbles
bio: It's rumored that Bubbles' father is the Easter Bunny himself, but only close family and friends know for sure. If you can't find her with her large family, Bubbles is most likely at the park jumping rope.
appearance: Bubbles is a lavender purple rabbit with long lop ears. She has a white belly and a hot pink nose and mouth. Her eyes are closed, and two black whiskers appear on each side of her face.

name: Buck
bio: After forgetting his lines in the school play. Buck almost gave up showbiz—until he discovered improv! He loves getting to come up with totally random stories and characters. Recently, he improvised a scene where a dragon named 'Huck' perfectly recites all his lines in a school play. Where does he come up with this stuff?
appearance: Buck is a cream dragon with silver spikes along his back. His muzzle, belly and the inside of his ears and wings are silver and his horns are golden. He has a peach fuzzy belly. He has round black eyes and tan nostrils.

name: Buffy
bio: Ready to have a fang-tastic time, meet Buffy the bat! Buffy is not your average gal, she enjoys going on adventures into the forest and fruit picking with her pals. When she's not exploring the world around her, she enjoys hanging around with her family and baking fruit pies.
appearance: Buffy is a bright red bat with long, upright ears. Her inner ears, wings and belly are all black. She has round, black eyes with short lashes. Her smiling mouth is adorned with two white, pointed fangs.

name: Bufinda
bio: Bufinda is a night-owl and seems to do her best work when everyone else is in bed. She wants to be a writer and is working on her first book! Mystery, suspense, and even a little bit of comedy are all some of the things she writes about. One day you can read it!
appearance: Bufinda is a black Squishmallow with a large, pastel rainbow horn. She has two black fins on either side of her body. Her skull is rounded with lashed, circular eyes and four flat teeth. Her skull, ribs and sternum are all striped in pastel rainbow colors.

name: Buford
bio: Psst! Remember to call Buford a bear! This method-acting moose is playing a bear in his latest movie and prefers to stay in character. While some might call his acting process extreme, this two-time award winner is going for a third. Wish him luck!
appearance: Buford is a brown moose with a tan muzzle, inner ears and belly. He has dark green and black plaid-patterned antlers and scarf to match. He has dark brown nostrils and round, black eyes.

name: Bullseye
bio: Bullseye embodies optimism, loyalty, and love as Target's official brand mascot and spokes-pup. Wherever Bullseye goes, there's a feeling of energetic excitement. Decked out in a stocking cap, Bullseye is always up for something fun, whether it's a road trip or just snuggling up on the couch.
appearance: Bullseye is a white dog. They wear a red beanie with white pointy ears poking out. They wear a red and pink scarf. They have round black eyes with the right eye resembling the target logo and a big black nose.

name: Buna
bio: Buna washes her hands constantly- sometimes out of habit, sometimes to relax, and sometimes because she has garlic stuck to her fingers! Buna only likes her homemade garlic bread and has a tray in the oven right now. Don't forgot to wash up before dinner!
appearance: Buna is a blue and purple creature with a fuzzy mane on the head and long, shaggy ears. She has light purple pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts, and 3 toes. She has black eyes, a wide mouth which stretches across her face, and a white tooth sticking out of the right side of her mouth.

name: Bunny
bio: Bunny is president of her high school cheese club! Her responsibilities include planning field trips, organizing taste testings, and even picking 'cheese of the month.' Though she claims to love fancy parmesans at best, Bunny has a secret—her favorite cheese is string!
appearance: Bunny is a lavender alligator with darker purple spines on the top of her head and back. She has a large snout with sharp, white teeth, a white belly and black eyes that sit atop her head. Her belly has a glittery embroidered purple heart on it.

name: Buster
bio: See here—Buster is a professional wiseguy! He trains up with a palooka-lookin' carrot and loves using wit and metaphor to lob the proverbial "bun bun" at his opponents. Wish him luck at this year's Why I Oughta World Championship!
appearance: Buster is a light green bunny with lower body covered in chocolate and dot candies. He has a teal bowtie and has green outer ears with brown in the inner ears. He has a winking expression and has a pink nose and mouth along with black whiskers.

name: Buttons
bio: Buttons is the king of Easter egg hunts. He always gets the most eggs, but he shares his prizes with his siblings. His favorite Easter treat? Marshmallows!
appearance: Buttons is a sky blue rabbit with long lop ears. He has a white belly and a hot pink nose and mouth. His eyes are closed, and two black whiskers appear on each side of his face.

name: Buzz
bio: If you give a sloth a donut, he's sure to want more! Especially Buzz, the way to this smooth sloth's heart is through his stomach. And donuts are his favorite. Another thing about Buzz is, he seems to know EVERYTHING! The buzz on Buzz is: he's the best secret keeper in town.
appearance: Buzz is a sloth with a creamy yellow body and a lighter yellow patch on his face and belly. His body is covered with white, green, blue, pink and purple sprinkles. The banded markings around his eyes are bright blue, and he has an orange muzzle. He has cheerful, shiny eyes with short lashes, a triangular purple nose and a happy smile showing a pale pink tongue.

name: Byron
bio: Byron teaches Caliente Pop Punk Pilates Fusion at the local senior center. He loves watching the residents get on their sweat on, shake their groove thing, and unleash the beast within. While some are just happy to sit and clap, that's fine with Byron too!
appearance: Byron is a blue dragon with blue wings, ears and long yellow striped horns. He has pink inner wings, and fuzz from the top of his head to his tail. He has a white muzzle and a white belly with golden nostrils with white fangs. His eyes are round and black.

name: Cacey
bio: Cacey seeks adventure of all kinds, and lately she's been going parasailing at the beach! She loves to feel the wind through her spines. Cacey has so much fun pursuing these exciting hobbies, but she also wants someone to share in the thrills. Could it be you?
appearance: Cacey is a pink Squishmallow with two uneven arms on each side. Her body and arms have thin, dark pink stripes. She has a cluster of pink spikes on her head and a round white belly. She has red hearts on top of both arms. She has a winking face with her right eye closed, and a red smiling mouth.

name: Caddie
bio: Caddie loves card games and road trips. They remind her of her choir days, especialtly her favorite annual choir trip! Every spring her choir would travel cross-country. They had so much fun singing songs and playing games on the bus.
appearance: Caddie is a cream cat with a muzzle and belly. Her nose, mouth, and the insides of her ears are yellow and blue. She has two closed eyes and two black whiskers on each side of her face.

name: Cade
bio: Meet Cade. Cade has a very creative personality and likes to let his imagination run wild. One of Cade's favorite activities is drawing funny pictures of his classmates. Cade uses silly shapes and wacky colors to make everyone look brand new, how should Cade draw you?
appearance: Cade is a yellow packet of crayons with green stripes. His head is made up of five pencils: pink, red, blue, green and purple. He has round, black eyes and a small smile.

name: Caden
bio: Caden can pitch a tent in a snap! She goes camping every year and knows all the tricks to make it easy and fun. This 'Mallow always has a compass and first aid kit handy, and they never forget to pack marshmallows for nightly s'mores parties. Join Caden on their next big camping trip!
appearance: Caden is a dark blue horse with a white stripe on their* forehead. They also have a white muzzle with navy nostrils. Her mane and tail are navy blue, and her fluffy belly is the same color.

name: Cadence
bio: Cadence loves K-Pop! She dreams of taking the stage herself one day and even has an idol name and persona picked out. "K-Dance" might be a soft-spoken bookworm, but let the spotlight hit her and see how she shines!
appearance: Cadence is a lavender Fennec Fox with white, banded markings on her eyes and fuzzy belly. She has triangular ears with fuzzy lighter lavender inner ears. She has a flower crown on top of her head with lavender, pink, white and blue flowers and her lashed eyes and triangular nose are black.

name: Cadencia
appearance: Cadencia is a white cat with a pink patch over the right side of their head. They have closed eyes, a pink nose and mouth, and two black whiskers on each cheek. They also have pink inner ears and a pink and white striped straw protruding from the left side of their head.

name: Caedia
bio: Grab your gloves and get ready for a workout, Caedia is your new de-stress coach! She teaches kick-boxing and has a stress-busting routine for everyone. She likes to write her stress on the punching bag for some extra motivation. Would you like to take her class?
appearance: Caedia is a pale blue cow with patches that are tie-dyed with rainbow colors on her lower left side and over her right ear. She has small, off-white horns and round, black eyes with short lashes. Her muzzle is white with aqua colored nostrils.

name: Caedyn
bio: Do you like apple pies and movie nights? So does Caedyn! She loves baking pies and watching scary movies, especially for a movie marathon. She loves a monster movie with a side of fresh pie. Would you like to join her?
appearance: Caedyn is a mostly white cow with patches of pink. She has a hot pink patch on her lower left side and a pale pink patch over her right ear. She has small, triangular pink horns and round black eyes. Her left ear has a pink inner, and her right is white. She has a pale pink muzzle with heart-shaped, hot pink nostrils.

name: Caeli
bio: Who's that cat caught in the yarn, it must be Caeli! This crafty cat is a yarn expert but occasionally she gets all tangled up. Caeli loves long and sparkly nails even though they sometimes get stuck while she's knitting.
appearance: Caeli is purple tie-dye cat with white on her belly, muzzle and inside her ears. She has light pink tabby stripe markings on her head. Black whiskers frame her face, featuring a pink nose/mouth and closed eyes with long beautiful lashes.

name: Cailey
bio: Original:Cailey loves noodles, cooking with her grandmother, and reading up on her favorite stars. Pop culture and being cozy are some of her favorite things, she is an ace with random pop culture facts. Whenever she meets someone new, Cailey shares a factoid to remember their name.
appearance: Cailey is a light pink crab with a round, white belly. She has two large claws which are hot pink in color and six smaller legs beneath them. Each set of legs is a different shade, changing from fuchsia to peach. She has round black eyes with short lashes and a pink, smiling mouth.

name: Caine
bio: Caine's stationery store was seeing some tough times. So Caine had the inspired idea of opening his shop as performance space! Now his buisness is packed with 'Mallows every weekend listening to local indie bands. Caine's sticker and colored pencil sale have even increased!
appearance: Caine is a Princeton orange leatherback turtle with a yellow belly and two flippers with yellow-orange spots on top of his head. He has a simple face with copper glasses around his black eyes, he has a simple smile. A vermillion color shell is on his back.

name: Caitroina
bio: Are you looking for some delicious chocolates for your friends and family? Caitroina is the one for you! Visit Caitroina's chocolate shop where she whips up the best homemade chocolates! She loves to create new and exciting flavors because chocolate is her passion. Want to try?
appearance: Caitroina is a teal leopard-print cat. She holds a valentines day chocolate box with a rose gold tummy. She has teal ears with rose gold insides. Her face consists of black eyes with two lashes and she has a black nose, with a black mouth and she has black whiskers.

name: Cala
bio: Cala is a discount devotee! With a degree in the Haggling from Frugal U to a full-ride scholarship, of course!. This gourd can drive a hard bargain. She's been known to stretch a dollar into a full blown Thanksgiving feast, and once even scored an all-inclusive tropical cruise for the price of... well they paid her!
appearance: Cala is a gourd a type of squash. Her top half is a yellow with a stem on top and their lower half is green. She has light green stripes. She has closed eyes with lashes and a black smile with pink blush.

name: Calais
bio: Meet Calais. This chameleon can shift into any type of musician you want to hear. Calais grew up as a piano player, and after mastering this instrument, picked up the violin. Now every year, Calais learns to play a new instrument. What do you want to hear Calais play?
appearance: Calais is a lizard with a camouflage pattern in numerous shades of teal and green. They have a bright teal frill atop their head with a curly tail and stripes on their back in the same shade. They have huge, white eyes with shiny black pupils.

name: Calamity
bio: Calamity is a peach cactus with two, uneven cactus arms on her sides. There are green spikes all over her body except for her off-white, fuzzy belly. She wears a flower with yellow petals and white pistil on her head. She has black eyes with lashes, and a black mouth.
