appearance: Calamity is a peach cactus with two, uneven cactus arms on her sides. There are green spikes all over her body except for her off-white, fuzzy belly. She wears a flower with yellow petals and white pistil on her head. She has black eyes with lashes, and a black mouth.

name: Caleb
bio: Caleb and his friends celebrate the beginning of each spring with a unique activity—potato boat racing! That's when you hollow out a potato and send it floating down the river. First place gets a bucket of french fries, and Caleb hasn't lost yet!
appearance: Caleb is a pastel green octopus with a white belly. He has a round body with eight short tentacles. He wears white bunny ears with yellow inner ears. He has round black eyes and a smiling black mouth with pink blush.

name: Cali
bio: Cali is a tired kitty, she has insomnia but that doesn’t keep this tabby cat down for long! She journals or writes poetry when she can’t sleep and shares her poems with her naptastic friendPaulita. Can you help Cali catch some ZZZs?
appearance: Cali is a tie-dye caticorn whose primary colors are pink, yellow and blue. Her belly and inner ears are colored white. She has a white, shimmery horn with a rainbow swirl. She has closed eyes and a pastel pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Calio
bio: Meet Calio. She and her friendRibacan't wait to load up their pails with candy on Halloween night. They make the perfect duo. Calio loves chocolate, but can't stand sour candy, andRibaloves sour candy, but is allergic to chocolate, so they just trade!
appearance: Calio is a pure black cat with a pink nose and mouth. She has white whiskers and white irises around her pupils. Calio is wearing a bright orange pumpkin costume with her ears sticking out of the top. The pumpkin has a large vibrant green stem which features a glittery texture in the 5" version.

name: Callista
bio: Callista is a free spirit and goes wherever the wind blows her. She loves to surprise her friends with a visit and always shouts ‘Boo!’. Callista’s favorite spooky treat? Marshmallow treats in the shape of a ghost!
appearance: Callista is a caticorn, a cat with a unicorn's horn. She is mostly white, with pale pink inside her ears and on her belly. Her nose, mouth and horn are also pale pink. 'Boo!' is written on her belly in white with a pink outline. She has black whiskers and round, black eyes with short lashes.

name: Callister
appearance: Callister is a white cat with tan ears and a tan patch over the right side of their head. They have closed eyes, a pink nose and mouth, and two black whiskers on each cheek. They also have pink inner ears and a blue and white striped straw protruding from the left side of their head.

name: Callum
bio: Callum loves slime! He makes his own with DIY recipes and always adds lots of glitter. Callum plays with slime while he watches TV, or under his desk in class to help him stay focus and nor fidget. Callum just picked up some googly eyes. Want to help him make fun slime blobs?
appearance: Callum is an apple green monster with yellow and green striped horns and two thick, yellow eyebrows. He has a tuft of yellow fur on top of his head and a fuzzy green belly. He has black eyes and a wide mouth with two square teeth poking out at the top.

name: Calm-amore
bio: Calm-amore is a grey horse with spots around their body with a white stripe on their forehead. They also have a grey muzzle with dark grey nostrils. Their mane and tail dark grey, and their fluffy belly is white.
appearance: Calm-amore is a grey horse with spots around their body with a white stripe on their forehead. They also have a grey muzzle with dark grey nostrils. Their mane and tail dark grey, and their fluffy belly is white.

name: Calton
bio: Learn to cook with Calton! He loves food: everything from lasagna to making pot pies. When Calton isn't whipping up delicious food, he's probably taking a quick snooze. What kind of food can Calton show you how to cook?
appearance: Calton is a fluffy brown cow with a patch of longer white fur like a fringe. He has an off-white muzzle, belly and inner ears, which aren't fluffy. He has thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and are sparkling silver. Thin brown lines mark the sections. He has round, black eyes, brown nostrils and a small smile.

name: Calvin
bio: Calvin is a cup of latte with whipped cream on top decorated with green and red sprinkles and a Christmas tree cookie and has a white and gold striped straw. He has a fuzzy red sleeve with a star anisse logo on it. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.
appearance: Calvin is a cup of latte with whipped cream on top decorated with green and red sprinkles and a Christmas tree cookie and has a white and gold striped straw. He has a fuzzy red sleeve with a star anisse logo on it. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Calynda
bio: Meet Calynda. Her free spirit makes her the perfect travel buddy. She loves meeting new people and trying new things. She once went to a circus and ended up swinging on the trapeze! Fun and adventure are always in-store when you're rolling with Calynda!
appearance: Calynda is a pink cow with two solid colored "spots" which are a darker shade of pink than her base color. One is located on the upper right corner and can be seen from the front as it covers her right ear and right area over her eyes. The other is located in the opposite corner on the bottom and can only be seen from the back since the front lower area is characterized by her "belly". The inside of the ears, horns, and nose are the same shade of pink, which is lighter than her base color and is overall the lightest shade on her. Both her eyes are closed in a rainbow shape arc and each eye has two small, curved eyelashes coming out of the outermost corner. Her belly is patterned with small, darker pink "spots" over the same light shade of pink as her horns, etc., and has an embroidered strawberry on the lower right corner of the belly. She has another embroidered strawberry such as this one on the back, on the opposite side to the bottom "spot", and her tail has a tip of fluffy hair in about the same shade of pink as those solid colored "spots".

name: Calypsa
bio: Anxious about the future? Talk to Calypsa! This enchanted dragon is an expert at using her crystal ball to assure nervous 'Mallows that no matter their situation, things can and will get better. Can you believe she has yet to be wrong?
appearance: Calypsa is a pride dragon with a rainbow pattern on her body. She has a shimmery silver snout, belly and inner ears and wing membranes. Her wings are the same rainbow pattern as the body but horizontal. She has two black eyes with eyelashes.

name: Cam
bio: Original: If you’re looking for a feline friend, Cameron’s your cat. He loves to jump in and out of boxes, build forts with his friendsHootandWendyand use his skateboard to get around town. Cam also loves going to the beach to take cat naps with his friends, but is always up for an adventure!
appearance: Cam is a calico cat, meaning he has a cream body and brown and black patches. He has one brown patch over his right ear, and two black patches, one on his left ear and the other on his lower left body. He has closed eyes, black whiskers, and a happy, pink cat mouth. The Laying Hug Mee Cam has the colors of his ears and face spots swapped for an unknown reason.

name: Camden
bio: Camden is a happy chick who loves to smile! He's going to school to become a dental hygienist so he can help others love their smiles too! When he's not studying and cleaning teeth, he loves to go on hikes with his spring squad friends.
appearance: Camden is a blue bird with a bright blue beak. He is sky blue with patches of ice blue on his belly and around each of his round, black eyes. His fluffy wings, tail and the crest atop his head are all pale blue.

name: Camette
bio: Meet Camette. She plays the piano for her school choir and loves to have her friends sing along. Every winter she accompanies the choir to bring holiday cheer and the joy of music to others, what can she play for you?
appearance: Camette is a calico cat with a white body and pink and grey patches. She has one pale pink patch over her left ear, and two grey patches, one on her right ear and the other on her lower right body. She has round, black eyes, black whiskers and a happy, pink cat mouth. Her tail is grey with a pink tip. Camette also wears a knitted scarf which is outlined in brown and includes white, grey and brown wool.

name: Camile
bio: Say cheese! Camile snaps portraits of all her closest 'Mallow friends with her instant film camera and she's ready to take one of you! She's known for capturing her subjects in the middle of a laugh, making her photos beautiful and funny. Will you go to her next gallery showing?
appearance: Camile is a black dinosaur with a purple belly. She has golden spines running down her back. She has a smiling mouth and round, black eyes.

name: Camilla
bio: Don't let Camilla's sparkly appearance trick you - this caticorn isn't afraid to get her paws dirty. Camilla works for the Parks Service, and one of her favorite activities is hosting neighborhood cleanups!
appearance: Camilla is a pastel, rainbow caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. Her fur is patterned in rainbow stripes, including green, blue, purple and pink. She has triangular ears and a unicorn tail. The inside of her ears and her belly are white. She has a pink horn with silver glitter and a darker pink swirl, and a bright pink nose and mouth. She has closed eyes and two black whiskers on either side of her face.

name: Camilo
bio: Meet Camilo. Camilo is a musical theatre major, and their dream is to be onstage. Camilo has been taking voice, dance and acting lessons for years, and knows all the words to the big musicals. Do you want to sing and dance with Camilo?
appearance: Camilo is a grey chinchilla with a pale grey pattern on their cheeks and belly, as well as inside their ears. Three grey whiskers of various lengths sprout from each cheek. They have round black eyes and a light grey nose and mouth.

name: Canda
bio: Meet Canda. This fish has a passion for FASHION! She loves to stand out and make the world her runaway. In addition to being a style icon, Canda also has a gift of gab. You can ask anyone, she loves some feel-good gossip but she knows when the gossip has gone too far.

name: Candace
bio: Candace plays the triangle in her school band, she wears her lucky t-shirt the day before they perform. Her lucky t-shirt is from her first year at band camp! Candace also plays soccer and wants to be the best goalie in her league.
appearance: Candice is a white and purple dog with upright, triangular ears. Her main body and inner ears are white, whereas she has two large purple patches which cover from her ear to her eye on either side of her face. She has closed eyes with short lashes, a black nose and mouth, and is poking out her pink tongue.

name: Candela
bio: Candela knows she has the best job in the world as a theater usher! She watches all the newest plays, eats candy from concessions, and meets the whole cast and crew of each production. Come catch a show anytime — Candela left two tickets at the box office just for you!
appearance: Candela is a brown cow with a patch of longer rainbow fur like a fringe. She has an off-white muzzle and pink inner ears, and a fluffy, rainbow belly She has thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and are shiny and metallic. Thin brown lines mark the sections. She has round, black eyes, pink nostrils.

name: Candess
bio: Meet Candess. She is all about natural and holistic remedies and loves helping others heal emotionally or physically. Candess is in school learning about nutrition and anatomy so she can open her own holistic practice!
appearance: Candess is mostly white with patches which are tie-dyed with pastel rainbow colors on her lower left side and on her right ear. She has small, yellow horns and round black eyes. Her muzzle is pink with slightly darker nostrils.

name: Candis
bio: ICYM, Candis loves texting. Though work sometimes make her go OMG, she's happy to LOL with her BFFs after a long day. TBH, she might text too much, but Candis is GRB at knowing when she needs to BRB and put the phone down. TTYL!
appearance: Candis' body is colored tie-dye with pink, blue, and yellow, she has 8 little arms on her sides, a holographic tail, and two pink antennae on the top of her head. She has a light pink belly with three red stripes across it. Her eyes are black with eyelashes and a black smile.

name: Candiz
bio: Candiz is a werewolf with brown fur and a darker brown mane and tail. They have tall ears with tan inner ears and a tan face. Their eyes are black with lashes, they have a round, brown nose and a red smiling mouth with two fangs poking out from the bottom. They wear a lavender bow by their right ear.
appearance: Candiz is a werewolf with brown fur and a darker brown mane and tail. They have tall ears with tan inner ears and a tan face. Their eyes are black with lashes, they have a round, brown nose and a red smiling mouth with two fangs poking out from the bottom. They wear a lavender bow by their right ear.

name: Candy
bio: Cotton candy and jelly beans are Candy's favorite, can you guess why? This bright bunny loves springtime for flowers, fun and the annual Squishmallow egg hunt! She holds the record for finding the most candy eggs!
appearance: Candy is a bunny with tie-dyed rainbow fur and long, floppy ears. Her inner ears and belly are covered in thick, long, white fur. Her eyes are closed and she has two black whiskers on either side of her pale pink nose.

name: Cannon
bio: Despite his name and appearance, Cannon is a wellness coach who teaches kids how to make healthy meals. However, he can't resist a sweet treat during Halloween, so he makes his famous caramel apples for himself and all the trick-or-treaters!
appearance: Cannon is a piece of candy with three bands of color: white at the top, orange in the centre and yellow on the bottom. He has round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Caparinne
bio: Meet Caparinne. She keeps freshly picked flowers in almost every room and loves taking a morning stroll through her garden to see the latest flowers. You'll find her rocking her favorite bright blue broad-brimmed hat and matching gardening gloves.
appearance: Caparinne is a hot pink bigfoot with a fuzzy mane in multiple shades of pink on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a tan face and belly, and pale pink pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face. A small white tooth pokes up below her right eye.

name: Capri
bio: Capri tackles every task and challenge that comes her way with confidence. She's a 'Mallow with moxie, and a natural born leader. Everything's taken care of when you're hanging with Capri. Would you let her give you a hand?
appearance: Capri is a sliced orange, with a bright orange peel on the outside and a white face and belly. The red markings on their belly represent the segments of a orange. The top of their head sports a short brown stem and a sparkly green leaf. They have a winking expression, pink blush and a red, smiling mouth. They also wear a purple flower on the left side of their head.

name: Caprina
bio: Bright colors, bangles, and ice cream sandwiches are some of Caprina's favorite things. You can usually spot her a mile away in one of her neon ensembles, Caprina loves to stand out. Can you guess her favorite color? Hot pink of course!
appearance: Caprina is a pale pink axolotl-corn with a rose gold horn on her head. She has shimmery rose gold gills with pink frilly edges on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms, round black eyes, and a cat-like smile.

name: Capsule Cat
appearance: This Squishmallow is a white cat with an off-white belly and pink and purple spots on their body. Their left ear is purple and their right ear is pink with silver, holographic inner ears. They have a white tail with a purple tip, black eyes with lashes, black whiskers and a pink nose and mouth.

name: Capsule Cheetah
appearance: This Squishmallow is a pink cheetah with purple spots all over. They have pink inner ears and a long tail with a white muzzle and belly, black whiskers, a white nose and mouth, and black round eyes.

name: Capsule Husky
appearance: This Squishmallow is a cyan dog with triangular ears They have white markings on their face and belly, as well as inside their ears. They have round, black eyes, a large nose and a smiling mouth.

name: Capsule Mouse
appearance: This Squishmallow is a mouse with a white body and purple and pink spots all over their body. They have a pink left ear and a purple right ear and a long, thin purple tail. Their whiskers are black with black eyes, a white snout, a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Carah
bio: Meet Carah. She's a theater kid at heart. Halloween is her favorite time of year because she gets to dress up and really get into character. She can never decide on just one costume so she gets seven of them and dresses up all week! Want to join her trick or treating?
appearance: Carah is a candy corn with a white top, and orange center, and a yellow bottom. She wears a devil costume with red pointed horns, wings, and tail. Her eyes are closed in a happy expression and she has a black, smiling mouth.

name: Cardona
bio: Cardona is the founder and CEO of a bespoke bolo tie company! Her favorite styles include Ghost on the Grange, Rootin' Toothin', and—in an homage to her pomegranate bestie—Ode toOatfae. Look out for her booth at the local yee market and hang the haw 'round your decolletage today!
appearance: Cardona is pomegranate monkey. She has red skin with a pink front with three sections of pomegranate seeds. She has round ears with pink inner ears and on top of her head she have a red pomegranate leaf. She has a pale pink heart shaped face with round black and a red nose with a black mouth.

name: Carin
bio: Where is that beautiful music coming from? It's Carin playing the French horn! She loves that brassy sound how simple it is to play with just her wings. Carin is planning a big beach trip this weekend with other members of the orchestra, and she's packing her favorite food—burritos!
appearance: Carin is a dark blue dragon with wings, fin-like ears and tan horns. She has red inner wings, webbing in her ears, and red fuzz from the top of her head to her tail. She has a white muzzle and belly with dark blue nostrils. Her eyes are round and black.

name: Carina
bio: Maybe Carina watched too many TV shows about UFOs, because she's on a mission to find one! Carina loves space and astronomy more than any other subject. and dreams of one day seeing a UFO with her own eyes wanna go UFO hunting with Carina?
appearance: Carina is a mushroom with a cream stalk and a purple cap. The top of her cap is a purple with a yellow moon and stars. Her stalk makes up her body and including a white belly. She has round, black eyes and a magenta, smiling mouth.

name: Carizma
bio: Meet Carizma, one of the coolest cat around! Carizma LOVES to play the bass, she practices almost every day. She dreams of playing in a band with her friends and rocking a red and black mohawk. Will you go watch them play?
appearance: Carizma is a cat with navy blue fur. She has dark navy stripes on her head and sides. She have a white belly and sparkly sliver inner ears and as well as a white muzzle. Her nose and mouth are dark navy, framed by black whiskers. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes.

name: Carl
bio: This is Carl the cheeseburger. He loves practical jokes and hanging out with his burger bros. When he was just a little mallow patty, he dreamt of one day being the funniest cheeseburger in the pack.
appearance: Carl is a cheeseburger made of a brown bun with sesame seeds on top. His face is on the top bun, a pair of black eyes and a red smiling mouth. Between the bread is a layer of bright yellow cheese, dark brown meat, a red slice of tomato and wavy green lettuce leaves with a brown bun underneath.

name: Carla
bio: Meet Carla, a therapy caticorn in training! She visits hospitals and clinics all over her city to help people. Carla is always ready to greet you with a smile and a hug (but only if you want one).
appearance: Carla is a tie-dye caticorn whose primary colors are purple and pink. Her belly and inner ears are colored white. She has a pale pink, shimmery horn with a pink spiral. She has closed eyes and a pastel pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Carlee
bio: Carlee is an amazing poet and her dream is to give a reading at her local bookstore. There's just one problem: public speaking makes her very nervous. Carlee's friend Miley is helping her practice so one day you can hear her poems too!
appearance: Carlee is a tan/peach camel with baby pink fur on her head and in a heart-shaped patch on her chest. She has a pink muzzle and inner ears. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and two narrow nostrils connected to a smiling mouth. Her back is covered by a blue and purple tie-dyed saddle.

name: Carlita
bio: Meet Carlita. This caticorn has one of her best giggles around. Her giggles is contagious and unique, so its not hard to join, If she laughs at your jokes its considered a pretty good compliment. Do you have any jokes for Carlita?
appearance: Carlita is a white caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears are rainbow and her fluffy belly is pink. The horn is a rainbow. She has round eyes with curled lashes and a hot pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Carlito
bio: Meet Carlito. His favorite type of music is ska—he's a pretty chill frog. Carlito also enjoys the outdoors so if you like to go camping, he's the frog for you! Want to know his hidden talent? Making the best grilled cheese sandwiches.
appearance: Carlito's body is colored rainbow in a tie-dye pattern. His belly is white with his black eyes sitting on the top of his head. There are white rings around his eyes, with black nostrils, and black smile.

name: Carlos
bio: Have you met Carlos? This creative crustacean is a salsa instructor and a world traveler. Carlos is a travel writer and writes about dance and food across the globe! His favorite travel food: tapas in Spain.
appearance: Carlos is a bright red crab with a round, white belly. He has two large claws and six smaller legs beneath them. He has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Carlota
bio: Meet Carlota. this colorful calico cat is always on the move, jumping from one activity to the next. Last year, she was birdwatching everyday in the park, and this week, she is studying butterflies! You never know what Carlota will do next, but you always know she will take her cat nap after!
appearance: Carlota is a calico cat with a white body and two different color patches. She has one peach-colored patch over her left ear, and two purple patches, one on her right ear and the other on her lower right body. She has closed eyes, a pink nose and black whiskers and pink mouth.

name: Carly
bio: Carly is planning her biggest bit yet! She invited all her friend to go see a movie and can't wait to surprise them with a wedding instead. The bride and the groom don't know they're getting married, but that's part of the bit too. Bitception!
appearance: Carly is a red monster with purple horns, pink fin-like flaps on the sides of her body, and a purple and pink striped belly. She has gold freckles between their eyes, and pink blush. Her eyes are black with lashes and a winking expression with a wide mouth and a single square tooth poking out by the bottom right of their mouth. She wears a teal bucket hat with black spots.

name: Carmelita
bio: Do you like manga? You should check out some of Carmelita's work. She draws black and white manga about school, her life, and adventures with her best friendCinnamon. Don't worry about spilling any secrets, Carmelita uses code names for any juicy stuff.
appearance: Carmelita is a s'more, a marshmallow sandwiched between chocolate and graham crackers. Atop her head is chocolate that melts downward, resembling hair. The light brown pastry worn on her head has some dark brown circles dispersed throughout it. There is also a long patch of chocolate that stretches around her body near the top of her chest. Under the patch of chocolate is another light brown pastry, covering the rest of her body. She has closed eyes with short black lashes, a smiling red mouth, and round pink cheeks.

name: Carmella
bio: Meet Carmella. Her personality is as bright as she is! With her distinct laugh and pretty feathers, she truly stands out in the crowd. She loves dashing around in the snow or hanging out in her treehouse eating S'mores and playing cards with her friends! Want to join?
appearance: Carmella is a yellow, pink, and blue bird with a cream belly and a white mask around her eyes. She has a plume of rainbow feathers atop her head and fluffy, rainbow wings on either side. She has a small, triangular, yellow beak and pink blush on her cheeks. She has round, black eyes with white eyelashes.

name: Carmen
bio: Carmen always has a camera strapped to her side. She loves nature and spends all day photographing rocks, trees and beaches. With each picture she takes, Carmen feels more appreciative of our beautiful world.
appearance: Carmen is a white cat with pointed, triangular ears. She has a hot pink belly and inner ears, both of which have shimmery flecks. She has a small, white muzzle, framed by two hot pink whiskers on either side. Her mouth and heart-shaped nose are hot pink. She has closed eyes with curled lashes sweeping downwards. Her tail is marked with hot pink stripes.

name: Carmichael
bio: Carmichael is best known for his haute couture fashion house, Carmichael. He dresses the most famous celebs, includingArlene, who’s featured in this year’s holiday campaign. Check out Carmichael’s latest Fall/Winter fashion show!
appearance: Carmichael is light green cucumber. He has lime green flesh, with a white rime on the outside. His chest is covered in white seeds. He has round and a smiling mouth.

name: Carmine
bio: Carmine is a fusion between a mallard duck and a pig. They have a green head and a brown body, separated by a white band on his neck. They have fluffy brown wings the same color as their body and a paler, tan-colored belly. They have green ears with white inner ears. They have round, black eyes and a white snout with tan nostrils.
appearance: Carmine is a fusion between a mallard duck and a pig. They have a green head and a brown body, separated by a white band on his neck. They have fluffy brown wings the same color as their body and a paler, tan-colored belly. They have green ears with white inner ears. They have round, black eyes and a white snout with tan nostrils.

name: Carnita
bio: Carnita is looking for a pair of sensible heels! After a lifetime of sandals and sneakers, she's ready to tip toe to the top of the corporate ladder, and thinks a pair of classy, patent leather pumps will do the trick. Well, that and the 20 hours of unpaid overtime she worked last week!
appearance: Carnita is a pig pulled pork sandwich. She is made up of two buns with pulled pork, lettuce and a salad in the middle. She has two ears with one of them having a brown patch. She has sesame seeds on her head along with round, black eyes with lashes and a tan snout with brown nostrils.

name: Carol
bio: Caroling, cocoa, and cookies are some of Carol's favorite things. This festive mallow loves the bright and cheery vibe of the holidays and wishes the world could be that way every day. She sings in an acapella group that visits schools, homes and hospitals to sing festive tunes all year round.
appearance: Carol is a forest green Christmas tree with a golden star atop her head. Three rows of Christmas lights are wrapped around her with small, circular lights in red, orange, yellow, pink and blue. She has large black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Caroleena
bio: NewReady for a laugh? Caroleena is the queen of impressions! Even if you're in a bad mood, she'll have you laughing in no time. Once, Caroleena made her auntSandralaugh so hard that she broke a table! Maybe this 'Mallow will do an impression of you next.OldReady for a laugh? Caroleena is the queen of impressions; even if you're in a bad mood, she'll have you laughing in no time. Her impressions are spot on, and she can stay in character for a long time. One time, she made her aunt laugh so hard, she broke a table!
appearance: Caroleena is an orange carrot with a pattern of pale yellow horizontal bars. She has two yellow-green and one dark green leaves protruding from the top of her head. She has round, black eyes with straight lashes, a smiling mouth, and a pale pink blush.

name: Carotene
bio: Miss Carotene isn't a substitute teacher anymore—she's a substitute principal! It can be hard to learn the "who's who" of 3000 students and faculty in a matter of days, but she's up for the challenge. How else is she gonna be promoted to substitute superintendent?
appearance: Carotene is a cup of carrot juice. She has a light orange lid on top of her head with a white straw with an orange bow. She has a peach belly with a carrot embroidered on it. She has a winking expression with a red smile and orange blush.

name: Carpio
bio: Congratulations to Carpio! This entrepreneurial scorpion just opened his neighborhood's first vegan taqueria. His signature cactus tacos might be out-of-this-desert delicious, but be warned: they're super spicy! Make sure to pair it with a glass of almond milk horchata!
appearance: Carpio is a teal scorpion with a lighter blue belly with 3 lines running across it. He has holographic pincers and 6 short legs with a long-segmented tail and stinger on the tip. His eyes are black and rounded with a simple black smile.

name: Carrie
bio: Carrie attends the The Holden College of Baggery! While she sometimes feels envious of her designer purse friends—especially when they get to carry around tubes of lipstick for Home Ec—Carrie can't wait for all the joy and happiness she'll be spreading after graduation. Maybe she'll even work forNick!
appearance: Carrie is a red Santa Bag. Her top reveals multiple gifts with a candy cane on the left side of her head. She has a fuzzy white band on her forehead with a mistletoe on the right side. There are two red patches on the right side of her body. She has a winking expression with a black smiling mouth

name: Carrigan
bio: Carrigan can't wait for the first snow to fall on her new beachside home! She finally found the perfect place that's cold and snowy, but also close to the ocean. Are you ready to build a snowman on the shore with Carrigan?
appearance: Carrigan is a pink Christmas tree decorated with silver and pink gold ornaments across her body, a black star on top of her head, and three layers of white snow on her body. She has black eyes and a red smile.

name: Carson
bio: Carson loves cars, monster movies, and travelling to new places. He calls Texas his home state, but has been to many other places in the U.S.
appearance: Carson is a grey tabby cat with a pale grey body with a white belly and darker stripes on his head and sides. His nose, mouth and inner ears are pale pink, framed by black whiskers, and his eyes are closed. He has 'xoxo' embroidered on his belly in red, and a purple heart outline between his belly and the stripes on his right side.

name: Carty
bio: Carty finds it hard to say hello and goodbye. Greetings can be so awkward! Help Carty out by giving her a high five next time you see her out and about. She's a reclusive koala most of the time, but an energizing wave or warm hug is all she needs to start socializing.
appearance: Carty is a light purple koala with a rainbow tie-dye fuzzy hairdoo. His belly is tie-dye rainbow. He has a large black nose, as well as round eyes with eyelashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Caryl
bio: Meet Caryl. She teaches an aerobic class with her fantastic friendBrock. They celebrate all body types and ability levels, so all are welcome to join! Grab a towel, some weights, or maybe a partner and get moving with Caryl and Brock!
appearance: Caryl is a calico cat with a cream body and pink and turquoise patches. She has one turquoise patch over her left ear, and two pink patches, one on her right ear and the other on her lower right body. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes, black whiskers and a happy, pink cat mouth. She wears a purple sweatband around her head which reads "I don't sweat, I sparkle" in hot pink. She also holds a metallic, hot pink weight in each paw.

name: Casa
bio: Casa wants only one thing for Christmas this year—a trip to her favorite theme park! She can't wait to ride all the coasters and see the beautiful decorations. Casa promises to ace all her exams if she can go! Want to join Casa and her family?
appearance: Casa is a gingerbread house. She has a red roof with gumdrops as Christmas lights and swirls of icing decorating it with a chimney on the right side. She has two icing windows and a red door with candy cane on each side. She has three layers of icing on top of her head. She has round, eyes and a smiling mouth with red blush.

name: Cascade
bio: Cascade reads slower than the most 'Mallows, but she can write a poem in minutes! Cascade get tutoring at school to keep up with spelling and learning new words, and her tutor even helps Cascade memorize her poems so she can preform them at the local cafe's slam poetry night!
appearance: Cascade is a teal turtle. She has a blue striped belly and two flippers (one on each side). She has a simple face with round black eyes and a smile. On her back is a galaxy tie-dye shell.

name: Casey
bio: When you think of a candy corn witch, traffic cop doesn't come to mind but that's exactly what Casey is! Casey helps navigate the busy streets so that every mallow has a safe place to live.
appearance: Casey is a piece of candy with three bands of color white at the top, orange in the center and yellow on the bottom. They have a pair of black bat wings and wears a black witch's hat with a purple band and orange buckle. They have round eyes and a smiling mouth. Casey's updated version is missing their witch hat and has lashes with a winking expression

name: Cash
bio: Cash dresses in his best attire, no matter the occasion. You will usually find him in a well-tailored suit, and even a bow tie! Cash's family has always ben in the tailoring buisiness, but this gingerbread decided to go a different route. He studies publishing and dreams of being a book editor!
appearance: Cash is a golden-brown gingerbread boy wearing a maroon headband with large white earmuffs. He has two dots of white icing running down either side of his body. He has a maroon colored belly with two red gumdrop buttons decorating it. He also wears a large, green bow tie above his buttons. He has round eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Casja
bio: Meet Casja. She is visually impaired, but that doesn't stop her from playing her favorite video games! Want to try an audio video game?
appearance: Casja is a light blue Walkman portable cassette player. She wears yellow headphones atop her head and has a row of six grey control buttons on her forehead. In the middle of her body she has a yellow cassette slot with a red cassette tape inside. She has a glittery blue circle on either side of her body. Above the cassette tape she has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Caslina
bio: Meet Caslina. She wants to become a fashion photographer and she's chosen you to be her muse! Caslina loves to have fun on her shoots, so put on your favorite tunes, show off your favorite outfits, and let the camera work its magic
appearance: Caslina is an axolotl with a striped gradient pattern in bright rainbow colors and a pattern of white stars scattered over the top. She has silver gills with a hot pink frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly with silver glitter. She has black, oval-shaped eyes with a white shine and short lashes, as well as a cat-like smile.

name: Casmir
bio: Meet Casmir. His friends say that his name should be "Caring" because he is always taking care of others. By day he is working at the retirement home, and by night he is volunteering... anywhere! If you want to give back to the community, join Casmir on his next outing!
appearance: Casmir is a grey and white husky with two straight ears atop his head. His inner ears and belly are white and he has fluffy, cloud-shaped eyebrows. He holds a red and cream mug of hot chocolate in his paws which is topped with marshmallows. He sips from the red and white striped straw and has closed eyes.

name: Cassie
bio: Meet Cassie! She is the head nurse at the hospital where she works to help save lives every day. Cassie knows hospitals can be scary so she keeps lollipops and stickers in her pocket for any mini-mallow patients she sees. Don’t be shy, give Cassie a smile or a wave if you see her rushing around!
appearance: Cassie is a calico cat with a white body and blue patches. She has a pale blue patch over her left ear and face and a sky blue right ear. She has closed eyes, black whiskers and a happy, pink cat mouth. She wears blue nursing scrubs with an unfastened face mask hanging from the front. Her pocket has a first aid symbol on it and contains a packet of medication and a syringe.

name: Cataleya
bio: Cataleya is one bright koala, she's made the school honor roll almost every month this year! She is also very witty; she loves to laugh at puns and bad jokes. Because her favorite subject is science, she created science-punny valentines for her friends. Do you have any good science jokes to share with her?
appearance: Cataleya is a light blue koala with enormous, round ears. Her belly, her muzzle and the insides of her ears - which are fluffy - are white. She has a large black nose, as well as round eyes with sparkles and a cat-like smile. Three hearts decorate her right side, growing larger as they descend. The smallest is pale pink, followed by red and then blue.

name: Catarina
bio: Do you have a favorite time of year? Catarina does - it's spooky season! Every year she starts to decorate on October 1st, with decorations inside and out. Catarina hosts a haunted house party and every year she tries a new spooky theme.
appearance: Catarina is a black cat with pointed, triangular ears. She has a hot pink belly and inner ears. Her closed eyes and dual whiskers on each cheek are white, whereas her nose and mouth are pale pink.

name: Cato
bio: Meet Cato. He's turned another year older and another year wiser! But no matter how old he gets, he's still young at heart. He loves a silly birthday party with balloons, games, and a pinata filled with extra candy! And the perfect gift? The company of his friends of course!
appearance: Cato is a layered tan and brown cake with white frosting in between layers and on the top of his head with rainbow sprinkles and a rainbow candle. His bottom layer is brown, the middle layer being tan, and the top layer being cream-colored, his middle layer having sprinkles as well. He has black eyes with a winking expression and a red mouth.

name: Catrina
bio: Nobody makes better pan de muerto than Catrina! Her pan de muerto comes out of the oven super soft and sweet every time. Want to help Catrina dust loaves with sugar? She's baking a large batch for Día de los Muertos celebrations and would love to have you as her assistant baker!
appearance: Catrina is a sugar skull decorated black cow. She has a mint muzzle, inner ears, and belly She has thin, curved horns which sit wide from her head and are white with a black fringe. She has round, black eyes surrounded by yellow-green flowers and black nostrils and a small smile.

name: Catrine
bio: Catrine is a hot pink and pink dog with floppy ears. Her body is predominantly hot pink, with white markings. and the light pink belly. muzzle and in an white eyebrow-like pattern above her eyes. The inside of her ears are also light pink. He has round black eyes with a white outline. He also has a pink nose and a smiling dog mouth.
appearance: Catrine is a hot pink and pink dog with floppy ears. Her body is predominantly hot pink, with white markings. and the light pink belly. muzzle and in an white eyebrow-like pattern above her eyes. The inside of her ears are also light pink. He has round black eyes with a white outline. He also has a pink nose and a smiling dog mouth.

name: Cavaleri
bio: Cavaleri is a movie star with a unique sense of style. From wearing flip-flops with ball gowns to using a basketball as a handbag she's always setting trends! Though the fashion critics never quite get her, Cavaleri doesn't mind much. After all, she dresses for herself!
appearance: Cavaleri is a mint alpaca with a lime green mane and white face and inner ears. She has a short tail, a pink nose and mouth, and black eyes with eyelashes.

name: Caylee
bio: Caylee is a Gemini and embraces her two sides! Some days she's feeling dark and mysterious, other days, bright and  sunny! Her friends love her and accept her no matter what. They love to hang at the coffee shop, sip super sweet mochas and read their horoscopes!
appearance: Caylee is a black and rainbow caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. Her multi-colored bangs include lemon yellow, ice blue and lavender. The inside of her ears and her belly are a pastel rainbow. The horn is a glittery silver with multi-colored bands in pink, yellow and blue. She has round eyes and a pink nose and mouth, all framed by two silver whiskers.

name: Cazden
bio: Cazden gets excited and nervous when meeting a new friend because he wants to make a good impression. Will you calm his nerves with a hug?
appearance: Cazden is a pastel blue dragon with a white nose and belly. The insides of her ears are also white. His horns and the inside of his wings are a glittery silver and the spines on his back are a glittery blue. He has two large black eyes.

name: Cazlan
bio: Did you see that flash of red soaring through the skies? It must be Cazlan! This speedy cardinal loves to zoom about but when she finally lands, it's time to get her nerd on with her best friendBabs. One day she wants to be her sidekick!
appearance: Cazlan is a red bird with a black mask marking and belly. Her round, black eyes are ringed in white with two short lashes on each. She has a triangular, yellow beak and pink blush on her cheeks. She has a fluffy, dark red tuft atop her head and matching wings.

name: Ceba
bio: Meet Ceba. She is stubborn, yet productive, so if she says she will do something, she gets it done. In her free time, she loves to shop 'til she drops. When she's done, she's ready for a nap as nothing gets between Ceba and her sleep!
appearance: Ceba is a bright blue bird with stubby wings and an extravagant rainbow feathered tail. Both her belly and the tips of her tail are a light sky blue. Three cobalt feathers sit atop her head. She has a small, yellow beak and round black eyes with thick lashes.

name: Cece
bio: Today is a very special day can you guess why? The party hat might give you a clue, today is Cece's birthday! This cuddly cat can't wait to celebrate, will you join her special day?
appearance: Cece is a rainbow cat with a tie-dyed pattern. She has a tail and cat ears with her inner ears being a light pink. She wears a striped, pink party hat with a light pink pompom up at the top. She holds a pink, strawberry cake with white frosting, and a red, lit candle. She has closed black eyes with lashes, black whiskers with two being on each side, a black nose, and a white muzzle.

name: Cecilia
bio: Dumplings, dancing, and dragons are some of Cecilia's favorite things. She loves mystical movies and tv shows, (especially if it includes dragons), and even has her room decorated like a castle! Would you go on a dragon quest with Cecilia?
appearance: Cecilia is a sky blue bird with two fluffy wings and a shimmery white belly. She has round, black eyes and a triangular yellow beak. She wears a sparkly silver crown atop her head.

name: Cecily
bio: Cecily is a professional winner! From jai alai championships to prize-winning apple pies, she knows just what it takes to edge out the competition. Her secret? Well, it definitely doesn’t involve calling her competitors the night before a contest pleading, "let me win, tomorrow... let me win tomorrow or I'll be so very sad"!
appearance: Cecily is a red is Bigfoot with a fuzzy red mane and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and hot sauce wrapper belly, and sparkly red pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts with red outline. She has mischievous eyes with lashes and a wide mouth which stretches across her face.

name: Cecy
bio: This beaming bunny lives on the bright side. For anything that doesn't quite go their way, Cecy tries to see the positive side and make the best of things. They're the perfect pal to have when you need some cheering up.
appearance: Cecy is a bunny with sage green fur and long, floppy ears. Their belly is covered in thick, long, white fur. They have round, black eyes, a pale pink blush on their cheeks and a peach colored nose and mouth.

name: Cedrick
bio: Cedrick wants to be an engineer when he grows up - he loves building forts, clubhouses, and crazy cool mini buildings with his friends. Once they even built a clubhouse from Easter baskets and popsicles sticks!
appearance: Cedrick is a light blue bird, with a white belly, light blue fuzzy wings, a light blue tuft of hair, and a darker blue beak.

name: Celenia
bio: Celenia wishes she could hug everyone but her immune system has to work a little bit harder in order to fight off germs. She sticks to fist bumps and air high-fives to say hello. She's a huge fan of French baking and is striving to perfect her flaky croissant dough. Do you want to help her taste-test?
appearance: Celenia is a light pink cat with pointed, triangular ears. She has a white green belly and sparkly, hot pink inner ears. Her round nose and the whiskers that frame it are all hot pink. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes.

name: Celeste
bio: Celeste is the queen of balloon animals! She has an obsession with clowns and making a balloon animal for every occasion! Don’t worry, she won’t put on a red nose or scare you but she will make you the best balloon animal you have ever seen.
appearance: Celeste is a cobalt blue bear. She has round ears with white insides, as well as a white muzzle and belly. Her facial features are all black, including her oval-shaped eyes and round nose.

name: Celestina
bio: Celestina loves bubble baths and bathrobes, she has one for every day of the week! When it's time for a bath, she lights candles and adds some of her favorite scents to create the perfect at-home spa experience.
appearance: Celestina is a dragon with a pink and yellow tie-dye pattern, also including shades of peach, and a scaly texture. She has a white nose, inner ears and belly. Her horns and the inside of her wings are shimmering pale silver, and the spines along her back are hot pink. She has two large black eyes with short lashes and pink blue nostrils.

name: Celestino
bio: Are you doing anything right now? Celestino could really use some company. Wanna go out for a stroll? Grab a bite to eat? Celestino is up for anything. Even if you feel like being quiet, he could just sit and read a book next to you! Anyway, he's coming over!
appearance: Celestino is a white highland cow with olive spots all around him a patch of longer tan fur like a fringe. He has a cream muzzle and white inner ears, and a fluffy, cream belly. He has white thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and thin cream lines mark the sections. He has round, black eyes, brown nostrils.

name: Celia
bio: Roller coasters and beach trips are two things Celia loves to do every summer. She loves to go to the amusement park and scream on all her favorite rides. Her favorite rides are on the boardwalk so she can see the ocean just before the drop, want to tag along next time?
appearance: Celia is a sliced orange, with a darker orange peel on the outside and a lighter orange on her face and belly. The markings on her belly represent the sections of an orange. The top of her head sports a short white stem and a bright green leaf. She has round black eyes with short lashes, a smiling red mouth, and round pink cheeks.

name: Celie
bio: Celie has softball tryouts today and is feeling pretty nervous about it. She's never been on a sports team before! Celie hopes to make the make the team in any capacity, even if it's just as a backup player. Head to the ballfield this afternoon and root for Celie!
appearance: Celie is a black grasshopper with cyan wings. She has a cyan belly with cyan stripes and two antennae with fuzzy pale blue tips. She wears a tea and black l gingham bow. She has round, black eyes rimmed in white and a red smile.

name: Celine
bio: You might never meet a sweeter Squishmallow than Celine, she wants to help everyone she meets. Her aunt works for a nonprofit that helps Squishmallows in other parts of the world and when Celine grows up, she wants to work there too.
appearance: Celine is a light brown chicken with small wings and a pure white belly. She has a red comb on the top of her head. She has round, black eyes and a light orange beak.

name: Cella
bio: Meet Cella. She owns a boutique where she sells homemade candles. She experiments with unexpected ingredients to make intriguing scents. Last week, she made a basil, jasmine, and peppercorn candle and it sold out! Swing by her shop, you never know what she'll be lighting up!
appearance: Cella is a blue bearded dragon, a type of lizard. Her body has a gradient that goes from light blue to dark blue from the top of her head to her tail. She has a fuzzy, white belly and three dark blue markings on her back, above her tail. She has light blue fringes that protrude from either side of her head. She has round, black eyes, and a cat-like smile.

name: Chaitra
bio: Congrats to Chaitra who just moved into her first apartment! Living alone can be tough at the beginning, so Chaitra plans on hosting lots of dinner parties and game nights with all her besties. But first, she has to unpack. Will you come over and give Chaitra a hand?
appearance: Chaitra is a purple whose inner ears and belly are white. She has black eyes with eyelashes surrounded by purple, as well as a purple nose and mouth. She also has silver mask marking. She has three hearts on her belly one pink, one teal and one purple. Also the top of her body is light purple

name: Chamberlain
bio: Congratulations to Chamberlain! This walking dictionary just placed first in the local spelling bee. Though she had trouble with the word ambidextrous, Chamberlain trusted her gut and brought home the gold. Can you spell champion?
appearance: Chamberlain is a light orange bear with off-white inner ears, belly, and muzzle. She has an orange glittery heart on her belly, and her nose and mouth are orange with her round eyes being black.

name: Chambless
bio: Chambless is as charitable as a peach tree in July. This professional do-gooder loves giving back to the community and always does it with a smile. After a long day helping others, Chambless helps herself...to a glass of her favorite sweet tea!
appearance: Chambless is a possum with a white head and a rose-pink body. She has pink rounded ears and belly with a pink triangular tuft of her on her head and a long pink tail. Her whiskers and eyes are black, alongside a black curved mouth with a light pink nose. She wears hot pink heart glasses.

name: Champ
bio: Though he's not old enough to race yet, one day Champ hopes to live up to his name and become a champion racehorse. He comes from a family of legacy horses and he can't wait to have them cheer him on for his first big race.
appearance: Champ is a golden horse with a white stripe on his forehead. He has black eyes and a brown mane and tail. His inner ears, muzzle and belly are white, though his belly is decorated with dark brown splotches and the back of his ears are the same color.

name: Chance
bio: Chance is fearless, she loves adventure and stepping outside of her comfort zone. From beating her own race times to not being afraid of the dark, she loves to find new ways to challenge herself or get over her fears.
appearance: Chance is a purple and blue tie-dyed horse with a white blaze on her forehead. She has black eyes and a candy pink mane and tail. The inside of her ears, muzzle and belly are white in color. She has a bright pink lily emblem embroidered on the right side of her chest.

name: Chandler
bio: Besides show and tell, naps and snacks are two of Chandler's favorite things. He loves to share and learn more about his friends. Next week is his turn and he can't decide if he should bring his favorite blanket or his favorite snack, can you help him choose?
appearance: Chandler is a bright yellow shark with three fins, two on each side and one atop his head. He has a round, white belly. He has round black eyes and a toothy, open-mouthed grin.

name: Chandra
bio: Meet Chandra. This cupcake cutie loves to singing in the mirror and can't wait for her next choir practice! Chandra and her friend Carol loves to harmonize and they've been practicing a new song. Will you be there to cheer them on
appearance: Chandra is a cupcake with swirled icing in layers of red and white. Rainbow sprinkles decorate the two upper layers. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth. Her lower half is green with dark green stripes.

name: Chandy
bio: Chandy works in the home section of a department store. Sometimes, when no one is around he jumps on all the beds! It's his little secret. Even when Chandy's not at work, you can usually find this 'Mallow goofing around. Ready to place "Out of Order" signs all over the store?
appearance: Chandy is an anglerfish with a navy blue body. He has blue pectoral fins, and a pale blue belly with a long rod on his forehead and a fuzzy red lure. He wears a pair of white ear muffs with a red band. He has black eyes, and a wide mouth with four fangs poking out of the top.

name: Chanel
bio: Say hi to Chanel the cinnamon roll. She’s sweeter than your average pastry, and she’s a pastry chef who loves giving back! Chanel likes to volunteer with her free time at the local food pantry and teaches cake baking and decorating classes.
appearance: Chanel is a light brown pastry slathered in white icing. The icing covers her head and drips down her body, and has a brown swirl loosely in the shape of a heart. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Channing
bio: Have you met Channing? Channing has never met someone he doesn't like and would love to be your new bestie. On a snowy day, you'll probably see him making snow angels and building a moat for his snow fort. Do you want to join in the fun?
appearance: Channing is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. They wear a cobalt blue hat printed with white snowflakes atop their head, and a teal outfit with sky blue accents on their bottom half.

name: Chantal
bio: How many snowflakes fall in one day? Are they really all different? Ask your new friend Chantal. Chantal loves to find out random facts and share them with her friends, especially when snow is involved!
appearance: Chantal is a cupcake with swirled icing in layers of green and white. Rainbow sprinkles decorate the two upper layers. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth. Her lower half is red with candy pink stripes.

name: Chappy
bio: Chappy draws six-panel comics about a caterpillar named Terpi! He completes a story almost every week, even writing the action and dialogue. Chappy's dream is to expand Terpi the caterpillar's story into a longer form epic! Would you read Chappy's comics?
appearance: Chappy is a mushroom with a tan stalk and a blue cap. The top of his cap is a light blue with white spots. His stalk makes up his body and includes a glittery, purple heart on his belly with the text "SMILE" in magenta inside of the heart. He has closed, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Charaka
bio: Charaka creates beautiful multimedia sculptures! Her favorite sculpture is a life - sized barrel cactus with blooming flowers made of brown glass. Charaka names every sculpture after someone she loves. Can Charaka name one of her works of art after you?
appearance: Charaka is a white flying pig that has sparkly silver wings with her tummy rainbow with red and blue heart on it. She is covered with spots that are gray and sky blue. Her ears are gray with the inside rainbow. Her face consists of one black eye and with the other eye winking. She also has a pig snout.]]

name: Charisma
bio: Meet Charisma. She loves chocolate wafers, crunchy peanut butter, and cinnamon toast. Charisma is the queen of video games, she live-streams her favorite video games especially when they go on raids. She loves making friends this way, would you join her on her next boss fight?
appearance: Charisma is a mint colored cat with a cream colored belly. She has a large silver bow adorning her right ear. Her inner ears, nose and mouth are all pastel pink. She has closed eyes and two straight, black whiskers. In her 5'' form, she has no white belly. (Claire’s version)

name: Charity
bio: Guess who just learned how to ride a bike? Charity did! She has a blue and purple bike with streamers on the handle bars. She used to be afraid of falling but then she got right back up and tried again. Will you go on bike rides with Charity?
appearance: Charity is a creamy white colored chicken with a pure white belly. She has small wings with brown feathers on the tips. She has a red comb on the top of her head. She has round, black eyes with short, straight lashes and a light orange beak.

name: Charles
bio: You will usually find Charles working on a new drawing! He loves to doodle even if he doesn't have a specific idea in mind. Sometimes, drawing reminds Charles of fun memories and his family who live in a faraway land. He can't wait to visit them this year!
appearance: Charles is a green pickle with embroidered markings all over his body. He has a green stem poking out of his top, and a brown mustache with black eyes and a winking expression.

name: Charlice
appearance: Charlice is a hot pink chinchilla with white cheeks and belly. They have pale pink inner ears and red whiskers, nose, and curved mouth and black rounded eyes.

name: Charlie
bio: This little pup is always on the go; Charlie has had the travel bug since he was little. He is spotted at the finest areas in the world. It makes sense since he aspires to break the news as a future reporter someday!
appearance: Charlie is a white dog with a round black patch on his left eye. He has triangular ears with pink inners and a belly the same color. He has a black nose and mouth, and round black eyes. Only his left eye has a rim of white.

name: Charlie the Chick
bio: (no bio was given on tag)
appearance: Charlie is a pale-yellow chick with lighter yellow belly, with a orange beak and has black eyelashes on his black rounded eyes.

name: Charlize
bio: Meet Charlize. She is a professional masseuse and thinks everyone could use a little more self-care. This chick is very strong and loves soothing her fellow Squishmallows whenever they need some TLC. What does she do for her own self-care? A nice weekend to herself in a cabin far, far away.
appearance: Charlize is a cockatiel, a type of small parrot. She has a yellow head, including a fluff on feathers on top. She has red cheeks, black eyes with short lashes, and a grey beak. The bottom half of her body is also a soft grey, including her fluffy wings.

name: Charlon
bio: Charlon entered his school's pumpkin carving contest. Think he can win? Charlon has carved a few pumpkins before, but that was just for fun. Charlon wants to impress the judges with a space design. He's been drawing little stars all month to practice!
appearance: Charlon is an orange monster. He has black eyes with a right-eyed wink, a smiling mouth and numerous white, pointed teeth. His horn is striped green and purple, and he has a  large purple witch hat with a green belt. His belly is striped in green and purple, and he has a green patch around his left eye.

name: Charlotte
bio: Easter is one of Charlotte’s favorite holidays because it means she can jump in and out of as many Easter baskets as she wants. When she gets tired, she’ll nestle up inside one of the smallest baskets to enjoy a nice nap.
appearance: Charlotte is a calico cat with a cream body and pink and purple patches. She has one pink patch over her left ear, and two purple patches, one on her right ear and the other on her lower right body. She has closed eyes, black whiskers and a happy, pink cat mouth. Her tail is purple with a pink tip.

name: Charlotte the Sloth
bio: Charlotte has a motto in life to slow down and enjoy the little things. She is patient and kind, and loves nothing more than taking a snooze in the sun.
appearance: Charlotte is a purple long sloth with arms and legs. She has a white with purple marking between her eyes. she has short purple tail poking out. She has black closed eyes with lashes and black nose and mouth.

name: Charmaine
bio: Charmaine is a tennis champion! She never gloats after vanquishing opponents with her backhand—she simply takes them out for ice cream. After her 86th consecutive win, however, she's beginning to wonder if her competitors are only throwing out soft serves in exchange for—well—soft serve!
appearance: Charmaine is a hummingbird with a purple head and a lavender body and wings. She has a round, off-white belly with the tips of her wings being tan. Her tail is short, and they has a long pink beak. She has round black eyes

name: Chase
bio: Chase loves camping, canoes, and capture the flag. Every summer he goes on a trip with his Squishmallow Scouts group and they have a blast, last year it was Chase that found the opposing team’s flag! If you love the outdoors then Chase is the cat for you.
appearance: Chase is a green tabby cat with a pistachio green body and darker stripes on his head and sides. He has a white belly and inner ears the same color. His nose and mouth are bright pink, framed by black whiskers, and his eyes are closed.

name: Chasen
bio: Chasen owns a floral shop! He's there every day from open to close, arranging colorful floral bouquets. Chasen is known for contrasting the flower with smaller branches and leaves, creating a full and beautiful bouquets. Want Chasen to create a custom arrangement for you?
appearance: Chasen is a dog with a pink colored fuzzy body. His muzzle is white and his belly is rainbow, and he has a dark pink colored patch around his right eye. His fluffy ears are the same color with a hot pink underside. He has round, black eyes and a pink nose and mouth. I

name: Chasmen
bio: Chasmen shows off his unique personality through flowing dresses and and brightly colored manicures. Every day is a new chance to make a statement and express himself. He embraces himself for exactly who he is and he wants you to, too!
appearance: Chasmen is a green color on his body with fuzzy gills with a tie-dye pink, purple, and blue frill on each side of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a fuzzy, white belly. He has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Chauncy
bio: Chauncy lives with his grandmother on a farm and helps her take care of all the animals. His favorite thing to do in the summer is to run through the sprinkler with all his friends. Chauncy wants to be a superhero when he grows up, what could his superpower be?
appearance: Chauncy is a tan dog with tall ears which taper at the tips. His belly, muzzle and inner ears are a creamy white. He has round black eyes and a nose the same color. He has 'xoxo' emblazoned on the right side of his chest, accompanied by the outline of a heart. These alternate between light pink and maroon in color.

name: Chaz
bio: Chaz is like totally excited for the holiday season! His love language is gift giving and this year he hand-knit each member of his skate crew a wicked cool cashmere sweater. They're embroidered with the words 'Radical Cauliflower' (inside joke) and Chaz can't wait to gift them!
appearance: Chaz is a white and blue cup of slushie. on top of his head is cherry slush. there is a cyan straw poking out from his left side. he has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth. He wears a red scarf with a snowflake.

name: Chea
bio: You won't see Chea around town until at least mid-afternoon. This 'Mallow loves sleeping in! Chea isn't usually up late until he has a gig with his band, Active Dry Yeast. So he's otherwise relaxing at home. Wanna come over and watch some TV?
appearance: Chea is a cheesy yellow pizza slice. He is decorated with various toppings including, pepperoni, mushrooms, sausages and green onions. He has a brown crust which appears as a stripe at the base on the front, and covers his back half. He has round, black eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Chelsea
bio: When Chelsea is not showing off her quick wit and her brilliant endurance, she enjoys relaxing with her friends. Known as "Chill Chelsea", she loves to stay home for a movie night, full of popcorn and laughter. Whenever Chelsea's friends are in need of a comfy cat-nap, they know Chelsea's their girl!
appearance: Chelsea is a cheetah with a sky-blue coat. She is covered in hot pink spots with a dark grey outline. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a hot pink nose and mouth. Her ears are round with a peachy pink color inside.

name: Cherie
bio: Meet Cherie. There's nothing she can't handle, although she is a little afraid of the dark. But, she knows that doesn't mean that she's not brave. She's ready to conquer the world! All she asks is that you leave a light on.
appearance: Cherie is a brown tiger with two white fur patches on each side. She has a cheetah pattern and a white fuzzy belly. She has rounded black eyes with a muzzle and her long teeth are white.

name: Cherish
bio: Roller skates, picnics, and crunchy peanut butter are some of Cherish's favorite things. This roller skating Squishmallow loves a good picnic by the beach, want to know her favorite sandwich? Peanut butter and banana!
appearance: Cherish is a grey elephant, though her16"release is pale blue. Both versions have a round, white belly. She has large, floppy ears with sparkly silver on the inside, and an embroidered trunk. She is winking her right eye and has short, curled lashes on both.

name: Cherleen
bio: Meet Cherleen! Nature is Cherleen's passion. She loves being outside, no matter the weather! Cherleen can see the good in every season, but she admits spring is her favorite because of all the bright and beautiful colors. What's your favorite season?
appearance: Cherleen is a pale pink strawberry with a pale green top. She is covered in white. She has round black eyes with perky eyelashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Cherry
bio: Cherry loves to create music. She enjoys playing the flute and wants to learn how to play more instruments every year. This year she wants to play the bass guitar and the tuba, which do you think she should try first?
appearance: Cherry is a cherry colored fruit with a musk pink belly. She has a brown stem and a thin, green leaf protruding from the top of her head. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Cheryl
bio: With eight legs, Cheryl excelled at many sports. So she decided to be physical therapist and help heal all her fellow athletes! Cheryl uses heat and ice therapy, as well as a few yoga poses, to get all 'Mallows feeling their best. Want to book an appointment with Cheryl?
appearance: Cheryl is a teal spider with eight creepy, crawly legs. Her legs are orange, black, purple, and teal and are different on either side. She has a black sparkly belly and wears a bow the same color. She has round, black eyes with short dual lashes, and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Chesa
bio: Chesa is a white peppermint with two different colored swirls, such as red and pink. She has black eyelashes and mouth.
appearance: Chesa is a white peppermint with two different colored swirls, such as red and pink. She has black eyelashes and mouth.

name: Chester
bio: Even though he's small, Chester is a strong shrimp. He works as a stage hand and helps set up many 'Mallow shows. Even though it is hard work, Chester loves traveling and exploring the interesting places he visit on tours.
appearance: Chester is a coral corduroy shrimp. He has 8 little arms, a shimmery tail and 2 shimmery antenna on top of his head. His belly is white and striped with his corduroy coral body color. His face features 2 round black eyes with lashes and a small happy smile.

name: Chet
bio: Bobbleheads and sneakers are two things Chet loves to collect. He has almost 100 figurines and a crazy story for almost every pair of sneakers, just wait until you hear about his latest pair!
appearance: Chet has a teal green body with two dark blue cheeks. He has grey spots on his face, and yellow spines on his back. His eyes are black and he has a white belly.

name: Cheyenne
bio: This octocorn has a sweet tooth, can you guess her favorite treat? For her birthday last year, she had a candy-themed party. She had a candy cake, a candy buffet for party favors, and even a piñata!
appearance: Cheyenne is an octopus with a rainbow tie-dye pattern and a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including blue, green, yellow and pink). She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Chienda
bio: Chienda is a flower artist. She makes extravagant and strange bouquets at her flower shop that will make your eyes pop! She pairs flowers, feathers, shiny jewels, and even live butterflies, to make completely unique creations that look and smell amazing! Swing by and pick one up!
appearance: Chienda is a brown mammoth with a fuzzy patch of darker brown fur atop her head. She has large, floppy ears with marbled pink inner ears and an embroidered trunk and curled, ivory tusks. She has a fuzzy, light brown belly and round, black eyes.

name: Chip
bio: Chip is a smart guy! He is very kind and likes to help people. When he grows up, Chip wants to be an aircraft designer and fly the jets that he creates!
appearance: Chip is a brown rodent with round ears and a tan colored belly. He has a white muzzle with a triangular brown nose and two prominent front teeth. He has round, black eyes and long black whiskers. On the right side of his chest are three hearts, two small ones in purple and hot pink, and a larger red heart below. Also comes in 8 inch and clip, without hearts.

name: Chitra
bio: Chitra is a fitness instructor with a passion for fashion. In fact, she teaches a shopping themed cardio class on Tuesdays! Sign up for such exercises as shopping bag squats, sample sale sprints, and even "those are MY high heels" high kicks!
appearance: Chitra is a peach goblin. She has teal horns on her head and light teal pointy ears. On the back of Chitra she has a peach devil-like tail. She has round, black eyes and mouth with burgundy blush.

name: Chloe
bio: Chloe is a pampered, prize-winning show poodle who has an eye for style. She's happiest when she's playing dress-up with her friends. She's the perfect fashionista to accompany you on your next shopping spree!
appearance: Chloe is a pastel pink poodle with curly fur on her head and on the ends of her floppy ears. She has lighter pink on her muzzle and belly. Her nose and eyes are both black.

name: Chloeyana
bio: Who is always happy to see you with a big smile on her face? It's Chloeyana! She loves to go for an early morning walk and head back to bed until brunch. If she had her way, she could sleep and play all day.
appearance: Chloeyana is a tan dog with upright, triangular ears. Her muzzle and eyebrows are white and spiky, and her inner ears and belly are also white. She has large, round, cartoon eyes with hazel irises and a dual symbol of a small blue heart on a larger red heart on her chest.

name: Chokka
bio: [[ This Bio is Stubbed ]]
appearance: Chokka is a carton of milk with a dark periwinkle lid and a yellow straw. They have lavender stripes on half of their body and the other half is white with an image of a brown-spotted cow to signify a chocolate flavoring to the milk. Their eyes are open and their smiling mouth is as well.

name: Chrissy
bio: Meet Chrissy. She's proud to be part of the LGBTQ community! This proud 'Mallow may have a coolcat exterior, but she's really just a big goofball! She loves grabbing burgers with her friends and has been known to squirt soda out of her nose from laughing so hard! Want to go?
appearance: Chrissy is a white dogicorn, a combination of a dog and a unicorn. She has triangular ears with striped, bright rainbow insides. Her horn and belly are both metallic gold. She wears aviators with striped rainbow lenses and purple frames. Her nose and mouth are also purple, and she has a bright, rainbow mane.

name: Christabel
bio: Meet Christabel. She is a go-getting, trendsetting superstar ready to take on any role in her career. When Christabel's not at her marketing job, she's out on the soccer field scoring goals and being the MVP! Join Christabel at her next soccer game and she will teach you some tricks.
appearance: Christabel is a multi-colored swirling crab with a white belly. She has two large lavender claws and three different colors (pink, yellow, blue) smaller legs beneath them. Lastly, she has a black simple smile and two black eyes.

name: Christian
bio: Christian writes children's books with his pal,Nova! After Christian writes the story, Nova draws the pictures for it. They are working on a series now about a 'Mallow who goes on underwater adventures! Want to check out their latest story?
appearance: Christian is a caterpillar with a segmented body. His head is pink followed by a tie-dye pink in a repeating pattern. He has a white, fuzzy belly, cream antennae with pink rounded tips. He has round, black eyes with pink blush and rounded black glasses.

name: Christo
bio: Christo lives life to the extreme! From hot sauces to hot takes, this larger-than-life genealogist is an expert at keeping things interesting, especially at the dinner table. He would love to chart your family history, but be warned: you might get a lecture on an obscure 20th-century conflict, too!
appearance: Christo is a red chili pepper. He has a green leaf with a stem on top of his head. He has a red curve on the right side of his body. He has mischievous black eyes and an orange smile with pointed teeth.

name: Christopher
bio: Racecar driver Christopher might be known for burning rubber on the racetrack... but burning his signature red velvet? Unheard of! He's passionate about cakes, cars and baking cakes that look like cars. Right now he's making a chocolate ganache hot red  for his best friend Allison's birthday!
appearance: Christopher is a watermelon whale with dark green stripes on his body. He has a fin on each side of his body and one on atop his head, as well as a fluke. He has a pink watermelon belly with black seeds. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Chuck
bio: Don't let his cute appearance fool you... Chuck is a tough chick. Chuck plays guitar, goes on the tallest rides at the far and is not afraid of the dark. Easter is his favorite holiday, since it's all about him!
appearance: Chuck is a yellow bird with a white belly. He has a pale orange beak and ovals of pale pink blush under each of his eyes. His eyes are closed and each has two straight eyelashes.

name: Chuey
bio: Chuey is a student of the world, he loves to pick up new tips and tricks on the adventures with histwin brother. They aren't old enough to travel on their own just yet, but they have a huge list of places they want to go. Where do you think they should go first?
appearance: Chuey is a grey dinosaur with a scaled texture on his body. He has two small arms sticking out from his front, each with small, white claws on the tip. His belly and the spines along his back are blue. He large cartoon eyes and a wide, toothy grin like a shark.

name: Chunks
appearance: Chunks is a tan jar of peanut butter with a bright blue lid and label. Brown peanut butter drips down their face. They have round, black eyes, an open, smiling mouth, and pale pink plush. Their label depicts two laughing peanuts with the phrase "EXTRA FUN" written in hot pink inside a chartreuse speech bubble.

name: Chutney
bio: Chutney feels restless. She doesn't have any plans today and has just been swimming around her favorite iceberg. Any chance you want to swim over and catch mackerel together? With so much free time, Chutney wants to pick up a new hobby. Do you have any suggestions?
appearance: Chutney is a green seal with dark green spots and two flat flippers on each side. She has a round, white muzzle and belly. She also has round markings above her eyes resembling eyebrows. Her facial features, including nose, mouth, round eyes, short lashes and whiskers are all black.

name: Chuy
bio: Do you need a racing partner? Or maybe someone to laugh and snuggle with? Chuy is the pup for you! This courageous Cairn Terrier may be small but his heart makes him ginormous. He loves playing with his sisterChloeyanaand staying up late on his rooftop patio.
appearance: Chuy is a black dog with upright, triangular ears. His muzzle and eyebrows are grey and spiky, and his belly is the same color. He has pink inner ears and is poking out his tongue. He has round, black eyes rimmed in white.

name: Cian
bio: Cian doesn't hiss—he boogies! This selfless snake is a great dancer and a better friend. He can't wait to one day bring his hip-hop dance team to the aquarium and perform and perform a flash mob in front of the jellyfish exhibit!
appearance: Cian is a navy blue Basilisk with a peach lower jaw and belly with a darker shade of lines across his belly. He has white horns and red fuzz on the top of his head that goes onto his back. He has a spotted back with the spots being a holographic, navy blue. He has black eyes, and navy blue nostrils with a wide, curved mouth, and his pink forked tongue sticking out of his mouth.

name: Cicely
bio: Cicely is an agricultural biologist specializing in mushroom farming! This 'Mallow dedicates herself to the land and loves what it can bring back with a little water and some spores. Cicely's mushroom project has already yielded delicious results. Want to try her iced chaga lemonade?
appearance: Cicely is a black cat with pointed, triangular ears with pink inner ears. She has a white belly with arms and she is holding a pink lemonade. Her nose and mouth are pale pink and framed by two white whiskers on either side. She has round, black eyes ringed in white.

name: Cici
bio: Cici loves commercials! She can recite almost any jingle at the drop of a hat and loves coming up with creative ideas for her friends and family; look out, world – here comes the next advertising CEO!
