appearance: Cici is a hot red panda with a conventionally bright red body. She has white markings including on her ears, on her muzzle, eyebrow-like ovals above her eyes and fluffy cheeks. Her eyes, nose and mouth are all black. Her belly and the insides of her ears are chocolate brown.

name: Cienna
bio: Cienna is a daydreamer and loves collecting stickers. She especially enjoys listening to the sound of rain and taking pictures of thunderstorms. Her favorite color is rainbow, which might explain why she loves thunderstorms so much.
appearance: Cienna is a light purple caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears and her belly, as well as the spiral on her horn, are striped in rainbow. The horn itself is a shimmery white. She has closed eyes and a hot pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Cillian
bio: Have you seen Cillian's vlog? He has thousands of followers and now he's turning his successful online series into a TV show! Since Cillian studies photography at his local art collage, he is developing the show at school-even his classmates love the idea! Want to help Cillian on set?
appearance: Cillian is a blue cow with patches of black on his lower left side and on his right ear. He has small, off-white horns and round black eyes. The inside of his ears and his muzzle are both a light pink and nostrils are blue as well.

name: Cincy
bio: Despite her beautiful wings, Cincy has a great fear of heights. With the encouragement of her friends she is gaining more and more confidence in her ability to fly. She now prefers soaring across the skyline downtown instead of walking through the streets. She can't walk a full city block without being asked to pose for selfies!
appearance: Cincy is a light pink pig. She has curly ears with darker pink insides, and round, black eyes. She has a large, dark pink snout which takes up most of her face. Simple, silver wings sprout from her back.

name: Cinda
bio: Have you met Cinda the chef? Cinda's love language is food, eating AND preparing it, and she loves to share her food with friends. Cinda delivers meals to shelters and wants to start a nonprofit that feeds 'Mallows in need. Would you like to help?
appearance: Cinda is a pumpkin spice latte crossed with a cat. Her head is light orange and she has triangular ears and a cat's face. Her face has oval black eyes, a simple nose, whiskers, and hot pink blush. Atop her head rests a swirl of whipped cream decorated with orange and brown sprinkles, a stick of cinnamon and a tiny, smiling pumpkin. Her body consists of a cup with a white rim, vertical tan and brown stripes in the center and a bright orange base.

name: Cindy
bio: Cindy is a very shy cat but she loves to draw. She has her own comic book where she creates new stories based on things she finds fascinating each week and shares it with her friends. One day she wants to create a cartoon based on her comics to share with everyone!
appearance: Cindy is a cat with a rainbow tie-dye pattern. She has pointed ears with white insides, as well as a white belly. She has round, black eyes, a pink nose and mouth, and two straight whiskers on either cheek. On her chest she has the word 'love' embroidered in red, accompanied by a pink and purple heart above it.

name: Cinnamon
bio: Cinnamon and her best friendCarmelitaare like two peas in a pod, but sweeter! You can usually find them in the writing lab working on new stories or at the mall, they love to window shop. If you see them out and about, they'll be sure to give you a big hug.
appearance: Cinnamon is a pink cup of milkshake. On top of her head is swirled whipped cream with red sprinkles. There is a striped purple and white straw poking out from the left side of the whipped cream. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, and a smiling red mouth.

name: Citlalli
bio: Citlalli teaches art classes by day and works as a tattoo artist by night! She loves meeting new friends and making little personalized art for them. Citlalli's hosting a paint & snack party tonight, and making a big plate of elote! Can she count on you to bring the crab rangoons?
appearance: Citlalli is a black ladybug with a fuzzy lavender belly. She has two black antennae atop her head with lavender heart tips. Her wings stick out to either side of her and are lavender with black spots. She has round black eyes rimmed in white with short lashes, as well as a red, smiling mouth and light pink heart blush.

name: Claire
bio: Picking clover, enjoying the sunrise, and bananas on toast are some of Claire's favorite things. She is up bright and early every morning to help her family do chores.
appearance: Claire is mostly white with patches of light purple on her lower left side and on her right ear. She has small, pale-yellow horns and round black eyes. The inside of her ears and her muzzle are both a light pink. Her nostrils are light purple as well. There is a small blue flower and a large pink flower stitched onto her stomach.

name: Clara
bio: Have you ever seen a ‘Mallow deadlift or power clean? It’s time you met Clara! This girl loves to see her friends at the local gym, they call themselves the Sugar Box Gang.
appearance: Clara is a pink cupcake with white frosting, decorated with rainbow sprinkles. She has a cherry on top. Her bottom half is light brown with darker brown, vertical stripes. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, a red, smiling mouth and hot pink blush on each cheek.

name: Clarice
bio: Meet Clarice, one of the trendiest Squishmallows! Clarice's favorite activity is dyeing her bangs different colors. This caticorn could not settle on a color this time around, so she decided to dye her hair all of the colors in the rainbow! Do you like her rainbow bangs?
appearance: Clarice is a wisteria purple caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. Her multi-colored bangs include lemon yellow, ice blue and lavender. The inside of her ears and her belly are striped in a pale, pastel rainbow. The horn is a white with multi-colored bands in pink, yellow and blue. She has round eyes and a hot pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Clarissa
bio: Clarissa loves the color purple and wearing sparkly shoes to school. She loves listening to her parents' records while painting in her attic - the music inspires a lot of her work. Clarissa is a hippie at heart, she loves bright colors, smiling faces and being kind to those around her.
appearance: Clarissa is a unicorn with rainbow stripes, primarily pink, yellow and blue, on a diagonal angle. She also has soft, white spots which resemble sparkles. She has white on her muzzle, belly and inside her ears, with fluffier fur than her body. Her multi-colored mane includes purple, aqua and hot pink. She has a shimmery, white horn with a tri-colored swirl matching the colors on her body. Her eyes are closed and she has long, curled lashes.

name: Claudella
bio: Meet Claudella. This handy 'Mallow knows how to build just about anything. Right now, Claudella is building a treehouse with a tire swing and a slide! She loves to soak up all the fun and sun of summer, and can't wait to spend time in her new happy place. Would you like to help?
appearance: Claudella is a pink and orange tie-dyed cat with darker pink stripes on her head and sides. She has a long tail, and pointed cat ears, her belly, muzzle, and inner ears are white. Her eyes are black and have lases with whiskers, a pink nose, and curved mouth. She wears a golden bow on her left ear and has the initial 'C' embroidered on her belly in gold with small pink hearts beside it.

name: Claudette
bio: Claudette works as a meteorologist on 'Mallow channel 3. She loves reporting good weather news like rain after a drought, or a sunny day in the winter. Claudette is not only recognized on TV but also in her community! This 'Mallow loves to volunteer for environmental projects, and you can usually find her planting trees.
appearance: Claudette is a washed-out purple cheetah with darker purple spots with pale green outlines. Her belly is white with rounded ears, a long tail, and her inner ears being a glittery silver. She has a white muzzle with a purple nose and curved mouth with round black eyes and lashes protruding out from them.

name: Claudia
bio: Claudia wakes up with the sunrise! She's a responsible little beet and supports all her friends and family with anything they need – even if it's just for a laugh. Claudia knows that generosity comes in all forms, including goofy ones. And nobody makes a better key lime pie!
appearance: Claudia is a reddish-purple beetroot with a smiling mouth, wide open eyes with eyelashes, and pink blush. She has 2 leaves on top which are colored mainly green with red stripes. She also has lighter stripes around her front.

name: Claudio
bio: Claudio passes time by watching time! The "tick, tock" of the clock tickles his brain and he always looks forward to the hour hand hitting this favorite numbers. Like 5, 10, and sometimes even 11!
appearance: Claudio is a white cow with red patches by the upper left of his head and his left ear and on the lower left side of his body. He has a red patch on his right eye. He has pale pink inner ears and muzzle, cream horns and a long tail with a tuft of red fuzz at the tip. He has a mushroom embroidered on the right side of his body. His eyes are black, and his nostrils are red.

name: Clay
bio: Clay has been participating in the beauty pageant circuit as long as she remember. Last year, Clay was crowned Little Miss County and went on to compete at all-star regionals! Judges can't get enough Clay's folky voice and mellow banjo when she performs for the talent round.
appearance: Clay is a musk pink cow with a large, darker pink patch over her right ear. She has light pink horns and closed, happy eyes. Her inner ears and muzzle are cream. Her belly is white and patterned with pink splotches.

name: Clayton
bio: Whenever Clayton is feeling anxious, he likes to imagine himself as Clayton the Brave, a comic book superhero. With superpowers of strength and courage. Clayton the Brave is able to vanish his nerves and bring peace to his mind. He even has a sidekick—The Weighted Blanket!
appearance: Clayton is a light blue cow with a large, pale blue patch over his right ear. He has cream-colored horns and round, black eyes. His inner ears, muzzle and belly are white. His belly is a white fuzzy belly.

name: Cleary
bio: Vroom, vroom! Cleary is in town for a big monster truck show and is ready to show off his speed skills, and freestyle crashing tricks. After the show, Cleary wants to take his squad out for a ride in his truck. Don't forget to wear ear protection!
appearance: Cleary is a cow with a strawberry body in magenta. He has yellow seeds on his body, a neon green stem on his head, yellow horns and inner ears, and a white belly. He has a white muzzle with pink nostrils and black eyes.

name: Clement
bio: Clement is the conductor of a preschool chorus! Each year, he turns a new class of youngsters into a troupe of tiny vocal virtuosos. Believe it or not—a certain intergalactic clown pop star first found her voice in Mr. C's classroom and always thanks him in her speeches!
appearance: Clement is a lemon donkey. He has long floppy ears with a white muzzle. He has a white which is in the shape of a lemon slice. On top of his, he has a tuft of yellow hair and a brown stem with a green leaf. He has round, black eyes and yellow nostrils.

name: Clementine
bio: Hi! My name is Clementine! My mini and I love to climb tree and play together in the forest.
appearance: Clementine is a peachy-colored squirrel with a tan belly with a pouch and her face. She has black closed eyes and black nose with a cat-like mouth with her tonuge sticking out. With her Mini one she is a same appearance but her face is open with white small dots on each eyes.

name: Cleo
bio: Cleo is an aspiring actress whose favorite Holiday is Halloween. She's president of the drama club and loves to get her friends together to dress up and act out scenes from some of their favorite plays.
appearance: Cleo is a black cat with pointed, triangular ears. She has a jade green belly and inner ears. Her nose and mouth are pale pink and framed by two white whiskers on either side. She has round, black eyes ringed in white.

name: Clint
bio: Clint saved all the cow-tips he received working as a barista to open up his very own coffee shop-Cafe Half Calf. Now fans flock for his famous oat milk macchiato with top-quality beans sourced from...well, wouldn't you like to know?
appearance: Clint is a white cow with a fuzzy cyan patch by the upper right of his head and his right ear and one on the left side of his body. He has pale blue inner ears and pink muzzle, pale blue horns and a long tail with a tuft of cyan fuzz at the tip. His eyes are black, and his nostrils are cyan.

name: Clove
bio: Clove is presenting a special St. Patrick's Day show at her puppet theater! The theater performs plays weekly. with the most popular puppets always returning to headline. You can catch a sneak peek of Clove's St. Paddy's Day show on one of today's parade floats!
appearance: Clove is a sage green sheep. Her face and inner ears are an off-white with a fuzzy white belly. She has round black eyes with short dual lashes. She has a sage green heart-shaped nose with a black mouth.

name: Clover
bio: Meet Clover! Your cuddly, squishy and udderly adoraBULL friend from Prince Edward Island! Clover loves to watch MOOvies while being warm and COWzy and gives great big hugs before hitting the hay.
appearance: Clover is mostly white with patches of black on their lower left side and on their right ear. They have small, pale yellow horns and round black eyes. The inside of their ears and their squarish muzzle are both a light pink. On their left nostril, there is a small white dot.

name: Clovis
bio: Clovis drives a school bus for the elementary school in his coral reef community. He loves greeting students in the morning and putting smiles on their faces. On Fridays, Clovis plays the radio for the whole bus to hear and everyone to have a sing-along on their way to school!
appearance: Clovis is a pineapple seahorse with an white belly, segmented by dark yellow lines. He has fins atop his head and on his sides, all of which are honey color. His snout also has honey at its center. He has round, black eyes.

name: Clutch
bio: Meet Clutch. He isArchie’s best friend and teammate; they are almost inseparable. Clutch steps in to be Archie’s ears and advocate when they’re with someone who doesn’t sign. He taught their whole team how to sign for Archie’s birthday, would you like to learn?
appearance: Clutch is a blue axolotl with a white belly sprinkled with pastel rainbow confetti. He has silver gills with a dark blue frill. He has a round body with blue hands. His left hand holds a red balloon. He has black, round eyes with a black mouth.

name: Cobie
bio: Say hi to Cobie! Cobie works hard on his family's farm from morning to night, and he loves having such an important job! Cobie's favorite part of the day is watching the colors in the sky change when the sun rises. Want to watch the sun rise with Cobie?
appearance: Cobie is a corn cob with an orange base and corn seeds in varying shades of orange, yellow and brown. His husk is green and he has golden silks coming out from the top of his head.

name: Coco
bio: Meet Coco. Her favorite color is purple and she loves rock candy. Coco lives next door to her friendsFlorenceandAmina, and they ride their bikes to school together every day. Coco's basket is purple with sparkles and her bike horn sounds like a foghorn.
appearance: Coco is a mint green koala with green glittery ears and three eyelashes on each eye. Her stomach is white with small silver dots. She has a large, black nose and a smiling mouth. Her small Squishville version has no eyelashes and no silver dots.

name: Coda
bio: Grab some yarn and join Coda for a knitting circle! This ‘Mallow is almost done knitting a big yellow vest with lots of pockets. It’s the perfect garment for stashing snacks on a long swim. What will you knit for your next adventure with Coda?
appearance: Coda is a light grey body with three grey spots on their body with the bottom most spot being the darkest grey. They have flippers, a tail fin, ears with pink inner ears, and off-white horns. Their snout is pink with a darker pink nose and two black eyes.

name: Codie
bio: Are you looking for a study buddy? Codie attends a big law school and wants to start a new study group. Activism, snacks, and the arts are just some of his passions but there always room for more.
appearance: Codie has a rainbow box with yellow fries sticking out. He has black, closed eyes with a smiling mouth. He has pink blush..

name: Cody
bio: Cody loves fixing cars and he’s a water polo coach. His hobbies include DIY projects and making beautiful things with any material he comes across. He loves listening to music and his favorite color is brown.
appearance: Cody is a peach pink bird with black eyes and short eyelashes. He has fluffy wings which are bright pink and a pastel pink belly. His large beak is the same color with a pale grey tip.

name: Cole
bio: Ready for some robot rumble fun? Cole is your guy if you like building things and tearing them down, he loves making crazy cool robots and letting them race and dual it out, just don't destroy his best bot!
appearance: Cole is a green turtle with dark green scales atop his head. He has a white belly and four flippers (two on each side). He has a simple face with round black eyes and a smile. On his back is a green tie-dyed shell.

name: Coleen
bio: Coleen only considers herself competitive when it comes to climbing in the playground! She can hang upside down longer than her classmates and is the fastest on the wavy bars. Rub your hands in some sand and come join Coleen on the dome climber!
appearance: Coleen is a pale purple lizard with a white belly. She has a frill with metallic purple scales atop her head and a thin, curled tail with the same pattern. The three broad stripes on her back are also scaled. She has large, wide eyes with  black pupils and a smiling mouth.

name: Colette
bio: Colette sure loves to nap! She often dreams that she is a meow-maid in the water, exploring and collecting her favorite shells!
appearance: Colette takes on the appearance of a laying Hug Mee. She is a white cat with pastel purple and pink patches on each side of her face with a white streak in the middle along her muzzle. She has a pink right paw and purple left paw and vice-versa for her hind legs. She has a purple tail, and glittery pink inner ears. She has closed black eyes with lashes and a white muzzle with black whiskers, black nose, and a cat-like smile.

name: Coley
bio: Coley is one gigglicious dragon and she loves to joke around with friends. It might sound corny, but Coley thinks that laughter can be the best medicine. She is the perfect 'Mallow to keep around when you need to turn your frown upside down.
appearance: Coley is a pale grey dragon with dark teal features. Her belly, the insides of her ears, nostrils, her wings and the spines on her back are all teal. She has a plain white muzzle and sparkly silver horns, as well as two large black eyes with short lashes.

name: Colin
bio: Grab your mat and a set of weights, class is about to start! Colin is a barre instructor and teaches one of the most fun classes around. He has backlights and music blasting so his class feels like a party. No matter how tired you are, you'll want to dance it out!
appearance: Colin is a mostly white cow with a pattern of black splotches. He has small, triangular yellow horns and round black eyes. His left ear has a pink inner, and her right is white. The inside of his ears and his muzzle are both a light pink.

name: Colleen
bio: Colleen is the type of friend you call on for adventure, for advice, and more. She always seems to have the answer! Colleen has a heart like gold she loves spending time with people or taking care of them to help them feel better.
appearance: Colleen is a Mint Corgi with two straight ears atop her head. Her inner ears and belly are white and she has two hearts one magenta and one pink. She has closed, black eyes with a black nose and mouth with a pink tongue.

name: Colleta
bio: Meet Colleta! She used to be afraid of the dentist then one day she conquered her fear. Now she's going to school to become a dentist so she can help 'Mallows who are afraid like her. Colleta hopes that by sharing her story she'll inspire others to conquer their fears too.
appearance: Colleta is a tie-dye pink and blue fox with large, triangular ears. Her belly and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. Her inner ears are glitter magenta. She has round oval cheery black eyes, a circular and a baby pink smiling open mouth.

name: Colm
bio: You’re invited to Colm’s holiday music showcase! He’s been practicing new songs on his saxophone, piano, bongos, and cello. The best part is, he can play them all at the same time! Colm is a one ‘Mallow jazz band, and with his perfect coordination, he’s sure to be a hit at this year’s show.
appearance: Colm is a dark green octopus with red, orange, yellow, and green tentacles with multicolored string lights wrapped around his body. He has black eyes and a black smile.

name: Colton
bio: Colton loves scary movies and popcorn - as long as there's some hot sauce on top! He has a blog dedicated to all the scary movies ever created. Can you guess his favorite?
appearance: Colton is a black cat with pointed, triangular ears. He has a bright orange belly and inner ears. His round eyes are black. The outline of his eyes and the dual whiskers on each cheek are white, whereas his nose and mouth are pale pink.

name: Connie
bio: Are you afraid of the dark? So is Connie! That's why this plucky yoga lover moved way far north. Though the days are super long, that's what Connie prefers--the more the sun is in the sky, the more she can salute it!
appearance: Connie is an emerald moth with fuzzy light-yellow antennae and a fuzzy light-yellow belly. She has light blue with a pattern of yellow and blue spots. She has round black eyes with short lashes, pink cheeks, and a smiling black mouth.

name: Connor
bio: Original:Mooove out of the way, Connor is at the finish line waiting for you! Connor is quite the athlete! You can catch him riding his bike everywhere! What's the coolest place he's ever travelled to? Cowlifornia! Can you catch up with him?
appearance: Connor is mostly white with patches of black on his lower right side and on his left ear. He has small, pale yellow horns and round black eyes. The inside of his ears and his muzzle are both a light pink.

name: Conrad
bio: Have questions about eating better? Conrad is the corn for you! He wants to be a chef one day and loves food science. He knows there is more to food than just taste and wants to share more about the science behind it.
appearance: Conrad is a cob of corn in a husk. He has a yellow base with a orange pattern to represent corn seed, a white tuff of hair for silks, and green husks.

name: Conradina
bio: Meet Conradina. Conradina is an amazing writer. She sees the world with vivid imagery and emotion. Now she’s working up the courage to share her work. She wants to read in front of a crowd at open mic night, but public speaking makes her nervous. Can she practice reading a poem in front of you?
appearance: Conradina is a light purple Bigfoot with a fuzzy, pastel, rainbow mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and belly, and sparkly pink pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush, and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face. She wears a hot pink headband with two antennae, each with a large, sparkly pink heart on the end.

name: Constance
bio: Constance is an actress and wants to be a star. She can sing and dance, so she called herself a triple threat, and is waiting for her big break. Do you have a movie she can star in?
appearance: Constance is a leopard, covered in green and blue spots with a darker, gray outline. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a gray nose and mouth. She also has sparkling silver inner ears.

name: Contessa
bio: When Contessa won the lottery, she didn't buy a mansion--she bought a mueseum! This former librarian can't wait to curate exhibits of her favorite things. From dalmatians to musical theater, vineyards to vinyl, her museum is sure to be as electic as she is!
appearance: Contessa is a xanadu raccoon with black markings around her eyes. Above these are white marks which resemble eyebrows. Her belly is fluffy white, and Contessa has a snout are white. Her inner ears are pale green, and there is a thin ring of white around her raccoon round black eyes too.

name: Conway
bio: Are you looking for Conway? You should try calling his restaurant. Conway is the maître d' at Super Fancy, a new bistro downtown! Lucky for you, Conway always saves reservations for his best pals. Get ready for a glitzy night out and lots of yummy plates. Cheers!
appearance: Conway is a white highland cow with pastel purple spots. His belly and bangs are fuzzy and purple. He has pastel purple ears and white inner ears, and long, cream-colored, curved horns. He has a tan muzzle with brown nostrils, a tail that ends with a purple tuft of fur, and black eyes.

name: Cookie
bio: Cookie has been fascinated by flora and fauna ever since she’s been able to walk. She aspires to become a botanist some day to teach others all about plants!
appearance: Cookie is a bright pink Flamingo with black eyes and short eyelashes. She has fluffy wings which are a darker pink than her body. Her beak is the same color with a pale grey tip.

name: Cooper
bio: Cooper likes to think life is what happens in between naps! This 'Mallow always gets his beauty rest, but when it's time to have fun, Cooper is the first one there. Cooper joins his bestie,Sager, every Sunday to snuggle with a cozy blanket for their favorite shows and treats!
appearance: Cooper is a tan Schnauzer with fuzzy ears and a white bearded snout; he has a short, curled fuzzy tail, black eyes, a black nose, a black mouth and a white belly.

name: Cora
bio: Have you ever met a cat who loves extreme sports? Cora loves doing things for the thrill; cliff diving, parasailing, and hang gliding are just some of the things she loves crossing off her bucket list. What's next? Swimming with sharks or scaling a mountain.
appearance: Cora is a white cat with blue and purple patches. Her left ear is covered by a pale blue patch, and she has a purple patch on her purple ear and lower right side. She has closed eyes, a pink nose and mouth, and black whiskers.

name: Cora the Shiba Inu
bio: Cora is a orange-tan dog with upright, triangular ears. She has a white muzzle and belly, as well as white inner ears and round, eyebrow-like markings above her eyes. Her eyes, nose and mouth are all black. and she a curly long tail on the back of her.
appearance: Cora is a orange-tan dog with upright, triangular ears. She has a white muzzle and belly, as well as white inner ears and round, eyebrow-like markings above her eyes. Her eyes, nose and mouth are all black. and she a curly long tail on the back of her.

name: Coralie
bio: Coralie studies biology at her dream school! She specializes in plant life and loves to take little samples on her weekend walks in the woods. Coralie wants to learn everything she can about plants, trees, and flowers so she can help protect them and keep beautiful plants growing forever!
appearance: Coralie is a jackalope, a mythical creature that is a jackrabbit with antelope antlers. She has a light grey body and long, vertical ears with pink inner ears. She has two sparkling silver antlers with two points each between her ears. She has a white, fuzzy belly and tail. She has round, black eyes and a dark grey nose and mouth.

name: Corbett
bio: Congrats to Corbett who just started their first job! Hopefully working as a cashier in the gift shop won't be too stressful. Mostly, Corbett can't wait to buy a light-up crown with their employee discount. Will you visit them in the shop today?
appearance: Corbett is a brown turkey leg with bump-like marks on their body and an off-white bone sticking out of their top left. They have black eyes, a black mouth, and blush.

name: Cordea
bio: Are you ready to record a hit record? Head over down to Cordea's recording studio and start laying down some tracks right away. Cordea knows all about sound equipment and loves putting their audio engineering degree to use if you're lucky Cordea may even play one of their own songs for you!
appearance: Cordea is a barbie pink with lobster claws, antennae, and tail on their lavender tummy. Their face consists of black eyes and simple black smile.

name: Cordelia
bio: Cordelia is a regular at all the local, small toy shops in her area. She drops by almost every weekend looking for new and unique keepsakes to add to her collection or gift to a close friend. Cordelia's favorite toys are miniatures so she can always hold onto one when she's on the go.
appearance: Cordelia is a caterpillar with a segmented body. Her head is light teal, and her body is teal with a light teal stripe by her tail. She has a white fluffy belly and dark blue antennae with light teal tips. She has round, black eyes with black rounded glasses, a smiling mouth and a pink blush.

name: Cordess
bio: (no bio was given on tag)
appearance: Cordess is a pink caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has a candy pink mane. The inside of her ears and her heart-shaped belly are striped with pastel rainbow colors. She has a hot pink horn with glitter and a silver swirl, as well as a pale pink nose and mouth. She wears a pair of oversized aviator sunglasses with shiny teal lenses and a bright pink frame.

name: Corinna
bio: Even though she's stuck at home, Corinna is one imaginative cat. She and her best friendPriyago on all kinds of magical adventures together. They love to look up at the clouds and pretend they're slaying dragons or hopping around on the clouds.
appearance: Corinna is a teal cat with a long tail drooping behind her. She has seven blue stripes: three on top of her head, and two on each side of her body. She has a fuzzy white belly and a white muzzle that is triangular at the top and round at the bottom. She has two black whiskers on each side of her face, a blue nose and mouth, and rainbow inner ears.

name: Cornelia
bio: Cornelia is one of the funniest 'Mallows around. They have the gift of gab and know laughter is truly the best medicine. That's why they love making others laugh! With silly antics and spot-on impressions, Cornelia dreams of being a late-night talk show host.
appearance: Cornelia is a caterpillar with a segmented body. Their head is pink, followed by yellow, then green, and they have a blue and purple tail. They have a white belly and the 5" has shiny, golden antennae and the 7" has pink antennae with shiny, silver tips. They have round, black eyes with short lashes, a smiling mouth and a gold blush.

name: Cornelias
bio: Meet Cornelias. He loves to lend a helping hand, but be warned, he's known for his cheesy puns! They're so bad, you won't be able to help but giggle. For Cornelias, there is no task to big or small. And whatever he helps you with, you're guaranteed to have a ton of pun!
appearance: Cornelias is a cob of corn in a light brown husk. He has a yellow base with a pattern of light yellow, orange, pink and light brown corn seeds and a white tuff of hair for silks.

name: Cornelius
bio: Would you mind grabbing Cornelius a "Springtime Salad" from his favorite café remember to sub the carrots for croutons, the tomatoes for pita chips, and the romaine lettuce for wonton crisps. The sourdough slice on the salad is fine as is, though—thanks!
appearance: Cornelius is a brown cow with blue frosting on his face. He has a frosting yellow patch by the upper right of his head with pink flowers and one yellow on lower left side of his body with yellow flowers. He has white inner ears and muzzle, pink horns and a long tail with a tuft of fuzz at the tip. His eyes are black, and his nostrils are blue.

name: Cornella
bio: Cornella is a total plant mom, some might say she likes plants a little more than 'Mallows. She loves plants of all varieties and sizes, ready to guess her current fave? The bonsai has a special place in Cornella's heart. What's your favorite plant?
appearance: Cornella has a pale teal body with white inside the ears and on the muzzle. Her mermaid tail features white scales with a teal outline, and her shell bra is teal with sparkles. Her horn matches her bra. Her mane is a brightly colored teal, and she has closed eyes with short lashes.

name: Cortez
bio: Meet Cortez. This 'Mallow is a true friend. He always has something uplifting and encouraging to say. Cortez is always ready to celebrate your glow-up! Plus he has eight arms, which makes him an amazing hugger!
appearance: Cortez is a green caterpillar with three horizontal dark green lines segmenting his body. He has six arms with a yellow, green, and light green arm on each side and two green antennae. He has round, black eyes, a smiling mouth and a pink blush.

name: Cosette
bio: Cosette finally gathered the courage to get her ears pierced! After three years of canceled appointments, Cosette swears this time she's ready. Once it's over, she'll be brave enough to do anything—like hang glide over a rocky canyon, or rock a gold statement on hoop!
appearance: Cosette is a brown takeaway coffee cup, she has a tan lid with a purple straw poking out. She has a flower crown on her lid. She has a brown band around her body with brown steam in a cream circle surrounded by brown outlines. She has black eyes with lashes, a red smile, and pink blush.

name: Cosimo
bio: Not everyone gets Cosimo's sense of humor—but his dedicated readers sure do! This edgy mushroom writes a weekly column in the local paper and never holds back his honest opinions. Sometimes Cosimo even receives responses from fans! Want to read Cosimo's latest article?
appearance: Cosimo is a mushroom with a dark purple stalk and magenta cap with white spots and a magenta fuzzy belly. He has bat ears with white inner ears and magenta wings.

name: Cosme
bio: Cosme plans parties for any all occasions. She started her own party planning business five years ago after building a reputation for herself in town. Now everyone has their special events produced by Cosme! Want Cosme to organize your next birthday party?
appearance: Cosme is a brown horse with a white stripe on her forehead. She has black eyes with lashes, a pale pink muzzle with chocolate brown nostrols and a mane which is light brown. She wears a pink overall with a white T-shirt with yellow lining on it. On her overalls she has a pocket with a white flower with purple dot on her.

name: Cosmina
bio: Make sure you schedule your checkup with Cosmina, she's the best dentist around! Cosmina loves to make her patients laugh, so if you're afraid to show your smile she'll put on her cheese hat to make you smile.
appearance: Cosmina is a baby pink crab with a purple belly. She has two large purple claws and six smaller pink legs beneath them. Lastly, she has pink cheeks and a red simple smile and winking black eye, concluding both eyes with eyelashes.

name: Costanza
bio: Costanza can't help but cry at Christmas music! She's not sure what it is about sleeping in heavenly peace—or even partridges in pear trees—but the second she hears those jingle bells ring it's sob city at the supermarket. And don't even get her started on that one-horse open sleigh, okay!
appearance: Costanza is a brown fireplace. She has green tinsel on her forehead and wears a red bow on top of her head. She has two red stocking below on each side of her body. She has an open fire pit with two brown logs with an orange and yellow fire with bricks in an arch above. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Courtney
bio: This curious caticorn has a mystical gift – she can talk to plants! Wherever she goes, she whispers with the trees and flowers around her and if you watch closely you can almost see them whisper back. She lives in an enchanted tree where she keeps a library of all the plants she meets.

name: Cressida
bio: Cressida is a tech wiz and loves everything digital. When she grows up, she wants to be a programmer, so she practices her coding whenever she can! If you're looking for Cressida - she's probably at her computer desk.
appearance: Cressida is a light pink axolotl with a pattern of debossed moons and stars. The moons and stars glow in the dark. She has fluffy rainbow gills on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a pastel, rainbow-striped belly. She has closed eyes with curled lashes and a cat-like smile.

name: Cris
bio: If you like playing with gadgets and fixing your mom's cell phone, then Cris is the Squishmallow for you! He knows all the phone and game hacks and will play any video game!
appearance: Cris is a light blue lamb with a white face. His nose is silver and shaped like a heart. He has closed eyes with curled lashes and a sweet, smiling mouth. His belly and inner ears and belly are white and fluffy.

name: Crisanta
bio: Meet Crisanta. She loves hot cocoa, ice skating, and going to the movies. She gets so excited when the cozy, winter weather sets in so she sips hot cocoa and bundles up in her favorite super-soft, cashmere scarf! She's amazing on the ice and would love to teach you her moves!
appearance: Crisanta is a dark magenta bear with rounded ears. She has rounded bear ears with her inner ears being a holographic silver. Her muzzle and belly are white, and she wear a light grey cashmere scarf with a faint print. Her nose and curved mouth are magenta and her eyes with lashes are closed in a happy expression.

name: Crissle
bio: Crissle is a true optimist at heart. She has a special talent for always being able to shine a positive light on any situation. She andSunshineare best friends and even have a secret handshake! They'd love to teach it to you!
appearance: Crissle is a pale yellow lightbulb with a grey base and coil. The phrase 'Think POSITIVE' is emblazoned across her chest in bright yellow. She has a smiling face with a winking right eye.

name: Cristina
bio: Cristina is headed to the mall! This 'Mallow loves to shop, especially with her bestiePatricia. Cristina picks a color every morning and builds her whole outfit around it. and today is all about purple! Want to try on some lavender shades with Cristina?
appearance: Cristina is a Purple and Magenta that has magenta, purple, and white stripes. She has purple grape and raspberry magenta slushie on top with a mint straw. Her face consists of black eyes with a simple black smile.

name: Cristobal
bio: Cristobal is a script doctor extraordinaire! Flat dialogue? Weak endings? Plot holes as wide as the ocean blue? Cristobal can flip the script to magic! But when it comes to his own screenplay... he remains stuck in Act 2, locked in perpetual battle with the greatest movie villain of all, perfectionism
appearance: Cristobal is a glass of horchata. He is a blue cup with horchata and ice cubes in the cup. He has a cinnamon stick on the right side of his body. He has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Cruz
bio: Mini-golf and guac are two things Cruz can't live without, he would play every day if he could! He likes to have guac on everything, from breakfast foods and sandwiches to his mom's healthy avocado cupcakes!
appearance: Cruz is a bright yellow sun with orange rays which sit on his head like a crown. He wears large black sunglasses with a shiny texture. He has a smiling mouth and pink blush on either cheek.

name: Crystal
appearance: Crystal is a white snow leopard and has leopard print all over her body, white lighter grey marks and thick, dark grey outlines. She has a long tail, and glittery inner ears. She has six black whiskers with three on each side of her face, a black cat-like smile, a heart-shaped pink nose and anime eyes with lashes and blue irises.

name: Crystal the Unicorn
bio: (no bio given on tag)
appearance: Crystal is a blue unicorn, her hair is rainbow and she has a silver horn. She has closed eyes with short lashes with two dots for her nose and a black smile. Her legs are blue with silver hooves.

name: Cupcake
bio: Cupcake is throwing his annual Valloween party and would love for you to join! The theme this year is “Roses Are Dead, Violets Are Boo” and Cupcake can’t wait to get spooky cute with his Squad. There’s going to be a hissing booth, bobbing for chocolate-covered strawberries—even a romcom villain costume contest!
appearance: Cupcake is a black dragon with a pink belly, inner ears, wings, and  spines on the top of his head to his upper back. He has a black tail and short,  ears with black-gold holographic horns and muzzle. He is holding pink hearts as well as two hearts dropping. He has mischievous eyes.

name: Cupid
bio: Cupid didn't always like the heart-shaped birthmark on his left eye, but these days he thinks it's pretty cool. A talent agent spotted him at the trendy ham restaurant the other day, thought the same, and even just signed him to her modeling agency! Can you believe he ever disliked what makes him so unique?

name: Cyan
bio: Meet Cyan. He's a great friend and an even greater singer. He and all his friends have formed an underwater traveling band and they swim around to all the different reefs to perform. Their favorite kind of music? You guessed it, the blues!
appearance: Cyan is a blue whale with a tie-dyed pattern on his body. The pattern is mostly blue and turquoise, with some traces of purple. He has a fin on each side of his body and one atop his head, as well as a fluke (tail fins). His has a ridged, textured belly which is bright turquoise. He has large, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Cyma
bio: Meet Cyma. She loves off-roading, concerts, and soccer. She especially enjoys cheering on her cousinReginald,who taught her how to play. Cyma plays in her own league for 'Mallows with low vision. Are you ready to cheer her on in her next game?
appearance: Cyma is a white and rainbow tie-dye dog with upright, triangular ears. Her main body and inner ears are white, whereas she has two large rainbow tie-dye patches which cover from her ear to her eye on either side of her face. She has round, black eyes, a black nose and mouth, and is poking out her pink tongue. She is also has words on her lower left body says "Hugs & Squishes" with a big red heart on her.

name: Cyra
bio: Meet Cyra. She can't wait to study abroad. She's been studying extra hard to make sure she's ready! She's most excited about the late-night dinners, espresso, and architecture! Do you want to practice your Spanish with her?
appearance: Cyra is a fuzzy red crab with a round, non-fuzzy pink belly. She has two large, fuzzy claws and six smaller legs beneath them that are purple, pink, and orange. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Cyrena
bio: Cyrena is a cupcake queen! Every weekend she bakes up a giant batch of cupcakes in the most unique flavors that she can think of. Last week, she made passionfruit meringue cupcakes topped with sour sprinkles. This week, she's going to make a spicy hot chocolate flavored cupcake. Do you have any flavor ideas for Cyrena's next cupcakes?
appearance: Cyrena is a rainbow tie-dye bear with round ears. She has a white belly with a blue embroidery saying "SWEET" and two pink hearts on each side, and white muzzle. Her ears are rainbow with sparkly teal insides. She has round, black eyes, along with a pink nose and mouth.

name: Cyrenna
bio: Cyrenna tests toys for safety at Santa's workshop! Each toy has to pass her high standards for function and fun, while maintaining its durability. Even though Cyrenna is an important elf, it's safe to say she's made a career playing with toys.
appearance: Cyrenna is an elf with white skin, brown hair styled in pigtails and pointed ears. She wears a red collared shirt with a green undershirt with yellow strings. She wears a brown belt with a golden buckle and a white, red, and green striped pattern underneath. Her hat is a red double pom pom Santa hat with a green, spike patterned rim. She has black eyes with eyelashes and a black smile.

name: Cyril
bio: Cyril is a fearless marathon swimmer. For her next challenge, Cyril wants to get out of the pool and into a great big lake! Do you think she can swim against a fast current? Cyril sure hopes so! She’s training now and plans to swim across the 30-mile lake next summer.
appearance: Cyril is a dark teal capybara with arctic blue short ears and an egg-shaped muzzle. She has a cyan fuzzy belly, round, black eyes with lashes, black nostrils and mouth.

name: D'Angela
bio: D'Anglea is obsessed with palindromes! You might find her reciting tenets with her pals Aviva, Bob and Hannah or driving her racecar named "Madam". Her dream? To speak only in palindromes someday! When people ask if she might be pushing it a bit too far, she proudly replies, "Never a foot too far, even!"
appearance: D'Angela is a brown honey jar. She has a dark brown lid on her head with honey coming out of the jar. Her lower body is dark brown. She have a bee sticker on her belly. She has closed eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: D'Marie
bio: Meet D'Marie. She's a fashionista who loves planning parties with her friends. She wants to be a party planner when she grows up so she loves going to restaurants to try new dishes. She takes notes for future menu planning. Where should she go next?
appearance: D'Marie is a purple bunny with a white belly, white spots her her eyes, white fur for her snout. The outer body is purple.

name: Dabney
bio: Meet Dabney. She's a composer and knows how to play almost every instrument in the world. Her two favorites are the violin and piano. Her music is known to melt hearts and make you feel all the feels! She's working on a new song, want to listen?
appearance: Dabney is a sky blue fox. She has large, triangular ears, the inside of which are white with a silver shimmer. She has white markings on her face, including a round muzzle and fluffy cheeks. The markings on the tip of her tail her tail are also white. She has closed, happy eyes and a black nose and mouth. She also has a fluffy belly with marbled blue and white.

name: Dabria
bio: Meet Dabria; she's always working hard and trying her best at everything she does. Whether it's selling jewelry at her store or supporting a friend, she always gives 100 percent. Her friends like to say that Dabria shines brighter than any diamond in her store.
appearance: Dabria is a tan colored donut with pink icing. Sprinkles in hot pink, purple and baby blue decorate her face, and she has a tan circle representing a donut hole at her center. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, a red, smiling mouth, and pale pink blush.

name: Dagmar
bio: Dagmar lives in a big busy city. There's so much to see and explore that Dagmar finds himself walking all over town. This 'Mallow always gets his daily steps in! Dagmar thought it would be fun to invite some friend, so he started an urban hiking group. Want to join?
appearance: Dagmar is a light yellow cow with yellow patches by the upper right of his head and his right ear and on the lower right side of his body. He has white inner ears, muzzle, horns and a long tail with a tuft of yellow fuzz at the tip. He has a lemon embroidered on the right side of his body. His eyes are black, and his nostrils are yellow.

name: Dagnus
bio: In the summertime, you can find Dagnus at the beach studying the tiny creatures that live in tide pools. From sea slugs to starfish, Dagnus loves them all! Grab your water shoes and keep your eyes peeled for colorful crustaceans. What are your favorite saltwater creatures?
appearance: Dagnus is a cream whit highland cow with long pink horns, muzzle, and inner ears. The tuft of fur on their head and their belly is in a rainbow tie-dye pattern. They have black eyes, pink nostrils, and a smile on their muzzle.

name: Dahlia
bio: Meet Dahlia. She loves all things miniature; little toy houses, little toy cars, and is building a mini mansion for all her little playthings. She loves to take care of her little town, maybe when she grows up, Dahlia will become the mayor of her own town!
appearance: Dahlia is a unicorn with a tie-dyed pattern of pinks and blues, most notably hot pink, petal pink, sky blue and baby blue. She has a white muzzle and belly. Her horn is shimmery silver with a darker spiral around it. Her nostrils and inner ears are the same silver color. She has closed eyes with extravagantly long and thick lashes.

name: Dahlia the Flamingo
bio: Hi! My name is Dahlia! My mini and I love to relax in the sun together and catch some rays
appearance: Dahila is a pink tie-dye flamingo with black eyes and white small dot. She has  wings which are a the same color to her body. Her beak is white with a pale grey tip with her orange feet. In her pouch, she has mini one which is a same appearance but one of her eyes is winking.

name: Daisuke
bio: Daisuke just graduated with a PhD in Hyperbole! They think it's the most exciting thing to happen in the history of the world and can't wait to start looking for a job; theater critic, political speechwriter, mattress salesperson—the possibilities are endless!
appearance: Daisuke is a tan donut with matcha green and pale green icing. sprinkles in light green and green decorate their face. They have round black eyes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Daisy
bio: Daisy is dangerously creative! If you need someone to spice up your next outfit, Daisy is your go-to Squishmallow. From beadwork to embroidery to hair accessories and more, Daisy is the designer for you!
appearance: Daisy is a rainbow pegasus with pink wings. They have a white belly, and have a white snout. They have a rainbow tail and hair. However,in their 2" version, their hair is white and their tail is pink.

name: Daisy the Bunny
bio: Daisy loves to play and jump rope with her friend; the best thing about Daisy is her sweet personality.
appearance: Daisy is a white bunny with shiny silver ears with white feet that has pink toes; on her bottom, she has a small tail. Her face consists of two closed eyes with two lashes; Daisy also has a pink heart-shaped nose and a curvy mouth.

name: Daja
bio: Beaches, volleyball and soaking up the sun are three of Daja's favorite things. This Squishmallow is the go-to gal for activities when the squad needs some fun in the sun!
appearance: Daja is a pastel pink dolphin with two fins on each side and a dorsal fin on her head. She has a white belly and the standard Squishmallow face of round eyes and a smiling mouth. She has two hearts embroidered on her chest, a small, hot pink one in front of a larger purple one.

name: Dakota
bio: Dakota soars the skies searching for the perfect pie - she's a pastry chef in training! Her specialty? Dragon pies, crumbly crust on top and warm and delicious on the inside. One day you might be able to visit her pastry shop.
appearance: Dakota is a pastel pink dragon with a white nose and belly. The insides of her ears are also white. Her horns, the inside of her wings and the spines on her back are all glittery silver. She has two large black eyes.

name: Daksa
bio: Meet Daksa. Daksa is silly to the max and always seems to have hilarious inside jokes with their friends. They like to try new things even if they might fail. Once, they made pasta that tasted awful but it was so much fun to try so it was all worth it.

name: Daley
bio: Guess who made it on the dean's list again? It's Daley! This 'mallow aces all her academics and now she's starting a study group to help other students keep their grades up too. Look out for Daley next time you're on campus. She loves to make new friends!
appearance: Daley is a cup of takeout noodles with a red bottom and white lines running through the sides of her body. She has white flaps near the top of her head with tan noodles poking out at the very top. Shrimp, red chopsticks, a lime, and seasoning decorates their top. She has a red mouth and black eyes with a winking expression.

name: Dalha
bio: Meet Dalha. She has loads of energy and she loves to run. Lately, when she runs she's been using her GPS to try and write secret messages with her friends. Last weekend she ran and spelled out 'LOVE!', what should she try to spell next?
appearance: Dalha is a pink cat with leopard print fur, with white markings and hot pink outlines on many parts of her body. Her inner ears and belly are holographic. She holds a bitten watermelon in her paws and the seeds of the watermelon are heart shaped. She has a long tail, black eyes, whiskers, nose, and cat-like smile.

name: Dalia
bio: Dalia is a busy family doctor who sings in a mariachi band in her free time. She even plays the guitar and knows the lyrics by heart! Drop by her home during Día de los Muertos celebrations and be a part of this musical tradition.
appearance: Dalia is a black bat with hot pink inner ears and belly. She wears sugar skull makeup in celebration of Día de los Muertos, with light orange floral rings around her eyes, purple, green, and orange petal and water-drop-like patterns on her forehead, and a colorful spine and ribs on her belly. She has shiny black wings, a red smiling mouth, and two sharp teeth.

name: Dallas
bio: Don't be fooled by Dallas' cute exterior: she's one tough 'Mallow. She's a professional rugby player and has a black belt in karate! After a long day of being fierce, she loves winding down with hot yoga, hot cocoa, and a hot lavender bubble bath!
appearance: Dallas' coat is a light pink color and is covered in darker pink and blue spots with a grey outline. She has a white belly and snout, with a light purple nose and sparkly silver inner ears. She has round black eyes with simple eyelashes.

name: Dally
bio: Meet Dally.  This cuddly pug loves to play tag, watch movies, and dress up. You can find Dally dressing up in all sorts of outfits from superheros to his favorite snacks. Do you want to play dress-up with Dally?
appearance: Dally is a brown pug with black black marking with a block nose and pink tongue sticking out. He wears a brown  bear outfit and it has a light brown fuzz on the belly and the ears.

name: Dalton
bio: Dalton adds chocolate milk to his marshmallow cereal and hot sauce on his omelets. He has trouble sharing and he needs you to help him learn how.
appearance: Dalton is a blue dragon with numerous white horns, two centered on his forehead and another two on each side of his head. His snout, inner ears, wing membranes and belly are forest green. He has large black eyes on either side of his snout.

name: Damaris
bio: Damaris is the founder and CEO of a summertime-themed candle company! Top-selling scents include Popsicle Surprise, Hot Dog Barbecue and Crazy 4 Chlorine. business is so good, Damaris plans on launching an autumn-themed line extension!
appearance: Damari is a hippo in the style of a watermelon. Their body is all green. They have a large green round snout with two small white square teeth. They have a pink stomach with black watermelon seeds. They also have two green ears with pink insides. They have two round black eyes as well.

name: Damien
bio: This dino knows how to beat the winter blues – snowboarding, snowboarding, snowboarding! You can catch Damien on the slopes with his friends or editing his latest video. His favorite color is red and for his birthday this year he got a brand-new red board.
appearance: Damien is a dark teal dinosaur with textured scales covering him and a white belly. He has teal spines running down his back. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth. Squish date 03.12.2019

name: Dandii
bio: Meet Dandii. She spends all year looking forward to summer when she gets together with her extended family at their lake house. They have a giant oyster bake and play games like sack racing and tug-o-war. At night they catch lightening bugs in jars and watch them glow!
appearance: Dandii is a koi fish. She is white with splotches of grey and marbled orange. She has a tall, orange fin in the center of her head and two long, narrow black fins on either side. She also has a grey belly, plain black eyes and a dimpled smile.

name: Dandy
bio: Ahem—Dandy has arrived! This modern gentleman loves all things posh: croquet, bespoke waistcoats, and reality shows where ladies bicker at tea parties! Some say his choice of entertainment isn't exactly high society… but have you even seen those dames’ brooches?
appearance: Dandy is a cherry pie with red cherry filling and a tan pastry crust. He has a dollop of whipped cream with a cherry on the right side. He has round, black eyes with and a smiling mouth.

name: Dane
bio: Original:Hi from Dane the Dragon! Dane is always ready for some action; he loves amusement parks! His favorite rides are the tallest rollercoaster he can find. When he's not soaring through the sky, he's already looking for the next best ride. Join Dane on his next roaring rollercoaster.
appearance: Dane is a dreamy blue dragon with a white nose, inner ears and belly. His horns, the inside of his wings and the spines on his back are all a shimmering icy blue. He has two large black eyes with white shines.

name: Dani
bio: Dani loves sushi so much, she taught herself how to make it! This 'Mallow achieves anything she sets her mind to- like being the brand director of her favorite plush toy. When Dani's not working toward her goals, you can find her hosting a fun game night and feasting on homemade tuna rolls, with her besties,JettwardandAlfie!
appearance: Dani is a navy blue Bigfoot with a tie-dyed, fuzzy, grey mane and ears. She has a darker blue belly, heart shaped pads and toes on her feet. She has a lighter blue face with black eyes, pink blush, and a wide smile with two rounded teeth poking out at the top of each side.

name: Daniel
bio: Daniel doesn't think there's anything fun about a fun-sized chocolate bar! He plans on suing his favorite candy company for false advertising but isn't looking for a payday or anything like that. Just for them to rename their tiniest treats to something like tot-sized!
appearance: Daniel is a pink dalmatian with dark pink spots. He has floppy pink ears and a large black nose and mouth. His muzzle and belly are pure white. He has round, black eyes.

name: Danielito
bio: Meet Danielito. This cool cat is eager to learn new things and lives his life to the fullest! When he's not working in his family business, he is golfing, traveling, going to baseball games, and more. He loves playing the drums and making music with all of his different bands.
appearance: Danielito's body is a gradient mix of black & indigo blue and is covered in white speckles, resembling the night's sky. Danielito's snout, whiskers, inner ears, and belly are all stark white, and Danielito's nose is pink.

name: Danielle
bio: Meet Danielle; she loves playing music, video games, and strawberry-kiwi smoothies. Danielle plays the piano and is learning how to play the music from her favorite video games for her next recital; what song would you like her to play?
appearance: Danielle is a white bulldog with light purple patches over her right ear, around her left eye and on her belly. Her ears are large and floppy, standing up from his head. She has a pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls, with a rounded purple nose and round black eyes. She has 'xoxo' embroidered in white and a red heart on her belly.

name: Danika
bio: Danika starts her workout classes right on time — don't be late! This Pilates instructor does not cut corners. She helps every student reach their highest potential! If you're new to the exercise, Danika will train you in all the major poses. Ready to feel the burn?
appearance: Danika is a light blue tie-dye colored dolphin with two fins on each side, a dorsal fin on the back her head, and a split dolphin tail. She has a solid light blue belly, round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Danilo
bio: Did you know Danilo has a special power? He can put positive spin on anything! If Danilo runs into bad luck, he decides to take it as a learning experience. Danilo spreads thoughtfulness and optimism just by being around!
appearance: Danilo is a piece of chocolate banana toast. He is shaped like a slice of brown toast and has a brown nutella  spreading on his face design on most of her body, including her face. On the middle of the chocolate part there 5 pale yellow banana chips on him. He has a rounded black eyes with a red smiling mouth

name: Danka
bio: Danka hosts a weekly social studies podcast. Each episode dives into a fun 'Mallow tradition Danka wants to learn more about. This week, she's discussing  Valentine's Day traditions like chocolate and flowers. What topic do you want Danka to explore next week?
appearance: Danka is a tan poptart with white icing decorated with red, pink, and purple heart sprinkles. She has round, black eyes and a red smile with pink jam pouring out coming out of her head.

name: Danny
bio: You will always want Danny on your team! Why? He is the king of games! Danny loves strategizing for board games, puzzles, outdoor sports, or scavenger hunts with his buddies.
appearance: Danny is an apple green dinosaur with a white belly. He has darker green spines running down his back. He has a smiling mouth and round, black eyes.

name: Dante
bio: Dante is the tour manager for a metal band, his friendVladis the lead singer. Dante loves ghost pepper hot wings and hosts a hot wing cookoff every fall. He calls his secret sauce “Dante’s Fire”, would you try his wings?
appearance: Dante is a bright red demon with bat-like wings. He has two black horns on each side of his head and a black belly. His round, black eyes are rimmed with white and he has a smiling mouth with two prominent white fangs.

name: Danya
bio: Meet Danya. She loves going to school because her class is filled with friends and she loves to learn about history. On the weekends she loves to explore the museums around her, especially the art museum. Do you want to tag along with Danya?
appearance: Danya is a bunny with a pattern of horizontal shapes in vibrant rainbow and long, floppy ears. Her belly is covered in thick, long, white fur. She has round, black eyes and a pink nose and mouth.

name: Daphne
bio: Daphne just won a game show grand prize! For her valiant efforts matching numbers to what adjective they most feel like, this ham restaurant hostess received a lifetime supply of—well, she'd rather not disclose that. After all, she doesn't want anyone to befriend her just for her phone charge—shoot!
appearance: Daphne is a candy corn unicorn with a white top, and orange center, and a yellow bottom. She has white ears on her head and a sparkly silver horn and mane down her back with a white tail. She has round, black eyes with lashes and white muzzle with orange nostrils.

name: Darby
bio: Darby is a teal octopus with a white belly. They have a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different shades of teal. They have closed eyes with dual eyelashes and a smiling mouth.
appearance: Darby is a teal octopus with a white belly. They have a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different shades of teal. They have closed eyes with dual eyelashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Darcy
bio: Darcy works in the IT department at the North Pole. She helps all the elves with their software issues -- plus Santa! Darcy loves troubleshooting computer problems and educating 'Mallows on better practices so they can feel more comfortable using new computer programs. Darcy is hosting a seasonal IT training. will she see you there?
appearance: Darcy is brown spaniel with brown fuzzy ears with a white marking on her face she has black rounded eyes with short lashes and black nose and mouth. She wears a green shirt which has a red collar with white pom-pom and a red and white mint design in the centre. She wears green pants with suspenders, attached with gold buckles.

name: Darex
bio: Have you met Darex? Darex may be a little loud and boisterous, but he gives the best bear hugs. Darex is a great builder and carpenter and he creates beautiful custom furniture. What can Darex build for you?
appearance: Darex is a cobalt blue dinosaur with a green belly and orange spines spanning from the top of his head to his back. He has a long tail, black eyes, and a black smile.

name: Daria
bio: Say hi to Daria! With Daria's memory for dates and places, it's no wonder world history is her favorite subject in school. Daria also loves to eat pizza and watch TV, but that's only after all of their homework is finished!
appearance: Daria is a light purple Squishmallow with a skull-shaped white face her eyes is a flower-shaped. She is decorated with yellow, teal, white, and orange intricate sugar skull-style designs all over, and she also has yellow eyes

name: Darla
bio: Meet Darla. She likes to play in the snow and catch snowflakes on her tongue. She may have rosy cheeks but she aspires to have a red nose. Nothing cheers her up like a hot cup of cocoa, she prefers whipped cream and sprinkles instead of marshmallows.
appearance: Darla is a chocolate brown deer with a tan face and belly. She also has tan inner ears. She has silver colored antlers on top of her head which are also glittery. She has large, black eyes with curled lashes, a brown, oval nose, pink blush on her cheeks and a red, smiling mouth. She also wears a red and black plaid scarf. Her 5" has an blue scarf instead.

name: Darleen
bio: Darleen works as a personal chef for a big family. She has lot of responsibilties, but her favorite is picking fresh veggies and herbs from the garden! On weekends, Darleen makes her famous buckwheat and banana pancakes She would love to share her recipe with you!
appearance: Darleen is a grey elephant, she have a round, pink belly. She has large, floppy ears with pink on the inside, and an embroidered trunk. She is winking her right eye and has short, curled lashes on both.

name: Darlene the Beaver
bio: Darlene is a professional lullaby writer best known for "Cookies In Your Dream" and "Yawn Yawn, You're So Tired." While she's known to put audiences to sleep when she takes her act on the road, Darlene doesn't mind much. In the lullaby industry, that's like standing ovation!
appearance: Darlene is a salmon beaver with round ears. Her velvet belly and inner ears are red. She has a rounded, triangular muzzle in white, with a red nose and black mouth. Her eyes are closed and feature curled lashes. Each cheek has two curved, black whiskers. She has a large, flat, velvet tail.

name: Daryl The EMT
bio: Meet Daryl. He's a first responder and is always there when someone needs help. Daryl has always loved helping people and loves his job as an EMT. Daryl has been in some scary situations but knows that staying cool, calm, and collected is very important. When you see the ambulance go by, make sure to wave at Daryl!
appearance: Daryl is a light brown dog with round, black eyes. His muzzle and floppy, triangular ears are chocolate brown, and he has a black nose. He wears a blue EMT uniform with a pale blue collar and a white shirt underneath. He has a walkie talkie clipped to the front of his uniform and a red stethoscope tucked around his neck. His uniform has a white badge with a red symbol on the right side.

name: Daryl the Astronaut
bio: Ready for liftoff? Daryl andBrockare best buds and they're headed to the space station for an adventure. Their mission? To see the universe! Daryl hopes to meet an alien or two, Brock wants to throw a football around the moon, are you ready to go?
appearance: Daryl is a light brown dog with dark brown, triangular ears and a rounded muzzle the same color. He has large, cartoon eyes with chocolate brown irises. He is clad in a futuristic silver-grey space suit, which also includes a blue helmet.

name: Dash
bio: You will have to hurry to meet Dash, the Dragster racer. He is quick as can be and will show you how to screech into the finish line first. Just grab you shoes and your shades and jump into the race. Win or lose, it's always a fun time.
appearance: Dash wears a red racing suit with a big "Top Thrill Dragster" print on it. His head is fully covered with his white racing helmet. On his cheeks are yellow/red markings, right next to the air vents. His eyes are covered with large black racing glasses. On top of his helmet is a black and white checkered stripe.

name: Dash the Dumpling
bio: Meet Dash, the most artistic dumpling you'll find! Dash is inspired by classical works of art and loves to create designs of his own. He dreams of appearing in a museum one day - would you like to see some of his work?
appearance: Dash is a white dumpling Squishmallow. His dumpling fold stands out on top of his head and a few thin grey lines emphasize his shape. He has black eyes with a cheeky, right-eyed wink and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Dasvidaniya
bio: Dasvidaniya is the host of  '3-2-1 Bow', a reality television show looking for the world's next big bow designer. Though she never enjoys eliminating contestants from the competition, their consolation prize—picking a red carpet event for Dasvidaniya to wear one of their bows at—is worth its weight in rhinestones!
appearance: Dasvidaniya is a tie-dye tabby cat with a blue, purple and pink body and lavender stripes on her head and sides. She has a white belly and pink inner ears. Her nose and mouth are coral, framed by black whiskers, and her round black eyes have eyelashes. She wears a glittery white bow.

name: Dave
bio: Dave moderates We Can Hear You, a classic rock chat forum. While he appreciates the passion behind such topics as ‘all-time greatest tour bus drivers,’ he encourages his members to keep it civil. And if they don’t? Dave has a ‘block-and-roll’ button, and he’s not afraid to use it!
appearance: Dave is a plum bison with pink inner ears and nose with plum nostrils. His horns are white and he has a soft beard and head. He has white horns on top of his head. He has two large black eyes.

name: Davey
bio: Davey is an avant-garde Christmas tree decorator! From minimalist firs adorned with a lone popcorn kernel to pines suspended upside down from the ceiling, critics call his work "brave" and "boundary-pushing", Davey's family calls it "the reason we do Christmas at Aunt Linda's"
appearance: Davey is a piece of cinnamon toast. He is shaped like a slice of bread and has white frosting on his head with green and red sprinkles. He has a cinnamon swirl on his belly and he wears a red scarf with a snowflake. He has round, black eyes and a red smiling mouth.

name: David
bio: Meet David; when he's not twirling his favorite noodles, you can find him playing video games with his friends, just don't get mad if he levels up before you do! His favorite class is science and when he grows up, he wants to be a research scientist.
appearance: David is a forest green dinosaur with textured scales covering him and a white belly. He has green spines running down his back. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Davie
bio: Meet Davie. He loves figuring out how things work. He takes apart clocks and radios just to put them back together again! He's always tinkering with electronics and creating his own inventions. Next on his list? An alarm clock that wakes you up with eggs, bacon, and orange juice!
appearance: Davie is a teal fuzzy shark with three fins, two on each side and one atop his head. He has a round, white belly. He has round black eyes and a toothy, open-mouthed grin.

name: Davina
bio: Though she's shy at first, Davina is a lot of fun, she does really great impressions and can almost always make you laugh. She wants to be a voiceover artist when she grows up, she has many voices and impressions that she just can't wait to try out.
appearance: Davina has a light pink color all over her body with light pink, dark pink, purple and orange alternating tentacles. Her belly is white as well as her horn. The horn also has a yellow and blue line swirling up it.

name: Davis
bio: Davis just started her first year in college-congrats Davis! She's giddy about her new academic life, but first she wants to decorate her dorm room. Davis believes a pretty yet relaxing environment will be the most positive way to begin her new journey. Want to shop for string lights with Davis?
appearance: Davis is a magenta shrimp with 8 little arms, a shimmery tail and 2 shimmery antenna on top of her head. Her belly is shimmery white and striped with magenta stripes. She is winking with two eyes (one anime and one closed, both with eyelashes) and a small happy smile.

name: Davitta
bio: Davitta is a language teacher and this week her class is starting her favorite topic: forgotten languages. Even though they might not be used anymore, Davitta wants her students to know about them and why they no longer exist. Do you know any forgotten languages?
appearance: Davitta is a white dog with tan patches over her right ear, around her left eye and on her belly. Her ears are large and floppy, standing up from her head. She has a pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls, with a rounded black nose and round black eyes with curled lashes. She wears a pastel rainbow bow on her left ear.

name: Dawn
bio: Dawn is a tomboy who is always up for a camping adventure. She is fluent in all animal languages and loves to teach her friends all about the different animals who live in the forest. She hopes to be a park ranger one day!
appearance: Dawn is a light brown deer with a white face and belly. She also has white inner ears and speckles on her forehead. She has sandy colored antlers on top of her head. Her eyes, nose and mouth are all black.

name: Dawna
bio: Dawna's favourite food is ice cream, can you tell? Dawna wants to become a food scientist to understand how to create treats that are as yummy as they are healthy.
appearance: Dawna is a white unicorn with a light golden muzzle. Their head is covered in bright pink icing which drips down their body and is decorated with rainbow sprinkles. Their tail is the same color. Their ears are sparkly and pale pink inside. Their horn is golden and resembles an ice-cream cone. They have closed, happy eyes with chunky lashes and a pink blush on each cheek.

name: Dawson
bio: Dawson is a teal dinosaur with a white belly. He has white spines running down his back. He has a smiling mouth and round, black eyes.
appearance: Dawson is a teal dinosaur with a white belly. He has white spines running down his back. He has a smiling mouth and round, black eyes.

name: Dax
bio: Dax wants a hug when it's raining out and his feathers are too wet to fly, will you help Dax dry off?

name: Daxi
bio: Daxi learned some magic tricks and now they're using it to shock their friends! Yesterday Daxi made a coin disappear into thin air, then turned a friend's hat into a rainbow scarf! Not to worry, once the trick is done, Daxi always shares the secrets behind the magic. Want to learn some magic tricks too?
appearance: Daxi is a blue machine. She has a light blue body with a grey top and hot pink bottom. At the bottom, she has grey, semi-circle flip-open door on the left and a circular, silver turn knob. In the middle of her body, she has a white rectangular window with eight heart capsules inside at the bottom. Above the window, she has round, black eyes, a smiling, red mouth, and pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Daxxon
bio: Daxxon has traveled very far to join the Squishmallows Squad. He was exploring a new galaxy and met his best friendRudyon the way. These best buds love to pretend they are superheroes and love to save the day.
appearance: Daxxon is a purple and blue galaxy printed alien. His body is covered with a white pattern of stars. He also has dark purple speckles on his body and antennae. He has a light purple belly and a simple, smiling face.

name: Dayton
bio: Dayton may be a small fish but she throws big tantrums! This little 'Mallow gets overwhelmed when she finds something unfair. Sometimes counting backwards helps her calm down, but maybe Dayton to just prefers putting on her headphones and listens to classical piano music. it's the perfect time out!
appearance: Dayton is a yellow fish with black large and small spots all over her body. She has two rainbow pectoral fins, a dorsal fin at his back and a tail fin by her bottom. She has a light yellow belly, black eyes and a black, smiling mouth with small dimples.

name: DeRay
bio: DeRay plays video games all day! He works in the video game industry testing new games and reporting any bugs or glitches. There’s no difficulty level DeRay can’t beat. He can even play an entire game straight through without losing! There’s no doubt this ‘Mallow is the best gamer around.
appearance: DeRay is a light green ankylosaurus, a heavily armored type of dinosaur. He has dark green spots in groups around his body. He has four pale yellow spikes atop his head and a broad yellow plate. He has a pale yellow belly with green stripes and a plain, smiling face.

name: DeWitt
bio: Ramen noodle soup is the cornerstone to DeWitt's daily diet. He loves ramen for breakfast, lunch or dinner, and always orders it with extra garlic. DeWitt tried making his own ramen once at home, but he is not the best in the kitchen. Do you have a favourite food too?
appearance: DeWitt is an army green frog with a cream colored patterned belly. His eyes sit on top of his head, and are black rimmed in white. He has prominent nostrils above his smiling mouth, and cream blush on his cheeks.

name: De Nadia
bio: De Nadia doesn't mean to be the airl who cried chupacabra-she's iust a little near-siahted! If you couldn't see a stone's throw past vour face you might also have thought that pile of wood was la chupacabra. Or that "STOP" sian. Or even that weird-looking gray dog that hangs out near the salt mines!
appearance: De Nadia is a black chihuahua with tall ears which taper at the tips. Her muzzle, stomach, inner ears are purple. Her stomach has a multi color skeleton rib cage.  She has round black eyes rimmed in purple and pink flower pedals, and a nose the same color.

name: Deacon
bio: Sunday night ice cream sundae parties are at Deacon's house! Any time is a good time for ice cream, and Deacon loves to start off his week with triple scoops of rocky road, rainbow sprinkles, and extra cherries. Want to join Deacon's Sunday sundae party?
appearance: Deacon is a purple donkey with a white muzzle. His long, fuzzy ears are all dark purple, and his eyes are round and black. He has a dark purple mane running down his back and a matching tail. His belly is white with blurred out purple splotches.

name: Deandra
bio: Deandra is determined to figure out this whole "Easter Egg Hunt" thing. At last year's hunt, she heard the countdown and mistook it for hide-and-seek, so she closed her eyes while the other little 'Mallows picked up all the eggs! This year, she has a plan—pretend the eggs are players in a game of tag and she's it!

name: Dear
