bio: When Dear was choosing a career for himself, he looked to his name for inspiration. This happy-go-lucky frog is a professional letter writer! Dear loves helping busy 'Mallows keep up with their pen pals. One day, he hopes to write acceptance letters for the local college!
appearance: Dear is a mint frog with a seafoam green belly. Groups of black spots decorate the sides of his body and in a patch above his nose. His eyes sit on top of his head and are black and rimmed with white. He has prominent nostrils above His wide, smiling mouth.

name: Dearest
bio: No one knows for sure if Dearest is a nickname or a birth name. And she will never say for sure either. Dearest has simply been Dearest since her grannie called her that many years ago. Luckily, Dearest lives up to her name. Well, most of the time.
appearance: Dearest is a teal monster with green horns with yellow fin-like flaps with teal lines on the sides of her body, and a light yellow belly with spots. She has yellow spots on the right side of her face. She has a black bat bow on the left side of her head. Her eyes are black with lashes and a teal mouth with pointy white teeth.

name: Debra
bio: Debra is a purple capybara with purple short ears and an egg-shaped muzzle. She has an off-white fuzzy belly, round, black eyes with lashes, black nostrils and mouth.
appearance: Debra is a purple capybara with purple short ears and an egg-shaped muzzle. She has an off-white fuzzy belly, round, black eyes with lashes, black nostrils and mouth.

name: Decker
appearance: Decker is a mint dodo bird with short wings. They have an off-white belly and white face with a long, orange beak. Their eyes are black, and they have orange rings around their eyes.

name: Declan
bio: If there's one thing Declan procrastinates doing, it's washing dishes. As a busy clown, Declan never has time to scrub and dry plates and glasses, but he just had a great idea to help him get motivated—hosting a dishwashing disco party! Don't forget to bring your own sponge!
appearance: Declan is a cotton candy/snow cone clown with white face paint and rainbow fuzzy hair. He pops out of a cup rimmed in pink with diagonal white, teal, and pink lines across it. He has yellow eye makeup, teal lipstick, and a round pink nose with mischievous black eyes.

name: DeeDee
bio: Meet DeeDee. She loves dancing, reading, and tending to her garden of sea cucumbers! She is patient, caring, and tries to learn something new every day. One day she wants to be a 1st-grade teacher and a mom. She's also an amazing baker! Want to try her shortbread cookies?
appearance: DeeDee is a grey-blue seahorse with an ice blue belly, segmented by blue lines. She has fins atop her head and on her sides, all of which are sparkly blue. Her snout also has sparkly blue at its center. She has closed eyes with short lashes.

name: Deeto
bio: Meet Deeto. His ears are as perky as his personality! Deeto loves picking flowers, going shopping, and having dessert before breakfast! He might be a little barky when he first meets you, but give him a belly scratch and he will love you forever.
appearance: Deeto is an African Wild Dog. He has a tan coat with sandy yellow splotches outlined in black. He has upright, round ears which are brown with fluffy white insides. He has a black marking on his face which surrounds his eyes and muzzle with an upward stripe. He has a sandy belly and a tuft of brown fur atop his head.

name: Deezo
bio: Take a deep-sea dive with Deezo! This 'Mallow wants to be a volcanist when he grows up and study underwater volcanoes! He's working on designing the perfect submarine for deep-sea adventures. Come explore with him!
appearance: Deezo is an anglerfish, a type of deep-sea fish. He is a tie-dyed blue color with light blue paint splatter. He has a teal belly and teal fins on either side of his body. He has a long appendage protruding from his forehead with a shiny, silver end representing the light anglerfish have. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with four sharp, white teeth sticking up from his mouth.

name: Deidra
bio: Deidra repairs and sells leather goods in her shop. Come by and check out her new satchels! This 'Mallow loves to work with her hands, and you can always find her behind the counter in the middle of a repair, listening to her favorite records.
appearance: Deidra is a gnome with a large nose and two white braids coming out from under her hat. She wears a grey hat printed with diagonal grey rectangles and a red pom-pom atop her head, and a grey outfit on her bottom half with a red plaid belly.

name: Deja
bio: Meet Deja. She loves improv, makeup, and vintage clothes. All of it help her to get into character. She's great at doing impressions and is perfecting all of her different accents. When she grows up, she wants to be a voice actor in animated movies!
appearance: Deja is a tan colored donut with brown and pink icing. sprinkles in red, baby blue, and yellow decorate her face, she has round black eyes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Delaney
bio: Meet Delaney. He can get overwhelmed when things are too loud, so if you see him put his headphones on, don't be alarmed. He listens to classical music to calm his nerves. Delaney can play flute, piano, and clarinet, and one day hopes to fulfill his dream of being a composer.
appearance: Delaney is a teal frog with orange-yellow spots on the sides and a light blue belly. He has black eye ringed in a blue with a black nose and smile.

name: Delcia
bio: Delcia is not your average monkey—she’s allergic to bananas—but she doesn’t let that ruin her day! This ‘Mallow finds something positive in every situation and is always manifesting good vibes. So what if Delcia can’t eat bananas? Now she's a pro at opening coconuts!
appearance: Delcia is a hot pink monkey with rounded ears. She has a round peach face that curve in slightly by the middle top. She has a peach nose, along with black eyes, a pink smiling mouth and a long tail. She has "I love you" written on her body in white in a cursive font with red hearts by the sides.

name: Delenne
bio: Meet Delenne. She loves tea parties with fancy hats, tiny sandwiches, and cakes. Every year for her birthday she and her friends dress up for a birthday tea party. This year she wants to decorate mini-cakes and cookies, would you like to join?
appearance: Delenne is a tie-dye-colored dog with hot pink, flopped ears with white, round eyebrow markings above her eyes. She has a white muzzle with a black nose, mouth, and eyes. She has a white belly withHAPPY BIRTHDAYwritten in blue, orange, green, and purple letters. She also wears a party hat with orange, pink, and purple stripes with a red, fuzzy ball on the top.

name: Delfina
bio: Meet Delfina. She loves bright-colored paintings, spicy candy, and telling stories with her friends. Delfina grew up with her aunt and spooky season is very special to them. They wear matching costumes every year and make special sugar skulls to share with their friends.
appearance: Delfina is a black Squishmallow with a round, white face. Her large, black eyes and smiling mouth are decorated with teal and black details. She has a purple design on her forehead and a large, colorful flower design on her body.

name: Delia
bio: Delia is a hot pink bear with round ears with off-white inner ears. She has an off-white belly and has two pink arms holding heart-shaped pancakes with red, pink and white sprinkles on top. She has black eyes with lashes and an off-white muzzle with a pink nose and mouth.
appearance: Delia is a hot pink bear with round ears with off-white inner ears. She has an off-white belly and has two pink arms holding heart-shaped pancakes with red, pink and white sprinkles on top. She has black eyes with lashes and an off-white muzzle with a pink nose and mouth.

name: Delie
bio: Delie is dressing up as her favorite animal — a bat! Last year, she was a flying fox bat. The year before that, a fruit bat. She's obsessed and knows all about them, like how they use echolocation to see where they're going. Watch out, this year she's a vampire bat!
appearance: Delie is a piece of candy corn with three bands of color: white at the top, orange in the center and yellow on the bottom. She has round eyes and a smiling mouth with some black bat ears headband with wings.

name: Delilah
bio: Delilah's favorite season is fall; she loves baking anything apple! Apple donuts, apple muffins, and especially caramel apples. Are you ready to become her baking assistant?
appearance: Delilah is a mottled purple dinosaur with a white belly. She is covered in the texture of her scales. A crown of purple spines tops her head. She has black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Delindy
bio: Delindy loves live music! If you've got an extra ticket, she's guaranteed to want to come along and dance, no matter if the music is fast or slow! So put on a sparkly outfit, or some comfy dancing shoes, and get ready to move!
appearance: Delindy is a pumpkin spice latte with cream. On top of her head is swirled whipped cream with orange swirls and dots. There is a green poking out from the left side of the whipped cream. She has an orange body with a yellow band through her middle, decorated with a pumpkin design at its center. She wears a winking expression and has orange blush, and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Delita
bio: Meet Delita! Delita is a morning person who enjoys crosswords puzzles and breakfast. She makes a special granola recipe almost every day. One day Delita wants to have her very own granola shop! What kind of granola mix can Delita make for you?
appearance: Delita is a dragonfruit with a red body. She has a white face with black eyes and a pink smile.  She has five sparkly green leaves and black seed spots on her belly.

name: Della
bio: Meet Della. This ambitious athlete is going for gold as she swims for victory! She is one competitive duck which helps her stay motivated for those early morning swims! Do you have a sport you're training hard for?
appearance: Della is a duck with a hot pink head and a petal pink body, separated by a white marking on her neck. She has fluffy hot pink wings and a very pale pink belly. Her round black eyes have a white ring around them, and her short bill is bright yellow.

name: Delmar
bio: Delmar speaks in long, confusing metaphone. He likens his speech pattern to a pot of campfire chili, slowly simmering as shy baked beans shake hands with shallots, onions, carrots—hey, do you remember where he was going with this?
appearance: Delmar is a cow burger. He is made up of buns with a patty, cheese, lettuce and tomato in the center. The burger bun is tan with sesame seeds on top of his head with a brown patch on right side. He has white horns with tan and brown ears and tan inner ears. He has round, black eyes a white nose with brown nostrils.

name: Delores
bio: Meet Delores. This clownfish cutie loves to dance! Fun fact about Delores: her love for dance inspired her to learn new languages. Delores is all about growth and trying new things, what inspires you?
appearance: Delores is a clownfish with a pink body and turquoise stripes. She has a white belly, a tuft of pink hair above her head, a tail by her bottom, and glittered, hot pink pectoral fins on her sides. She has black eyes with lashes and a dimpled smile.

name: Delphine
bio: Meet Delphine. She loves flowers, heart-shaped balloons, and chocolate. She loves to live every moment to the fullest, which is why she always eats a piece of chocolate before her meal. The sugar isn't good for Delphine so she is going to try dark chocolate!
appearance: Delphine is a rainbow axolotl with a pattern of swirling colors. Her color palette is predominantly cool colors (blue, green, purple, etc.). She has shiny, dark purple gills with a violet frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly. In size 14"

name: Delroy
bio: Meet Delroy. Besides being a great friend, Delroy has a superpower. Its his stomach! He can eat anything and everything. When you're full, he's going back for seconds. It's no wonder his favorite restaurant is buffet style!
appearance: Delroy is a brown dog with long, fluffy, cream-colored ears. His muzzle and belly are white, and he has a heart-shaped patch around his right eye. He has round, black eyes and a brown nose and mouth. He holds a sparkly red toy bone between his front paws.

name: Delva
bio: Devla loves going to the beach, if she could she would live there. She loves the sound of the ocean, the warm sun, and picnics with her friends. Do you want to join?
appearance: Delva is a white and blue tie-dyed unicorn with a white mane and tail. Her inner ears, muzzle, and horn is a holographic silver. She has a white belly with closed lashed eyes.

name: Delzi
bio: Delzi just start taking pottery classes and now she can't stop making mugs! Delzi finds pottery throwing is so relaxing and fun. She even likes how messy it looks! She's decided to save up to buy a pottery wheel of her own. Would you like Delzi to make you a personalized mug?
appearance: Delzi is a purple donkey with a white muzzle and her belly is pink with flowers everywhere. Her long, floppy ears are pink with flowers on the inside, and her eyes are round and black. She has a purple mane running down her back and a matching tail.

name: Demi
bio: Demi appreciates life's simple moments, like the rustling sound of leaves, and the crisp smell of of autumn air. When he's not flying around town, Demi goes apple picking with his squad! This 'Mallow's favorite apples are red and sweet, making them perfect for pies - and he wants your help to bake them!
appearance: Demi is a red owl with prominent black ear tufts and white markings on his face and belly. Small, black feathers decorate his chest and he has a triangular yellow beak. He wears a black velvet cape tied around his neck.

name: Demir
bio: Demir loves all kinds of water activities. Whether it's scuba diving, snorkeling, or surfing, you can always find them near the beach. Demir is saving up to buy a boat and learn how to sail, do you want to join?
appearance: Demir is a dog with a pale mint body. Their muzzle and belly are white, and they have a darker mint patch around their right eye. Their white belly and their ears are fluffy. Their ears are pastel rainbow with a pink underside. They have round, black eyes and a mint nose and mouth.

name: Den
bio: There goes Den making another touchdown! This speedy 'Mallow knows when to scramble or throw, and is always ready to support his teammates. Off the field, Den chills out with a good book or rides his scooter around town with pals.
appearance: Den has a brown color on his body with brown gills on either side of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a gingerbread belly. He has round black eyes and a black cat-like smile. He also has gingerbread frosting on his forehead, and he has a big green bowtie.

name: Denali
bio: Denali collects bumper stickers. She received her first at a White Elephant exchange--"Honk if you love garlic!"--and has grown her collection tenfold since. Her favorites? Random "My child is an honor roll student At..." decals she finds at charity shops!
appearance: Denali is a blue stegosaurus with darker blue speckles on her front and stripes on her back. She has pink spines running down her back and a white belly. She has a tail, black eyes, and a black smiling mouth.

name: Denise
bio: Denise loves donuts, iced coffee, and spending time with her family. She is the go-to mermaid for the latest hair and makeup trends in all the ocean, and still has time to keep up with her friends looking fab! You can recognize her signature nails and matching purple hair.
appearance: Denise is a tan mermaid with purple hair. Her eyes are brown with three eyelashes with a white shine. She has a crescent nose and a smiling mouth with pink blush. She has shimmery pink shells on her chest and her tail has scales that are mostly pink, purple, and blue.

name: Deniz
bio: Do you have an alter ego who loves to be the center of attention? So does Deniz! After his first improv class, his alter ego blossomed and this once-shy pelican rules the stage! He loves to practice new roles and push his limits as a performer. One day you can see him perform!
appearance: Deniz is a light grey pelican, a type of bird with a large beak. He has a white belly and fluffy, light grey wings with grey tips. He has a large, rounded, orange beak that protrudes from the front of his face with small, black nostrils and round, black eyes.

name: Dent
bio: Dent just moved from the other side of the globe! He's starting to meet new 'Mallows at school, but some of them have a hard time understanding his accent. Dent loves cinema and he can't wait to be a film critic. So if you get to know Dent, he'll be sure to give you a great movie suggestion!
appearance: Dent is a black dragon with a purple fuzzy belly, inner ears, wings, and spines on the top of his head to his upper back. He has a black tail and short, black ears with silver holographic horns and muzzle, his eyes are also black and round.

name: Denton
bio: Meet Denton! Denton isKent's older sibling and loves supportingKent's dreams of being on-stage by helping with his makeup. When the stage isn't calling, Denton likes to sit at the park and sketch everything from a new perspective. Do you want to see some of Denton's work?
appearance: Denton is a lizard who is mostly apple green, with a gradient of darker green on the top and pink on the bottom. They have a frill atop their head, a thin, curled tail and three broad stripes on their back. All of these features are covered in shiny, rainbow scales. They have large, wide eyes with shiny black pupils. They have a smiling mouth and a plain white belly.

name: Deontay
bio: Deontay loves all things birthday—so much so that he uses gift wrap as wallpaper and even has a pet pinata named Chiquis! When a friend needs cheering up, he rushes over with cake and decorations because—according to Deontay—it's hard not to smile with confetti in your face and a friend at your place!
appearance: Deontay is a purple dog with floppy ears. His ears are fluffy with purple fur. He wears a silver star headband on top of his head. He has a white with rainbow sprinkles which resembles icing on a cake. He has a white patch on his muzzle and forehead and has round, black eyes with a black nose and mouth.

name: Derek
bio: Derek is a curious explorer who enjoys taking epic backpacking trips through different cities with his friends! He always comes back from his trips with fascinating tales that inspire others to go out and explore. His dream is to become a National Geographic Explorer. So he can conduct expeditions that shed light on a corner of the world that no one has yet discovered! He's training for a body building competition right now, and after that, a marathon!
appearance: Derek is an apple green dinosaur with a white belly. He has darker green spines running down his back. Derek also has two horns atop his head, and a flat, white horn on his face. He has a smiling mouth and round, black eyes.

name: Desirae
bio: Desirae loves to play croquet with her family and her favorite food is clementines. Just like her cousinDanny, she is a whiz at games and one day wants to design her own board game!
appearance: Desirae is a green dinosaur Hug Mee. She has oval shaped eyes, a white muzzle with orange nostrils, and a white belly. The spines going down her back are orange or dark green depending on the squad.

name: Desmund
bio: When it comes to cooking, look no further than Desmund! Not only does Desmund cook with the best spices and flavors, but he also heats up his steak with his burning hot breath. Everyone in his squad loves a special, home-cooked meal made by Desmund!
appearance: Desmund is a mint green dragon. His wing membranes, horns and the spikes on his back are all shimmering silver, while his snout, inner ears, and belly is white. He has two large black eyes.

name: Dessa
bio: Dessa loves sports, video games, and dreams of becoming a model. She loves to try on new accessories and showoff on the catwalk for her friends. When she's not busy working on a new look, you can find her engrossed in a game and strategizing the next move with her 'Mallow teammates.
appearance: Dessa is a cake with rainbow-colored layers and strawberry frosting with white icing decorated with rainbow sprinkles. She has a happy expression with closed eyes and an open mouth with pink blush.

name: Destiny
bio: Destiny's favorite place to visit with her family is the aquarium. She loves watching the colorful fish swim around in their large tanks, visiting the shark lagoon, and touching sea jellies. The highlight of Destiny's day is learning all about the incredible creatures that live in the ocean!
appearance: Destiny is a dragon with a blue tie-dye pattern, ranging from aqua to indigo, and a scaly texture. She has a white nose, inner ears and belly. Her horns, the inside of her wings and the spines on her back are all a shimmering pale silver. She has two large black eyes and dark blue nostrils.

name: Detective Kirk
bio: Meet Detective Kirk! He helps teach other mallows on the force how to help in times of crisis. When mallows have a problem and need a helping hand, Kirk is the koala for the job! He knows that it can be scary to talk to people in uniform so he tries extra hard to be friendly and fair. With Kirk on the case, you don’t have to fear.
appearance: Kirk is a light grey koala with enormous, round ears. The inside of his ears are white. He has a large black nose, as well as round eyes and a smiling mouth. He wears a dark blue police uniform, including a shirt with badge, a black belt and pants. His cap is predominantly blue with a yellow band around the base, another shield emblem on the front and a black brim.

name: Detina
bio: Meet Detina. She is one cuddly pup who is eager to make new friends and go on adventures! Detina loves to give emotional support, but make sure you give it back because Detina can get anxious, too. When she's not at the park with friends, she is at home cooking up a new adventure.
appearance: Detina is a dog with a pink, tie-dyed body, which includes shades ranging from cream to bright pink. Their muzzle is white with a hot pink nose, and they have a hot pink patch around their right eye. Both their floppy, hot pink ears and white belly are very fluffy.

name: Detra
bio: Looking for a Halloween costume? Give Detra a call! Detra works at a costume shop and has a costume for everyone! She loves to help find the perfect costume, do you have anything in mind?
appearance: Detra is a red octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including red, butter yellow, neon yellow and peach). She has round black eyes and a smiling mouth. She wears a black witch hat on the left side of her head which has a purple band and an orange buckle.

name: Devika
bio: This birthday babe is having a great day! Devika's birthday started off with breakfast in bed; blueberry pancakes and chocolate milk. At school, her friends covered her locker with streamers and balloons. Can you guess what she wants to do next?
appearance: Devika is a tie-dyed, rainbow unicorn without a nose or mouth. She has closed, happy eyes and a pink blush on each cheek. Her mane is streaked in teal, yellow and pink. She wears a sparkly, silver crown, which is the same color as her inner ears. Her horn is bright, shiny gold. She also wears a sparkly pink sash which reads 'BIRTHDAY GIRL' in white and purple writing.

name: Devin
bio: Knock, knock, here is Devin! Devin is an aspiring standup comedian and loves knock-knock jokes! This silly Squishmallow thinks that comedy is the answer to everything and will always have a joke ready if you are having a bad day.
appearance: Devin is a sky blue dragon with a white nose and belly. Their horns, the inside of their wings and the spines on their back are all glittery silver. They have two large round black eyes and deep blue nostrils.

name: Devlin
bio: When Devlin isn't bungee jumping or scaling steep mountains, you can find her curled up a good book—perched atop her favorite giant redwood tree. Despite her affinity for altitude, Devlin believes there is nothing more important than staying ground!
appearance: Devlin is a bunny with black fur and long, floppy ears. The underside of her ears are a fluffy and blue. Her belly is covered in fluffy,  fur. She has round, black eyes, a blue nose with a black mouth and black whiskers.

name: Devorah
appearance: Devorah's body is lavender purple and they have a light purple belly with thin purple stripes across it. They have four wings which are holographic teal with rainbow stripes, and are shaped like blades. Their antennae are sparkly and teal in color. They have black eyes, pink blushing cheeks and a smiling mouth.

name: Devra
bio: Are you ready for a style session with Devra? This diva-licious dragon wants to be a stylist and has all her friends glammed up in home-style chic. She loves to go through her virtual closet app and plan red-carpet looks for her friends. What can she style for you?
appearance: Devra is a pastel purple dragon with shiny blue spikes. Her wings are sky blue with a metallic pink membrane on the front side. Her large, cartoon eyes are also sky blue. Her belly and inner ears feature a rainbow tie-dye pattern.

name: Dexter
bio: Dexter is a unique individual who loves to fly around town with his friendBrody. His dream is to become a pilot and travel the world, but for now Dexter sticks to soaring the skies around his neighborhood showing off the tricks Brody taught him to their group of fun-loving fly friends!
appearance: Dexter is an apple green dragon with a white snout, belly, and inner ears. His horns are bright yellow, and the outer sides of his wings and the spines on his back are forest green. He has two large black eyes.

name: Dezzy
bio: Unlike her sisterMeg, Dezzy does not like the outdoors. Sleepovers with scary stories, makeovers, and of course making s'mores are more her style. To compromise, Meg and Dezzy have sleepovers in their treehouse. Do you want to join them?
appearance: Dezzy is a light orange or coral colored dog with upright, triangular ears. She has cream inner ears and a cream patch on her muzzle and belly. Her eyebrows, which are also cream, are shaped like clouds. She has large, blue cartoon eyes with spiked black lashes. Dezzy also has a large nose and is poking out her pale pink tongue.

name: Diana
bio: Meet Diana. Whether she's spreading her wings on the dance floor or taking a stroll through the park, this social butterfly is guaranteed to bump into someone she knows. Come meet her! She loves trying new things, making new friends, and always accepts others for who they are!
appearance: Diana is a brightly colored butterfly with a rainbow gradient and purple antennae. She has purple wings with a pattern of rainbow sections and white dots. She has a white belly with silver sparkles which match the tips of her antennae. She has round eyes with short lashes, pink cheeks and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Dianalee
bio: Dianalee is a world-famous pop star! This musically-gifted 'Mallow loves to sing about practicing positivity, helping others, and doing it all with a smile. Though she's constantly on the road. Dianalee always makes time for her biggest fans of all time—her family!
appearance: Dianalee is a candy pink chipmunk with rounded ears and a long tail. There are three magenta markings on her head with one on her forehead and two on the sides. She has a white mark by her mouth and inner ears, with a white fuzzy belly. Her tail is pink and has white and magenta stripes with a white marking underneath. She has black, rounded eyes, with lashes with a black nose and curved mouth.

name: Diane
bio: Diane recently graduated college and is taking her new life one day at a time. She submitted a few job resumes this morning before going to rowing practice. Even without a new routine, Diane still has shepherd's pie for dinner at her favorite bistro almost every night! Would you like to join her?
appearance: Diane is a peachbigfoot. She has a large fuzzy rainbow tie-dye mane with long, shaggy ears. She has a face with a blank emotion and pink blush. Diane also has two feet, each one with shiny silver heart-shaped pads with 3 toes with a pastel pink belly.

name: Dibbs
bio: How do you write a hit song? Dibbs wants to know the answer to that too! This aspiring songwriter loves a good pop song and can't wait to leave their mark in history. Dibbs even recorded a few original songs on keyboard and uploaded them online. Hopefully they start trending!
appearance: Dibbs is a scoop of strawberry ice cream with darker brown chocolate syrup, multicolored sprinkles, and a cherry on the top of their head. They are placed on top of a tan waffle cone with a diamond pattern and her scoop overflowing on top of it. They have black eyes, a black smile and pink blush on their cheeks.

name: Diedre
bio: If you've got rhythm and can handle some competition, you might be the perfect match for Diedre. She and her friends love to jump rope and are getting ready for a big contest. They're looking for the best jump ropers around, are you ready to jump on in?
appearance: Diedre is a cupcake with swirled pink icing and rainbow sprinkles on top. She has closed, happy eyes with short lashes, pink blush and a red, smiling mouth. Her lower half is sky blue with darker blue stripes.

name: Diego
bio: Inspired by his surroundings, Diego uses the jungle as his muse for all of the poems that he writes. He recently had one published in the local paper!
appearance: Diego is a light teal or aqua elephant. He has large, floppy ears with white on the inside, and an embroidered trunk. He has round, black eyes too.

name: Dieric
bio: Ready for a day at the art museum? Dieric will be there and can't wait to show you around! They give tours for anyone interested in learning more about all the paintings and sculptures, but Dieric admits their favorites are the abstract canvases. This dragon loves big and colorful art!
appearance: Dieric is a yellow dragon with wings, fin-like ears and tan horns. They have sparkly orange inner wings, webbing in their ears, and red fuzz from the top of their head to their tail. They have a white muzzle and belly with yellow nostrils. Their eyes are round and black.

name: Diesel
bio: Diesel plays the drums for The Vertabros! These totally-righteous physical therapists just got a major gig playing Dave's nephew's bar mitzvah and can't wait to bring the heat to the Alabaster Hotel banquet. Mosh like you mean it—just please stretch before!
appearance: Diesel is a black triceratops with a black belly with a skeleton ribcage. A ridge of black spines appears atop his head. They have two white horns on their head and a large white horn on his face. They have black, round eyes rimmed in white and a smiling mouth.

name: Dilka
bio: Dilka can't wait for Mocha March! That's when Dilka spends 31 days trying 31 different mochas. Though that might seem like a tall order, Dilka prepares far in advance. He already has two scheduled- 'Ganache Raspberry Surprise' on the 8th and 'Dark Chocolate Beetroot' on the 27th!
appearance: Dilka is a lavender bigfoot with a fuzzy mane on his head and long, shaggy ears. He has white pads on his feet which are shaped like hearts, and 3 toes. He has black eyes, a wide mouth which stretches across his face, and a white tooth sticking out of the right side of his mouth. He also has a pair of white pink bunny ears.

name: Dina
bio: Dina loves blue-raspberry Danishes and watching the sunrise. She reads books with her friendTatianaevery weekend and wants to travel to all the places she reads about.
appearance: Dina is a lavender purple dragon with a white belly. Her horns, her snout, the insides of her ears, the inside of her wings and the spines on her back are all glittery silver. She has two large black eyes.

name: Dinora
bio: Dinora hosts a podcast with her chocolate bunny besties. They discuss their favorite mystery series and create all kinds of fan theories with listeners! If you're caught up on "Most Northwest Mountains", call Dinora and tell her what you think will happen next.
appearance: Dinora is a brown chocolate bunny. She has yellow inner ears and a bowtie with a darker brown belly with thin cyan and pink icing swirled on it. She has dark brown whiskers and eyes with lashes and a pink nose and a curved mouth.

name: Dion
bio: Ready for a delicious snack? Dion is here to make your day! She loves making yummy snacks for her friends; usually cheese, crackers, and something sweet. She's ready to be the host with the most!
appearance: Dion is a baby pink unicorn with a a small tail and no mane. Her horn and inner ears are shimmery silver, and her muzzle is white with royal blue nostrils. She also has a round, white belly. She has royal blue eyes which are closed and have long lashes which curl upwards. Over these she wears glasses with a hot pink frame, matching the color of the spiral on her horn.

name: Dionne
bio: Here comes Dionne! He's a wiz at tabletop games, but sometimes his wings flap and blow all the pieces down! At least he got his fiery hiccups under control, and he has a squad to help him get the game back on track! Do you have what it takes to play with Dionne?
appearance: Dionne is a gargoyle, a dragon-like creature. He has a gradient of three main colors: green, orange and purple. He has orange horns with wing-like ears sitting below them. The wings on his back also have a gradient. His snout and belly are green, and he has small, white fangs.

name: Ditka
bio: Ditka is currently working on getting her broom license! She's still learning and flies into trees every once in a while but she doesn't mind! She loves trying new things and working at them until she's mastered them! Next, she wants to perfect her cauldron cooking skills!
appearance: Ditka is a witch with brown skin and pink hair styled in pigtails. She wears a large, black witch hat with a pink strip, gold buckle, decorated with gold stars. She has a black shirt with long sleeves, a pink belly, and a broom on her left hand. She has a black smile and black eyes with lashes as she has a winking expression.

name: Ditty
bio: Say hi to Ditty. He wants to be a geologist and has a huge collection of rocks and minerals! Sometimes Ditty goes hunting for quartz and fossils in the mountains with his friends! Would you like to go rock hunting with Ditty?
appearance: Ditty is a pink lemur whose inner ears, belly and mask markings are white and his belly is fuzzy. He has black eyes surrounded by pink, as well as a black nose and mouth.

name: Diva
bio: Diva just left her acapella group to pursue a solo career! She no longer has to worry about “blending in with the other voices” or “limiting her boundless talent” as she now sings all 6 voice parts, from soprano to vocal percussion. Be sure to buy tickets to Diva’s “Do-Re-ME” tour before they sell out!
appearance: Diva is a cream bigfoot with a fuzzy tan mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and fuzzy brown belly, and golden pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush beneath and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face.

name: Divina
bio: Divina is the silliest duck around; she loves to tell jokes to all her friends. She has her own library of joke books so she'll never run out of jokes.
appearance: Divina is a yellow duck in the style of a Hug Mee. She has a white tuft of fur on top of her head with her wings being white-tipped and a white belly. She has an orange beak, yellow feet, and black eyes with lashes. Her belly has an embroidered yellow flower on it.

name: Dixie
bio: Binge watching sci-fi shows and drawing are two things Dixie is known for, she loves the design inspo! Dixie wants to be an architect and has notebooks full of crazy cool designs. Her latest drawing has 3 garden rooftops and a waterfall.
appearance: Dixie is a white dog with small, black spots covering her body. Her muzzle and belly are pure white, and her floppy ears are pure black. Each ear sports a pale pink bow. She has large, brown cartoon eyes with spiked black lashes, as well as a large black nose and mouth.

name: Diz
bio: Diz is a very adventurous dragon, especially when it comes to having fun in the snow! Last year Diz got a pair of snowshoes and hiked to the tippy top of the mountains, it was a beautiful sight! Want to go on an adventure with Diz?
appearance: Diz is a light blue dragon with a light blue nose and white belly. The insides of their ears are also white. Their horns and the inside of their wings are a silver and the spines on their back are also silver. They have two large black eyes. They wear a red and green scarf that has a white pattern.

name: Djimon
bio: Meet Djimon at the science museum! This iguana loves checking out fossils and learning all he can about new topics. Djimon is a graphic designer and has been known to sit and work from the museum cafe. You can always spot this 'Mallow from the super cool sci-fi stickers on his laptop!
appearance: Djimon  has an ultramarine blue body with two dark teal cheeks and a teal belly. He has bluish-grey spots on his face, and royal blue spines on his back. He has round, black and a smiling mouth.

name: Dmitri
bio: Dmitri isn’t like most movie stars. He doesn’t care about “looks” or “accolades” but rather “feelings” and “charitable organizations.” In fact, he just founded TFFBAWMSWALOMS—“The Fund for Beautiful, Award-Winning Movie Stars Who Aren’t Like Other Movie Stars”!
appearance: Dmitri is a black wolf with large, triangular ears, the inside of which are black; he has grey markings on his face, including fluffy cheeks, as well as a grey belly. His eyes are black which are rimmed in yellow; he also has a black nose and mouth.

name: Dobrilla
bio: Meet Dobrilla. She's a fashion model who lives for the catwalk. Catch her rolling down the runway in her wheelchair, all decked out with jewels and a fringe. When she's not modeling, Dobrilla loves to knit, play video games, and go on scavenger hunts.
appearance: Dobrilla is a candy pink creature with a fuzzy, pastel, rainbow mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and belly, and sparkly pink pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush, and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face. She wears a bright pink headband with two antennae, each with a large, sparkly pink heart on the end.

name: Dohna
bio: Meet Dohna. She love fashion and design! Her collection of shoes and purses is so amazing, people have asked her to open her own closet museum! When she is not working as a personal designer, she is hiking and playing pickleball! Do you want to take a look at Dohna's collection?
appearance: Dohna's coat is a light grey color and is covered in grey spots with a darker outline. She has a white belly and snout, with a dark grey nose and sparkly silver inner ears. She has round black eyes with simple eyelashes.

name: Dolan
bio: Time to Tee off with Dolan! A perfect day for Dolan is one where he can play a full 18 holes of golf, with unlimited lemonade.  He knows that good posture is the trick to getting a hole in one. Want him to show you how? Dolan will let you borrow his  clubs!
appearance: Dolan is an red dinosaur with a white belly. He has darker purple spines running down his back and a small red tail. He has light green spots on the top and sides. He has a small smiling mouth and round, black eyes.

name: Dolma
bio: Grab your camera and follow along with Dolma. She's a tour guide who loves to entertain her guests. She loves showing off her city and helping 'Mallows discover new sights to see. Would you like to join her tour?
appearance: Dolma is a black octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including peach, mustard yellow, orange and black). She has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Dolores
bio: Do you know why Dolores crossed the road? She'd love to know! This cheerful chick has a bit to a memory problem. As frustrating as her forgetfulness can be. Dolores has decided to look at the positives--like rewatching mystery movies and remembering friends!
appearance: Dolores is an aqua bird with an off-white belly. She has a pale yellow beak and an aqua comb on top of her head. She has round, black eyes. She wears a large candy pink bow with magenta outlines.

name: Domingo
bio: Domingo has a secret...he loves to sing! This 'Mallow has a beautiful voice too, but he's scared to sing in public. Last week, Domingo and his squad formed a band called Billy's Blues. They practice every day after school. Do you think practicing with Domingo conquers his stage fright?
appearance: Domingo is a mint goat with numerous white markings. These are found inside his ears, in a triangle pattern on his forehead, on his muzzle, his belly and on the underside of his tail. He also has a fluffy white goatee. He has two tan triangular horns and round black eyes, and he is holding an off-yellow egg with purple and mint zigzags as well as a pink heart.

name: Dominic
bio: Dominic's favorite place to visit with his family is the aquarium. He loves watching the colorful fish swim around in their large tanks, visiting the shark lagoon, and touching sea jellies. The highlight of Dominic's day is learning all about the incredible creatures that live in the ocean!
appearance: Dominic is a dragon with a blue tie-dye pattern, ranging from aqua to indigo, and a scaly texture. He has a white nose, inner ears and belly. His horns, the inside of his wings and the spines on his back are all a shimmering pale silver. He has two large black eyes and ice blue nostrils.

name: Dominik
bio: Meet Dominik. He loves shoes! His closet is full to the brim with fancy footwear! That's because he has to buy extra to fit all of his eight feet! He's currently looking for the perfect pair of leather boots to go with his witch costume! Want to help him shop?
appearance: Dominik is a black spider with eight creepy, crawly legs. His legs are orange, black and purple, and are different on either side. He has an orange belly and wears a bow the same color. He has closed, white eyes with short lashes, and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Don
bio: Do not toss that slimy head of lettuce or those used coffee grounds—mail them to Decay With Don! He’ll add them to the skyhigh compost pile that adorns his front lawn and nourishes all the soil in the city. Don's slogan is, “If you don’t compost—you’re toast!” and on that subject…you done with that rye crust yet?
appearance: Don is a charcoal black donkey with a white muzzle with nostrils and blue belly. His long, black floppy ears are blue on the inside. He has a pastel blue mane running down his back and a matching tail. He has mischievous black eyes.

name: Donaver
bio: If you're afraid of the dark give Donaver a call, he loves things that glow at night. He has a collection of cool lava lamps of all shapes and sizes. He even has streamers and stickers that glow for his bike!
appearance: Donaver is a persian blue dragon with a white muzzle with blue nostrils, orange inner ears, silver horns, and green spines on his back. He lays on his belly and has small, blue wings, tail, stubby arms and legs, and black eyes.

name: Donella
bio: When two ghosts love each other very much, they go straight to Donella! This ghoulish wedding planner is an expert at helping happy haunts tie the knot. She especially enjoys working with the maid of horror on her screech, and sampling butterscream frosting for the cake!
appearance: Donella is a green cup of latte with an orange corduroy band around her lower. Her top has whipped cream decorated with purple orange, and green syrup. She has a black bat on the right side of the whipped cream. She has a black and white striped straw on her head. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a black mouth.

name: Donnan
bio: Meet Donnan. This super-smart 'Mallow is a doctor and a scientist! And guess what? She found the cure for hiccups! That's right. You never have to worry about drinking your soda too fast again! When she's not in the lab, Donnan loves to rollerblade of tend to her herb garden.
appearance: Donnan is a black dodo bird with a white mask marking and belly. She has a triangular, white beak with an orange tip. She has fuzzy, black wings with white on the end and a fuzzy, white tail.

name: Donnelly
bio: You can usually find Donnelly with their headphones on making music on their keyboard! They love mixing lo-fi beats and even layering in real life dialogue. Donnelly always gives their tracks a personal touch. follow Donnelly's playlist to hear their latest tunes
appearance: Donnelly is a Neon green macaron with white whipped cream on their head with pink and green sprinkles. they also have white cream in the middle. Donnelly has a rounded black eye with a winking face and a light pink smile.

name: Donnie
bio: Meet Donnie. He loves board games and movie nights; his family plays a new game every month! When he grows up, Donnie wants to open a game store where people can play board games and watch movies.
appearance: Donnie is a bright teal dog with a darker patch on his left eye. He has triangular ears with pale blue inners and a belly the same color. He has a black nose and mouth, and round black eyes ringed in white. He has a white muzzle and a narrow stripe between his eyes. He wears a white, bunny ear headband, which sits between his own ears.

name: Donny
bio: Donny only eats food that start with the letter P. While he sometime thinks it's a little strange—and he's not quite sure why he does this—at least he didn't choose 'Q' or 'Z'. Between pasta, pizza, potatoes he has some pretty great options!
appearance: Donny is a yellow koala with enormous, yellow round ears. His belly and the insides of his ears are fuzzy white. He has a large black nose, as well as round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Donya
bio: Meet Donya. She loves visiting new places and learning a new action sport. Last year, she went white water rafting, then rock climbing on ’Mallow Mountain. This year, she wants to learn to snowboard! There's no sport Donya isn’t brave enough to try!
appearance: Donya is a golden brown cheetah with black spots. Her tummy is white and her eyes are black with white shine. She has a white muzzle with a black nose connected to her open mouth. She also has pink blush.

name: Donyar
bio: Nothing scares Donyar! He's a courageous eel ready to take on any challenge that comes his way. Donyar loves to try new things and experience everything the sea has to offer. All of this adventure helps Donyar invent and design new toys! Want to see his latest creation?
appearance: Donyar is a blue eel with a purple dorsal fin on top of his head with a light blue belly. He also has rounded black eyes with purple nostril with a black wavy mouth. On the back of him he has purple lines.

name: Doodle
bio: Doodle hosts the TV show "Who Wants to Be a Game Show Host?"! Each week, players go head-to-head in challenges like: "Don't Forget the Contestant's Name" or "Consoling the Runner Up." This season's competitors are so strong, Doodle is worried they might be gunning for his spot; good thing he signed a 10-year contract!
appearance: Doodle is an apple pie with tan pastry pie crust and a green pie tin base with dark green at the top and light green on the. He has a dollop of whipped cream with an apple slice. He has round, black eyes with and a smiling mouth.

name: Dookdook
bio: Dookdook didn't have the easiest start on life, but that doesn't mean he isn't living his best one today! From rendezvous with movie star neighbors to doggie bags of fancy French chicken, Dookdook has come a long way from his humble beginnings. His secret? Oodles of optimism and his best friend,Nicolas!
appearance: Dookdook is a teal dog with black and white ears, and a black patch on his left eye with dark teal stiches. He has a tuft of dark teal hair on his head and a scar above his right eye. He has a round white belly with stiches above and a red embroidered with white stiches. He has a round teal nose and round black eyes and mouth with freckles.

name: Doral
bio: Doral makes friends everywhere she goes. Even though this bunny just moved to a new town, she already hops around with a great group of friends after school! With this kind of personality, Doral thinks she can win student Vice President. Does she have your vote?
appearance: Doral is a fuzzy brown bunny with long fuzzy lop ears. She has floral patterned belly and a dark brown nose and mouth. Her eyes are closed, and two black whiskers appear on each side of her face.

name: Doreen
bio: This cheetah-corn loves a good beat, she plays the drums and wants to start her own band. For practice she puts on a show for all her stuffed animals and occasionally her grandparents, they are her biggest fans.
appearance: Doreen is a cheetah with a unicorn horn. She is pink with white spots that are outlined in hot pink. Her horn and inner ears are shimmering hot pink. The spiral of her horn, her muzzle and her belly are white. and features two hearts on her stomach. She has round black eyes with spiky eyelashes.

name: Dorgee
bio: Meet Dorgee. He loves anything outdoorsy and in nature! He is the activities leader at his summer camp and takes his role seriously. So don't forget your sunscreen and your water bottle, and get ready for fun outdoor exploration with Dorgee!
appearance: Dorgee is a light blue seal with a white snout and belly. He's wearing a pink scarf with a floral pattern which is tied in the front.

name: Dorina
bio: Birthdays are extra-special when Dorina’s around. This ‘Mallow loves to celebrate her friends the whole week! She makes cards, sends them a special birthday treat, and loves to sing them a special birthday song.
appearance: Dorina is a cream-colored birthday cake. She has three stripes of icing across her body, the top one being white, the middle pink and the bottom one white again. Below the pink stripe and above the top white stripe there are many sprinkles of many colors. In between the white and pink stripe she has a smiling face, and two black eyes with two eyelashes on each side. On the top of her head, there are three shots of whipped cream. Behind the middle one, there is an orange candle with yellow fire.

name: Dorinda
bio: Dorinda has an MFA in infomercial Acting! She specializes in clumsy antics—like spilling cranberry juice on mattresses, or getting tangled up in garden hoses—but hopes to transition to "disclaimer narration" soon. You should hear how fast she can say "may cause measles!"
appearance: Dorinda is a pangolin. She has a purple shell with purple fish-like gills. She has a lavender face and belly which consists of round, black eyes a purple nose and a black smiling mouth as well as coral blush.

name: Doriz
bio: Doriz is a sassy, rough and tumble 'Mallow.
appearance: Doriz is a macaron with tie-dyed, white and pink macaron shells with pink fuzz separating the shells from the brown cream inside, and they have vanilla frosting on top of their head. They have black irises and hot pink pupils with eyelashes, their left eye is closed, giving them a winking expression alongside their hot pink smile.

name: Dorthea
bio: Meet Dorthea, she loves biking, climbing mountains, and staying busy. Dorthea hates sitting still for so long so don't expect her schedule to be free at the drop of a hat. She's planning a camping trip very soon, would you like to join her?
appearance: Dorthea is a hot pink, purple, indigo and teal owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. there is teal,purple, and magenta letter "E" with wings decorate her chest. She has black eyes with short, straight lashes, and a pink, triangular beak.

name: Dottie
bio: Dottie goes through many phases. Last month, she only ate french fries and Caesar salads! Now Dottie's obsessed with purple things, like acai bowls, lavender wallpaper, and amethyst crystals. What do you think Dottie's next phase will be?
appearance: Dottie is a sea slug with a marbled purple and blue pattern covering her body. She has pale purple, segmented lines running down either side of her body. She has light blue wings with pink tips on each side of her body. Her antennae are the same - light blue with pink tips. Her belly is the same shade of musky pink. She has a winking expression with curly lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Doug
bio: Doug is very smart and an athlete. His favorite sports are basketball and volleyball and he likes to write on rainy days. He loves to play in the mud and sometimes chase squirrels around his yard. When he grows up, Doug wants to be a pilot.
appearance: Doug is a light brown dog with a lighter colored belly. His belly is decorated with two chocolate brown paw prints. His floppy ears and the patch around his left eye are also chocolate colored. He has round, black eyes, a black nose and mouth, and a small pink tongue poking out.

name: Dove
bio: Dove is a flying attendant with a dream: to be the savannah's first crocodile pilot! Though the lions in the cockpit think she's crazy, Dove is determined to prove them wrong—with her sky-high persistence she's bound to!
appearance: Dove has a tie-dye violet body, with a white belly. She has an embroidered snout with two teeth at the front and a further two on each side of her jaw. Her round, black eyes sit on knobs atop her head. A row of charcoal black spikes run along her spine.

name: Doxana
bio: Who's that koala popping her gum? It's Doxana! She loves everything pink and bubbly, from her boba to her clothes .can you guess her favorite flavor?
appearance: Doxana is a teal koala with enormous, rainbow round ears with a pure white belly. She has a large black nose, as well as round eyes and a smiling mouth. She has to grey arms which are holding a lavender boba tea with black tapioca pearls.

name: Doxl
bio: Doxl lives on a farm where he grows organic veggies and herbs. What he doesn't eat, he donates to the local school so the students can have a healthy and organic lunch! When he's not gardening, you can find him playing table tennis with his best friend,Leonori.
appearance: Doxl is an green frog with a striped rainbow belly. His eyes sit on top of his head and are all black. He has prominent nostrils above his smiling mouth, and a pale pink blush on his cheeks.

name: Dr. Hoot
bio: Meet Dr. Hoot. He is busy night and day making sure his hospital remains happy, healthy, and safe. He wears a mask with a big smile so his patients and fellow doctors know he is there to help. When he thinks patients might be scared, he starts to sing them a little song to feel better.
appearance: Dr. Hoot is a soft grey owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on his face and belly. He has a golden, triangular beak and wears circular purple glasses. He wears a white doctor's coat with a purple shirt and tie underneath, a first aid pin on his lapel and a stethoscope around his neck.

name: Drake
bio: Drake is here to take your blood... for donation. Drake aspires to be a nurse, and help others as much as he can. He wants to treat patients and offer them the best care, even on Halloween night!
appearance: Drake is a vampire with pale teal skin and pointed ears. He has slick black hair with a pronounced widow's peak, thick, triangular eyebrows and a black belly. He wears a red bow tie. He has a broad smile with large, white fangs protruding.

name: Dray
bio: Meet Dray. He is an expert typer by day and a professional cartoon watcher by night. If you couldn't tell, Dray is one busy 'Mallow! In case you're wondering, Dray has hot takes on animation styles that he'd love to discuss. Have you seen any good cartoons lately?
appearance: Dray is a sasquatch with a fuzzy, blue flannel winter hat on his head over his fuzzy, brown hair. He has a light brown body with a cream colored belly and face. He has round, black eyes and smiling mouth with small white fangs.

name: Dreamy
bio: Meet Dreamy, She loves to sing- she has a little song for almost everything. Instead of doing a happy dance, she has a happy song. She has a beautiful voice that you can't help but sing along with. Will you sing with Dreamy?
appearance: Each of Dreamy white clouds have faces, the left has her eyes closed with a open smile and cheeks. Her right cloud is winking with a open smile and cheeks. Her rainbow is the colored melon, light melon, pink, yellow, sky blue, and blue.

name: Drella
bio: Drella and her sisterMarinaare complete opposites. Marina loves to play outside while Drella would rather stay inside and play video games. Drella's favorite thing about spring is the rainy days.
appearance: Drella is mostly white with patches of dark brown on her lower right side, her lower left side, over her right eye, and on the back of her right ear. She has small, pale yellow horns and oval black eyes. Her muzzle is white with dark brown nostrils. She has dark brown hooves and a white tail that has a dark brown tip. There is a large pink flower and a smaller blue flower stitched onto her stomach. Her 2021 edition has light brown patches, a pink muzzle with pink nostrils, and a colorful Easter egg stitched onto her stomach.

name: Drella the Dog
bio: Meet Drella. She loves playing catch with her friends, sprinkles on her cupcakes, and loves to climb. She loves to hike and see how far she can get. Maybe one day she'll climb to the top of Mallow Mountain!
appearance: Drella is a peach dog with a white belly. Her belly is decorated with two orange paw prints. Her floppy ears and the patch around her left eye are also orange. She has round, black eyes, a black nose and mouth, and a small pink tongue poking out.

name: Drew
bio: Drew is a confident little creature who has a passion for baseball! When he is not playing in the fantasy league, he likes going on magical adventures to new stadiums. Drew's creative mind loves learning new languages and hopes to one day become an airplane engineer so he can travel to all the enchanted stadiums!
appearance: Drew is a mint-green dragon with a white nose and belly. His horns, the inside of his wings and the spines on his back are all glittery silver. He has two large black eyes.

name: Drow
bio: Meet Drow. He doesn't use his wings much because he's afraid of heights! But what he lacks in flying skills, he makes up for with his funky dance moves. But be warned, if you catch him on the dance floor, he might challenge you to a friendly dance-off!
appearance: Drow is a lavender purple dragon with a white nose. His inner ears, wing membranes and belly are sky blue with shiny, metallic blue-green scales. He has blue spikes running down his spine and glittery silver horns atop his head. He also has two large round black eyes and blue nostrils.

name: Duane
bio: Whoosh! That's the sound of Duane cutting through the ice rink with his triple axel. When Duane really wants to dazzle the judges at competitions, he uses his wings to lift over the ice. Duane ice skates year-round and hopes to one day turn it into his full-time career!
appearance: Duane is a griffon, a mythical creature that combines a lion and an eagle. Duane's head which is white, which ends in a row of feathers. He has fluffy blue puffs on either side of his head, round black eyes and a sharp blue beak. His body is cyan with a lighter colored belly. The wings on either side of his body are white, with long blue feathers on the tip. He has a long, white tail with a fuzzy, blue tip. He also has a white snowflake embroidered on his belly.

name: Ducel
bio: Ducel just graduated with a music degree! She’s thinking about teaching music at the local high school, but for now, Ducel plays bass in her bestie’s band, The Brite Shells! Ducel loves playing music with her friends and is getting ready for their next live show. Will she see you there?
appearance: Ducel is a multi-colored Easter egg. Her face is teal. The top half of her body is an eggshell consisting of yellow and red waves. The bottom half of her body is an eggshell with cool grey, purple waves. The purple wave is decorated with large red dots. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Duchess
bio: Duchess loves her "me time". She pampers herself with cucumber cooling eye masks, bubble baths, and of course, soothing temple massages. Despite Duchess' needed alone time, she absolutely loves a Spa Day with her friends. Would you care to join them?
appearance: Duchess is a hot pink deer with a white face and belly. She also has white inner ears and speckles on her forehead. She has glittering, silver antlers on top of her head. Her nose and mouth are hot pink, and she has round, black eyes with short lashes. She has a heart motif on her belly featuring a small, hot pink heart on top of a larger blue one.

name: Duffy
bio: When you look into Duffy's big puppy eyes, you can't help but fall in love. He is a snuggly, playful champion, perfect to join any family.  Don't forget to give him a treat every once in a while.
appearance: Duffy is a golden brown dog with floppy, chocolate colored ears. He has round white markings above his eyes which resemble eyebrows, as well as a white muzzle and belly. His eyes are cartoon-like eyes which they are brown,and his nose and mouth are black. He also has "LOVE" that is pink with a big hot pink heart on his belly.

name: Duke
bio: Duke and his brotherDominicare both fascinated by the ocean! Duke pretends that he is a deep-sea diver and wishes he could swim down to see the creatures who live at the bottom of the ocean.
appearance: Duke is a dragon with a dark green tie-dye pattern, ranging from apple to olive, and a scaly texture. He has a white nose, inner ears and belly. His horns, the inside of his wings and the spines on his back are all a shimmering chrome color. He has two large black eyes and green nostrils.

name: Dulce
bio: Dulce works a part-time as a gift wrapper and makes the most beautiful bows. Even though the holidays can get stressful, she is dedicated to her work. She's saving up to move across the world, one city at a time. If you need help wrapping on present, you know who to call!
appearance: Dulce is white peppermint with two different colored swirls, such as red and green. She has black rounded eyes.

name: Duma
bio: Duma loves hanging with besties and is a bigtime fashionista. She also holds a softball record for bases stolen, because she's super-fast!
appearance: Duma is a leopard with a tan coat which is covered in brown spots with a black outline. Rainbow splotches also decorate her body, though pink is notably more prominent than other colors. She has pointed, black ears with tan and white details on the inside. Her muzzle and large paws are white, with hot pink details for her nose and paw pads. She has large, cartoon eyes with black pupils and black whiskers sprouting from her muzzle.

name: Duna
bio: Duna collects everything! She especially fond of tiny things like soap bars, seashells, and sticky notes. Her family has asked her to donate some of her extra collections, but she never had a heart to do it. For Duna, everything she collects is important to her. What do you collect?
appearance: Duna is a yellow dumbo octopus, a type of umbrella octopus (meaning their arms are connected by a web of skin). Her tentacles flare out from his body in a flower-like shape and are light yellow. She also has yellow fins on his head which resemble ears and have light yellow inner ears. She have a open black eyes with lashes on both eyes, pink blush and a smiling mouth.

name: Duncan
bio: If you've got a problem, Duncan can probably solve it. He's an all-around handy dinosaur who always has his tool belt with him. He's an aspiring architect and loves to map out his own blue prints in his spare time.
appearance: Duncan is a pale mint with a white belly. He has light mint spines running down his back. He has a smiling mouth and round, black eyes.

name: Dungaree
bio: Dungaree isn'ttryingto drag out jury duty and stay with her 11 new besties for as long as possible... she just has a lot of questions! Like:What does "guilty" mean? Can we do the trial again, just in case we missed something? You guys promise we'll still talk after this, right?
appearance: Dungaree is a pink owl with fuzzy wings, a short tail, and a cream belly with yellow feathers embroidered on it. They have an cream face that curves inwards by the center top surrounded by white feathers. They wear a green gingham scarf. Their beak is triangular and yellow, and they have black rounded eyes with eyelashes.

name: Dunie
bio: Dunie went on his first skydive today! He was very nervous all morning, but once he was suited up on the plane, he actually got super excited. Now he feels like a bravest 'Mallow  ever. Dunie is going sky diving again next year with some friends, and you're invited!
appearance: Dunie has a hot pink color on his body with 3 colors: Pale Pink, Teal, Light Blue gills on either side of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a white belly. He has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Dunkie
bio: Meet Dunkie. She’s planning her next tropical vacation! She can’t wait to snorkel, try new foods, and hang with her friends. She is loud and boisterous and always orders dessert for the table! Pack your suitcase and come with!
appearance: Dunkie is a brown bison with tan ears and nose. Her horns are white and she has a soft beard and head. She has two large black eyes.

name: Duranga
bio: The second she turns on the computer, Duranga the soft-spoken art student, becomes Duranga the Magnificent--a heroic goblin princess! This imaginative online gamer loves casting spells, saving princes and vanquishing dragons. If you ask nicely, she might event gift you some XP!
appearance: Duranga is a blue raccoon with black markings around his eyes. Above these are white marks which resemble eyebrows. Her belly is fluffy blue, and Duranga has a snout are white, and there is a thin ring of white around her raccoon round black eyes too.

name: Duranza
bio: Duranza is a super friendly dragon! They say hello to every person they see and always hold the door open for strangers. Once a week, Duranza hands out flowers to everyone in their apartment building, calling this, "Daisies from Duranza"! Duranza is on their way to give you a little bouquet!
appearance: Duranza is a pastel rainbow dragon with a white snout, inner ears, and inner wings. Their horns and the spines on their back are glittery silver. They have two large closed black eyes. On their belly they have a big pink heart with hot pink words "XOXO".

name: Duster
bio: Duster loves taking power naps! He sleeps just fine at night, but there is something special about laying down for a cozy naps. Duster says he gets a best ideas fro new drawings after waking up from the nap, and its always put him in a great mood for the rest of the day!
appearance: Duster is a bright red dinosaur with a white belly. He have sparkly red spines running down their back. He has a smiling mouth with a row of pointed teeth and round, black eyes. A snowflake emblem decorates their belly.

name: Dustin
bio: Original:Meet Dustin. This active little pup is always ready for adventure. He was once a rescue pup so he knows a thing or two about rescuing others! When he is not training for a frisbee contest he is volunteering at his local fire station. Join Dustin on his next adventure.
appearance: Dustin is a white dog with black spots. He has floppy black ears and a large black nose. His muzzle and belly are pure white. He has round, black eyes with a white rim.

name: Dylan
bio: Meet Dylan; he loves soccer, swimming and race cars. Dylan wants to play soccer, but he gets teased for having wings on the field. His mom tells him not to worry, because one day those wings will help him score a goal. Do you want to play soccer with Dylan?
appearance: Dylan is a sage green dragon with dark green scales, silver horns and a white nose; he also has black eyes.

name: Earling
bio: Earling knows any round root vegetable makes for a perfect jack-o’-lantern! He carves a whole assortment each season using turnips, parsnips, and of course, gourds. These smaller veggies can be challenging to carve. But Earling thinks they look so cute all lit up together!
appearance: Earling is a mushroom with a green stalk and a lime green cap with yellow spots and a light green belly. He has green bat ears with cream inner ears and light green wings. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Eartha
bio: Eartha loves the smell of extra-strong hairspray. It always reminds her of performing in her middle-school dance troupe and fills her heart with nostalgic glee! Though she sometimes misses being on stage. Eartha likes teaching even better. Her studio's spring recital is this Friday—you don't want to miss it!
appearance: Eatha is a lavender seahorse with a white belly, segmented by pink lines. She has purple fins atop his head and on her sides, with the side fins having a glitter finish. She has a small purple dorsal fin on her back with a curled tail. Her snout is purple with a dark purple outline. Her eyes are black with lashes, and she wears a pink headband with a silver heart design on the front.

name: Earworm
bio: Earworm is putting together a ghoul group! This macabre music mogul is seeking the perfect blend of bone-chilling and blood-curdling and invites all souls, spirits, and skeletons to audition. Come prepared with a 16-bar cut of your favorite Halloween song and be ready to wake dance!
appearance: Earworm is a purple monster with black horns, a grey striped belly and a silver patch over their right eye. They wears a top hat with a grey stripe and a white button with a black  thread. They have black round eyes with a winking expression, they have a wide mouth with sharp, white teeth poking out from under their mouth.

name: Easton
bio: Meet Easton. Scared of the dark? Don't worry, Easton will light your way! This bright 'Mallow always has a smile on his face and something fun and interesting to talk about! He loves deep talks with friends over passion fruit shaved ice. Want to join?
appearance: Easton is an anglerfish, a type of deep-sea fish. He is tie-dyed purple color with white paint splatter. He has a grey belly and grey fins on either side of his body. He has a long appendage protruding from his forehead with a shiny, silver end representing the light anglerfish have. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with four sharp, white teeth sticking up from his mouth.

name: Eaton
bio: Eaton hops to solve some life's biggest mysteries. Who ate the last slice of carrot cake? Where did his favorite socks go? Eaton even keeps a detective journal, as all good detectives do! Want to search for clues with Eaton?
appearance: Eaton is a cyan bunny with the body covers in chocolate and brown nuts. He has a teal bowtie and has cyan outer ears with brown in the inner ears. He has round, black eyes with and a pink gold nose and mouth along with dual black whiskers.

name: Edden
bio: Edden is quite the little matchmaker. She loves finding a spark that creates long-lasting relationships. Need any advice? Edden is your girl!
appearance: Edden is a unicorn with tie-dye pattern which includes purple, fuchsia and lilac, to name a few shades. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly pink horn with a darker pink swirl wrapped around it. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes. On her chest she has a design with three hearts; the smallest is pink, the middle is blue and the largest is purple.

name: Edelweiss
bio: Edelweiss is the reigning queen of the haute couture Halloween costume scene. Best known for her 'little black witch's dress,' her minimalist take on trick-or-treat fashion has made her a worldwide sensation. Her fall collection is entitled Reflections on the Treat Pail and she can't wait to show it!
appearance: Edelweiss is a jester. She wears a jester hat with purple on the left side and navy blue on the right side with her face poking out. There are two pom poms on each side of her hat one navy blue one on the left and one purple on the right. She wears a pink and maroon striped outfit with purple buttons and a black ruffle. She has mischievous eyes with purple make up above and below her eyes and a red smile

name: Eden
bio: In the mornings before high tide, Eden climbs the hills and wedges through a cave that opens up to a beautiful secret beach! This is where Eden hosts post-hike bagel picnics for her friends and family that come along on the adventure. Want her to show you the way?
appearance: Eden is a Tie-dye bigfoot. She has a large fuzzy purple, pink, and blue tie-dye mane with long, shaggy ears. She has a face with a blank emotion with eyelashes and pink blush. Eden also has two feet, each one with sky blue heart-shaped pads with 3 toes.

name: Edie
bio: Have you heard the weekly weather report? Make sure you tune in to Edie's Eggcellent Weather Report to find out! Edie loves to talk about the weather and always tries to dress the part. Her favorite ensemble is a jumpsuit with lightning bolts that glow in the dark!
appearance: Edie is a multi-colored Easter egg. Her face is pink. The top half of her body is an eggshell consisting of yellow and green waves. The bottom half of her body is an eggshell with blue, purple, and green waves. The purple wave is decorated with large yellow dots. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Edita
bio: Meet Edita. She dreams of being a travel blogger. She loves to travel and is always taking photos of her favorite transportation method - the subway. She hopes to make travel safer for 'Mallows like her who want to travel alone, so if you have any advice she's all ears.
appearance: Edita is a burrito with round, black eyes, curled lashes and an open, smiling mouth. Her body is made up of a tortilla tucked into a folded silver wrap. Meat, tomato, lettuce and cheese spill out from the top of the tortilla.

name: Edmund
bio: Though he can easily fly down the mountain, Edmund loves to show off his crunchy moves and feel the fresh snow under his board. This is one pterodactyl who loves cruisin' down the slopes.
appearance: Edmund has a brown body with white tie dyed rings on it. He has a round beige snout with two brown nostrils and a black smile and eyes. Edmund has the same tie dye pattern on his outside wings with plain beige inner wings. He also has a beige stomach.

name: Edna
bio: Edna is a theater critic for the Playground Post! She recently gave a rave review to the end-of-year recital—Frostbite Memories of a Snowflake—but did take issue with the lead actress. Namely, why wasn't it Edna?
appearance: Edna in a pink and red mug of latte. The mug has two stripes pink on top, a stripe of red on the lower half and a red handle. The brown coffee has a white latte art pattern on top. She has closed, happy eyes with short lashes, pink blush and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Eduardo
bio: Eduardo is a little shy but a loyal friend to have, he is kind to everyone he meets. He enjoys playing video games or even going camping with his brothers, they always have a good time.
appearance: Eduardo has a blue body. His stomach is tan. He has black eyes with white surrounding them, a tan nose and a black smile. He has white markings on each side of his eyes.

name: Edward
bio: Edward is always ready for the next adventure! This patriotic Squishmallow loves history and shares some of his favorite tales with his Squishmallow pals. Fun fact about Edward: he can remember almost every name in history! And his favorite holiday? You guessed it, the 4th of July! Join this little eagle on his next expedition.
appearance: Edward is a bird with a white head and a pointed orange beak. He has a white ruff around his neck, separating his white head from his brown body. He has fluffy brown wings and a tan colored belly.

name: Edwin
bio: Tick-tock, tick-tock—welcome to Edwin's clock shop. This punctual pie sells some pretty strange timepieces. Like grandmother clocks that smell like apple pie, or stopwatches that fly around the room! Just don't be late—he locks up right at 5pm!
appearance: Edwin is a banana cream pie with a yellow lemon top and a tan base and white meringue with brown sprinkles and a lemon slice. He has round eyes with lashes and a black smile.

name: Effie
bio: This is one toy obsessed 'Mallow, she loves to review toys and share them all with her squad. Effie reviews new toys and then donates them for other mini 'mallows to enjoy. Do you have any toys to share with Effie?
appearance: Effie is a tie-dyed leopard with pink spots, her ears are round with her inner ears being a glittery silver and a long tail. She has a white belly and muzzle with a pastel purple nose and curved mouth. Her eyes are black with lashes on them.

name: Efua
bio: Meet Efua. They are a sleepy owl by day and an exclusive chef by night. If you can score an invite to one of their pop-up eateries, you're in luck! What's on the menu? A yummy sweet and sour soup, just be sure to let it cool first!
appearance: Efua is a pale teal owl with round, dark teal wings on either side of their body. They have triangular ear tufts and wear a silver bow on the left. They also wear huge, round glasses with a chartreuse (yellow-green) frame and white lenses. They have closed, happy eyes with short lashes and a triangular, pastel pink beak. Grey feathers decorate the center of their chest.

name: Egbert
bio: Egbert manages his college radio station. He has his own show Tuesday and Thursday nights-call in and request a song! Sometimes Egbert interviews students and professors or will update listeners on important school events. Will you tune in to Egbert's radio show?
appearance: Egbert is a multi-colored Easter egg. His face is teal. The top half of his body is an eggshell consisting of purple and grey waves. The bottom half of his body is an eggshell with yellow, pink, and grey waves. The pink wave is decorated with large grey dots. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Eiko
bio: If you like to dress up and have fancy dinners, you'll love hanging out with Eiko. Eiko believes in dressing for a special occasion, but for him, every event is special! His awards season parties are known to be the best among all his friends. Don't worry, your invitation is on its way!
appearance: Eiko has a teal body with teal, sea green, and cream-colored tentacles. He wears a black top hat with a red ribbon, and a red heart-shaped monocle. Eiko has a thick black moustache and round black eyes.

name: Eileen
bio: Eileen started a community event called Spring Seeds. On the first day of spring, town residents are encouraged to plant a seed of anything they like and share the growth progress throughout the year. Eileen even sends pictures of her sprouting plant to the weekly paper. Imagine all the gorgeous gardens this will create!
appearance: Eileen is a butterfly with shades ranging from hot pink to coral to blush, as well as a paint splatter pattern on top. She has a pink belly with thin pink stripes across it.
