Her wings and antenna are a combination of candy pink and cream. Her cream antennae end in pink pom-poms. She has black eyes with two short eyelashes on each, pink blushing cheeks and a smiling red mouth.

name: Eitan
bio: Eitan was having a difficult time in law school until he discovered mediation. It's the perfect law career for him! Eitan is a great listener and always aims to resolve arguments peacefully. This 'Mallow is working from the courthouse today—he hopes to make a good impression!
appearance: Eitan is a minty green Red Panda with white round eyebrows, whiskers, muzzle, and ears. He pops out of a matcha boba drink with brown tapioca pearls, a matcha leaf on his head, and a white and tan striped straw.

name: Elanor
bio: Meet Elanor. She is one lucky pup because sometimes she gets to go to work with her mom. Elanor loves those days because she has a lot of friends and toys to play with while she's there. She loves having a day for fun, would you like to tag along one day?
appearance: Elanor is a white dog with a pale grey patch over her right eye. Her ears are large and floppy, standing up from her head. She has a pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls, with an upturned, dark grey nose and round black eyes. She has a pale pink belly and wears a black bandana with a white skull print around her neck.

name: Elda
bio: Elda is a dance teacher who also fixes cars. When she was little, she just couldn't decide what she wanted to be when she grew up! Her friends used to laugh when she said she could do both but now they come to her when they need a tune-up or an extra salsa lesson.
appearance: Elda is a pink ostrich with a small, oblong beak. She has round, black eyes with thin eyelashes and narrow, angled nostrils. Her back, wings and body are covered in rainbow striped feathers. She is often mistaken for an emu, a peacock, a pig or a piñata; however, she has been confirmed to be an ostrich.

name: Elea
bio: Meet Elea, This environmental hero is on a mission to save the world. She enjoys the outdoors because there's so much to explore and discover. She feel strongly about protecting the planet and doing her best to play her part. Will you join her mission to save the world?
appearance: Elea is a dark grey sheep. Her tummy and inner ears are white with multicolor flowers in it. She has round black eyes with short lashes. Her mouth is black and her nose is grey.

name: Eleanor
bio: Eleanor didn't learn to read as fast as the other ’Mallows. Now that she can, she can't stop! Her favorite book is the one about the sixteen-foot mouse and she hopes to meet the author someday. Maybe Eleanor will become a writer herself!
appearance: Eleanor is a sliced grapefruit, with yellow skin on the outside, and white on her face and belly. The pink markings on her belly represent the sections of a grapefruit. The top of her head sports a short green stem with a single leaf. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and a pink smile. She wears a pink flower.

name: Eleni
bio: Eleni is trying out for the Halloumi High Cheer Squad! Well—trying for the opportunity to try out. She'll also have to pass the timed state capitol quiz, of course. And then there's the interview, the cannonball contest... no matter. Put this Capricorn under pressure and she'll shine like a diamond
appearance: Eleni is a blue and white of crinkle-cut fries. She has yellow crinkle-cut fries inside of her box. Her box has a blue stripe on the upper part of the box and has a white stripe in the middle and blue strip below. She has round black, with lashes eyes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Eli
bio: Eli wants a hug when it gets dark out, will you comfort Eli with a hug?
appearance: Eli is a grey elephant in the style of a Hug Mee. They have a white belly and pink inner ears with white hearts decorated across it. They have a large trunk and 'Love you tons!' written in grey and pink with two small pink hearts around it.

name: Eliana
bio: Do you want to work on a puzzle with Eliana? She can be a tiny bit shy, but when she's working on a puzzle you can bet she gets excited, especially if it's a big one. Right now she's trying to finish one with 1500 pieces!
appearance: Eliana is a bunny with a cloud-like pattern on her body, a blend of pale blue and white. She has long, floppy ears and a white belly. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and a pale pink nose and mouth.

name: Elida
bio: Looking for some help on your next big project? Give Elida a call, she is an A+ Project Manager who loves to lend a helping hand! Elida loves organization and keeping everything in check, she says that's her happy place. What keeps her organized you ask, her lucky, pink planner!
appearance: Elida is a purple cat with black leopard spots all over. She has pink inside her ears and a grey belly. She has round black eyes, with a white circle around them, black whiskers and a pink nose and mouth.

name: Elin
bio: Elin loves math and is the treasurer and founding member of the math club at school. Her mission is to help others understand how math can be fun and a valuable skill for all. One day she wants to be an accountant!
appearance: Elin is a pink lotus, a type of flower. She has layered pink petals which are darker at the base with a gradient fading to light pink at the tips. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Elina
bio: Elina is a food critic and writes reviews for all the new restaurants in town. Though she can be harsh, she has excellent taste and is very kind with her words. When she's not writing about food, you can find her tending to her garden or gearing up for a hike.
appearance: Elina is a light purple bird with stubby wings and an extravagant feathered tail. Both her belly and the tips of her tail are white. Three dark purple feathers sit atop her head. She has a small, orange beak and round black eyes with curled lashes.

name: Elio
bio: Meet Elio! Come wintertime he's a total homebody. This 'Mallow is delighted to spend all his free time napping on the sofa or cooking himself a hot and fulfilling meal. Elio keeps his home neat and tidy by cleaning a little bit each day. Grab a blanket and kick back with Elio!
appearance: Elio is a brown cup of peppermint mocha with chocolate pouring out the tip of his head. He has a white lid and whipped cream decorated with red and green sprinkles, a holly, and a candy cane. He has pink blush, a red smile, and black eyes with eyelashes.

name: Elisa
bio: Sparkles, sci-fi, and fuzzy slippers are some of Elisa's favorite things. This cheetah-corn is not a morning person but she's always ready for an adventure. On the weekends you can find her doing yoga or snoozing in the sun, with her favorite smoothie on deck!
appearance: Elisa is a cheetah-corn, a combination of acheetahand aunicorn. Elisa's coat is powder blue and is covered in light grey spots with a teal outline. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a teal nose and black mouth. She has a sparkling blue horn with matching inner ears.

name: Elisabetha
bio: Elisabetha collects geodes! After learning about minerals and crystals in school, Elisabetha got motivated to do some geode collecting herself. Right now her favorite is opal. She could stare off at the pearly glow for hours! Do you have a favorite mineral?
appearance: Elisabetha is a cream cup of ice cream sundae with a fuzzy pink base below. On top of her head is a swirl of soft serve with chocolate and strawberry syrup and a cherry on the right side. There is a striped pink and white spoon poking out from the left side of the soft serve. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, and a smiling pink mouth.

name: Elise
bio: Activist filmmaker Elise just wrapped on their passion project docuseries 'The Heaviest Feather'. This pastoral portrait follows a courageous coup of hens who decide to unionize! Elise practices their awards speech nightly—not due overconfidence—but so they remember to thank all 127 'Mallows in the cast and crew!
appearance: Elise is a pink French bulldog with a light pink belly with two Sakura flowers one white and one pink. They have pink, triangular ears with light pink inner ears. They wear a light pink beret on the right side of her head. She has a light pink pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls and a rounded black nose.

name: Eliza
bio: Congratulations to Eliza! This budding television writer was just hired on "You Have the Night to Remain Silent, a Christmas-themed crime drama, Her shoplifting elf sample script was so chilling, the head writer almost spit out his candy cane!
appearance: Eliza is a peach pig. She has triangular peach ears and grey inner ears. She has a grey patch on the right side of her eye and a grey on the left side of her and has a grey belly. She has round, black eyes and a grey muzzle with pink nostrils.

name: Elizabella
bio: Helping others is something Elizabella values very much, this year she wants to start volunteering! She has just one problem: she doesn't know what she should do first. Can you help her decide?
appearance: Elizabella is a bunny with a rainbow base coat, including colors such as peach, green and sky blue. She is covered in powder blue spots with a darker, sky blue outline. Her ears are long and floppy. She has a white belly, a light pink nose and mouth and a pair of round, black eyes with two short lashes.

name: Elizabeth
appearance: Elizabeth is a pink unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly pink horn. She has black eyes with curled eyelashes.

name: Ella
bio: Ella is a talented ballerina who dreams of attending the Squishmallow Consevatory. Just like her older sisterLola, she loves to visit new places. She plans on joining a traveling dance company after the Conservatory in order to see the world!
appearance: Ella is a turquoise unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. Her belly, nose and inner ears are all white, and her nostrils are light pink. She has a short metallic golden horn with a gold swirl wrapped around it. She has black closed eyes with short eyelashes.

name: Elle
bio: Lights, camera action! Looking for Elle? She is the creative eye of the friend group. Elle loves to direct music videos, short films and video tutorials with her favorite Squishmallows cast and crew.
appearance: Elle is a bright purple penguin with a white face and belly. She has a large orange beak and closed eyes with very short lashes.

name: Ellen
bio: Ellen is a barista who does the most amazing latte art! Hearts, paisley patterns, and beautifully detailed leaves are just some of the designs she creates with espresso and foam. Swing by her coffee shop and let her whip you up something tasty and artistic!
appearance: Ellen is a light purple fuzzy seal with a darker belly and snout. She has round black eyes and whiskers.

name: Ellette
bio: Meet Ellette! He looks bite sized, but he has a king sized personality! He even hands out king sized candy bars at his castle every Halloween. Ellette brings fun and laughter everywhere he goes. If you catch him at the right time, he'll even sing a song for you! What song would you like to hear Ellette sing?
appearance: Ellette is a bright orange owl with prominent, purple ear tufts and white markings on his face and belly. He has round, black eyes and a triangular yellow beak. He is dressed as a vampire with a lime green waistcoat, black pants and a purple bow-tie. He also wears a black cape lined in shiny purple fabric.

name: Ellie
bio: Are you ready to have tons of fun? Meet Ellie the elephant! This elephant is not your average gal, she loves making her friends smile and is quite the comedian. Ellie enjoys spending summers abroad and spends the holidays with her loved ones.
appearance: Ellie is a light grey elephant. She has large, floppy ears with pale purple on the inside, and an embroidered trunk. She has closed eyes with curled lashes. Her white belly has the phrase 'Love You Tons' embroidered in red cursive writing, accompanied by a two tiny pink and purple hearts.

name: Elliene
bio: Elliene loves spreading the joy of reading so much that she's built a tiny free library in her front yard. She's decorated it with colorful flowers and filled it with all of her favorite books. Anyone can stop by and take one. All are welcome!
appearance: Elliene is a bird with a colorful gradient which fades from red on her head through yellow and into green at her base. She has fluffy, lime green wings and a white tuft atop her head. She has round, black eyes, a large yellow beak and a white belly.

name: Elliot
bio: Elliot isNick's little helper. He is second in command to make the holidays as sweet as the Squishmallows are. He enjoys eating the cookies that Nick leaves behind on Christmas Day. Shh don't tell Santa!
appearance: Elliot is an elf with pointed ears and pink-toned skin. He has a round nose, black eyes and a smiling mouth. He wears an elf costume which is forest green with red trims, including a band around the base of his hat and a pointed collar around his neck. He has a yellow pom pom on the end of his hat. He wears a black belt with a gold buckle, and has a yellow and red button adoring his top.

name: Ellison
bio: Ellison and his Squad started a punk band! What do you think of his outfit? Ellison wants to make sure he really looks the part. He's even trying to play his bass a little sloppier so the band can sound more punk rock. Stop by rehearsal and check it out!
appearance: Ellison is a maroon toad with a plaid belly. His mischievous eyes sit on top of his head, and are black rimmed in white. He has prominent nostrils above his smiling mouth, and pink blush on his cheeks. His back is covered in black splotches.

name: Ellixsa
bio: Ellixsa knows that you can't rush the good things in life. That's why she takes everything nice and slow. After finishing her homework, she loves doing yoga or reading in her hammock in the backyard. She believes life is about enjoying the moment no matter what you're doing.
appearance: Ellixsa is a sky blue butterfly with rainbow striped antennae. Her wings are also rainbow striped on the inside, and cobalt blue with white spots on the outside. She has a shiny, silver belly striped in pink. She has round eyes with short lashes, pink cheeks and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Elodie
bio: Are you ready for arts & crafts? Join Elodie for some crafting fun! Her favorite colors are pink and red and she loves to mix and match her DIY home decor. If you need some DIY inspiration or want to spend the day crafting, give Elodie a call!
appearance: Elodie is a rainbow-pastel octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles. Her eyes are black and round; she also has a smiling mouth.

name: Eloise
bio: Original:Meet Eloise, the chicest cat in town! This kitty is known for her impeccable taste in style. When she is not on the runway she enjoys crafting with different colors on new creations. Are you ready to see Eloise's next collection?
appearance: Eloise is a tabby cat with tie-dyed blue and purple fur. She has darker purple stripes on her head and sides. She has a white belly and inner ears to match, as well as a white muzzle. Her nose and mouth are purple, framed by black whiskers, and she has round, black eyes with curled eyelashes.

name: Elpha
bio: Elpha is prepping a goodie bag for her bestieClara'sbirthday. Elpha likes to go to her local store, pick out a pretty gift bag, then fill it up with items from all over the store! This gift bag has makeup, fun hair clips, coloring pens, and a mini planner. Now it's time to write an extra special card.
appearance: Elpha is an off-white cupcake with brown frosting, decorated with rainbow sprinkles with hearts. She has a heart-shaped cherry on top. Her bottom half is red with dark red, vertical stripes. She has round, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth and hot pink blush on each cheek.

name: Elsa
bio: Elsa wants to be a teacher when she grows up. She spends her time helping her friends with their homework and DIY projects when she's not in school.
appearance: Elsa is a pink lamb with a cream colored face. She has round, black eyes, lashes, embroidered oval cheeks, and a smiling mouth.

name: Elson
bio: You can always find Elson snacking on crispy treats like kelp or starfish chips to help regulate his blood sugar. Elson loves to play hide and seek during recess, and even though he finds all the best hiding spot, sometimes you can still hear him quietly crunching while hes tucked behind a rock!
appearance: Elson is an eel that has dark reddish orange skin with his belly being a light orange color.  His dorsal fin (fin that runs all the way from his head to his mid-back) is an even darker reddish orange than his main color. He has three lines that go across his back along with twelve dots. His tail is in the shape of a lightning bolt.

name: Elton
bio: Elton is always up to something! Whether he’s tinkering with a watch, a truck or a toy, he’s fascinated by the way things work!
appearance: Elton is a peach monkey with rounded ears which sit low on his head, in line with his face. He has a pale yellow-pink heart-shaped face, with the same color on the insides of his ears and on his belly. He has a peach nose, along with black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Elvio
bio: Elvio is usually a quiet 'Mallow, but not when it comes to participating in big celebrations with his friends and family! Thats why his favorite holiday is Día de los Muertos. The parade and parties start tonight want to join in the festivities?
appearance: Elvio is a sugar glider, a type of possum which can glide using wing-like membranes. He is primarily black with a white lower face and belly which is decorated in a sugar skull design He has orange markings in stripes covering each eye with two green flowers, a large stripe starting at his head and running down his back, on the tip of his tail and on the outer front side of his 'wings'. His inner ears are green. He has round, black eyes and a peach nose and mouth.

name: Elysa
bio: Introducing... Elysa! This slow slug moves at a leisurely pace. Instead of focusing on running quickly through life, Elysa slides down the road, observing and appreciating the complex and beautiful world around her. If you are in need of an intellectual and deep conversation, Elysa is your girl!
appearance: Elysa is a snail with a white body and a shimmery, silver belly. She has two antennae which stand up on her head. Her shell has a tie-dyed pattern and is predominantly blue and purple in color. She has closed eyes with short lashes and a pink, smiling mouth.

name: Emani
bio: Emani is Nicole's right-hand elf. She helps keep the North Pole running and makes sure all the elves, reindeer, and even Santa himself are on schedule. What's her secret to success? Naps, cute planners, and being fearless.
appearance: Emani is an African American elf with pointed ears and black hair worn in braids. She wears a red, double-tailed Santa hat with a white pom-pom on each tail and a green band around the base. She wears a green shirt which has a white collar with triangular points, a pale green placket and two golden buttons. Her bottom half is solid red.

name: Emela
bio: Meet Emela. When she's not in her greenhouse tending to her orchids, you can find her at the farmer's market picking out the perfect peaches to make fresh jam. Emela is the best houes guest because she always brings homemade treats and flowers. Would you like a visit from Emela?
appearance: Emela is a pale green lamb with a peach colored face. Her nose is lime green, matching her inner ears, and shaped like a heart. She has round, black eyes, short lashes and a sweet, smiling mouth. She has a sparkly, bright green bow atop her head and a green clover design embroidered on her white belly.

name: Emerald
bio: Emerald is a talented psychic who enjoys helping meteorologists predict when it's going to rain. When she isn't  at the weather  station you can find Emerald playing Go Fish, a card game she's particulary talented at. Got any 3s?
appearance: Emerald is a galaxy style rainbow seahorse with a lavender belly, segmented by purple lines. She has fins atop her head and on her sides, all of which are lilac Her snout also is lavendar at its center. She also has round black eyes.

name: Emery
bio: Emery is the queen of caffeine! She loves to have friends over for coffee so she can show off her barista skills. She loves to make fancy coffee concoctions with rose petals, lavender, and even gold foil. What can Emery make for you?
appearance: Emery is a Latte drink in a pink mug. The mug has three shades of pink: pale pink on top, a stripe of coral pink on the lower half and a musk pink handle. The brown coffee has a white latte art pattern on top. Emery has closed, happy eyes with short lashes, pink blush and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Emil
bio: Rise and shine! Emil is a total morning 'Mallow. He wakes up at sunrise each morning, full of energy. Emil starts the day with a run through the park, then breakfast at his favorite diner, where he jots down his to-do list! First up, picnic with friends at the beach!
appearance: Emil is a tan Frappe cup topped with whipped cream decorated with sprinkles and caramel syrup. He has a green straw on his head and black irises and green pupils with a black smile.

name: Emiliano
bio: Emiliano is a dental assistant by day and a saxophone legend by night. He plays the saxophone with a group of friends at their favorite coffee shop. Do you want to go hear them play?
appearance: Emiliano is a colorful bird with a bright red head and green body. He has three pointed feathers atop his head, and a long, green tail. He has a collar of white and lime green wings. He has round, black eyes and a rounded yellow beak.

name: Emily
bio: Just like her older brotherBart, Emily loves space! Her dream is to become an astronomer so she can help name the new planets and stars that are discovered. Emily also enjoys studying astrology. In her free time, she uses her telescope to study star patterns and creates horoscopes for her friends.
appearance: Emily is a black bat with long, upright ears. Her inner ears, wings and belly are all dark grey. She has round, black eyes rimmed with white. Her red, smiling mouth is adorned with two pointed white fangs.

name: Emma
bio: Emma has a heart of gold, and loves to put that into her artwork. What’s her next arts and crafts project? She is creating friendship bracelets for her best friendsLanaandLuke!
appearance: Emma is a grey elephant with a white belly. She has large, floppy ears with pale pink on the inside, and an embroidered trunk. She also has round, dark grey eyes.

name: Emmeline
bio: Meet Emmeline. She helpsGinaandRubymake the best hot cocoa in the North Pole, just don't ask for her secret recipe! Some of her favorite things are music, art, and gingerbread houses. Emmeline loves to sing while she works. Can you guess her favorite song to sing?
appearance: Emmeline is a light-skinned elf with pointed ears and brown hair worn in braids. She wears a red, double-tailed Santa hat with a white pom-pom on each tail and a green band around the base. She wears a green shirt which has a white collar with triangular points, a pale green placket and two black buttons. Her bottom half is solid red.

name: Emmi
bio: Pasta, basketball, and watching funny movies are some of Emmi's favorite things. She also plays guitar and loves to dance - this is one busy sloth! When she grows up, Emmi wants to be a news anchor.
appearance: Emmi's fur has a tie-dye pattern which is predominantly blue, ranging from ice blue to cobalt. She has sky blue markings surrounding her round black eyes, and her face is white. She has a fluffy, pale blue belly. Her snout is the same color with a sky blue nose and smiling mouth.

name: Emmie
bio: Meet Emmie. She's a happy-go-lucky kind of gal. She never wakes up with a plan which allows her endless possibilities of adventure. One of her favorite things to do is hop in her spaceship and set off for a new planet to experience new cultures and foods! Do you want to join her?
appearance: Emmie is a galaxy printed alien with shades of blue, green and orange. Her body is covered with a white pattern of starbursts. She has golden embroidered stars decorating her face and body, and yellow dots at the end of her antennae. She has a plain white belly and a simple, smiling face.

name: Emmy
bio: Meet Emmy. She's in charge of all the toys in Santa's workshop! Emmy has her own list that gets checked twice every day! She is one organized elf. When Emmy's not tracking toys on spreadsheets you can find her atFiona's, trying her latest ice cream flavor.
appearance: Emmy is a light-skinned elf with pointed ears and golden hair worn in braids. She wears a green, double-tailed Santa hat with a red pom-pom on each tail and a pointy red band around the base. She wears a green shirt which has a large white collar and a red and white mint design in the centre. She wears red pants with suspenders, attached with gold buckles.

name: Emmyloo
bio: Emmyloo spends most of her time at the amusement parks playing games! Her favorite is the water race because she rarely loses. Emmyloo wishes everyone could win at least one game, so if you're have bad luck winning a prize, ask Emmyloo to play a game and win a prize for you!
appearance: Emmyloo is a plum boysenberry. She has bumps all over her body with a magenta belly. She has a light green stem with leaves. She have round, black eyes and a pink smiling mouth.

name: Empressa
bio: Empressa is a professional hopscotch player. This year, she plans on competing with a novel new move: the reverse double-skip! Along with her signature one-legged twist, Empressa isn't the only hoping for gold--she's hopping for gold!
appearance: Empressa is a pink bird with an eggshell colored in teal mint and purple with gold dots. She has a triangular yellow beak. Her eyes are round, and black  and each has two short eyelashes. She has magenta feathers the same color as her hair tuft.

name: Emrys
bio: Emrys is a snoozy dragon and loves showing off their matching PJs. When it comes to games Emrys is always ready to play, just make sure the treats are sugar-free or this dragon might be up all night!
appearance: Emrys is a teal dragon with a white nose, inner ears and horns. They have a row of silver spikes running along their spine. Their inner wings, nostrils and belly are all light teal, and they have black closed eyes in a sleepy expression. They wear a light teal and yellow sleeping hat.

name: Enid
bio: Enid studies folklore and knows hundreds of old tales. Want to here one? Right now, Enid is working on a project about fairies because she wants to prove they're real! Enid is still collecting the data but she knows she'll find a whimsical fairy soon enough.
appearance: Enid is a mushroom with a green stalk and a purple cap. The top of her cap is a dark purple with green spots, and the underside is a less saturated purple. Her stalk makes up her body and includes a round, neon green belly. She has round, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Ennis
bio: Ennis is applying to medical school! Though he has yet to start his “Why I want to be a doctor” essay, he has a few ideas in mind: like the amazingness of hospital cafeteria food, the cool white coats doctors get to wear, and the chance to help other ‘Mallows feel the best they can be!
appearance: Ennis is a red creature based on the Loch Ness Monster. He has fins on either side of his body, two small horns and maroon spots along his back. His light red belly has a cord texture with the appearance of horizontal stripes. He has round, black eyes, a smiling mouth, and pink blush.

name: Ennui
bio: Ennui is a piece of French toast. They are shaped like a slice of bread and has maple syrup spread on their face. They have a strawberry and a slice of butter embroidered on the right side of their body. They wear a navy blue beret on top of their head. They have round, black eyes and a smiling mouth
appearance: Ennui is a piece of French toast. They are shaped like a slice of bread and has maple syrup spread on their face. They have a strawberry and a slice of butter embroidered on the right side of their body. They wear a navy blue beret on top of their head. They have round, black eyes and a smiling mouth

name: Enos
bio: Enos is the president of his high school conservation club! Last year he successfully protested the demolition of his favorite oak tree, Roberta. Though some call him a tree hugger. Enos doesn't see why that's a bad thing---after all, trees need hugs too!
appearance: Enos is an olive green leopard with blue and sage green spots all over his body. His stomach is pure white. His ears are silver and his muzzle is white. He has two round black eyes with eyelashes and a teal nose and mouth.

name: Enrique
bio: Enrique loves to play with building blocks, he could spend a weekend building a whole new world! When he grows up he wants to build his own house and he can have a room for all his blocks.
appearance: Enrique is a piñata striped in the colors of the Mexican flag. Each stripe has a 'toothed' edge, rather than straight lines. He has tall green ears with red inners and a green muzzle shaped like a rounded rectangle. He has round, black eyes and large, crescent-shaped nostrils.

name: Ensley
bio: Every spring Ensley attends to local Spring Mallow-Maze. This year she'll be racing through the maze to win the giant golden egg! Join Ensley on her next egg hunt!
appearance: Ensley is a grey Llamacorn with a glittery, pale pink horn on the top of her head. She has a white face and pink inner ears, with a pink flower embroidered by her belly. She has a short tail, eyes with lashes closed in a happy manner and a pink nose and smile.

name: Enya
bio: Enya finally found her bliss—but it wasn’t without sacrifice! To quit crying over spilled milk, she cut out dairy. To avoid fussing at the drop of a hat, she donated hers. To stop making mountains out of molehills, she quit her job in landscaping. Now, Enya works at a salon—trimming hairs instead of splitting them!
appearance: Enya is a pink capybara with darker pink short ears and an egg-shaped muzzle. She is holding and eating an orange carrot. She has a white fuzzy belly, closed eyes with lashes, black nostrils and mouth.

name: Enzo
bio: Enzo cheers for Team Everyone! It includes every sport org in the world with the notable exception of Donahue Diamond Miners, a rabble rousing tee-ball team. They know what they did, all those many years ago!
appearance: Enzo is a green leopard shark with dark green spots around their body and two fins on each side, They have two dorsal fins on his head and on their lower back with a tail at the bottom. They have a round, white belly. They have round black eyes and a wide red mouth with pointy teeth.

name: Eponine
bio: Don't get too close to Eponine, or she might hiss at you! This creative and brave wallflower loves perfect grammar and pirate fan-fiction. Though her classmates don't get the whole "me bubble" thing. Eponine isn't surprised—those land-lovers don't get a lot of things.
appearance: Eponine is a black cat with a cyan belly and holographic cyan inner ears. She has a long tail and tall, pointed ears with white whiskers, black eyes with white rings around them and a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Eric
bio: Meet Eric. This blobfish is adventurous and lazy at the same time. He loves kayaking, paddle boarding, and a good nap. He's a funky reggae music superfan who loves to jam. Fun fact about Eric: he could eat peanut butter fudge ice cream for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
appearance: Eric is a blobfish, a deep sea creature. He is bright pink with a pale pink belly and coral colored fins. He has black eyes, a bulbous 'nose', and large, pink lips surrounding his smiling mouth.

name: Erica
bio: Erica teaches ballet to the local hockey team! Though the players were reluctant at first, they're quickly learning the benefits of barre. From enhanced core strength to increased flexibility, Erica is leading the team to victory, one plie at a time.
appearance: Erica is a peach color chinchilla with a white pattern on her cheeks and belly, as well as inside her ears. Three brown whiskers of various lengths sprout from each cheek. She has round black eyes with eyelashes and a brown nose and mouth.

name: Erie
bio: Meet Erie. Catch this thrill-seeker front row on the fastest rollercoaster in the park. Erie loves theme parks and that exhilarating feeling of being at the top of a ride before it drops! Join if you dare!
appearance: Erie is a rainbow tie-dye bear. They have two round black eyes with a white muzzle and a navy blue nose and mouth. They also have two ears one orange and one red with navy blue insides too. They also have a white belly

name: Erika
bio: This tabby cat tries to stay out of trouble, but she loves to play practical jokes. Her favourite day is April 1st, she plans her jokes months in advance! Do you have any ideas about what she could do next?
appearance: Erika is pastel rainbow tie-dye cat with white on her belly, muzzle and inside her ears. She has light pink, almost white tabby stripe markings on her head. Black whiskers frame her face, featuring a pink nose/mouth and closed eyes with long beautiful lashes.

name: Erin
bio: Erin organizes her backpack weeks before the new school year starts and always fills it with fresh supplies. This 'Mallow looks forward to all the subjects she will learn and plans on signing up to be a writing tutor this year. Want Erin to help you with your history essays?
appearance: Erin is a tan squirrel with a white face and belly and has three stripes on her head. Her inner ears are a glittery silver, she has a brown nose and brown cat-like smile with a light-yellow fluffy tail. Both of her eyes are closed and have eyelashes. She wears a plaid pattern green and orange patterned scarf.

name: Erissa
bio: Don't touch that dial!—Erissa chooses the radio station around here! Whether it's a talk show or old pop ballads, this 'Mallow is always tuned in. Some of the local stations even know her name since Erissa calls in song requests every Friday! Do you have a song you'd like to hear?
appearance: Erissa is an tan poptart with teal icing decorated with multi-colored sprinkles on her front. She has blue jam coming out of her head, closed black eyes with lashes, and a red smile.

name: Erma
bio: Erma is a theme-park vlogger on a mission: to ride every roller-coaster in the world! Though she sometimes feels silly waiting 11 hours at grand openings—or booking week-long cruises just to ride their on-board kiddie coasters—there's a reason Erma is the best in the biz!
appearance: Erma is a yellow roll of funnel cake. She has powdered sugar covering her entire body except for her head. She has whipped cream on the top of her head with strawberry syrup dripping down her head with powdered sugar. She has a strawberry on the right side of her head. She has closed eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Ermengarde
bio: Ermengarde is an exchange student! She hails from a distant land that doesn't celebrate Valentine's Day and isn't quite sure about giving someone her heart this February. What if she never gets back it back, or something goes wrong during the procedure?
appearance: Ermengarde is a brown colored donut with pink frosting with a swirl of white icing. Heart sprinkles in lavender, purple and pink decorate her face. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a pink, smiling mouth.

name: Ernesh
bio: Be careful what you tell Ernesh—he tends to overshare! This little dragon can't help but talk and talk, and sometimes, secrets just slip out. Luckily for all his friends, Ernesh joins the school's drama club this year. Now he's busy with lots of lines to learn and recite!
appearance: Ernesh is an apple green dragon with wings, fin-like ears and tan horns. He has blue inner wings, webbing in his ears, and blue fuzz from the top of his head to his tail. He has a white muzzle and belly with dark blue nostrils. His eyes are round and black.

name: Ernest
bio: Ernest sits outside the dessert shop with a hot chocolate almost every weekend. Sometimes he challenges young 'Mallows to play tic-tac-toe with him. Best out of five! And the winner gets to keep all of Ernest's Halloween Candy. Think you can beat Ernest at tic-tac-toe?
appearance: Ernest is a red orange monster with yellow and purple striped horns and a thick, yellow unibrow. He has a tuft of orange fur on top of his head, a fuzzy red belly, and small yellow freckles in between his eyes. He has black eyes and a wide mouth with two sharp teeth poking out at the top.

name: Ernesto
bio: Watch out for Ernesto! This 'Mallow moves fast on the soccer field, and before you know it he's scored! Ernesto plays the midfield position, and will use his signature header to knock in goals. Ernesto loves the game, but he loves supporting his teamates most of all.
appearance: Ernesto is a cup peppermint latte with mint whipped cream on top decorated with white and red sprinkles and a Christmas tree cookie and candy cane with chocolate pouring out. He has a fuzzy white ring and a green sleeve. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Esme
bio: Have you heard the weather report? Esme can share it with you! She wants to be a storm chaser when she grows up, following storms across the sea and tracking their next moves. She is fascinated by how the weather impacts her world.
appearance: Esme is a baby pink narwhal with two fins on each side. A long, white horn protrudes from her head. Her belly is dyed in pastel rainbow tie-dye and is fuzzy. She has black eyes with short lashes and a smiling mouth. Esme also has a tail on her bottom.

name: Esmeralda
bio: Esmeralda has quite the colorful personality. Her creativity is always shining through, especially in her artwork. Her collections brighten the room and inspire positivity wherever she goes.
appearance: Esmeralda is a unicorn patterned with rainbow tie-dye. She has a white muzzle, belly and inner ears. Her horn is shimmery pink with a darker pink swirl. She has round black eyes with short, curled lashes.

name: Esmeralda the Grocery Clerk
bio: Say hello to Esmeralda the grocery clerk! She loves helping people at her store and knows how important it is to greet them with a smile and some sanitizer to keep them safe. Esmeralda used her love for art to decorate all the signs in the store, including a giant mural reminding the mallows to wear their masks.
appearance: Esmeralda is a unicorn patterned with rainbow tie-dye. She has a white muzzle, belly and inner ears. Her horn is shimmery pink with a darker pink swirl. She has round black eyes with short, curled lashes. She wears a pink shirt and light blue pants. She has a green apron over the top with a fresh produce in the front pocket.

name: Esmina
bio: Movies that make you cry, chocolate ice cream, and PJs is Esmina's perfect night. Instead of going out with friends, she sometimes prefers to stay home; though she loves the company, sometimes being by herself feels great.
appearance: Esmina is a fairy with magenta hair styled in space buns. She has light brown skin and a pink mouth, and is winking her right eye. Her dress has a teal blue bodice and a skirt with numerous metallic petals, including shades of purple, as well as yellow and lime green. The underside of her dress is pale pink. Iridescent butterfly wings sprout from her back.

name: Essy
bio: Essy attends all the punk shows in her area. She makes sure to have a healthy meal before every show so she has lots of energy to dance. You should see her ticket collection—it fills an entire bulletin board! Want to join Essy at her next show?
appearance: Essy is a teal eel with a dark teal dorsal fin on top of her head with a light blue belly. She also has rounded black eyes with light blue nostril with a opened sharp teeth like a shark. On her back, she has blue lines going across it.

name: Este
bio: Este is an award-winning mystery writer with a few mysteries of her own. As curious as her family is to know where she goes at 2:22pm each day, they know she'd never tell. And as for the time they spotted her in a wig at the local coal mine? Research for a new novel, Este claimed!
appearance: Este is a muted blue bat with tall, pointed bat ears and bat wings. Her inner ears and wings are a glittery silver with a fuzzy deep blue belly. She has round, black eyes with dual lashes and a red smiling mouth and two white, sharp fangs poking out at the bottom of her mouth.

name: Estelle
bio: Estelle looks up to her cousinChuckand wants to play guitar just like him! She dreams of being a rock star, but she has to clean her room first.
appearance: Estelle is a yellow Peep-styled chick with an orange beak & black, rounded eyes with lashes.

name: Estephania
bio: Estephania listens to reggae music all summer. She loves fluttering to those hip bass lines and positive lyrics. Estephania is a curator at her city's science museum and sets up fun exhibitions each season. Right now, she's working on one about carnivorous plants. Come by for a tour!
appearance: Estephinia is a rainbow butterfly that has purple antennas with a white top. Her wings are purple on the inside are rainbow with white spots on the outside. She has a sparkly white belly. She has round eyes with short lashes, pink cheeks and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Esther
bio: Esther volunteered to decorate the natural history museum for the holidays this year. Though she claims to be doing it out of the goodness of her own heart, her coworkers at the "Fossil Fools" gift shop beg to differ. After all she's been talking about putting a Santa hat on the T. rex for years!
appearance: Esther is a cup of hot chocolate with whipped cream on top decorated with green and red sprinkles. She has a spoon on top. She has a fuzzy dark brown band with a snowflake label in the middle. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Estrella
bio: Interested in learning a new hobby? Join Estrella to try something new. She enjoys thinking outside the box, learning as she goes, and making friends along the way.
appearance: Estrella is a tie-dye yellow star with sparkles all over her body. Her colors range from deep yellow to light yellow. She has a red smiling mouth and a winking face.

name: Ethan
bio: Ethan is one with his community - connecting Squishmallow squads from every age group, size, and location. His passion for unity is highlighted by his work to bring everyone together. He's excited to pass out Valentines to the whole Squishmallow squad.
appearance: Ethan is a light grey elephant with an embroidered trunk. He has large, floppy ears with a pale pink inside. He has two embroidered hearts on the left side of his belly, one red and one purple. His eyes are round and black.

name: Ethel
bio: Ethel is a silent film actress! She just booked her first major role in "The Private Life of Mrs. Claus" and hopes to one day play a First Lady or something real serious and dramatic like that. For now, she's just happy to quit her day job at the delicatessen!
appearance: Ethel is a pink cup of peppermint latte with whipped cream on top decorated with crushed peppermint and a candy cane on the right side with pink latte pouring out. She has a fuzzy pale pink ring and a white sleeve with a peppermint in the middle. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Etta
bio: Etta is an African-American elf with pointed ears and long, black hair. She wears a red double-tailed Santa hat with a white pom-pom hat and a green spiked band around the base. She wears a green shirt with a red jacket which has a red collar with yellow linings with triangular points. Her bottom half has a pattern of red and white and green  vertical stripes.
appearance: Etta is an African-American elf with pointed ears and long, black hair. She wears a red double-tailed Santa hat with a white pom-pom hat and a green spiked band around the base. She wears a green shirt with a red jacket which has a red collar with yellow linings with triangular points. Her bottom half has a pattern of red and white and green  vertical stripes.

name: Etude
bio: Etude is packing for their first yoga retreat. They feel a little nervous, since they don't know what to expect yet, but two weeks away by the beach can't be that bad! Etude practices yoga regularly but is ready to challenge themselves with new poses. Want to tag along with Etude?
appearance: Etude is a pastel pink Shiba with white rounded eyebrows, inner ears, muzzle, and belly with two Sakura flowers embroidered on it. They have black eyes, and a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Eugene
appearance: Eugene is an azure monster with magenta horns and bat wings on the sides of their body, and a pale blue and white spotted belly. They have a pale grey hair tuft atop his head. Their eyes are black with a wide mouth and round teeth poking out of their mouth

name: Eunice
bio: Meet Eunice. She is a DIY diva who loves glitter, glam, and glitz. Eunice loves to add glitter to almost everything, from her notebooks and school supplies to clothes and even her hair! While it sometimes gets messy, she loves to see things sparkle.
appearance: Eunice is a pastel blue unicorn with white on her muzzle and belly. Her multi-colored mane includes lavender, white and sky blue. She has a shimmery, golden horn and matching inner ears. Her eyes are closed and she has long, curled lashes.

name: Eurydice
bio: Eurydice is a high-school English teacher by day and a professional cosplayer by night. She loves combining her two worlds into one at the end of every class novel, when she'll come to school dressed as a character voted on by the students! This month, she has to construct a 'white whale' costume. Think she can do it?
appearance: Eurydice is a clown with a white face, red hair styled into curly pigtails with cyan hairbands. She wears a cyan buttoned top with black buttons and white and red straps. She has a red and black gingham skirt and a striped cyan and black party hat with a white trim and a white pom pom on top. She has cyan makeup with a star placed on her left eye, she has a big red nose, and a black smile with black lashed eyes.

name: Eva
bio: Sweet and tangy treats are Eva's favorite kind, especially blue raspberry cotton candy. Her favorite cousins live by the beach and whenever she visits them, she gets a fresh cone all to herself.
appearance: Eva is a bunny with a cloud-like pattern on her body, mostly pale blue with dashes of other colors such as light green and peach. She has long, floppy ears and a white belly. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and a pink nose and mouth.

name: Evan
bio: When it comes to little victories. Evan wins big! Like last week, he found the last donut in the break room and remembered to send his reports on time. He's cool with leaving the "big victories" to colleagues... promotion, schromotion! Evan got through an entire phone call without accidentally talking on mute!
appearance: Evan is a brown lemur with a cream belly. His inner ears are cram and his mask is cream. The markings around his eyes and muzzle are brown. He wears a blue scarf with a white Christmas tree embroidered on it. He has black eyes ringed in white, as well as a black nose and mouth.

name: Evangelica
bio: Meet Evangelica. She is a huge animal lover and has a soft spot for animals in need. She works at a rescue farm where she takes care of animals of all kinds. She cooks for them and even reads them stories at night. Would you like to volunteer with her?
appearance: Evangelica is a mostly white cow with a pattern of pink splotches. She has small, triangular yellow horns and round black eyes. She has a white left ear and a pink right ear. She has a pale pink muzzle with heart-shaped, hot pink nostrils.

name: Evangeline
bio: Evangeline loves eggs! Deviled, hard-boiled, easy over—but NOT scrambled. It reminds her of a really stressful period in her life and she'll start screaming if she sees a plate in front of her. Sometimes the eggs are so scared, their yolks start running!
appearance: Evangeline is a pastel blue monster with pink and yellow striped horns that droop downwards. She has a peach fuzzy belly with a peach unibrow that stretches across. She has round, black eyes and a wide smile with two triangular teeth poking from the top.

name: Evelina
bio: Meet Evelina, this Evelina wants to save the day. She wants to be an OR nurse when she grows up. As a mini 'Mallow she was hurt and a nurse saved her life. She wants to save lives and inspire future nurses one day at a time.
appearance: Evelina is a pterodactyl, an ancient flying reptile. Her body is patterned in a blue tie-dye with hints of purple. Her beak, belly and inner wings are bright blue. Her outer wings are aquamarine with large foil patches. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Evelyn
bio: Video games and slushies are two of Evelyn's favorite things. Her favorite flavor combo is cherry and green apple because they turn her tongue funny colors. She's not allowed to mix them while playing though, in case she accidentally spills on her controller!
appearance: Evelyn is a hot pink elephant. She has large, floppy ears with pale pink on the inside, and an embroidered trunk. She has round, black eyes too.

name: Ever
bio: Ever draws her saber with care and grace in every fencing match. She knows being a good sport is more important than winning. It's one reason Ever is so well respected by her peers, and as she grows up, she's considering becoming a fencing instructor. Would you take one of Ever's classes?
appearance: Ever is a white bigfoot with a fuzzy mane on their head, and long shaggy ears. They have a white face and white pads on their feet which are shaped like hearts. They have black eyes with short lashes, and a white snowflake on their belly and they have plain black eyes with short lashes. They have a wide mouth which stretches across their entire face with a pink blush on their cheeks.

name: Everett
bio: Meet Everett. He has a superpower — he can speed read! On the weekends, he goes to the library to see how many books he can read in a day. Once he read 4 books in only a few hours, so far that's his record! What book should he read next?
appearance: Everett is a guinea pig with small, round ears. He has two large patches of color on either side of his head: grey on the left, bright orange on the right. His inner ears and nose are pink. He has round, black eyes and a black mouth.

name: Evie
bio: Evie’s favourite questions are ‘did you know?’ And ‘why?’ She loves to learn and share her findings with all her friends. When she’s not busy fact finding, her favourite activities are collecting flowers and twirling! Her favourite foods are marshmallows, chocolate and avocados!
appearance: Evie is a peach pink narwhal with two fins on each side. A long horn protrudes from her head, patterned in the same pastel rainbow stripes as her belly. She has closed eyes with lashes sweeping downwards and a smiling mouth.

name: Evita
bio: Grab your snowshoes and join Evita on her next wild, wilderness adventure! But you better bundle up — this 'Mallow never gets cold. She has been known to hike through snowstorms and loves catching snowflakes on her tongue!
appearance: Evita is a light grey creature with a fuzzy mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and white pads on her feet. She has round, black eyes and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face with a single white tooth poking out upwards. She also has glittery silver antlers protruding from the top of her head.

name: Excalibur
bio: Excalibur sometimes wishes he was named Scott or something. Scott or something wouldn’t have to “spell that for me, please.” Scott or something wouldn’t have to explain why he isn’t a gallant knight. Scott or something could just be some guy… and that’s all Excalibur really wants!
appearance: Excalibur is a neon green dragon with a black fuzzy belly, inner ears, wings, and spines on the top of his head to his upper back. He has a neon green tail and short, neon ears with black-gold holographic horns and muzzle, his eyes are also black and round.

name: Eyk
bio: Meet Eyk. He's a bit of a perfectionist. He will work on something until he thinks it's just right, like his famous strawberry cheesecake recipe or his amazing classical piano skills! Whatever it is Eyk tries his hand at, he always gives it one hundred and ten percent!
appearance: Eyk is a bright green dragon with a glittery gold snout, belly, inner ears, and inner wings. His horns and the spines on his back are glittery silver. He has two large black eyes.

name: Ezekiel
bio: Ezekiel was taught by their grandfather to be polite, punctual, and never shaken for granted. They wear the red bowtie they inherited from him every day to remind them of these lessons, and hope they're making him—and all of their ancestors—proud to call Ezekiel their own.
appearance: Ezekiel is a snow globe. Their upper body is made of a blue glass ball with snow, trees and snowflakes inside. Their lower body is his base which is green with a red ribbon in the middle. They wear a red Santa hat on top of their head. They have round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Ezrah
bio: Ezrah is one lucky elf, he gets to work withNormaandNormanin the woodshop! When it's time for the elves to start building, he brings new ideas and designs with some help from Santa's wishlist. What can Ezrah build for you?
appearance: Ezrah is a dark-skinned elf with pointed ears and short, black hair. He wears a green Santa hat with a white pom-pom on the tail and a red band around the base. He wears a green shirt which has a red collar with triangular points, each tipped with a white bead. His bottom half has a pattern of red and white vertical stripes.

name: Fabi
bio: Meet fabulous Fabi! Fabi loves pumpkin flavored treats and hiding in plain sight. She can camouflage herself in most surrounding which is helpful when Fabi wants to curl up and takes a long nap. Keep a pumpkin latte on hand when you're on the lookout for Fabi!
appearance: Fabi is a black snake with a golden lower jaw and belly. Her belly has black stripes dividing it horizontally. She has shiny, gold spots on her back. She has round black eyes rimmed in white and white nostrils and mouth. A thin, pink, forked tongue pokes out from her mouth. She wears a purple witch hat with black belt with the yellow thing with it.

name: Fabiola
bio: Meet Fabiola. This fish has a passion for FASHION! She loves to stand out and make the world her runaway. In addition to being a style icon, Fabiola also has a gift of gab. You can ask anyone, she loves some feel-good gossip but she knows when the gossip has gone too far.
appearance: Fabiola is a rainbow fish has blue stripes around her. Fabiola has black eyelashes and a smile on her face. She got a white belly on her.

name: Fabrizia
bio: Fabrizia isn't really a witch--she just plays one on TV! While her fans of her show are sometimes frightened to meet 'Goplinka the Ghoulish' at the supermarket, Fabrizia promises she won't turn them into frogs, She'd be happy to sign an autograph and pose for a selfie, though!
appearance: Fabrizia is a dark purple fish with two fins on each side and a dorsal fin on her head. A large rostral bone - the 'sword' - protrudes from the center of her face. She has a bright yellow belly and round, black eyes.

name: Faine
bio: Faine fishes in the lake by her house early in the mornings. She loves the peace and quiet, and gets lots of reading done waiting for fish to bite. Faine's patience always pays off when she returns home with a cooler full of fish ready for barbeque. Swing by for dinner on the patio!
appearance: Faine is a pink bear with a white belly and inner ears. She wears a yellow bow on the right side of her head. She holding a cup of coffee. Her muzzle is white and has a plum nose and curved mouth with black eyes and eyelashes.

name: Faisah
bio: Meet Faisah; her door is always open if you need advice or if you just need someone to listen. She has a comforting way about her; if you’re feeling low, you can count on her for words of encouragement or a totally funny joke to lift your spirits!
appearance: Faisah is a Pegasus with teal, purple, and pink stripes, a vivd pink mane, and little white stars all over her entire coat. She has sparkly pink wing, and her eyes are closed as though she’s sleeping. She has pink nostrils on her white nose, and a white belly.

name: Faith
bio: Faith loves playing with toys, and hopes that someday she can make toys! Between styling her toys' hair and changing their outfits, it's not hard to see Faith's creativity. When this smart fox becomes a real toymaker, she'll be able to provide all of her mallow pals with the coolest toys around!
appearance: Faith is a fox with a tie-dyed coat featuring blue and purple colors. She has large, triangular ears, the inside of which are white. She has white markings on her face, including a round muzzle and fluffy cheeks. Her belly and the markings on her tail are also white. She has closed, happy eyes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Falala
bio: Falala works in the miniature hand sanitizer department of a local bath and beauty! She takes her work incredibly seriously and hopes to one day become Regional Manager for Holiday Hand Products, just as she dreamed of as a little 'Mallow. Her first act of business? Pine-scented cuticle cream!
appearance: Falala is a pink deer with a white face and belly. She also has white inner ears and light pink gold speckles on her forehead. She has a silver snowflake on the right side of her belly. She has silver antlers on top of her head. Her eyes, nose and mouth are all black.

name: Faldette
bio: Here comes Faldette! Faldette is a bundle of energy, she's one active fox and is always up for some fun or adventure. Faldette has run multiple marathons, one year she broke her PR and came in first! Do you think you could keep up with Faldette?
appearance: Faldette is a fox with a marbled blue-grey and white print. She has a white mask marking across her face, as well as a white belly and inner ears. She has a round, black nose and oval eyes with a white shine. She has long, curly lashes and is poking out her pink tongue. Her tail is fluffy and blue with a white tip.

name: Fancy
bio: Meet Fancy. This flamingo is known for her beautiful voice and her talented toes - she loves to perform in musicals. She loves to be on stage, dressed in a new costume and dazzling the audience with her routines. Will you watch her in her latest show?
appearance: Fancy is a hot pink flamingo with a light pink face. She has a slender, black-tipped beak the same color. She has round, green cartoon eyes with long lashes. She also has a white belly and a crest of light pink feathers atop her head.

name: Fang
bio: Fang is a corn maze scare actor who sometimes gets scared himself! Especially if the people he jumps out in front of start shrieking. That makes Fang shriek too... which makes them shriek again... which makes Fang—sometimes they're like this for hours!
appearance: Fang is a candy corn with a white top, and orange center, and a yellow bottom. He has white bat ears on top of his head and has a pair of orange bat wings on each side of his body. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Fania
bio: Do you like hearing stories about castles, kingdoms and queens? So does Fania! She loves to read fairy tales about royalty and even imagines herself as the princess who saves the day. Maybe Fania could even write a royal fairy tale of her own! Would you read it?
appearance: Fania is a dark purple owl with prominent ear tufts. She has white patches surrounding each eye which are vaguely egg-shaped. She also has a white belly speckled with light purple feathers. She has closed, happy eyes with curled lashes and a triangular, yellow beak. She wears a shiny, hot pink crown atop her head.

name: Fanina
bio: Fanina knows almost everything when it comes to nature. She can name hundreds of different plants and animals, but her favorites are the flowers that grow by the pond in her garden. Fanina wants to go on a camping trip soon, do you want to come along?
appearance: Fanina is a marbled pink frog with a white belly. Her eyes sit on top of her head, and are black with thick lashes and two white shines. She has prominent nostrils above her smiling mouth, and a hot pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Fanny the Dragon
bio: Fanny is a dark periwinkle dragon with a white muzzle, periwinkle inner ears, textured belly and inner wing webbing. Her horns, the inside of her wings and the spines on her back are all glittery purple. She has round, black eyes with lashes.
appearance: Fanny is a dark periwinkle dragon with a white muzzle, periwinkle inner ears, textured belly and inner wing webbing. Her horns, the inside of her wings and the spines on her back are all glittery purple. She has round, black eyes with lashes.

name: Fantasia
bio: Fantasia is a light blue witch with green hair tied in pigtails. On her head, she wears a purple witch hat with a black buckle. She wears a black collar with a yellow buckle, a black top and under her being black and purple striped pants. She has black eyes with lashes and a red smile.
appearance: Fantasia is a light blue witch with green hair tied in pigtails. On her head, she wears a purple witch hat with a black buckle. She wears a black collar with a yellow buckle, a black top and under her being black and purple striped pants. She has black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Farhad
bio: Farhad loves everything vintage. From old books to older furniture. he can't get enough of it! A perfect day for Farhad would include shopping at the antique store, visiting the museum, and strolling down his favorite city block--Retro Road!
appearance: Farhad is a lime mammoth with a fuzzy patch of darker green fur atop the head. Farhad also has large, floppy ears with fluffy dark green inner ears and an embroidered trunk and curled, ivory tusks. He has a dark green belly and round, black eyes.

name: Farice
bio: Meet Farice. His kind and generous spirit are truly inspiring. He knits blankets to donate to the local animal shelter and volunteers doing beach clean-ups every Sunday. He never hesitates to help. Need a hand moving or just a nice warm hug? Farice is the 'Mallow for you.
appearance: Farice is a chocolate brown ferret whose triangular ears, belly and muzzle are white. He has a dark brown mask marking over his eyes which is outlined with fluffy white fur. He has round, black eyes and a pink nose.

name: Farina
bio: Meet Farina. She loves lemon bars, hula hoops, and playing pretend. Farina is OBSESSED with fairy tales, and asks her family to call her, "Your Highness". Sometimes she even wears a crown and cape to school! Farina's favorite royal meal is PBJ's cut in the shape of a crown.
appearance: Farina is a creamy white fox with a snow white belly. She has large, triangular ears, the insides of which are shimmery silver. The banded markings across her eyes and sides of her face are also pure white. She has closed, happy eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek.

name: Fariq
bio: Nights energize Fariq. He does all his best thinking and journaling during those quiet, late-night hours. Sometimes when Fariq's up late, he puts on an western movie and eats a bowl of fruity cereal. But don't worry — he'll keep the volume down.
appearance: Fariq is a black bat with long, upright ears and wings on either side of his body. His inner ears and wings are lime green and purple, and his belly is orange and green stripes. He has round, black eyes rimmed with white and his smiling mouth is adorned with two white, pointed fangs.

name: Farrah
bio: Farrah is the queen of flowers! She owns a flower shop and creates amazing floral arrangements for the Squishmallow Squad. When she's not working with flowers, you can find her daydreaming in her paddle boat.
appearance: Farrah is a pink dog with upright, triangular ears. She has a white muzzle and belly, as well as white inner ears and round, eyebrow-like markings above her eyes. She has a bright pink nose and mouth and round, black eyes. She has a blue and hot pink set of hearts emblazoned on her chest.

name: Farryn
bio: Meet Farryn. She loves to jump in puddles and listen to the rain while she falls asleep. She likes to learn about storms and what the weather can do. Farryn also loves to watch storm chasers and thinks she would make a great storm chaser when she grows up.
appearance: Farryn is a light blue deer with a white face and belly. She also has white inner ears and speckles on her forehead. She has glittering, silver antlers on top of her head. Her nose and mouth are black, and she has closed eyes with short lashes.

name: Fastrada
bio: Fastrada enjoys the simple things in life, like baking scones and tending her azalea garden. If you've heard anything to the contrary—particularly, that she's some sort of infamous, international spy—Fastrada can assure you that's just some silly neighborhood rumor!!
appearance: Fastrada is a SeaCow, the combination of a cow and a manatee. She has the body of a cow with a pink manatee snout, flippers for arms, and a split tail fin. Her snout is spotted with a slightly darker pink and she has small nostrils. She has a white body with rainbow patches around her body. She has small, tan triangular horns atop her head and round, black eyes.

name: Fatima
bio: One 'Mallows trash is another 'Mallows treasure. Just ask Fatima! This inventive multimedia artist loves working with unconventional materials. From sculptures made of scrap metal to stained glass made of soda bottles, Fatima isn't just creating great art—she's helping save the planet!
appearance: Fatima is a salmon pink frog with the appearance of a peach, she has her black eyes on the top of her head with white rings around them and a tall green leaf and stem poking out of her head. Her belly is off-white and fuzzy, with pink blush, black nostrils, and a black smile.

name: Fay
bio: Fay loves to give hand-made gifts to all the people in her life. She decorates cookies with each person in mind, writing their name or a special note in icing. She also makes them hand-written cards with glitter, hearts, and stickers.
appearance: Fern is a lilac purply fox with white markings on her face and inside her ears. Her belly is striped in pastel rainbow colors. Her right ear sports a heart emblem in a rich purple. She also has round black eyes with short eyelashes, a triangular nose and two whiskers on each cheek.

name: Faye
bio: Faye is a rainbow dumbo octopus, a type of umbrella octopus (meaning their arms are connected by a web of skin). Their tentacles flare out from their body in a flower-like shape and are pink on the top, white on the bottom. They also have fins on their head which resemble ears and have shiny, pink inner ears. They have a winking expression with lashes on both eyes, pink blush and a smiling mouth.
appearance: Faye is a rainbow dumbo octopus, a type of umbrella octopus (meaning their arms are connected by a web of skin). Their tentacles flare out from their body in a flower-like shape and are pink on the top, white on the bottom. They also have fins on their head which resemble ears and have shiny, pink inner ears. They have a winking expression with lashes on both eyes, pink blush and a smiling mouth.

name: Faylyn
bio: Meet Faylyn, this rock and roll 'Mallow loves loud music, motorcycles, and the open road! She believes in safety first, and always wears her helmet, even if it messes her hair up! She's part of a cool motorcycle crew that takes group rides up the coast! Want to join them?
appearance: Faylyn is a fox with a red, marbled patterned body. She has tall, pointed ears and a long tail with a white tip, white belly, inner ears and markings by her eyes. She wears a silver, holographic band by her forehead and another band holding up a red hair bun. She has black eyes with lashes and a black, triangular nose.

name: Feather
bio: Feather just turned another year older but didn’t announce it. She feels self-conscious on her birthdays, but loves to celebrate the birthdays of other ‘Mallows! In fact, Feather gives really thoughtful and personal gifts. Just wait and see what Feather is getting for your birthday!
appearance: Feather is a black bigfoot with a black mane. She has an orange belly, cream heart-shaped feet and toe pads and a cream face with black, lashed eyes, a long black mouth that extends across her face. She wears a purple party hat that is decorated with bats, moons and stars with an orange pom pom on top, a red clown nose, and yellow and green buttons on her face.

name: Felexine
bio: Felexine is here to play! This fox is always on the move, whether she's having a spontaneous dance party or going  shopping with her sisters. She loves having fun while staying active, do you want to join in the dance party?
appearance: Felexine is a rainbow tie-dye fox with white fur patches on the belly, around the eyes and on the tip of her tail. Her ears are purple and shimmery. Her eyes, surrounded in white fur are black with a white dot, representing a pupil, each eye has two eyelashes. Her nose is situated at the bottom point of the dip made for the eyes and extends into a smiling mouth with a tongue hanging out.

name: Felice
bio: Meet Felice! This 'Mallow doesn't go anywhere without his camcorder and an extra battery pack. Felice's favorite scary movies inspired him to make his own, and this year he's shooting one about a haunted house! Felice needs your help on his spooky masterpiece. Do you want to be part of his crew?
appearance: Felice is a grey tombstone has few cracks on it it has a word called "RIP" that is white it has grass on the bottom with a white flower on it. He has black rounded eyes with eyelashes and red smile and blushing cheeks!

name: Felicia
bio: This magical mallow loves to explore the world on hiking trips to some of the most wonderful parts of the planet; if a magical waterfall or icicle fairy kingdom exists, you can be sure that Felicia has seen it! Join her in her next expedition to a mystical land far away!
appearance: Felicia is a white panda with teal markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band around her body. She has black eyes ringed in white, and a teal nose and mouth. She has metallic silver wings and a rainbow unicorn horn in the centre of her head.

name: Feliciti
bio: Meet Feliciti. This 'Mallow always has something up her sleeve. whether she's planning a surprise party, or bringing a friend lunch while they're at work. Nothing warms Feliciti's heart like brightening a friend's day with a small surprise!
appearance: Feliciti is a teal, tie-dyed mint shake cup with whipped cream on her top decorated with brown sprinkles, a brown cookie, and a teal and white striped straw. She has a winking expression with black irises with teal pupils and lashes and a hot pink smiling mouth.

name: Felipe
bio: Felipe was recently crowned the kickball king at his school. And with good reason—he’s always the last one standing! No one knows how this goblin manages to bob and weave with such speed and grace. But if you ask him, Felipe says his secret is a daily multivitamin!
appearance: Felipe is a navy goblin. He has black horns on their head and navy blue pointy ears with black inner ears. On the back of Felipe He has a navy blue devil-like tail. He has evil-like eyes and a bole mouth with pointy teeth with mint blush. On the right of him he has a black scar with black stitching. He wears a black crown on top his head.

name: Felisha
bio: Felisha runs a summer camp for emotionally and complex teens. With activities like writing love letters to the moon, hair-dye roulette and moody moonboard making, she knows exactly how to enchant the disenchanted. Wonder how she keeps up the scene? Let's just say her emo phase is about as immortal as she is!
appearance: Felisha is a vampire with black hair with pink streaks and teal skin. Her is tied into two pigtails at the. She black eyes with lashes and a red, smiling mouth with sharp white fangs. She wears a black vest with white buttons, a purple shirt underneath with pants and a pink bow-tie, as well as a pink vampire cape.

name: Felix
bio: Felix loves soccer and, baseball and motorcycles and when he grows up wants to be a scientist. If he's not playing soccer or watching baseball you can find him fixing his motorcycle or getting home from a long ride.
appearance: Felix is a white dog with a pink belly with two hearts one red and one teal. He has pink, triangular ears. He a rounded black nose and mouth. He also has two black eyes with the left one rimmed in white with a black patch.

name: Felize
bio: Every October, Felize throws her annual caramel apple-making party. 'Mallows come from all over, dressed in their spookiest attire to attend. Everyone brings their own apple and Felize supplies all the caramel and yummy candy toppings. This year, she'd love it if you'd join!
appearance: Felize is a white ghost with a orange and purple witch hat has a golden belt on it. She has written "BOO!" on her belly with orange outer layer and Purple in the inside. She has black closed eyes with a red smile

name: Felton
bio: Felton loves everything fruity and sweet. She's studying to become a pastry chef. Her specialty is fruit tarts. She always bakes with organic and seasonal fruits. Mangos in the summer, Mandarins in the winter. No matter the time of year, she's bound to make something delicious.
appearance: Felton is a light grey cat with a darker face. She has triangular ears, which are also darker grey, and a tail. The inside of her ears are light pink. She has round, black eyes rimmed in pale blue and a black nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Fen Fang
bio: Fen Fang loves summer storms. They always seem to happen when something isn't going her way, and happily remind her to embrace the unexpected. Like she's learned to say in times of stress, 'If it's going to thunder in July. I might as well dance in the rain!'.
appearance: Fen Fang is a black Stingray with a cod grey belly. She has white spots on her back, and tail. She has round black eyes rimmed in white, and a simple red smile. They have two round fins and a pointy tail. She also has three gills on both sides of her front.

name: Fender
bio: Fender loves learning about extinct rollercoasters and even collects old brochures of theme parks to see where exactly they were located. He thinks it's important that someone still cares about them and hopes to one day write a book, "Extinct Amusement", to carry on their memory!
appearance: Fender is a red apple coated in glittery candy red sugar candy coating except for his bottom. He has a tan stick sticking out of the top his head. He has black eyes, left eye is open and their right is winking with a smiling mouth.

name: Fenella
bio: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day for Fenella, she could have breakfast all day! She loves having scrambled eggs for dinner or fresh waffles for lunch. What breakfast food you like the most?
appearance: Fenella is a pink, tie-dyed unicorn with shades ranging from hot pink to coral to blush, as well as a paint splatter pattern on top. She has a plain white belly. Her inner ears and muzzle are white, and she has a shiny silver horn. Her nostrils and the swirl on her horn are hot pink. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes and a candy pink mane.

name: Fenra
bio: Fenra loves helping people and is studying to be a psychologist. Fenra listens carefully to everything you want to share. Better than that, he always knows the right thing to say! If you're looking for a empathetic new buddy, Fenra is the 'Mallow for you.
appearance: Fenra is a green frog with a purple, blue, yellow belly. He has hearts on the sides of his mouth and has a yellow crown.

name: Feodora
bio: Thought she's usually bright and cheery, once in a while Feodora woke up on the wrong side of the bed. Her bad-day cure starts with her favorite hoodie, an EXTRA large hazelnut coffee, and listening to the sound of the ocean.
appearance: Feodora is a pink and white tie-dye caticorn with a white belly. Inside of her ears and her horn is sparkly golden she has grey closed eyes with a grey heart nose and whiskers. She has no mouth.

name: Ferdie
bio: Ferdie loves dressing up, reading, and red licorice, They even host a book club every month. For every book the club reads, Ferdie dresses up like one of the main characters. Now they've inspired other members to dress up as well, would you like to join the book club?
appearance: Ferdie is a marbled blue and green frog with a white belly. Their eyes sit on top of their head, and have black pupils with white rings around them. They have prominent nostrils above their black, smiling mouth and pink blush on their cheeks.

name: Ferko
bio: Meet Ferko. This shoebill crane loves using his giant beak to munch on pretzels while watching his favorite documentaries. He wants to create his own docu-series one day! He hopes to spread awareness and inspire action to protect the homes and species of endangered animals.
appearance: Ferko is a grey shoebill, a type of bird with a large beak. He has a light grey belly and crest of feathers atop his head. He has a teardrop-shaped orange beak and round, black eyes. He has fluffy, light grey wings with grey tips.

name: Fern
bio: Fern decorates her house with paper heart chains, confetti and pink balloons for Valentine's Day every year. Join her for the most amazing parties, as she's the best host around.
appearance: Fern is a hot pink fox with white markings on her belly, face and inside her ears. She has 'XOXO' and a heart emblazoned across her front. She also has round black eyes with short eyelashes, a triangular nose and two whiskers on each cheek.

name: Fernanda
bio: Fernanda is the queen of the playground! Though her crown is made of construction paper and her throne is just the slide, Fernanda loves playing pretend. If you ask nicely, she might even make you a knight!
appearance: Fernanda is a blue bird with darker blue fuzzy feathers on each side of her body and a fuzzy belly with a holographic blue and white heart embroidered on her belly. She wears a silver crown, have a yellow beak, and black rounded eyes.

name: Fernando
bio: Fernando and his twin sisterSavitaare on the soccer team at school, sometimes they scrimmage at home with their friends. Fernando really wants to be able to do a bicycle kick, do you know how?
appearance: Fernando is a tan skinned squishmallow with black hair on his head. He wears a green shirt with a soccer ball in the middle and white pants with red and green striped lines. He has black eyes and a sweet smile.

name: Ferraz
bio: Ferraz loves abstract art and opposite patterns. This interior designer believes less is boring and more is never enough! Though his design partner,Woodward, tends to scale back his more outlandish ideas—like using a lifeboat as a coffee table—their different styles make them the perfect team!
appearance: Ferraz is a chestnut-colored Caracal cat with a tan belly, inner ears, and muzzle. He has tufted ears that end with brown fuzz.
