Four black whiskers sit on his face with two on each side, alongside brown, round eyebrows, and a triangular mark on the top of their muzzle colored in chestnut. His eyes are black rimmed in blue, his nose and curved mouth are brown.

name: Fey
bio: Fey is serious about her egg hiding skills. She hosts Easter egg hunts every year and invites the whole family! Fey hides little chocolate eggs anywhere she can think of and gives her little cousins all day to find them. Sometimes, Fey even finds those chocolate eggs weeks later!
appearance: Fey is a a blue and white bird with fluffy blue wings and a pale grey beak. There are two shades of blue: royal blue on top of her hair tuft and on middle part of her body, and bluish-grey on the top part of her head and bottom part of her body. She has a white face mask which is shaped like an M, arching over each eye and dipping below her beak. Her belly is also white. She has black eyes and pink blush on each cheek, as well as a blue line which stretches horizontally across her face, in line with her eyes. She has an easter egg on the right side of her body

name: Fiana
bio: Fiana is not called "Fancy Fiana" for no reason! Fiana is a classically trained ballroom dancer, and turns many mallows' heads with her glittery costumes and her magical moves. Rumor has it, she's thinking about teaching a ballroom dancing class! Are you ready to dance with Fiana?
appearance: Fiana is a light brown deer with a white face and belly. She also has white inner ears and speckles on her forehead. She has shiny, golden antlers atop her head and wears a red bow on her left ear. She has a black nose and mouth and long, sweeping eyelashes.

name: Fidalna
bio: Fidalna's favorite color is purple and she can't wait to show off her costume atOlena's slumber party. She's bringing her favorite pillow and lots of snacks to share, can you guess what her favorite snack is? Here's a hint, they go best with salsa!
appearance: Fidalna is a grey mouse with a white lower face. She has large, round ears with pink insides that match the blush on her cheeks. She has oval-shaped eyes and a tiny nose, both of which are black. She wears a fuchsia cat onesie with hot pink stripes.

name: Fiemma
bio: Get ready to snap some pics with Fiemma! Fiemma is a social media influencer who loves to immortalize every moment in photos. She's never without a spare battery pack and portable ring light. Maybe Fiemma will tag you in her next post!
appearance: Fiemma is a washed-out, pink and white fox with a marbled pattern on her body. She has pale pink, shimmery inner ears and heart on her belly. Her tail is long and she has pointed ears. Her eyes have white, banded markings over them and a white belly with black whiskers, a black nose, and black eyes with lashes.

name: Fifi
bio: Fifi is your girl if you like to go on adventures! She’s traveled to the Arctic, to the mountains, and is ready to go on her next trip with you. Born October 6, Fifi has a vibrant personality and is quite the little firecracker. She channels her energy through yoga flows and is working on getting her yoga teacher certificate!
appearance: Fifi is a coral red fox with large, triangular ears. Her belly, the insides of her ears and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. She has round black eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek.

name: Fifi the Fire Chief
bio: Three cheers for Fifi the Fire Chief! Fifi’s love for adventure has grown even more since becoming the fire chief. Whether they are putting out fires, rescuing cats from trees, or responding to other emergencies, Fifi and her crew work hard to help their community.
appearance: Fifi is a red fox with large, triangular ears. Her belly, the insides of her ears and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. She has round black eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek. She wears a black firefighter's uniform with a yellow band around the middle and an elaborate red badge. She also wears a bright red helmet with a golden shield embossed on the front.

name: Filippa
bio: It feels like magic to hear Filippa play the harp. She started playing for a yoga studio and teaches meditation classes there too. She enjoys using music as a wellness tool, do you want to take her class?
appearance: Filippa is a pink tabby cat with a pale body and darker pink stripes on her head and sides. She has a white fuzzy belly and blue iridescent inner ears. Her nose and mouth are pale pink, framed by black whiskers, and her round black eyes have eyelashes.

name: Fina
bio: Meet Fina. She loves the outdoors and goes hiking almost every weekend. Her favorite way to enjoy nature is to bring along her friendsJasonandJuniperfor a fun adventure. Want to tag along with this hiking squad?
appearance: Fina is a periwinkle blue donkey with a white belly. Her long, floppy ears are peach pink on the inside, the same color as her muzzle. She has round, black eyes with four winged lashes on each. She has a navy blue mane running down her back and a matching tail.

name: Finbar
bio: Nothing puts Finbar in a better mood than cheeseburger sliders from his school’s cafeteria. He just can’t resist those cute little patties! Finbar adds barbeque sauce and crinkle fries to his burgers, and now everyone at his lunch table is doing it. Would you like to try one too?
appearance: Finbar is a white dog with purple spots. He has floppy black ears and a large purple nose and mouth. His muzzle and belly are pure white. He has round, black eyes with a white rim.

name: Finley
bio: Finley loves to play pretend! She really gets into whatever character she's playing, dressing up in various costumes and accessories to completely change her look. She played a villain in one of her friendAlex's short action flick — you wouldn't believe it was her!
appearance: Finley is a golden dog with floppy, fuzzy ears. Her ears and belly are fuzzy with golden fur. She has a tan patch on her muzzle and forehead. She has a black nose and mouth and has red hearts over her eyes.

name: Finn
bio: All aboard! Finn the conductor is collecting tickets, are you ready for an adventure? Finn loves trains and has a basement full of elaborate train tracks. When he's not building or collecting tickets, you can find him reading more about his current planet and beyond.
appearance: Finn is a lime green alien with dark green speckles, and a wide smile so you can see his little tongue. He has a pale green tummy and indigo anime eyes. He has two antennas on top of his head that flop around dramatically.

name: Fiona
bio: Fiona lives in an ice castle in the North Pole near her winter squad friends. She has an ice cream shop and can make any flavor you want, don't forget to ask for her famous icicle sprinkles!
appearance: Fiona is a fairy with ice blue hair styled in space buns and a snowflake hairclip on the right side. She has pale skin and a blue mouth, and is winking her right eye. Her dress has a sky blue bodice and a skirt with numerous petals, some metallic blue and some plain ice blue. Silvery butterfly wings sprout from her back. She also has pale blue ballet slippers.

name: Fiona the Fox
bio: Fiona loves to explore! She's always looking for new adventures to scenic places, and enjoying the beautiful world around her.
appearance: Fiona is a light blue fox with the appearance of a laying Hug Mee. She has a white tail, lower body, paws, face, whiskers, and muzzle, with light blue ears and upper body. She has closed black eyes with lashes, a black nose, and black cat-like smile.

name: Fionn
bio: Meet Fionn. Nothing makes her happier than a space race with her best friend, Ralph! They both love friendly competition and are always encouraging each other to be their best. No matter who wins, Fionn and Ralph always celebrate by making their favorite dish, spaghetti and meatballs!
appearance: Fionn is a silver rocket with some red on the top on her head and on her rocket fins. She has a navy blue ring near her head with dark grey bolts. She has a navy blue window on her chest with stars inside of it. On her bottom, there is flames coming out of it. She has a winking expression with a smiling mouth.

name: Fiorello
bio: Fiorello works from home. Though 'home' is technically a deluxe suite at a tropical island resort... no one said he couldn't! This senior software engineer loves writing code on the beach and talking meetings by the pool. Last week, he even ran into a co-worker with the same idea!
appearance: Fiorello is a navy blue walrus with flippers on each side of his body. His muzzle and belly are both lavender, and he has two white tusks protruding from his mouth. He has closed eyes, straight whiskers, a navy blue nose, and a small navy blue tuft of hair on the top of his head.

name: Fitch
bio: Fitch makes movies with his camcorder—his goal is to complete one short film a week! But he doesn't do it on his own, his palNattygets behind the camera so Fitch can also play the lead role. This week they're shooting a detective movie. Want to help Fitch look for clues?
appearance: Fitch is a white and tan dog with triangular ears. His main body is white and he has two large tan patches which cover from his ear to his eye on either side of his face.  He has round, black eyes, a black nose and mouth, and is poking out his pink tongue.

name: Fitz
bio: Fitz is one of the fastest corgis you'll ever meet! He loves to show off his skills on the track, and also does the high jump. See if you can catch this track star's eye for Valentine's Day.
appearance: Fitz is a red dog with upright ears. He has a white marking on his face covering his muzzle and a stripe between his eyes. He has black eyes and a hot pink nose and house. His inner ears and belly are white, and he has a heart emblem on his belly which features a hot pink and a purple heart.

name: Fitzwilliam
bio: It is universally acknowledged that Fitzwilliam loves a good romance novel! From "Of Cattle and Circumstance" to "The Heifers of Aberdeen", the only thing Fitzwilliam appreciates more than a literary tearjerker is a well-done film adaptation. That does not include "Heavens to Bessie", for the record.
appearance: Fitzwilliam is a pink highland cow with long light pink horns, white muzzle, and inner ears. The tuft of fur on their head is light pink. They have a white belly with to Sakura flowers one light pink and one dark. They have black eyes, pink nostrils, and a smile on their muzzle.

name: Fitzy
bio: Fitzy talks a lot--even during movies! They just can't help but comment on all the exciting stuff happening on screen. Now Fitzy goes to drive-in movies so they can comment all they like, and bring their favorite drinks and snacks to the show!
appearance: Fitzy is a light green goblin. They have dark green horns on their head and light green pointy ears. On the back of Fitzy they have a green devil-like tail. They have closed black eyes and mouth with mint blush. Fitzy is holding a pumpkin spice and drinking from it.

name: Fizzy
bio: Fizzy is always losing his belongings and finding them in random places! Last month, he found his wallet at the bottom of a coal mine—which is pretty strange because he works in IT. He narrowed down that his recently misplaced car keys are either in: a) the middle of the ocean or b) his office desk drawer!
appearance: Fizzy is a yellow iguana with two teal cheeks. He has six teal spots on his face, and yellow spines on his back. His eyes are black and he has a teal belly.

name: Flannery
bio: Flannery was feeling a bit blue this morning, when he had a brilliant idea! He decided to combine all the things that bring him joy into one big event and invite his whole squad—including you! There will be disco music, candy peach rings, and lilac scented candles. Join the party!
appearance: Flannery is a fuzzy teal bearded dragon, a type of lizard. His body has a blue. He has a fuzzy, white belly and three dark teal markings on his back, above his tail. He has light blue fringes that protrude from either side of his head. He has round, black eyes, and a cat-like smile.

name: Flaxy
bio: Meet Flaxy. This playful 'Mallow would play tug of war with you all day long if she could! Flaxy may look small, but she might surprise you with her strength - you could even need another teammate if you want to win a challenge against her! Ready to play?
appearance: Flaxy is a brown dog with floppy ears. Her body is predominantly chocolate brown, with lighter markings on her belly, muzzle and in an eyebrow-like pattern above her eyes. She has round black eyes with a white outline. She also has a black nose and a smiling dog mouth.

name: Fletcher
bio: Who's that 'Mallow behind the drums? It's Fletcher━you can tell by his infamous grin! Once the Fletch-Man lays down a groove, you won't be able to sit still. This pterodactyl never misses a beat.
appearance: Fletcher is a pterodactyl, an ancient flying reptile. His body is patterned in a light blue and green tie-dye. His beak, inner wings and belly are apple green. The outside of his wings is a slightly darker green with metallic green splotches. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Fleur
bio: Fleur stages window displays for the local department store! Her concept for Christmas is an existential exploration into "the reason for the season" and Fleur hopes it inspires a robust dialogue on the importance of premodern tradition in a postmodern world. She hopes it sells hats and handbags!
appearance: Fleur is a chocolate Yule Log. She has white icing dripping down on top of her head with a mistletoe on the right side of her head. She has a swirl of red and white icing on her belly. She has round, black eyes with a pink smile.

name: Flora
bio: Flora loves puzzles, board games and movie nights with her family, they have game nights every other week! Her dad recently taught her a few card tricks and now Flora wants to learn cool ways to shuffle and deal cards, can you help her?
appearance: Flora is a light pink fox. She has large, triangular ears, the inside of which are white with a silver shimmer. Her belly has the same pattern. She has white markings on her face, including a round muzzle and fluffy cheeks. The markings on the tip of her tail her tail are also white. She has closed, happy eyes and a black nose and mouth. On the right side of her chest, she has a motif of a small, sky blue heart on top of a larger hot pink heart.

name: Florence
bio: Meet Florence. She wants to be a singer when she grows up, but she hasn't picked her stage name yet. Flo puts on shows for her friends and family in their backyard, her friendsAminaandCocoeven helped her built it. One day maybe you can see the show!
appearance: Florence is a pastel blue fox with a furry belly which is patterned in cobalt blue and white. She has large, triangular ears, the insides of which are shimmery silver. The banded markings across her eyes and sides of her face are white. She has round black eyes with short lashes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek.

name: Florent
bio: Meet Florent. This axolotl is always getting into mischief. He's the class clown and has been known for chatting and telling jokes during class lessons. He can't help it! He's got an extra silly funny bone. He even makes his teachers crack up!
appearance: Florent is a pink axolotl. He has fuzzy pink, hot pink, and blue gills on each side of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a white belly, as well as round, oval, black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Flori
bio: Looking for an adventure? Tag along with Flori! This skeleton is always on her way to see something new. Last month Flori climbed a mountain. Now it's time for something new. Do you have any ideas?
appearance: Flori is a black Squishmallow with orange bones. She have a round, humanoid skull with flat teeth and cavities for the eyes and nose, as well as a sternum and ribcage.

name: Florian
bio: What Florian lacks height, he makes up for on the racetrack. This mare-minded badger is a highly-decorated horse jockey. When he isn't racing, you can find Florian bringing his trusty steeds to the spa-- for a post-gallop pedicure of course
appearance: Florian is a badger with a white head and a light red body. He has round ears with dark red inside and a pure white muzzle. He has stripes running from his ears to his eyes which are carmine red, the same color as his belly. He has round, black eyes and a black nose. He also has a large, fluffy, dark red tail. He wears an azure toque.

name: Floxie
bio: Grab your candy bucket and join Floxie, it's almost time for the Halloween parade! Floxie loves seeing all the decorations and the costumes, especially on the haunted house float! They love to collect stickers, bubbles, and of course, yummy candy.
appearance: Floxie is a grey fox with large, triangular ears. Their belly, the insides of their ears and the markings on their eyes and the sides of their face are all white. They have round black eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek. They have small, embroidered arms and carry an orange, jack-o-lantern themed candy bucket in their right paw.

name: Floyd
bio: Have you ever met a French fry that loved adventure? Meet Floyd! This salty French fry dreams of leaving the kitchen for adventures he’s only heard about! Climbing a mountain, sailing the sea, or even visiting his family in Idaho.
appearance: Floyd's top half is made up of yellow fries, divided by tan lines. His black eyes and smiling, red mouth are located on his top half. His bottom half is bright red and has the word 'Fries' written in white writing.

name: Fluxie
bio: Ready for Fluxie to make your day? This 'Mallow always has a pep in her step and a dash of cocoa powder on her cappuccinos. Fluxie is a barista who loves to work opening shifts so she can spend the rest of her day creating custom designs for her postcard and sticker business
appearance: Fluxie is a caterpillar with a segmented body. Her head is blue followed by a light pink and magenta in a repeating pattern. She has a white belly with magenta and hearts and blue and pink antennae. She has a winking eye with short lashes, a smiling mouth and a pink blush.

name: Forest (Beaver)
bio: Meet Forest. He's this year's dentist of the year! He always leaves his patients with big smiles on their faces! When he's not at the office, you can find him hiking upstream through rugged terrain to find his favorite campsite! With Forest, it's always good in the woods!
appearance: Forest is a is a coffee brown beaver and a tan colored belly. He has a white muzzle with a triangular brown nose and two prominent front teeth. He has round, black eyes and long black whisker. He also wears a plaid red and black sweater.

name: Forest (Salamander)
bio: Forest fears no internet challenge. Right now he's in the middle of the bubblegum challenge - he hasn't stopped chewing the same cube of gum for a week, expect for bedtime. Forest vlogs about his progress everyday. Follow him on social to keep up!
appearance: Forest is a black salamander with a light yellow tummy. His black fur is covered with yellow spots. He face consist of black eyes rimmed in white and he has two dots for his nose and he has a simple black smile. He has a little pointy tail on his back.

name: Forina
bio: Forina is an interpretive dance instructor! The only rule in her dance studio is to be yourself, oh and to have fun! Okay, so maybe there are two rules! Forina believes there is no right or wrong way to move and express yourself in dance! So come join and let the music take control!
appearance: Forina is a jade green jellyfish with forest green spots. She has a round, white belly, black eyes and a smiling mouth. The end of her belly has a wavy design and is apple green on the underside. Her tentacles are made from pink, green, yellow, and blue ribbon.

name: Foster
bio: Meet Foster. Foster finds importance even in life’s little moments. He loves to celebrate any achievement, big or small, and made himself a promise to do exactly that in 2022! Even a get-together with his squad is celebration worthy and Foster is so grateful for each and every one of them.
appearance: Foster is a black french bulldog with the text "2022" embroidered in shiny gold on his white belly. He has black, triangular ears with shiny gold  insides. He has a pronounced, grey snout with classic bulldog jowls with a rounded black nose and round, black eyes with white rings around them.

name: Franca
bio: Peace, love, and chocolate are some of Franca's favorite things. On Valentine's Day, she adds a few chocolate hearts along with a giant hug for all her friends. Ready for your hug from Franca?
appearance: Franca is a Hug Mee unicorn with a white belly, Tye dye fur and white feet. she has closed eyes with small lashes and 2 pink nostrils with a black smile underneath. she has a white fuzzy mane and a silver sparkly horn to show she is a unicorn, she also has two hearts on her belly, a small silver one and a large pink one.

name: Frances
bio: Frances is very outgoing and doesn't shy away from the chance to make new friends. Frances loves to host game nights or have people over to listen to music and dance! She's hosting a holiday game night, want to join the fun?
appearance: Frances is an orange deer in the shape of a Hug Mee. She has a tan face, belly, inner ears, muzzle, and spots on her forehead. She wears a grey and red headband with white fuzzy earmuffs. She has a short tail and a golden antlers with black lashed eyes closed in a happy expression, and an orange nose and smile.

name: Frances the Witch
bio: Frances runs to the soundtracks of every scary movie. This scream queen wannabe likes to imagine she's escaping dastardly villains and saving her town from evil! One night, her imagination got the better of her and she ran from a flock of radioactive seagulls for 13 miles!
appearance: Frances is a light blue witch with pink hair tied in pigtails. On her head, she wears a witch hat with a purple buckle. She wears a lavender collar with a black moon, a black corset top and under her being a black and pink striped pattern. She has black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Francesca
bio: Francesca has two jobs on Valentine’s Day. She’ll deliver your special notes to all your friends, but her favorite job is to enjoy heart-shaped lollipops when she gets home.
appearance: Francesca is a pink owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. Small, pink feathers decorate her chest. She has black eyes with short, straight lashes, and a pink, triangular beak. The right side of her chest is decorated with a heart motif. Her 2019 release has a single, hot pink heart, while the 2020 release adds a smaller, ice blue heart on top.

name: Francine
bio: Francine never missed a corn maze tour! Every year she hops through the huge corn maze outside town with her trusty map. It's such a fun tradition! Francine hopes to be a tour guide when she gets older, and share the joy with younger 'Mallows experiencing their first corn maze.
appearance: Francine is a pastel purple frog with a white belly. Her black eyes sit atop their head rimmed with white, black nostrils, smile, and a silver crown. Her blush is red and is heart shaped.

name: Francis
bio: A local hero, Francis is a respected firefighter, admired by all the other Squishmallows in his community. He's courageous, sweet and has a soft spot for comic books when he has a moment to relax on the porch after a hard day's work.
appearance: Francis is a golden colored lion with round ears and a white muzzle and belly. He has a fluffy brown mane which covers his head. He has round black eyes and a cat-like smiling mouth.

name: Franco
bio: Franco is the king of the anime fan scene. His video channel has more than 800k followers and his most popular upload, Anatomy of an Anime Opening, just topped 3 million views. This superfan even has superfans of his own, and always gets the red-carpet treatment at conventions!
appearance: Franco is a mushroom with a black stalk and dark purple cap with fuzzy pink spots and a pink fuzzy belly. He has black bat ears with black inner ears and pink wings. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Francois
bio: Order up! Francois needs six beef Wellingtons and he needs them now! This culinary cantaloupe is an award-winning chef. Though running a five-star restaurant isn't for everyone, Francois can stand the heat. Bon Appétit!
appearance: Francois is an open cantaloupe revealing an orange pulp and yellow seeds covered by a tie-dyed green cantaloupe skin. He has a small, green stem on the top of his head, a red smile and black eyes.

name: Frank
bio: Frank enjoys fishing and hanging out at the lake house with his family and friends. He may be a cat but he LOVES the water! Someday he wants to travel the world with his friendCam– by boat!
appearance: Frank is a purple cat with a muzzle and belly. His nose, mouth, and the insides of his ears are pink. He has two large black eyes and two black whiskers on each side of his face.

name: Frankie
bio: People may be afraid of Frankie, but there is no need to be. He is quite the friendly giant who aspires to become a police officer after Halloween. No haunted house can scare him away from protecting you!
appearance: Frankie is a green frankenstein, with a green  body, black hair on his head and silver protrusions on the sides of the head. He also has a simple black stitch on his left side above his eye.

name: Franky
bio: Franky is an apple green elephant. They have large, floppy ears with light green inner ears. They have an embroidered apple green trunk and have round, black eyes.
appearance: Franky is an apple green elephant. They have large, floppy ears with light green inner ears. They have an embroidered apple green trunk and have round, black eyes.

name: Franny
bio: Franny is the head designer for the North Pole. She loves to transform homes from drab to fab (you should see what she's done with Santa's Workshop)! She has a keen sense of style and is always hip with the latest fashion.
appearance: Fanny is a bright pink bird with black eyes and short eyelashes. She has fluffy wings which are a darker pink than her body. Her beak is the same color with a pale grey tip. She has christmas lights (red, white. teal, green, blue, yellow) wrapped around her. She wears a christmas hat on her left head.

name: Frawleen
bio: If you have a crafting idea, you've come to the right 'Mallow! Frawleen uses all the latest interplanetary tech to mix new colors, make unique appliques, and knit with glow-in-the-dark yarn. What kind of DIY art project do you want to make with Frawleen?
appearance: Frawleen is a magenta alien. Her body is covered with a pink pattern of spots. She also has rainbow speckles on the tips of her antennae. She has a sparkly white belly with an embroidered rainbow constellation in the shape of a heart with smaller stars and heart inside. She has round black eyes with eyelashes and a smiling, black mouth.

name: Fred
appearance: Fred is an elf with pointed ears and pink-toned skin. He has a round nose, black eyes and a smiling mouth. He wears an elf costume which is red with green trims, including a band around the base of his hat and a pointed collar around his neck. He has a yellow pom pom on the end of his hat. He wears a black belt with a gold buckle, and has a yellow and green button adoring his top.

name: Freddie
bio: Games, guitars, and gumballs are some of Freddie’s favorite things. When he isn’t playing games with his friends you can find him practicing with his band – just don’t step on his lucky guitar pick!
appearance: Freddie is a zebra with a white body covered in black stripes, aside from on his belly. His muzzle, eyes and mane are all black, with white inside his ears and nostrils.

name: Frederick
bio: Frederick goes to medical school! He was just elected Vice President of Surgery Club and can't wait to start planning fun events like thyroid trivia nights and seminars on the spleen. Remember to RSVP for the big Valentine's Day dance: An Evening in the Cardiovascular System!
appearance: Frederick is a purple cow with a darker purple patch by the upper right of his head and his right ear and on the right side of his body. He has off-white inner ears and muzzle, off-white horn and a long tail with a tuft of purple fuzz at the tip. He has green leaves on his head with a green stem His eyes are black, and his nostrils are purple.

name: Freedom
bio: Freedom just moved to a small town where doorbell ringing is outlawed! He understands that Mayor Chao is still haunted by the ding-dong ditches of his youth but is determined to bring Knocksville together to fight for their right to ring. Maybe through a signed petition, or a flash mob at City Hall!
appearance: Freedom is a purple pumpkin with thin vertical stripes. There is a black stem on his head and a triangular pattern of black leaves. He has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Fresa
bio: Grab a microphone and put on your favorite dance outfit, Fresa is here! This strawberry has dreams of being a pop star, singing and dancing on stage with fans cheering her on. She wants to sing about love, life, and how to stay happy. Do you want to hear her latest song?
appearance: Fresa is a pastry with a suspiciously similar appearance to a Pop-Tart. She has a tan, biscuit base with pale pink icing slathered on her front, accompanied by rainbow sprinkles. The top right corner of her head is covered with bright pink jam which appears to be oozing out. She has closed, happy eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Fresita
bio: [[This Bio is unknown]]
appearance: Fresita is pink strawberry milk with striped lines with a red stripped straw on the top. She has white label that looks like a pink strawberry dipped in the strawberry milk. She even has a fake nutrition facts on the side. She has black rounded eyes with lashes with a opened mouth with a red tounge.

name: Freya
bio: Freya loves being outdoors! She wants to be a marine biologist when she grows up. She loves reading and her favorite books are fantasy; with wizards and dragons. One day she says she’ll be a superhero marine biologist, saving species from extinction!
appearance: Freya is a teal snail with two glittery teal antennae on top of her head. Her stomach is cream white. The shell on her back is tie dyed pastel rainbow colors with two light pink swirls on either side, and she has a pointy tail sticking out from the bottom.

name: Frida Kahlo
bio: Need a bio
appearance: Frida is a peach squishmallow with facial features she has brown eyebrows and has black eyes with one short lashes and a mouth with red lipstick with rosy cheeks. She also wears mariachi dress which she has red and white clothing with a big turqoise flower and 2 white smaller flowers with a golden yellow curved line below it.

name: Frieda
bio: Frieda cuts the prettiest papel picado you've ever seen! Her style is a little less traditional since Frieda cuts with her crab claws. Today she's following a skeleton template for Día de los muertos papel picado. Come see the banner strung all along Frieda's balcony!
appearance: Frieda may resemble a crab from the front due to her large claws and six pink, teal, and yellow legs, but she is actually a scorpion - she has a long, segmented tail with a stinger on the end. She has a teal color belly decorated in a sugar skull design. She has round, black eyes surrounded by yellow flower details and a smiling mouth. On Frieda's forehead she has three flowers one teal, one pink, and one yellow with a pattern of pink and teal dots.

name: Fritz
bio: Fritz pickles all sorts of veggies! After his first bite of pickled cauliflower, Fritz knew pickling would be his new hobby. Now this frog is on the farmer's market circuit selling his own pickled and jarred goods. He's famous for his spicy pickled green beans! Pick some up for your next charcuterie plate.
appearance: Fritz is a mint frog with a darker shade of mint tummy with daisies in it. His face consists of eyes that are black and rimmed in with pink, his nose is made of two upside down curves, and he has a simple black smile with pink cheeks.

name: Frumpy
bio: Frumpy grew up as a child actor on a popular kids' sketch show. She's always had a chip on her shoulder about having missed out on typical school life, so she left television for a future in sociology and academia! Want to walk Frumpy to her next class?
appearance: Frumpy is a black Bigfoot with fuzzy rainbow tie-dye mane and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and belly, and sparkly silver pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts with purple outline. have a pink oozing heart on the right side of her body. She wears a sparkly black antennae with purple hearts, She have mischievous eyes with lashes and a wide mouth which stretches across her face.

name: Fuyuki
bio: Fuyuki plays the triangle for the youth orchestra. She uses two kinds of wands to adjust the volume of the triangle, sometimes even playing with a knitting needle for really quiet notes. Fuyuki loves playing such a complex instrument and is perfecting a triangle roll for the next show!
appearance: Most of her body is a mint color, she has a white belly with black open eyes w/eyelashes and a dark teal nose and mouth. She has two white ears and 3 blue stripes on her head. She also has a very large dark fuzzy tail on her back.

name: Fuzzy
bio: Fuzzy moved to a beachside home last year and it's total paradise! They love to walk barefoot in the sand and watching the sunset. For Fuzzy, nothing beats a fresh glass of limeade and all the changing colors of the evening sky. Want to visit Fuzzy at the beach this summer
appearance: Fuzzy is a sasquatch with a peach bucket hat on their head over their fuzzy, orange hair. They have a peach body with a cream colored belly and face. They have round, black eyes and smiling mouth with small white fangs.

name: Gabby
bio: Watch out for Gabby! Her favorite color is silver but don't let that fool you, this figure skating Yeti is going for gold someday! When she's not on the ice you can find her spending time with her friends and family.
appearance: Gabby is a pale grey yeti with a round white face. She has rainbow horns on either side of her head and a puff of fur on her forehead. She has round black eyes, as well as a smiling mouth. Her stomach has rainbow diagonal stripes.

name: Gabin
bio: Gabin loves haunted houses. One time, he even saw a real ghost! When Gabin learns of a new haunted house, he adds it to the list of places he wants to visit. Want to go on a spooky road trip with Gabin?
appearance: Gabin is an orange axolotl. His body has thin vertical stripes. There is a green stem on his head and a triangular pattern of green. He has peach gills and orange frills with his tummy white and has orange arms. His face consists of round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Gabourey
bio: Gabourey is writing a new movie! Her screenplays are usually romantic comedies and she's developing a new one for Valentine's Day. This story is going to be about two 'Mallows who live far away, but write each other sweet postcards. Will you watch Gabourey's new movie.
appearance: Gabourey is a pink flying squirrel, she has pink wing-like membranes with pale red tips and white insides. She has pale red short floppy ears, three stripes on top of her head and a heart-shaped nose. She has an off-white face and belly and black eyes, with a curved mouth. She has a large fuzzy tail and a red glittery heart on her belly.

name: Gabriela
bio: Day or night, you're likely to find Gabriela singing and dancing to a tune in her head. She wants to be a professional dancer one day, as well as a teacher. She wants to teach history and dance, maybe even in the same class.
appearance: Gabriela is a tan skinned human with a brown unibrow, black eyes with one short lash on each eye, a mouth with red lipstick and rosy cheeks. She wears a red and white mariachi dress with a big blue flower and 2 white smaller flowers with a golden yellow curved line below it.

name: Gael
bio: Don't say Gael's stuck in the 90s, he just knows good music when he hears it! Gael fills his days dusting off his favorite playlists while he spends his time woodworking, cooking, and watching movies with his best friendNicky. Join them for a 90's holiday singalong!
appearance: Gael is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. He wears a grey hat printed with white snowflakes atop his head, and a red outfit with green accents on his bottom half.

name: Gage
bio: Gage is a tie-dye coral, yellow and blue lobster with coral lobster claws. He has coral antennae, and a coral tail. He has eight coral legs. He has a yellow belly and three coral stripes. His face consists of black eyes and simple black smile.
appearance: Gage is a tie-dye coral, yellow and blue lobster with coral lobster claws. He has coral antennae, and a coral tail. He has eight coral legs. He has a yellow belly and three coral stripes. His face consists of black eyes and simple black smile.

name: Gaines
bio: Does Gaines have your phone number? If she does—you're gonna get a joke call! Gaines likes to call her friends and favorite restaurants using silly voices just for fun! One of the restaurant owners in town,Kaia, recognizes Gaines' silly voice, so sometimes they just stay on the phone chatting.
appearance: Gaines is a grey gargoyle with black speckles all over her body to give her a stone textured look. She has blue-grey, fin-like ears, wings, and darker grey horns that sit on her head. Her belly is grey and fuzzy, her muzzle is blue grey with black nostrils, she has black eyes and a winking expression.

name: Gal
bio: Gal has a wig for every occasion. She doesn't know how it happened, but shortly Gal started to grow a whole collection and now she can't imagine a day without wearing one of her snazzy wigs. Today Gal is sporting one with bangs and multicolored highlights. How does she look?
appearance: Gal is a light red unicorn with white on her muzzle, and belly, and the insides of her ears are black. Her multi-colored mane includes bright red, light pink and purple. She has a shimmery, black horn with a pink swirl. Her eyes are closed and she has long, curled lashes.

name: Gala
bio: Meet Gala. They love listening to golden oldies but goodies on their record player and cooking yummy vegan meals for all of their friends. When they're not perfecting their coconut curry recipe, they love snapping photos with their film camera or taking care of all their house plants!
appearance: Gala is a griffon, a mythical creature that combines a lion and an eagle. Their head has a watercolor pattern combining pink and orange, which ends in a row of feathers. They have a fluffy pink puff on either side of their head, round black eyes and a sharp green beak. Their body is green with a lighter colored belly. The wings on either side of their body match their head, with long green feathers on the tip. They have a long, green tail with a fuzzy, pink tip.

name: Galci
bio: Meet Galci. He loves learning about famous unsolved mysteries. When he finds one that interests him, he learns everything about it he possibly can. One day, he wants to host his very own podcast, and in each episode, he'll deep dive into a different mystery!
appearance: Galci is a light grey raccoon with black, winged markings around his eyes. Each marking has a white band above it. He also has a white muzzle with a black nose and mouth, as well as round black eyes ringed in white. He has black ears with white, fluffy insides, matching his fluffy white belly.

name: Galia
bio: Meet Galia. Galia loves being active! They may get a little winded during activities, but as long as they have an inhaler, they will be alright. Nothing can stop Galia from living their best life! Will you join Galia in their next activity?
appearance: Galia is a purple Gameboy handheld video game console. They have a grey body with a purple top and bottom. They have two red buttons in the bottom right and a grey directional control pad in the bottom left. In the middle of their body, they have a blue/purple gradient screen which contains their face. They have round, black eyes with eyelashes, a smiling, red mouth, and pink blush on their cheeks.

name: Galina
bio: Galina is a professional license and ID photographer! She always encourages fun and funky facial expressions and sometimes even tells the next guest in line to hop in there to. For poses like back-to-back besties, get a load of this guy, or—Galina's personal favorite—bunny ears!
appearance: Galina is a white dog with blue patches over her right ear, around her left eye and on her belly. Her belly has a pink flower on the right. Her ears are large and floppy, standing up from her head. She has a pronounced snout with white outlines and classic bulldog jowls, with a rounded black nose and round black eyes.

name: Galindo
bio: Galindo's favorite time of the year is Christmas of course! But can you guess his second? It's summer! When he's not busy helping Santa spread winter cheer to little children across the world, you can find him relaxing on the white sand of a sunny beach with ice cold fruit punch!
appearance: Galindo is a white snowman with a carrot shaped nose. He wears a red hat on head. He also wears a blue scarf with snowflakes sitting just over his two glitterly grey buttons.

name: Gallup
bio: Who's the fastest mallow on the track? If you guessed Gallup, you might be right. He loves to race his friends for fun and is also a star on his cross country team.
appearance: Gallup is a black horse with a white stripe on his forehead. He has black eyes ringed in white and a black mane and tail. His muzzle, inner ears and belly are white. He has an emblem of a black horse silhouette decorating the right side of his belly.

name: Garda
bio: Garda learned an important life lesson—you can't win 'em all! She competes in the school science fair every year, but this time, she didn't even place in the finals. Maybe Garda shouldn't have included Pluto in her planetary diagram? But winning isn't everything, and at least she had tons of fun building it!
appearance: Garda is a purple bunny with the body covers in chocolate and dot candies. Garda has a purple bowtie and has pink outer ears with brown in the inner ears. Garda has a winking expression and Garda has a pink nose and mouth along with black whiskers.

name: Gardenia
bio: Gardenia crafts tasty and colorful stands for lunch every day! You never know what you'll find in one of Gardenia's giant salads, but it's sure to cure your crunch cravings. This 'Mallow is especially fond of edible flowers such as clover, and whips a light, sweet dressing to match. Come join Gardenia for a healthy lunch!
appearance: Gardenia is a brown groundhog with rounded ears, and a darker brown fuzzy tail. They have tan belly and muzzle, with darker brown inner ears and nose. Their lashed eyes are rounded and black with two front teeth poking below their muzzle.

name: Garnet
bio: Meet Garnet. She and her sisters are very different but they usually get along. While her sisters are more musical, Garnet is all about the glam and glitz of the holiday season. Planning holiday parties and elaborate gift exchanges make her heart happy.
appearance: Garnet is a pale pink Christmas tree with a shiny, bright pink star atop her head. Three rows of Christmas lights are wrapped around her with small, circular lights in red, hot pink, white and silver. She has large black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Garo
bio: Being friends with Garo means you're always in close communication. That's because Garo uses a walkie-talkie! His transmitter is always on if you want to chat or have a spur of the moment hang out. Just make sure you learn the lingo first. Roger that? Over and out!
appearance: Garo is a neon mushroom with a green stalk and a tie-dye rainbow cap. The top of his cap has a yellow flower on him, and the underside has yellow, green, and blue tie-dye, his stalk makes up his body and includes a round, purple belly. he has round black eyes and a red smile.

name: Garret
bio: Garret cuts his own stencils for stamp art! He rolls ink over the stencil then stamps away, making everything from postcards to posters. You can catch Garret at the monthly art fair selling all his custom stamps and even working on some new ones. Want Garret to make you a custom stamp?
appearance: Garret is a brown and white guinea pig with small, round, tan ears. The top half of his body is brown with a white patch from his nose to the top of his head. The bottom half of his body is light brown and he has a fuzzy white belly. He has a white muzzle with a tan nose and black mouth and he has round, black eyes with eyelashes.

name: Garth
bio: Garth is a teal alien. His body is covered with a blue pattern of spots. He also has blue speckles on the tips of his antennae. He has a tie-dye galaxy print belly with white starbursts. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.
appearance: Garth is a teal alien. His body is covered with a blue pattern of spots. He also has blue speckles on the tips of his antennae. He has a tie-dye galaxy print belly with white starbursts. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Gary
bio: Nothing can stop Gary from reaching the finish line! You can't miss his long legs on the track, as he aspires to become a future Olympian. Want to know the best part about Gary? He is fast on his feet and can solve any problem that comes his way!
appearance: Gary is a giraffe with a yellow body covered in brown spots. He has a brown mane running down his back. He has two white horns. The inside of his ears, his muzzle and his belly are all white.

name: Gasper
bio: Gasper just got home from an enlightening trip abroad. He was so impressed with the delicious fresh pasta he ate on his trip, he decided to buy a pasta machine! Gasper is going to start by making spaghetti. What sauce should he add to the homemade noodles?
appearance: Gasper is a gnome with a large nose, a bushy white beard, and a round, grey belly. He wears a grey hat printed with diagonal grey rectangles and a red pom-pom atop his head, and a red plaid outfit on his bottom half.

name: Gasten
bio: Gasten can't wait for winter. He usually spends summers indoors with the AC blasting because he can't stand the heat. You should see his electricity bill! Now that cooler fall weather is starting. Gasten is making plans with his whole squad. Want to join them apple picking?
appearance: Gasten is a yellow crepe. He is primarily cream wrapped in a yellow crepe with a swirl of chocolate icing on his belly. He has strawberry syrup on top of his head with a strawberry on the right side. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Gavi
bio: Gavi is learning to play the recorder! He and his class are going to have a festive fall recital. He's so excited for his moms to see all the progress he's made! After the show, they're going to go out and celebrate with cinnamon rolls and hot cocoa!
appearance: Gavi's head is orange-ish red with a yellow beak, red caruncle, and round black eyes. His body is tan/cream colored while his belly is white and fuzzy. His tail feathers are mostly brown, with a bit of orange and tan at the tip. He also has brown wings.

name: Gavyn
bio: Gavyn is the world's best uncle! His five nieces think Uncle Gavyn makes the best black bean cheeseburgers with sweet potato fries! Gavyn plays guitar in a rock band, and gives his nieces backstage passes to see him in concert all the time. Want to come to tonight's show?
appearance: Gavyn is a bright yellow donkey with a white muzzle and belly. His long, floppy ears are white on the inside, and his eyes are round and black. He has a yellow mane running down his back and a matching tail.

name: Gawa
bio: Gawa loves to hang out withCaslina; she also like to go on a tea party with friends. Gawa can be a Party Planner and she really wants you to come over!
appearance: Gawa is an axolotl that is rainbow coloed and has black stripes that look like a zebras scattered everywhere. She has silver gills with a yellow frill on each side of their head. She have small, stubby arms and a white belly. She has black, oval-shaped eyes with a white shine and short lashes, as well as a cat-like smile.

name: Geli
bio: Geli looks forward to fall every year. She even has designated fall outfits with different shades of her favorite color, pink! Geli participates in all fall activities she can, and has won the bobbing for apples contest three years in a row. Can you guess her advantage? It's her unicorn horn!
appearance: Geli is a black Squishmallow and has a silver horn with a hot pink swirl. She also has a hot pink mane along their back. Her skull is rounded with lashed, circular eyes, a hole for each nostril and four teeth. The skull, sternum, ribs and inner ears of this character are all hot pink. She wore a black mermaid dress with pink scales around her.

name: Gelina
bio: If you're ever in need of a detective, Gelina can help you out! She is an expert at using the smallest clue to find out the whole scoop from her friends. Just don't ask for her source - she protects them at all costs!
appearance: Gelina is a lavender purple bunnycorn with long lop ears. She has a shiny, silver horn with a purple spiral. Her belly features a pattern of pastel rainbow stripes. Her mouth and triangular nose are both pale pink. She has round, black eyes with a white shine, each with three curled eyelashes.

name: Gemma
bio: Photography, museums, and history are some of Gemma's favorite things. She loves to explore museums and take pictures of new and historical buildings wherever she goes.
appearance: Gemma is a fox with an orange and white body. The lower half of her face, including her muzzle, is white, as is her belly. Her ears and feet are red. She has black, oval-shaped eyes, a large nose, and a smiling mouth. and in some variations, has an embroidered heart emblem on her belly.

name: Genesis
bio: Genesis loves spy movies and is all about the action. She sometimes wishes that she could be a super spy! If she were a spy she'd be stealthy and have the best cover-ups. Sometimes she pretends she's going undercover, what's your code name?
appearance: Genesis is technically apegacorn, as she has both wings and a horn. However, she is categorized as a pegasus. She has a white body covered with a print of silver star silhouettes. She has long, curly bangs which are shades of purple, blue and pink in a tie-dye pattern. Her inner ears, tail, and the front of her wings bear the same pattern. Genesis has long, downward-sweeping lashes and a pale pink blush beneath each. She also has a shiny, pale pink horn.

name: George
bio: George is one energetic mallow, he can talk for hours and sometimes he gets carried away telling stories so his friends have to tell him to slow down. Sometimes he gets so excited he stutters when he talks.
appearance: George is a black dog with tall, pointed ears. He has a white muzzle and stripe on his face and a round white belly. The insides of his ears are pale pink. His nose, mouth and eyes are all black, although his eyes are rimmed with white.

name: Georgette
bio: Georgette has an alter-ego George! He's a cantankerous old man who might need a walker but brings the heat to his weekly poker night. Though "his" competitors might not know "he" has algebra in the morning and loves the color rainbow—bluffing is part of the game!
appearance: Georgette is a carrot cake. They have vanilla frosting with a swirl of orange caramel on top of their head and raisins and walnuts on the middle layer. They have two vanilla frosting on the top and bottom layer. They have a dollop of cream and a carrot on top of their head. They has closed eyes and smiling mouth with red blush.

name: Georgia
bio: Meet Georgia the Peach, her favorite season is Summer! Georgia loves to make her famous iced tea, a family recipe passed down, from peach to peach. She always has some ready when friends come-over, but she'll never tell you what the recipe is!
appearance: Georgia is a pale pink peach with a red flower and three water droplets at the corner of her body. She has darker pink arms and legs, and she also has one green leaf and a brown stem on her head, adding on with light pink cheeks.

name: Georgie
bio: Georgie recently learned that aloha also means I love you! He was trying to say hello to a classmate and was a little taken aback when they said they loved him too. Thankfully, they were a good friend—and Georgie does love them!—but he'll probably just stick with guttentag from here on out.
appearance: Georgie is a scoop of vanilla cream with darker brown chocolate syrup, blue sprinkles and star, and a headband with a red star on the left and a blue star on the right of his head on the top of his head. They are placed on top of a tan waffle cone with a diamond pattern and his scoop overflowing on top of it. He has black eyes, a black smile and pink blush on his cheeks.

name: Georgina
bio: Meet Georgina. Her favorite things are pumpkin pie, poodles, and jumping in the puddles after it rains. Fall is her favorite season because the colors change and she gets to eat pumpkin pie with her friends. Will you jump in the rain with Georgina?
appearance: Georgina is a bright yellow giraffe with a mosaic of brown patches. Her muzzle, the broad stripe on her forehead, inner ears and belly are all white. She also has tiny brown horns. She has wide, anime-style eyes with black lashes, blue irises and white, star-shaped sparkles.

name: Georgios
bio: Georgios watches good movies and bad movies with the same enthusiasm! He has a rule to finish every movie he starts even when he feels it's not his speed. Georgios thinks bad movies can be fun in a different way since he learns a lot about storytelling! Meet Georgios tonight at his theater to check out a new flick.
appearance: Georgios is a bright red crab with a sliver crown on his head. He has a round, maroon stripped belly. He has two maroon large claws and six smaller legs beneath them. He has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Gerald
bio: Gerald didn't think he has any special talents until his best friend,Wilbie, asked him to put together a dresser. This thoughtful train conductor was a super speedy builder, and even had time to paint purple friendship flowers on the drawers!
appearance: Gerald is an olive green tapir with an olive green trunk, a large white stripe across the center of his body and pale pink inner ears. He has black, rounded eyes.

name: Geraldine
bio: Geraldine isn't like most plumbers—she's a bagpipe plumber! Whether the clog is a frog or the jam is some ham, this nimble feline has seen and cleared it all. If you ask nicely, she might even launder your kilt!
appearance: Geraldine is a Scottish Fold cat with dark pink fur and a light pink belly. She has a long tail and folded cat ears. She has darker stripes with three on her forehead and four by her sides. She has a white muzzle with a pink nose, and cat-like smile, and black whiskers and eyes.

name: Geranium
bio: Geranium owns the record store in town. It's a small shop, but it's stacked and packed with all kinds of records. In fact, Geranium will tell you that most of the albums are from his own collection! He doesn't have room in his attic anymore, and loves to see his favorite music find a happy home.
appearance: Geranium is a yellow finch with black, fuzzy wings, and a pale-yellow fuzzy belly. He has a tuft of black fuzz on the top of his head and a black marking on his forehead that connects to his orange beak. His eyes are black and are rimmed with white.

name: Gerard
bio: If you like pancakes and building pillow forts, Gerard might be your new best bud. He and his cousins spend Saturday morning watching cartoons and eating pancakes. His favorite part of the weekend is watching movies in their giant pillow fort.
appearance: Gerard is a Yellow Bird with a Orange Beak and Yellow Fluffy Wings and black rounded eyes.

name: Gerik
bio: Do you hear that? Sounds like Gerik's tummy is grumbly! This cat's got one big appetite, especially when the weather turns chilly. Gerik's favorite meal is meat pies and Halloween candy! Grab a plate and nosh with Gerik.
appearance: Gerik is a purple cat with pointed, triangular ears. They have a black belly and a large witches' hat the same color. They have a winking expression and short lashes, as well as a pale pink nose and mouth. Black whiskers sit either side of their face. They have prominent paws and are holding a jack-o-lantern candy basket in their right paw.

name: Geronimo
bio: Give Geronimo a head start on any plans, because this bagel is always running behind schedule. He tends to dillydally or get easily distracted, but he always has good intentions! Geronimo has finals this week and he can't be even a minute late. Will you help him get to class?
appearance: Geronimo is a bagel with he is a tan bread one is top and one is bottom. the top bread has brown to tan bagel seeds on top. In his body he has cheese, pale red bacon, light green lettuce and a white eggs on the middle of him. He also has rounded black eyes  with a right eye wink and a red smiling mouth.

name: Gert
bio: Gert only wants to attend his state's most prestigious university. He's working with a guidance counselor to get all his materials together, not to mention a tutor, so he can ace the regional exams. Gert just can't decide what his major will be. Do you have any ideas for him?
appearance: Gert is a mushroom with a charcoal black stalk and maroon cracked cap. He has fuzzy red spots on his cap. He has a fuzzy black belly. He has mischievous eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Gertrude
bio: Gertrude has a reputation for being bossy, but she just likes to help people; she loves group projects and leads study groups for big tests. Want to know a secret about Gertrude? She laughs so hard water sometimes comes out her nose!
appearance: Gertrude is a black, white and grey Canadian goose. Her head is black with a white stripe, and her fluffy wings are grey. She has a grey body with a white belly. She also has a pale grey beak and round, black eyes with a white rim.

name: Gianna
bio: Gianna knows there is order in chaos. If you need an example, look no further than her room! Sometimes you can barely see the floor because there are clothes and books all over, but Gianna knows exactly where to find everything. Think she has a photogenic memory?
appearance: Gianna is a light blue seal with white spots and two flat flippers on each side. She has a round, white muzzle and a fluffy belly. She also has round markings above her eyes resembling eyebrows. Her facial features, including nose, mouth, round eyes, short lashes and whiskers are all black.

name: Gianni
bio: Gianni has the most beautiful garden of all the Squishmallows! He grows tomatoes and cucumbers and has lilacs that smell like no other. He's holding an "Open Garden" next week and it's the talk of the town!
appearance: Gianni is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. He wears a red hat printed with pale pink hearts atop his head, and a grey outfit with red accents on his bottom half.

name: Gideon
bio: Meet Gideon. He is the life of the party wherever he goes! He's been all over the world and is full of stories from his travels! He's wrestled giant squid, climbed to the top of 'Mallow Mountain, and eaten with kings and queens! Join him for his next adventure!
appearance: Gideon is green with peppers, onions, and cheese bits inside of it. He also has a tortilla chip sticking out of his head. He has a bowl which is half brown , and half yellow, and has green and red triangles in the middle of it. His face consists of black closed eyes and a red smile.

name: Gigi
bio: This 'Mallow moves a mile a minute, thanks to her favourite fuel: apple juice! When Gigi is around, you are sure to smell a hint of apple before you see her. How many is too many? The limit does not exist!
appearance: Gigi is a tabby cat with peachy orange fur. She has dark orange stripes on her head and sides. She has a cream belly and inner ears to match, as well as a white muzzle. Her nose and mouth are peach colored, framed by black whiskers. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes.

name: Gilbert
bio: Gilbert always looks forward to the springtime when he can play outside. His family's Easter traditions include decorating eggs, making egg-shaped pancakes and a family baseball game.
appearance: Gilbert is a lime green sheep with a pure white face and inner ears. He has round, black eyes with short lashes, a pink nose and mouth, and pink blush on his cheeks.

name: Gilbert the Groundhog
bio: Ready or not, Gilbert is here for spring! Gilbert is a groundhog like no other - he has insomnia but that doesn't keep this Squishmallow down for long! He journals or writes poetry when he can't sleep and shares his poems with his friends. Even though he has trouble sleeping, Gilbert enjoys to get out and smell the magic of spring.
appearance: Gilbert is a brown rodent with round ears and a tan colored belly. He has a round brown nose, simple black eyes and two prominent front teeth.

name: Gilberto
bio: Gilberto is known all over the reef for his saxophone skills. He jams with a bunch of jazz groups, and has even played with the award-winning ska band, Seafoam Swishers! But Gilberto is not interested in that kind of notoriety. He just wants to be the best saxophone player he can be.
appearance: Gilberto is a neon yellow shark with two fins on each side, one fin atop his head, a dorsal fin on his back and a tail fin with neon pink tips. He has a round, fuzzy neon blue belly. He has round black eyes, a small toothy smile, and gills on both sides of his body.

name: Gildie
bio: Meet Gildie! She's a longtime accountant who cleans up at local trivia nights — she's undefeated for the past four years! This spider crunches numbers, hard candy, and the only thing Gildie is faster at than answering questions, is clacking on her calculator!
appearance: Gildie is a black spider with eight creepy, crawly legs with the legs are black, purple, green, and orange! She has a orange and purple stripe belly and an orange smile. Her eyes are round and black with a white rim around the outside.  She wears a purple witch hat with yellow stars on it with a black belt on it.

name: Giles
bio: Give it up for Giles!  You'll never see this grasshopper without his favortie electric guitar, because he's always working on perfecting tricky riffs. If Giles keeps up this practice routine, he's sure to get into a professional band someday soon.
appearance: Giles is a blue grasshopper with a yellow belly and two blue antennae with fuzzy  yellow tips. His left eye is winking. He also has slightly darker blue wings and pink blushes on his cheeks.

name: Gilma
bio: Gilma collects all kinds of gadgets—even broken gizmos fascinate Gilma! They have so much fun learning how a device works by taking it apart then putting it back together again. Gilma wears a tool belt with mini tools perfect for tinkering with different thingamabobs. Want to see Gilma's work?
appearance: Gilma is a caterpillar with a segmented body. Their head is yellow followed by a yellowish-green in a repeating pattern. They have a white belly, yellow antennae with yellowish-green rounded tips. They have round, black eyes with salmon blush and rounded black glasses.

name: Gimlet
bio: Watch out for Gimlet! This little goat loves to scare other 'Mallows by sneaking up behind them and shouting "Boo! His family is waiting for this phase to past, until then. everyone stays on guard. Do you think you could scare Gimlet?
appearance: Gimlet is a cream goat with numerous grey markings. These are found inside his ears, in a triangle pattern on his forehead, on his muzzle, and on the underside of his tail. He also has a fluffy white goatee. He has two pale grey triangular horns and round black eyes. He has a fluffy white belly with grey dots.

name: Gina
bio: Sweet and spicy describes this gingerbread girl! Gina is the head chef for the North Pole and she loves to test new tasty treats for Santa and the elves. But if they don't eat their veggies - she doesn't let them have any cookies!
appearance: Gina is a golden-brown gingerbread with a ring of wavy white icing around her body. She wears a red bow on the right side of her head and a striped red and white scarf. She has two gumdrop buttons, green and red, which sit below her scarf. She has round eyes with short, straight lashes and a smiling red mouth.

name: Ginger
bio: Ginger is a sassy waitress with a dream in her heart—to dance for the Jazzmallows. When she isn't serving breakfast at the local diner, you can find Ginger in dance class. If you ask nicely, she might even show you her signature move—The Ginger Snap!
appearance: Ginger is a tan cup of latte with a red bottom and a white dot and wave pattern embroidered on it. She has light brown milk pouring out of her top, she has a white lid and swirled milk foam on top with red and green sprinkles, a gingerbread, and a brown and white striped straw. She has black eyes with lashes, a smiling mouth, and red blush

name: Gino
bio: If deli worker Gino made your six-inch hoagie, you might want to measure its length. This hungry hyena tends to slice himself a little bite, especially when it comes to his favorite: roast beef on rye! Thankfully, his sandwiches are so good his customers hardly notice!
appearance: Gino is a burgundy hyena with darker spots on his body. He has white, rounded ears and plum inner ears, with burgundy fuzz going from the top of his head to his back. He has thick pink eyebrows and belly with a plum muzzle. His eyes are black and so is his nose and cat-like smile.

name: Gio
bio: Gio fears small places, but when he feels trapped, Gio knows all that he has to do is flap his wings. For Gio, there is nothing more freeing then flying over the tallest buildings and bridges to downtown. Ready to soar with Gio?
appearance: Gio is a gargoyle, a dragon-like creature. He is a dull white with black speckles, almost resembling an inverse of a starry night sky. He has a grey belly, a grey snout, and open eyes. His wings are black with skeletal white markings on them, and he has dark grey horns with lighter grey ears.

name: Giovana
bio: Giovana and her bestieWuare ready for spring! They live in a rainy town and when it stops, it's time for fun! They love to splash around in the puddles, smell the flowers, and watch everything change from dull to bright green. Do you want to join them?

name: Giovanni
bio: Giovanni is the quarterback of kindergarten football team. A leader on and off the field, this big-hearted walrus is always inspiring his teammates to play with positivity and put the fun in football. The other teams sometimes even let him score just to watch his signature touchdown: The Giovanni Jump-a-Round!
appearance: Giovanni is an aqua walrus with flippers on each side of his body. His muzzle and belly are white, as are the tusks which are protruding from his mouth. He has black closed eyes, straight whiskers and an aqua nose. He also has a tuft of dark aqua hair.

name: Gisla
bio: Meet Gisla. For Gisla each day begins and ends with a mindful meditation. She takes a deep breath, breathing in the future, and lets it go, breathing out the past, knowing in life that not every question needs an answer.
appearance: Gisla is a teal Hamsa Hand with various purple, white, and blue designs throughout. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with a third blue eye on her forehead.

name: Gist
bio: Kiai! Gist has a blue belt in karate and he would love to show you his favorite moves. When Gist isn't in class, he practices outside in his backyard, or watches karate movies for inspiration. Gist always brings carrot and celery stick snacks to class-he loves the crunch sound they make!
appearance: Gist has a green and blue can with bubbles on the right side and on bottom and top there grey. The soda lid is blue and green, and he has closed eyes and a red smile.

name: Giuseppe
bio: Giuseppe is a menace with the label-maker! His addiction started with the spice rack, graduated to cabinet doors, and now encompasses every square-inch of his—as labeled on the front door—“Spanish-style cottage.” The only thing Giuseppe won’t label? His “problem,” because he swears he doesn’t have one!
appearance: Giuseppe is a teal clownfish with two large light blue stripes, one above his face and one in line with his teal fins. These stripes are lined in black. His belly is white and they have two black eyes and a smiling mouth with small dimples.

name: Gjemail
bio: Meet Gjemail. Gjemail and his family come together every year to celebrate Dia de Los Muertos. They create a beautiful altars full of bright, orange marigolds, candied pumpkins, and sugar skulls. What traditions does your family celebrate? Gjemail would love to hear all about it!
appearance: Gjemail is a spider with an ornately decorated black body and white face paint around his eyes and mouth. He is wearing “sugar skull” Dia de Los Muertos-inspired makeup. His legs are black, green, and salmon. He has black eyes which are framed by orange face paint.

name: Glady
bio: Meet Glady. Her job in construction keeps her busy, but she always finds a way to beat the heat! Glady keeps things sweet, even in her side gig as a poet. Do you want to hear a poem?
appearance: Glady is a brightly colored rainbow ice cream, topped with chocolate and rainbow sprinkles. Her scoop overflows from her cone, creating a wavy pattern. Her cone is brown with a darker brown diamond pattern. She has curled lashes and a winking right eye, a smiling mouth and pink blush on either cheek.

name: Gladys
bio: Gladys works in accounts receivable at the local power plant. As much as her co-workers enjoy chatting with her in the break room—or trying one of her famous Gladys apple strudels—they do wonder how much work she gets done each day. According to Gladys: enough to warrant a raise!
appearance: Gladys is a pink seal with two flat flippers on each side. She has a round, white muzzle and fuzzy belly. She has round, black eyes with lashes, black whiskers and a black nose and mouth.

name: Glaudini
bio: Glaudini is a musical theater sound designer! With his masterful mixing skills, he makes sure every actor sound phenomenal, even the understudy's, understudy's understudy. Glaudini's method you ask? Treat each production like your best friend on a bad day—listen well and prepare for screaming!
appearance: Glaudini is a brown cat with pointed, triangular ears with pink inner ears. He has a white belly. His nose and mouth are pale pink and framed by two white whiskers on either side. He has round, black eyes ringed in teal.

name: Gleb
bio: Meet Gleb. He's what you might call a morning 'Mallow. He wakes up at sunrise, bursting with energy! He loves the first hot sip of cocoa, and early hikes in the crisp morning air! He just unwrapped a new bike and can't wait to go on a sunrise ride! Set your alarm and come along!
appearance: Gleb is a cream white color bear with small rounded ears. He has round black eyes, a grey muzzle with a black nose and mouth. He is wearing a black hat with a gold trim and decorations, and a light blue vest with gold decorations and a black belt with a gold buckle.

name: Glena
bio: Glena is a water baby and loves all kinds of water activities. Whether it's scuba diving, snorkeling or surfing, you can always find them near the beach. Currently, Glena is working hard and saving up to buy their first sailboat. Sailing lessons, here we come!
appearance: Glena is a purple eggplant with a pale purple belly. They have a green stem and leaves atop their head. They have round, black eyes with curled lashes, pale pink blush and a red smiling mouth.

name: Glixa
bio: Glixa is a makeup artist and loves to show off her skills. She especially loves to do calaveras for the celebration of Día de Los Muertos. She adds gems, glitter, and sometimes even feathers to complete her favorite look. Are you ready to become a beautiful Calavera?
appearance: Glixa is a white Squishmallow with a round, white face. Her large, black eyes and smiling mouth are decorated with teal and black details. She has a purple design on her forehead and a large, colorful flower design on her body.

name: Gloria
bio: Meet Gloria. She loves cooking, comic books, and sci-fi movies. She wants to be an archeologist when she grows up. Gloria and her friends play all afternoon in the back yard pretending they're digging for ancient alien artifacts! Want to join?Halloween 2024:Meet Gloria. She wants to be an archeologist when she grows up! Gloria and her friends play all afternoon in the backyard pretending they're digging for ancient dino artifacts. She's planning a trip to the natural history museum soon. Want to join?
appearance: Gloria is an olive green frog with a pale yellow belly. Her eyes sit on top of her head and they're black-rimmed in white. She has prominent nostrils above her smiling mouth, and a pale pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Gobo
bio: Gobo has won the Vintage Video Game Championship three years in a row! Think he can win again this year? Gobo speed-plays puzzle and block building games and has developed quite a following. This 'Mallow is on his way to become a gaming legend!
appearance: Gobo is a lime colored gummy bear with a dark green tummy. His has lime ears with dark green inside. His face consists of slightly darker green then lime and has a lime nose and mouth.

name: Gobrianna
bio: Gobrianna is a pop star with a dream: to write a great Thanksgiving song! Tired of Halloween and Christmas getting all the attention, Gobrianna is determined to top the charts, even it takes a little brainstorming. Hey, what do you think about 'Lets All Go Back For Seconds'?
appearance: Gobrianna is a turkey with a dark red head and beige body. They have a floral belly decorated with leaves, mushrooms, flowers, sticks, and acorns. They have fuzzy wings, red caruncle, a yellow beak, and black eyes. Their tail has yellow-tipped feathers, with yellow to orange, and red to light red patterns.

name: Goldie
bio: Goldie is celebrating 150 Years of Cedar Point Fun. Whether walking the sandy beach, staying at Hotel Breakers, watching an amazing show, eating funnel cakes, or riding the best collection of anywhere, Goldie loves nothing more than spending a day at Cedar Point.
appearance: Goldie is a golden brown bear with round ears. They have a white belly, muzzle and inner ears, with the Cedar Point 150 Years logo printed on their belly in gold. They have round, black eyes, along with a black nose and mouth.

name: Goldine
bio: Goldine works at the local news station, hooking up mics and mixing sound. She records sound for the morning news and a live talk show that follows it. Goldine has very early mornings, but when she clocks out, there is so much left of the day! Would you like to spend the afternoon with Goldine?
appearance: Goldine is a bright yellow bunny Squishmallow with a white spot on her stomach, black eyes and whiskers, and a pink nose and mouth. She has two short eyelashes on each eye and is winking with her left eye. She has very long ears and a short tail. She holds a green, white, and pink easter egg in her paws.

name: Gonza
bio: Gonza sings lead vocals in The Brite Shells! She started the band with her brother,Stew, and they got their best buds together to help play instruments, too. Gonza loves to write new songs and play the maracas! Want to help Gonza write some lyrics?
appearance: Gonza is a multi-colored Easter egg.  She has a yellow face and top half of her body is an eggshell consisting of green and orange waves. The bottom half of her body is a cracked eggshell in orange, pink, orange, and green with a pale purple stripe running across her bottom with white dots nearing the top. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Gordon
bio: You don't have to fear, Gordon is one of the friendliest Squishmallows around! He loves helping others so much that one day he wants to start his own nonprofit!
appearance: Gordon is a pale grey shark with two fins on each side; he has two dorsal fins on his head and on his lower back with a tail at the bottom. He has a round, white belly, round black eyes and a small smile.

name: Gorm
bio: Gorm collects coins! He saves them in velvet bags and loves the clinking sound they make when he carries the around. This little Viking has everything from pressed pennies to ancient silver, but do you want to know which coins are Gorms favorite? Milk chocolate!
appearance: Gorm is a light-green dragon with a white nose and belly. He wears a silver Viking helmet with yellow and orange horns. The inside of his wings and nostrils are dark green. He has two large black eyes.

name: Grace
bio: Grace is quite bootiful and one to fear during a competition. She has participated in pageants all over the area. What's her talent? Ghost bustin' out some of her favourite dance moves.
appearance: Grace is a white ghost Squishmallow with a wisp from her head. She has round, black eyes and a wide smile, showing off pointed teeth and a red tongue. 'Boo!' is written on her belly in light purple, outlined in orange.

name: Gracelynn
bio: Meet Gracelynn the Winter Fox. Snowball fights and building snow forts are two of her favorite things. She loves building a whimsical snow world with her friends, and this year they want to build a snow castle! Do you want to build a snow world with Gracelynn?
appearance: Gracelynn is a white fox with large, triangular ears, the inside of which are glittery pink. She has light grey markings on her face, including fluffy cheeks. She has wide, cartoon eyes which are brown, and a black nose and mouth. Her belly is very faintly striped in rainbow. She also has a version with her eyes closed with eyelashes as a Target exclusive.

name: Gracia
bio: Meet Gracia. This 'Mallow loves all forms of dance, especially ballet, and dreams of being principal in her favorite ballet. She loves the feeling she gets when she steps on the stage and how the music helps her move. Will you bring her a bouquet for her next performance?
appearance: Gracia is a tan meerkat with a cream face and belly. She has black ovals around her eyes and inner ears the same color. Her ears sit low on her head and are pointed at the tip. She has round, black eyes with a white rim and a black nose and mouth.

name: Gracie
bio: Are you ready to meet the queen of the lagoon? Gracie is one of the most glamorous girls you'll meet. Her style is a little retro mixed with old school Mallowood, thanks to her favorite vintage shops.
appearance: Gracie is a combination of a cat, unicorn and mermaid, and has features of each. The top half of her body is pastel pink and she has large triangular ears. The inside of these are silver, matching her horn. Both the spiral on her horn and her nose and mouth are a soft periwinkle blue. She has closed eyes and two black whiskers on each cheek.

name: Graciela
bio: Graciela manages the supermodel career of her kitty-cat bestieMs. Miss. Though the hours are long—and she's often asking her yoga instructor 'where's my zen?'—Graciela knows the best ways to decompress. Her favorites? Reality TV, screaming into the void, and games on her phone!
