appearance: Graciela is a teal green cactus with two, uneven cactus arms on her sides. There are light green spikes all over her body except for her light teal belly. She has two flowers with petals and red pistil one on her head and one on her left arm. She has pale pink blush, black eyes with lashes, and a pink mouth.

name: Grady
bio: Congratulations to Grady This wheelchair-assisted stallion just placed first in a disability-inclusive horse derby. Always one to give back, Grady is super excited to use his winnings to help train the next generation of racehorses on wheels.
appearance: Grady is a light grey horse with a white stripe on his forehead. He also has a peach muzzle and a white belly. His whole body is covered with dark grey splotches, the same color as his fluffy mane and tail. He has round, black eyes and black nostrils. The insides of his ears are peach.

name: Grant
bio: This gutsy goat has one dream: to become a soccer player! He plays soccer with his friends at the park, at school, and at home with his friends. After they win, he celebrates with his favorite, a chocolate swirl ice cream cone.
appearance: Grant is a light brown or tan goat with numerous white markings. These are found inside his ears, in a triangle pattern on his forehead, on his muzzle, his belly and on the underside of his tail. He also has a fluffy white goatee. He has two pale brown triangular horns and round black eyes.

name: Grayson
bio: This Squishmallow knows the most important meal of the day is breakfast, and for Grayson that can only mean one thing. Waffles. Waffles with peanut butter, berries, or even chocolate chips. Can you guess his favorite holiday? National Waffle Day of course!
appearance: Grayson is a grey-blue dinosaur with a white belly. He has textured, dark teal spines running down his back. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Grecia
bio: Cinnamon rolls and peppermint lattes are the key to Grecia's heart. She loves the festive taste and the feeling of being cozy, even when it's hot outside!
appearance: Grecia is a pegacorn, a combination of a pegasus and a unicorn. This means that she has a unicorn hornandpegasus wings, all of which are metallic pink. Her inner ears also match. Her body is musk pink and she has a white muzzle and belly. Her fluffy mane and tail are white. She has closed eyes with long, curled lashes.

name: Greeley
bio: Greeley keeps her library card up to date and goes book browsing every weekend. She always returns books on time, no matter how many she borrows, and is careful to keep them clean and intact. Greeley spends so much time at the library, she's thinking about becoming a librarian!
appearance: Greeley is a jellyfish with a green to peach pink gradient and white markings on her bell. The end of her bell has a wavy design. Her tentacles are made from multi-colored ribbons that match her body colors.

name: Greer
bio: Greer doesn't just deliver the news—she sings the news! This meteorologist loves to add a musical spin to her daily weather report. Whether yodeling the daily temperatures or rapping about rainfall, her beautiful voice brightens the gloomiest of forecasts!
appearance: Greer is a yellow grasshopper with a pale-yellow belly and darker yellow antennae with fuzzy yellow tips. She has dark yellow wings, pink blushes on her cheeks, black eyes with lashes with her left eye closed and a black smile.

name: Greggor
bio: Meet Greggor. He's a modern moose. He lives in a penthouse downtown and loves going to art museums and late-night dinners. He enjoys defying expectations, a lively debate, or diving into a single subject and learning all there is to know about it!
appearance: Greggor is a marbled brown and sand moose. He has large, sparkling gold antlers which stand tall on his head and curve inwards. His muzzle and inner ears are brown and he has a fluffy white belly. He has round, black eyes and brown nostrils.

name: Gregory
bio: Meet Gregory, the go-to photographer for all things nature. Gregory takes amazing photos from all over the world, he just got back from a trip in the Mallow Mountains! He loves sharing the amazing things he sees with other 'mallows. Where should he go on his next photo-adventure?
appearance: Gregory is a black goat with numerous white markings. These are found inside his ears, in a triangle pattern on his forehead, on his muzzle, his belly and on the underside of his tail. He has two gray triangular horns and round black eyes rimmed in white.

name: Greta
bio: Greta has resting bear face - she always looks grumpy but she's a very happy ‘Mallow. Sometimes she's just too busy enjoying life to smile. Greta wants to be a counselor for wilderness camp to teach trail safety, she loves exploring and sharing her mountains with friends.
appearance: Greta is a chocolate brown bear with round ears. She has a pale tan belly, inner ears, and a marking on her muzzle which is narrow between her eyes and widens around her black nose and mouth. Her eyes are round and black.

name: Gretchen
bio: Gretchen loves hanging out in her treehouse, sipping pineapple juice with her crazy straw, and watching the clouds go by. She loves to daydream about mystical adventures while the world moves around her. Take a seat and daydream with Gretchen!
appearance: Gretchen is a sloth patterned with splotches of bright, fluorescent colors. While pink is the most prominent color, she also has blue, orange, purple and green patches. The banded markings around her eyes are pink, and she has a light grey muzzle. Her face and belly are white. She has cheerful, shiny eyes with short lashes, a pink, heart-shaped nose and a happy smile showing a pale pink tongue.

name: Grey
bio: Jigsaw puzzles and macaroni are two Grey's favorite things. He loves trying new recipes with veggies, bacon, or even breadcrumbs. Do you have a recipe to share?
appearance: Grey is a Blue Dragon. He also resembles as a teddy bear. He is glittery wings and spikes on his head. Grey has a white muzzle and belly. He has white toes on his feet.

name: Griella
bio: Meet Griella, they love lazy Sundays and breakfast in bed. In the afternoon they hit up their favorite sandwich shop and order the number seven with extra pastrami. At night they love concerts, karaoke, or a long car ride with loud music. They know the words so come sing along!
appearance: Griella is a brown cow with a winking right eye and a stripe of white running through the center of their face. They have small, tan horns and wear a rainbow bow on their right horn. The inside of their ears are white and they have a pale pink muzzle.  Their belly is white and features splotches with a pastel, rainbow gradient.

name: Griffin
bio: Griffin is one motivated 'Mallow. From keeping fit at the gym to keeping tidy with his dustpan, you can always find him doing his best. And when he needs to relax a bit? A historic building tour with his bestieYongdoes just the trick!
appearance: Griffin is a tropical blue tiger with two white fur patches on each side. He has a cheetah pattern and a white fuzzy belly. He has rounded black eyes with a muzzle and his long teeth are white.

name: Griffith
bio: Ready for a fun Valentine's Day picnic? Griffith and her besties,FluxieandCordelia, host big outdoor lunches with lots of cheesy dishes and chocolate treats. All 'Mallows are invited to join the Valentine's Day fun! Griffith even makes mini daisy bouquets for every guest to bring home.
appearance: Griffith is a pink caterpillar with a segmented body, her head is a peachy pink with cyan antennae and round, hot pink tips. Below her head is a rounded cyan segment that protrudes slightly, and a hot pink segment underneath with a white belly. She has black eyes, a black mouth and light pink blush as she wears pink heart-shaped glasses,

name: Grin
bio: Grin is a rugged outdoorsman who also enjoys woodworking. When not in his wood shop or hiking mountain trails, he spends his time in flea markets hunting for unique gifts for his friends and family.
appearance: Grin is a falcon with a black head and pale grey body. His small wings are black and he has black speckles on his body. He has a round, white belly and pale orange feet with sharp, black talons. His beak is the same shade of orange and has a black tip. He has angry black eyes with an orange iris. On his back, theTalon: The Grip of Fearlogo is printed on the left side, withDorney Parkwritten on the right.

name: Griz
bio: Meet Griz. They love road trips, pineapple ice cream and zoning out to music. Griz has a list of the top 10 best places to drive and they can't wait to get started. The only thing stopping Griz is going by themself, do you want to be their co-pilot?
appearance: Griz is a sandy brown dog with chocolate brown patches over their right ear, around their left eye and on their belly. Their ears are large and floppy, standing up from their head. They have a pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls, with a rounded black nose and round black eyes.

name: Groovy
bio: Groovy isn't just groovy--she's way far out! This disco diva shakes her groove thing wherever life takes her. Though her family sometimes get embarrassed when she does 'the wacky parrot at the grocery store, Groovy can't help it. After all, she was born to boogie!
appearance: Groovy  is a hedgehog with a rainbow body. Her snout is white and her ears are lavender. She has a purple nose and a winking expression with lashes. Her face and belly are periwinkle, and white spines which decorate her back.

name: Guadalupe
bio: Guadalupe draws cartoons for her town's local newspaper. You can catch her art weekly in the Sunday edition! Guadalupe comes from a family of artists and has been drawing since she was a little 'Mallow. Does your family have any common traits or skills?
appearance: Guadalupe is a black Squishmallow with a skull-shaped white face. She has large yellow eyes, exposed skull-like teeth, and is decorated with intricate Sugar Skull-style designs all over. She strongly resembles the 4.5" version ofDelfina's 2021 redesign.

name: Guardian
bio: SCI12 #28 Squishdate 07.28.2023
appearance: Guardian is a red dragon with yellow detailing and white spikes all over their head. They have the word "Guardian" embroidered around their belly during 2021 season. He was not seen again until the 2024 season when he was re-released without his name on his belly.

name: Guardo
bio: Guardo stops for every garage sale he sees! He knows there are tiny treasures among old fax machines and porcelain knick-knacks. Guardo really takes his time to search through everything and always introduces himself to the garage sale host. Have you ever been to a garage sale?
appearance: Guardo is a green candle. On top of his head he has a yellow flame which is melting mint wax from on top of his head. He has a mint sticker with a Christmas tree on it. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Guinevere
bio: Guinevere studies Gargoyle Design at the Stoker Academy of Architecture! She loves giving her creations cute and kooky nicknames—like Leslie, or Samantha—and always makes sure to ask them how they’d like their wings done. Clipped, cropped, or a Guinevere surprise?
appearance: Guinevere is a peach praying mantis with an off-white belly and pink antennae with fuzzy yellow tips. She has sunset front legs, baby pink blushes on her cheeks and black eyes and a black smile. On the back of Guinevere she has shiny sunset wings.

name: Gunda
bio: Gunda and her brotherHanselcommunicate in Manwhish! It's a mixture of Mandarin + Swahili + Finnish and perfect for planning pranks. Though they're sometimes not sure what they're saying—neither know Mandarin, Swahili or Finnish, after all—that's what their other twin language (whispering in English) is there to clear up!
appearance: Gunda is a red bunny with white seed surrounding her upper body. Her lower body is dipped with chocolate with a swirl of white icing. She has long red floppy ears with neon green leaves above her head with a green stem. She has closed eyes with a red nose and mouth.

name: Gunther
bio: Meet Gunther. Don't be fooled by his spikes and scales, this Dino is a big softy! He loves to knit while watching his favorite romantic comedies! He's currently knitting warm and fuzzy blankets for all the dogs and cats at the local animal shelter. Want to help?
appearance: Gunther is a tie-dye blue, teal and white dinosaur with a white belly. A ridge of textured, turquoise spines appears atop his head. He has two white horns on his head and a large white horn on his face. He has black, round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Guri
bio: Meet Guri! If you ever need a helping hand, Guri will be there for you! Guri loves to spread kindness and will be there whenever you call. Fun fact about Guri: he gets to helpNickwith his nice and naughty lists; which one will you be on?
appearance: Guri is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. He wears a red hat printed with white snowflakes atop his head, and a green outfit with grey accents on his bottom half.

name: Gustavo
bio: Gustavo is the life of the party, he loves to have a good time with friends. When he has people over, they grill, have bonfires, and even swim in the pool! All he needs is a DJ, can you help him out?
appearance: Gustavo is a brown dog with upright, triangular ears. He has a white facial marking which creates a stripe between his eyes and covers his muzzle. He wears a yellow sombrero with a triangular, green and red pattern on its brim. He also wears an outfit inspired by the Mexican flag which features stripes in red, white and green. His eyes, nose and mouth are black.

name: Gustavus
bio: Gustavus is a popular pup and has a lot of friends but sometimes he prefers to be alone with his thoughts. He used to think he was weird for wanting to be alone sometimes, but now he knows it's good to have his own time too.
appearance: Gustavus is a dog with a patchy grey body. His muzzle is white with a dark grey nose, and he has a darker grey patch around his right eye. Both his floppy, dark grey ears and white belly are very fluffy.

name: Gwen
bio: Meet Gwen! This unicorn is not your average Squishmallow. Gwen loves catching the waves at her favorite beach. She loves the friendly competition of the other surfers and has won many boogie downs by the water. Are you ready for a lesson from your favorite unicorn?
appearance: Gwen is a unicorn with a cloud-like pattern on her body, a blend of pale blue and white. Her mane, muzzle, inner ears and belly are white. She has a sparkly sky blue horn with a blue spiral. She has closed, happy eyes with curled lashes. She has the phrase "UNI TASTIC" embroidered on her belly in blue with a pink heart in the center. Her5" editionfeatures the phrase 'XOXO' with a heart on either side instead.

name: Gwendle
bio: Meet Gwendle. This 'Mallow is an expert bird watcher. He keeps a journal and writes down all the different types of birds he sees on his hikes. He keeps native plants around his house to attract his favorite bird of all, the hummingbird! Grab some binoculars and join him!
appearance: Gwendle is a fuzzy, light pink pig with darker pink splotches. His snout and belly are blush pink. He has floppy, triangular ears and round, black eyes.

name: Gwendolyn
bio: Congratulations to Gwendolyn! This batty just earned her PhD in Mad Science. While the rest of her class hopes to use their degree to create monsters or travel back in time, Gwendolyn has a different dream in mind—to glow in the dark! Think she can do it?
appearance: Gwendolyn is a strawberry-themed fruit bat. She have yellow pointy inner ears and wings with a light green stem on her head. She has a plain white belly with yellow seeds surrounding her body. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth with two small white fangs.

name: Habib
bio: As an only child, it's taking time for Habib to get used to sharing. When school started, they were taking all the paints into one corner for themselves, but now Habib understands everyone needs access to all different colors. Except for teal. Habib's not ready to share that one yet.
appearance: Habib is a red apple coated in purple sugar candy coating with various sprinkles on top of their with a spider on the right side. They have a brown stick sticking out of the top their head. Their eyes are black with a black smiling mouth.

name: Hadeon
bio: Who has the prettiest kitchen in all the land? Hadeon does! He knows the heart of every home is the kitchen, so his is spruced up with decorative hanging pots, fruit plates, and a place setting just for you! Pull up a chair and let Hadeon whip up a tasty meal just for you!
appearance: Hadeon is a light green grasshopper with green wings. He has a pink belly with red stripes, pink cheeks, and two antennae with shiny pink hearts on the tips. He has round black eyes, a smiling mouth, and pink blush on his cheeks.

name: Hailey
bio: Meet Hailey. She's a park ranger who loves to educate about the outdoors! She greets visitors at the park entrance and makes sure guests know all the do's and don'ts to staying safe and keeping the park clean. If you're ever in need of a guide, Hailey is the bigfoot for you!
appearance: Hailey is a bigfoot with a pink multi-colored fuzzy mane on her head, and long shaggy ears. She has a white face and a pink belly, and white pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has plain black eyes, and has a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face.

name: Haizley
bio: Meet Haizley. She's working hard at her swim classes everyday after school. She's already mastered the backstroke and  the butterfly stroke! When she's not practicing her swimming skills she loves helping her dad make dinner and watching nature  documentaries!
appearance: Haizley is a light grey hippo with a large, round snout. Two square teeth poke out from beneath her snout, and her round black eyes rest atop it. She has small, curled ears with pink insides, as well as a pink belly. She has glittery silver wings on either side of her body and a glittery silver horn with a gold spiral protruding from her head.

name: Hakim
bio: Meet Hakim. There isn't a sport or activity that he can't do. From the moment he opens his eyes, he's moving around and accomplishing every task on his long to-do list for the day! Don't get in Hakim's way when he is on a mission, but once he's done, you can find Hakim on the couch.
appearance: Hakim is a blue hammerhead shark with four fins, one on each side, two on his back, and a tail fin. He has a round white belly. He has round black eyes, a small black smile, and gills on each side.

name: Hal
bio: Say hi to Hal! Hal is a mechanic in training, and loves to learn all about cars and trucks! Hal’s practicing so that he can build a custom car one day and go on a  road trip! He wants to see the ocean, eat new foods, and maybe even make friends along the way.
appearance: Hal’s body is a golden yellow with dark blue spines running down his back. He has a white tummy with soft ridges in it, as well as round black eyes and a simple smile.

name: Halima
bio: The perfect weekend for Halima starts out with a big stack of pancakes at a cozy cabin with friends, to quilt! Last month on their quilting trip, Halima and her friends had so much fun that they almost didn't finish their quilts!
appearance: Halima is a fox with a splotchy pale blue and white coat. The inside of her ears and her belly are both white. She has a white, mask-like marking around her closed eyes. Her tail is mostly the same as her body but ends with a white tip.

name: Halisa
bio: You won't be at the park long without a big hello from Halisa. There's always a big commotion when she and her friends skate by. They all met her friends at the skatepark and every summer they say it will be the best one of their lives. Do you want to join in the fun?
appearance: Halisa is a neon orange hamster with a white front and inner ears. She has small paws which stick out at the front. She has a wide-open mouth with a pink tongue. Her eyes are closed with a pink blush under each.

name: Hallie
bio: Meet Hallie! This narwhal is quite the curious and enjoys a good mystery. She loves watching detective movies and pretending to help solve the case or playing detective with her friends. When she grows up, she hopes to become a super sleuth.
appearance: Hallie is a tie-dyed narwhal, predominantly purple and blue, but with traces of pink and a white belly.  She has two fins on each side and a dorsal fin on her back. An elongated, sparkly silver horn protrudes from her head. She has sparkling black eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Hallie the Hamster
bio: Hallie is a nature girl, and loves to care for the Earth. She scatters seeds around her home to grow yummy vegetables and pretty flowers. Her favorite food is carrots!
appearance: Hallie is a grey hamster in the style of a laying Hug Mee with three darker grey stripes on her forehead, a darker grey pattern across her back, and tail. She has glittery pink inner ears, a white snout, and four grey feet. The bottom half of her face is white, with pink blush and a pink nose with a cat-like smile. She has black eyes and has a winking expression.

name: Halton
bio: Blink and you might miss Halton. This speedy 'Mallow loves a good underwater race with his friends! He doesn't mind if he wins or loses, he just loves to go fast! The only time Halton slows down is to eat. His favorite food? Super spicy, extra-loaded nachos!
appearance: Halton is an orange stingray with a white belly. He has large fins on either side of his body which are triangular in shape. He has a long, thin tail and orange gills on the sides of his body. His light orange back is covered in large  spots of blue, yellow and orange. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Halver
bio: If you ever need an expert in history, Halver's your 'Mallow. She loves fun facts, trivia and any sentence that starts with "Did you know..?" If you think that you have some interesting knowledge she might not know, she'd love to hear it. Talking about history is Halver's perfect day!
appearance: Halver is a blue and white tie-die corgi with two straight ears atop her head. Her inner ears and belly are white and she has fluffy, cloud-shaped eyebrows. She has round, black eyes with a black nose and mouth.

name: Ham
bio: Ham loves home runs, extra butter on his popcorn, and cheering on his favorite team. He goes to games with his cousins and sometimes there are so many they take up a whole row! Want to join them at the next game?
appearance: Ham has an army green body, with white belly. He has an embroidered snout with two teeth at the front and a further two on each side of his jaw. His round, black eyes sit on knobs atop his head. A row of green spikes run along his spine.

name: Hammie
bio: Hammie runs an ice hotel! the hospitable mushroom took his love for winter into an icy adventure for all his guests. Everything in Hammie's hotel is made of ice, including the igloo huts and furniture. But don't worry every bed is topped with a super cozy thermal mattress and lots of fluffy quilts!
appearance: Hammie is a mushroom with a maroon stalk and a metallic red cap. The top of his cap is made from red velvet fabric with maroon rhinestones, and the underside is a less saturated red. His stalk makes up his body and includes a round, white belly. He has round, black eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Hanina
bio: Hanina is one talkative cupcake, her friends joke that she almost never stops! She loves school and learning new things, especially science. She wants to have her own science blog where she shares cool new things she reads about or shows fun experiements she's working on.
appearance: Hanina is a brown cake with blue frosting on top and in a line through her center. her head and the lower half of her body are decorated with rainbow sprinkles. she has a blue candle with a yellow flame in the center of her head.HAPPY BIRTHDAYis written in bold, rainbow lettering across her front. she has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Hank
bio: Hank loves mountain biking, roller coasters, and bubble baths. You can find him at the bike shop or trying to plan his next big roller coaster adventure - one day he might even design a bike/roller coaster hybrid ride!
appearance: Hank is a light aqua hippo with a large, round snout. Two square teeth poke out from beneath his snout, and his round black eyes rest atop it. He has small, curled ears with light grey insides, as well as a light grey belly.

name: Hank the Scarecrow
appearance: Hank has a tan body and a brown nose with a small smile. He wears a pointed grey hat with blond hair peeking from underneath. He has a green plaid print on his belly.

name: Hanna
bio: Have you met Hanna? This sweet Squishmallow loves writing poetry and every year writes a poem for all of her friends. Maybe one day you will find her poems in the Squishmallow Shop!
appearance: Hanna is a purple hippo with a large, round snout. Two square teeth poke out from beneath her snout, and her round black eyes rest atop it. She has small, curled ears with light pink insides, as well as a grey belly.

name: Hans
bio: Default Hans:"Hans has seen every movie ever and loves to eat pudding, especially with sprinkles. Actually, when it comes to food, he's willing to try whatever someone puts on his plate, probably because he is so open to change and adventure. He visits his family in Europe every summer where they like to go to museums and explore new countries. Last year on his birthday, August 6, his family surprised him with a special trip to the Alps!"
appearance: Hans is a hedgehog with a chocolate brown body. His snout and ears are sand-colored, and he has a black nose and eyes. His face and belly are a peachy color, the same as the spines which decorate his back.

name: Hansel
bio: Hansel and his sisterGundalove playing pranks! They use their secret twin language to hatch their cheeky little plans—like organizing a canned food drive, or planting new trees at the park—and haven't been caught once. Last year, they even threw a community Easter parade and got a thank you from the mayor!
appearance: Hansel is a purple bunny. He has a blueberry on top of his and blueberry syrup dripping from the top. He has long floppy purple bunny ears. On the bottom of his body there is a graham cracker base crust. He has closed eyes with a purple nose and mouth and whiskers.

name: Hara
bio: Hara dreams of thrilling audiences with her dramatic acting skills. This bunny is so dedicated to her craft, she memorizes all her lines before rehearsal! Hara is ready for the big stage. Want to go to her theatrical debut?
appearance: Hara is a forest green bunny Squishmallow with a white spot on her stomach, black eyes and whiskers, and a pink nose and mouth and is winking with her right eye. She has very long ears and a short tail. She holds a yellow, pink, and purple easter egg in her paws and a pink pixelated like heart on the egg.

name: Harlan
bio: Harlan grows beautiful orchids! This gentle gator trims and waters all his orchids so carefully, it's no wonder they bloom into so many pretty colors. Harlan thinks it's time to take his hobby to the next level and open up an orchid shop! Do you want to take home some orchids for yourself?
appearance: Harlan is an alligator with a blue body and a white belly. He has an embroidered snout with two teeth at the front and a further two on each side of his jaw. His round, black eyes sit on knobs atop his head. A row of cyan spikes run along his spine.

name: Harley
bio: Harley is an aqua koala with rainbow tie-dye ears and four eyelashes on each eye. Her stomach is holographic rainbow with small silver dots. She has a large, black nose and a smiling mouth.
appearance: Harley is an aqua koala with rainbow tie-dye ears and four eyelashes on each eye. Her stomach is holographic rainbow with small silver dots. She has a large, black nose and a smiling mouth.

name: Harlow
bio: Harlow loves shaved ice, sushi, and being cozy. She especially enjoys fancy weekend camping trips with friends! Harlow is an expert glamper and is thinking about starting a glamping app. Would you go glamping with Harlow?
appearance: Harlow is a light blue sloth with a tie-dyed, fuzzy tummy. She has a glittery silver snout and markings around her eyes, as well as a silver nose. Her eyes are closed and her face is  white.

name: Harmony
bio: Hello from Harmony, who teaches music for many of the Squishmallow squad! Her favorite thing to teach is music history, that's how she first fell in love with music. Her first instrument was piano, now she can play 10 different instruments.
appearance: Harmony is a pink bird with two fluffy wings and a yellow belly. She has round, black eyes with straight lashes and a golden yellow beak. She wears a sparkly rose gold crown atop her head.

name: Harper
bio: Harper has a love for building cars and airplane models. She is considered the problem solver of the Squishmallows friend group. Harper seeks new and creative ways to connect people and objects together.
appearance: Harper is a pastel pink bunny with long, floppy ears. Her belly is an even lighter shade of pink. Her eyes are closed and she has two black whiskers on either side of her candy pink nose.

name: Harper the Hedgehog
bio: Harper gives the best "hedgehugs" in the world! Just ask her friends. She is sweet and spunky and always thinks of the best games to play at sleepovers!
appearance: Harper is a hedgehog in the style of a laying Hug Mee. She has a tan body with a fluffy, brown back representing a hedgehog's quills. She has a white lower body and muzzle, with round ears, and 4 paws. She has glittery, pink inner ears and pink blush. She has black eyes with white sparkles, black nose, and a curved mouth.

name: Harpo
bio: Harpo owns Skim Milk, a library cafe for speed readers! If you finish your book before the ice in your latte melts, you get your drink for free! Turns out, bookworms are quicker readers than Harpo expected, but he's determined to make his business model work - with bigger ice cubes and thicker novels!
appearance: Harpo is a red elephant he has large, floppy ears which resemble butterfly wings that have pink inner ears with a butterfly pattern, which contains magenta dots and pale-purple pattern. He has an embroidered trunk. He has round, black eyes.

name: Harriet
bio: Harriet whips up amazing concoctions in her kitchen, especially for Valentine's Day. She's actually working on a special Valentine's Day cookbook to share with friends.
appearance: Harriet is a wisteria-colored owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. Small, purple feathers decorate her chest. She has round black eyes and a pink, triangular beak. She has a large, shimmering, purple heart emblem on the right side of her chest differentiating her from Holly

name: Harris
bio: Have a problem you can't solve? Never fear, here comes helpful Harris(on) to the rescue! At first, his classmates thought he was being a teachers' pet, but he really just loves to help solve problems.
appearance: Harris(on) is a dog with a light tan colored body. His muzzle and belly are white, and he has a caramel colored patch around his right eye. His fluffy ears are the same color with a chocolate brown underside. He has round, black eyes and a brown nose and mouth. In his new release, instead of having two black eyes, his eyes are closed and shows happy black lashes, and he has his tongue sticking out in a cute little blep.

name: Harrison
bio: Harrison loves hockey, hiking, and horseback riding. He loves almost anything that involves being outdoors! Once a month Harrison is a counselor for Big/Little Mallows and brings the little Mallows on hikes.
appearance: Harrison is a light grey hippo with a large, round snout. Two square teeth poke out from beneath his snout, and his round black eyes rest atop it. He has small, curled ears with pink insides, as well as a pink belly.

name: Harry
bio: Writing music and traveling the world are all Harry thinks about, he loves to make music and wants to see the world! He started by reading poetry and writing down his own feelings and now he's going to school to write music. Maybe one day soon you‘ll hear one of the songs.
appearance: Harry is a brown purple horse with a white diamond on his forehead. He also have a white muzzle and belly. His belly is covered with dark brown splotches, the same color as his fluffy mane and tail. He have round, black eyes and brown nostrils. The insides of his ears are pink. He has a pair of white bunny ears atop his head, and the inside of the bunny ears are teal.

name: Hartman
bio: Last Valentine's Day, Hartman received a special little bouquet of flowers from his bestie,Claudette. Even now that the flowers have dried, he still can't bring himself to throw them away! Hartman still loves how they smell and seeing them every day just makes him smile.
appearance: Hartman is a purple monkey with lavender inner ears, belly, and heart-shaped face. He has purple, pink, and teal glittery hearts on his belly with a dark purple heart-shaped nose. his eyes are rounded and black and he has a black smile.

name: Harvey
bio: Harvey builds big sandwiches that match his appetite. He always uses fresh bread and a variety of fillings, but his favorite by far is tuna salad! The secret ingredient to Harvey's tasty tuna salad is honey mustard if Harvey's extra hungry, he tops off his sandwich with potato chips for a super crunch.
appearance: Harvey is a fuzzy bluish-grey walrus with pale grey flippers on each side of his body. His muzzle and belly are both white and he has two white tusks protruding from his mouth. He has closed eyes, straight whiskers and a black nose.

name: Hasani
bio: Meet Hasani. He may look little, but his personality is larger than life. His silly and lovable demeanor makes him easy to be around, it's hard not to smile when he's around. Hasani has a simple goal for life when he grows up, he wants to be happy!
appearance: Hasani is a hedgehog with a teal blue body. His snout is pale blue, and he has an aqua nose. His face, belly and inner ears are white, and he has black eyes. The spines which decorate his back, resembling sprinkles, are dark blue.

name: Hautely
bio: At one point, Hautely was a stressed out stockbroker. These days, she's a long-haul driver! Though sometimes she misses her fancy lunches and fancier business suits, Hautely wouldn't trade the open road for anything. She especially loves honking the horn!
appearance: Hautely is a cream-colored takeaway coffee cup, she has a teal lid with a tan straw poking out. She has a brown band around her body with a coffee bean in a cream circle surrounded by tan outlines and teal ribbons. She has black eyes with lashes, a red smile, and pink blush.

name: Havin
bio: Meet Havin. They're helpful, handy, and great at thinking outside the box. Havin loves working on maths problems, building birdhouses, and putting together jigsaw puzzles. Havin has a huge sweet tooth, so if you share some sour candy, they'll be your friend forever.
appearance: Havin is an orange insect with a marbled pattern and shiny black wings. Their belly is striped in solid orange and yellow and they have two curled yellow antennae. They have round eyes with short lashes, a smiling mouth and pink blush on each cheek.

name: Hawk
bio: Congratulations to Hawk! This junior chef just placed second on a cooking competition show for little 'Mallows. Tough he was super proud of his chicken katsu tacos finale dish, Hawk sampled his competitor's deconstructed gumbo and agreed the judges made the right decision!
appearance: Hawk is an olive and orange galaxy printed alien. His body is covered with a white pattern of stars. He also has seaweed green speckles on his body and antennae. He has a white belly and a simple, smiling face.

name: Hawley
bio: Hawley loves haunted houses! Every year, they fly to different Halloween festivals and theme parks just to get a good scare. Hawley doesn't scare easily, so if you see them jump, you can be sure it's a frightening experience!
appearance: Hawley is a black bat with tall, bat ears and bat wings. Their inner ears are teal and have a teal spine and ribs embroidered in the middle of their body. Hawley has black eyes with white rings around them, a red smiling mouth with two sharp fangs below their mouth.

name: Hayes
bio: Hayes is an aspiring designer who wants to make suits! These would be no ordinary suits, they would be one-of-a-kind! Hayes learned how to sew and dabbles in fun pajama sets featuring mixed prints and patterns. When you're ready for a cool new look, give Hayes a call!
appearance: Hayes is a catburger - a cheeseburger with cat ears. He is made up of two buns with cheese, tomato, meat and lettuce in the center. His tall, triangular ears are white inside, matching the seeds sprinkled on his head. He has a thin black nose, a cat smile and his eyes are squeezed shut. He also has hot pink blush on both cheeks and black whiskers.

name: Hazel
bio: Meet Hazel the unicorn. Hazel is not your average gal; she enjoys playing volleyball with her unigals. When she's not busy on the court, she enjoys spending time at home sipping on a magical uni-latte.

name: Heath
bio: Heath is a member of a talented acting troupe-the Wolf Pack! Though Heath was born a husky, he moves, sounds, and acts like a wolf. His fellow actors agree, and are happy to include him where he belongs on stage, front and center.
appearance: Heath is a rainbow husky he has rainbow body with triangular ears. the inside of his ears are silver he also has a purple nose with a purple smiling mouth

name: Heather
bio: True to her species ability to transform, Heather is one of the mightiest mallows around. No matter what obstacles come her way, she doesn't get discouraged. Heather is always able to find a way to solve and overcome any problems with positive solutions.
appearance: Heather's body is sky blue and she has a purple belly with thin blue stripes across it. She has four wings which are holographic rainbow with blue stripes, and are shaped like blades. Her antennae are sparkly and light purple in color. She has black eyes, pink blushing cheeks and a smiling mouth.

name: Heather the Husky
bio: Heather is energetic and adventurous. She loves to challenge herself and set goals to achieve. Her next goal in life is to go to the North Pole!
appearance: Heather is a grey and white tie-dyed husky. She has a long husky tail with a white undertail alongside a white underbelly. She has glittery, silver inner ears with a white muzzle. She has closed eyes with lashes, a black nose and a curved mouth with her tongue sticking out.

name: Hectico
bio: Meet Hectico. This cuddly cobra loves making new friends and greets everyone with a tight hug. When he isn't devouring his tacos, Hectico is traveling the world. He loves traveling and making memories to share.
appearance: Hectico is a light brown snake with a tan lower jaw and belly. His belly has mustard yellow stripes. He has a large, chocolate brown hood which is speckled with darker brown and white scales. He has round black eyes and black nostrils and mouth. A thin, pink, forked tongue pokes out from his mouth.

name: Hedda
bio: Hedda is best friends with a cardigan! They met at a convention for women in STEM back in 2008—when they were- umm, 16... of course…—and have been thick as thieves ever since. Not only is Joanie girl a great listener: she’s also a great seat-saver!
appearance: Hedda is a white milk carton with a green band by her center readingMILKin a white, print font andfor Santain a cursive font. Under the band she has a red and green stripe pattern, and a white lid on top with a green bow and red and white striped straw poking out by her left. She has black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Heidi
bio: Hungry Heidi has one passion: food. After enjoying a long walk outside, Heidi races to the local pizza place and stuffs her face with cheese pizza. Heidi's fellow mallows love to join her, and sometimes, if they're lucky, Heidi will offer them an itsy-bitsy bite of food!
appearance: Heidi is a dark grey husky with triangular ears. She has a big white patch that covers her eyes and belly, as well as a white stripe along her muzzle. Her inner ears are also white. She has one round, black eye with white shine, and another eye that's winking. Both eyes have long eyelashes. She also has a black nose and a smiling mouth. The white patch on her belly is embroidered with three hearts, one large pink one, a smaller red one, and an even smaller purple one.

name: Helca
bio: Helca is one curious penguin, she loves jazz, peanut butter smoothies, and tries not to overthink everything. Helca loves to try new things and hopes to try something new every day. She doesn't know what she wants to be when she grows up, do you have any suggestions?
appearance: Helca is a light blue penguin with a white face and belly. She has a tiny orange beak and closed eyes with pale pink plush under each.

name: Helena
bio: If you go to a fair or carnival you had better grab some cotton candy for Helena! This sweet Squishmallow is the first to share hers. When she grows up, she wants to open a dessert bar – just for cotton candy!
appearance: Helena is a tie-dyed unicorn with darker and lighter purple patches. She has shiny silver inner ears and a plain white belly. Her horn is dark chrome and wrapped with a silver swirl. Her mane is bright shades of pink and orange. She has a light purple muzzle with a small smile. Her left eye is happy with a white shine, and her right eye is winking.

name: Helene
bio: If listening to sad music puts you in a great mood, Helene is the sloth for you! This moody 'Mallow loves to explore the great out doors and laughing at her own jokes. She wants to enjoy her time and never takes herself too seriously. What song should she play next?
appearance: Helene is a periwinkle sloth with a periwinkle body and a silver patch on her face. The banded markings around her eyes and her muzzle are very silver. She has closed eyes, a round nose and silver a cat-like smile, of which are black. She also has a holographic belly which say MAKE in green, TODAY in blue and GREAT in magenta

name: Helia
bio: Helia practices the drums every night before dinner. She's getting pretty good and can't wait to be apart of a rock band ! Drumming can create quite an appetite, so Helia always runs to the dinner table ready to feast. Do you know what this kirin drinks to keep her drumming energy up? Pineapple soda?
appearance: Helia is a light pink Kirin, a hooved mythical creature from East Asian folklore, with a deep ruby belly. Her inner ears and muzzle are cream. She has a deep ruby mane, tail, goatee, and cream diamond marking on her forehead. She has dark blue holographic deer-like horns and black eyes.

name: Helmut
bio: Meet Helmut. He travels around the galaxy in his out-of-this-world ice cream truck giving out space sundaes! He makes cool creations inspired by flavors across the universe! But be careful, these treats are so delicious you might just get a brain freeze!
appearance: Helmut is an orange and purple galaxy printed alien. His body is covered with a purple pattern of spots. He also has golden speckles on the tips of his antennae. He has a plain white belly, closed black eyes, and smiling mouth.

name: Hemkey
bio: If your car is on the fritz, head over to Hemkey's auto repair shop! This ferret knows everything there is to know about cars and loves to get his paws dirty. Hemkey even works on his cars in his free time just for fun. Would you pass him a luge wrench please?
appearance: Hemkey is a xanadu ferret whose triangular ears, and muzzle are white. He has and off white belly. He has a sage green mask marking over his eyes which is outlined with fluffy white fur. He has round, black eyes and a xanadu nose.

name: Henley
bio: Meet the next popstar, Henley! This Alicorn is not your usual gal, she enjoys performing and singing her very own originals. When she's not in the spotlight she loves baking and eating her favorite, lasagne! Are you ready to boogie down with Henley?
appearance: Henley is an alicorn, a combination of a unicorn and pegasus, with a pink tie-dye pattern. She has a fluffy, hot pink mane and tail. She has a white belly and muzzle. Her horn, inner ears and wings are all shimmery hot pink. She has round, black eyes with long lashes. In her 24" form, she has closed eyes with curled lashes.

name: Henrietta
bio: Have you met a narwhal who loves to bake? It's time you met Henrietta! She collects cookie cutters and loves to decorate them special for her friends. This week she's baking sugar cookies, what cookie cutters should she use?
appearance: Henrietta is a narwhal with a splotchy, pastel pattern of blue, green and purple. Unlike most narwhals, her fins rest on her pale green belly. She has a sparkly silver horn and a tail the same color. She also has round, black eyes with white shines, a small, happy mouth and round, peachy cheeks.

name: Henry
bio: Known by all the Squishmallows for his fantastic voice, Henry is a famous sports announcer. While he regularly provides commentary on basketball, football, and baseball games, his favorite sport is volleyball.
appearance: Henry is a light green turtle with a white belly. He has a simple face with black eyes and a smile. On his back is a forest green shell. His Hug Mee variant has a tie-dye brown and white shell rather than forest green.

name: Hera
bio: Hera made a soup today for the first time, but it tasted a little burnt. Only Hera could burn a soup! She's teaching herself how to cook by making one new recipe every day. Although it has been very challenging, Hera's confident she can conquer the kitchen!
appearance: Hera has a Pink coat with a dense pattern of blue and purple spots. Her muzzle and belly are white, while the insides of her ears are a purple. Her round eyes are black and her nose are purple, she also has a sparkly purple crown.

name: Herb
bio: Herb is a pitcher and he loves all things baseball, his dad taught him how to play when he was just 4. His current obsession is a collection of trading cards passed down from his grandpa! Wanna play baseball with Herb?
appearance:
Herb is a mint green turtle with a tuft of hair atop his head. His grey belly is textured with cord, a velvety, striped fabric. He has a simple face with black eyes and a smile. On his back is a sage green shell.
His 7 inch has an white belly, and he is a lime green turtle instead. His shell is also brown and white tye-dye.

name: Herbert
bio: Herbert loves French fries, veggie pizza, and watching tennis. When he's not watching or playing he can be found in the kitchen trying a new batch of homemade fries with his mom.
appearance: Herbert is a tan pug in the shape of a Hug Mee. He has brown floppy ears, muzzle, and feet. He has tan arms, a short tail and a white belly with a teal easter egg embroidered on his belly with pink and yellow stripes decorate on it. His eyes, nose, and smile are black.

name: Herbie
bio: Herbie is the head chef of “Simmer and Shine,” a breakfast eatery that serves strictly boiled dishes! He sometimes gets so mesmerized by the bubbles that his soft boiled eggs become hard boiled eggs, but he never disappoints with his signature Boiled Chicken & Waffles. Trust him. It’s delicious.
appearance: Herbie is a snowshoe cat with a fuzzy white belly with a white muzzle maroon ears and pink inner ears. He has a light pink lower body. White whiskers frame his face, featuring a pink nose and mouth and a maroon patch. He has round black eyes rimmed in cyan.

name: Herman
bio: Greetings, this is Customer Service Representative Herman. If you're having internet issues, please press 1. OK. Herman would be happy to help you with that! He suggests turning off your Wi-Fi, waiting ten seconds, then turning it on again. Thank you for calling!
appearance: Herman is a navy blue snake with a galaxy printed lower jaw and belly. his belly has navy blue stripes dividing it horizontally and a short tail on his back. He has round black eyes with and black nostrils and mouth. A thin, light red, forked tongue pokes out from his mouth.

name: Hermia
bio: Hermia is more than just a pretty swirl—she works down in the mines! Sure, her hard hat has rhinestones, and, yes, she uses coal dust to create the perfect smokey eye, but she’s not digging for compliments. With the best yields in the biz, Hermia believes that to find rare diamonds, you oughta look like a million carats!
appearance: Hermia is a latte in a peach takeaway cup. She has pink whipped cream with red and pink sprinkles a glittery pink straw poking out with a red rose. She has a sparkly pink band around her middle a rose flower-like logo design decorates her middle. She has closed eyes with lashes and a pink smiling mouth with pink blush.

name: Hermine
bio: Hermine's love for arts and crafts is reaching new heights—literally! This DIY-loving stack of pancakes is using her skills in basket weaving and paper-mache to construct the world's first handmade hot-air balloon. Isn't that crafty?
appearance: Hermine is a stack of 3 pancakes that are brown on top and a light green on the bottom. She has pancake syrup on top with a pat of yellow butter. She has black eyes with eyelashes, pink blush, and a black smiling mouth.

name: Hernan
bio: Hernan teaches artistic swimming on weekends and is a lifeguard at the beach for the rest of the week. Artistic swimming is his passion, and he loves the choreography this year's class is developing—they might even make it to regionals!
appearance: Hernan is a mint seahorse with teal fins on his head, on his back, and snout. His belly is silver, segmented with three golden lines. He has a curved tail, teal hair held up by a silver headband and round black eyes.

name: Herschel
bio: Herschel has lived thousand of lives—but refuses to live in the past! From the launch of his successful launch chain to his brief stint as the muse of a famous expressionist painter, he has plenty of memories to share, but he's too busy making new ones. Next up? A PhD in Everything Else!
appearance: Herschel is a black dog. He has two dark grey floppy ears and a dark grey belly. He has grey eyebrows with his eyes looking tired he has wrinkles below his eyes and above his eyebrows. He has a pronounced snout and a black nose and mouth. He has black eyes rimmed in brown.

name: Hettie
bio: Hettie is a happy little mallow because she was recently adopted! She has always dreamed of finding a family to love and now she even has brothers and sisters. Hettie can't wait for all the adventures she'll go on with her new family.
appearance: Hettie is a pastel pink pig with white details inside her ears and on her belly. Her ears are triangular and flop forwards. She has large, cartoon eyes with pink irises and chunky black lashes. Her snout and mouth are outlined in black. Her short arms are holding a bright orange carrot with a green top.

name: Hetty
bio: Meet Hetty. This sweet and nurturing 'Mallow is always looking after her friends! Need a warm hug, a stellar pep talk, or just a friend to sit and listen! Hetty is the girl for you! She works hard to make all her friends feel seen and supported! So come hang and be yourself!
appearance: Hetty is an angel, a brunette Caucasian humanoid with white wings. She wears a silver halo around her head and white, blue and silver clothes with golden swirls and a gold lace on her chest. She has messy buns with a silver star clip. Her eyes are closed and have curled lashes. She has pink blush and a pink, smiling mouth.

name: Hexla
bio: Halloween is Hexla's favorite holiday; she loves the creepy-crawly deco. Every year she has a dinner party and she decorates the table with spider webs and skeletons, but don't be scared! Do you want an invite?
appearance: Hexla is a black skeleton pegacorn with a pink skull, spine, ribs with white outlines and pink inner ears. Her mane is pink and goes from the top of her head to her back and a matching pink tail with holographic hot pink wings. A white unicorn horn sits on her forehead, she has black nostrils and black eyes with lashes.

name: Hidalgo
bio: Dancing the foxtrot—it’s Hidalgo! This ballroom world champion has a sizzling stage presence and three Step Ball Change Hall of Fame awards: one for the cha-cha, one for the waltz, and one just because they felt like it!
appearance: Hidalgo is a crow with fuzzy black wings. They have a tuft of black hair on top of their head. He has fuzzy black belly with a tail on their back. They have mischievous black eyes rimmed in yellow and a dark grey beak.

name: Hila
bio: Hila is pleased to meet you! He’s always looking for a buddy that’s up for adventure. No matter how hard the quest, Hila always tries his best. That’s his motto, to always keep trying. Hila is a great motivational friend and ‘Mallow.
appearance: Hila is a brown hedgehog with a brown nose. He has gold ears, snout, and spines (which look remarkably like sprinkles), as well as black eyes and a cream belly. He also has shiny white inner ears!

name: Hilary
bio: Meet Hilary. She might be the sweetest bear you'll ever meet. As an empath, sometimes she can be too nice but she's learning how to say no. Understanding boundaries and setting them can be hard, but she knows that's important to be kind to herself too!
appearance: Hilary is a chocolate brown bear with round ears. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, a tan muzzle, and a black nose and mouth. She wears a white t-shirt with a hot pink collar and sleeves, with pastel pink stripe details on either sleeve. The shirt reads 'kind people are my kind of people' in a bubbly, bright pink font.

name: Hobart
bio: Meet Hobart. This helpful hamster is a never-ending source of information and cool factoids. Hobart is a bookworm and enjoys spending his time reading in the library. You're guaranteed to learn something new or cool whenever Hobart is around! Do you have any fun facts to share?
appearance: Hobart is a light teal color with a creamy white pattern on his cheeks and belly. He has small ears with pink insides, round black eyes and a hot pink nose and mouth.

name: Hodel
bio: Hodel works five part-time jobs—one for each weekday! While Tuesdays are good for the money—riverboat captains make a fortune in tips—Hodel looks forward to Fridays the most. She loves seeing her cavemen friends at the natural history museum and telling them about her week!
appearance: Hodel's body consists of a stack of three pancakes, each red on the top half and dark red on the bottom. A swirl of whipped cream sits atop her head, which has a mint leaf on the left side. She also has red sprinkles. She has round, black eyes, with lashes pink blush and a smiling mouth.

name: Hodge
bio: Meet Hodge. This wise and joyful 'Mallow always makes time to stop and smell the flowers. He is kind, lighthearted, and quick with a joke. If you want someone to try something new with, or simply keep you company, Hodge is the 'Mallow for you!
appearance: Hodge is a light grey Buddha with grey, fuzzy hair. He has ears protruding from either side of his head and wears a dark grey robe with a white shirt underneath. He has grey, closed eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Hoknii
bio: Say hi to Hoknii! Hoknii is a harp playing hippo who loves history. She combines her passions by learning to play songs from historic sheet music that she finds in the library archives. Hoknii performs 100 songs that are more than 100 years old! Which song can she play for you?
appearance: Hoknii is a Teal and Purple ombre Hippo the up part of Hoknii's body also her ears are teal. the inside of Hoknii's ears are silver her snout is pink with two square teeth. her nostrils and the outline of her snout is purple also the low part  is purple and her white belly has two hearts 1 pink and 1 purple also the message on her belly says love you in grey and TONS! in teal

name: Hollandaise
bio: Hollandaise sings six nights a week on the S.S. Enchantress, a luxury cruise liner! Though her younger self dreamt of selling out stadiums, her older self much prefers the quiet of the ocean (and the crab leg buffet). Make sure to catch "Starboard Showtunes"--it's a passenger favorite!
appearance: Hollandaise is a banana bunny with the body covers in chocolate and a swirl of icing. She has a yellow bowtie and has banana outer ears with brown in the inner ears. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a pink nose and mouth along with dual black whiskers.

name: Holly
bio: Original: Give a hoot for Holly, the incredibly outgoing owl! Holly’s bright purple feathers make her the belle of the ball. She loves to dance, make new friends, and shop. Holly likes to bake cakes and her favorite color is you guessed it: purple!
appearance: Holly is a wisteria-colored owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. Small, purple feathers decorate her chest. She has black eyes with short, straight lashes, and a pink, triangular beak. Her 7" Baby Squad version is lavender instead of wisteria.

name: Hominy
bio: Hominy is the face of Gut Grain, a fiber-forward cereal company! She uses her MFA in Dramatic Performance to deliver artful interpretations of lines like "these flakes are on fleek" and hopes to one day portray  "Digestive Debbie" on the big screen. According to Hominy, her backstory is totally blockbuster worthy!
appearance: Hominy is a coral bear with an off-white belly. She has coral with off-white inner ears. She is holding a yellow bowl of cereal. Her muzzle is off-white and they have round, black eyes with lashes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Honeydew
bio: Roll up your sleeves, it's time for class, today's assignment is to play in the garden! Honeydew teaches a gardening class; the biggest rule is that you must sing to your plants. What song will you sing?
appearance: Honeydew is a pastel rainbow lizard with a white belly. They have a pastel purple frill atop their head and a thin, curled tail the same color. They have three broad stripes on their back in red, blue and yellow. They have large, wide eyes with shiny black pupils and a smiling mouth.

name: Hoot
bio: Hoot and his sisterHollyare complete opposites. He’s quiet and likes to read and study, sometimes in his tree fort with his friendCam. But...Hoot is also secretly a wonderful singer, but only when he thinks no one is watching. Catch Hoot and his hoot-iful voice in the shower, and you'll understand what we mean.
appearance: Hoot is a soft grey owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on his face and belly. Small, golden feathers decorate his chest, the same color as his triangular beak.

name: Horace
bio: Are you ready for game night? Horace is the yeti you want on your team; he has a whole room dedicated to playing games! With floor-to-ceiling shelves of games and a variety of personalized playing cards, he knows how to have fun. Want to play a game with Horace?
appearance: Horace is a dual tone yeti with a grey head and a denim blue body. He has a white face with a simple smiling expression and blue horns with a cord texture either side of his head. He also has a fuzzy, snow white belly. A puff of grey fur sits like a fringe over his forehead.

name: Horacio
bio: Horacio doesn't particularly like insects, but he absolutely loves butterflies! His favorite by far is the monarch butterfly. Horacio never gets tired of seeing their beautiful orange wings and even made himself some monarch wings for Día de los Muertos celebrations. Come check it out!
appearance: Horacio is a pink warthog with light pink accents inside in his ear. His ears are triangular and have two purple stripes on his head with a tuft of lavender hair. He has a yellow flower on his forehead with teal swirls. His belly is white with a purple flower surrounded by day of the dead makeup. He has two round, black eyes with teal flowers rimmed around them, a yellow snout with pink nostrils and white tusks.

name: Hosha
bio: Meet Hosha! Hosha is serious about staying hydrated and you'll always see them with their favorite personalized water bottle. They make sure to drink 64 ounces a day! Hosha is on a 150-day hydration streak right now. Can you beat Hosha's hydration record?
appearance: Hosha is a pink, tie-dyed Manatee with flippers and a white spotted snout. They have a white belly with 'LOVE' embroidered on it colored in pink, with the O being replaced by a pink heart. They have black eyes with lashes and are winking.

name: Howland
bio: Howland might live in the middle of nowhere but he practices agricultural law in the big city. That's why he just got his helicopter license! Howland now looks forward to his scenic morning commute, and even able to woo clients with business lunches in the sky!
appearance: Howland is a tan bull with a patch of short tan hair like a fringe. He has a cream belly and matching muzzle and inner ears. He has yellow curved horns that fade to black which sit wide from His head. He has round, black eyes with one of them winking, grey nostrils and a golden nose ring.

name: Hoyt
bio: Do you know what Hoyt's favorite part of Valentine's Day is? Candy! Hoyt loves any kind of sweet, but his favorite is gummy bears. If you want Hoyt to be your Valentines this year, head to your local candy shop and pick him up a big bag of sweets!
appearance: Hoyt is a lavender Shiba Inu with white inner ears, belly, rounded eyebrows and muzzle. He has a pink, glittery paw on his belly with a lilac heart in the center. He has black eyes, nose, and curved mouth.

name: Huck
bio: Huck is the sweetest member of the tennis team. He can be found on the courts everyday after school perfecting his serve. A caring friend, he is always a treat to be around. He is constantly spreading love and positivity while keeping things cool in the hot summer sunshine!
appearance: Huck is a sky blue soft-serve ice cream. The swirl is denoted by dark blue lines across his head and the curl atop his head. His lower half is a light brown ice cream cone with a bold crosshatch pattern in darker brown.

name: Hudson
bio: Have you met Hudson? Hudson is a mushball of love and affection. With their fluffy personality and kind smile, Hudson always knows how to cheer up their 'Mallow pals!
appearance: Hudson is a sky blue unicorn with white inner ears, muzzle and belly. They have light blue nostrils and a shimmering, silver horn. Their multi-colored mane includes yellow, aquamarine and candy pink. Their eyes are closed and they have long, curled lashes.

name: Huey
bio: Roar! Huey’s here! But don’t be frightened, this lovable T-Rex has a heart of gold! Huey loves spending time with his friends and family, especially his twin brotherChuey. Together they want to travel the world and see what adventures they find.
appearance: Huey is a dark grey dinosaur with a scaled texture on his body. He has two small arms sticking out from his front, each with small, white claws on the tip. His belly and the spines along his back are pistachio green. He large cartoon eyes and a wide, toothy grin like a shark.

name: Hugh
bio: Hugh works at a coffee shop next to the college campus and has super busy mornings! He prides himself on making delicious and frothy drinks in a snap. Hugh even knows his regular customers orders by heart and adds beautiful foam art to their lattes!
appearance: Hugh is a purple ombre Hippo His body is all ombre He has a large purple round snout His ears are round  with silver insides. His belly has pink and purple hearts with a pink H. he also has two square teeth on his snout

name: Hugo
bio: Hugo loves adventure, he always seems to be on an imaginary quest! Whether it's from a movie, a comic book, or hearing a story from a friend, Hugo takes bits of his regular day to create his own cool adventure to save the day.
appearance: Hugo is a blue planet with a darker shade of blue on the left side of his head and on the bottom right. He has a shimmery ring around him with sparkles on the right side of his body. He has black round eyes with curled lashes and a smile.

name: Humphrey
bio: Humphrey loves writing scripts and plays. When he's finished with his latest work, he'll get together with all his Squishmallow friends and act it out! Join him and see what role you'll land!
appearance: Humphrey is a golden brown color with a creamy white pattern on his cheeks and belly, as well as inside his ears. He has round black eyes and a pale pink nose and mouth.

name: Hunter
bio: Hunter is always busy at her dream job as a stage lighting technician. Being a bit too shy for the stage herself, she enjoys helping others shine. She loves being a part of the team and helping others succeed!
appearance: Hunter is a bright blue firefly. Her antennae, wings and belly are dark navy blue with a pattern of stars. Her belly has the silver logo for the Orion rollercoaster printed in the centre. She has a plain face with round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Hydrangea
bio: Hydrangea might be an anti-social butterfly. but she really comes alive onstage. This budding actress loves singing in musicals and recently joined her middle school's improv team. Valiant knights are her favorite roles to play, and sometimes she even tries her wing at dragons!
appearance: Hydrangea is a teal blue butterfly with black antennae ending with teal blue pom-poms. She has black wings with a pattern of pale blue sections and silver dots. She has a pale mint blue belly with that is striped in teal blue. She has round eyes with short lashes, pale pink cheeks and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Ibina
bio: Meet Ibina. She is a horror movie aficionado! She and her friendDeliehave a unique Halloween tradition. Every year they go to the movie theater, order an extra large, extra butter popcorn, and two orange sodas—then watch a scary double feature!
appearance: Ibina is a black cat with a deep teal holographic belly and holographic inner ears. She has a long tail and tall, pointed ears with white whiskers, black eyes with white rings around them and a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Ichika
bio: Ichika doesn't snowboard—she sandboards! This desert-dwelling thrill seeker loves hitting the dunes. Though her crash landings can get pretty gnarly, Ichika always picks herself back up again. Check out the scorpion stickers on her helmet!
appearance: Ichika is a seaweed green cactus with two, uneven cactus arms on her sides. There are green spikes all over her body except for her peach, corduroy belly. She wears a flower with peach petals and yellow pistil on her head. She has pink blush, black eyes in a winking expression, and a red mouth.

name: Icicle
bio: Icicle loves to bake and make new sweet treats for her friends. Her favorite food is donuts! She is always energetic and hops around her neighborhood finding new adventures.
appearance: Icicle is a blue bunny, her body is colored with a gradient from light blue at the top and darker blue at the bottom. She has blue feet with white pads and three white toes. She has two long bunny ears with white, glittery inner ears, her left ear is slightly bent. She holds a pink donut with strawberry frosting in her paws, and she also have a white bunny tail.  She have black eyes with sparkles and lashes, a black nose with a cat-like smile, and four black whiskers, two being on each side of their face.

name: Ignacio
bio: Ignacio is a white snowman with a carrot shaped nose. He wears a black top hat on the left side of his head with a red band and a snowflake in the middle. He wears a teal plaid scarf sitting over his two black buttons. He has mischievous eyes with a smirk like smile.
appearance: Ignacio is a white snowman with a carrot shaped nose. He wears a black top hat on the left side of his head with a red band and a snowflake in the middle. He wears a teal plaid scarf sitting over his two black buttons. He has mischievous eyes with a smirk like smile.

name: Igor
bio: Igor's favorite kind of music is heavy metal, and they love dancing to it! Igor finds the drumming patterns so energizing. and loves to bounce back and forth or jump in circles Igor is starting a metal band of their own and wants you to be a part of it. What instrument do you want to play?
appearance: Igor is a pastel tie-dye narwhal all around and his fins and tail with a circular-shaped white face and a black bumpy outline. Their eyes are surrounded by magenta flower-details, and all around they are decorated with intricate yellow, teal, and pink sugar skull designs. They also have a flower cut out with two teal petals and one purple with red insides. They also has a white horn and their belly is decorated in intricate sugar skull designs with a pink flower.

name: Ike
bio: Say hey to Ike! Ike skates gracefully across any ice, perfectly balanced by his antlers. He can even do a figure eight on one leg! In hockey, Ike’s been known to score a goal from the other side of the rink. Ready for icy adventures with Ike?
appearance: Ike is a light tan moose with a light tan body as well as a fuzzy, white belly. closed blink like eyes. He also has a soft furry apricot belly and light tan body with brown antlers.

name: Iker
bio: Iker dreams of being a major league baseball pitcher. He plays on a minor league team right now, and threw a no-hitter last season! Iker keeps his energy up during a game with roasted sunflower seeds. Will you cheer on Iker at his game tonight?
appearance: Iker bread is orange with yellow streaks and his wrapper is grey. He has cheese, tomato, lettuce, and onion inside. His eyes are black with a red smile.

name: Ileana
bio: Ileana visits her local botanical garden every spring! She loves to see all the beautiful flowers in bloom. Ileana brought her bestieSherry, to the botanical garden today, and they're wearing bunny ears to make the trip extra festive.
appearance: Ileana is a cupcake with swirled icing in layers of pink and white. Pastel colored sprinkles decorate the two upper layers. She has round, black eyes with eyelashes and a smiling mouth. Her wrapper is white with pastel green stripes and the top of the wrapper is yellow. She also has pink bunny ears

name: Ilene
bio: Meet Ilene, a future Broadway star! This unicorn loves singing, dancing, and being the belle of the ball. Every August she gets to see a new musical on Broadway for her birthday, she doesn’t have a favorite yet because she wants to see them all!
appearance: Ilene is a pastel pink unicorn with white on her muzzle, belly and inside her ears. Her multi-colored mane includes candy pink, light turquoise and lavender. She has a shimmery, golden horn with a hot pink swirl. Her eyes are closed and she has long, curled lashes.

name: Illia
bio: Illia tends to the bonsai garden at her local plant nursery. She even teaches classes in the evenings on how to clip and care for bonsai, encouraging all 'Mallows to give these beautiful little trees a try. Want to learn about the art of bonsai trees with Illia?
appearance: Illia is a tomato red hot sauce. On the top of Illia's head, she has a red lid. She has a white label with green outlines and a red chili pepper. She also has two, round black eyes and a basic smiling mouth.

name: Iman
bio: Iman works at a coffee shop with many of her friends who hope to be actors and actresses. She often works the early morning shift so she has time to rehearse an audition in the afternoon. This week she is auditioning for a role as a zombie princess, can you help her read lines?
appearance: Iman is a teal cat with a long tail drooping behind her. She has seven blue stripes: three on top of her head, and two on each side of her body. She has a fuzzy white belly and a white muzzle that is triangular at the top and round at the bottom. She has two black whiskers on each side of her face, a light teal nose and mouth, and rainbow inner ears. She also has a rainbow unicorn horn in the center of her head.

name: Iman the Jelly
bio: Iman is a true artist at heart. Before every pop performance with her bestie Brizby on stage, they creates amazing designs with paint and glitter on her face. She loves transforming her into a sparkly rock start! When she's on stage, she feels on top of the world!
appearance: Iman is a piece of jelly toast. She is shaped like a slice of toast and has a hot pink jelly spreading on her face  design on most of her body, including her face. On top of the jelly part are small piece of strawberry on the right side of her. She has round, black eyes, and a black smile with pink blush on her face.

name: Imelda
bio: Hang ten—Imelda is a web surfer! Whether taking part in a fan fiction book club or playing her favorite online pet games, Imelda could spend the entire day on the computer. That’s why she always makes sure to schedule IRL time—like attending cosplay conventions, or taking her cat for a walk!
appearance: Imelda is a caterpillar with a segmented body. Her head and upper body are lavender, and her lower body is purple with a purple stripe by her tail. She has a white fluffy belly and grey antennae with purple tips. She has round, black eyes with brown rounded glasses, a smiling mouth and pale pink blush.

name: Imogen
bio: School may not be her strong suit, but wait until you hear her sing! Imogen thinks school can be a drag but she loves being in the school plays. Her parents say as long as she loves to be on stage she has to go to school. She can't wait to graduate so she can be done with homework and start a new life onstage.
appearance: Imogen is a turquoise owl with prominent ear tufts. She has white patches edged with silver feathers surrounding each eye. She also has a white belly with three rows of feathers outlined in silver. Her belly is also embroidered with a single hot pink heart. Her beak is also pink. Her eyes are round and black with a white shine and curly lashes.

name: Ina
bio: Ina isn't an easily excitable 'Mallow—unless it's game day for her favorite college basketball team! She hosts the best pregame parties with snacks, sweet tea and noisemakers; Ina stays positive whether her team wins or loses, so you're guaranteed to have a great time!
appearance: Ina is a black moth with fuzzy white antennae and a fuzzy belly. She has black fuzzy wings with white inner wings with a pattern of black spots and red motifs. She has round black eyes with short lashes, pink cheeks, and a smiling black mouth.

name: Indie
bio: Need a hand with some home improvements? Indie is at your service! This hermit crab knows a thing or two about fixer-uppers and is just a call away. You'll make Indie's day with some raspberry lemonade and fresh-baked cookies!
appearance: Indie is a red hermit crab with a light sandy brown shell. They have two red claws and six red legs. They have a white belly, pink cheeks, round black eyes, and a simple smile.

name: IndieMae
bio: IndieMae built herself a Zen den! She decorated the space with her favorite posters, flowers, and string lights. Her den has floor pillows IndieMae knits herself, and cozy little corners perfect for gaming. Will you drop by for lunch? IndieMae rolled some fresh sushi!
appearance: IndieMae has a maroon color on her body with bright maroon gills and the yellow on the inside of the gills on either side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a fuzzy dark maroon belly. She has closed black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Inez
bio: Get out your protractor, a laser pointer, and some marshmallows, class is about to start! Inez believes that math = fun so she uses games, arts and crafts, and even snacks to teach her geometry class. Are you ready for some fun?
appearance: Inez is a white bear with mint markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band around her body. She has very fluffy ears and a silver unicorn horn. She has a mint nose and mouth as well as round, black eyes with long lashes.

name: Ingeborg
bio: Ingeborg is the princess of a cold and distant kingdom. While her parents believe it's a milkshake cow's sacred duty to brave the bluster, this rebellious royal uses her princess powers to bring warmth to all the land. Make sure to check out the Princess Ingeborg Sauna Center!
appearance: Ingeborg is mostly mint with patches of brown on her lower left side and on her right ear. She has a swirl of whipped cream with caramel syrup with brown sprinkles with a green and white straw. She has round, black eyes with a white muzzle with red nostrils. She has a thin mint embroidered on the right side of her body.

name: Ingo
bio: Look out for googly eyes next time you're walking around town—Ingo sticks them on everything! This prankster thinks googly eyes look funny on lamp posts, fences, and even mailboxes. Watch out, he might stick some on your backpack!
appearance: Ingo is a purple monster with a fuzzy orange belly and a bright green, fuzzy unibrow. He has two pairs of horns with the innermost horns being a bright green, and the outermost horns being orange and black striped. He has black eyes, a wide smile with two teeth poking out of the top, and white freckles in between his eyes.

name: Ingred
bio: Fifteen minutes to curtain! Ingred is an usher at the local theater. When she isn't showing 'mallows to their seats, Ingred likes to stand at the back of the theater and memorize the routines of the dancers. One day, she hopes to make her way from the aisle to the stage!
appearance: Ingred is mostly bright purple with patches of black on her lower right side and on her left ear. She has tan, triangular horns and round, black eyes. The inside of her ears is light pink, and her muzzle is white with purple nostrils.

name: Ingy
bio: Ingy holds a garage sale every Saturday until sunset. They have bins of old records, kitchen appliances, and souvenirs from faraway places. All of Ingy's neighbors come around to take a peek at what's new, or just to catch up with their pal. Come check out Ingy's record collection!
appearance: Ingy has a grey base and a red top and bottom with a pale red rim. They have a red joystick by the bottom of their body and blue and yellow heart buttons. Their screen in the middle of their body is a dark blue with a pixelated heart displayed on it. They have black eyes and a red smile.

name: Irina
bio: Irina is a gymnast and she can’t wait to start competing. She enjoys showing off her skills on the balance beam but her absolute favorite thing to practice is her floor routine. She loves working on a new routine and letting the music fuel her moves.
appearance: Irina has an aqua blue body with multi-colored gills. From top to bottom, her gills - and the frills - are pink, yellow then purple. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly. She has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Iris
bio: This beautiful butterfly is a pageant star, she has won the Miss 'Mallow title 3 years in a row! Her favorite part of the pageants is the talent — she plays the harp!
appearance: Iris is a butterfly whose body is patterned with splotches of bright, fluorescent colors. While pink is the most prominent color, she also has blue, orange, purple and green patches. She has a pink belly with thin, hot pink stripes across it. Her wings and antenna are a combination of white, pale pink and hot pink colors. She has black eyes with two short eyelashes on each, pink blushing cheeks and a smiling mouth.

name: Iris the Husky
bio: Iris is energetic and unstoppable. She is always planning adventures with her friends. She loves the snow and going sledding in the winter.
