appearance: Iris is a grey husky; she has a white face and feet with paw pads. She has shimmery, white inner ears and a grey tail with white fur; she wears a rainbow bow by her right ear. She also has black eyes with blue irises with lashes, a white snout with a black nose and a small smile.

name: Irving
bio: Looking for adventure? Give Irving a call. He’s always up for riding ATVs, skydiving or even bungee jumping!
appearance: Irving is a grey rhinoceros with a prominent square muzzle and curled ears. His nose boasts a large white horn. The inside of his ears and his belly are also white, whereas his eyes are black.

name: Isabella
bio: Isabella loves to sing, dance, and swim!  She wants be a mermaid someday, and for now her magical mermaid moves on land. She loves spending time with her family and eating cookies!
appearance: Isabella is a bunny with long mint floppy ears. She has a white, fuzzy belly and a tiny green tail. She has round black eyes with curled lashes. She has pinkish nose and mouth.

name: Isadora
bio: Isadora doesn't sell seashells by the seashore—she sells sweet s'mores by the seashores! Her oceanside s'mores shack is a total hit with both tourists and locals alike. The secret to her recipe? Sprinkling a little bit of sea salt over the gooey chocolate squares!
appearance: Isadora is a parakeet (budgie), a type of small parrot. She has a creamy white head, a cherry blossom body and a white belly. Her wings are pale pink. She has a rounded, yellow beak with a pale pink cere above it, as well as round, black eyes with lashes. She has three hearts on her belly, which are two pink ones and one purple one.

name: Isaiah
bio: Isaiah just realized he’s starring in his own manga! He wasn’t sure what the deal was with his coworkers sporting sparkly eye contacts—or why there were suddenly speech bubbles over everyone's heads—but when Wizard Thomas-ken sent him on a mission to save the world from the malevolent Mouse King? He had a pretty good idea!
appearance: Isaiah is a tealish-blue bull with a patch of longer blue fur like fringe. He has a fluffy, blue belly and a silver muzzle and blue ears, which aren't fluffy. He has thin, silver, curved horns which sit wide from his head with thin gold lines that mark the sections. He has round, black eyes, blue nostrils and a golden nose ring. He also has a long, black tail with a fluffy end.

name: Isla
bio: Ever wonder what it's like flying in space? This unicorn can help you out! Isla is an astronautical engineer and she's working on some very exciting projects. Her favorite type of music to listen to when she's working? Bluegrass!
appearance: Isla is a pastel pink unicorn with shimmery white belly and inner ears. Her horn is the same and wrapped with a pink swirl. Her mane and tail are both vibrant rainbow colors. She has a white muzzle with pink nostrils, round black eyes and very short, curled lashes.

name: Isler
bio: Isler has a knack for making everyone feel welcomed and cared for. So it's no wonder she works in 'Mallow Resources at a tech company. Isler isn't sure about the tech stuff, but she knows every employee is well taken care of! If you have any questions about your benefits or 401 (k), Isler is happy to help!
appearance: Isler is a mint blue crab with a round, powder pink belly. She has two powder pink large claws and six smaller legs beneath her that are two mint blue and one powder pink. She has round black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Ismail
bio: Ismail is part-wizard—1/48th, to be exact! Though his only power is turning tomatoes into marinara sauce, his friends agree it's some of the best they've had. They even encouraged him to open his own pasta restaurant! Think he should do it?
appearance: Ismail is a mushroom with a bluish-grey stalk and a velvet fabric grey-green cap with metallic grey spots. His stalk makes up his body and includes a round, grey-green velvet fabric belly. He has round, black eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Isolde
bio: Isolde is a public defense lawyer. She's a tough onion in the courtroom, but once you peel back those layers, you'll find Isolde to be a deeply caring 'Mallow. She fights for all her clients like they're her own family, and wants a fair, just hearing. A friend like Isolde will always have your back!
appearance: Isolde is a white onion with darker peach stripes on her top and bottom, these stripes vary in size. She has multiple green leaves on top, some are light green, and others are dark. Isoldes face has two wide open black eyes, a smiling black mouth, a golden pair of glasses with rounded frames and pink blush.

name: Isosceles
bio: Isosceles is a  yellow cat. They have a yellow body with orange patches. They have one orange patch over their left ear and two on their lower body and one on their eye. They have a candy corn embroidered on the left side of their body. They have, black whiskers, and a happy, pink cat mouth.
appearance: Isosceles is a  yellow cat. They have a yellow body with orange patches. They have one orange patch over their left ear and two on their lower body and one on their eye. They have a candy corn embroidered on the left side of their body. They have, black whiskers, and a happy, pink cat mouth.

name: Istvan
bio: Istvan is a feisty (and hungry!) food critic who loves to try all the culinary options in his town. You can find him dressing up as an anonymous mariachi player, hoping to get the inside scoop on the hottest restaurants. When he's not writing about his foodie experiences, he is practicing guitar and hanging out with his friends! What's your favorite restaurant, and can Istvan come too?

name: Ivanna
bio: Ivanna's favorite part of springtime is getting ready for softball - she loves picking out new equipment, wearing her lucky cap, and playing with her team-mates! This year Ivanna wants to be a pitcher, she's working on an new pitch called the winding wing, will you watch Ivanna play softball?
appearance: Ivanna is a lemon yellow bird with a fluffy white belly and a hot pink blush on each cheek. She has a triangular orange beak. The fluffy wings and crest of feathers atop her head are bright yellow. She has closed eyes with short, curled lashes. Some versions of her have a white belly with silver glitter.

name: Iver
bio:
Iver has dozens of different herbal teas in his kitchen—it's his favorite drink in the world! Iver likes blending different teas together to create new concoctions, like blueberry mint chamomile and red apple rooibos. But he thinks his best creation so far is ginger lemon
ginseng! Come share a pot of tea with Iver.
appearance: Iver is a light mint colored cow with a patch of longer white fur like a fringe. His belly is also white and fluffy. He has an darker mint colored muzzle and inner ears, which aren't fluffy. He has thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and are tan with many thin lines giving texture to his horns. He has round, black eyes, green nostrils and a small smile.

name: Ivette
bio: Ivette teaches art history at the city college. Even though she's on winter break, Ivette has lots of final exams to grade! After grades are in, Ivette can't wait to go to the movies. Holiday films are her favorite and she makes sure to see every new release!
appearance: Ivette is a figgy pudding with a brown base, white icing dripping from her top with round red and green sprinkles and a holly. She wears a red scarf decorated with white dots. Her eyes are black, and her smile is red.

name: Ivy
bio: Ivy is an avid gardener; she loves to take care of her flowers and create beautiful spaces for her friends to play in!
appearance: Ivy is a light pink deer with white spots on her back and forehead and light pink and white triangular ears that stand up. She has a white face and her eyes are closed. She also has rose gold antlers and hooves. Her belly is white. She also has a small tail.

name: Ivy the Dog
bio: There goes Ivy! Ivy's studying for their pilot license so they can travel the world. Trying new foods and meeting new 'Mallows is what Ivy is all about. When they're back on land, Ivy enjoys long naps outside on their hammock. Want to be Ivy's co-pilot?
appearance: Ivy is a dog with a light grey body. They have fluffy grey ears and a fluffy white belly. Their muzzle is white and they have a grey patch over their right eye. They have a grey, heart-shaped nose and closed eyes with short lashes. They also wear a scarf striped in bright red and white.

name: Izaak
bio: Izaak is a pitcher for his high school's virtual reality baseball team. While he sometimes misses the feeling of a real ball park, Izaak much prefers playing in a simulated one. Not only do fireworks dazzle the sky for every home run, his team can pick between 32 different fields! Izaak's favorite? Candy Cane park!
appearance: Izaak is a blue cup of slushie. on top of his head is cherry slush with two layers maroon and one light red. there is a dark blue straw poking out from his left side. he has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth. He has 3 stars on the right side of his body one blue and two red.

name: JSK
bio: Who has a big heart and even bigger dreams? It's JSK! This business casual cat is always on the hunt for innovation, quality, and lattes. When he's not growing his business or networking, you'll find him working out at the gym or playing tennis.
appearance: JSK is a calico cat, meaning he has a cream body and glittery golden and blue patches. He has one golden patch over his right ear, and two blue patches, one on his left ear and the other on his lower left body. He has rounded eyes, black whiskers, and a happy, pink cat mouth. He wears a blue tie with yellow stripes on his neck.

name: JT
bio: If JT can go anywhere, he would go to the grocery store! There's nothing better to this bigfoot than enjoying his favorite "special treats" after a long day of baseball, especially when his two best friends are around. Though he'd love to share his cookies with them, dogs can't have chocolate!
appearance: JT is a dark teal Bigfoot with a tie-dyed, fuzzy, purple and dark teal mane and ears. He has a purple belly, heart shaped pads and toes on his feet. He has a teal face with black eyes, pink blush, and a wide smile with two rounded teeth poking out at the top of each side.

name: Jacinda
bio: Frisbee and volleyball are two of Jacinda's favourite sports, especially at the beach. She loves to spend the day playing with friends. Whenever she wants to cool off, she just throws the frisbee towards the water and jumps in.
appearance: Jacinda is a golden brown poodle with curly fur on her head and on the ends of her floppy ears. She has a tan colored muzzle and a fluffy white belly. Her nose and eyes are both black.

name: Jack
bio: Jack is the strong silent type, but he’s always there when you need him. He’s not afraid to speak up for himself or his friends. He can be a little feisty, but he loves to cuddle. Jack loves giving back and thinks we should always lend a helping hand.
appearance: Jack is an all-black cat with closed white eyes and white whiskers. He has a pale pink nose and mouth. His right ear is adorned with an exclusive 500 tag which is gold and shaped in a heart.

name: Jacken
bio: Shhh. Jacken is fly fishing in the creek and needs complete quiet. He knows the best way to gather fish is patience, aim and really strong galoshes! Don't remind Jacken about that time he got a school of shiner fish in his fishing suit--that's not the way this 'Mallow likes to catch fish
appearance: Jacken is a navy blue sea slug. He has a blue stripe coming from his head all the way down to his back. He has arctic blue wings and antennae . He also has a fuzzy white belly. He has black eyes and a smiling mouth and baby pink blush.

name: Jackie
bio: Jackie and her sisters love to shop vintage, whenever they travel together, they go on a retro hunt. Last month, they found hot pink fuzzy phones that light up when you call. What will they bring home next?!
appearance: Jackie is a purple tulip flower. Her petals are dark purple at the base with a gradient to light purple at the tips. The top of her head - the inside of her petals - is a lighter purple again. She has two large, pale green leaves which cup the bottom half of her body. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Jacob
bio: Jacob is the king of the mountain! Spring is his favorite season because it means he can start to climb again, surrounded by beautiful wildflowers. He also likes to make up songs as he hikes up to the summit.
appearance: Jacob is an aqua lamb with a white face, which matches his inner ears. He has round black eyes with short lashes, a pink nose and mouth, and pink blush cheeks. He also has an aqua tail.

name: Jacqueline
bio: Jacqueline works at the holiday law firm of Jolly, Jolly & Jones. While she's best known for taking chimney insurers to task, she's proudest to have blocked a ban on saying 'bah humbug' in public places. According to Jacqueline, it's supporters were total freedom-of-speech scrooges!
appearance: Jacqueline is a brown fox. She has large, triangular ears, the inside of which are tan. She has tan markings on her face, including a round muzzle and fluffy cheeks. She has a swirl of white icing with white dollops of icing. She has a light tan belly with white dots of icing. She wears a red and  green striped scarf. The markings on the tip of her tail is also brown. She has closed eyes and a brown nose and mouth.

name: Jaelyn
bio: Do you have anything to throw Jaelyn's way? They're practicing for a juggling competition! Jaelyn loves to juggle and participates in competitions all over the place. This spring they won 1st place for juggling 17 candy bars!
appearance: Jaelyn is a black axolotl who has shiny white gills with a hot pink frill on each side of their head. They have small, stubby arms and a white belly. They have round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Jagger
bio: Jagger is the editor-in-chief of The Economy and Things Like That, super-serious magazines for super-serious 'Mallows. Don't tell his readers, but after a long day writing about fixed-rate loans and sink disposals, Jagger retreats to his backyard bounce house to play "alicorns" with his besties!
appearance: Jagger is an orange tiger shark with two fins on each side, one fin atop his head, a dorsal fin on his back and a tail fin. He has maroon tiger stripes all over his whole body. He has a round, beige belly. He has round black eyes, a small toothy smile, and gills on both sides of his body.

name: Jaida
bio: Jaida completes her holiday shopping in January! She thinks it's a good way to keep the season going and always scores the best deals, especially on things like stocking stuffers and gift wraps. Though she sometimes forgets what she got her friends and family come December, the surprise is half the fun!
appearance: Jaida is a lavender with a pale pink face and belly. She has lavender ears with golden inner ears and has silver colored antlers on top of her head as well as gold ribbons on her forehead. She has a golden outline around her belly. She has round, black eyes with lashes, a black oval nose, and a red smiling mouth. She also has a gold Christmas-like pattern below her belly.

name: Jaime
bio: Sugar, spice, and everything in between can be found in Jaime's home. She loves to bake goodies for her friends and delivers weekly snacks to the Squishmallows in her squad.
appearance: Jaime is a pegasus with a rainbow tie-dye pattern. She has a fluffy mane and tail which are white. The insides of her ears, her muzzle and her belly are all white. She also has shimmery pink wings and round, black eyes with curly eyelashes. Her 16" has an rainbow mane instead.

name: Jaina
bio: Are you ready for an adventure with Jaina? She loves to go for drives to catch the sunrise and could spend the whole day wondering. Whether she's with friends or by herself, she loves to see what's around the corner.
appearance: Jaina is a pink sloth in the style of a Squeezemallow, she has long arms, and round feet. Her belly is fuzzy and white with a red heart embroidered on it. She has a heart-shaped white face and pink banded markings that go around her lashed eyes. Her muzzle is pink with a darker pink heart nose and curved mouth.

name: Jaiya
bio: Have you met Jaiya? She is one interesting 'Mallow. While she teaches art, she's also full of fun facts and tidbits about plants, space, and minerals. She likes to talk about the world and start new discussions, just be mindful of time because she could talk all day!
appearance: Jaiya is a sushi roll with a white rice body wrapped in a band of blacknori, or seaweed. Red, green and orange ingredients poke out from the top of her head. She has short lashes and is winking her left eye. She also has a red, smiling mouth.

name: Jak
bio: Jak likes to give hugs with his wings to cheer people up, do you want a wing hug from Jak?
appearance: Jak is a green dragon with a green nose and white belly. The insides of his ears are also white. His horns and the inside of his wings are a green and the spines on his back are a white. He has two large black eyes.

name: Jakarria
bio: Meet Jakarria. This Mallow has a very big heart and brings joy wherever she goes. Jakarria has a big, beaming smile and whenever you’re hanging out with Jakarria, you can’t help but smile too.
appearance: Jakarria is a blue boba tea with hot pink tapioca pearls. She also has a pale pink lid rimmed in white with a silver, sparkly straw poking out. A metallic green flower sits just below her lid on the left side. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and a smile.

name: Jake
bio: Jake loves the outdoors! When she is not volunteering her time at the park, she spends her weekend in a cozy cabin in the mountains.
appearance: Jake is a light teal unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. Her belly, nose and inner ears are all white, and her nostrils are light pink. She has a pink horn with a darker pink spiral. She has open eyes with short, curled lashes.

name: Jake the Owl
bio: Meet Jake! This helpful owl is like a one-stop-shop. He can do almost anything! Fun fact about Jake, he LOVES to fish! Whenever he needs some time to himself, he goes on a fishing trip to get some peace.
appearance: Jake is a brown owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on his face and belly. Small, light yellow feathers decorate his chest, the same color as his triangular beak.

name: Jakob
bio: A shaman once told Jakob that he was a drum in his past life! He's not sure how that's possible, but his besties agreed that he is in fact, the steady, strong beat that keeps their friend group in sync. What's more, his hilarious jokes always bring the bah dum tss!
appearance: Jakob is a pale-pink bat with triangular ears and wings on either side of his body. His inner ears. wing membrane and fuzzy belly are peach. He has round, black eyes, a pale teal muzzle and a curved smile which shows two pointed, grey teeth.

name: Jalisca
bio: Jalisca is open to talking about her blindness, even sharing her story online and ways she uses her other senses. One of Jalisca's favorite meals is sushi because it has such great texture! This leopard doesn't need utensils and loves to dig in with her paws.
appearance: Jalisca is a pink cheetah with maroon spots all over her body. She has fuzzy black ears and tuft of fur at the end of hair tail, with white inner ears and fuzzy belly. She has a white muzzle with a black nose, cat-like smile and eyes.

name: Jamal
bio: If you're interested in geography, Jamal is the cat for you! He wants to start a geography camp, to teach the importance of geography and how it affects our world, do you want to sign up?
appearance: Jamal is an all-black cat with embroidered green eyes and white whiskers. He has three narrow, white stripes on his forehead. He has a hot pink nose and mouth.

name: Jamar
bio: Jamar loves all things sparkly and bright! When Jamar decorated his home, he mixed glitter in the paint so that every wall would gleam in the sunlight. If you want to visit Jamar's house, he might lend you some of his shiny gold jewelry to wear! Come get glam with Jamar.
appearance: Jamar is a pink meerkat with a white face and belly with two hearts one red and one big pink. He has red ovals around his eyes and inner ears the same color. His ears sit low on his head and are pointed at the tip. He has round, black eyes with a white rim and a red nose and mouth.

name: Jameel
bio: Are you looking for an extra special piece of furniture? Go hunting at Jameel's antique market for the perfect thingamajig. Your unique furnishing might be hidden under stacks of other odds and ends, but luckily Jameel's long limbs and sticky fingers can pick anything right up!
appearance: Jameel is a black frog with a red belly. Their eyes sit on top of their head rimmed in red. They have prominent nostrils above their smiling mouth.

name: James
bio: James is quite the catch. When he’s not studying for his next math test, you can find him in the outfield, becaue he is the captain of the baseball team. He travels all over the country for sports, and is expected to play in the major leagues!
appearance: James is a bright orange fox with large, triangular ears. His belly, the insides of his ears and the markings on his eyes and the sides of his face are all white. He has round black eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek.

name: Jamir
bio: Jamir likes to write his ideas in a journal; he starts a new one every year! Sometimes he writes a made-up story that he wants to share with his friends, or its a new invention he wants to see.
appearance: Jamir is a planet that is based off ofSaturn, the sixth planet in our solar system. He has brown stripes all over his body. He has a shimmery ring around his body. He also has round, black eyes and a happy smile.

name: Jan
bio: Jan is learning to accept the things she can't control—like income tax, or the poltergeist that lives in her attic! It turns out "Raymond the Malevolent" was actually "Raymond the Misunderstood" and only opening portals to the underworld because he wanted a friend. Now that he has one in Jan, he's really quite the roomie!
appearance: Jan is a blue cactus with two, uneven cactus arms on her sides. There are blue stitches all over her body except for her white belly. She wears a black witch hat with a teal band and silver buckle. She has pink blush, black eyes winking with lashes, and a pink mouth.

name: Jana
bio: Meet Jana. Every year Jana and her family come together to celebrate their loved ones through vigils, colorful face painting, sharing stories, and eating pan de Muerto. Come join! She'd love to teach you more about her family's traditions!
appearance: Jana is a black cat wearing sugar skull makeup. She has a white face with purple and blue designs with a pink flower on her forehead. She has blue inner ears, and a silver spine and ribs on her belly with a purple flower with vines above it. She has purple floral designs around her eyes with black marks under her eyes. Her eyes are closed in a happy expression, with black whiskers, nose, and a curved mouth.

name: Jane
bio: Jane is a beauty influencer who posts a daily GRWM—Get Reaper With Me! She loves talking about her plans for the day as she contours her cheekbones and sharpens her scythe. Rumor has it she's even launching her own makeup line soon: Lashes to Lashes, Blush to Blush!
appearance: Jane is a grim reaper with a black cloak. Her skull is humanoid with round eyes with lashes, a black nose and four teeth with pink blush. A pointed hood comes off her head and a ghostly tail trails behind her. She has a pink bow on the right side of her. She carries a scythe with a silver blade and a pink handle.

name: Janet
bio: Janet has a passion for music, and she views the ocean as a musical playground! After putting on her headphones, Janet strums her tentacles, mimicking the sound of a guitar. Janet's sea squad loves to hear her play and they dance along to her beautiful beat!
appearance: Janet is a rainbow tie-dye jellyfish with a white patch on her bell. The end of her bell has a wavy design. Her tentacles are made from pink, green, yellow, and blue ribbon. Her oral arms are made from a white shimmery fabric. Her Valentine edition features two hearts, a small blue one and a larger hot pink one, embroidered onto it.

name: Jangle
bio: Meet Jangle. He’s an expert hot cocoa mixologist! He loves experimenting with new and unexpected flavours. Spicy cayenne hot cocoa and lavender dark chocolate hot cocoa were two of his most recent concoctions! He’s always in need of taste testers! So grab a mug and join him!
appearance: Jangle is a light-skinned elf with pointed ears and short, brown hair. He wears a green Santa hat with a white pom-pom on the tail and a white band around the base. He wears a green shirt which has a red collar with triangular points, each tipped with white bead. His bottom half has a belt on and has a pattern of red and white stripes. He has a winking face.

name: Janice
bio: Janice waited all year to go to her favorite amusement park. She bumped so many cars in the bumper car ride that one of her candies fell off! When the ride stops, would you help Janice find it? Hopefully, it doesn't get crushed!
appearance: Janice is a green apple coated in caramel coating with various circular sprinkles on top of her. She has a light brown stick sticking out of the top her head. Her eyes are black with lashes with a black smiling mouth.

name: Janicza
bio: Do you smell that incense burning? Janicza must be getting ready for Día de los Muertos! She loves to cleanse the air with different woodsy scents, even clasping an incense stick with her long tail and fanning the aroma everywhere she goes.
appearance: Janicza is a teal ankylosaurus, a heavily armored type of dinosaur. She has a blue flower with teal vines with blue and orange raindrop-like makeup on her broad light blue plate with four cream spikes atop her head. She has a white belly with a colorful rib spine on her belly and an orange flower above with teal vines. She has round black eyes rimmed in orange, blue and teal flower petals and a smiling mouth.

name: Janis
bio: Janis is a brown donut with pink icing. They have red and green pieces of fruit embroidered on her face and a green, red and white striped candy cane embroidered on the right side. They wear a red snowflake trapper hat. They have round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.
appearance: Janis is a brown donut with pink icing. They have red and green pieces of fruit embroidered on her face and a green, red and white striped candy cane embroidered on the right side. They wear a red snowflake trapper hat. They have round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Janna
bio: Janna just built a skateboard ramp in her backyard! She practices her skateboard skills every day after school and invites her whole squad. Skating helps Janna unwind after a long day and is her favorite way to escape. After that, it's homework time! Come join Janna for a fun skate break.
appearance: Janna is a jar of bright red jam with a pink lid and label. Her label is edged in cream and has a strawberry motif on a white background at the center. She has closed eyes with short lashes, a smiling mouth, and blushing cheeks that match the color of her lid.

name: Jans
bio: Jans is as concentrated as they come. A marine biologist by day, she spends her nights developing the perfect paper straw. Though the hours are long, Jans won't rest until plastic straws are out the ocean and paper straws stop melting in her cup!
appearance: Jans is a pink fruit punch box with a fuchsia pink top and band by her center. Her band contains a cherry, watermelon, and a pineapple slice design with a hot pink and light pink striped pattern below. She has a straw poking at the top of her head with white and hot pink stripes. Her eyes are black and round, her mouth is colored red, and she has red blush marks.

name: Janus
bio: Janus is an active member of the North Pole community! He ,even hosts orientations for new 'Mallows starting at Santa's workshop so they can feel the holiday spirit right away. If you ever have a question about history or traditions Janus probably has the answer.
appearance: Janus is a Christmas Ornament with a tie-dyed red pattern, predominantly red and white. He has a pattern of linked, flowing swirls embroidered in silver across his body, and a gold cap atop his head. He has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Jarik
bio: Meet Jarik! Sleepovers with friends are his favorite. They stay up late watching romantic comedies, choreographing funny dances, and making mood boards with pictures they’ve cut from magazines. In the morning they flip fluffy pancakes with extra maple syrup!
appearance: Jarik is a bright red dragon with rounded ears. His muzzle, inner wings and belly are all gold, and he has long, spiraling horns which are black with gold stripes. He has a fuzzy, red mane. He has red nostrils and small, white fangs protruding from his muzzle. He also has round, black eyes.

name: Jarin
bio: Have you ever seen a jellyfish juggle? Jarin might be the first with dreams of joining the circus one day Jarin practices his juggling skills with anything he can find.
appearance: Jarin is a pale blue jellyfish with white markings on his bell. The end of his bell has a wavy design. His tentacles are made from white ribbons, and his oral arms are made from a shimmery fabric.

name: Jarrell
bio: Meet Jarrell. He is creative and often thinks about the future, dreaming and innovation are his way of life. Music helps foster his creativity, especially a good hip-hop or lo-fi beat. When he needs some downtime, you'll find him watching his favorite anime, do you want to join?
appearance: Jarrell is a dinosaur with a gradient of color shifting from green to blue. He has a textured white belly with a triple heart motif: a small, lime green heart, an aqua heart, and a large blue heart. He has lime green spines running down his back, as well as round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Jasmine
bio: (Bio taken from 4-pack wildlife squad boxset)
appearance: Jasmine is golden brown with black splotches all over her body. She has tan ears, and a white tummy. She has round black eyes with eyelashes and a black round nose with a cat-like smile.

name: Jason
bio: Early mornings are hard for Jason, especially when he was up late studying! This donkey is studying to become a truck driver - he wants to drive trucks up through the mountains and beyond. Jason grew up loving trucks and can't wait to drive but only after he's had his coffee.
appearance: Jason is a grey donkey with a white muzzle and belly. His long, floppy ears are pink on the inside, and his eyes are round and black. He has a light grey mane running down his back and a matching tail.

name: Jasper
bio: Concerts, quesadillas and collecting posters are Jasper's favorite things. He and his friends travel to see their favorite bands and keep all the concert posters in a huge portfolio to keep them safe. Do you want to see all the concerts they've been to?
appearance: Jasper is a dragon with a ringed tie-dye pattern with predominantly blue shades, including powder blue all the way to indigo. He has a pale blue nose, inner ears and belly. His horns and the inside of his wings are shimmering pale silver. The row of spines along his back are purple. He has two large black eyes and blue nostrils.

name: Javari
bio: Javari works round-the-clock in preparation for the biggest day of the year--Groundhog Day! This marketing guru is responsible for advertising the change in the season. Word in the den? Spring has sprung!
appearance: Javari is a lavender rodent with purple round ears and a periwinkle colored belly. He has a round purple nose, simple round, black eyes and mouth with two prominent front teeth.

name: Jaxton
bio: Jaxton believes that you’re never too busy for family time! He is quite the planner and everyone has learned to embrace it. He is coordinating the next big reunion for his entire family who’s scattered throughout the country!
appearance: Jaxton is a pale, brown-grey owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on his face and belly. Small, silver feathers decorate his chest. He has round, black eyes and his small, triangular beak is lemon yellow.

name: Jay
bio: Jay collects all kinds of shoes even though he doesn't have feet. They are so beautiful just to look at! Every pair has a different variety of textures, fabric, and colors—Jay just can't stop buying them. He considers each shoe a work of art!
appearance: Jay is a tan colored donut with orange and purple icing. sprinkles in light green, green, and yellow decorate his face. He has round black eyes and a black smiling mouth.

name: Jayda
bio: Jayda is a medical student who has a passion for helping others. She is also an expert at needlework. When she’s not studying for exams, she’s sketching designs and sewing costumes for her friends! What would you ask Jayda to sew for you?
appearance: Jayda is a pale pink jellyfish with white markings on her bell. The end of her bell has a wavy design. Her tentacles are made from white ribbons, and her oral arms are made from a shimmery fabric.

name: Jaydelle
bio: Have you met Miss Jaydelle? Her students seem to love her the most for her fun way of teaching. She knows the answer to just about anything but if she doesn't, the whole class gets to learn something new! Her favorite subject to teach is math because you'll always need it.
appearance: Jaydelle is a pale brown owl with prominent, darker brown ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. She wears a crimson cardigan with a white shirt and green bow tie. She holds a pointer in her right wing. She has round, black eyes with a white shine and curled lashes, over which she wears a pair of red glasses. She also has an orange, triangular beak.

name: Jayden
bio: Meet Jayden. By day he works in a restaurant and by night he is a rock legend. Jayden plays the drums and his skill will blow you out of the water. Once in a while, he'll put on a show for his fellow kitchen staff on the pots and pans. Do you want to hear him play?
appearance: Jayden is a pale blue beluga whale with a bulging forehead. He has a fin on each side of his body and one atop his head, as well as a fluke (tail fins). His has a white belly, round, black eyes and a curved smile.

name: Jayla
bio: Jayla organizes events of all kinds! She loves to get involved in fundraisers or charitable events for her community. This generous 'Mallow also hosts free, monthly self-defense classes for anyone curious about learning. There's no doubt Jayla is one tough bird!
appearance: Jayla is a Cockatoo with a hot pink head and a grey body with pink, fluffy feathers on top of her head. She has fuzzy grey wings and a pink belly. Her cheeks have light pink blush, a grey beak and black eyes with lashes.

name: Jazmanian
bio: Meet Jazmanian. This cool and compassionate 'Mallow sees a world bursting with possibility! You never know just what fun and creative adventures Jazmanian will get into! But this 'Mallow knows the best things happen when we work together! So come along and see what happens next!
appearance: Jazmanian is a lion with a grey body, blue mane, and shiny silver muzzle and belly. They have a long, grey tail with a blue tip, round black eyes, and a blue nose and mouth. They have a small embroidered Jazwares "J" logo on the bottom right of their belly and an embroidered blue circle with the text, "Jazwares 25th ANNIVERSARY" on their back. The inside of their bio tag is signed by Jazwares CEO, Judd Zebersky.

name: Jazzy
bio: Jazzy loves to enjoy the sun and travel. She can be found laying out by the pool or at the beach with a smile on her face. Her favorite food is cheese and she loves to watch movies with her friends on the weekends.
appearance: Jazzy is a giraffe with a pale lilac body covered in purple spots. She has a purple mane running down her back and two white horns. The inside of her ears, her muzzle and her belly are all white. On the right side of her chest is a motif with two heart outlines, the larger in sky blue and the smaller in red.

name: Jean
bio: Jean watches a lot of French movies- they're her favorite. She loves the old black & white ones the most, and even has posters of them in her room. Jean's learning French at her local community college, and hopes one day watch her favorite movies without subtitles!
appearance: Jean is an apple juice box. She has a lime band around her middle accompanied by a red apple with a leaf. Beneath that, she has a striped pattern, white and green. She has round, black eyes, baby pink cheeks and a red smile. Her top section is also green and has a small straw striped in white and baby pink coming out from her head.

name: Jeanne
bio:
Jeanne is a hyper helper, and the queen of multi-tasking! She uses all 8 tentacles to lend a helping hand, solve problems, and she can still have fun! There's no problem she can't solve.
She is a restrained introvert.
appearance: Jeanne is a pale pink octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including hot pink, magenta, fuchsia and coral). She has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Jeannie
bio: Even though her birthday is in the spring, Jeannie's favorite time of year is Halloween. She loves to dress up in costumes, try new makeup tutorials, and of course give her sisters a little fright. Who should she dress up as this year?
appearance: Jeannie is a yellow tulip flower. Her petals are dark yellow at the base with a gradient to light yellow at the tips. The top of her head - the inside of her petals - is a lighter yellow again. She has two large, pale green leaves which cup the bottom half of her body. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, a winking right eye and a smiling mouth.

name: Jeb
bio: This 'Mallow lives for open road! Jeb takes road trips as often as he can and never gets tired of seeing all the new and beautiful landscapes. For Jeb, nothing beats the freedom of a long-distance adventure except for one thing--coming back home to his family
appearance: Jeb is a maroon monster with purple and black striped horns and a thick, grey unibrow. He has two tufts of grey fur on top of his head on each side, with a grey belly. He has black eyes with two sharp teeth poking out at the top.

name: Jeff
bio: Meet Jeff, the park ranger! Because his size can be intimidating to other he is very shy and likes to keep to himself. He prefers a small group of close friends over large crowds. Being a ranger suits him perfectly as he is able to spend long stretches of time on his own in nature.
appearance: Jeff is a beast whose most noticeable feature is his enormous claws. He has large black claws sprouting from each paw, and steel bands on each arm. He also has black horns which sit above his red and orange ears. He has large, apple green eyes with cat-like slits, with fiercely angled grey eyebrows. He has a broad, grey nose and a small smiling mouth with tiny fangs. He has an orange belly with 'The Beast' written across the bottom.

name: Jeff the Blue Turtle
bio: Meet Jeff! Jeff hosts a book club for 'Mallows who love reading long, epic novels. This is a breeze for Jeff because he's a trained speed reader! He even keeps track of plots and characters in the books he's reading with colorful highlighters! Want to join Jeff's book club?
appearance: Jeff is a blue turtle with light blue scales atop his head. He has a white belly and four flippers (two on each side). He has a simple face with round black eyes and a smile. On his back is a blue tie-dyed shell.

name: Jefferson
bio: Jefferson is the creator of The Mumpkins a comic strip turned television cartoon turned megawatt film franchise! He still remembers the first day he drew that wacky pumpkin family and can't believe how far they've come. Look out for the sequel to their prequel— "Mumpkins On Mars"—in theaters soon!
appearance: Jefferson is a black cow with orange patches by the upper right of his head and his right ear and on the lower left side of his body. He has cream inner ears and muzzle, orange horns and a long tail with a tuft of orange fuzz at the tip. He has a pumpkin embroidered on the right side of his body. His eyes are black, and his nostrils are black.

name: Jemima
bio: Meet Jemima, this crooner has a beautiful singing voice. She's also the fastest banjo player ever! Feeling down in the ditch? She'd love to lift you spirits with one of her sweet and catchy songs. When she starts on the banjo, you can't help but smile!
appearance: Jemima is a rainbow tie-dye bear with white ears, tail, around her eyes, and a white band around her body. Her nose, mouth and eyes are all black, and her eyes have short eyelashes.

name: Jemma
bio: Meet Jemma. This sweet 'Mallow paints the most colorful pictures! In fact Jemma often features rainbows and sunrises in many of her vibrant works of art. Jemma takes any opportunity she can to watch the sun rise, even if that means staying up and dancing with her bestie!
appearance: Jemma is a s'more. She has a light pink marshmallow sandwiched between chocolate and graham crackers. Atop her head is chocolate that melts downward. On her head she has some pink holes dispersed throughout it. There is chocolate that stretches around her body on the bottom. Under the patch of chocolate is another graham cracker. She has closed eyes with short black lashes, a smiling red mouth, and pink heart cheeks. She has a heart headband above her head.

name: Jen
bio: Jen loves to spend time with her family, listen to music with her friends, and is the queen of naps. When she's not taking care of her family or napping you can find her studying to become a lawyer! Watch out for her purple law school takeover.
appearance: Jen is a grey penguin with a white front. She has closed, happy eyes and a pale yellow beak. Her 2018 version has a blue plaid scarf. Her 2020 versions wear a pair of pastel pink earmuffs and one of two varieties of scarf: the first is bright pink with a candy cane print (as pictured), and the second is pastel pink gingham. She was re-released in 2021 as a 10" HugMee. Her HugMee version is light grey with an orange beak, and she is wearing a multicolored tie-dye unicorn costume.

name: Jenna
bio: Make sure to congratulate Jenna! This super strong warthog just set a weightlifting world record. When she isn't pumping iron, Jenna enjoys playing with her two adorable kittens--Tricep and Bicep!
appearance: Jenna is a magenta boar with white accents inside in her ears, on her snout and on her belly. Her ears are triangular and have two dark magenta stripes on their forehead. She has two round, black eyes with lashes, purple nostrils. and a tuft of magenta hair.

name: Jenney
bio: Every year Jenney participates in her school's winter festival. She is always cast in the choir but this time, Jenney was given a solo! Jenney has been practicing all season and can't wait for her shining moment. Will you be at the winter festival to support Jenney?
appearance: Jenney is a grey penguin with a white face and belly. She has silver wings with, a golden halo around her head. she wears white and periwinkle clothes a gold lace on her chest. Her eyes are closed and have curled lashes with a yellow beak.

name: Jenny
bio: Jenny can't believe the local JC is offering a class on Smorgenyorgen! It's the fictional centaur language from her favorite medieval romance drama and anyone who's anyone on the convention circuit seems to know it. Hooves crossed Jenny gets to perform Foofoo's famous monologue to Gina for her final!
appearance: Jenny is a light pink cup of latte with whipped cream on top decorated with sprinkles and heart sprinkles and a light pink straw on the right side. She has a fuzzy tan sleeve with a pink heart in the middle. She has a winking expression with lashes and a pink smiling mouth.

name: Jeremiah
bio: Jeremiah believes autumn isn't just a season--it's a lifestyle! Catch him carving pumpkins in December, wearing flannel jackets in July, and 'Halfway to Thanksgiving' parties in May. This maple syrup bottle loves fall so much, he even planted an orange-leafed tree in his front yard!
appearance: Jeremiah is a royal orange jug of maple syrup. On the top of Jeremiah's head he has a red lid. He has a white label with red outlines and a brown maple leaf. He also has two, round black eyes and a basic smiling mouth.

name: Jericho
bio: Jericho is the mayor of a small town and sings baritone in The City Ballers, a barbershop quartet of bureaucrats. These public servants love bringing harmony to their community and even perform parody songs—like "Silent Night"—to call attention to local issues— like noise ordinances!
appearance: Jericho is a brown cow with brown patches by the upper right of their head and their right ear and on the lower right side of their body with swirls of white icing with green and red candy. They have tan inner ears and muzzle, white horns and a long tail with a tuft of brown fuzz at the tip. They wear a big red bow tie. Their eyes are black, and their nostrils are brown.

name: Jerome
bio: Jerome doesn't have a 5-year plan or even a 2-day plan! He loves living on the edge. Each morning is a surprise and each day a mystery! On Monday, he's at a silent disco with his friends in the park, and on Tuesday, he's learning how to scuba dive! With Jerome, anything is possible!
appearance: Jerome is a tie-dyed blue and white dinosaur with a white belly. A ridge of textured, dark blue and turquoise spines appears atop his head. He has two white horns on his head and a large white horn on his face. He has black, round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Jerrika
bio: Are you ready to take a trip with Jerrika? Jerrika is a journalist who travels the world interviewing those who are changing the world. Before she goes on any adventure, she makes sure to pack her lucky socks, she couldn't travel without them! Could you be her next interview?
appearance: Jerrika is a sky blue octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color of the rainbow. She has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Jerry
bio: Have you met Jerry? He's a mechanic by day and an aspiring comedian by night. Jerry normally considers himself pretty basic but he recently updated his 'doo as a part of a sketch and he's thinking about keeping it. What do you think?
appearance: Jerry is a teal hedgehog with darker teal spine markings, and a white face and belly. His muzzle is an off-white with a teal nose and his eyes are black, He has poofy rainbow hair held up by a glittery teal band.

name: Jessi
bio: Meet Jessi. He loves vanilla lattes, hot yoga, and history. When he grows up he wants to be an art history teacher! His favorite way to spend the day is walking the halls of old art museums and grabbing a coffee at the café. Want to join him?
appearance: Jessi is a zebra with black and white zebra print on his body. His muzzle and ears are black as he has a teal mohawk on the top of his head and a fuzzy tail. His belly and inner ears are a tie-dyed rainbow color, his nostrils are white, and his eyes are black with white rings around them.

name: Jessica
bio: Jessica wants to be a doctor when she grows up. You can find her dancing or coloring when she's not studying.
appearance: Jessica is a light blue unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly pink horn with a darker pink swirl wrapped around it. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes.

name: Jessie
bio: Meet Jesse, an aspiring author! Jesse loves scary movies and writes short stories that turn regular mallow life into spooky tales of Mallowville. One day Jesse might write a book of scary stories, would you read it?
appearance: Jessie is a jellyfish with a pale teal body. Their body ends with a wavy design and they have a darker teal color underneath. Their white belly is covered in shimmers. They have rainbow, multi-colored tentacles.

name: Jett
bio: Have you seen Jett? This tricky dragon can really blend in with his surroundings. He got his love for all things camouflage from his dad, he even has a camo-print bed!
appearance: Jett is a dragon Squishmallow. He is patterned with a camouflage style print which is predominantly dark teal, with splotches of color including dark navy, pistachio green and off-white. He has a white nose with khaki nostrils. He has sparkly lime green horns and spines. The inside of his wings are sparkling silver.

name: Jettward
bio: Jettward is one loveable and playful poodle pup! He will be by your side for any adventure. Some of his favorite activities are playing fetch on the beach, running zoomies at the park and snuggling up on your lap. He wants to be your forever pup.
appearance: Jettward is a black poodle with curly fur on his head and on the ends of his floppy ears. He has a lighter black muzzle and a fluffy black belly. His nose is black and his eyes are black with white rings around them. He has a black tail with a fluffy end.

name: Jeurgen
bio: Don't be fooled by Jeurgen's appearance. He's a big scaredy-cat! He sleeps with the light on and prefers a silly joke to a ghost story! One thing he does love? Caramel apples! He can't wait to celebrate Halloween and give them out to all the trick-or-treaters!
appearance: Jeurgen is a green ghost with a orange and black witch hat has a golden belt on it. He has written "BOO!" on his belly with black outer layer and white on the inside. He has black closed eyes, pink blush and a red smiling mouth.

name: Jezray
bio: Meet Jezray. This funky frog is a shaker and a groover. They bring music with them wherever they go and is never afraid to bust a move. Jezray loves to stand out by wearing glittery outfits, colorful hair, and showing off their moves.
appearance: Jezray is a green frog with a tie-dyed body and a large, purple mohawk that sits on their head.  They have a pale-yellow belly, pink blush, black eyes with white rings around them, black nostrils and a black smile.

name: Jim
bio: Pack a bag and get to know Jim! He is the best Squishmallow to hike a mountain with or ski down the slopes on a sunny, winter afternoon. Wouldn’t it be exciting to travel the world with your best friend? Jim gets to do just that with his older brother,Tim. During the day, he backpacks through the woods, and at night, he is at different music venues supporting his brother’s dream.
appearance: Jim is a llama with a light green body. Both the insides of his ears and the facial markings around his eyes and muzzle are cream. He has round, black eyes with short and straight lashes. His nose and mouth are dark cream, and he has a pale pink blush on each cheek.

name: Jingle
bio: Did you know thatCarolhas a twin? Meet Jingle! Jingle may not be as joyful as Carol but still plays along with her holiday shenanigans. Sometimes Jingle downplays the holiday cheer but deep down loves Carol enough to join in on the fun. Do you want to cause some mischief with Jingle?
appearance: Jingle is a white Christmas tree with a golden star atop their head. Three rows of Christmas lights are wrapped around them with small, circular lights in silver, blue, green, red and yellow. They have large black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Jingles
bio: Jingles wants to be a costume designer when they grow up. It's about the tassels, feathers, and glitter that make movies so magical. Last year Jingles helped with the costumes for the school play and can't wait to do it again.
appearance: Jingles is a light purple cat with violet stripes on their forehead. Their belly and the lower half of their face is white. They have peach pink inner ears and matching blush. They have closed, happy eyes with spiky lashes, a hot pink nose, a happy cat mouth and long black whiskers. Their tail is striped with darker purple.

name: Jiovanne
bio: Hats off to this curious cat, Jiovanne is the adventure cat you’ve been waiting for. Parasailing over dangerous waters, diving deep into the sea for treasure, and even scaling a snow-covered mountain are just some of the things she's done. Where should she go on her next trek?
appearance: Jiovanne is a periwinkle blue cat. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears is sparkly apple green. She has closed eyes and a pale pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Jivin
bio: Jivin devours sci-fi novels, homemade mac & cheese, and '90s sitcoms with a bottomless appetite that will make you wonder how they even have time for their day job. Not to worry - somehow Jivin makes it work! Jivin is a youth "Mallow counselor, who also spends their summers mentoring at a wilderness camp! What shows would you watch with Jivin?
appearance: Jivin is a hot pink, blue, and purple gradient deer with a white face and belly. They also have white inner ears and speckles on their forehead. She has hot pink antlers on top of their head. Their nose and mouth are hot pink, and they have round, black eyes with short lashes.

name: Joan
bio: Joan is an active columnist! From crochet tips to kayak rentals—dental floss and loss—if you have a question, "Dear Joan" has the answer. Sometimes she doesn't even read the question and just starts writing about whatever's on her mind that day!
appearance: Joan is a blobfish, a deep sea creature. She is peach pink with a creamy white belly and coral colored fins. She wears a pink heart headband on her head. She has winking eyes with lashes, a bulbous 'nose', and large, pink lips surrounding her smiling mouth. She has two heart blush one lavender on the left side and one red on the right side.

name: Joanne
bio: Joanne is a faithful companion to mermaids on all types of adventures, they’ve even given her the nickname ‘sea pup’! She has a sweet tooth and her favorite treat is honey buns. Her favorite color is emerald green and her birthday is May 14.
appearance: Joanne is a brown otter with small, folded ears and a dark golden marking across her face and belly. She has round black eyes which rest between the two colors of her face. She has a large, black nose, a narrow smile and 3 freckles and 3 whiskers on each cheek.

name: Joaquin
bio: En garde! Joaquin is taking fencing lessons this year, he wanted to try something cool and different. At first, there weren't many mallows in his class but now the classes are filling up! He loves cheering on his friends when it's not his turn.
appearance: Joaquin is a teal dragon with a white nose, inner ears and horns. He has a row of silver spikes running along his spine. His inner wings, nostrils and belly are all sky blue, and he has round, black eyes.

name: Jodie
bio: Meet Jodie! She collects small objects everywhere she goes and stores them like treasure. It would be impossible to track Jodie's keepsakes — she hides them all over her room! Her favorites are the perfect fall leaves she protects in hardback novels.
appearance: Jodie is an orange pumpkin with carved features like a jack-o-lantern. She has semicircle and a broad grin withe one prominent square teeth. There is a green stem on her head and a triangular, leaf-like pattern.

name: Joe
bio: Joe is a white takeaway coffee cup, he has a black lid with a tan straw poking out. He has a brown band around his body with a coffee bean in a cream circle surrounded by tan outlines. He has round, black eye and a black smiling mouth.
appearance: Joe is a white takeaway coffee cup, he has a black lid with a tan straw poking out. He has a brown band around his body with a coffee bean in a cream circle surrounded by tan outlines. He has round, black eye and a black smiling mouth.

name: Joelle
bio: Joelle wants to be an ambassador when she grows up, she likes to help people. She doesn’t know the first thing about it, so her teacher suggested that she do a report to learn more. Do you want to help her research?
appearance: Joelle is a blue bigfoot with a fuzzy mane on her head with long, shaggy ears. She has iridescent pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with eyelashes, a wide mouth which stretches across her face and blushing cheeks.

name: Joey
bio: If it has wheels then Joey is a fan! He loves cars, bikes, tractors and anything else he can speed around in! He regularly gives his friends a ride to the beach where they love to kick around a ball and have fun. When hunger strikes there’s only one snack Joey will reach for and that’s a chocolate brioche.
appearance: Joey is a mint dragon with numerous silver horns, two centered on his forehead and another two on each side of his head. His snout and inner ears are white, but his wing membranes and belly are patterned with pastel rainbow stripes. He has large black eyes on either side of his snout.

name: Johan
bio: Say hello to Johan! Johan has a goofy sense of humor, and sometimes he hides in wacky place so he can jump out and surprise his friends! The only problem is that Johan's friends have caught on to his jokes, so now his pranks aren't quite as surprising. What prank would you play on Johan?
appearance: Johan is an purple, orange, and green pumpkin with curving jack-o-lantern face. He has black eyes and a nose and a zig-zag mouth. he has a black trangle-like leaf on his head with a black vine on his head as well.

name: Johann
bio: Do you like to celebrate the season? So does Johann. This super creative pine tree loves dressing up for different holidays. Though most 'Mallows associate him with Christmas, Johann has an outfit for every occasion. His favorite is Halloween!
appearance: Johann is a green Christmas tree decorated with blue and yellow Christmas lights across his body, a golden star on top of his head, and three layers of white snow on his body. He has black eyes and a black smile.

name: Johanna
bio: Johanna loves when the air turns crisp and leaves on the trees begin to change. It means all her favorite fall vegetables are in season. She loves to cook hearty soups that keep her and her friends warm during the cool fall nights! So grab a bowl, she'd love to share!
appearance: Johanna is a grey cauldron with a light grey rim at the top. A bubbly green potion brews inside her, with a black bat wing and the handle of a wooden ladle sticking out. Orange flames tipped in yellow lick at her base. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, a smiling mouth and pink blush.

name: Johannes
bio: It's true: Johannes isn't an elf! He admits that wearing big fake ears was a little insensitive of him doesn't think he did anything "wrong" in infiltrating Santa's workshop. Candles can be good toymakers, and if it took burning a bridge to pave a path, so be it!
appearance: Johannes is a maroon candle. On top of his head he has a yellow flame which is melting pink wax from on top of his head. He has a pink sticker with two cranberries embroidered on it. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: John-John
bio: John-John can't get enough monster trucks! He collects everything from toy models to the real thing, and can't wait to tell you about it at his monster truck party tonight. John-John invited all his besties.Sager,KellyandCooper, and even baked monster truck-shaped cookies! Want to try one?
appearance: John-John is a bluish-grey dinosaur. He has pale blue spots on each side of his body. He has a creamy white belly. He has pale blue spikes which run down his back. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Joie (Unicorn)
bio: Joie is an electric unicorn who's always ready for a good time! This unicorn, decked out in neon and giant sunglasses, knows how to make a fashion statement. All of Joie's friends hope to be as stylish as her!
appearance: Joie is a white unicorn with a brightly colored rainbow mane and tail. She has a silver horn with yellow and green spirals. Her prominent muzzle has hot pink nostrils, the same color as her inner ears, and a wide, smiling mouth. Her heart-shaped belly is a dark blue color. She wears multi-colored sunglasses with purple lenses and a yellow and blue arm on either side. The lenses each feature a hot pink heart.

name: Joie the French Toast
bio: Joie might be a 12-time horseback riding champion, but around here, she's simply "Mother Hoof". Though she's retired her riding helmet, she passes the reins each year by mentoring one lucky young equestrian. From perfect poster to superb sportsmanship, Joie ensures her proteges shine brighter than a rhinestone saddle!
appearance: Joie is a piece of French toast. She is shaped like a slice of bread and has maple syrup spread on their face. She has a blueberry and a slice of butter embroidered on the right side of her body. She wears a purple beret on top of her head. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth

name: Joldy
bio: Meet Joldy, she's a total trickster who loves playing pranks on her friends. She's been known to hide for up to two hours, waiting for the perfect moment to jump out and scare her friends! So keep an eye out, because you never know when she's planning her next spooky prank!
appearance: Joldy is a lavender purple bat with long, upright ears. Her inner ears are shiny silver and her wings and belly are black. She has a winking expression and short, curled lashes. Her red, smiling mouth is adorned with two pointed white fangs.

name: Jolene
bio: Jolene has just about had it with the local bureaucracy! Her small town thought it'd be a real cute marketing push to elect one of their famous igneous rocks as mayor—and Jolene was keeping an open mind!—but the man has done the darn near nothing. Probably hanging out at the quarry or something... typical politician!
appearance: Jolene is a lavender bat with triangular ears and wings on either side of her body. She has cow spots all over her body. Her inner ears, wing membrane and fuzzy belly is white one of the wings is pink and the other is lavender. She has round, black eyes, a purple muzzle and a curved smile which shows two pointed, white teeth. She wears a necklace with a blue jewel tied on it.

name: Jolie
bio: Jolie is a princess in disguise; this Squishmallow gets the royal treatment wherever she goes! Instead of being zebra royalty, she wants to be a detective.
appearance: Jolie is a zebra with a salmon pink body covered in black stripes, aside from on her pure white belly. Her muzzle and ears are both black, with white inside her ears and pale pink nostrils. Her fluffy mane is black and she has round, black eyes ringed with white. She has an emblem with two hearts on her chest, a small ice blue one on top of a larger, bright red heart.

name: Jolly
bio: Meet Jolly, she loves everything about the snow. Jolly lives in a warm and busy city but dreams of moving far, far away. She wants to live on a snow-covered mountain or maybe a forest where she could ski and enjoy the snow all year long.
appearance: Jolly is a Christmas ornament with a tie-dyed orange pattern, which also includes shades of yellow and peach. She has a geometric, grid-like pattern embroidered in gold across her body, and a golden cap atop her head. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Jones
bio: Have you been wronged by cracked gingerbread? Wrinkly wrapping paper? Wilted mistletoe? Call Jones, Attorney at Paw. An expert on holiday law, this persuasive feline doesn't just fight the naughty—he defends the nice!
appearance: Jones is a golden-brown cat in the style of a gingerbread. He has tall cat ears and a long tail, with darker brown stripes on the top of his head and sides of his body. He has tan inner ears, muzzle, and round belly. He wears a red bowtie with green and red gumdrop buttons and white, wavy icing on his belly. He has white lines along his ears and white whiskers, black rounded eyes, black nose and cat-like smile.

name: Jonessa
bio: Jonessa is a great writer and photographer which comes in handy for her growing career as a food critic. Jonessa is happy to give advice on anything from revamping your resume to the perfect pairings for dinner.
appearance: Jonessa is a rainbow, tie-dyed bear with a predominantly pink, yellow and purple color scheme. She has a white muzzle with a purple nose and mouth, as well as a white belly. Her inner ears are glittery pale purple. She has round, black eyes with short lashes.

name: Jonny
bio: Have you seen Jonny? This fast-paced mallow is always busy and on-the-move! Even though he has 8 tentacles, Jonny jokes that he could do with 8 more. One thing to know about Jonny, he’ll always speak up for what he believes in.
appearance: Jonny is an apple green octopus with a white belly. He has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different shade of green (including bottle, pistachio, lime and apple). He has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Jordan
bio: Meet Jordan. This gingerbread boy is ready for action! Jordan went to school to be a firefighter AND an EMT, so he is one of Mrs. Claus’ favorite holiday helpers. Jordan is in charge of keeping the North Pole safe and sound, especially during the busy holiday season.
appearance: Jordan is a golden-brown gingerbread boy wearing a Santa hat. He has squiggles of white icing running down either side of his body. He has a pale colored belly with green and red gumdrop buttons decorating it. He also wears a large, red bow tie above his buttons. He has round eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Jordon
bio: Jordon is throwing a salad party! This happy-go-lucky ghoulie can't wait to celebrate his favorite type of food. Join the party for pin the heart on the artichoke, lettuce head bobbing, and the annual salad dressing costume contest! Should Jordon go as a rancher or an archipelago?
appearance: Jordon is an amethyst purple ghost with a wisp from his head. He is holding a light orange jack-o-lantern. He has a black belly. He has round, black eyes and a wide smile, showing off fangs and a red tongue.

name: Jorge
bio: Have you ever seen al pastor on a boogie board? Say hello to Jorge! He loves beach volleyball and boogie boarding, basically anything near the beach!
appearance: Might need help with this one...

name: Jorgina
bio: Jorgina volunteers for the food bank in her community. This jellyfish could be a professional chef if she wanted to, but her real passion is helping 'Mallows—especially when it comes to food! Nothing motivates Jorgina more than seeing those groceries go to happy homes.
appearance: Jorgina is a teal jellyfish with a silver holographic belly. The end of her belly has a wavy design. Her tentacles are made from ribbon with different shades of teal, and her oral arms are made from a shimmery fabric. She has black rounded eyes and a mouth. At the top of her head she has teal spots with a fuzzy teal tuft of hair.

name: Josa
bio: Josa loves to make 'Mallows' laugh! She gets voted class clown every year and is known to dress up in silly outfits on school spirit. days Josa even started to wright down some of her favorite jokes. keep your eyes peeled for Josa the next time you see an open mic night!
appearance: Josa is a blue sea slug. She has dark blue, segmented lines running down either side of her body. She has blue wings with white tips on each side of her body. Her antennae are white with blue tips. Her belly is the same shade of dark blue. She has black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Josephina
bio: When Josephina grows up, she wants to be a cloud. Everyone tells her that's "impossible", but she assures them that the next time they look up at the sky and see a cumulonimbus eating a cheese danish, that's definitely her. She also likes croissants!
appearance: Josephina is a peach tadpole with a white belly. Her eyes sit on top of her head and are black rimmed in white. She has prominent nostrils above her smiling mouth. She has orange spots all over her body with a tadpole-like tail behind her.

name: Josephine
bio: Meet Josephine. She is adventurous and loves to play outside while being creative. Music is her secret weapon. Whether it is swimming, biking, or swinging at the playground, she is always humming or singing along. What's your favorite song to jam along to?
appearance: Josephine is a yeti with a pattern of pastel rainbow stripes and a round, white face. Her belly is also white, with fluffy fur. She has glittery silver horns on either side of her head and a puff of fur on her forehead. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, as well as hot pink blush and a smiling mouth.

name: Josie
bio: Josie is a happy-go-lucky type of girl; she has the most positive attitude, and she's always ready to cheer up a friend in need!
appearance: Josie is a llama similar to the style of a laying Hug Mee, her body is colored in a rainbow tie-dyed pattern and her face, underbelly and fuzzy mane are white. Her tail is short  and she has all, pink ears and her white muzzle has a heart shaped nose and curved mouth on it, she has black eyes with lashes and pink blush.

name: Josue
bio: If there's a storm brewing, you can be sure Josue is at the center of it. This 'Mallow chases tornadoes, hurricanes, and any other severe weather event! Josue fell into his career during college while studying meteorology. He went on one storm chase with his classmates and decided he wanted to do it forever.
appearance: Josue is a zebra with a cream body covered in peach stripes, aside from on their belly. His muzzle, pointy ears, belly and the inside of his ears are sand also He has round black. He has a fuzzy brown mane and tail

name: Jova
bio: Jova invented a new kind of airplane. Her goal is that one day everyone can fly their own little plane—like a car in the sky! Jova pilots this single 'Mallow plane for test runs every morning, then works on improvements the next day. This muffin is sure to be the next best inventor of our time!
appearance: Jova is a blueberry muffin with blue sprinkles and a blueberry on top with a yellow wrapper. They round, black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Joxtine
bio: This is Joxtine's first slumber party and she's a little nervous. Even though she has fun with her friends, she doesn't know how it might go. She's bringing her favorite blanket to keep her company because it makes her feel safe.
appearance: Joxtine is a pink cat with a panda costume on. She is blushing, and she has whiskers. She also has circle eyes, and she has oval ears.

name: Joy
bio: Catch her if you can, Joy is a thrill seeker and always on the move! She lives among the treetops and loves to glide like a purple streak through the trees. Once she was gliding so fast that even she didn't think she could stop. Are you ready for adventures with Joy?
appearance: Joy is a sugar glider, a type of possum which can glide using wing-like membranes. She is primarily violet with a white lower face and belly. She has darker purple markings in stripes covering each eye, a large stripe starting at her head and running down her back, on the tip of her tail and on the outer front side of her 'wings'. Her inner ears are also blue-violet. She has round, black eyes and a flamingo pink nose and mouth.

name: Joy the Flying Pig
bio: Joy loves to fly! Her sparkling wings are always taking her to new heights! Joy is always cheerful and ready to brighten anyone's day.
appearance: Joy is a hot pink flying pig with silver, glittery wings. She has a light marbled pattern all over her body with a lighter pink muzzle, belly, and inner ears. Her hooves are metallic silver alongside a curled pig tail behind her. She has closed eyes with lashes with black nostrils on her muzzle.

name: Joyce
bio: The only thing Joyce loves more than shopping for herself is shopping for others. A personal stylist at her favorite boutique. Joyce takes joy in helping other 'Mallows decide what to wear and how to wear it!
appearance: Joyce cup is cream colored with a fuzzy tan holder, her holder has a white snowflake, and she has whipped cream with sprinkles and a gingerbread man, she has a brown and white striped straw. Her left eye is winking and her right eye is open, she has a black mouth.

name: Juana
bio: Better known for her bold stage performances and funky electro beats, Juana likes to hide during her downtime. When she's not performing at a big EDM festival, you can find Juana hiking in the hills or perched on a lookout taking pictures of the sunset.
appearance: Juana is a jackalope, a mythical creature that is a jackrabbit with antelope antlers. She has a lemon body and long, vertical ears with yellow inner ears. She has two sparkling white antlers with two points each between her ears. She has a yellow, fuzzy belly and tail. She has round, black eyes and a pink nose and mouth. she wears a sakura and daisy flower crown.

name: Judith
bio: Judith's favorite season is fall, she loves to jump in the big piles of leaves. When it's time to clean up Judith helps her mom rake and afterward, they make a batch of fresh hot apple cider. Would you like some?
appearance: Judith is a black Squishmallow with gold, shiny bones. She has a shimmery, round, humanoid skull with flat teeth and cavities for the eyes and nose, as well as a sternum and ribcage.

name: Judy
bio: Judy wants to be a writer when she grows up; she loves to make up fantastical stories based on the people in her town. She shares the stories on her vlog and has her followers help decide which characters to focus on next; what could Judy write about you?
appearance: Judy is an orange fruit with a stripy orange and yellow pattern. She has a pale yellow shine on the right side of her head. She has a small, happy mouth, a pink blush, and round, black eyes with short lashes. She wears a pair of circular, brass-colored glasses. A green stem and pair of leaves sprout from the top of her head.

name: Julep
bio: Are you looking for a party planner? Julep is your girl! She plans elegant galas and loves to entertain guests. She wears a hat to every event she plans; can you guess how many hats she has?
appearance: Julep is a chocolate brown horse with a white star on her forehead. She has black eyes and a lighter brown mane and tail. The inside of her ears, muzzle and belly are pink in color. She has a mint julep emblem embroidered on the right side of her chest.

name: Jules
bio: Meet Jules the mint cat. Jules loves to laugh and play hide and seek with her friends. She also loves to color; she tells stories with her artwork. You’ll know when she’s excited because she gets really loud, she just can’t hide her excitement!
appearance: Jules is a blue mint tabby cat with a pale green-blue body and aqua stripes on her head and sides. She has a white belly and pale pink inner ears. Her nose and mouth are pastel pink, framed by black whiskers, and her eyes are closed. She has the phrase 'You're PURRFECT' embroidered on her belly in grey and mint, accompanied by a hot pink heart.

name: Julian
bio: Drawing and listening to music are two of Julian's favorite things. Though he loves to play with his brothers, he likes to spend time by himself and draw stories about his life. Do you want to draw with Julian?
appearance: Julian has a red body and tan stomach. he has black eyes and white around them. he has a tan nose and a black smile. he has white markings on his sides and a marking on his head.

name: Julianne
bio: Weekends for Julianne mean nonstop dancing! This 'Mallow wants to bop, hop, and slide to any danceable song. Really, Julianne loves all genres of music. So if you made plans with her this weekend, don't forget your dancing shoes!
appearance: Julianne is a black with a light grey coffin-like shape with white outlines by her front. She has a skull and two crossed bones on her belly with a purple bow and a spider web by the right of her head. She has mischievous black eyes and a red smile.

name: Juliette
bio: Juliette is a bookworm who loves to get lost in a good story. She has a big imagination, and has a plan one day to go to England and meet the Queen!
appearance: Juliette is a corgi with tan and white fur, she has pointed ears with white inner ears and a short tan tail. She wears a golden crown on the top of her head with white paws and pink toes and paw pads. She has black eyes, a black nose, and a curved mouth with her tongue poking out.

name: Jung
bio: Jung is a pale-blue Honduran white bat with yellow triangular ears and wings on either side of their body. They have pale blue wing membrane and a fuzzy yellow belly. They have round, black eyes, a yellow muzzle and a cat-like smile which shows two pointed, grey teeth.
appearance: Jung is a pale-blue Honduran white bat with yellow triangular ears and wings on either side of their body. They have pale blue wing membrane and a fuzzy yellow belly. They have round, black eyes, a yellow muzzle and a cat-like smile which shows two pointed, grey teeth.

name: Junie
bio: Junie jumped at the opportunity to plan her annual family reunion! Her family gathers once a year connecting from all over; it's Junie's favorite day. She's planning a delicious barbeque and lots of fun outdoor games. Will you help Junie string the party lights?
appearance: Junie is a yellow half-peeled banana with four peels hanging off from the center of her body all the way around. Her top half is a lighter yellow color with round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Junior
bio: Junior is writing a rom-com! It's called "Carry the One" and is about two accountants—opposite in personality—who find common ground in crunching numbers. Spoiler alert: something major happens on April 15th!
appearance: Junior is a scoop of ice cream with white syrup, red and pink heart sprinkles and pink sprinkles, and a red heart headband on top of their head. They are placed on top of a tan waffle cone with a diamond pattern and his scoop overflowing on top of it. They have black eyes, a black smile and red blush on their cheeks.

name: Juniper
bio: All rise, the honorable Judge Juniper is here! Being fair is very important to Juniper, and when they grow up, they want to be a judge. For now, Juniper is focused on being fair on the playground and with their friends.
appearance: Juniper is a pistachio green donkey with a white muzzle and belly. Their long, floppy ears are yellow on the inside, and their eyes are round and black. They have an olive green mane running down their back and a matching tail.

name: Justice
bio: Justice is a white saucier or gravy boat. They have gravy on top of their head and is dripping. They have a white handle on the right side of their head. Their bottom half is green and has a holly berry embroidered on the left side. They have closed eyes with lashes and a red smile with pink blush.
appearance: Justice is a white saucier or gravy boat. They have gravy on top of their head and is dripping. They have a white handle on the right side of their head. Their bottom half is green and has a holly berry embroidered on the left side. They have closed eyes with lashes and a red smile with pink blush.

name: Justin
bio: Meet Justin. This gutsy 'Mallow never says no to a dare! He once painted the neighbor's yard blue! This sometimes gets him in trouble, but all in good fun. Even the neighbors couldn't help but have a chuckle at their bright blue yard. Do you have a dare for Justin?
appearance: Justin is a grey dinosaur with a pale grey belly. He has grey spikes which run down his back. He has a smiling mouth with a row of sharp, white teeth, and round, black eyes.

name: Justine
