bio: Justine loves reading and writing, especially stories about other galaxies! Her favorite time to write is in the spring because everything feels fresh. She hides away in her favorite tree reading or thinking about what stories she might create next. Would you like to read one?
appearance: Justine is a mint green bird emerging from a pastel colored eggshell. The eggshell has a jagged top with a yellow border, with a white center and a mint base with a scalloped edge. Colorful dots are spread across the top half and a peach band runs horizontally across the egg. Justine's fluffy wings and the crest of feathers atop her head are mint with a blue tinge. She has round eyes with short, curled lashes and a pointed, yellow beak.

name: Jyri
bio: Jyri has a serious sweet tooth. He treats himself to cake, tartlets, and cookies all the time. Jyri knows his limit, but sometimes he just can't help himself and he eats too many pastries--the sugar rush really pushes back his bedtime! Wanna split a brownie with Jyri?
appearance: Jyri is a tanGinsengwith darker stripes around the front of his body. Theres two light green leaves on top of Jyri's body. He has 2 arms which are both different from one another, these represent a Ginseng's roots. Jyri's face has two round wide open black eyes and a smiling black mouth.

name: K8-e
bio: K8-e communicates using the robot language of her favorite science fiction series. Though her family sometimes has trouble understanding her, they've learned to rely on her handy dandy translation guide for help. According to K8-e, "red alert: za za" means she's hungry for pizza!
appearance: K8-e is a hot pink cupcake with a purple wrapper and darker purple stripes. She has white frosting on her top decorated with multi-colored sprinkles and pink heart sprinkles. She has a pink heart on top of her head with black lashed eyes, a black smile, and pink blush.

name: Kachina
bio: Meet Kachina. She is lovable and caring spirit who helps people find their healthy paths. She works as a nutritionist, and through she knows different food work for different people, she likes to follow a vegan diet, Do you want to make some vegan cookies with Kachina?
appearance: Kachina is a green fruit with a brown peel. She has white stripes on her face and a white core. She also has few black seeds, and has a black, round eyes and a red mouth.

name: Kaelea
bio: Meet Kaelea. This lovable and huggable koala is all about essential oils, hanging outside, and showing others love. When she's not relaxing in the trees, she is out and about collecting eucalyptus to munch on. And while she's foraging, she will grab some fresh herbs for dinner!
appearance: Kaelea is a pastel pink koala with enormous fluffy ears. Her ears are varying shades of pink and purple. She has round, black with curled lashes, a large koala nose and a smiling mouth. She has a light pink belly and is holding a large, glittery pink heart in her front paws.

name: Kai
bio: Kai is the king of the sea! When he's not ruling the sea, you can find him searching for sunken treasure; Kai loves to show his creativity by making elaborate underwater sandcastles with his best friends.
appearance: Kai is a black whale with three fins, two on each side and a dorsal fin. He has a white belly and markings above his eyes which resemble eyebrows. He has black eyes, rimmed in white, and a white smile.

name: Kaia
bio: Meet Kaia. She is the chef and owner of her very own restaurant! She loves making all types of food and is especially good at making handmade pasta. If you are looking for a yummy meal with an amazing friend, reach out to Kaia!
appearance: Kaia is a tie-dyed ice cream in pink and blue colors, topped with pink sauce and rainbow sprinkles, her scoop overflows from her cone, with a wavy pattern going on top of the tip of the cone. Her cone is tan colored with a diamond pattern. She has closed black eyes with lashes, pink blush, and a red smiling mouth.

name: Kaisa
appearance: Kaisa is a mint green kangaroo with tall, upright ears. She has a round snout which is brown on top and white on the lower half. Her ears and belly are also white. She has round, black eyes and a black nose. She carries a baby identical to herself in an elastic pouch on her belly.

name: Kaitlyn
bio: Meet Kaitlyn. This loyal and loving lemur is your new best friend and workout buddy! Kaitlyn loves going for runs, swimming in lakes, and hiking. Her latest hobby is mud running! She may get dirty, but she always has her precious pink glow!
appearance: Kaitlyn is a white lemur with a sparkly belly. Her mask is white with silver sparkles, and the markings around her eyes and muzzle are light pink. She also has pink stripes on her tail and pink iner ears. She has black eyes ringed in white, as well as a black nose and mouth.

name: Kalani
bio: Meet Kalani! Kalani will do anything for her friends, including waking up early to hang out with her best buddy -Cobie! Kalani loves to do silly sing alongs and play pranks on her friends, but also knows when to lend a helping hand. Want to plan your next prank with Kalani?
appearance: Kalani is an orange pumpkin with a large green stem and a striped scarf. Kalani has the standard Squishmallow face, unlike the Halloween Squadpumpkinswhich all feature a jack-o-lantern style.

name: Kaldette
bio: Do you hear someone singing? It might be Kaldette! She is bursting with talent and loves to sing throughout her day. Kaldette loves singing along to her favorite tunes while she works, but she doesn't always remember to mute her mic.
appearance: Kaldette is a sliced grapefruit, with a pink and yellow skin on the outside, and light, peach pink on her face and belly. The bright pink markings on her belly represent the sections of a grapefruit. The top of her head sports a short green stem with a single leaf. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and a red smile.

name: Kaldette the Panda
bio: Picnics, and paper planes are Kaldette's idea of a good time, she loves a DIY charcuterie day with friends! She loves writing kind notes on paper planes and then sending them off into the sky for someone to read. What would yours say?.
appearance: Kaldette is a pink panda, and She resembles as a teddy bear. She has rainbow fluffy ears and she has black eyes that ringed in white, and a pink nose and mouth. She has an adorable white feet paws

name: Kalina
bio: Ready for some fun? Kalina the cow is at your service. This colorful cow is a party planner turned decorator, and she loves mixing colors, fun shapes, and making magic with retro chic. So grab your go-go boots and get ready for a Mod good time!
appearance: Kalina is mostly white with patches of pink and purple tie-dye on her lower left side and on her right ear. She has small, pale pink horns and round black eyes. Her muzzle is light pink with darker pink nostrils.

name: Kamala
bio: Kamala flies all day to keep up with her busy schedule. She's a law student preparing for big exams, president of her soronity, and works at the library in the evenings! But no matter what, Kamala always making time for the 'Mallows she cares about---including you!
appearance: Kamala is a bird with a white head and a pointed orange beak. She has a white ruff around his neck, separating his white head from his pink body. He has fluffy hot pink wings with a yellow heart belly that says "Text Me" in hot pink.

name: Kamili
bio: Here comes Kamili! Kamili wants to be a traffic coordinator one day, helping guide others on the busy streets. Kamili loves to provide direction and be the navigator for friends and family. If you need a co-pilot for your next adventure, you know how to call!
appearance: Kamili is a sea pig, a type of sea cucumber which lives on the ocean floor. They are purple-blue in color and have small, lilac horns on their head. They have eight legs which are tucked in over their peach pink belly. They have black eyes with short lashes and are winking their right eye. They have an unusual, lumpy-looking mouth and pink blush under each eye.

name: Kamya
bio: Kamya is know for her green thumb these days, but gardening didn't always come naturally to her! After overwatering her first shrub, she conducted a series of tests to determine the perfect soil to water ratio. Her yard is now so full of greenery, it's increased the city's oxygen concentration by 3%
appearance: Kamya is a mint turtle with teal scales atop her head. She has a pale green belly with two flippers on each side holding a bouquet of flowers. She has a round black eyes with lashes and a red smile. On her back she has a tie-dye purple shell.

name: Kandace
bio: Kandace's  favorite book is "The Princess and the Pea" so you guessed it-- she takes a lot of naps!  Kandace is on a mission to find the softest, most nappable bed.
appearance: Kandace is a brown sloth hugmee with white spots all around her and she has a cream colored belly and face. She has grey markings around her muzzle and eyes. Her nose is a dark grey and he has two large black eyes.

name: Kaprina
bio: If you think Kaprina looks familiar, you've probably seen one of her commercials. Kaprina's last commercial was for paper towels, and now she has a lifetime supply! Being in commercials is fun for now, but Kaprina has her eyes set on opening her own business. Do you have any ideas for her?
appearance: Kaprina is a fluoro green monster with round, black eyes, a smiling mouth and white fangs. She has bright blue horns and a puff of orange hair on top of her head. She also has an orange, circular patch around her eye and on her belly.

name: Karina
bio: Original:Karina is a numbers girl. Her favourite subjects have always been maths and science. She plans on using her data expertise as a future computer scientist!
appearance: Karina is a calico cat with a cream body and pink and grey patches. She has one pink patch over her left ear, and two grey patches, one on her right ear and the other on her lower right body. She has closed eyes, black whiskers and a happy, pink cat mouth. Her tail is grey with a pink tip.

name: Karl
appearance: Karl is a grey koala with a white belly. His ears are grey with blue fuzzy insides. His face consists of two round black eyes, a big black nose and a black smiling mouth. He is wearing white bunny ears with pink insides.

name: Karlie
bio: Got a glitch? Call Karlie! There's no computer error this techie 'Mallow can't fix and nothing makes her happier than helping her friends. Karlie grew up playing games on her big brother's desktop computer, and now she's developing games on her own! Want to play one of Karlie's computer games?
appearance: Karlie is a red demon with bat-like wings. She has two gold-white horns on each side of her head and a light red belly. She has round, black eyes, with one of them winking. She also has a smiling mouth with two prominent white fangs.

name: Kat
appearance: Kat is purple, blue, and pink with spots all over her body. Her stomach is iridescent sequins. Her ears are pink and her muzzle is white. She has cheerful eyes.

name: Kate
bio: Meet Kate; she loves to travel and watch sports, some of her favorite games have been on the road. She enjoys spending time with her family and friends, especially when they're tailgating or watching a championship game. Her favourite game day snack is macaroni and cheese.
appearance: Kate is a llamacorn, a combination of a llama and a unicorn. She is off-white in color but has a bright, rainbow mane. Both the insides of her ears and the facial markings around her eyes are white with shiny, silver flecks, the same as her rainbow-spiralled horn. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a white muzzle and a pale pink nose and mouth. A shiny, double heart emblem in hot pink and lavender decorates her chest.

name: Katharina
bio: Meet Katharina. She's a professional gamer and gets to test out new video games all day! She goes on mythical quests and journeys to the end of the planet all from the comfort of her bright pink gamer chair. She's the #1 player! Come join, she'd love to show you the ropes!
appearance: Katharina is a dog with a grey body. Her muzzle is white with a dark grey nose, and she has a darker grey patch around her right eye. Both her floppy, dark grey ears and white belly and black rounded eyes.

name: Kathy
bio: Meet Kathy. This cozy cat loves to play in the snow. Kathy has a marvelous coat collection; she has a coat for every occasion! When she's not playing in the snow, you'll find her tending to her indoor garden, she loves being a plant mom!
appearance: Kathy is a white cat with pink inner ears, wearing a pale pink sweater with a pink pocket featuring an embroidered snowflake. She has cyan mittens and a cyan toque with pink detailing.

name: Katinka
bio: Katinka is an aspiring actress! Her most recent performance as Sardine Lady in the philosophical farce 'Plenty of Fish' impressed her village so much, they agreed to send her to acting school. Katinka can't wait for Crying 101 and hopes to place into Farm Animals 310!
appearance: Katinka is a yellow cat poking out of a half-peeled banana. She has a banana yellow head and darker stripes on her head and sides. She has round, black eyes with her nose and mouth are lemon yellow, framed by dual yellow whiskers.

name: Katsla
bio: Just like her sisterKarina, Katsla is all about the numbers. While her sister is about the principles of math and science, Katsla is about the sleep number. She wants to uncover the secrets of sleep, stay tuned for more of her research!
appearance: Katsla is a white cat with pastel pink and black patches. Her left ear is covered by a pale pink patch, and her right ear is black. She has a pink nose and a black mouth. Her eyes are hidden beneath a black sleeping mask which reads 'NIGHT M★DE' in a pink font. She wears pastel pink pajamas which have a repeating pattern of black moons and the phrase 'NIGHT MODE', as well as some small star details. The pajamas have a hot pink collar and black buttons.

name: Katta
bio: Katta just got her Pilot's license! Katta is fascinated by all things that fly, which makes aviation the perfect career choice for her. When she's not in the sky, Katta watches water birds in their natural habitat by the seaside.
appearance: Katta has a tan body and ears with her inner ears, tummy, and marking around her face white. Her face consists of black eyes, smile, whiskers, and nose.

name: Katya
bio: Meet Katya. She and her mom moved to a new country recently and sometimes she gets homesick. Her new favorite thing to do is rollerblade by the beach. When she grows up, Katya wants to become a lawyer like her mom and help people.
appearance: Katya is a koala tie-dyed in rainbow colors with enormous, round ears. Her belly and the insides of her ears are creamy white. She has a large black nose, a smiling mouth, and closed eyes with short, curled lashes.

name: Kavya
bio: Meet Kavya. This peppy penguin is a team player who is always willing to lend a hand. Kavya believes that being kind and thinking of others are the best ways to live.
appearance: Kavya is a hot pink penguin with a white front. They have closed, happy eyes and a sparkly silver beak. They wear a colorblock shirt which has baby blue and baby pink panels. The shirt's collar is lilac and laced up with white string, and the pocket on the right side is also lilac with white stripes.

name: Kayce
bio: Have you ever seen a panda pegacorn do Muay Thai? Meet Kayce! She coaches soccer and trains in Muay Thai during the week and on the weekends attends tournaments and cheers on her team.
appearance: Kayce is a white panda with black markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band around her body. She has black eyes ringed in white, and a black nose and mouth. She has metallic silver wings and a matching unicorn horn in the centre of her head.

name: Kayla
bio: Kayla loves fruit juice, being silly with her friends and hanging out in her tree house. She helped her dad build it and they even added a projector sheet so her friends can put on puppet shows or watch home movies.
appearance: Kayla is a light purple koala with enormous, round ears. Her belly and the fluffy insides of her ears are white. She has a large black nose, as well as round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Keanu
bio: Kickball and dodgeball are two of Keanu's favorite games to play at recess. Whenever it's his turn to kick, he pretends he's kicking the ball all the way into space. He hasn't kicked it that far yet, but maybe one day he will!
appearance: Keanu is a dragon Squishmallow. He is patterned with a camouflage style print which is predominantly teal, with splotches of color including black, pistachio green and off-white. He has a white nose, belly and inner ears. He has sparkly silver horns and bright turquoise spines. The inside of his wings are sparkling silver.

name: Keely
bio: Keely is a soon-to-be-mommy, and blogger, who wants to start her own painting business. She paints murals for her friends and family, and dreams of one day painting a mural for her favorite place to visit, the Sydney Opera House!
appearance: Keely is a tan/light brown kangaroo with tall, upright ears. She has a round snout which is brown on top and white on the lower half. Her ears and belly are also white. She has round, black eyes and a pale pink nose.

name: Kei
bio: Meet Kei! Kei likes to go on long walks when she's feeling stressed, so the park is her favorite place to be. Recently, she's taken a special interest in learning about the names of the cloud formations she sees on her walks! Want to go for a stroll with Kei?
appearance: Kei is light brown with darker brown splotches all over her body.  She has greyish fluffy ears that have a white middle, and a fluffy white tummy. She has round black eyes with eyelashes and a pink round nose with a cat-like smile.

name: Keiko
bio: Keiko has a special connection with the snow. Somehow, it just makes her feel peaceful. Best of all, Keiko says many magical moments happen when it snows. Like that day she got a perfect score on her spelling test, it was snowing! How does the snow make you feel?
appearance: Keiko is a light blue Christmas tree decorated with white, gold and silver Christmas lights across her body, a silver star on top of her head, and three layers of white snow on her body. She has black eyes and a black smile.

name: Keina
bio: Never in one place for too long, Keina is a nomad. Keina loves to explore new places, speak new languages, and make new friends! Keina can stay awake all night talking about all the amazing places to visit. Pack your bags if you're ready for a road trip!
appearance: Keina is type of sushi known asebi sushi(prawn sushi). Their body is made up of white rice. They have a pink prawn on her head which has banded stripes of darker and lighter pink, and a hot pink tail. They are winking on their left eye and have a red, smiling mouth.

name: Keir
bio: For Keir, fall means all new TV! New seasons of old shows and new original series all start in the fall, and she can't wait to find out what's going on with her favorite characters. Keir looks forward to cozying up with her family for one of their favorite seasonal routines.
appearance: Keir is a green apple coated in red sugar candy coating with various sprinkles on top of her. She has a brown stick sticking out of the top her head. Her eyes are black with lashes with a black smiling mouth.

name: Keisha
bio: Keisha subscribes to a bunch of magazines. After she's done reading, Keisha cuts out different pictures and articles to create a collage! Sometimes she applies sparkly glitter glue to paste all the cutouts together, then puts her masterpiece in a big frame. Want Keisha to make a Collage for you?
appearance: Keisha is a cupcake with swirled icing in layers of cream and yellow. Orange and yellow sprinkles decorate the two upper layers. She has round, black eyes with eyelashes and a smiling mouth. Her wrapper is orange with dark orange stripes and the top of the wrapper is yellow. She also has a carrot on her icing.

name: Keith
bio: Meet Keith. He loves to play sports, make new friends, and go on crazy adventures. One day he wants to travel or coach his own team! One of Keith's favorite things about summer is going to camp. Last year he met two new mallows who go to his school.
appearance: Keith is a blue fox with a cream white belly. He has large, triangular ears, the insides of which are shimmery silver. The banded markings across his eyes and sides of his face are white. He has round black eyes with short lashes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek.

name: Keith the Dragon
bio: Put on your goggles and grab a tool belt, it's time to step into Keith's woodshop! Keith is a carpenter who builds cozy outdoor furniture. He also teaches a woodworking class. This week his students are helping build a deck, are you signed up?
appearance: Keith is a dragon with a tie-dye pattern that is predominantly blue with traces of light green. He has a white snout, belly and inner ears. His wings membranes, horns and spikes are all shimmery silver. He has two simple, black eyes.

name: Kelbel
bio: Although Kelbel makes her living in cat toys and takes daily cat naps, she absolutely loves dogs! She sometimes even sneaks out to a nearby dog park on her lunch break to share her french fries with Frenchies. Now if only she could get them to stop following her back into the office...
appearance: Kelbel is a purple half-peeled banana with four peels hanging off from the center of her body all the way around. Her top half is a darker purple color with round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Kelby
bio: Meet Kelby. Kelby dramatizes every aspect of his life like he's living in a TV show. So if you see Kelby take a long pause or gasp, don't worry, he's just amplifying the moment. Kelby even gives his houseplants names and narratives!
appearance: Kelby is a lime Squishmallow. He has hot pink tapioca pearls and silver lid with a hot pink straw. He also has eyelashes he also has a red smile. He looks somewhat identical toSevda’snew design.

name: Kelen
bio: The only thing more colorful than Kelen's appearance is their personality! They love singing silly songs they've made up, making secret handshakes and shopping with their friendDoriz. Afterwards, they go home and do a mini fashion show with all the clothes they scored!
appearance: Kelen is a tie-dyed cup of milkshake colored in cyan, pink, white and yellow. On top of their lid, they have whipped cream with rainbow sprinkles on top and a pink and white striped straw. They have black eyes with lashes and a red mouth.

name: Kelina
bio: Meet Kelina. She loves painting her nails and handwritten cards. On the weekends you'll find her painting her nails blue and browsing her local stationery store. Send her your address and she'll send you a card!
appearance: Kelina is a grey koala with large, round ears. Her belly and ears are furry and rainbow colored. She has a large black nose, as well as round eyes with two lashes on each and a smiling mouth.

name: Kellie
bio: Have you seen Kellie? This 'Mallow is always on vacation! Kellie travels to a different beach every weekend no matter how far. In fact, for Kellie it is all about the journey. Would you like to go with Kellie on her next beach adventure? She can teach you how to build a giant sandcastle!
appearance: Kellie is an orange goldfish. She has a tall, metallic orange fin in the center of her head and two long, narrow fins on either side the same color. She also has a white belly with silver sparkles, plain black eyes and a dimpled smile.

name: Kelly
bio: Kelly loves playing his marching drum because he gets to hang it close enough for his arms to reach! This software engineer always keeps up with the latest tech and can't wait to tell his besties,SagerandCooper, all about it, even when they're busy watching TV. Kelly uses his freshly baked cinnamon rolls to get their attention!
appearance: Kelly is a pale red Velociraptor with short arms, black sharp claws, and a tan belly. He has maroon hair on the top of his head going down to his back, with three brown stripes on his back and a tail. His eyes are black, and round and he has an open mouth with white sharp teeth.

name: Kelsey
bio: Kelsey loves DIY crafts, gardening, and helping others. She loves to do craft projects and finds inspiration everywhere around her.
appearance: Kelsey is a white cat. The inner side of her ears are pink, as well as her heart-shaped nose, mouth, and whiskers. Her muzzle is white. She has round, black eyes with straight eyelashes.

name: Kena
bio: Kena loves coconut shaved ice and watching sunsets by the pool, especially with her friends! They play volleyball and have splash contests to see who has the biggest jump. Grab your swimsuit and join the fun!
appearance: Kena is a bright blue bird with stubby wings and an extravagant feathered tail. She has a jade green belly and rainbow feathers on the end of her tail. Three cobalt feathers sit atop her head. She has a small, yellow beak and round black eyes with thick lashes.

name: Kenan
bio: Kenan has a green thumb! He grows houseplants as low as maintenance as he is and puts them in every windowsill. Kenan loves that the shade they create helps him get his daytime beauty rest, making them the perfect roomies! Want to meet Kenan's plants?
appearance: Kenan is a safety orange owl with black prominent ear tufts and white markings on his face and belly. Small, black feathers decorate his chest. He is winking his right eye his right eye and has a yellow, triangular beak

name: Kendla
bio: Kendla loves everything about being cozy. Whether it’s sitting in front of the fireplace with a good book, or knitting a sweater for her friendBernice, you can always unwind with her. Her favorite season is fall, what season do you love most?
appearance: Kendla is pumpkin spice latte. On top of her head is swirled whipped cream with orange sprinkles. There is a golden straw with sparkles, and an orange candy poking out from the left side of the whipped cream. She has closed, happy eyes with short lashes, and a smiling, black mouth.

name: Kendra
bio: Meet Kendra; she loves to play sports, make new friends and go on crazy adventures. One day, she wants to travel or coach her own team! One of Kendra’s favorite things about summer is going to camp; last year, she met two new ‘Mallows who go to her school.
appearance: Kendra is a pastel blue fox with a white belly. She has large, triangular ears, the insides of which are sequined. The banded markings across her eyes and sides of her face are white. She has round black eyes with curled lashes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek. Her tail is fuzzy and white.

name: Kenji
bio: Meme-king Kenji loves his memes. From Fake Halloween costumes to pineapple cat reaction GIFs, this seventh-grade superstar is always is always LOLing at something. Kenji even just created his own meme using a photo of his chubby-cheeked hamster and would love for you to share it!
appearance: Kenji is a teal blue capybara with dark blue short ears and an egg-shaped muzzle. He has a pale blue fuzzy belly, round, mischievous black eyes, black nostrils and mouth.

name: Kennedy
bio: Kennedy loves the outdoors! When she is not volunteering her time at the park, she spends her weekend in a cozy cabin in the mountains.
appearance: Kennedy has a turquoise body. She has a silver horn with blue stripes on it. There are multiple versions of her belly, one with sequins, one with shiny fabric and the other with silver glitter on white. She has a white muzzle and inner ears, and closed, happy eyes.

name: Kenneth
bio: Hold on to your hat! Kenneth has big dreams to become the next best race car driver! He might not move very fast on his own but as soon as he hits the gas - good luck keeping up!
appearance: Kenneth is a brown sloth with a cream colored belly and face. He has grey markings around his muzzle and eyes. His nose is a dark grey and he has two large black eyes.

name: Kenny
bio: Kenny is not your average dragon – he loves watching movies, going dancing, and learning about the world of finance! When he’s not on the dance floor or catching the latest movie, he’s studying for his Master’s Degree.
appearance: Kenny is a white or very pale blue dragon with a white nose and belly. The insides of his ears are also white. His horns, the inside of his wings and the spines on his back are all a dark, glittery purple-grey. He has two large black eyes.

name: Kensington
bio: Do you hear that snoring? It's Kensington taking his post-lunch nap. He can't help it that he snores, so if it gets too loud just give him a nudge. Kensington's brother once took a video of him while he was snoring and it's super funny! Wanna see?
appearance: Kensington is a purple bottle of potion. He is made of purple liquid with silver bubbles and stars. He has a dark purple label on his belly that has a white sun with black, and white rays and two black moons and stars. On top of his head he has a tan cork and a purple string with a black tag. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Kenson
bio: Kenson is a shy horse, he prefers to be home on a quiet ranch than to be in a crowd. When it's time to get ready for a race, he stays by his fearless friendChancefor motivation.
appearance: Kenson is a grey with a white stripe on his forehead. He has black eyes and a grey mane and tail. His muzzle, belly and inner ears are all white. He has the state of Kentucky embossed on the right side of his belly in bright blue with the letters KY inside.

name: Kent
bio: Kent is a theatre geek who loves to put on a show. While he's still not quite ready to play the lead, he dedicates a lot of time to the roles he plays and learning how to get into character. This year he's trying out for his first musical, can you help him prepare?
appearance: Kent is a pale green lizard with a rainbow striped belly. He has a dark green frill atop his head and a thin, curled tail the same color. He has three broad stripes on his back in red, blue and yellow. He has large, wide eyes with shiny black pupils. He has a smiling mouth and is poking out his pink tongue.

name: Kenzie
bio: Need Bio
appearance: Kenzie is a pastel pink Hug Mee pig with white details inside her ears, on her snout and on her belly. Her ears are triangular and flop forwards. She has two round, black eyes and distinct pink nostrils. In easter she has an pink decorated egg on her belly

name: Kepler
bio: Congratulations to Kepler! He made it to the very end of design competition show "3-2-1" Bow and can't wait to share his haute couture hair bow collection on the finale mainstage. His pieces are inspired "the morning dew that makes us consider who we are" and Kepler hopes they bow-wow the judges!
appearance: Kepler is a tan donkey. His front body has mint icing with a squiggle of white icing on his forehead and yellow dots. He has a tuft yellow hair on top of his with long floppy tan ears. He wears a pink bow tie and has a yellow belly with white polk-a-dots . He has round black eyes a tan muzzle with nostrils.

name: Keren
bio: Keren roams the mall every weekday after school, and all day on weekends. It's her favorite place to be! She's even made friends with 'Mallows at the food court. So next time you and Keren hit the mall, get ready for pizza, hot dogs, and ice cream!
appearance: Keren is a white and blue panda with a blue tail, a blue stripe across her body, and blue round markings over her eyes. She has a silver band on her forehead to hold up fuzzy, rainbow-colored hair tied in three buns. She has black eyes rimmed in white, a blue nose, and curved mouth.

name: Kerian
bio: Meet Kerian. This 'Mallow is always looking for something to sing about. He may not have the best voice, but he sings with confidence, and everyone loves to join in! But if he sings a little too long, you can hand him a snack and let his taste buds hum.
appearance: Kerian is a bag of popcorn. The bag is white with thin red and blue stripes, while the popcorn part is tan and fuzzy. He has black eyes and a simple smile.

name: Kerry
bio: Meet Kerry! Kerry is a team player, and is always a good sport - even when their siblings beat them in their daily swim races. Because Kerry is so patient and kind, they make the perfect coach for their family's swim team! Want to be Kerry's assistant coach?
appearance: Kerry is a SeaCow, the combination of a cow and a manatee. They have the hot pink body of a cow with a light pink manatee snout, flippers for arms, and a split tail fin. Their snout is spotted with a darker pink and they have small pink nostrils. They have a patch of darker pink spread over and around their right ear. They have round, black eyes with small eyelashes. They have darker pink splats on their belly.

name: Kerstin
bio: Kerstin looks forward to summer festivals and summer fashion every year! She carefully books weekend passes to all outdoor summer shows, inviting one or two 'Mallow pals along. Kerstin tailors her outfits to be as comfortable as possible in the summer heat. Want to hang with Kerstin?
appearance: Kerstin is an ice cream scoop, her scoop is tie-dyed with pink, purple, blue, and yellow. Chocolate syrup is topped on her head with white sprinkles and a blue bowl is under her. She has round black eyes with lashes, pink blush, and a red mouth.

name: Kervena
bio: Meet Kervena. He loves spending Saturday afternoons shopping for trendy thrifted threads. He has an eye for all things retro-lava lamps, classic cars, tie-dye, fringed jackets-you name it! He always finds something cool and unique on his excursions. Would you like to join?
appearance: Kervena is a mushroom with a tan stalk and a rainbow tie-dye top with white spots. His stalk makes up his body and includes a round, rainbow tie-dye belly. He has round, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Kesla
bio: Springtime means one thing for Kesla - it's time to get outside! She hates being cooped up in the cold, so when springtime arrives, she loves to get outside and smell the fresh air. What is your favorite part of spring?
appearance: Kesla is a white cat with teal and floral print patches. The patch on the left side of her head and on her right ear are teal, whereas her left ear and the patch on her lower right body feature a predominantly blue floral print with cobalt blue, yellow, red and lilac flowers. She has closed eyes, a pink nose and mouth, and black whiskers.

name: Kevin
bio: Meet Kevin, this kooky koala loves eating breakfast for dinner. In fact, Kevin could eat breakfast for every meal! Can you guess his favorite breakfast combo? It's cereal and waffles, but he only likes to eat the cereal on top his waffles
appearance: Kevin is a teal koala with enormous, teal round ears. His belly and the insides of his ears are white. He has a large black nose, as well as round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Keyes
bio: Have you ever met a rugby playing witch? Keyes and her team are busy concocting potions, ahem... training, for the Winter Solstice Coven Cup. Alright, she might be brewing up a special handoff hex that makes the ball slippery for her opponents. But hey, all is fair in scrum and war right?
appearance: Keyes is a purple witch with green hair tied in pigtails. On her head, she wears a witch hat with a purple band with cobweb details. She wears a black shirt with a round purple patch with a spider embroidered on it. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Keysha
bio: Keysha is no ordinary Squishmallow - she can read minds! Keysha is a fortune teller and she predicts the future for the Squishmallows Squad. Step into her magical tent and find out your Squish fortune today!
appearance: Keysha is a turquoise kangaroo with tall, upright ears. She has a round snout which is turquoise on top and has a nose the same color. The bottom part of her snout, as well as her belly, are both white. She has a shimmery silver horn and wings, and her inner ears match. Her magical horn features a turquoise spiral. She has round, black eyes with short curled lashes.

name: Khaled
bio: You know you're in awe of Khaled's sparkle, smooth appearance! Khaled is one laid back 'Mallow and would spend all day basking in the sun if he could. Say hello, he might just invite you to play frisbee in the park or go for a dip in the pool.
appearance: Khaled is a green snake with a white lower jaw and belly. His belly has green and pink stripes, and his underside is purple. He has a large hood which is covered in shiny, dark green scales. He has round black eyes and his nostrils and mouth are brown. A thin, pink, forked tongue pokes out from his mouth.

name: Khalil
bio: Broken banjo? Go to Khalil's music repair shop and he'll  have you strumming again in no time! Khalil grew up watching his father and uncle repair insturments at the shop, and now it's his turn to keep the music alive. Khalil might be surrounded by insturments, but he only enjoys playing the harmonica!
appearance: Khalil is a koi fish. He is charcoal black with a tall fin in the center of his head and two long, narrow fins on either side. He has a yellow belly with gills, plain black eyes and a pink dimpled smile.

name: Kiefer
bio: Kiefer is a sea bunny, a type of marine slug. They are blue. Their tall, fluffy, off black ears are actually rhinopores, a sensory organ that detects chemicals. They have a fluffy black belly and tail with a simple, smiling face.
appearance: Kiefer is a sea bunny, a type of marine slug. They are blue. Their tall, fluffy, off black ears are actually rhinopores, a sensory organ that detects chemicals. They have a fluffy black belly and tail with a simple, smiling face.

name: Kieli
bio: Kieli is a talented make-up artist. He uses his face as a canvas to express himself! He loves trying new products and creating new looks, then uploading them to his blog. He draws inspiration from nature and loves warm, earthy colors. He'd love to try his next look on you!
appearance: Kieli is a brown antelope with two curved, glittery, golden horns atop his head and his curled ears sit below. He has pure white markings on his lower muzzle and around his eyes, with a dark brown line running through the center of his eye markings. His inner ears are glittery gold and he has a fuzzy, off-white belly. He has round, black eyes with curly lashes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Kiki
bio: Kiki is a medical student who has a passion for helping others. She is also an expert at needle work. When she's not studying for exams, you can find her sewing costumes for her friends! What would you have her make for you?
appearance: Kiki is a purple kangaroo with tall, upright ears. She has a round snout which is white on the bottom half and purple on the top half. Her ears and belly are also white. She has round, black eyes and a pale pink nose.

name: Kiko
bio: There goes Kiko gathering apples! She looks forward to apple picking each year and will crawl up the trees to reach the sweetest, ripest apples. Kiko loves peace and quiet of the orchard, and even the tractor ride back to the farm is fun. Now Kiko can't wait to bake an apple pie just for you!
appearance: Kiko is a lavender purple spider with eight black creepy crawly legs. She has a fuzzy black belly and a red smile. Her eyes are round and black with dual lashes. She wears a bright orange corduroy beanie with a green pom-pom that resembles a pumpkin.

name: Kiks
bio: Meet Kiks! Kiks has an unusual, but really fun job - he's a professional gift wrapper! For perfectly curled ribbons, calligraphy name tags and more wrapping paper options than you've ever seen, call Kiks! He'll add his extra loving touch to every present.
appearance: Kiks is a white cake with baby blue frosting on top and in a line through his center. His head and the lower half of his body are decorated with rainbow sprinkles. He has a metallic blue candle with a yellow flame in the center of his head. 'HAPPY BIRTHDAY' is written in bold, rainbow lettering across his front.

name: Kimberly
bio: Kim is the editor of her school paper; she loves the hustle and bustle of the newsroom and even has a framed picture of her very first edition framed. Kim wants to be an editor at the Squishmallow Times when she grows up!
appearance: Kimberly is a llama with a yellow-green body, almost fluorescent in color. Both the insides of her ears and the facial markings around her eyes and muzzle are white. She has round, black eyes with short and straight lashes. Her nose and mouth are dark cream, and she has a pale pink blush on each cheek.

name: Kimia
bio: Baking cakes and planning parties are two of Kimia's favorite activities.  She and her best friendTres'zureplan parties for their friends. Tres'zure works on the decorations while Kimia does the menu, they make quite a team!
appearance: Kimia is covered in a striped pattern consisting of hot pink, purple, indigo and blue. She has a white horn with a pink and purple spiral. Her multi-colored mane includes sky blue, purple and hot pink. She has closed eyes with long, curled lashes. Her muzzle, inner ears and belly are white.

name: Kimmie
bio: Meet Kimmie. This cupcake loves all things cheerful and creative, she loves thinking outside of the box! Kimmie is as bright and colorful as her rosy cheeks snd sprinkles she's always up for a sweet time with a side of giggles. You're in for a lot of fun with Kimmie around.
appearance: Kimmie is a cupcake with swirled icing in layers of a purple and pink pattern. Rainbow sprinkles with chocolate and ruby chocolate hearts decorate the two upper layers. She has closed, black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth with blush. Her lower half is is tan with SWEET printed on the lower half with pink, magenta and teal hearts.

name: Kinara
bio: Have you met Kinara? She's the head decorator at Santa's workshop and keeps the North Pole Dazzling all year long. Kinara makes sure everything that leaves Santa's sleigh gets an extra dash of love.
appearance: Kinara is a Christmas ornament with a tie-dyed pattern, predominantlygreen, red and white. She has silver wave lines on the top and bottom of her body. and a metallic red cap atop of her head. Her eyes are closed with eyelashes and has a smiling mouth.

name: King
bio: Grab some quarters and get ready for an intense day. King is trying to beat his high score in pinball! Ever since his first game, King has been obsessed with getting the highest score, ever! Do you ever get the end-of-ball bonus?
appearance: King is pale blue Stingray with a white belly. He has darker spots on his back, round black eyes, and a simple black smile. He has two triangular fins and tail with the same pattern his back has. He also has three gills on both sides of his front.

name: Kinsley
bio: Looking for some extra help? Kinsley is the Squishmallow for you! Kinsley is a psychologist and volunteers to teach the importance of mental health. Kinsley has a passion for helping people and knows how hard it can be to live without help.
appearance: Kinsley is a llama pegacorn, a combination of llama, pegasus and unicorn. As such, she has features of all three: a silver unicorn horn, silver pegasus wings and a white llama face with closed, long-lashed eyes and a triangular nose. Her body has a pattern of pastel rainbow stripes slanting diagonally.

name: Kip
bio: Kip is a fun-lovin' llama who lives for rock n' roll. You might call Kip an old soul because she prefers tunes from a different time. You can always find her listening to her parents' records and watching legendary performances from the past.
appearance: Kip is a pastel pink llama with a hot pink mane on her head. She has a white face with a protruding muzzle, tipped with a narrow pink nose and black mouth. Her inner ears are also white. Her heart-shaped belly is hot pink. Her eyes are obscured by a black pair of sunglasses with a pink heart on each lens.

name: Kippie
bio: Meet Kippie! They love anything and everything collectible, but the pride of their collection is their trading cards! Kippie has over 500 different cards, and each one is special to them. Can you guess which one is rare?
appearance: Kippie is a blue and green tie-dyed dog with large, pointed ears. The top and sides of their head are cobalt blue, with a furry pattern on the sides of their face, and the back of their ears and their muzzle are navy blue. They have a fluffy, mint-green belly and inner ears the same color. They have round, black eyes rimmed in white and a black nose and mouth. They have a silly cute CONTENT expression.

name: Kira
bio: Kira plays in Sylvia Don't Do It, and indie folk supergroup. Her haunting contralto brings clarity to abstract lyrics like 'You're my marshland, and I wish it was my birthday' while her expert mandolin playing brightens the bluest of ballads. Look out for "Just Kira"  her solo EP out soon!
appearance: Kira is a hedgehog with a maroon body. Her snout is pink, and she has a black nose. Her face, belly and inner ears are white, and she has black eyes. The spines which decorate her back, resembling sprinkles, are pink.

name: Kirk
bio: You won’t meet anyone as lovable as Kirk! His passion for learning and mentorship makes him the perfect fit for becoming a teacher. What will your first lesson with Kirk be?
appearance: Kirk is a dark grey koala with enormous, round ears. His belly and the insides of his ears are creamy white. He has a large black nose, as well as round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Kirsten
bio: If you need a penpal, Kirsten is the panda for you! She loves writing letters to her friends near and far. Her dad built her a cool writing desk, it has compartments for stationery, envelopes, and even a fancy stamp!
appearance: Kirsten is a white bear with a psychedelic rainbow tie-dye pattern on her ears, around her eyes and on the lower half of her body, aside from a plain white belly. Her nose, mouth and eyes are all black. Her large eyes are closed and have curled lashes. She wears a pale pink bow on her left ear.

name: Kirsty
bio: Meet Kristy. This bright and beautiful butterfly believes everyone she meets has the potential to be a great new friend! Every week, Kristy goes to different classes for dance, art, and music so that she can meet new people! Will you be Kristy's friend, too?
appearance: Kristy is a lime-green gradient butterfly, has a black antenna, and also she has lime lined belly. She has green butterfly wings with black markings and white spots on each wings. She has round, black eyes and red, smiling mouth and light pink blushing on her face.

name: Kitty
bio: Kitty is a pink unicorn with black accents. She has a black belly, and her sparkly unicorn horn and inner ears are black. Her mane that goes from the top of her head to her back and her fluffy tail are black. She has mischievous eyes and her muzzle is black and her nostrils are pink.
appearance: Kitty is a pink unicorn with black accents. She has a black belly, and her sparkly unicorn horn and inner ears are black. Her mane that goes from the top of her head to her back and her fluffy tail are black. She has mischievous eyes and her muzzle is black and her nostrils are pink.

name: Klaus
bio: Ready for a game of mini-golf? Keep your eyes out for Klaus, he's the dragon to beat! Klaus pretends he's not that good, but once he's got his lucky putter, it's almost always a hole in one.
appearance: Klaus is a gray stackable dragon. He has dark gray textured horns and spikes, and shimmery silver ears and wings. Like other stackable dragons, Klaus does not have a tail.

name: Kline
bio: Kline works in the big city as a financial advisor. He's a busy frog with lots of clients but always makes sure to give every 'Mallow personalized attention. Kline knows even just a cup of tea and a good chat can boost any business owner's confidence. Schedule some time with Kline when you're downtime!
appearance: Kline is a pastel pink frog with a belly imprinted with a Sakura flower and petal floral pattern. he has black eyes rimmed in white that sit atop his head, black nostrils, and black smile. He has pink-gold blush on their cheeks.

name: Klint
bio: Penguins can't fly, but they can fish! Klint is a first-class fly fisher with a smile on his face and a song in his heart. Unlike most penguins, Klint knows the real trick to reel in anchovies isn't the best bait—it's the best attitude!
appearance: Klint is a greenish-grey penguin with a white underbelly and face. He wears a patterned light grey and white trapper hat. He has a yellow beak, and closed eyes in a happy expression.

name: Koako
bio: Koako moves around more than your average 'Mallow. She lives in a new town or city for a few years, then skips to another! Koako embraces new experiences and new friends, and is top -notch pen pal to all her old  neighbors. She's on the move again this year. Where do you think Koako will go next?
appearance: Koako ice cream in the middle is vanilla and her two ice cream sandwich is tan with chocolate chips. Her face consists of black closed eyes and a red smile. If you have purchased Koako from the mystery squad, she has two open eyes, same chocolate chips, same smile and a pink bow.

name: Kobester
bio: Kobester would love to share his toys with you! After his brotherWinsteychomped his favorite red choo choo train, Kobester was pretty broken up about it—until he realized that life isn't about the toys you have, but the 'Mallows you play them with! Plus, it helps that his new train is pink and lights up!
appearance: Kobester is a cobalt blue betta fish. He has wavy pectoral fins and a dorsal fin on top of his head with shiny holographic ocean blue spots on his fins and belly. He has black eyes with and a black smile with dimples.

name: Kofi
bio: Meet Kofi. His favorite part of Hanukkah is the food and trying to show off with his siblings. Their family tradition is a fashion show all 8 nights with prizes after the candles are lit. After walking the catwalk he can't wait to dig in!
appearance: Kofi is a chocolate brown bear with round ears. His inner ears and muzzle are tan, and his eyes, nose and mouth are black. He wears a dark blue kippah with a silver Star of David design. He also has a blue shirt and navy pants. His shirt is decorated with a row of nine candles in various shades of blue which represent the nine candles of a Hanukkah menorah.

name: Kona
bio: Meet Kona. Kona has always liked playing dress-up with his sisters and letting them style him how ever they want! Now, he says he is the most fashionable 'Mallow in the family. What outfit do you think Kona should wear next?
appearance: Kona is a Sea Cow, the combination of a cow and a manatee. He has the body of a cow with a manatee snout, flippers for arms, and a split tail fin. His snout is spotted with pink and he has small, pink nostrils. He has a white body with patches of brown spread around his body. He has rounded black eyes

name: Krisa
bio: Krisa lives in a small beach community where everyone knows everyone! She works at a plant-based restaurant pressing juices and rolling seaweed wraps. Drop in to meet Krisa--she'll press you a fresh ginger shot and introduce you to the locals.
appearance: Krisa is a purple,teal,pink tie-dye jellyfish with a white patch on her bell. The end of her bell has a wavy design. Her tentacles are made from pink, purple, and blue ribbon. Her oral arms are made from a white shimmery fabric. She has black rounded eyes and a smile.

name: Kristina
bio: Meet Kristina. She loves to explore and makes the purr-fect travel partner! She's on a mission to visit all the wonders of the world. When she's not traveling around the globe you can find her taking cat naps and hanging out with friends. Where should she go next?
appearance: Kristina is a pink cat with pointed, triangular ears. She has a white belly and sparkly, hot pink inner ears. Her round nose and the whiskers that frame it are all hot pink. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes.

name: Kurt
bio: Kurt’s birthday falls on Halloween, so his besties throw an “Annual Kurt Costume Contest” to celebrate! They each dress-up as different versions of their friend, and although “Tap Class Kurt” and “Tropical Vacation Kurt” brought back good memories, this year “Kurt at Last Year’s Party” took the cake!
appearance: Kurt  is a cupcake with swirled icing in layers of purple on the bottom, green in the middle and black on top. He has white ghost on the middle layer of the icing. He has a black and grey striped wrapper. He has round, black eyes and a red smile.

name: Kurtz
bio: Kurtz knew from the first moment he went to the school dance he needed to have one thing—his very own disco ball! Who can resist the glittery glow? Now this 'Mallow is on a mission to buy one of his own. Kurtz can't wait to host his first disco party! Will you RSVP?
appearance: Kurtz is a navy blue piranha. He has a tall fin in the center of his head and two round fins on each side of his body. He has a golden belly with shiny gills. He has round, black eyes and a red open mouth with pointy teeth.

name: Kwame
bio: Kwame teaches high school history. This is his dream job since it combines talking about 'Mallow history and hanging out with younger  generations. Kwame hosts his classes as interactive discussions and awards a prize to one star student every Friday! Think you can win this week?
appearance: Kwame is a light purple walrus with flippers on each side of his body. His muzzle and belly are both light grey, and he has two white tusks protruding from his mouth. He has closed eyes, straight whiskers, a grey nose, and a small grey tuft of hair on the top of his head.

name: Kya
bio: Strawberry cupcakes and blueberry smoothies are two of Kya's favorite things. This koala has quite a sweet tooth and loves all desserts especially with berries: berry cakes, cookies, and even adds frozen berries to her hot cocoa! Fun fact about Kya: she's an expert tree climber even in the snow.
appearance: Kya is a baby blue koala with enormous fluffy ears. Her ears are rainbow colored in pastel shades. She has black oval-shaped eyes with long lashes and shines, a large koala nose and a smiling mouth. Her belly is covered in reversible sequins with white on one side and iridescent pink on the other.

name: Kyla
bio: Kyla has a memory like no other, and loves to recount stories whenever she meets new friends. She's also got an eye for photography and is great at taking portraits.
appearance: Kyla is a bright pink elephant. She has large, floppy ears with pale pink on the inside, and an embroidered trunk. She has round, black eyes too.

name: Kyler
bio: Kyler is your typical 'Mallow. He loves dancing to silly songs, looking at neon colors, and being outdoors. Kyler works as a landscaper! You should see the tiki hut and hibiscus garden he's building now for his little sis. She's gonna be so surprised! Want to kick back with Kyler?
appearance: Kyler has a lime green color on his body with mint gills on either side of his head with light teal frills and a dark green leaf and brown stem on top of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a white belly which resembles a lime slice with green pulp/flesh. He has round black eyes with and a cat-like smile.

name: Kylie
bio: This girl is on fire! This stylish fashionista can create your Valentine's Day look from head to toe! Kylie's eye for color, pattern, and class has allowed her to become the fashion guru of the entire Squishmallow squad.
appearance: Kylie is golden brown with black splotches all over her body. She has tan ears, and a white tummy that says Cutie embroidered on the right side and a red heart. She has round black eyes with eyelashes and a black round nose with a cat-like smile.

name: Kyra
bio: Kyra knows all about crystals, gems, and minerals! She owns a small shop where she sells these little treasures, as well as books about them. Kyra's passion is helping other 'Mallows find their perfect crystal combo! Come by the shop to chat with Kyra about gems.
appearance: Kyra is a black cat with iridescent inner ears and belly. She has a long, black cat tail with pointed cat ears. Her eyes are black with a white ring around them alongside eyelashes. She has a pink nose and curved mouth with four white whiskers.

name: LJ
bio: Grab some bubbles and get ready for some fun, LJ  is here to play! LJ has a purple bubble wand and loves to wave her bubble wand around everywhere she goes. Just watch out for when they pop!
appearance: LJ is a purple and blue tie-dye stackable bunny with long, floppy ears. one of her eyes are closed and she has two black whiskers on either side of her candy pink nose.

name: Lacey
bio: Lacey loves lollipops, rainboots, and rainy days. She has a new pair of bright blue rain boots that she loves jumping into puddles with. Lacey picks out a new pair every spring and even gives them a name! What should she name her new blue pair?
appearance: Lacey is a lamb with a white body and peach face with glittery peach inner ears. She has a pink and blue flower embroidered by her belly, her eyes are closed, she has a pink, heart-shaped nose and a curved mouth.

name: Ladee
bio: Ladee teaches the first grade. She's a big fan of nap time and reminds her students that every 'Mallow needs a quiet midday break, no matter their age. On Fridays, Ladee walks some of her students to the community pool for a free swim! She thinks there's no better way to end the week.
appearance: Ladee is a black bug with a pink gradient, going from pale to hot pink, on her belly. She has two curled, red antennae atop her head. Her wings stick out to either side of her and are pink with a red heart pattern. She has round black eyes rimmed in white with short lashes, as well as a red, smiling mouth and pink blush.

name: Lady Kraken
bio: Lady Kraken has a street named after her! It's called "Lady Kraken Lane" and stands in honor of her philanthropic contributions to the community. She's hosting a charity gala for unopened Easter eggs next month and would love to see your smiling face and open checkbook in attendance!
appearance: Lady Kraken is a coral bearded dragon, a type of lizard. She has a peach belly and three brown markings on her back and above her tail. She has fringes that protrude from either side of her head. She wears a tie-dye plaid head band on her forehead. She has round, black eyes, and a cat-like smile.

name: Lael
bio: This Squishmallow doesn’t have a bio.
appearance: Lael is a teal Llama with white inner ears, muzzle, and eye markings. They pop out of a red Twizzlers wrapper with a white top. They have black eyes with lashes, an off-white nose and curved smile, and pink blush.

name: Lafi
bio: Meet Lafi. Lafi is a fearless rock climber and yogi. Ever since they were little, Lafi's loved scaling and giant sequoia trees, boulders, and cliffs. Lafi loves to meditate and practice their breathwork when they reach the top.
appearance: Lafi is a llama with a yellow body, almost fluorescent in color. Both the insides of their ears and the facial markings around their eyes and muzzle are white. They have round, black eyes with a pink nose and mouth are, and they have a maroon blush on each cheek. Their belly says LLAMASTAY in teal and ALL DAY in pale purple

name: Lai
bio: Meet Lai. She's caring and passionate, and will always make sure that you're okay. She's always thinking of others, so when you get a chance, ask her about her day and give her a biiiiiig hug! Hop on board her fins and let her take you on a sweet ride!
appearance: Lai has a green body, a standard Squishmallow face, and gills on either side of her belly. Her inner fins and belly are colored red and have black watermelon seeds printed on.

name: Lake
bio: Lake writes short magazines and sends them to all of his closest ‘Mallow friends — he’s on issue #109! His dream is to write young adult novels from a little cottage in the woods, and be published under the pen name L.B. Gold. Would you read his stories?
appearance: Lake is a black bull with a patch of longer black fur like a fringe. He has a fluffy, black belly and a grey muzzle and inner ears, which aren't fluffy. He has thin, light grey, curved horns which sit wide from his head with thin gold lines that mark the sections. He has round, black eyes, grey nostrils and a golden nose ring. He also has a long, black tail with a fluffy end.

name: Lakely
bio: Green juice, peanut butter cookies and thunderstorms are some of Lakely’s favorite things. Lakely loves the rain so much that he has a collection of rain boots and matching umbrellas! He loves splashing in the puddles and hearing the crackle of thunder
appearance: Lakely is a grey dinosaur with a marbled pattern. His belly and the large, rounded spines along his back are turquoise. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Lala
bio: Lala is the sweetest lamb you'll ever meet. She makes cards for all her friends and even has a special stamp to seal the envelopes. Lala's favorite thing to do is add just a tiny bit of glitter to the front where she writes her friends names. She hopes the extra sparkle will make them feel special.
appearance: Lala is a pastel pink sheep. Her face and inner ears are white. She has fluffy legs with silver hooves, between which she is holding a sparkly, hot pink heart. She has round black eyes with short lashes. Her mouth, nose and the blush on her cheeks are pale pink.

name: Lalinda
bio: Meet Lalinda. Have you heard of Lalinda? This ‘Mallow is taking the music industry by storm with her deep vocals and fun guitar riffs. You’ll catch her strutting down every red carpet this year and headlining all the major music events. Reach out to Lalinda on social media! She loves to hear from her fans.
appearance: Lalinda is a giraffe with a white body covered in gold, pink, green, and purple spots. She has a purple mane running down her back and a fluffy, purple tail. The inside of her ears, her muzzle, and belly are all pink, and her horns are green. She has small pink nostrils and round, black eyes.

name: Lamar
bio: Lamar stars in a food show where he travels Seven Seas searching for the best vegetarian foods! This means he has to eat several meals each day just to get the footage needed for each episode. Not a problem for Lamar! He has limitless appetite for veg-tastic treats.
appearance: Lamar is a teal whale shark with sliver stripes around him he has three fins, two on each side and one atop his head. He has a round, white belly. He has round black eyes with lashes and a sharp toothy, open-mouthed grin.

name: Lamont
bio: Meet Lamont. This well-traveled ‘Mallow has a unique perspective on the world and a wonderful sense of humor. He brightens up any conversation with laughter and stories from his travels. Lamont seems to have been everywhere and knows just about everyone! Lamont would love to meet you next!
appearance: Lamont is a white dog with a black patch on the upper right side of his body and a white belly. He has black, triangular ears with striped, bright rainbow insides. He wears aviators with striped rainbow lenses and silver frames and a shiny, silver bow tie. He has a pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls and a rounded black nose.

name: Lana
bio: Have you met Lana? This little lamb loves horseback riding and horchata and will always have your back. Lana's favorite place to visit is the stables with her pony named Bernard!
appearance: Lana is a rainbow tie-dye lamb with a white colored face. Her nose is pink and shaped like a heart. She has round, black eyes, curled lashes and a sweet, smiling mouth.

name: Lanai
bio: Welcome to Lanai's garden! This 'Mallow could spend all day trimming and repotting flower beds, or just sitting on their favorite wicker chair watching everything grow. Lanai is especially proud of their cacti — some are growing taller than the fence!
appearance: Lanai is a tie dye blue and green frog with a cream belly. Their eyes sit on top of their head, and have black pupils with white rings around them. They have prominent nostrils above their black, smiling mouth and pink blush on their cheeks.

name: Lancaster
bio: Lancaster loves the camera, and the camera loves him! This tainted triceratops is an expert at delivering the news and looking good while doing it. While he sometimes gets distracted by the sound of his own voice, Lancaster is a professional through and through. Back to you,Greer!
appearance: Lancaster is a is a canary yellow Triceratops. He has a dark yellow pointed frill that adorns his head, two white horns on his head, and a wide, white horn on his snout. He has black eyes, and a black smile.

name: Lance
bio: Meet Lance. He loves BLTs, cookies and cream milkshakes, and jumping through the sprinkler in the summer. This loveable lemur is the high jump champion and wants to break the record for highest jump ever! Do you think he can do it?
appearance: Lance is a teal lemur whose belly and mask markings are white. The markings around his eyes and muzzle are the same color as his body. He has black eyes ringed in white, as well as a black nose and mouth.

name: Lancelot
bio: Lancelot is growing out his whiskers! He thinks it’s giving “retro debonair realness” and even bought a fancy blue bowtie to complete the look. Now all Lancelot needs is a classic cool guy catchphrase—what do you think about what’s the word, ya bunch of birds?
appearance: Lancelot is a brown chocolate bunny. He has light blue inner ears and a bowtie with a darker brown belly with rainbow sprinkles. He has black eyes which are winking, a light pink nose and mouth and dark brown whiskers.

name: Lander
bio: Who loves animals and working on a farm? Lander/TyRee does! She wakes up early and talks to them throughout the day, and sometimes, they even help her with silly pranks. Do you want to visit Lander's/TyRee's farm?
appearance: Lander/TyRee is a white panda with markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band around her body. The markings are tie-dyed with galaxy print shades, namely purple, blue, pink and white. She has black eyes ringed in white, and a pink nose and mouth. She has metallic silver wings and a matching tie-dyed unicorn horn in the centre of her head.

name: Landi
bio: You can find Landi headed to their favorite amusement park dressed in his favorite superhero onesie. It's perfect for standing out in the ride photos. He loves to make a silly face! One day he hopes to meet a superhero in real life, do you think he will?
appearance: Landi is a white lemur with a fuzzy white belly. His inner ears are shiny silver and his mask is white with silver sparkles. The markings around his eyes and muzzle are grey. He has black eyes ringed in white, as well as a black nose and mouth.

name: Landis
appearance: Landis is a cyan dragon. Their nose, belly, wings, the spines on their back are and horns are all glittery silver. They have a light green JOLLY rancher wrapper on the bottom of their body. They have two large black eyes and teal nostrils.

name: Lando
bio: Lando can't figure out why his new fitness plan isn't working. He's been bulking up on calories hoping to gain muscle, but the results just aren't there. At this point, he's starting to wonder if his nightly sit up is even worth it!
appearance: Lando is a fusion between a turtle and a parrot. He has a white belly and a pale blue tuft of hair. He has small, fluffy rainbow ombre wings that are rainbow striped. He has a rainbow turtle shell on his back. He has a broad yellow beak and large black eyes.

name: Landon
bio: If you're ever in need of a helping hand, Landon has a tentacle or two to spare. He works as a project manager and is quite possibly the most organised squid around. How does he unwind after a busy week? Karaoke!
appearance: Landon is a squid with a triangular head and a tie-dye pattern of turquoise on white. He has 10 legs which protrude from beneath him and curve upwards. Each leg is a different shade of aqua, ranging from dark turquoise to light green. He has a white belly and a plain, smiling face.

name: Landry
bio: Stand back and watch Landry work! Landry can fix anything as long as she has her trusty tool belt. Pretty soon Landry will be a licensed contractor fixing homes for all 'Mallows! Do you have a repair Landry can help with?
appearance: Landry is a yellow tie-dye macaron with a white cream in the middle with the fuzzy macaron. She has a white dollop with a green leaf on top. Landry has a rounded black eye with a winking face and a red smile.

name: Lane
bio: Solving math problems and writing equations is no hassle for Lane - she loves doing it! Lane is a star mathlete on her school's team, helping them win three different completions. Lane's next goal? Become a collage professor!
appearance: Lane is a light pink squirrel. She has three hot pink stripes on her head, and her nose and mouth are the black. Her face and belly are white and she has closed, black eyes. She has a words on her belly in pink says "love" with a red small heart

name: Lang
bio: Anytime there is a big weather event or the mayor is making an important speech, look at the top of your screen. Its Lang signing for the whole new address in ASL! Lang works for the mayor's office as a sign language translator , and makes lots of appearances at local televised events
appearance: Lang is a coin grey dinosaur with stone grey spines running down their back. They have a fluffy pebble grey tummy with soft ridges in it, as well as round black eyes and a simple smile.

name: Lani
bio: Lani is a superarbol rep'd by Tinsel Talent! She can’t wait to put this holiday season to rest—if she has to be lit by a city council one more time…—and already has big plans for December 26th. Namely: chow mein and a bubble bath!
appearance: Lani is a gradient Christmas tree with a golden star atop her head with three layers of  shades of green mint green on the top, green in the middle and dark green below. Three row of Christmas lights are wrapped around her with small, circular lights in red, blue, yellow and gold and has three ornaments one yellow, one red and one blue. She has black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Lanny
bio: Lanny just got lost in a corn maze that he had to eat his way out! Although he ended up with a gnarly stomach ache, he was glad to make it out before sunrise. Here's hoping tomorrow's haunted house has a well-lit exit sign!
appearance: Lanny is an orange cauldron. A bubbly purple potion brews inside him, with a black bat wing and the handle of a metal ladle sticking out. He has a jack-o-lantern face with to crescent eyes, triangular nose with an open black mouth with three square teeth.

name: Largo
bio: Largo owns her very own seashell shop! She's a pro at eco-friendly shelling so she started a business for all 'Mallows to collect seashells without going to the beach. Protecting local beaches is a big priority for Largo, and she even started a monthly beach cleanup. Stop by Largo's store to volunteer!
appearance: Largo is a key lime pie with keylime filling and a tan pie crust and base. She has a dollop of cream with dark green speckles on top with a key lime on the right side. She has closed black eyes with short dual lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Lars
bio: Lars just set pistachio shelling world record! Though he might not have the fastest flippers, Lars makes sure to remind each and every nut that it's okay to come out of their shell. This super shy turtle tells himself the same thing every morning, and knows just how encouraging it can be!
appearance: Lars is a neon green turtle with a tuft of yellow hair atop his head. He has a yellow belly and two flippers (one on each side). He has a simple face with round black eyes and a smile. On his back is a multi-colored, tie-dyed shell.

name: Larson
bio: Larson is a black dragon with black wings, light blue ears and long blue striped horns. He has gingham blue inner wings, and fuzz from the top of his head to his tail. He has light blue muzzle and a plaid belly with blue nostrils with white fangs. His eyes are round and black.
appearance: Larson is a black dragon with black wings, light blue ears and long blue striped horns. He has gingham blue inner wings, and fuzz from the top of his head to his tail. He has light blue muzzle and a plaid belly with blue nostrils with white fangs. His eyes are round and black.

name: Lasla
bio: Congrats to Lasla who just joined her city's symphonic orchestra! This xylophone player spent all summer auditioning and is so excited to be part of a musical family. Lasla uses four of her tentacles when playing the xylophone and holds different types of mallets to create all sorts of beautiful sounds!
appearance: Lasla  is a magenta octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including magenta, purple, green, and yellow). She has a winking expression and a smiling mouth.

name: Laslow
bio: Laslow loves to sing underwater karaoke. He doesn't worry about singing in tune or even singing all the right lyrics. The point is to have fun! He grooves and swims to his own beat. Come join him, he loves singing duets!
appearance: Laslow is a marbled beluga whale (with the combination of purple, white and pale blue) with a bulging forehead. He has a fin on each side of his body and one atop his head, as well as a fluke (tail fins). He has a white belly, round, black eyes and a curved smile.

name: Lass
bio: Will you be attending tonight's town hall meeting? Lass don't miss a single one- she's the City Council 'Mallow! If you need a traffic light installed or want to expand the park's bike path, go ask Lass. She's always open to new ideas on how to improve her much-beloved city.
appearance: Lass is a black antelope with two curved, glittery, golden horns atop her head and her curled ears sit below. She has pure white markings on her lower muzzle and around her eyes, with a silver line running through the center of her eye markings. Her inner ears are sky blue and she has a fuzzy, sky blue belly. She has round, black eyes with curly lashes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Latchmi
bio: Latchmi is an arts-and-crafts queen! Her creations range from crocheted book covers to still lifes of coconuts and she even just designed a miniature convertible for her Holland Lop bunny, Theo. He might not have a license, but it's still adorable it doesn't matter!
appearance: Latchmi is a latte in a green takeaway cup. She has a lavender lid with a green  striped straw poking out, and a green body with a lavender band around her middle. A lavender flower-like logo design decorates her middle. She is winking with short lashes, and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Laura
bio: Laura is a creative cat who loves to build and invent things. Her ultimate hobby is gaming and she is always first in queue when a new game hits the market. Laura uses music to inspire her and loves to rock out to her heavy metal collection.
appearance: Laura is a tabby cat with musk pink fur. She has hot pink stripes on her head and sides. She has a white belly and inner ears to match, as well as a white muzzle. Her nose and mouth are hot pink, framed by black whiskers, and she has round, black eyes with curled eyelashes.

name: Laurel
bio: Laurel just learned the true meaning of Christmas! It's all about—wait, you're not gonna tell anyone, right? It's just that she's really proud to know it, and it's not like she's trying to gatekeep or anything, but if it's gonna be common knowledge, well... at least credit her on social media if you post about it!
appearance: Laurel is a tie-dye pink, yellow and blue Christmas tree decorated with yellow, pink and blue Christmas lights across her body, a gold star on top of her head, and snow on top of her head. She has black eyes and a pink smile.

name: Lauren
bio: Lauren loves to spend time with her sistersLaylaandLucia. She goes to all of Layla's games and all of Lucia's art shows. Layla's favorite part of being a big sister? Being a good role model AND having two best friends.
appearance: Lauren is a light grey lemur whose triangular ears, belly and mask markings are white. The insides of her ears, markings around her eyes and her muzzle are all dark grey. She has black eyes ringed in white, as well as a black nose and mouth.

name: Lavada
bio: This is one bunny you just have to meet! Lavada loves to live life to the fullest and color outside the lines. She loves jumping on the trampoline with friends during the day and gazing up at the stars at night. Do you know any constellations she can look for?
appearance: Lavada is a white bunny with patches of ombre color on either side of her head and on her ears. The ombre pattern starts off white, then fades through pink to blue at the base. She has round, black eyes and straight black whiskers. She has a pale pink blush under each eye and a short, triangular nose the same color.

name: Layla
bio: Have you ever seen a lemur play basketball? You'll want this leaping lemur on your team! Layla's favorite sport is basketball and she plays on the same team as her friendWendy!
appearance: Layla is a light purple lemur whose belly and mask markings are white. The insides of her ears, markings around her eyes and her muzzle are all a deeper purple. She has black eyes ringed in white, as well as a black nose and mouth. Layla has a striped tail.

name: Leah
bio: Who loves making flower crowns and flying kites? Leah! She makes crown and kite sets for her friends when they come over to play. This year she wants to make a giant kite of crowns, will you help Leah?
appearance: Leah is an off-white llama. Her inner ears, facial markings and muzzle are pure white. She has round, black eyes with straight lashes and her nose, mouth and the blush on each cheek is pale pink. The bottom half of her body is encased in a pastel Easter egg which has waves of pastel blue, purple and yellow decorating it.

name: Leama
bio: Leama loves glitz and glamour and dresses up any chance she gets. She spends all year looking forward to the time when she can don her tinsel, sparkly lights, golden star, and be the star of the show. Christmas is her time to truly shine!
appearance: Leama is a forest green Christmas tree with a golden star atop her head. Three rows of tinsel are wrapped loosely around her and small, circular ornaments in red, yellow, and blue and star-shaped ornaments in orange and white. She has round, black eyes with eyelashes and a smiling, red mouth. Her 4" Ornament Set version has a small, green ribbon loop on top for hanging for decoration.

name: Leander
bio: Leander is a slipper fanatic! She knows the comfiest textures and materials, and uses them to personalize all her slippers. Today, she's customizing a pair of fuzzy booties with holiday patches, rhinestones, and snowflake stencils to match her hat. Let Leander spruce up your seasonal slippers, too!
appearance: Leander is a red Gnome with a pointy bottle green snowflake patterned hat on her head. She has a coin grey belly partly covered by her fuzzy white beard. She has a large tan nose between her beard and her hat.

name: Leandro
bio: Leandro recently asked for extra vinaigrette at his favorite salad shop. While it might not seem like much of a big deal—and he definitely asked if the salad dressing could have more of him—it's all a part of his Year of Big Bravery initiative. Next up: shark-cage diving!
appearance: Leandro is an orange Cthulhu, a mythical cosmic entity with the head of a cuttlefish/octopus, dragon wings, and a humanoid body.
