He has a light orange belly, and darker orange spots on his forehead. He has wings with his inner wings being a glittery orange color. He has a short tail with two short fins on his head. He has black eyes and four tentacles that cover his mouth.

name: Leanne
bio: This unicorn loves spending time outside, especially with her family. Leanne comes from a huge family of Unipals and enjoys having pizza Fridays; she always eats the biggest slice! Join her on the next pizza pie night.
appearance: Leanne is a purple unicorn with a white muzzle and belly. Her horn and inner ears are a shimmering solid gold. She has a purple mane and tail as well as round, black eyes.

name: Leap
bio: This 'Mallow goes by Leap because they are the first to leap into action! As a busy paramedic, Leap tirelessly helps others by recording vitals, providing oxygen, and putting ice on hot cheese burns. Leap wants you to be careful next time you make fondue!
appearance: Leap is a neon green bat with long, round upright ears. Their inner ears are shiny and wings are shiny black. They have a black fuzzy belly. They have closed eyes with short, curled lashes. Their red, smiling mouth is adorned with two pointed white fangs.

name: Lee M.
bio: Lee M. felt the need to reinvent himself after high school. While it’s hard to imagine that Lee M., the super-trendy fashion reporter, was once Liam, the small-town quarterback, it was bound to happen eventually. What other linebacker would ask to redesign the team jersey?
appearance: Lee M. is a sloth with a blue body and a light tan patch on his face. The banded markings around his eyes and his muzzle are tan. He has a pale bluish-grey belly. He has round black eyes, a grey round nose and cat-like smile.

name: Leeland
bio: Looking for a mallow who will always have your back? It's time you met Leeland! Leeland is a team player both on and off the court, especially when it involveshis sister. Even though she is older than him and they don't always get along, he has her back.
appearance: Leeland is a lime, a green citrus fruit. He has a medium green outer area, or skin, and the inside of the lime/front of him is a very light green circle. He has light and bright yellow-ish green shapes on his stomach. He has a dark green leaf on a brown stem on top, and black round eyes and a red smile.

name: Legacy
bio: Meet Legacy. She has a beautiful butterfly garden which is perfect for frolicking amongst the flowers and keeping an eye out for new butterflies. Legacy’s favorite past time is laying in the grass and reading a book.
appearance: Legacy is a pastel pink bunnycorn with long lop ears. She has a shiny, rose gold horn with a pink spiral. Her belly is plain white. Her mouth and triangular nose are both pale pink. She has closed, happy eyes with curled lashes.

name: Leif
bio: Leif hunts for the tallest roller coasters at every amusement park in the reef. She's always ready for high-speed twists and turns! When Leif's not studying or swimming around town with her squad, she's looking for the next big coral coaster to ride. Join Leif on her next daring adventure!
appearance: Leif is a yellow leafy seadragon with a pale-yellow belly, segmented by lilac and magenta lines. She has flowy, magenta appendages on her sides and lilac appendages by the back of her head with a long, curled tail. She has an orange marking at the top of her head that goes down to her back, her snout is yellow orange rimmed with lilac and her eyes are black.

name: Leigh
bio: Leigh never learned how to swim as a younger 'Mallow, but she just started taking lessons! Leigh practices her breathing technique every day and hopes to swim a full lap soon - all the way to the deep end of the pool. Want to go swimming with Leigh?
appearance: Leigh is a bright yellow toad with a white belly. Her eyes sit on top of her head, and are black rimmed in white. She has prominent nostrils above her smiling mouth, and a pale pink blush on her cheeks. Her back is covered in brown splotches.

name: Leland
bio: Leland memorized almost 100 jazz ballads! He sings Friday and Saturday nights at a jazz lounge downtown and loves to take the audience requests. This charismatic lionfish cracks jokes and even shows off his dance moves in between musical numbers. Ready for a fun night of song and dance?
appearance: Leland has a light blue body with a yellow-green belly. He has multiple single-colored shades of blue stripes around his body from top to bottom. He has two light blue fins with ocean blue border. His face has wide open black eyes with and a smiling mouth with small dimples.

name: Lelila
bio: Meet Lelila. She's a talented ice skater who sews her own outfits! She's currently working on a galaxy costume with extra sequins so she'll look like a dazzling comet soaring across the ice! Want to learn to skate? She teaches lessons too! Lace up your skates and join her!
appearance: Lelila is a popsicle on a brown stick. She has a red top, white center and blue bottom. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, a red, smiling mouth and pink blush.

name: Lemora
bio: Lemora is everyone's go-to 'Mallow for the best book recommendations. In fact, Lemora extends an open invitation for anyone who wants to borrow from her collection of hundreds of books! Want to see what's on the shelf in Lemora's library?
appearance: Lemora is a lavender fox with a rose-patterned, lighter purple belly. She has pointed ears and a long tail with a white tip. She has glittery inner ears and white markings that go over her eyes. She has black eyes with lashes, black whiskers, and nose.

name: Lemus
bio: Guess who’s got a doctorate now? It’s Lemus! He just received his PhD in History and can’t wait to go out and celebrate tonight. Lemus invited everyone to his favorite restaurant where they make the best baklava. He might get some extra baklava to-go so he can snack on it all week!

name: Len
bio: If ghost encounters and mysteries of the night are your thing, Len is the one for you! He loves to hear all about the unexplained and creates his own theories on what is really going on. Len wants to travel the world to find out more about what goes bump in the night, do you want to join him?
appearance: Len is a monster that looks like a fluorescent green bear with round ears. He has curly, black hair and silver bolts protruding from each side of his head. He has a lighter green belly, inner ears and a marking on his muzzle which is narrow between his eyes and widens around his black nose and mouth. He also has round, black eyes. He has two scars, one red and one black, on either side of his face.

name: Lena
bio: Lena is a candle queen - she has a candle for every mood! She makes her own soy candles and creates custom scents for all her friends. Just be careful not to eat the candles, she makes them in the shape of food and they look good enough to eat!
appearance: Lena is a sliced guava, with a marbled green peel on the outside, a line of lime green, then very pale pink on her face and belly. The bright pink markings on her belly represent the sections of a guava. The top of her head sports a short green stem, and she wears a holographic red flower above her left eye. She has a smiling, winking face.

name: Lenaya
bio: Lenaya likes sushi, strawberry shortcake, and reading books by the river. She enjoys traveling to new worlds while dipping her toes in the water. This year she is making all her friends literary Valentine cards, she can't wait to share them with her class.
appearance: Lenaya is a lavender fox with white markings on her belly, face, and inside her ears. She has a dark red heart embroidered in one of hers ear. She also has round black eyes with short eyelashes, a triangular nose and two whiskers on each cheek.

name: Lenora
bio: Have you ever met a loon who couldn’t sing? Lenora can’t! She comes from a family of beautiful singers but she is tone-deaf and has a hard time joining in. She wants to start a rock band so she can still sing in a unique way, will you join her band?
appearance: Lenora is a black, white and grey loon, an aquatic bird. Her head and fluffy wings are black. She has a grey body with a white belly and speckles. She has a white neck with vertical black stripes, resembling a collar. She has a pale grey beak and round, black eyes with a pink rim.

name: Lenore
bio: Lenore has been woodworking most of her life, and it recently led her to guitar making. Some of the process is familiar, but there is also a bunch of sanding and lacquering involved—not to mention patience! Now Lenore has another goal in mind. Guitar lessons!
appearance: Lenore is a navy blue hermit crab with a tan shell. She has two claws and six legs on her left and right. She has a white belly, pink blush on her cheeks, round black eyes, and a simple smile.

name: Leon
bio: This monster isn't scary! Leon loves to cuddle and play games with his best friends and family. When Leon's having a bad day, he knows loved ones can make him feel better with sing-alongs and lots of sweet snacks! Leon's favorite feel-good snack is chocolate covered pretzels. Want to try one?
appearance: Leon is a teal monster. He has black eyes with a right-eyed wink, a smiling mouth and numerous white, pointed teeth. His horns are striped orange and purple, and he has a purple puff of hair between them. His belly is striped in orange and purple, and he has a purple heart-shaped patch around his left eye.

name: Leonard
bio: Have you ever met a lion who didn’t eat meat? Meet Leonard, he’s a vegetarian! He loves lentils, lasagna, and learning how to code. Leonard loves naps like his older brotherRichardand is helping create their website – the lion brothers!
appearance: Leonard is a tan or dark golden lion with a white muzzle and belly. The colorful mane which covers his head is rainbow, with lots of pinks, blues, yellows and greens. He has round black eyes and a matching nose and mouth.

name: Leonie
bio: Leonie loves going to the farmer's market. This week she's picking up carrots to make her favorite dish off all—carrot cake! With a touch of homegrown honey, it's sure delicious. Would you like a slice?
appearance: Leonie is a pink bee with shimmering silver wings. Her belly is striped in black and off-white, and Leonie has two curled black antennae. She has round eyes, a smiling mouth and pink heart blush on each cheek. Leonie has a purple flower with a pink center.

name: Leonori
bio: Leonori is a table tennis champion! He's won 1st place in the 'Mallow tournament 3 years in a row! He practices by wearing a blindfold and sensing where the ball is with only his ears. He also loves going to his friendDoxl's house for a fresh lunch from his garden.
appearance: Leonori is a grey manticore with shiny silver wings. His muzzle and belly are white. The colorful mane which covers his head is rainbow, with lots of pinks and blues. He has round black eyes with short lashes and a matching nose and mouth.

name: Lerna
bio: Lerna is a powerful, no-nonsense lady. An avid day trader and stock market expert, her independent hedge fund is valued in the billions. When her work is done, she enjoys a robust night life, dining in only the finest restaurants and rubbing elbows with Hollywood elites, earning her the nick name “Five-Star Lerna.”
appearance: Lerna is a lime green hydra, a dragon-like creature from Greek mythology. She has tall horns and fins decorating her head which are a paler green than her body. She has heavily hooded eyes, outlined in the same green as her horns. She has black sclerae and bright red irises. She has a light green muzzle with two small, pointed fangs protruding from the bottom. Her belly is purple and she has theHydralogo printed on the right side of her back.

name: Lesedi
bio: Do you know any owls obsessed with cinnamon? It's time to meet Lesedi, the cinnamon queen! She loves cinnamon rolls, cinnamon hot chocolate, and even cinnamon lip gloss! When she grows up, maybe she'll start her own cinnamon restaurant, would you eat there?
appearance: Lesedi is a pastel, rainbow tie-dyed owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. Small, pink feathers decorate her chest. She has closed eyes with short, straight lashes, and a hot pink, triangular beak.

name: Leslie
bio: Looking for a Squishmallow to get into some mischief with? Leslie is the 'mallow for you! She loves to set 'traps' for her friends and is a practical joke maven, she is known for her jokes and always has a story to make you laugh.
appearance: Leslie is a llama who is tie-dyed in rainbow, predominantly pink and blue with some yellow. She has a round, white face with black eyes, nose and mouth. She also has two curved lashes on each eye. Her inner ears are white. HerValentineedition has closed eyes, thick lashes, pink blush and a red heart emblem on her chest.

name: Lester
bio: Lester dreams a lot. This 'Mallow got so curious about his dreaming, they started a sleep research group in college. Lester is most fascinated by nightmares, and writes down all their dreams so they can learn about what makes them so weird and scary. What do you dream about?
appearance: Lester is a pumpkin spice latte with cream. On top of his head is swirled whipped cream with orange swirls and yellow dots. There is a green poking out from the right side of the whipped cream. He has an orange body with a white band through their* middle. He wears a jack-o-lantern face.

name: Leticia
bio: Though they have very different personalities, they play tennis like one on the court. Leticia is shyer than her brotherLeelandbut once she’s got her racket, the game is on. Watch out for her forehand!
appearance: Leticia is a sliced lemon, with a bright yellow peel on the outside and a white face and belly. The yellow markings on her belly represent the segments of a lemon. The top of her head sports a short brown stem and a dark green leaf. She has round black eyes with short, curled lashes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Levi
bio: Levi loves marshmallows and jellybeans and every Easter he tries to stack a marshmallow tower to be taller than he is. They usually fall down before he can add the top one, maybe next year he'll run out of marshmallows!
appearance: Levi is a pale teal lamb with a peach colored face. His nose is teal and shaped like a heart. He has round, black eyes and a sweet, smiling mouth. The inside of his ears is white. In larger releases he has a fluffy white belly, but smaller editions lack this.

name: Leviathan
bio: Leviathan is a mythical sea serpent with a need for speed; across the Seven Seas, this blue beast has a mean reputation, but at the end of the day, Leviathan is just a softie who loves nothing more than a good cuddle.
appearance: Leviathan is a cyan sea serpent Squishmallow with a golden blue-striped belly and a yellow snout & inner wings. They have a blue mane and two sharp front teeth.

name: Levinda
bio: Levinda built an epic treehouse! She even set up a little rope and pulley system to bring supplies up the tree. Levinda laid out a big carpet and some beanbag chairs to create a cozy space for when friends come over to visit. Now the treehouse just needs a name. Do you have any ideas for Levinda?
appearance: Levinda is a tan bunny in the style of a Hug Mee with tall bunny ears and a tail with pink inner ears and belly. She has tan hands, white feet, a white snout, and a pink nose and mouth with black eyes. She has a carrot embroidered on her belly.

name: Lex Lex
bio: Lex Lex is a competitive cheerleader! She’s also an elite volleyball player, expert zipliner, baccalaureate in Spanish and Theology… the list goes on. Just don’t expect frugality or tidiness out of this Type B banana—those are two skills she has yet to master!
appearance: Lex Lex is a pink half-peeled banana with four peels hanging off from the center of her body all the way around. Her top half is pastel pink with round, black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth

name: Lexi
bio: Halloween Edition:Who's that fox? It's your favorite fashionista Lexi and she is ready for Halloween! Lexi designed her costume and she can't wait to show her squad when she gets to Holly's party.
appearance: Lexi is a black and red fox, with a red and white tipped tail. She has a rounded skull with eyes and nose cavities with two pointed fangs. Her ears, ribcage, skull, and ears are red.

name: Lexie
bio: Lexie is quite the imaginative Squishmallow. She aspires to become an architect! What’s her next project? She is creating the interior and exterior of her future home with the rest of her cheetah girls.
appearance: Lexie has a tan coat with a dense pattern of black and brown spots. Her muzzle and belly are white, while the insides of her ears are a pale gold. Both her round eyes and her nose are black.

name: Lexis
bio: Lexis loves attending hockey games with her sister,Erica. A certified history buff, Lexis enjoys everything she can about the game.  In fact, she knows so much that the local college asked her to teach her a brand-new course—Evolution of the Puck!
appearance: Lexis is a purple red panda with tall, white ears and a pink, teal, and yellow striped tail. She has teal inner ears, fuzzy teal whiskers, white round muzzle, and white round eyebrows. Her belly is colored in a rainbow gradient, her nose and curved mouth are teal, and her eyes are black as she has a winking expression.

name: Liam
bio: Liam has always dreamt of becoming a teacher. What's his favorite subject? History! He has a love for antique items and fossils, and always has his head in the books.
appearance: Liam is a pale green lamb with white inner ears and face. He has black eyes with lashes with a pink nose, mouth, and blush.

name: Lianne
bio: Meet Lianne. She loves dim sum, iced tea, and reading mystery novels. When she’s not drooling over a dim sum feast, you can find her studying to become a lawyer. Lianne comes from a long line of lawyers and wants to continue to help people.
appearance: Lianne is a tan or dark golden lion with a white muzzle and belly. The bright, almost fluorescent mane which covers her head is rainbow, with lots of yellows, oranges, blues, greens and purples. She has closed eyes with long lashes and a black nose and mouth. She has a heart design on her chest with a small blue heart and a larger pastel pink one.

name: Libby
bio: Lollipops, lacrosse, and lime green are some of Libby's favorite things. This llamacorn doesn't like to share but her friendLucindais teaching her why that's important. Will you help Libby learn to like sharing?
appearance: Libby is a llamacorn, a combination of a llama and a unicorn. She has a solid grey body and a golden horn on the top of her head.

name: Liberty
bio: Liberty is learning a new trick! Her besties Olive and Erika are teaching this smart and funny Maltipoo how to tell stories and think she could write a great novel one day. Maybe it'll be about those feisty Chihuahuas that live down the street and all the times they've tried to steal her chicken dinner!
appearance: Liberty is light tan maltipoo dog breed which is a mix of a maltese and a poodle. She has light brown, floppy ears and a rounded, white belly which are both fuzzy. She wears a pink collar and is holding a bag of gummy bears. She has a white muzzle, round, black eyes, with lashes and a black nose and mouth with her pink tongue sticking out.

name: Lida
bio: Meet Lida. She is going to her first slumber party! Lida sleeps with a night light and is worried that she won't be able to sleep without it. She's going to try a sleep mask to keep her fears at bay, do you have any tricks to help her overcome her fears of the dark?
appearance: Lida is an aquamarine color owl with silver prominent ear tufts and white markings on her belly but not her eyes. Small, mint feathers decorate her chest. She has a light teal sleep mask and with brown closed eyes and eyelashes and has a gold, triangular beak

name: Liel
bio: Meet Liel. She loves dancing, dogs, and collecting her favorite toys. Liel is an expert dancer, she and her friends have a blast trying out the latest viral dance trend. Do you want to join them?
appearance: Liel is a pink and white tie-dyed unicorn. She has a white muzzle and belly, and her belly is fluffy. Her horn and inner ears are metallic pink, though in her14" inch formthey are rose gold. Her nostrils and the swirl on her horn are light pink. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes and a bright pink mane.

name: Liesel
bio: Liesel plays accordion in To Love is to Lose! She can’t believe her childhood dream of playing in a polka-themed cover band actually came true and pinches herself before every wedding, bar mitzvah, car wash, etc. Don’t tell anyone, but she might even be featured on a certain grilled cheese rapper’s latest 8-track!
appearance: Liesel is a white cow with a lavender floral patch by the upper right of their head and their right ear and one on the left side of their body. They have pink inner ears and muzzle, off- white horns, with a fuzzy, and a long tail with a tuft of lavender fuzz at the tip. Their eyes are black, and their nostrils are yellow.

name: Lietta
bio: Lietta can skate fast, but she prefers blades to the board. She skates to the beach every summer with her friendHalisa. They met at the skate park one summer and now they are the best of friends.
appearance: Lietta is a watermelon. Unlike every other Squishmallow, she is wide rather than tall. Her rind has a light green background covered with darker green lines. Above that, she has pink, green, yellow, and white lines. Finally, her face is on a thick, pink piece. She has eyelashes, pink cheeks, and a smiling mouth. She has 26 seeds (10 on the front, 16 on the back) and a hot pink bow.

name: Lijjian
bio: Lijjian is one feisty Aries! This capybara loves bringing people together and hosts the best dinner parties in town. When she isn't hanging with her bestie Seb, you can find Lijjian expressing her creative side through film. Right now, she's working on a series of female-based shorts!
appearance: Lijjian is a brown capybara with darker brown short ears and an egg-shaped muzzle. She has a tan fuzzy belly, closed eyes with lashes, black nostrils and mouth.

name: Lil Gouda
bio: Yo, yo, yo—it's Lil Gouda! This neighborhood famous rapper loves to freestyle and was even just asked to write a jingle for the local car dealership. Though Lil Gouda has dreams beyond rhyming 'SUV' with 'come and see,' he knows every great grilled cheese had to start somewhere!
appearance: Lil Gouda has two tan toasted breads with melted cheese sandwiched between the two. The front bread has a large yellow marking in the center with dark tan streaks by his belly. He has round, black eyes with a magenta smile.

name: Lilac
bio: Hi! My name is Lilac! My mini and I love to hop through meadows and pick flowers.
appearance: Lilac is a purple tie-dyed bunny with lop ears. She has lavender inner ears, fluffy tail, belly, and pouch. Her mini shares the same appearance but has closed eyes and has her tongue sticking out. Lilac has black eyes with a winking expression, black whiskers, a cat-like smile and a pink nose.

name: Lilah
bio: When it get's cold outside you can find Lilah eating her favorite food: noodles! She prefers to stay inside for long, luxurious naps and uses her eye for fashion to help her Squishmallow friends pick out their squishtastic snowsuits. This year, she might even join her friendDawn'sgiant snowball fight.
appearance: Lilah is a light blue koala with enormous, light blue round ears. Her belly and the insides of her ears are white. She has a large black nose, as well as round eyes and a smiling mouth. She wears a red and white striped scarf around her neck.

name: Lilaz
bio: Lilaz loves romance novels so much, she's writing one of her own! It's about a professional playlist maker named "Liliz" who finds her happily ever after in a pumpkin patch and just so happens to be a peach cow. Though she swears Liliz isn't inspired by herself, who knows? Maybe Lilaz is manifesting her next chapter
appearance: Lilaz is a white cow with peach patches by the upper right of her head and her right ear and on the lower right side of her body. She has pale pink inner ears and muzzle, pink horns and a long tail with a tuft of peach fuzz at the tip. She has a peach embroidered on the right side of her body. Her eyes are black, and her nostrils are pink.

name: Lili
bio: Did you hear the news? Lili is directing a feature film! It's about a small-town fruit enthusiast who travels the globe in search for the rarest apple of them all. There's going to be marching bands, spies and even a major twist at the end of Act II. Spoiler alert—it involve hiccups!
appearance: Lili is a coral bee with shimmering silver wings. Her belly is striped in brown and light pink. She has two brown antennae with coral fuzzy tips. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with coral blush.

name: Lilia
bio: Lilia knows everything about bioluminescent organisms and how to harness their thermal power into light! That's why she started her own organic lightness business. Now all underwater 'Mallows can have a bit of twinkling light at night!
appearance: Lilia is a light pink monster with mint horns, teal fin-like flaps on the sides of her body, and a mint and pink striped belly. She has pink freckles between her eyes, and pink blush. Her eyes are black with lashes and a winking expression with a wide mouth and a single square tooth poking out by the bottom right of her mouth.

name: Lilian
bio: Lilian or as her friends call her ‘Lili’, is kind, loyal and very competitive! She is always up to play a fun activity, especially if it’s a sport. Her favorite sport to play is soccer and her wings help her glide across the field quickly. When she’s not scoring goals, she loves to help her mom cook for their family in the kitchen!
appearance: Lilian is a cream-colored owl with shimmery, golden ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. Small, gold feathers decorate her chest. She has closed eyes with sweeping lashes and a gold, triangular beak.

name: Lilibet
bio: Meet Lilibet. She is bright, bubbly, and just a little gullible. This delightful duck would do anything for you, she's the best kind of friend to have. Lilibet always stands up for what is right.
appearance: Lilibet is a duck with a light pink head and a lavender purple body, separated by a white marking on her neck. She has fluffy lavender wings the same color as her body and a fluffy, sky-blue belly. Her round black eyes have a white ring around them, and her short bill is bright yellow.

name: Lilith
bio: Sparkles and glamour are two things Lilith can't live without. She loves glitter on everything, even her socks! For her birthday brunch, she wants to have glittery waffles and sparkling strawberry sundaes for all her friends.
appearance: Lilith is a rainbow ostrich with rainbow wings, and her head is covered with rainbow fur. Her body is hot pink with a magenta tummy. Her face consist of black round eyes with two lashes and she has a pink beak with few black dots has her nose.

name: Lilou
bio: Needlepoint and dodgeball are two things that keep Lilou calm. She likes to focus and get creative when she's working on a new design, she even created personalized canvas for everyone on her dodgeball team!
appearance: Lilou is a beige spotted seal with a white belly. She has two small fins and one tail. She has white spots above her round black eyes with eyelashes. She has two black whiskers on each side of her face and a black nose on a white snout.

name: Lily
bio: Lily and her friendLevidream of one day opening a candy shop, but they want to specialize in marshmallows, jellybeans, and lollipops! Lily wants to make the candy while Levi stacks it in cool baskets. Would you try Squishmallow candy?
appearance: Lily is a white lamb with a peach colored face. Her noise is silver and shaped like a heart. She has round, black eyes, curled lashes and a sweet, smiling mouth.

name: Lily the Horse
bio: Have you heard the phrase 'lillies for fillies'? That's what Lily was named after! Her mom used to help with the fillies' race and one day Lily wants to help too. She loves helping the racers get ready and one year she even gave the winning horse her bouquet!
appearance: Lily is a light grey horse with a white stripe on her forehead. She has black eyes and a grey mane and tail. The inside of her ears, muzzle and belly are white in color. She has a pink lily emblem embroidered on the right side of her chest.

name: Limell
bio: Meet Limell. He Loves swimming, archery, and hanging with his friends. He's had to take a little break because he just got his tonsils removed. But he gets to eat as many blue raspberry popsicles and he wants! Would you like one? He's always willing to share.

name: Limra
bio: Limra can't help but jam out to her favorite songs on the radio- even when she's driving! You will find Limra singing out loud while sitting in the traffic, or having a quick dance break at the red light. Get ready for a fun drive next time you carpool with Limra!
appearance: Limra is a latte in a pink takeaway cup. She has a white lid with a green straw poking out, and an off-pink body with a blue band around her middle. A coffee bean -like logo design decorates her middle. She has round, black eyes with short lashes,  and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Linda
bio: Linda loves cupcakes, superhero movies, and staying inside on rainy days. Linda is shy at first, but once you get to know her she'll be your best friend!
appearance: Linda is a medium blue bunny, with a pink nose and smile and black eyes and whiskers. Her ears are also blue, and she doesn't have a tail. Her ears are long and floppy, and she has closed eyes and a smile.

name: Lindsay
bio: You've metRegan, the king of hip hop, now is your chance to meet Lindsay, the QUEEN. This spunky leopard has moves and style unlike any other mallow, music is what keeps Lindsay going. Whether she's having a good day or a bad one, she lets the music talk for her and speaks and dances whatever is on her mind.
appearance: Lindsay is a leopard with a rainbow base coat, including colors such as peach, green and sky blue. She is covered in powder blue spots with a darker, sky blue outline. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a teal nose and mouth. She also has sparkling blue inner ears.

name: Lindy
bio: Lindy is a lyric soprano! She's making her operatic debut in the Polish translation of "Hard-Boiled Hare: The Life and Time of the Easter Bunny" and can't wait to sing big egg aria. Here's hoping she doesn't crack!
appearance: Lindy is a tan bunny. She has pink frosting on her body with a squiggle of white icing on her forehead. She wears a teal bow-tie with a candy arch over her belly and with daisies on her yellow belly with a white arch on top. She has tan years with yellow inner ears. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a pink nose and mouth with black whiskers.

name: Linnea
bio: Linnea teaches at an etiquette school! Her classes are geared towards little 'Mallows, but she encourages anyone to join. Linnea covers dining protocol, how to shake hands, and ways to politely accept a gift. Social graces are important and all, but sometimes even Linnea likes to blow bubbles in her chocolate milk. Tee-hee!
appearance: Linnea is a dog with a mint blue colored body. Her muzzle and belly are an off-white, and she has a greyish-teal patch around her right eye. Her fluffy velvet ears are the same color as the underside of her ears. She has round, black eyes with dual lashes and a greyish-teal nose.

name: Lira
bio: Will you sign Lira's cast? She recently broke her arm in a broom accident, but is healing so well she can still go trick-or-treating! Even though Lira's very nervous, she going to get back on her broom and fly again. With her 'Mallow friends believing in her. Lira knows she can do anything!
appearance: Lira is a Caucasian girl with black hair and silver tips tied in pigtails. On her head, she wears a witch hat with a spider web and a silver stripe with a white buckle design. She wears a black shirt with white laces and a black and white striped pattern. She has black eyes with lashes and a pink smile.

name: Lisa Tater
bio: Lisa Tater was the inspiration for an early 2000s alt-rock song! It's kinda funny listening to the lyrics now—baggy hoodie, hidden heart / a defense of black, against the dark—because she is so not that same potato. In fact, she doesn’t even wear gauges anymore!
appearance: Lisa Tater is a brown baked potato. On top of her head she has a dollop of sour cream with chives. In the potato there is mashed potato, bacon bits and cheddar cheese. She has silver wrapper below her body. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Lisbeth
bio: Lisbeth loves to play with clay! She made little ceramic replicas of her family in time for Día de los Muertos so they can be displayed on the family altar. The sculptures are still setting in the kiln. Want to help her pick out the paint colors?
appearance: Lisbeth is a turquoise dog with floppy ears. Her ears are fluffy with turquoise fur. She has a patch on her muzzle and forehead the same color. She has an orange flower on top of her head with turquoise vines. She has a white belly with a colorful spine rib with a flower above with four black spots and a sugar skull-like pattern above. She has round, black eyes rimmed with orange flowers and a turquoise nose and mouth.

name: Liv
bio: Who loves cheese, space, and nature walks? Liv does! You can find her with a grilled cheese in hand, gazing up at the stars learning about constellations. She wants to build rocket ships when she grows up, do you want to explore space with Liv?
appearance: Liv's coat is a light golden color and is covered in teal leopard spots with a black outline. She has a white belly and snout, with a gold nose and inner ears the same shade. She has round black eyes with simple eyelashes.

name: Livingston
bio: Livingston works in banking. He was never very good at keeping his piggy bank full, but ended up getting a good job for a bank through some friends. Now Livingston knows a bunch about savings and fiscal responsibility! Wait, what does "fiscal" mean again?
appearance: Livingston is a neon green bottle of potion. He is made of  neon liquid with white bubbles and stars. He has a dark green label on his belly that has a pale green sun with black, and pale green rays and two black moons and stars. On top of his head he has a tan cork and a green string with a black tag. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Livo
bio: Livo is a distance runner and country music superstar. Her long runs through the forest have inspired some of her greatest hits, including her latest single, ‘How Many Miles To Go?’ Livo is always looking for musical collaborators, so lace up your sneakers, tune up your guitar, and join her on the trail!
appearance: Livo is a magenta gummy bear with a dark magenta tummy. She has magenta ears with dark magenta inner ears and a magenta tail behind. She has round magenta eyes, a light pink muzzle and a magenta nose and mouth.

name: Livvy
bio: Meet Livvy. Her favorite color is yellow and she is an amazing photographer. She brings her camera with her everywhere to capture all aspects of life. Her favorite subjects are nature, especially capturing a sunrise or sunset. Maybe one day you'll see her photos published!
appearance: Livvy is a starfish with an orange, marbled pattern. She has two legs that stick out from either side of her body. She also has a patterned belly with a mosaic design of orange pieces. She has a winking, smiling expression.

name: Liz
bio: Liz is one sweet 'Mallow. She loves adventures, dress up, and playing make-believe with her friends. When she grows up, she wants to make movies where she can bring her imagination to life! Want to play?

name: Liza
bio: Liza escapes to the spa every Sunday! First Liza goes for a long swim, then it's off to the ice sauna for some cold therapy. This 'Mallow really knows how to treat herself to a relaxing day! Before leaving, Liza grabs a hot cup of jasmine tea and strolls home for a healthy lunch.
appearance: Liza is a cream colored golden retriever with floppy ears. Her ears are fluffy with light golden fur. She has a patch on her muzzle and forehead the same color. She has round, black eyes with eyelashes and a black nose and mouth. She has a white fluffy belly. On the top of Liza's head she has two magenta heart clips

name: Lizella
appearance: Lizella is a pastel purple pegacorn with a holographic silver horn, inner ears, wings, and muzzle. They have a rainbow mane and belly with pink nostrils and has black eyes with lashes.

name: Lizelno
bio: Lizelno is a mechanic! Whether cars, planes, or motorcycles, there’s nothing this crafty ‘Mallow can’t fix. When they aren’t tinkering in the shop, Lizenlo enjoys practicing karate, baking homemade bread, and taking long drives up the coast. Hop in and come for a ride!
appearance: Lizelno is a powder blue owl with prominent ear tufts. They have white patches surrounding each eye which are vaguely egg-shaped. They also have a white belly speckled with powder blue feathers. They have round, black eyes with curved lashes and a triangular, sparkly golden beak.

name: Lizette
bio: Gather round, Lizette is about to open a parcel from her grandmother! Her grandmother is a travel guide and sends Lizette a post card and a care package full of treasures from her latest travels. Can you guess where her latest adventure took place?
appearance: Lizette is a hot pink caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears and her belly, as well as the spiral on her horn, are striped in rainbow. The horn itself is a shimmery white with a colorful spiral. Her mane and tail are both vibrant rainbow. She has round eyes with curled lashes and a pale pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Lizma
bio: Meet Lizma. She loves writing, playing with her pet dog, and hosting fun, snack-filled parties with her friends! She is an expert at the art of cheeseboards, and makes beautiful spreads! Everyone's invited! So bring your dancing shoes and some songs to add to the party playlist!
appearance: Lizma is a rainbow macaron with white loops on her top and she a fuzzy macaron. Her face consist of a rounded black eye with the other eye winking, and she has a red smile.

name: Loafer
bio: Loafer develops films in bathtubs all over the world. This travel photographer refuses to go digital! Film just has a richer, ultimately more lasting quality. Loafer recently finished a series featuring redwood trees. It's going to be featured in this Sunday's paper!
appearance: Loafer is a light brown dog with black patches below his right ear, around their left eye and on their belly. They have two ears one black left ear and one brown right ear and are large and floppy, standing up from their head. They have a pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls, with a rounded black nose and round black eyes.

name: Lobert
bio: Lobert travels all over the world helping companies buy and sell their goods. He's on the road this month and will be staying at his sister,Loberta's, bed and breakfast! Lobert always looks forward to catching up with his sis over a tasty brunch. They might even have time for board games!
appearance: Lobert is a blue lobster. He has 8 small legs along the 2 sides of his body, along with 2 large blue pincers on each side, above the smaller legs. He has 2 thin blue antennae on the top of his head, along with a fan-shaped tail. His belly is a light blue, with horizontal white stripes across the length of his belly. He has round, black eyes and a smile.

name: Loberta
bio: Going out of town? You're welcome to stay at Loberta's bed & breakfast! Loberta hosts 'Mallows from all over and is really starting to gain popularity. You can expect freshly baked muffins every morning, and an extensive board game library.
appearance: Loberta is bright red lobster. They have 8 little legs and two red-orange tie-dye large pincers on each side of their body. They also have thin red antennae on top of their head and a fan-shaped tail. Their belly is red-orange tie-dye and striped with bright red. They have round, black eyes and a smile.

name: Lobi
bio: Lobi loves to knit, she has a room full of yarn! Some of her favorites are rainbow yarn, yarn with sparkles, and even bubblegum scented yarn! One day she wants to open a museum for yarn, would you visit?
appearance: Lobi is a white cat with a black patch on her left side which covers her ear and part of her face. She has one grey eye and one black eye, both small and oval-shaped. She has a pink blush under each and two straight whiskers. She also has a simple black nose. A rainbow-striped unicorn horn sits on her forehead.

name: Lockwood
bio: Lockwood plays professional football! He's living his dream as a kicker playing for his favorite regional team. Lockwood thrives under pressure, and loves having a whole stadium watch him make a winning kick. Want tickets to this Sunday's game?
appearance: Lockwood is a black rockhopper penguin with black fuzz at the top of his head with additional yellow fuzz resembling eyebrows. He has a grey belly, orange beak, and black eyes with white rings around them, and yellow markings coming out of the top of his beak connecting itself to the yellow eyebrow-like fuzz on his head.

name: Logan
bio: If you want someone to keep you safe Logan is the Squishmallow for you! Logan takes his job very seriously!- he's one of Santa's helpers! He helps protect the North Pole making sure that none of Santa's secrets get out. His birthday is December 26th and his favorite drink is hot cocoa with peppermint
appearance: Logan is a Nutcracker with White Hair and Blue and Red Shirt with a black belt. He has a peach-colored cheeks. He has a pale wooden trapezoid with round, black eyes and a large black mustache. He also wears a black nutcracker hat

name: Lois
bio: Lois has a tie-dyed body which is predominantly mint, blue and green. They have a mohawk and small, fluffy wings that match the colors of their body. They have a white belly. Their beak is pink golden with a bright, pink gold. They also have black, round eyes with two eyelashes on each side.
appearance: Lois has a tie-dyed body which is predominantly mint, blue and green. They have a mohawk and small, fluffy wings that match the colors of their body. They have a white belly. Their beak is pink golden with a bright, pink gold. They also have black, round eyes with two eyelashes on each side.

name: Lola
bio: Lola loves pink things, visiting the world and movies with best friends.
appearance: Lola is a unicorn with tie-dye pattern which includes purple, fuchsia and lilac, to name a few shades. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly pink horn with a darker pink swirl wrapped around it. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes. On her chest she has a design with three hearts; the smallest is pink, the middle is blue and the largest is purple.

name: Lomo
bio: Lomo is over the moon to meet you! He's a real extrovert and nothing brightens his day more than making a new friend. Once Lomo went on a vacation himself and made so many new friends they all became pen pals! Lomo makes time to respond on each and every letter he receives. Would you like to be pen pals with Lomo?
appearance: Lomo is an Ombre green axolotl. He has an ombre axolotl body from lime to mint with a gold heart on the belly which says KISS in red with black eyes, and a cat-like smile. He has 2 stubby arms. and two silver gills with lime frills.

name: Lon
appearance: Lon is a black bat with tall ears and red inner ears. They have grey wings with a red Twizzlers wrapper on the bottom of their body. Their mouth is red with two small white fangs and eyes that are black with white rings around them.

name: Londyn
bio: Are you ready to meet Londyn the unicorn? This unicorn has a passion for music. Londyn spends her time making her own beats and writing her own music. When she is not creating her next big hit, she loves singing karaoke with her pals! Maybe one day you'll see her on the next Uni-Idol!
appearance: Londyn is a pale pink unicorn with a silver, reversible sequin belly. Her horn is a glittery silver with a pink spiral around it. She has a long pink tail, a white mane, muzzle, and inner ears. Her nostrils are pink, and her lashed eyes are closed in a happy expression.

name: Lonina
bio: Years of practice make Lonina the yoga queen. She's been stretching since she was a little 'mallow. and now she's a bona fide instructor! Lonina teaches yoga and healing techniques for all ages, and you can find many of her courses on video! Grab your yoga mat and strike a pose with Lonina.
appearance: Lonina is a pink frog that holds a sliver heart with a pink outline. She has red spots on her sides. Her face consists of black round eyes on top of her head, she has two dots as her nose, she has a simple black smile, and she has white cheeks. Her tummy is all white.

name: Lonnie
bio: Looking for a Babysitter? Lonnie is the girl for you! She helped watch her siblings so much when she was younger that now she's a babysitting pro. Her best babysitting trick? A DIY popcorn bar for movie night!
appearance: Lonnie is solid blue. Her belly, snout, inner ears, mane, and tail are white. Her horn is silver and her eyes are closed with small eyelashes.

name: Loomis
bio: Loomis has a sensitive nose. Any scent will make her sneeze! That's why she prefers dried flowers. They're pretty, crisp, and low on allergens. Want to make a seasonal bouquet with Loomis?
appearance: Loomis is a green cup of hot chocolate with a purple handle. Her top reveals hot chocolate decorated with a caramel skull design. Her eyes with lashes are closed, she has pink blush markings and a smiling mouth.

name: Lopsang
bio: Lopsang always had a fidgeting habit until her Grannie recommended she try crochet. Now she keeps her hooves busy crocheting slippers and even bracelets. It seems like the more she learns about crochet, the more there is to make! Want Lopsang to crochet a teddy bear for you?
appearance: Lopsang is a teal deer with a white patterned face and belly. She also has white inner ears. She has dark brown antlers on top of her head. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and nose and mouth are all brown.

name: Loraly
bio: Need some help with your math homework, or pro tips on space travel? Loraly is the 'Mallow for you! She loves physics, star-hopping with friends, and always has the best restaurant recommendations. Loraly is packing her spaceship now for a weekend getaway. There's room for one more if you want to join!
appearance: Loraly is a galaxy printed alien with shades of pink and purple. Her body is covered with a white pattern of starbursts and purple dots to decorate her. She has magenta antennae with red dots. She has a plain white fuzzy belly and a simple, smiling winking face with two eyelashes.

name: Lorelai
bio: Meet Lorelai. She's a bit extroverted and a bit introverted, too! She loves a yummy dinner party with friends or a groovy disco party with loud music. She also needs a time alone to recharge with a quiet bath or a book! No matter what, she always finds the right balance for her!
appearance: Lorelai is a baby blue color with white horns, silver glittery wings and ears lined with teal, and a pink, blue, and yellow stomach. Also she is fuzzy everywhere except for her tummy!

name: Lorenzo
bio: Meet another one of santa’s helpers, Lorenzo. His job is guarding santa’s list! Day or night, this nutcracker makes sure the naughty and nice lists stay safe and hidden. His favorite cocoa has chocolate dipped marshmallows in it!
appearance: Lorenzo is Nutcracker with White Hair and Green and Red Shirt with a belt. He has a peach-colored cheeks .

name: Lorenzo the Banana Slug
bio: Meet Lorenzo. Lorenzo is a TV buff and blogger! He wants to use his knowledge and passion for television to break into showbiz. Lorenzo aspires to build his own TV network so he can schedule all his favorite shows and help create some new ones!
appearance: Lorenzo  is a banana slug with a honey color body and a yellow belly. He has two dark orange antennae which stand up on his head. On his back, he has seven shiny golden spots. He has round, black eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Loretta
bio: Loretta started a chess club at her school so she could meet likeminded 'Mallows who love chess as much as she does. Sometimes Lor brings in chess boards from her collection to show everyone - there are so many different kinds! Her favorite is the mini travel board with itty bitty chess pieces.
appearance: Loretta is a light blue dumbo octopus, a type of umbrella octopus (meaning their arms are connected by a web of skin). Her tentacles flare out from his body in a flower-like shape and are aquamarine on top and light blue underneath. She also has yellow fins on his head which resemble ears and have shiny, blue inner ears. She has a winking expression, pink blush and a smiling mouth.

name: Lorie
bio: Lorie is a talented singer and baker. She can make ANY dessert you ask and will even sing your favorite song while she does it. She loves to play in the garden and take care of her friends when they have bad days. When she grows up she wants to work on a farm.
appearance: Lorie's coat is a pale blush color and is covered in hot pink leopard spots. She has a white belly and snout, with a bright pink nose and peachy pink inner ears. She has round black eyes with simple eyelashes. She has a emblem on the right side of her chest featuring three hearts, with a large, hot pink one at the bottom, a small pale blue one in the middle and an even smaller purple one on top.

name: Lorita
bio: Lorita bakes carrot cake so delicious, they only make it once a year! Lorita adds chocolate chips upon request, and will also make a loaf nut-free for some of their 'Mallow pawls. Lorita's super secret recipe makes their carrot cake even more special! Want to order a one-of-a-kind carrot cake from Lorita?
appearance: Lorita is a white bunny in the style of a Hug Mee. Their limbs and tail are a light grey, alongside their ears and the markings on their face. Their belly and muzzle are white. They have pink inner ears, nose, and mouth with black eyes.

name: Lorna the Llama
bio: Lorna wrote a doo-wop song that lists the entire Periodic Table! She loves chemistry class but has a hard time focusing as easily as the other students, so she comes up with creative songs just to help her learn. "The Hydrogen Hop" is so catchy that her teacher is adding it to next year's curriculum!
appearance: Lorna is a teal llama. Her face and inner ears are white. She has light teal hair on top of her head. Her lower body is wrapped in rainbow tassel. She has round black eyes with thick, curly lashes and pink blush on her cheeks. She has a silver nose and mouth.

name: Lorono
bio: Chop Chop! Lorono is the fastest sous chef in the west. He cooks with ease under the pressure! When he's not in the kitchen at his fast-paced restaurant, he's traveling the world to find inspiration and new and delicious flavors to bring back with him. Bon appétit!
appearance: Lorono is a dark red lobster. He has 8 little legs and two large pincers on each side of his body. He also has thin crimson antennae on top of his head and a fan-shaped tail. His belly is light red and striped with bright red. He has round, black eyes and a smile.

name: Lorraine
bio: Lorraine loves quiche. She bakes one almost every Sunday, and between brunch and sharing slices with neighbors, it barely lasts a week. Lorraine makes her quiche with bacon, Gruyère cheese, onion, and of course, fresh eggs. Ready for a slice of Lorraine's homemade quiche?
appearance: Lorraine is a black cauldron with a black rim at the top. A bubbly cyan potion brews inside her, with a black bat wing and the handle of a metal ladle sticking out. She has a candy pink belly. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, a red smiling mouth and pink blush.

name: Louden
bio: Meet Louden, his birthday is coming up and he's planning the best party ever. There's going to be a peanut butter and jelly sandwich bar, a silly photo booth and a light up dance floor to get groovy on! Everyone is invited, including you! So grab your party hat and come celebrate!
appearance: Louden is a light purple goat with numerous white markings. These are found inside his ears, in a triangle pattern on his forehead, on his muzzle, his belly and on the underside of his tail. He also has a fluffy white goatee. He has two lavender triangular horns and round black eyes. A light green bandana with a white paisley print is tied around his neck.

name: Louie
bio: Are you looking for a racing partner? Louie might be the one for you! Born and raised in Louisville, he grew up racing with his friends and has a special dance when he wins. His favorite part of winning? Celebrating with his friends! Do you want to race with Louie?
appearance: Louie is a black horse with a white stripe on his forehead. He has black eyes rimmed in white, a grey muzzle and a black mane and tail. The inside of his ears and belly are grey, the same as his muzzle. He has a golden horseshoe emblem on the right side of his belly.

name: Louie the Lobster
appearance: Louie is a bright red lobster. He has 8 little legs and two large pincers on each side of his body. He also has thin red antennae on top of his head and a fan-shaped tail. His belly is cream and striped with bright red. He has round, black eyes and a smile.

name: Louie the Mango
bio: Meet Louie. He has dyslexia and has had to take a few extra lessons to help him learn to read. He's doing really well! He's almost finished with his first chapter book! He's grown to love books and stories and one day wants to be a librarian when he grows up.
appearance: Louie is a bright orange mango covered in fuzz. He has a colorful belly with diagonal stripes of green, yellow and red, as well as round black eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth. He has a brown stem at the centre of his head with a lime green leaf.

name: Louis
bio: Louis is an intern at the Holiday law firm of Jolly, Jolly & Jones! He's currently assisting senior partnerJacquelineon a major pro bono case—that of 3rd-grade Rebecca W. placed on The Naughty List without due process—and has hardly gotten a silent night's sleep since. At least there's free candy canes in the break room!
appearance: Louis is a gingerbread terrier with a peppermint belly. He has long triangular ears with a swirl of white icing on his forehead and a white triangular patch on his fac. He has five dots of icing running down each side of his body. He has round, black eyes and a curved mouth.

name: Louisa
bio: Get ready to hit the slopes and glide along as Louisa dances across the snow. This penguin princess loves to ski, it's her favorite mode of transportation. You can spot Louisa a mile away in one of her sparkly snowsuits and her hot pink skis.
appearance: Louisa is a tie-dyed rainbow penguin with a white face and belly. She has a large yellow beak and round, black eyes with short lashes. She has large, fluffy wings and wears a sparkly silver tiara.

name: Louise
bio: When it comes to setting up the table, Louise sets the bar! This hostess with the mostest throws the best dinner parties in town! An ear of corn with an eye for detail, Louise ensures her guests are well fed and even better entertained. Remember to RSVP!
appearance: Louise is a cob of corn in a light brown husk. She has a grey base with a pattern of yellow, white, blue and cyan corn seeds and a white tuff of hair for silks. She has round black eyes and a red smiling mouth

name: Lovisa
bio: Meet Lovisa. She's super smart and is studying to become an oceanographer. When she doesn't have her nose buried in a book, she loves organizing beach clean-ups, going to the movies, or cooking dinner for her friends! Would you like to join?
appearance: Lovisa is a tie-dyed magenta chameleon with a curled tail and a pink mohawk. She has a white belly, black lashed eyes, and a black smile.

name: Lowell
bio: Lowell goes out caroling every winter. At first, they got nervous singing in public, but now Lowell is as confident as ever! Caroling with friends around town or under the gazebo at the park has become one of Lowell's favorite traditions. Will you join Lowell's caroling group this year?
appearance: Lowell is a red Santa Bag with a thin yellow string tied in a bow by their top. Their top reveals multiple gifts with a candy cane and a green gift wrapped in yellow ribbons. They have black eyes and a black smile.

name: Lowry
bio: Lowry is a pale blue snail. He has a round dark blue on his back. He has two pale blue antennae and he has a bluish grey belly. He has round, black eyes and a pink smile.
appearance: Lowry is a pale blue snail. He has a round dark blue on his back. He has two pale blue antennae and he has a bluish grey belly. He has round, black eyes and a pink smile.

name: Luanne
bio: Luanne loves long summer nights on her front porch. She sits in her rocking chair and keeps a wooden folding fan handy in case the air gets too humid. Luanne made a pitcher of iced tea this afternoon. Will you come over and share a glass with Luanne?
appearance: Luanne is an opossum, the American variety of possum. She has a white head with a triangular tuft of grey fur atop it. She has a grey body with a black belly. Her triangular ears are also black. She has a light pink nose, while the rest of her facial features, including curled whiskers, are black. She also has a long, thin pink tail.

name: Luca
bio: Luca helps his best friendsLoganandLorenzokeep the North Pole safe, he is in charge of the reindeer! He helps  train them for the Reindeer Games. When he isn't working you can find him perfecting his famous spicy hot cocoa recipe.
appearance: Luca is a Nutcracker with White Hair and Red and Blue Shirt with a black belt. He has a red-colored cheeks. He has a pale wooden trapezoid nose with round, black eyes and a large black mustache. He also wears a black nutcracker hat

name: Lucasta
bio: Lucasta freaked out last year at the Halloween fair and went home early—but not this year! Lucasta promised herself she would be a brave bat all night, even on the super scary haunted house ride. She brought her pal,Ramably, so they can laugh out loud during all the creepy sound effects!
appearance: Lucasta is a teal bat with tall, pointed ears and bat wings. Her inner ears are a glittery darker teal along with her wings. She has a fuzzy, dark teal belly. Her eyes are round and black with lashes, and she has a black mouth with two sharp teeth poking out from under her mouth.

name: Lucia
bio: Lucia loves pepperoni pizza, the color yellow, and her sisters (most days). Lucia is a middle child and uses her paintings to show her feelings. Her special skill? She’s ambidextrous! This school year she plans to start an art club, will you join her?
appearance: Lucia is a hot pink lemur whose triangular ears, belly and mask markings are white. The insides of her ears, markings around her eyes and her muzzle are all red. She has black eyes ringed in white, as well as a black nose and mouth.

name: Luciano
bio: Luciano works a 9-to-5, but they also live the caravan lifestyle! They keep all their things in their van and call it home. Every weekend, Luciano drives into the mountains where they find the perfect camping spot right by a lake! By Monday, Luciano returns to their office feeling rested and recharged.
appearance: Luciano is a lion with a light blue body and shaggy purple mane. They also have a short tail with a purple tuft at the end. They have round black eyes, a white muzzle and a black nose and mouth.

name: Lucienne
bio: Do you mind if Lucienne asks you a question? She conducting interviews for her journalism class and wants to get the opinions of all her closest buds. Lucienne writes in a shorthand so she can take quick notes while still actively listening. She promises to quote you accurately!
appearance: Lucienne is a orange fish has a light orange belly, she has black eyelashes and black smile. She has yellow stripes around her body. Her gills are orange.

name: Lucille
bio: Lucille loves living near the water! She always finds new creatures, hidden gems and her favorite, rocks, whenever she goes on a dive. Ask her to see her amazing rock collection.
appearance: Lucille is a white seal with two flat flippers on each side. She has a round, pale grey muzzle and belly. Her facial features, including nose, mouth, round eyes, short lashes and whiskers are all black.

name: Lucinda
bio: Meet Lucinda, this sweet Squishmallow LOVES to volunteer at the local animal shelter and dreams of one day running an animal rescue. Her hobbies include taking care of animals, reading, and watching sci-fi with her rescue dog.
appearance: Lucinda is a llamacorn, a combination of a llama and a unicorn. As such, she has features of both: a golden unicorn horn and a white llama face with round black eyes and a triangular nose. Her body has a pastel tie-dye pattern which blends a rainbow of colors, including pink, blue and yellow.

name: Lucy
bio: Double, double, soil in trouble? Call Lucy, sorceress of house plants! This wonderful witch might not have a green face, but she certainly has a green thumb. One snap of her fingers and she can de-wilt a wisteria, hydrate a hydrangea, or even supersize a succulent!
appearance: Lucy  is a light purple witch with purple hair. On her head, she wears a witch hat with a teal buckle with golden moons and stars. She wears a black cape with golden moons and stars and a grey top and under her with a teal stripe and a gold buckle. She has black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Lucy-May
bio:
Lucy-May is all about adventure and doing as much as she can on her roller skates (she has been known to fall asleep in them!). Her favorite drink is boba and on the weekends you can find her with her crew trying new roller derby tricks.
Lucy-May is kind, creative, unique llama!
appearance: Lucy-May is a llama pegacorn, a combination of llama, pegasus and unicorn. As such, she has features of all three: a silver unicorn horn, silver pegasus wings and a white llama face with round black eyes and a triangular nose. Her body has a pastel tie-dye pattern which blends pink, blue and yellow.

name: Ludovica
bio: Ludovica is the electrifying editor-in-chief of a fashion magazine for stylish sea 'Mallows. When she isn't declaring kelp kits out-of-fashion, you can find Ludovica scouring the seafloor for the latest trends. What do you think about barnacles for spring?
appearance: Ludovica is a tan/peach stingray with large triangular fins, long tail, and white belly. She has darker pink gills and a spotted back with yellow, cyan, and darker pink spots. Her eyes are black with eyelashes and her smile is black.

name: Ludwig
bio: Log cabins and snowboarding are two of Ludwig's favorite things, he loves being in the great outdoors. He runs a ski lodge that sits at the top of a hill, so every morning when he wakes up, he can see snow-covered trees for miles around. Join him for a sunrise cruise down the slopes.
appearance: Ludwig is a teal frog with a light green belly. His eyes sit on top of his head, and are black rimmed in white. He has prominent nostrils above his wide, smiling mouth.

name: Luke
bio: Luke is the king of the playground. He is quite the social butterfly! Luke is always making friends with other Squishmallows on the swings, on the field or on the court.
appearance: Luke is a cream colored sheep with a pure white face and inner ears. He has round, black eyes with short lashes, a pink nose and mouth, and pink blush on his cheeks.

name: Lula
bio: Meet Lula. This 'Mallow makes her home in a fixed-up vintage school bus with her parents They travel cross-country to visit National Parks. Lula is working on collecting all of her Junior Ranger badges, When  they're not hiking, she loves roller skating around the bus.
appearance: Lula is a tie-dye candy pink and light blue sheep. Her face and inner ears are white. She has fluffy legs with silver hooves, between which she is holding a coral pink flower with lime leaves. She has closed black eyes with short lashes. Her mouth is black and her nose and the blush on her cheeks are pink.

name: Lulu
bio: Meet Lulu Pineapple, her favorite season is summer. Lulu loves summer cookouts, beach picnics, and going on camping trips. Where should Lulu camp this summer?
appearance: Lulu is a yellow pineapple with a big crosshatch pattern all over her body. Attached to her head is a bright pink bow and five green leaves. She has closed eyes with lashes and a smiling red mouth. She has bright pink blush on both her cheeks. Lulu has small, pale yellow legs and arms. She bears striking similarities to the edition ofMauithat wears a bow.

name: Lumi
bio: Who's that panda covered in frosting? It's Lumi! He works at a bakery and creates scrumptious cakes and cupcakes. When he's not decorating cakes or helping pick out a birthday surprise, Lumi loves to relax by playing the cello.
appearance: Lumi is a panda inside a teal and cyan cupcake liner with pink frosting decorated with sprinkles on his forehead. He has round black ears and round markings over his eyes with pink blush by his cheeks. His mouth and nose are black, and his eyes are closed in a happy expression.

name: Luna
bio: The cold can't stop Luna's dancing feet. She brings the heat with her smooth moves. Looking for a Squishmallow to lift you up when you're down? Luna is your girl!
appearance: Luna is a black penguin with a white front. She has closed, happy eyes and a pale yellow beak. She wears a pair of grey earmuffs which are extra fluffy. She also wears a blue and white plaid scarf wrapped around her neck. However, her 12" Cracker Barrel version has a blue and white tie-dye scarf with white snowflakes.

name: Lunasha
bio: Lunasha is an optometrist for mythical creatures like herself. She invented the first cyclops contact lens! It was a big challenge, but Lunasha knows how important good eyesight is for all 'Mallows. Now she wants to develop prescription goggles for her lake-dwelling bestie,Lune!
appearance: Lunasha is a lavender Yeti with a round white face. She has silver horns on either side of her head and an embroidered tuft of fur on top of her her head. She has a silver snowflake on the right side of her head. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth and pink blush.

name: Lune
bio: Waiting around is no problem for Lune — she always has a book to read. Lune loves old philosophy books that make her think. Lune wonders who she is and what kind of 'Mallow she wants to be. These are big questions, but for Lune, there's no rush to find the answer.
appearance: Lune is a light blue creature based on the Loch Ness Monster. She has fins on either side of her body and on the top of her head, blue spines running down her back, and 5 pale blue spots on her forehead. Her belly has a cord texture with the appearance of horizontal stripes. She has round, black eyes, a smiling mouth, and pink blush.

name: Lupi
bio: Ready to make a wish? Lupi stays up late looking at constellations and wanting for shooting stars. She never misses a lunar phase or eclipse, and one time she even saw a flying saucer! You never know what you'll see hanging out with Lupi!
appearance: Lupi is a white cereal with pink green and yellow strips on her bowl and she has rainbow fruit loops for her cereal and she has a gray spoon and her face consist of two eyes with lashes and a red smile and cheek marks.

name: Luther
bio: Achooo! Luther is one sneezy shark, his sneeze attacks make him sneeze 6 times in a row. This year at the science fair he's going to do a project on what makes people sneeze. Do you want to help him out?
appearance:
Luther is a shark with a ringed tie-dye pattern that is mostly blue with fragments of yellow-green. He has three fins, two on each side and one atop his head. He has a round, white belly. He has round black eyes and a small smile, as well as gills on each side of his body.
Luther also has an 8 inch stackable

name: Luvinia
bio: Meet Luvinia. This daring 'Mallow is a tight rope walker. Would you believe she used to be afraid of heights? Now she walks a rope high up above the mountains! When she's not sky high, Luvinia loves painting, listening to country music, and eating extra spicy food!
appearance: Luvinia's body is lavender purple and she has a mint belly with thin blue stripes across it. She has four wings which are holographic rainbow with blue stripes, and are shaped like blades. Her antennae are sparkly and dark purple in color. She has black eyes, pink blushing cheeks and a smiling mouth.

name: Lux
bio: Lux expresses his joy for the world through his adventurous and curious spirit. When he isn't listening to different kinds of music or exploring nature trails off-the-beaten path, you can find him making his favorite summertime treat: smoothies. Lux hopes to try every flavor imaginable!
appearance: Lux is a navy blue manta ray with cephalic horns, a baby blue belly, gills, and large, wing-like pectoral fins on the sides of his body. He has  a long tail, pink blush, smile, and black eyes.

name: Luxe
bio: Sequins, feathers, and a little bit of magic are things you'll find in Luxe's tote. She's a dancer with glitter to spare, just don't get anything on her freshly rhinestoned costume!
appearance: Luxe is a white caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. Her multi-colored bangs include pastel pink, mint and wisteria purple. The inside of her ears and her belly are peachy pink. The horn is a white with multi-colored bands in pink, yellow and blue. She has round eyes with curled lashes and a hot pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Luxmen
bio: Meet Luxmen. He's an entrepreneur! He's working hard to create his own tutoring non-profit to give everyone access to helpful education tools. Luxmen believes knowledge is power and the more we learn, the better the world becomes!
appearance: Luxmen is a black dragon with a shiny golden nose, belly, inner ears, and inner wings. He has two horns on each side of his head and a fuzzy, black mane between them atop his head. His horns and spines on his head are glittery silver. He has two large black eyes with white rings around them.

name: Luya
bio: Luya teaches a life skills math class for high school seniors. She knows teaching personal finance can be challenging, so Luya developed fun group projects for each lesson! This week, Luya's class is covering card responsibility. Ready to give a presentation on interest rates?
appearance: Luya is a midnight blue moth with fuzzy pink antennae and a fuzzy white belly. She has silver like color wings with a pattern of yellow and red spots. She has round black eyes with short lashes and a smiling pink mouth.

name: Luz
bio: Birthday parties are the best when Luz is around, she loves singing birthday songs for the guests of honor! When it’s time for cake and presents, Luz is first in line.
appearance: Luz is a piñata striped in a bright combination of colors, including hot pink, sky blue, cobalt blue, jade green and yellow. Each stripe has a 'toothed' edge, rather than straight lines. She has tall blue ears with yellow inners and a yellow muzzle shaped like a rounded rectangle. She has round, black eyes and large, crescent-shaped nostrils.

name: Luzma
bio: Luzma wants to make a tapete de arena for Día de los Muertos this year, but she lives too far from the coast to get sand. So Luzma is gathering materials she does have access to, like seeds, flower petals, and some sawdust she gnawed off her tree home. Would you help bring some glitter?
appearance: Lizma is a purple squirrel. She has three stripes on her head one orange, one teal and one pink. She has blue ears and a large fluffy blue tail behind. She has a white belly with a spider web-like pattern on her belly with a flower on top. She has round, black eyes with sugar skull makeup with floral rings around her eyes. She has a teal petal and pink water-drop-like patterns on her forehead. She has a blue nose and mouth.

name: Lyan
bio: Lyan loves creepy, crawly critters! Lyan has always been curious about insects, and he's thinking about being a scientist when he grows up so he can study them all the time. He even has an ant farm in his room so he can watch them work. Want to see his ant colony?
appearance: Lyan is an orange dinosaur. His belly and spines atop his head are a scaly texture and are a tie dye of dark and light orange. He has two white horns on his head and a large white horn on his face. He has black, round eyes, and a smiling mouth.

name: Lyca
bio: This Squishmallow was not given a bio on their tag.
appearance: Lyca is a werewolf with brown fur, tall, triangular ears, a brown mane, and fuzzy tail. Their body pokes out of a glittery, silverHershey's Kisseswrapper with the top folded over. They have a tan face and inner ears with black eyes with lashes, a large brown nose, and a red mouth with two fangs poking out below it.

name: Lydia
bio: Lydia laughs so loud you can hear her a mile away. The only thing Lydia loves more than big belly laughs is playing the piano! She performs on weekend nights with the local orchestra. It might be the only time Lydia looks serious, but she goes back to chuckling as soon as she takes a bow.
appearance: Lydia is a fuzzy, light purple sheep. Her face and inner ears are white, the only part of her body not covered in fluff. She has round black eyes with short lashes. Her mouth, nose and the blush on her cheeks are pale pink.

name: Lyla
bio: Meet Lyla. She loves to cuddle, especially when it means cheering someone up if they are sad. Lyla loves gymnastics and the color blue, she even has a lucky blue leotard. When she grows up, Lyla wants to be a dentist. She can't wait to wear blue scrubs!
appearance: Lyla is a cream-colored birthday cake with white frosting and rainbow sprinkles. She has a pink candle on top of her head and additional pink frosting at the center of her body. She has the wordsHAPPY BIRTHDAYembroidered on her belly with rainbow coloring.  She has black eyes with short lashes and a black smile.

name: Lyle
bio: Do you want to jog with Lyle? Lyle is always on the move and goes for a run at the track every single morning He has so much energy. sometimes he even runs a whole lap before the sun comes up! But if chilling with a cup of tea and a book is more your speed. Lyle is happy to have some calm, quite times with you
appearance: Lyle is an amethyst color ferret whose small triangular ears, belly and muzzle are white. His mask marking is pastel purple over his eyes with a fluffy white fur outline. He also has a purple nose and he also wears a red heart headband

name: Lyndon
bio: Feeling sick? Let Lyndon check it out! She's a medical student curious to learn all she can about curing 'Mallows. Last week, Lyndon learned why her foot falls asleep, and now she takes five minute dance breaks in the middle of a long study session to improve circulation!
appearance: Lyndon is a plague nurse who has a white mask with a beak on her face. She wears a white-collar shirt with a pink belly that has 6 pink loops that have white laces going through each one in an “X” shape.  Lyndon also has black rounded eyes with two eyelashes on each.

name: Lyric
bio: Lyric writes a weekly column in the newspaper. She reviews the latest music events in her community or discusses new bands she has recently discovered. Lyric listens to music of all kinds and writing about music is simply a dream come true to her! Want to read this week's article?
appearance: Lyric is a pastel blue squirrel with a white face and belly, a fuzzy teal tail, and fuzzy split-dyed pink and teal hair held up in buns with gold bands. She has lashed closed eyes in a happy expression and a teal nose and curved mouth.

name: Mac
bio: Meet Mac. He's decorating his treehouse for fall andCorneliasis helping him! They have snacks and fabric samples to pick the perfect curtains! He's having trouble deciding on the right shade of orange — pumpkin spice or pumpkin pie? Can you help him decide?
appearance: Mac is a brown acorn with a light brown body and a darker brown top patterned with crossing lines. He has a bright green leaf sprouting from the center of his head. He also has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Macario
bio: Meet Macario. He enjoys being in the warm sunshine and exploring the outdoors. His favorite treat is ice cream, he loves all the flavors! Macario loves stopping for ice cream after an adventure, would you take him to your favorite ice cream spot?
appearance: Macario is a blue and white, tie-dyed penguin with a white underbelly and face. He has snowflakes printed on his body with a yellow beak, and closed eyes in a happy expression.

name: Mackenzie
bio: Have you ever seen a more colourful crab than Mackenzie? She is a keen artist and loves to paint abstract portraits of all of her friends. Her two loves are painting of course and hotdogs! It's rare to find her without a paintbrush in one claw and a tasty hotdog in the other.
appearance: Mackenzie is a multi-colored paint splattered crab with a silver belly. She has two large silver claws and six smaller silver legs beneath them. Lastly, she has a black simple smile and two black eyes with eyelashes.

name: Mackinney
bio: Mackinney loves the sound of his own voice so much that he never stops talking! Some 'Mallows find this frustrating, but if you think about it, Mackinney is truly a wonder. He never runs out of things to say! Mackinney has such a gift of gab, he's joining his school's debate team this year.
appearance: Mackinney is a cream-colored rooster with white small fluffy wings with tan tips on. He has a pale red comb on the top of his head. He also has a yellow beak with a red wattle with round, black eyes. He has a dark tan patch around his eyes.

name: Madchen
bio: Welcome to Madchen’s diner! She serves up all the best comfort foods, but her regulars keep coming back for the pie. There’s something magical about it! Madchen will admit, her pie recipes are a secret passed down from her auntie. So how about a slice of key lime? It's on the house!
appearance: Madchen is a lime capybara with light green short ears and an egg-shaped muzzle. She has a light green fuzzy belly with a lime embroidered on the right side. She has round, black eyes with lashes, black nostrils and mouth.

name: Maddie
bio: Meet Maddie. She is one of the most passionate and dedicated 'Mallows out there. Maddie's friends are her biggest supporters and always encourage her to reach for the stars. She has big dreams of one day being the president of her very own company!
appearance: Maddie has a tie-dyed pink and orange body with a white belly. She has hot pink claws and pink and orange legs. She has black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Maddox
bio: Maddox is a stylist who loves to dance with his friendPoppy. He picks the look to go with Poppy's song choice and designs something new if they can't find the right piece. When they aren't in the studio, you can find Maddox playing video games with friends.
