appearance: Maddox is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. He wears a sky blue hat printed with white polka dots atop *their head, and a pale pink outfit with hot pink accents on his bottom half.

name: Madeleine
bio: Meet Madeleine, whose friends call her Maddy. Maddy is a girly girl whose favorite pastime is getting a mani-pedi with her mom and her favorite aunt. For Halloween, Maddy chose a purple nail polish and dyed her hair purple to match. Afterwards, she went trick or treating with her big brother!
appearance: Madeleine is a Caucasian girl with long, purple hair, round black eyes and a smiling face. Her clothes are black and orange - a black outfit with an orange centre, and a black witch's hat with an orange band.

name: Madge
bio: Madge teaches high school chemistry. Today she’s showing her students how one simple ingredient can change the outcome of a mixture or blend. Watch what happens when she adds gelatin to her sweet and sour drink. Poof! Lemon and lime jelly dessert, anyone?
appearance: Madge is a mushroom with a pale blue stalk and a blue cap. The top of her cap is navy blue with red spots. saturated red. Her stalk makes up her body and includes a round, grey belly. She has mischievous, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Madsen
bio: Madsen can’t stop shopping! They just got their first job at the mall and it’s been really hard to save money so far. Everywhere Madsen turns, there’s something distracting in a window display, and the next thing you know, they bought a new tote bag! Do you have any financial advice for Madsen?
appearance: Madsen is an aqua mothman, a humanoid cryptid creature that resembles a large bird. They have short, fuzzy ears that protrude from the top of their head and bat-like wings on either side of their body. their ears and belly are white and fuzzy and they have round, black eyes rimmed with red. They have a small black smile and two pink cheeks.

name: Madven
bio: Madven attends all the local music shows in her town. She loves collecting the band t-shirts! Madven has almost 100 tees in her collection and she personalizes each of them with different cuts and even little jewels! Do you want Madven to customize a shirt for you?
appearance: Madven is a cream-colored meerkat with brown inner ears, eye markings and tipped tail. She has a white belly and face. She has rounded ears, a long tail, and three tan stripes at her back. She has black eyes with white rings around them, a black nose, and curved mouth.

name: Mae
bio: Mae is developing a one 'Mallow musical. It's called "Come What Mae" and is about her journey from the shtetl to the stage—then, back to the shtetl—a brief stint out West as a nuclear engineer... and finally the silver scream! Will you help her choreograph the power plant dream ballet?
appearance: Mae is mint bear cup of boba with a white lid and a pink straw. She has rainbow boba below her belly.  She wears a pink flower on the right side of her head. Her muzzle is cream with a black nose and curved mouth with black winking eyes and eyelashes.

name: Maelle
bio: Maelle loves asking questions. She started her own podcast so she can interview friends and family and ask them whole bunch of questions. Maelle learned so much about her loved ones and can't wait to expand the show to other 'mallows too! Would you let Maelle interview you?
appearance: Maelle is a pink turtle with a white belly. She has a simple face with Hot pink glasses that resemble a seashell around her black eyes, she has a simple smile. On her back is a orchid color shell. On her top she has a pink sparkly bow.[1]

name: Maeve
bio: Meet Maeve. Maeve is one of the mellowest 'Mallows you'll meet! They go with the flow, literally! They let the water take them wherever the current goes! They love relaxing with a good book and a snack. Saltwater taffy is their favorite!
appearance: Maeve is a grey aquatic mammal with small but wide flippers. They have a white snout which resembles an upside-down, rounded heart. Their snout is spotted with blue and has small nostrils the same color. They have round, black eyes and a white belly.

name: Magdalena
bio: After summer program at the 'Mallow space center, Magdalena became fascinated with all things outer space! She's thinking about studying physics or engineering so she can work on important space missions in the future. Want to watch the latest spacewalk with Magdalena?
appearance: Magdalena is berry color mammoth with a fuzzy patch of darker plum fur atop of her head. She has large, floppy ears with marbled purple inner ears and an embroidered trunk and curled, ivory tusks. She has a fuzzy purple belly and round, black eyes with lashes.

name: Magela
bio: Magela is an activist who works hard for her fellow squad members to be safe and live in harmony. Whenever she hears of a problem, she finds a way to get involved. She knows that when everyone has what they need, the world is a better place.
appearance: Magela is a white crab with a pastel, rainbow-striped belly. She has 2 sparkly, sliver claws and 6 white, tiny, legs. She has 2 round black eyes, with 3 eyelashes on each (excluding her clip-on) and a smiling black mouth.

name: Maggie
bio: Maggie is no ordinary stingray, she's a stingray with a degree! Maggie just received her Masters in PA and can't wait to start helping people. This helpful stingray loves cooking, volleyball, and of course watching medical shows in her spare time.
appearance: Maggie is a light teal stingray with a white belly. She has large fins on either side of her body which are triangular in shape. She has a long, thin tail and darker teal gills on the sides of her body. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Magnis
bio: Magnis is so excited to meet you! She is always full of energy and up for exercise. Magnis makes a great running buddy because she’ll go at your pace, but will also encourage you to go the extra mile. Want to jog with Magnis?
appearance: Magnis is a light pink dog with darker pink patches. She has mottled peachy pink patches around his eyes and fuzzy, upright ears in multiple shades of pink. She has a white muzzle, with a stripe on her face and circular markings resembling eyebrows. She has round, black eyes ringed in light blue, and a black nose and mouth. Her belly is white and fluffy and adorned with a pink and blue heart motif.

name: Magtus
bio: Magtus collects lots of souvenirs from all over the world! But please ask him before taking one out of the cabinet. Magtus gets protective over these little treasures—even though some are as simple as coins or shells, it's still enough for Magtus to give you some side eye!
appearance: Magtus is a green Basilisk with a yellow-green lower jaw and belly with a darker shade of lines across his belly. He has tan horns and purple fuzz on the top of his head that goes onto his back. He has a spotted back with the spots being a holographic, dark yellow green. He has black eyes, and black nostrils with a wide, curved mouth, and his purple forked tongue sticking out of his mouth.

name: Magzie
bio: Meet Magzie. This 'Mallow's mantra is stay calm and dance on! Whenever she's feeling anxious or down, she turns up her favorite music and dances around in her living room. She loves hip-hop and punk rock! Feeling down? Pick a song and dance along!
appearance: Magzie is a pink Squish-Doo with a rainbow mane and hair tied up by two, pink, sparkly bands. Her face is white and her inner ears and belly are a darker pink. She has a short tail and a pink muzzle, her eyes with lashes are closed in a happy expression, her nose and curved mouth are darker pink.

name: Mahalo
bio: Mahalo loves Mondays! and Tuesdays! And also all the other days of the week! Just not Saturday or Sunday. He thinks it's ridiculous Ms. Marvin won't teach kindergarten on those days and plans on writing her a strongly-worded letter once she teaches them how to write!
appearance: Mahalo is a blue Sea cow the combination of a cow and a manatee. He has the body of a cow with a manatee snout, flippers for arms, and a split tail fin. His snout is spotted with purple and they have small, nostrils. He has a powder blue body with patches of blue spread around his body. He has rounded black eyes

name: Mahdi
bio: Mahdi collects seashells on his morning strolls at the beach! He uses simple home goods, like vases and picture frames, to create unique seashell art. Mahdi's most popular pieces are his lamps that are covered in individual shells. Want to see one of his little seashell nightlights?
appearance: Mahdi is a mushroom he has a purple stalk with a rainbow cap with white dots. He holds a golden star in his hands he also has a pink smile.

name: Maisha
bio: Maisha just started her own business, she makes candles! She handmakes each of the candles she sells and adds a little note to the bottom of each candle. She is always looking for new scent ideas, do you have any suggestions?
appearance: Maisha is a brown beaver with round ears and a tan colored belly and inner ears. She has a rounded, triangular muzzle in cream, with a black nose and mouth. Her eyes are closed and feature curled lashes. Each cheek has two curved, black whiskers. She has a large, flat, brown tail.

name: Major
bio: Tune in to Major's podcast every Friday night to learn about spooky mysteries and history Major works hard on recording and editing each episode of "Major Mysteries," and he's looking for a co host could it be you?
appearance: Major is a Neon green mummy. His bandages are neon green, and are wrapped around his whole body, except for his face, which is black. He also has black eyes with a white rim and a white smiling mouth.

name: Makena
bio: What's that glistening in the sun? It looks like something made by Makena! She collects jewels, shells, and crystals from the deep sea makes beautiful jewellery. Don't worry about having any copycat designs, she only creates one-of-a-kind pieces.
appearance: Makena has a pale pink body with white inside the ears and on the muzzle. Her mermaid tail has a gradient of rainbow, and her shell bra is pink with sparkles. Her mane and tail are both pink that matches her body colour perfectly.

name: Malcolm
bio: Have you ever met a soccer-playing Mushroom? Malcolm is the one for you! He's the goalie on his team and they've won the championship three years in a row!
appearance: Malcolm is a mushroom with a tan stalk and a red cap. The top of his cap is a cool red with white spots, and the underside is a less saturated red. His stalk makes up his body and includes a round, white belly. He has round, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Maldon
bio: Maldon is proud to say he's on a first-name basis with Santa. After all, he writes Santa several letters a year. Once, Maldon had to report one of his sisters for the naughty list after she hid all the postage stamps! Want to help write letters with Maldon?
appearance: Maldon is a brown fruit cake. He has white icing dripping from his head with round red sprinkles with a leaf crown and red cherries on top of his head. He has green, orange, red and yellow fruit surrounding his body. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Malia
bio: Meet Malia. Anywhere Malia goes, you're likely to find her sister,Mopey, too! When they were little, Malia andMopeyeven made up their own language so that their siblings couldn't listen in on their conversations! Don't worry, Malia andMopeywill always let you in on their secrets!
appearance: Malia is a SeaCow, the combination of a cow and a manatee. She has the body of a cow with a tan manatee snout, flippers for arms, and a split tail fin. Her snout is spotted with pink and she has small, pink nostrils. She has a white body with patches of light pink on her lower right side and on her left ear and pink inner ears. She has small, grey, triangular horns atop her head and round, black eyes with small eyelashes.

name: Malick
bio: Malick can make almost any item from wood, but his specialty is rocking chairs! This carpenter has been woodworking since he was a little 'Mallow, when he would help his grandfather build furniture. Malick guarantees every rocking chair is custom made with lots of love!
appearance: Malick is a navy blue moose with a white muzzle, inner ears, antlers to match. He has dark brown nostrils and round, black eyes. His belly is bluish-grey with a pattern of white snowflakes, dots and squiggly lines, looking like an ornament.

name: Malik
bio: Have an equation you just can't solve? Malik is here to help! Malik is great at maths and sees numbers in a totally different way. He love to make numbers make sense for his friends.
appearance: Malik is a blue dinosaur with a white belly. A ridge of dark blue spines appears atop his head. In the original UK release, this was matte blue, but subsequent US releases have given him a shiny, scale-printed design on his spines instead. He has two white horns on his head and a large white horn on his face. He has black, round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Maline
bio: Meet Maline. She has a sweet tooth, but sugar isn't good for her. She recently started baking healthy desserts that taste yummy and make her feel good! Do you want to try a yummy, sugar free cookie?
appearance: Maline is a pink capsule vending machine. She has a light pink body with a hot pink top and bottom. At the bottom, she has grey, square flip-open door on the left and a circular, gold turn knob. In the middle of her body, she has a purple rectangular window with eight spherical capsules inside at the bottom. Above the window, she has round, black eyes, a smiling, red mouth, and pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Mallora
bio: Meet Mallora, one foxy 'Mallow! She is an aspiring fashion designer by and DJs a roller club at night. She sets the mood with her remixes: just keep your hands off her "doo"!
appearance: Mallora is a bright orange fox with large, triangular ears. Her belly, the insides of her ears and the markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. She has round black eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek. Instead her ear she uses her two orange pom-pom hairs on each side.

name: Malta
bio: Malta isn't like most doctors—she's a dessert doctor! From refreezing melted ice cream to reapplying cookie crumbles, this medicinal 'Mallow helps sweet treats reach their full-flavored potential!
appearance: Malta is a matcha pastry with topped with chocolate icing with a mint swirl on top. She has black eyes with lashes, pink blush, and a red smiling mouth.

name: Maltese
bio: Maltese designs animatronic robots for theme park attractions. While he claims to love all his creations equally, his current pride and joy is the flying Medusa bunny on the Rabbits Through History helix coaster. Each of her snakes is fully articulated and some even hiss!
appearance: Maltese is a black sun bear with round ears. He has an orange fur on their chest, tan inner ears and a tan patch on their muzzle and two tan patches around their eyes. He has a large black nose and a mouth with round, black eyes.

name: Malu
bio: Malu joined her friendOmar'srunning group! She wants to start practicing for next year's city-wide marathon, and the thought of having a running buddy would be the best way. All this exercise has made Malu hungrier than ever! Want to come over for a big, healthy lunch?
appearance: Malu is a grey shih tzu with floppy fluffy ears. Her belly is fluffy with white fur. She has a patch on her muzzle and forehead the same color. She has round, black eyes with eyelashes and a black nose with her pink tongue sticking out.

name: Mamie
bio: Dance teacher Mamie step-kick-ball-changes her way through life! This feisty former chorus girl has boundless energy and a metaphor for just about everything. Though her newer students never quite know what she means by "your pirouettes are giving banana splits sundae", her older students know to say "thank you". After all, that means the look great!
appearance: Mamie is a candy pink bunny with the body covers in chocolate and rainbow sprinkles. She has a pink bowtie and has candy pink outer ears with brown in the inner ears. She has closed eyes and has a pink nose and mouth along with dual black whiskers.

name: Mamina
bio: Mamina is a red squirrel. She has three maroon stripes on her head. She has maroon ears and a large fluffy maroon tail behind. She has a velvet maroon belly with closed, black eyes with lashes and a black nose and mouth.
appearance: Mamina is a red squirrel. She has three maroon stripes on her head. She has maroon ears and a large fluffy maroon tail behind. She has a velvet maroon belly with closed, black eyes with lashes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Mandy
bio: Meet Mandy, she's best friends withPatrickand she's the happy to his grumpy. Contrary to popular belief she's not a sleepy sloth, she loves adventure and going to concerts with her squishmallow squad.
appearance: Mandy's fur has a tie-dye pattern which is predominantly rainbow. She has pink markings surrounding her round black eyes with short lashes, and her face is white and her belly have pink sequins. Her snout is a pink with a black nose and smiling mouth.

name: Mannon
bio: Mannon likes order. Just look at her desk—everything is at a 90 degree angle! This comic book artist would never color outside of the lines, and says boundaries help bring out her creativity. It must be working too. Mannon has just been nominated for a well-known animation award!
appearance: Mannon has a yellow cheese with lots of holes and a red wax casing. Mannon has black eyes and a red smile.

name: Manny
bio: Manny is quite the handy man. He enjoys picking up the pieces. He's known for building the most memorable gingerbread houses every year. He hopes to connect creativity and machines as an engineer in the future.
appearance: Manny is a white snowman with a carrot shaped nose. He wears a black top hat on one side of his head. He also wears a blue scarf sitting just over his two black buttons.

name: Manu
bio: Even if you haven't met Manu you're sure to have heard him. Manu is a voice actor! He narrates commercials, movie trailers, and cartoon characters on TV. Manu changes his voice in so many different ways, it's hard to tell it's all the same 'Mallow! What do you think Manu will do next?
appearance: Manu is a multi-colored caterpillar. His head is a peachy pink with coral antennae and round. Below his head is a rounded coral segment that protrudes slightly, a purple segment and a cyan one beneath. He has six arms with a coral, peach, and cyan arm on each side of his body. He has round, black eyes, a red smiling mouth and magenta blush.

name: Marcelina
bio: Marcelina is a commercial airline pilot! Although she's been written up a few times, she declares a strict "open window" policy in her plane to give passengers an unforgettable flight experience. Just keep an eye out for "seatbelts on" sign (that's when she starts the corkscrew)
appearance: Marcelina is a raspberry butterfly with black antennae with fuzzy raspberry antennae tips. She has black wings with a pattern of raspberry sections and silver dots. She has a pale purple belly that is striped in raspberry. She has round eyes with short lashes, pink cheeks and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Marceline
bio: Have you met Queen Marceline? This fabulous 'Mallow leads a glamorous life, she lives and breathes old school style. She loves to go thrifting and looking for vintage pieces to add to her new home.
appearance: Marceline is a brown corgi with a white underbelly and a rainbow unicorn horn. She has pointed ears with white inner ears and a rainbow tail by her back. She has two brown markings by her eyes. Her eyes are black and have lashes with a black nose and a black curved mouth with her pink tongue sticking out.

name: Marcella
bio: Marcella loves cooking for her friends. This amateur chef is particularly talented at caprese salads, caprese sandwiches, and caprese pasta! Try as she may to move on from basil, tomato, and mozzarella, Marcella can't help it. After all, she's crazy about caprese!
appearance: Marcella is an octopus in the style of a watermelon, she has a green body with darker green stripes running across her body, a red belly with black seeds, and a red flower with a white pistil. She has eight short and round tentacles on the bottom of her body. Her eyes are black with lashes and her mouth is black.

name: Marcellus
bio: You might think you’re seeing double, but Marcellus is very different than his twin sister. WhileMaritzais adventurous and active, Marcellus is more soft-spoken and likes to stay inside. He loves to build things like model airplanes, cars, and even little towns.
appearance: Marcellus is a green Squishmallow with two uneven arms on each side. His body and arms have thin, dark green stripes. He has a cluster of green spikes on his head and a round, white belly. He has round, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Marcia
bio: Marcia is an appellate attorney by day and an enchilada caterer by night. Though judges and juries never quite understand why she smells like frijoles all the time—and birthday party guests wonder aloud why the caterer shows up in designer pantsuits—Marcia wouldn’t have it any other way!
appearance: Marcia is a maroon capybara with raspberry short ears and an egg-shaped muzzle. She has a magenta fuzzy belly, round, black eyes with lashes, black nostrils and mouth.

name: Marcita
bio: Meet Marcita. She loves dressing up and celebrating friends and family just as much as the next 'Mallow, but her favorite way to celebrate is always the food. She wakes up early to prep a feast, would you like to try some?
appearance: Marcita is a pink Squishmallow with a skull-shaped white face. She is decorated with intricate sugar skull-style designs all over.

name: Marco
bio: Marco loves to play games with his friends like soccer, Go Fish, and his personal favorite, Marco Polo. He likes to spend Valentine's Day with his grandparents who always make him homemade candy.
appearance: Marco is a hedgehog with a pastel pink body, including his ears and muzzle. His body is decorated with hot pink spines which resemble sprinkles. He has round, black eyes and a hot pink nose. His face and belly are white, and he has a shiny, hot pink motif on his upper right side depicting three love hearts.

name: Marcos
bio: Marcos is writing a song about Vitamin C. The only problem? He can't find a word that rhymes with orange! Though Marcos has looked through every word dictionary in the library, the best he can come up with is 'door hinge.' Can you help him keep looking?
appearance: Marcos is a yellow orange juice box a darker orange band by his center with an orange fruit and a slice of orange on the center. Below he has a striped pattern with orange and yellow stripes. He has an orange top with a green and white striped straw coming out. He has black eyes, hot pink blush, and red smile.

name: Marcus
bio: You've never met a nicer monster than Marcus! He drives a big yellow bus and makes sure all his passengers get to their destination safe and sound. Marcus loves orange soda and uses black licorice for a straw.
appearance: Marcus is a Frankenstein, with a green body, black hair on his head and sliver protrusions on the sides of the head. He also has a simple black stitch on his right side above his eyes and a red stitch below his left eye.

name: Marcy
bio: Meet Marcy. This snazzy spotted pig can't wait to have her own set of keys because she already owns so many key chains! Marcy is always on the hunt for shiny treasures, and loves everything pretty, plastic, and petite. Next time you see Marcy at school, check out her new collection of backpack pins!
appearance: Marcy is a pig with a cream body and orange spots all over. She has a white fuzzy belly, floppy ears, a curled tail, and glittery orange wings. Her muzzle is pale pink with darker pink nostrils and her lashed eyes are black as she has a winking expression.

name: Margaux
bio: Meet Maragux. This spunky squishmallow loves the glitz and glam of the beauty world, her signature style is pretty in pink! Maragux practices her latest beauty looks on her favorite dolls (and sometimes even her mom) One day she can do YOUR makeup.
appearance: Maragaux is a llama pegacorn, a combination of llama, pegasus and unicorn. As such, she has features of all three: a silver unicorn horn, silver pegasus wings and a white llama face with round black eyes and a triangular nose. Her body has a purple-pink tie-dye pattern.

name: Margie
bio: Margie is the head of Boo Scary, an advocacy group that opposes excessive spookiness in Halloween decor. She prefers friendly ghosts to fearsome ghouls, cute bats to bloodthirsty vampires, and won't rest until every cackling lawn with has its batteries removed!
appearance: Margie is an orange pumpkin with thin vertical stripes. She has closed eyes with short lashes and a smiling mouth. There is a black stem on her head and a triangular pattern of black. She wears a pair of hot pink demon wings, and a demon horn headband.

name: Maria
bio: Need a weather update? Meet Maria, meteorologist at the local news station. She loves her job, rain or shine! But when the sun is out, Maria rides her bright yellow beach cruiser on the boardwalk, and always grabs a passionfruit ice cream after!
appearance: Maria's coat is a light golden color and is covered in brown leopard spots with a dark brown outline. She has a white belly and snout with a pink nose and mouth. Her inner ears are glittery gold. She has round black eyes with simple eyelashes. On Maria's belly she has one big pink gold heart and one small magenta heart

name: Maria Del Mar
bio: Maria del Mar has a birth name, but she created another one for herself! No offense to her loving parents, but the name Maria del Mar just captures her better. Plus, part of growing up means making your own decisions. And giving herself a name she chose is a great start!
appearance: Maria Del Mar is a jackalope, a mythical creature that is a jackrabbit with antelope antlers. She has a plum body and long, vertical ears with lavender ears. She has two sparkling silver antlers with two points each between her ears. She has a lavender, belly and tail. She has round, black eyes and a plum nose and mouth.

name: Mariah
bio: Have you met Mariah? This little lamb loves horseback riding and horchata and will always have your back. Mariah's favorite place to visit is the stables with her pony named Bernard!
appearance: Mariah is a sheep with a tie-dyed rainbow pattern. Her face and inner ears are creamy white. She has round black eyes with short lashes, as well as a black mouth. She also has a pastel pink, heart-shaped nose.

name: Mariam
bio: Mariam paints an array of self-portraits using watercolors. Each portrait has variations on the other, either with a different color palette or background, but she always keeps the same pose. You can catch her art displayed in galleries downtown. Want to go appreciate Mariam's art?
appearance: Mariam is a light green to blue gradient jellyfish with dark blue spots. She has a white belly, round black eyes and a smiling mouth. The end of her bell has a wavy design and is deep blue on the underside. Her tentacles are made from green, light blue and dark blue ribbon.

name: Mariana
bio: Mariana is a graduate student working on a master's degree in psychology! Mari has always known she wanted to be a therapist, and when she isn't studying at the dinner table, she's practicing her nail art! This week, Mari is painting her talons with green glitter tips.
appearance: Mariana is a bright blue bird with a light blue belly and white surroundings around both of her eyes. She has a bundle of purple, yellow and pink feathers atop her head and fluffy, bright blue wings on either side sticking out. She has a very large beak which is yellow with a pink and orange stripe. She also has pink cheeks next to her eyes.

name: Mariano
bio: Mariano coaches #1 team in professional 'mallow soccer league. He knows that patience and consistency can make anything possible, and it's that mindset that helped him build the right squad! Off the field, Mariano is also working on his memoirs. He hopes you read it!
appearance: Mariano is a multicolor chameleon with a glittery blue frill on his head and he has a tail with the same color. His three stripes on his back also is glittery blue. He face consists of two large white eyes with black circles inside, he has a simple black smile.

name: Marianovella
bio: Meet Marianovella. This nimble narwhal is full of creative ideas thanks to her love of food, fun, and fashion. Sometimes she finds inspiration where she least expects it. If you want someone to get creative with, grab a pizza and give her a call!
appearance: Marianovella is a narwhal with a pattern of pastel rainbow stripes running diagonally. She has a fin on either side of her body and a tail with two large flukes. A short, sparkly silver horn protrudes from her head and she has a plain white belly. She has sparkling black eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Maribel
bio: Original:Maribel has always loved going on trips and exploring new places! Her family has travelled all around the country in their RV, visiting national parks, monuments and historic sites. Join her on an adventure!
appearance: Maribel's body is light pink and she has a white belly with thin pink stripes across it. Her wings and antenna are a combination of candy pink and sparkly pale violet colors, the former being the pom poms and the outside of her wings, the latter being the stalks and inner wings. She has black eyes with two short eyelashes on each, pink blushing cheeks and a smiling mouth.

name: Mariel
bio: Mariel "doesn't like" Valentine's Day. If you've ever seen her wandering the flowers + chocolate aisle of the local grocery store, just know she probably "got lost" looking for something more authentic, like bandages or oatmeal. And don't even get her started on rom-coms—they're so "foolish" they make her cry!
appearance: Mariel is a black cat with a light blue belly black inner ears. She has a long tail and tall, pointed ears with white whiskers. She wears a black bucket hat with a melting heart in the center. She has mischievous black eyes with lashes and a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Marilyn
bio: Marilyn can't wait for the country sock hop! She heard the theme is Party at the Wetlands and bought a nifty white skirt to look just like an egret, her favorite coastal bird. All she needs now is  a date to go with—Bradalready asked her, but what do you think aboutSalami?
appearance: Marilyn is an emerald green pickle with embroidered markings all over her body. She has an emerald green stem poking out of her top, and round, black eyes with short lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Marina
bio: Marina’s favorite color is pink and one day she wants to be a model. She loves playing football, riding dirt bikes, and spending time with her cousinConnor.
appearance: Marina is mostly white with patches of black on her lower right side, her lower left side, over her right eye, and on the back of her right ear. She has small, pale pink horns and oval black eyes. Her muzzle is white with black nostrils. She has black hooves and a white tail that has a black tip. There is a large pink flower and a smaller blue flower stitched onto her stomach.

name: Mario
bio: Have you met Mario? His parents want him to be an architect but he wants to be a pastry chef and bake tall, elaborate cakes. Mario has always loved building things so he can't wait to make things out of cake! What kind of cake should he bake first?
appearance: Mario is a brown dog with large, pointed ears. The top and sides of his head are chocolate brown, though the back of his ears and his muzzle are black. His lower body and inner ears are caramel colored, and he has a furry pattern on the sides of his face. His round belly is tan in color. He has round, black eyes rimmed in white and his nose and mouth are black.

name: Mariposa
bio: When fall rolls around, Mariposa starts brewing her famous hot fruit and spice teas. Today she's making a big batch of cranberry, apple, cinnamon tea, and bringing a thermos to all her neighbors—it's their favorite! What teas do you like to drink in the fall?
appearance: Mariposa is a green witch with medium-length white hair. She wears a black witch hat with a purple stripe decorated with a vine pattern. A black button-up shirt with purple buttons underneath a purple vest with the same vine pattern, under her is purple with a net pattern over it. She has black eyes with lashes, pink blush, and a red smile.

name: Marisa
bio: Meet Marisa. She deals with anxiety and can get a little blue sometimes. Luckily, she has thoughtful friends and family who always stick by her side. When she's feeling down, they hug her and remind her how great she is, and that a new sunny day is just around the corner!
appearance: Marisa is a green and yellow dinosaur with a white belly. She has three darker green stripes running down her back. She has a smiling mouth and round, black eyes. She also has a little tail and a spike at the top of her head.

name: Mariska
bio: Mariska's hot pink exterior makes her stand out in the crowd. Luckily, she loves the attention! For Mariska, this is the perfect opportunity to test out new jokes. Mariska thinks fast, and has a spicy comeback for any comment. Think she will grow up to be a stand-up comedian?
appearance: Mariska has pink fries with a yellow and white box with a fire symbol on her. She has black eyes and mouth.

name: Maritza
bio: Have you ever met a soccer-playing cactus? Maritza’s the one for you! She’s the goalie on her team and they’ve won the championship three years in a row!
appearance: Maritza is a green Squishmallow with two uneven arms on each side. Her body and arms have thin, dark green stripes, and she has a round, white belly. She wears a pink flower on her left side. She has a winking face with her right eye closed, a red smiling mouth, and pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Marius
bio: Marius takes his time making decisions-they feel so final! He researches about the topic until he's confident about the choice he make. Right now, Marius wants to invest in a new computer. What advice would you give to Marius?
appearance: Marius is a purple aquatic mammal with small but wide flippers. He has a white snout which resembles an upside-down, rounded heart. His snout is spotted with purple and has small nostrils the same color. He has round, black eyes and a white belly.

name: Marjori
bio: Meet Marjori. She loves being outdoors, but she always wears long-sleeve clothes to protect her skin from the UV rays. Her favorite outdoor activities are swimming and barbecuing. Want to meet Marjori at the pool for a splash and a burger?
appearance: Marjori is sitting inside of a beige, diamond-patterned cone. Her ice cream is red, white, and blue, with a different color on each layer of the swirl. She's smiling with closed eyes and she has little blushes on her cheeks.

name: Marjorie
bio: Marjorie is known as the queen of many things. She is the reigning Miss 'Mallow, was voted as prom queen of her high school and 'most likely to make a difference in the world.' Marjorie stays humble even with all the accolades, and knows being the queen of kindness is what matters the most.
appearance: Marjorie is a peach naked mole rat. She has a peach body and ears with a sand colored belly. She also has a pink nose with a buck tooth and two brown whiskers on each side of her face

name: Mark
bio: Motorcycles, milkshakes, and mountains are some of Mark's favorite things. You can catch this 'Mallow getting ready for a road trip or getting ready for another summit!
appearance: Mark is a dark brown monkey with rounded, white ears which sit low on his head. He has a round, white face and belly. In more recent releases, the white is replaced with a tan color. He has a brown nose, along with black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Markina
bio: Get ready for something sweet! Markina loves sugary flavors so much, she has too add some sweetness to all her dishes just to eat them. Markina brought raisin coconut rice with mango slices for lunch today. Wanna try a bite?
appearance: Markina is a violet moose. She has large, silver antlers which stand tall on her head and curve inwards. Her muzzle, belly and inner ears are all a light, purple color. She has round, black eyes and brown nostrils. She wears a grey scarf with a white swirl pattern.

name: Marla
bio: How does this ladybug keep up with the hustle and bustle of city life? Marla doesn't even know herself! She lives on the move, flying from one appointment to the next. But Marla always makes time for everything, including herself. Next on today's agenda is a self-care hydrafacial.
appearance: Marla is a light pink bug with a bright pink belly. She has two curled, bright pink antennae atop her head. Her wings stick out to either side of her and are pale pink with darker pink polka dots. She has round black eyes with short lashes, as well as a red, smiling mouth and pink blush.

name: Marlene
bio: Marlene loves vintage sitcoms and rainy afternoons. Though this certified introvert might prefer a good book to the company of other 'Mallows, she always looks forward to visits with her grandmother. Together, they play hopscotch in the yard and look through old fashion magazines!
appearance: Marlene is a pink bowl of strawberry cereal with pink and magenta strips on her bowl and they have pink fruit loops for her cereal in different shades with a strawberry on the right of her. She has a gray spoon and her face consist of two eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Marley
bio: Ready to flip? Marley's French omelettes are as perfect as her somersaults. She's been cooking eggy deligts since she was a young cub — now she has the technique down pat. Omelettes are Marley's favorite meal before gymnastics class and they help her stay strong and energized.
appearance: Marley is a rainbow bear with white hearts and a round ears. She has a pale blue belly, and white inner ears, as well she has closed, black eyes, along with a black nose and mouth.

name: Marlowe
bio: Marlowe is a history buff who loves watching documentaries about ancient civilizations. She dreams of one day climbing the Great Pyramids. Her perfect day is going to a museum and grabbing two scoops of pecan ice cream after. Ask her for a bite, she loves to share!
appearance: Marlowe is a llama with a dove grey body. She has darker grey markings around her eyes and muzzle, and black ears with pink insides. She has closed eyes with long, sweeping lashes. Her nose, mouth and the blush on each cheek is pale pink. Her belly is diagonally striped with vibrant rainbow colors.

name: Mars
bio: Mars can't wait for Hailey's Comet to come shooting past Earth again! Though he knows it won't happen for a couple more decades, this budding astronomer is already hard at work planning a watch party. What are you doing in 2061?
appearance: Mars is a tan horse with a white diamond on their forehead. They also have a white muzzle with brown nostrils. Their mane and tail are brown, and their patterned belly is the same color. They have round, black eyes.

name: Marsha
bio: Get cozy with Marsha! She's a total bookworm and has lots of great book suggestions. Last year, she met her goal of reading over 100 books in total! Do you have any book recommendations for Marsha?

name: Marshal
bio: Marshal is the music director and conductor of his city's classical orchestra! Marshal loves composing the music for a concert with the musicians. He's known for getting really into the music and using his whole body when he conducts - even his feathery mane gets messy!
appearance: Marshal is a brown cow with a patch of longer sandy fur like a fringe. He has a brown muzzle, tan inner ears, and a fluffy, golden-brown belly. He has thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and are light tan in color. Thin brown lines mark the sections. He has round, black eyes, brown nostrils and a small smile.

name: Marshina
bio: Have you met Marshina? This cocoa queen has an imagination that is almost out of this world. From sci-fi heroines to everyday stories, Marshina is full of stories. She dreams of becoming a writer and taking the world she imagined from her head to the big screen.
appearance: Marshina is a mug, the top of her being tan, and the bottom, rim, and handle are red. She has hot cocoa inside of her, sprinkled with snowflakes and topped off with a striped, black and white straw. She has round, black eyes with lashes, pink, oval cheeks, and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Marta
bio: Marta decorated her entire bedroom with string lights, puffy clouds, and jewel curtains in every doorway—it's totally dreamy! Marta can't wait to invite her bestie,Maya, to hang out in her posh new bedroom. Ready for fun time with the coolest sundae around?
appearance: Marta is a scoop of chocolate ice cream with darker brown chocolate syrup, multicolored sprinkles, and a cherry on the top of her head. They are placed on top of a tan cone with a diamond pattern and her scoop overflowing on top of it. She has black eyes, a black smile and pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Martha
bio: When Martha inherited a fantastic fortune (from her great-grandfather, who patented lotion), she decided to go on a bit of a spree, including a manor overlooking the sea. Though she lives all alone—and never gets guests—her friends in the attic are some of the best!
appearance: Martha is a jackalope, a mythical creature that is a jackrabbit with antelope antlers. She has an olive green body and long, vertical ears with dark green inner ears. She has two sparkling gold antlers with two points each between her ears. She has a dark green belly and tail. She has mischievous, black eyes and a green nose and mouth. She holds a white candle.

name: Martina
bio: Martina is a lipstick artist who shares new makeup designs on her vlog almost daily. She loves to try dramatic or bright looks to stand out. Right now her favorite combo is matte red with gold shimmer gloss, would you try it?
appearance: Martina is a fish with a pattern of wavy stripes in pink, blue and purple. Her fins are bright pink with white tips, and she has two on either side as well as a long one along her back. She has a white belly. She also has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with small dimples.

name: Martine
bio: If you are looking for a magical meal, Martine is the llama for you! Martine comes from a BIG family and got his love for cooking from his mama. He loves experimenting with old and new recipes and will make you a Llamazing meal any day!
appearance: Martine is a llama with a dove grey body. Both the insides of his ears and the facial markings around his eyes are shimmering silver. He has closed eyes with three straight lashes on each. He has a white muzzle and his nose, mouth and the blush on each cheek is pale pink.

name: Marty
bio: Have you ever met a dragon who loves to bake? It's time you met Marty! He makes the best chocolate chip cookies thanks to a secret family recipe, one day he wants to open his own bakery. He'll call it Marty's Munchies and make cookies of all kinds.
appearance: Marty is a green dragon with matching iridescent scales all over his body. His wings are green with yellow iridescent scales. His horns are the same material. His snout is a lighter shade of green and he has a white belly. His eyes are round and black with a white pupil in the middle.

name: Maruta
bio: Any dish Maruta makes tastes unexpectedly delicious! Her famous rice with coconut milk and raisins will have you going back for seconds every time. Maruta loves to cook with ingredients that surprise her dinner guests. You're invited to a special Valentine's dinner tonight!
appearance: Maruta is a gorilla, a type of primate. She has a shaggy, red mane and a pink body with a cream belly. She has small, pink ears which sit low on her head and a cream-colored face. She has round, black eyes, a rounded oval cream with black nostrils and a small, black smile. on her tummy she has a red heart which says HUG in white and ME in teal with a pink heart

name: Marvin
bio: Have you met Marvin? This mallow monster is the life of the party when he hears his favorite monster mix! He loves to dance to spooky beats. Marvin's favorite food is spaghetti and meatballs - with pickles!
appearance: Marvin is a purple monster with round, black eyes, a smiling mouth and white fangs. Both his horns and his belly are striped in orange and light green. He also has a light green patch around his right eye.

name: Mary
bio: Meet Mary. She loves softball, volunteering, and extra cheesy enchiladas. Mary holds the record for the highest number of catches on her team. Her favorite thing to do after games is go to eat with her team, they have a team meal after every game.
appearance: Mary is an octopus with a blue and purple tie-dye pattern and a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including musk pink, baby blue, mint and violet). She has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Mary Alice
bio: Mary Alice has a habit of falling apart. Between her career, the laundry, that appointment in three weeks--it's all to much for a simple tuna roll to handle! And then, of course there's the broken computer, and the trial she has to--hey, do you know any good breathing exercises?
appearance: Mary Alice is a tuna roll. Her body is made up of white rice and a red tuna slice on the back of her body. Her entire body is wrapped in a band of blacknori, or seaweed. She has a plain face with black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Mary Jo
bio: Mary Jo is always on the lookout for grumpy 'Mallows. She understands they're probably just having a bad day and loves offering them a 'Turn That Frown Upside Down' flower. Though daffodils are her favorite. peonies, get the most results!
appearance: Mary Jo is a yellow sheep. Her face and inner ears are white. She has fluffy legs with silver hooves, between which she is holding a daisy with lime leaves. She has closed black eyes with short lashes. Her mouth is black and her nose is yellow and the blush on her cheeks are pink.

name: Marybeth
bio: Meet MaryBeth! MaryBeth loves to find little spots to make into comfy hidey-holes. She's not particularly shy, but having her own quiet space makes her feel safe and happy! She has one rule -- all of her spots have to have lots of fluffy blankets! Want to hang out in her blanket fort?
appearance: MaryBeth is a blue octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different shades of blue. She has round black eyes with eyelashes and a smiling mouth. She also has a blue flower on the right side of her forehead.

name: Marzio
bio: Working freelance isn't for everyone. but Marzio has the persistence to make anything happen! This graphic designer recently created his own website and is always adding new skills to his resume. Marzio is printing a bunch of custom stickers to help promote his artwork. Do you want to see one?
appearance: Marzio is a light blue cow with a velvet fabric dark periwinkle patch by the upper left of his head and his left ear. He has white inner ears and muzzle, light blue horns. his eyes are black, and his nostrils are light blue.

name: Massai
bio: Massai enjoys being active like his cousin,Tristan. He plays basketball, football, and baseball; his lucky sweatband protects his cool 'doo. Can you guess his favorite snack - macaroni and cheese!
appearance: Massai is an orange dinosaur with a white belly. He doesn't have spines like most triceratops - instead, he has a crest of fluffy, rainbow hair shaped into points. He has two white horns on his head and a large white horn on his face. He has black, round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Mateo
bio: Mateo gives the best hugs — this 'Mallow is known for spreading smiles wherever he goes. Mateo doesn’t know what he wants to be when he grows up but he knows that he wants to help people.
appearance: Mateo is a black and tan dog with floppy ears. His body is predominantly black, with brown markings on his belly, muzzle and in an eyebrow-like pattern above his eyes. The inside of his ears are also brown. He has round black eyes with a white outline. He also has a black nose and a smiling dog mouth.

name: Matias
bio: Uphill hikes don't scare Matias. Every morning he laces up his boots for a 3-mile hike and watches the sun rise. Once he even hiked 14 miles in one day! Matias eats an avocado to keep his energy up. What snack will you bring to hike with Matias?
appearance: Matias is a badger with a white head and a light purple-red body. He has round ears with dark red inside and a pure white muzzle. He has stripes running from his ears to his eyes which are wine red, the same color as his belly. He has round, black eyes and a broad black nose. He also has a large, fluffy, dark red tail.

name: Matilda
bio: Meet Matilda. Her favorite food is macaroni and cheese, but she only likes shell noodles. Even though she's picky about noodles, she loves every cheese! Matilda wants to work at a macaroni restaurant where they only serve macaroni and cheese, would you go there with Matilda?
appearance: Matilda is a rainbow, tie-dyed unicorn with a plain white belly and muzzle. Her inner ears and mane are both hot pink. She has a twisted, rainbow horn with a sparkly texture. Matilda has large, cartoon eyes set in a happy expression. Her eyes are pink and she has long, curled lashes. She also has hot pink nostrils and a wide smile.

name: Matilde
bio: Matilde just received the strangest fortune with her Chinese takeaway! It says “low on ink, replace cartridge immediately” and Matilde reckons it’s some sort of metaphor for something. Perhaps that she’ll meet Mr. Right tomorrow, and then win the lotto!
appearance: Matilde is a mint pig. She have triangular ears with silver inner ears. She wears a black headband with a teal rose in the middle. She has a round, black belly. She has round, black eyes and an off-white snout with teal nostrils.

name: Matlin
bio: Out in the tropical bamboo forest you'll find a little ice cream shop owned and operated by Matlin! This panda appreciates ice cream more than most 'Mallows, and thinks there's no better dessert than a triple scoop of mint chocolate chip. What ice cream treat can Matlin make for you?
appearance: Matlin is a panda with a white body, a pink stripe across their body, pink ears, and pink markings on their eyes. They have black eyes, pink nose and mouth with two Sakura flowers embroidered over their stripe.

name: Matt
bio: Did you see those crazy tee-shirt designs? Yes, Matt might have helped inspire the design! He loves graphic design + fashion and aspires to be a fashion designer one day.
appearance: Matt is a grey aquatic mammal with small but wide flippers. He has a creamy white snout which resembles an upside-down, rounded heart. His snout is spotted with black and he has small nostrils the same color. He has round, black eyes and a cream colored belly.

name: Mattea
bio: Mattea is an award-winning chef who prepares a 13-course Valentine's Day dinner every year. Reservations are already filling up, but don't worry, Mattea invites you to sit at her chef's table for an extra special supper! Chef Mattea even finishes every plate with a garnish of edible flowers.
appearance: Mattea is a mint grasshopper with green wings. She has a light pink belly with magenta stripes, pink cheeks, and two antennae with shiny magenta hearts on the tips. She has round black eyes, with lashes, a smiling mouth, and pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Matthew
bio: Musical theater major Matthew is returning hope this holiday break to help direct his high school's winter recital. He can't wait to teach everyone what he's been learning at drama school and even gave himself the big "Silent Night" solo to show 'em how it's done!
appearance: Matthew is a cream moose. He has large, shiny red antlers with the same color as the scarf which stand tall on his head and curve inwards. His belly and inner ears are teal. He has a cream muzzle. He has round, black eyes and brown nostrils.

name: Maude
bio: Maude had big dreams of becoming a prima ballerina before a whipped cream incident cut her performing career short. Though she'll never portray her dream role—a gumdrop fairy in the winter ballet—she volunteers with a local dance academy to support mini 'Mallows who still can!
appearance: Maude is a maroon cup of cranberry cider with a pink label with red cranberries and green leaves on the center. She has cranberry cider pouring out with whipped cream on top decorated with maroon and pink syrup. She has a cinnamon stick on her head, she has black eyes, and a black smile.

name: Maudi
bio: You can smell Maudi before you see her. But don't worry. she's a perfume enthusiast! Maudi follows her nose around the world, discovering new and unexpected scents to add to her perfume shop. Cedarwood, jasmine, vanilla, and mandarin are a few of her favorites. What's your favorite fragrance?
appearance: Maudi is a tie-dyed blue and tan muffin with a blueberry on top of her head and a blue muffin liner below them. She has blue sprinkles scattered on her head, she has black eyes with eyelashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Maudie
bio: Maudie is one cool 'Mallow. When he isn't greasing back his mane or singing in a doo-wop group, you can find him working on his vintage red convertible. He loves bringing it to the local car show, and even just airbrushed its name on the side--The Maudie Mobile!
appearance: Maudie is a peach donkey with a white muzzle and belly. His long, floppy ears are white on the inside, and his eyes are round and black. He has a salmon mane running down his back and a matching tail.

name: Maui
bio: Skateboards and scuba diving are two scary things Maui is determined to conquer her fear of. She already checked roller coasters and rollerblading off her list. Maui doesn’t like to be scared so she tries to conquer her fears by trying new things. Can Maui help you overcome one of your fears?
appearance: Maui is a bright yellow pineapple decorated with a crosshatch pattern in darker yellow. She has five pale green leaves sprouting from her head. She has large black eyes and a smiling red mouth. She has a big, round and white tummy on the bottom half of her body.

name: Maura
bio: Maura has a weak spot for chocolate - she just can't get enough! Whenever her friends travel, they make sure to bring her back some unique chocolate. Maura wants to work in a chocolate shop someday so she can sample all the yummy chocolate.
appearance: Maura is a light blue koala with enormous, round ears. Her belly and the insides of her ears are furry and rainbow colored. She has a large black nose, as well as round eyes with two lashes on each and a smiling mouth.

name: Maureen
bio: Maureen is the sleepiest sea cow in the ocean. From the couch to the classroom, she always seems to be dozing off! Though she tries her best to stay awake, not even an extra-strong seaweed latte can prevent a nap attack. Ask her about the time her graduation party turned into a slumber party!
appearance: Maureen is a mint SeaCow with teal spots on her side and on her left eye. She has short ears, flippers, a tail fin, and a pink belly with pink inner ears. She has a white snout with teal spots and teal nostrils, and black eyes with eyelashes.

name: Maurice
bio: Maurice LOVES chocolate chip pancakes and eats them almost every Saturday. His dad makes a giant stack for Maurice and his sisters to share. One day Maurice wants to be the host for a pancake show so he can try all kinds of pancakes.
appearance: Maurice is a brown moose. He has large, dark brown antlers which stand tall on his head and curve inwards. His muzzle, belly and inner ears are all a light, sandy color. He has round, black eyes and brown nostrils.

name: Mauricio
bio: Meet Mauricio. This octopus is an optimistic romantic and his love language is food. He finds great joy in cooking for others and finds inspiration when sharing a new recipe. His idea of the perfect meal is an oceanside dinner at sunset. Can he make you something yummy?
appearance: Mauricio is an octopus with a blue tie-dye pattern and a white belly. He has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different shade of blue (including cobalt, aqua, denim and baby blue). He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Mauve
bio: Mauve is a crochet extraordinaire and is always making new clothes for her friends. She aspires to own a store one day where she can sell all her goods!
appearance: Mauve is an alpaca with a pink body. Both the insides of her ears and the facial markings around her eyes and muzzle are white. She has round, black eyes with and her nose, mouth and the blush on each cheek is pale pink.

name: Mav
bio: Mav lives for the summer! He hosts water balloon fights and bubble blowing competitions with all his friends. This summer, he's challenging himself to try a new ice cream flavor every day! Think he'll get a brain freeze?
appearance: Mav is a cobalt blue shark with a fin atop his head. He has a round, white belly and black gills either side. He has round black eyes and a small, toothy smile. He holds an ice-cream cone with two scoops, yellow and pink, between his front fins.

name: Max
bio: Meet Max the techie! This raccoon loves technology: when he isn't playing his video games or learning about cars he enjoys rocking out to his favourite band. This little raccoon is adventurous and will take long bike rides to his favourite Italian bistro!
appearance: Max is a grey raccoon with black, winged markings around his eyes. These markings are outlined in white. His eyes are also black with a white border. He has triangular ears with rainbow striped inners, and his belly has the same pattern. His tail is striped in black and pastel shades of the rainbow.

name: Maxella
bio: Maxella challenged herself to make the ultimate party playlist! She's taking her time to carefully select every song, including the order they're played. Once the list in completed, she can't wait to share with her whole squad! Do you have a song to recommend?
appearance: Maxella is a purple and blue macaron with white whipped cream on her head decorated with red heart sprinkles. She has purple and blue cream around her, and her middle is pink and her bottom is blue with her top purple. Her face consists of black round eyes and a red smile.

name: Maxie
bio: Maxie dreams of returning to his desert homeland. He moved away long ago for love and adventure. but now it's time to nuzzle back into his favorite sand. And there's no doubt Maxie will get there. This determined 'Mallow accomplishes anything he sets his mind to, like his action figure collection that's reached his goal of 100 figures!
appearance: Maxie is an orange frilled lizard, a type of lizard. And Maxie has a light orange tummy. He has a wavy smile with round black eyes and nostrils.

name: Maxine
bio: Click clack, do you hear that? Miss Maxine may have some of the most stylish wings around but she has a fierce walk like you wouldn't believe! When she was a mini mallow, she loved to wear her mom's fancy shoes and now that's all she wears.
appearance: Maxine is a fairy with bright pink hair styled in space buns and a blue butterfly hairclip on the right side. She has pale skin and a pink mouth, and is winking her right eye. Her dress has a sky blue bodice and a skirt with numerous shimmering petals, including white, pale purple and cornflower blue. Her wings are hot pink with a white star pattern on the outside, and shimmery silver on the inside.

name: Maxwell
bio: Maxwell likes to play hard to get, but he's a real sweetie at heart. He's a poet and has written some great stories. If you're lucky he'll share them with you.
appearance: Maxwell is a bright red monkey with rounded ears which sit low on his head, in line with his face. He has a white heart-shaped face, with the same shade on the insides of his ears and on his belly. He has a round black eyes and a hot pink nose and mouth. On the right side of his chest he has a dual heart emblem, with a small lavender heart on top of a larger hot pink one.

name: Maya
bio: Meet Maya the mint ice cream! She’s fresh, cool, with a hint of sweet – how all the mallows describe Maya. This marvelous mallow is the best mallow to know if you need a helping hand. She’ll give you a little tough love but always knows the right things to say to turn your frown upside down.
appearance: Maya is a mint ice cream, topped with chocolate and rainbow sprinkles. Her scoop overflows from her cone, creating a wavy pattern. Her cone is tan with a brown diamond pattern. She has round eyes with curled lashes, a smiling mouth and pink blush on either cheek.

name: Mead
bio: Mead works from home as a web developer, and loves to create a cozy environment for themselves! For fall, Mead hangs little pumpkin string lights, fills decorative bowls with pinecones, and pours their own cinnamon stick candles. How do you decorate for the fall season?
appearance: Mead is a maroon cup of apple cider with a cream label with a red apple and green leaf on the center. They have a brown rim with whipped cream on top decorated with brown and orange sprinkles. They have a cinnamon straw and an apple slice on their head, they have black eyes, and a black smile.

name: Meadow
bio: If spring is your favorite season, Meadow is the Squishmallow for you! They love the transition from the dreary winter greys to lush bright colors, especially the smell of blooming flowers. Want to hear their favorite part? Listening to thunderstorms at night.
appearance: Meadow is a wisteria purple horse with a white stripe (11") or diamond (5" and 8") on their forehead. They also have a white muzzle and belly. Their belly is covered with dark purple splotches, the same color as their fluffy mane and tail. They have round, black eyes and light purple nostrils. The insides of their ears are pink.

name: Medea
bio: Give Medea all your candy wrappers and watch her make a work of art! She knots and glues all kinds of shapes and colors together to create tiny sculptures. Try holding the jack-o'-lantern Medea just made with caramel wrappers—it's so small and light!
appearance: Medea is a green cup of hot chocolate with an orange lid, handle, and mummy wrappings around her body. Her top reveals hot chocolate decorated with green crescents and purple stars. Her eyes with lashes are closed, she has pink blush markings and a smiling mouth.

name: Medina
bio: Did you catch that flash of yellow? It's Medina on her longboard! This superfast slushie works at a coffee shop and sometimes she helps with the deliveries. She's an expert at taking orders and juggling coffees.
appearance: Medina is a yellow cup of lemonade with a gradient from light yellow to dark. On top of her head is pale yellow lemonade slush. There is a striped green and white straw poking out from her left side, accompanied by a lemon slice. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, pink blush and a smiling red mouth.

name: Meemie
bio: Do you know any good jokes? Make sure to share them with Meemie, this wacky waffle loves to share jokes. Meemie wants to be a comedian one day and help people through hard times.
appearance: Meemie is a toasted, golden-brown waffle. She has brown syrup pouring down her head and a square pat of pale yellow butter, with its own happy face, on top. She has closed, happy eyes with a pale pink blush below them and an open-mouthed smile.

name: Meg
bio: If you like camping, Meg is the mallow for you! She knows how to navigate the outdoors and makes the best s'mores you’ll ever try.
appearance: Meg is a bright aqua colored dog with upright, triangular ears. She has white inner ears and a white patch on her muzzle and belly. Her eyebrows, which are also white, are shaped like clouds. She has large, blue and green cartoon eyes with spiked black lashes. Meg also has a large nose and is poking out her pale pink tongue. She wears a large pink ribbon on her left ear.

name: Megan
bio: Megan studies chemistry in colorful, cozy outfits! They keep her comfy and focused while she makes her dream of working in a lab come true! Snuggle up and get ready to hit the books with Megan!
appearance: Megan is a pink hamster with white round eyebrows, inner ears, lower jaw and belly. She has a darker pink heart-shaped nose and cat-like smile. She wears a yellow pineapple hoodie with a crosshatch pattern and green leaves poking out at the top of the hood.

name: Megg
bio: DO NOT let the Grand High Poobah of Egg Valley deceive you-Megg isn't deviled at all! It's just a big propaganda thing meant to distract Eggites from the scrambled state of Egganda. Word on the street is that Megg doesn't even breathe fire—that was just a nasty rumor started by the First Eggy!
appearance: Megg is a deviled egg. Their white outer body has a yellow swirled egg yolk belly that has chives and paprika on it. They have round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Meggie
bio: Meggie edits videos to create little stories. When she times these sequences just right, they make her burst out laughing! Meggie also layers in her friendSebi's sound effects to add some realism to the finished clip. Want to start some inside jokes with Meggie?
appearance: Meggie is a light tan maltipoo dog breed which is a mix of a maltese and a poodle. She has light brown, floppy ears and a rounded, white belly which are both fuzzy. She has a white muzzle, round, black eyes, and a black nose and mouth with her pink toungue sticking out.

name: Meghan
bio: A career in sales isn't easy, but Meghan is just the bat for the job! This tenacious little 'Mallow doesn't let the sun or moon affect her numbers, and sells all fruit from night-growing pitaya to sun-loving melon. Come join Meghan for a sweet treat—she cut some fruit samples just for you!
appearance: Meghan is a cream bat with triangular ears and wings on either side of her body. Her inner ears. wing membrane and fuzzy belly are peach. She has round, black eyes, a peach muzzle and a curved smile which shows two pointed, white teeth.

name: Megz
bio: Goodbyes are hard for Megz! What if they never meet again? Or forget about each other? Her friends promise that they could never forget her and that they'll see her at their bi-weekly movie night, which usually calms her nerves a bit; well, that and a 45-minute group hug!
appearance: Megz is a latte in a peach takeaway cup. She has white whipped cream with caramel sauce dripping down and a tan straw poking out. She has a green band around her middle with a star anise logo design decorates her middle. She has round black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth with pink blush.

name: Mei Lien
bio: Mei Lien is the voice of  the subway. Though she hates hearing herself announce delays, she takes pride in reminding passengers to stay safe and 'stand clear of closing doors'. Listen for her on your next ride and remember to mind the gap!
appearance: Mei Lien is a golden-brown bear with round ears. She has a tan muzzle and inner ears. She has round, black eyes, along with a black nose and mouth. She has a brown label and a bee. She has a yellow flower on the right of her forehead and a yellow honey cap on top of her head.

name: Mel
bio: Mel loves dogs and spending time with her family. She goes camping and hiking on the weekends and makes the best s'mores you've ever had.
appearance: Mel is a pastel pink raccoon with hot pink markings around her eyes. Above these are white marks which resemble eyebrows. Her belly and snout are also white, and there is a thin ring of white around her round black eyes too. She has a hot pink nose and mouth and a striped tail. The heart emblem on her belly has a small, purple heart on top of a larger pink heart.

name: Melani
bio: Melani is always on the move, she just can't sit still. Melani goes to school online and hates sitting down so her mom helps to keep her calm. She loves stickers and gets a sticker when she sits for an assignment. Do you want to see her collection?
appearance: Melani is a fox with a tie-dye coat resembling a cloudy blue sky. The inside of her ears are shiny gold and she has a white belly. She has a white, mask-like marking around her closed eyes. Her tail is mostly the same as her body but ends with a white tip.

name: Melania
bio: Pizza, candy, and hot chips are some of Melania's favorite things. She loves to dance and spend time with her favorite aunt. She's always the first one to sign up for the Squishmallow talent show every year!
appearance:
Melania is a purple unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. Her belly and nose are white, and her nose also has silver nostrils. She has a short, sparkly silver horn and matching inner ears. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes.
'

name: Melfy
bio: Melfy's family double checks her Halloween candy so she doesn't eat anything she's allergic to. This little ghost has a tree nut allergy, so she stays away from certain candies, but her favorite sweet is sour chews! As long as Melfy can still enjoy those, she says she doesn't mind her allergies.
appearance: Melfy is a white ghost Squishmallow with two devil horns wisp from her head. She has round, black eyes and a wide red smile with two red wings on each side of Melfy and two silver cheeks. 'Boo!' is written on her belly in silver, and outlined in light grey

name: Melidy
bio: Melidy just went snowboarding for the first time! She started off kind of nervous, then learned she was a natural. Now Melidy can't wait to keep practicing and even get some more snowboarding apparel. This 'Mallow loves cute winter gear!
appearance: Melidy is an ice cream sandwich with an orange cookie base and assorted sprinkles on top. She has tie-dyed, white, yellow, and pink ice cream between her cookie base and she wears a red headband with green earmuffs and silver, glittery antlers.  Her eyes are closed in a happy expression and her mouth is red.

name: Melina
bio: Baking is one of Melina's/Summer’s favorite things to do, her second is eating the sweet treats she bakes. She takes advantage of all eight tentacles in the kitchen and makes some of the best peanut butter cookies you'll ever try.
appearance: Melina/Summer is a peach colored octopus with a white belly. She has orange, pale orange, pale yellow, and peach colored tentacles. Her eyes are closed with curled lashes and she has a simple smile.

name: Melinda
bio: Melinda hosts 'Fins & Footlights'—a podcast about her favorite TV dance competition! Each week, she twirls through topics like wardrobe malfunctions and sickled feet, dreaming that someday her color commentary will earn her a spot on the judges' panel. She even has the perfect sequin blazer picked out, just in case!
appearance: Melinda has a cyan body with a cyan belly. She has multiple single-colored shades of blue stripes around her body from top to bottom. She has light blue cat ears with pink inner ears. She has two light blue fins with ocean blue border. Her face black eyes with a white and a pink smile and mouth with two whiskers on each side.

name: Melissa
appearance: Melissa is a light grey unicorn with white on her muzzle. Her belly, horn and the inside of her ears are all shimmery silver. The spiral of her horn and her nostrils are pale gold. Her multi-colored mane includes musk pink, periwinkle blue and seafoam green. Her eyes are closed and she has long, curled lashes.

name: Mellie
bio: This environmentally conscious Squishmallow believes in looking after both body & mind. Mellie always has a positive outlook and can be found exercising and meditating before the sun has even come up! One day she dreams of owning her very own allotment so she can grow vegetables for Squishmallow friends.
appearance: Mellie is a cream unicorn with a white muzzle and cream nostrils. Her multi-colored mane includes lemon yellow, light turquoise and lavender. She has a shimmery, white horn with a rainbow spiral. Her belly and the insides of her ears are patterned with pastel rainbow stripes. She has large, black eyes with curly winged lashes.

name: Melly
bio: Meet Melly. She and her best friendNeeonalove doing arts and crafts and practicing their martial arts moves together in the park. They're currently making purple and pink best friend necklaces to go with their best friend bracelets and best friend earrings! Want to join?
appearance: Melly is a white milk carton. She has a sky blue band around her middle reading "MILK" in a white font. Beneath that are vertical stripes in alternating white and pale blue, with a sky blue base. She has round, black eyes, a red smile and pink cheeks. She has a small straw striped in white and baby pink coming out from her head.

name: Melrose
bio: Melrose is the principal of an elementary school! He works to make sure school is a fun and inviting place where all the students feel welcome. Melrose even started a community garden he tends to with students in the afterschool program. They're growing pumpkins!
appearance: Melrose is a cassowary, a type of flightless bird. He has glossy navy-blue feathers with pink wattles and purple neck feathers. He has a cyan head with two black eyes with eye lashes and black beak. He also has a yellow helmet.

name: Melvin
appearance: Melvin is a light brown monkey with rounded, white ears which sit low on his head. He has a round, white face and belly. He has a brown nose, along with black eyes and a smiling mouth. In his4"ornament form he appears to be more orange, though his nose is still brown.

name: Melzie
bio: Melzie carves butter sculptures right in her kitchen! She uses a butter knife and fork, or molds with her paws. Want to know what sculpture Melzie is entering in the contest at this year's fall festival? A towering princess castle with a moat!
appearance: Melzie is a tan chipmunk with rounded ears and a long tail. There are three brown markings on her head with one on her forehead and two on the sides. She has a white mark by her mouth and inner ears, with a white fuzzy belly. Her tail is tan and has white and brown stripes with a white marking underneath. She has black, rounded eyes, a black nose and curved mouth.

name: Mentha
bio: Mentha is a high-concept party planner! from masquerade potlucks to surprise retirement parties, a Mentha function is anything but cookie cutter. Make sure to RSVP for this week's Fundraver—a benefit for EDM and glowsticks!
appearance: Mentha has a brown cookie base with chocolate chips on top. She has mint chocolate ice cream in the center. She has black closed eyes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Merritt
bio: Merritt loves to paint and recently began painting abstract portraits for her friends. She uses many of their favorite colors and adds glitter and feathers for a little pizazz. Would you like to be her next muse?
appearance: Merritt is a pastel pink bunnycorn with long lop ears. Her ears are fuzzy and rainbow in color. She has a shiny, rainbow horn. Her belly features a pattern of pastel rainbow stripes. Her mouth and triangular nose are both pale pink. She has round, black eyes with a white shine, each with three curled eyelashes.

name: Merriweather
bio: Move over. Turkey Trot—Merriweather is planning Reindeer Races! This Christmas Eve holiday event will feature a sled race, a cookie-eating race, a race to wrap presents and the best of all—the one home to leave cookies out for Santa!
appearance: Merriweather is a brown cookie shaped like a Christmas tree. Their face is covered in mint frosting with white icing on their lower body which contains red, green and yellow ornaments and stars. They have a yellow candy star on top of the head. They have, round black eyes and a red smile.

name: Merry
bio: Hi! My name is Merry! My mini and I love to play tag and chase our tails in circles.
appearance: Merry is a yellow dog with a rainbow bow on their head. They have black eyes with a winking expression, nose, and mouth with a pink tongue sticking out. They have a pouch on their belly with a baby that is nearly identical to Merry, the only differences being their face and that they do not have a pouch.

name: Meryl
bio: Meryl doesn't just dive through water--she dives through history. This deep sea archaeologist loves scouring the ocean floor for rare and ancient artifacts. She once found a vintage disco ball from a sunken cruise ship and it made her year totally groovy!
appearance: Meryl is a light purple seal with two flat flippers on each side. She has a round, white muzzle and the belly is white with pink and lavender tie dye. She has facial features, including nose, mouth, round eyes, short lashes and whiskers are all black.

name: Metta
bio: Metta studies orthopedic medicine! She's fascinated by how bones grow and heal, and would like to remind us all to get enough calcium. Can you guess Metta's favorite bone? It's the funny bone. of course!
appearance: Metta is an indigo cat. She has an indigo body with galaxy patches with starbursts. She has one galaxy patch over her left an on her lower right body. She has a silver moon and stars on the left side of her body. She has closed eyes, black whiskers, and a happy, pink cat mouth.

name: Mexican Corn Señor
bio: This Squishmallow doesn’t have a bio.
appearance: This Squishmallow is a bright yellow cob of corn in a green husk. He wears a sombrero, has black eyes, and a black moustache.

name: Mexican Corn Señorita
bio: This Squishmallow doesn’t have a bio.
appearance: This Squishmallow is a bright yellow cob of corn in a green husk. She wears a green, red, and white striped bow on her head. Her eyes are black with lashes, pink blush, and a black smile.

name: Mia
bio: Mia is quite the little camper; who needs an RV when Mia is preparing for a camping trip with her best Squishmallows pals? She will be there to build the tent, make the s’mores and create the memories.
appearance: Mia is a purple unicorn with a matching tail. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has violet nostrils. She has a short, sparkly pink horn with a dark pink swirl wrapped around it. She has oval-shaped eyes with short eyelashes.

name: Micah
bio: Micah's favorite Valentine's Day tradition is skiing! He loves the winter months, and be able to teach all Squishmallow friends how to conquer their fears. Join him this year!
appearance: Micah is a giraffe with a yellow body covered in brown spots. He has a brown mane running down his back. He has two white horns. The inside of his ears, his muzzle and his belly are all white. He has small purple heart and a large red heart on his belly.

name: Micha
bio: Meet Micha. He's all about balance. He loves pairing sweet and salty flavors or watching a comedy right after a scary movie! Sometimes he has a lazy day after a long week of busy work or a hike after a relaxing day by the pool! He's super chill and always goes with the flow!
appearance: Micha is a green frog with darker green spots on the sides and he has a white-blue tummy, And he holds a yin and yang ball.  His face consists of black rounded eyes rimmed in yellow, he has two upside down curves and black smile and two pink cheeks.

name: Michaela
