bio: Meet Michaela. She loves birds, bubblegum and baseball. Michaela volunteers at a local shelter once a month and tries to teach the birds how to say "please," "thanks" and "home run."
appearance: Michaela is a zebra with a white body covered in black stripes, aside from on her belly. Her muzzle and ears are both black, with a lilac color inside her ears and nostrils. Her fluffy mane is the same color. She has round black eyes ringed with white.

name: Michaela the Cheetah
bio: Meet Michaela. Thanks to her big heart and how much she cares for others, she is one of the sweetest Squishmallows around. If you're ever in need of a hug or a word of encouragement, she's your gal!
appearance: Michaela is a cheetah with a pastel, tie-dyed coat including colors like yellow, blue and white. She is covered in white spots with a pale pink outline. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a pale pink nose and mouth. She also has sparkling pink inner ears.

name: Michelle
bio: Michelle is a lawyer and a clown.

name: Michiel
bio: Introducing Michiel! If it's a rainy day, you can find Michiel outside playing in puddles, and wearing her favorite rain jacket. Michiel even collects the rainwater to help her plants grow! Michiel wants to know - do you prefer the rain, or the sunshine?
appearance: Michiel is a teal snail. She has a tie dye shell colored in red, blue and yellow. She also has light pink swirls on the shell. She also has two teal antennae's.

name: Micky
bio: Micky is full of life! She's a neighborhood coffee shop barista that likes making people laugh and smile. She loves to cook and take her dog Frita for a walk to the doggie park. She's an animal lover for sure and aspires to be a vet some day.
appearance: Micky is a white unicorn with hot pink on her belly and tail. She also has hot pink inner ears and a horn, although these are also shimmery. Her very pale, multi-colored mane includes lemon yellow, powder blue and lilac purple. Her eyes are closed and she has long, curled lashes.

name: Middy
bio: Middy is a talented perfume artist who creates unique fragrances! This nearsighted 'Mallow uses her strong sense of smell to combine every scent you can imagine. From geranium and garlic to rose and red cabbage, Middy's creations are pleasing to the nose and distinctly her own.
appearance: Middy is a macaron with a pink shell and hot pink frosting and multi-colored heart sprinkles on top of her head. The tips of her shell are fuzzy and her cream between her shells is a pastel rainbow. She has black lashed eyes and a pink smile.

name: Midnight
bio: Midnight is a tour guide and spends his days showing people around town and giving directions. Since moving out west, he loves to make friends as he shows them around Frontier Town! Midnight loves kicking up his heels with his best friendStevie the Sheriff.
appearance: Midnight has a dark grey body with a blue belly and blaze. On his belly is a big "Maverick" print. He has a black fluffy mane and tail. The inner of his grey ears is also blue. He has a light grey mouth and yellow eyes.

name: Mieko
bio: Meet Mieko! Mieko is laid-back, relaxed, and cool as a cucumber! Nothing makes Mieko happier than sitting in the sun, and listening to some of her favorite tunes. When Mieko's in her happy place, she doesn't have a worry in the world! Want to chill with Mieko?
appearance: Mieko is a pina colada, a type of drink inside of a coconut. She has a brown body and a white top with an umbrella and pineapple piece coming out from the top. She has a small red flower on her forehead and pink blush on her cheeks. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Miel
bio: Miel’s birthday falls on the cusp between Sagittarius and Capricorn! It wasn’t always easy flipping between their studious and adventurous sides, but they recently realized they don't have to. Now, Miel’s off on a world cliff-diving tour—collecting research for their PhD on gravity!
appearance: Miel is a yellow goat with numerous white markings. These are found inside their ears, in a triangle pattern on their forehead, on their muzzle, and on the underside of their tail. They also have a fluffy white goatee. They have two tan horns and round black eyes. He has a fluffy white belly with yellow dots.

name: Mikah
bio: Meet Mikah. She loves baseball, red velvet cake, and spending time with her friends. Mikah wants to be an archaeologist when she grows up, and her favorite city to visit is Rome. Fun fact about Mikah: she plays the recorder!
appearance: Mikah is a pale pink unicorn with a fluffy white mane and tail. Her belly is white and patterned with rainbow confetti. Her inner ears are also white, but lack the same colorful pattern, the same as her muzzle. She has a sparkly, pale pink horn with a hot pink swirl wrapped around it. She has round black eyes with short, curled lashes.

name: Mike Beef
bio: Which of these statements is false? 1) Mike Beef invented the internet! 2) Mike Beef loves brunch. 3) Mike Beef is a survivor of not one but three shipwrecks. If you guess (2)—you're correct! Something about a childhood frittata incident?
appearance: Mike Beef is a burger made of a brown bun. His face is on the top bun has a red flag on top with a toothpick. Between the bread is a layer of mozzarella cheese, dark brown meat and pickles. He has round, black eyes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Miki
bio: Miki goes thrifting every weekend—she never knows what she's going to find! Her weakness is jackets and backpacks, especially if they match her warm color profile. The best part is, Miki regularly donates back to thrift stores! For Miki, there's no better way to recycle and reuse.
appearance: Miki a yellow cup of pineapple boba tea with a white lid and an orange straw with a pineapple slice on the right side. She has golden tapioca pearls, round, black eyes with lashes, and a red color smile.

name: Mila
bio: Mila is making moves! She has found her healthy fix through creative recipe tips, which she uses to treat her friends and family! Ready to get happy and healthy with Mila?
appearance: Mila is a light grey elephant. She has large, floppy ears with pale pink on the inside, and an embroidered trunk. She has round, black eyes too.

name: Milaina
bio: Meet Milaina. Horses and sports are her true loves, and  one day she hopes to open a rescue ranch. She dreams of a beautiful place tucked away in the hills, full of lush green fields, a babbling brook, and even a day spa for the horses and other animals to relax.
appearance: Milaina is a narwhal with a multi-colored tie-dye body. She has a fin on either side of her body and a tail with two large flukes. A long, sparkly magenta horn protrudes from her head and she has a white belly which says love. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Milan
bio: Milan loves wearing his "Empathy is Awesome" shirt! He thinks it's such an important statement that he went back and bought all 16 from the local department store, even the ones that were too big or too small. Now Milan can spread the message through dresses and crop tops, too!
appearance: Milan is a navy blue fruit bat with triangular ears and wings on either side of his body. His fuzzy inner ears, fuzzy wing membrane and fuzzy belly are purple ombre. He has round, black eyes, bluish-grey muzzle and a curved smile which shows two pointed, white teeth.

name: Milanda
bio: Meet Milanda. She loves the outdoors and goes hiking almost every weekend. Her favorite way to enjoy nature is to bring along her friendsJasonandJuniperfor a fun adventure. Want to tag along with this hiking squad?
appearance: Milanda is a periwinkle blue donkey with a white belly. Her long, floppy ears are peach pink on the inside, the same color as her muzzle. She has round, black eyes without eyelashes. She has a navy blue mane running down her back and a matching tail.Milanda is an exact replica ofFinabut without eyelashes.

name: Mildred
bio: Fish sticks and fudge brownies are two of  Mildred's favorite food. Her grandfather is a fisher man and makes the best fish sticks around. Mildred isn't allowed to use the oven yet, but one day soon she wants to make a brownie bigger then the oven, do you think she can do it?
appearance: Mildred is a baby pink owl with black prominent ear tufts and white patches on her face and belly. with a pink and purple P with wings to decorate her chest. She has round black eyes with eyelashes and has a yellow, triangular beak. She also has purple outlines on her patches.

name: Miles
bio: Are you ready to meet Miles the computer guru? This dragon loves to learn about the technology world around him. When he is not behind the screen, he enjoys building robots with his friends. One day Miles aspires to be an engineer.
appearance: Miles is a light teal dragon with a white nose, inner ears and belly. His horns, the inside of his wings and the spines on his back are all glittery silver. He has two large black eyes.

name: Miley
bio: A friend to all, Miley is one of the sweetest Squishmallows around. Her love language is taking care of others. From a simple cooked meal to a last-minute road trip, Miley is the kind of friend always to ready to be by your side.
appearance: Miley is a llama with an aquamarine body. Both the insides of her ears and the facial markings around her eyes are white with silver specks. She has closed eyes with three straight lashes on each. She has a white muzzle and her nose, mouth and the blush on each cheek is pale pink.

name: Millennia
bio: Millenia is a majorly modern 'Mallow! When she isn't reading about cubism on the Z line, you can find her creating new hairstyles at downtown. While she wasn't trained at beauty school—or anywhere, for that matter—Millennia believes success is always right around the corner in this exciting new age!
appearance: Millennia is a grey bat with velvet triangular ears and wings on either side of her body. Her inner ears. wing membrane and velvet belly are silver with rhinestones. She has round, black eyes, a grey muzzle and a curved smile which shows two pointed, white teeth.

name: Millie
bio: Meet Millie the adventurous astronaut. She shows us how to be brave and try new things, like going sky high on a roller coaster! Millie conquers her fears knowing that she will be stronger and more confident as she reaches for the stars.
appearance: Millie wears a blue astronaut suit. On her left breast is a "Millennium Force" print. Her face is framed by a white helmet with blue hinges (one on each side). She has round black eyes, a smiling mouth and a brown pony looking out of the helmet.

name: Mills
bio: Mills is a professional rock climber! He's been climbing trees and rock faces since he was a little 'Mallow, winning several national championships. Now Mills follows the good weather and focuses on free climbing mountains and boulders. Feeling brave? Join Mills on his next climb!
appearance: Mills is a fuzzy chartreuse monkey with rounded ears which sit low on his head, in line with his face. He has a pale white heart-shaped face, with the same color on the insides of his ears and on his belly. He has a dark green nose, along with black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Milly
bio: Get to know Milly! You can always find her monkeying around on and off the mat! Her family knew that she was destined for gymnastics. She was hanging on everything, of course! Now, she competes all over the world, and is expected to be the next big Olympian. It even lands on her birthday sometimes, which is August 1st! It’s fate, don’t you think?
appearance: Milly is a chocolate brown monkey with rounded ears which sit low on her head, in line with her face. She has a white heart-shaped face, as well as white on the insides of her ears and on her belly. She has a brown nose, along with black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Milo
bio: Milo is the master of languages and speaks 10 fluently! His favorite pastime is studying extinct languages and teaching them to his friends. He dreams of becoming a linguist for the Smithsonian Institution, so he can combine his love of languages and history!
appearance: Milo is a mummy swathed in white bandages which cover all of his body, except for his face. His face appears to be hidden in shadows and is black. He has black eyes with a white rim and a white smiling mouth.

name: Milto
bio: Milto dressed up as a jack-o-lantern this year! What do you think of his costume? This 'Mallow is going on a hayride tonight with his pal, and they all decided to dress up in their Halloween costumes to make the night extra special!
appearance: Milto is a pale grey mouse emerging out of a jack-o-lantern. He has medium, round ears. The inside of his ears are pale pink. He has a red nose, a black mouth, and a white buck tooth and round black eyes are framed by dual short, straight whiskers on either side of his face.

name: Mimi
bio: Mimi loves to go on early morning walks and start the day singing with the birds. She loves starting each day fresh and tries to spread joy. Do you want to know her other favorite morning activity? Making pistachio pancakes and vanilla lattes.
appearance: Mimi is a pale grey seal with white spots and a white belly. She has a flipper on either side of her body and a long tail. She has black, oval eyes and a black nose and mouth. Pale pink blush adorns her cheeks and she has shiny silver eyebrows and whiskers, three on each side of her face.

name: Mimi the Strawberry
bio: Achoo! Mimi sneezes more than your average 'Mallow, but her allergies don't stop her from sniffing flowers, or petting cute puppies! Want to know a secret? This is how Mimi maintains her pinky glow.
appearance: Mimi is mainly red with a white fuzzy belly, she has yellow seeds all around the red part of her body. She has black eyes with eyelashes and a smiling mouth. Mimi also has a bright green top.

name: Mina
bio: Who's that caticorn with the stethoscope? Mina, or Doctor Mina as she likes to be called. Mina wants to grow up to be a doctor like her mom, she wants to take care of people and teach them to stay healthy. Are you ready for your checkup?
appearance: Mina is a musk pink caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears is sparkly red, and her belly has a gold to red gradient. She has a larger than usual horn which has a pastel rainbow gradient and a silver spiral dividing it. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a red nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Mina-Mae
bio: Drawing, daydreaming, and standing up for others is the best way to describe this dragon. Mina-Mae is usually quite quiet but when it's time to speak up, her voice stands out from the crowd. Mina-Mae wants to use her artwork for good, do you want to hear her plans so far?
appearance: Mina-Mae is a dragon with a red and yellow tie-dye pattern that has deashes of pink. She has a white nose, inner ears, wing membranes and belly. Her horns and the spikes running down her back are white and shimmery. She has two large black eyes with short lashes and peach pink nostrils. Her original Valentine's edition also has 'XOXO' embroidered on her belly.

name: Mindy
bio: Mindy wants a hug when it gets cold outside, will you snuggle with Mindy to keep her warm?
appearance: Mindy is a white calico cat with brown and white patches on her body. She has a white belly a long tail. black whiskers, a pink nose and mouth and eyes that are closed in a happy expression.

name: Minerva
bio: Minerva is the founder of 'The Yearly Hear Ye', an inclusive medieval cosplay festival! No matter your costume or character, Minerva and her merry band of event organizers are happy to treat you to a week of merriment. Just keep all dark magic off festival grounds, please!
appearance: Minerva is a griffin with a mint green head that ends in feathers and purple body. She has fuzzy teal tufts on either side of her head. She has mint wings with purple tips, a lavender belly and beak. She has a long tail with a mint fuzzy tip, dark purple nostrils, and black eyes.

name: Minna
bio: Minna is a winna! At least that's what she says in the mirror each morning. She's gotten really into self-affirmations since breaking a ski at the Slalom World Championship. She's being totally chill about it though.... which is exactly what she recites herself when she isn't being chill about it! Dang this stuff really works!
appearance: Minna is a gingerbread house. She has a pink roof with chocolate as Christmas lights and swirls of icing decorating it with a chimney on the right side. She has two icing windows and a pink door with candy cane on each side. She has three layers of icing on top of her head. She has round, eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth with red blush.

name: Mint
bio: Have you seen Miss Mint in action? She's a fast horse to beat, and when she wins she loves to parade around and show off her roses.
appearance: Mint is a mint green horse with a white diamond on her forehead. She has black eyes and a white mane and tail. The inside of her ears, muzzle and belly are also white in color. She has a green mint leaf emblem embroidered on the right side of her chest.

name: Minutia
bio: Minutia appreciates the little things in life... like the family of spiders that lives on her windowsill! This year she sewed tiny vampire cloaks for each of them, because she believes everyone deserves a Halloween costume, no matter how small. Her next project? Tiny wool sweaters to keep them warm through the winter!
appearance: Minutia is a red monster with purple and black striped horns and green eyebrows. She has a tuft of green fur on top of her head, a green fuzzy belly. She has black eyes and a wide mouth with two sharp teeth poking out at the bottom with black freckles between her eyes.

name: Minya
bio: Minya travels the country in her camper van with her best friend,Brindall. They love stopping and bathing in natural hot springs, or driving to see super wildflower blooms. She captures everything on her camera and uploads it to her travel blog! Want to tag along?
appearance: Minya is a mushroom with a light purple stalk. She has a galaxy print top featuring shades of purple, pink and blue with white stars over the top, decorated with large white spots. Her stalk makes up her body and includes a fluffy white belly. She has a winking expression and a smiling red mouth.

name: Miper
bio: Meet Miper. She's studying to become a marine biologist! Did you know 80% of the ocean is unexplored? Not once Miper gets through with it! She can't wait to explore the deep seas and discover all the new and exciting sea creatures waiting down there!
appearance: Miper is a grey chinchilla with a pale grey pattern on her cheeks and belly, as well as inside her ears. Three grey whiskers of various lengths sprout from each cheek. She has round, black eyes and a light grey nose and mouth.

name: Mipsy
bio: Need to get your life together? Call Mipsy! This detail-oriented axolotl is a professional organizer. Though some think she hates mess, Mipsy and her 16 different label makers can't get enough of it!
appearance: Mipsy has an apple green color on her body with mint gills on either side of her head with light teal frills. She has small, stubby arms and a fuzzy white belly. She has round black eyes with eyelashes and a cat-like smile.

name: Miracle
bio: Congratulations to Miracle! This big-city waitress finally earned enough tips to quit her job at the meatball restaurant and enroll in cosmetology school. Though she'll miss her coworkers dearly, Miracle knows she'll see them soon. After all, she offered everyone a free perm!
appearance: Miracle is a pink Fennec Fox with white, banded markings on her eyes and fuzzy belly. She has triangular ears with fuzzy darker pink inner ears. She has a dark maroon bow on her head and her lashed eyes and triangular nose are black.

name: Miralou
bio: Meet Miralou. Miralou is an interior designer and makes every room feel calming and perfectly balanced! Even though they're a pro now, they got their start by decorating their own room! How would you decorate your dream room?
appearance: Miralou is a snail with a blue body and a plain white belly. They have two sparkly teal antennae which stand up on their head. Their shell has a blue tie-dye pattern. They have round, black eyes with many curled lashes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Miranda
bio: Miranda loves watermelon, collecting keychains, and making dance videos with her friends. This week she did a video dressed up as a dancing lobster. Miranda loves dressing up in silly costumes for her dance videos, what should she dress up as next?
appearance: Miranda is a pale purple owl with prominent ear tufts. She has white patches surrounding each eye with are edged with pastel pink feathers. She also has a white belly with three rows of feathers outlined in pink. Her beak is the same shade. She has round eyes with a white shine and curly lashes.

name: Mireya
bio: Unlike her cousinAustin, Mireya likes to keep two feet on the ground. She prefers the stage and dreams of starring in plays and maybe even a movie. Do you want to see her costume ideas?
appearance: Mireya is a dark green avocado with a bright green front. Her pit, the large circle on her belly, is both light brown. She has round, black eyes with sharply winged lashes, pink blushing cheeks and a smiling mouth. She wears a bow striped in green, white and red, the colors of the Mexican flag, atop her head.

name: Miriam
bio: Miriam is a dance instructor who teaches young royals how to waltz! She delights in helping future kings and queens fulfill their duties on the dance floor, and only asks for invitations to royal balls in return!
appearance: Miriam is a tan cat wrapped around a purple cupcake wrapper with white frosting decorated in rainbow sprinkles and a cherry on top of her head. She has pink inner ears, whiskers, nose, and mouth with black lashed eyes.

name: Mirren
bio: Not sure what your dream job is? Mirren can help! She's a career coach who loves to find job matches made in heaven. Mirren counsels 'Mallows at all levels. from seasoned professionals, to first-time job hunters She'll even teach you her fool-proof resume writing system! Ready to get hired?
appearance: Mirren is a tart red moth with fuzzy brown antennae and a fuzzy white belly. She has same color wings with a pattern of white spots with red spots and red and white curves. She has round, black eyes with eyelashes, red cheeks, and a smiling, black mouth.

name: Miry
bio: Miry dresses up every day even if she doesn't have a special occasion. Themed outfits are her specialty, and today the theme is sunshine! With this inspiration, Miry will plan her entire outfit from antennae and wings. Do you have fashion ideas for Miry?
appearance: Miry is a light-yellow moth with fuzzy yellow antennae and a fuzzy light-yellow belly. She has sunset sky like color with a pattern of yellow and red spots. She has round, black eyes, pink cheeks, and a smiling, black mouth.

name: Mischa
bio: Meet Mischa, she designs roller coasters! Mischa loves adventure and tries to design the biggest (and scariest!) rides. Her favorite coaster design is a twisted triple loop that ends with a waterfall. Will you join her on her next roller coaster?
appearance: Mischa is a red panda with a pale pink body. She has white markings including on her ears, on her muzzle, eyebrow-like ovals above her eyes and fluffy cheeks. She has round, black eyes and a silvery grey nose and mouth. Her belly and the insides of her ears are pale grey.

name: Misha
bio: Meep—it's Misha! This crazy candle loves bring random and is always looking for a new way to make people laugh. For example—saying spaghetti instead of saying goodbye, or walking like a crab to math class! Last year, she wasn't random for 40 days, and it was totally random!
appearance: Misha is a bright orange candle. On top of her head she has a yellow flame which is melting peach wax from on top of her head. She has a cream sticker with a pumpkin on it. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth

name: Misko
bio: Meet Misko. He plays guitar and has toured the world performing with his bands. When he's not writing music, you can find him trading stocks and playing video games. His favorite food on and off the road is pizza, do you want to grab a slice?
appearance: Misko is a water bear, also known as a tardigrade: microscopic aquatic animals less than a millimetre long. He has a bright blue body and six short, chubby legs, which rest over his belly. Each leg ends in three dark blue claws. His belly is pale blue and segmented with thin lines. He has round, black eyes, a blue muzzle and a smiling mouth.

name: Miss Chatty
bio: Miss Chatty is always talking about something: badminton, her hopes and dreams, what she wants for breakfast tomorrow. Though her teachers used to say "Miss Chatty, stop all  that chatting," they've learned to use her power for good. For example—bringing new students out of their shells!
appearance: Miss Chatty is a yellow ghost with a light green and black witch hat has a black belt with buckle on it. She has black closed eyes, magenta pink blush and a red smiling mouth.

name: Miss Lindsey
bio: Miss Lindsey is a hotshot theatre director who teaches preschool during the off-season! Her years wrangling stage actors left her plenty prepared to wrangle toddlers and sometimes she even casts her students in her workshop plays. The only difference? These actors get paid in juice boxes, and intermission doubles as nap time!
appearance: Miss Lindsey is a purple sea cow the combination of a cow and a manatee. She has the body of a cow with a grey manatee snout, flippers for arms, and a split tail fin. Her snout is spotted with purple and she has small nostrils. She has a grape purple body with patches of purple spread around her body. She has small, purple horns atop her head and round, black eyes.

name: Miss Vi
bio: Miss Vi is one adventurous axolotl. She loves to sing, dance, and has a wonderful imagination. She loves snacks, so her nickname is the snackmonster. She might start her own comic adventure book, 'Adventures of the Snackmonster', would you read it?
appearance: Miss Vi is an axolotl with a blue gradient, starting with light blue on top of her head all the way down to a deep indigo. She has shimmery white gills with a blue frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly. She has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Missy Me
bio: There goes Missy Me greeting the neighborhood! She loves going on for a stroll and talking to new 'Mallows, especially if she gets to meet their pets. Missy Me tests her cooking skills all the time with new recipes, and tonight you're invited to try her homemade pizza!
appearance: Missy Me is a chicken wing coated in teriyaki sauce with bump-like marks on her body and an off-white bone sticking out of her top left. She is covered with green onions and sesame seeds. She has black eyes, a black mouth, and pink blush.

name: Mister
bio: Mister is all about his me time. As much as this introvert enjoys collecting toys by himself, you can find him hanging with his bestie,Aegi. These foodies love discovering new restaurants together and would be happy to recommend you their favorite places!
appearance: Mister is a yellow dragon with golden wings, ears and white horns. He has gold inner wings, webbing in his ears, and brown fuzz from the top of his head to his tail. He has a mustard muzzle and a shiny golden belly with golden nostrils with white fangs. His eyes are round and black.

name: Misty
bio: Ready to take a ride on the wild side? Misty the mischievous mouse is the gal for you. Misty is not your typical mouse - though she is tiny, she is mighty. She loves hockey, baseball, NASCAR and horses! Her passion for riding aspires her to be an equestrian one day!
appearance: Misty is a pale grey mouse with large, round ears. The inside of her ears and her nose are pale pink. She has a white muzzle and belly, and her black eyes are framed by two short, straight whiskers on either side of her face.

name: Mita
bio: Meet Mita! She's on the shy side, but she loves nothing more than a good rock concert. You can usually spot her wearing a super cool band tee and listening to a new song. Maybe one day she'll start her own band! Want to join?
appearance: Mita is a brown badger with a light brown belly. She has a white stripe across her face and one from her nose to the top of her head. She has a white muzzle with a black nose and smiling mouth and a long fuzzy, brown tail.

name: Mitch
bio: Mitch benefits from all kinds of healing practices. After years on stage as a modern dancer, Mitch relaxes with pressure point massages on his webbed paws, and comforting yoga poses. You should see this platypus in standing tree pose! Want to join Mitch for a guided meditation?
appearance: Mitch is a rainbow, tie-dye platypus with a white furry belly. He has a blue, duck-like bill. His eyes are round and black, with two eyelashes flaring from the sides. It also has a platypus tail that is the same blue as his bill.

name: Mitchard
bio: If you're looking for Mitchard, you can find him at the ballpark! This bear loves to sit in the stadium all afternoon with a big of peanuts, muttering jokes and starting the wave. Mitchard comes off as the strong silent type, but once you get to know him, you'll find him cuddly as he is funny.
appearance: Mitchard is a light brown bear with fluffy, round ears and short tail. His inner ears and belly are made of the inside of a kiwi with a green base and black seeds, his belly also has an additional lighter green circle by the center. He has black eyes and a tan muzzle with a black nose and curved smile.

name: Mitchie
bio: Say hello to Mitchie! If you're looking for Mitchie, she's probably flying through the air doing one of her famous trapeze tricks! Mitchie is an acrobat, and performs her acts high up in the sky each night. If you want to see the show, you can be Mitchie's guest of honor!
appearance: Mitchie is a dragon with a blue tie-dye pattern, ranging from aqua to indigo, and a scaly texture. She has a white nose, and her cream blue inner ears and belly. Her horns, the inside of her wings and the spines on his back are all a shimmering pale silver. she has two large black eyes and blue nostrils.

name: Mito
bio: Mito was just selected as the valedictorian of his graduating class—and it’s causing a stir! Sure, he only takes electives courses, but he cooked hard to earn that A+ in Home Ec. And the harmonies in Novice Chamber Choir were really high this semester!
appearance: Mito is a griffon, a mythical creature that combines a lion and an eagle. His head has a watercolor pattern combining yellow and orange, which ends in a row of feathers. He has a fluffy orange tufts on either side of his head, round black eyes and a yellow beak. His body is yellow with a white belly. The wings on either side of his body match his head, with long yellow feathers on the tip. He has a long, yellow tail with a fuzzy, brown tip.

name: Mitzie
bio: History may seem boring to some, but Mitzie loves it! She enjoys learning about everyday things that may have happened in books or movies and wonders how they might have impacted her life.
appearance: Mitzie is a combination of a cat, unicorn and mermaid and has features of each. The top half of her body is peachy pink and she has large triangular ears. The inside of these are pastel rainbow colors. She has a silver horn with a blue, pink and purple spiral. She has closed eyes and two black whiskers on each cheek, as well as a pastel pink nose and mouth.

name: Mo
bio: Hop in the car and buckle up, Mo is going to take you on an adventure. He's a tour guide and loves to drive around to show the hidden gems in the neighborhood.
appearance: Mo is type of sushi known astamago sushi(egg sushi). His body is made up of white rice and yellow egg, which can only be seen from the back. His entire body is wrapped in a band of blacknori, or seaweed. He has a plain face with black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Mogo
bio: Namaste—it's yoga Mogo! This flexible butterfly loves leading classes at the gym and always makes sure to align her students' chakras. When she isn't on the mat, you can find Mogo walking her dogs, supporting the local cheer squad, or hanging with her bestie, Bill. Together, they make the perfect team!
appearance: Mogo is a peach butterfly that has magenta metallic velvet fabric antennas with a light pink tops. Her velvet wings are metallic pink with silver spots on the outside. She has a velvet magenta belly. She has round eyes with short dual lashes, pink-gold cheeks and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Moira
bio: No matter what language you speak, you're sure to have seen one of Moira's commercials. This dino directs TV ads distributed all over the world! Moira puts in months of work and preparation all for a quick 30-second spot, but the hard work does pay off. She's nominated for best TV commercial this year!
appearance: Moira is a rose-pink dinosaur with a white belly. She has pink spines running down her back. She has a smiling mouth and round, black eyes with dual eyelashes. She has two Sakura flowers on the left side of her head,

name: Moka
bio: Moka gave himself and early Christmas gift this year—a camcorder! He plans on filming his family's entire holiday celebration—good, bad, and ugly. Moka's family isn't exactly thrilled about being on cam 24/7, but Moka can't wait to capture all the memories!
appearance: Moka is a brown moose. He has a squiggle of white icing running across his pale brown belly with red peppermint and wears a green bow tie. He has a squiggle of icing on his head with red candies. His antlers are red with two brown ears. He has round black eyes and a tan muzzle and brown nostrils.

name: Molinda
bio: Molinda's favorite way to start the day is high in the sky, she flies a hot air balloon! She gets up bright and early because she loves having a bird's eye view of the sunrise. Molinda always packs a basket of breakfast and coffee and she's got room for one more, so hop in!
appearance: Molinda is a white dog with a pastel blue belly with two, triangular ears. She has a rounded black nose and mouth. She also has two black eyes both rimmed in white with the left one having a black patch.

name: Mollie
bio: Get your stopwatch prepped and have your camera reday, this is going to be a close race! Mollie is a track star and runs almost as fast as a streak of lightning. She sets records at many races and has medals galore.
appearance: Mollie has a blue and purple tie-dye splatter body. Her belly, snout, inner ears, mane, and tail are white. She has a silver horn and closed eyes with eyelashes.

name: Molly
bio: Molly loves a hug after she wins in chess! She practices very often because she loves hugs so much, will you celebrate with Molly and give her a hug?
appearance: Molly is a hot pink Hug Mee Squishmallow with a white belly. On her belly is one pink, one blue, and one purple heart. She has a pink nose with silver glitter. Her round ears also feature white markings. She has round black eyes.

name: Molly the Mushroom
bio: Molly is the sweetest and most loving 'Mallow you'll ever meet. She has a special sense for knowing when you're feeling anxious or lonely and is always there to cheer you up. She has a knack for singing bad karaoke and you can't help but crack up when she sings out of key!
appearance: Molly is a mushroom with a light pink stalk. She has a tie-dye top with shades of hot pink, pale pink, white and lemon yellow, decorated with white spots. Her stalk makes up her body and includes a white belly. She has a round, black eye and a closed eye with short lashes and a smiling red mouth.

name: Momo
bio: Roses are red, violets are blue, if you like poems, Momo's the monkey for you!
appearance: Momo is a chocolate brown monkey with rounded ears which sit low on her head, in line with her face. She has a white heart-shaped face, as well as white on the insides of her ears and on her belly. She has a brown nose, along with black eyes and a smiling mouth. A large, red heart decorates the right side of her chest.

name: Mondi
bio: Mondi judges costume contests! This Halloween professional travels to harvest festivals and office parties all across the world looking for BOO: believability, originality, and overall spook factor. If you really are the scream of the crop, Mondi might even invite you to nationals!
appearance: Mondi is a mint apple coated in pink sugar candy coating with a worm on the right side of their head. They have a purple stick sticking out of the top their head. On the left side of their head there is olive green goo. Their eyes are black with lashes with a black smiling mouth.

name: Mondy
bio: Introducing Mondy! If you like sweet treats, Mondy can whip you up a tray of the most delicious cookies ever! Mondy loves to bake, and especially loves decorating her cookies to fit the occasion. Her trademark treat is her "Pool of Peaches" cookie, which combines her siblings' love for both fruit and swimming! Want to try a bite?
appearance: Mondy is a SeaCow, the combination of a cow and a manatee. She has the body of a cow with a tan manatee snout, flippers for arms, and a split tail fin. Her snout is spotted with pink and she has small, pink nostrils. She has a white body with patches of pink spread around her body. She has small, grey, triangular horns atop her head and round, black eyes with small eyelashes.

name: Monica
bio: Playing the drums is all Monica dreams about, she just wants to rock! Though she doesn't have a garage to practice in, one day soon she hopes to pick up a pair of sticks and let the music take control.
appearance: Monica is a light purple axolotl. She has shimmery white gills with a purple frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly, as well as round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Monique
bio: Monique is a cup of mint chocolate milkshake. On top of her head is swirled whipped cream with mint and brown sprinkles. She has a mint cookie poking out of the right side of her head. There is a striped brown and mint straw poking out from the left side of the whipped cream. She has chocolate syrup dripping out. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, and a smiling mouth. She has brown and mint spots on the cup.
appearance: Monique is a cup of mint chocolate milkshake. On top of her head is swirled whipped cream with mint and brown sprinkles. She has a mint cookie poking out of the right side of her head. There is a striped brown and mint straw poking out from the left side of the whipped cream. She has chocolate syrup dripping out. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, and a smiling mouth. She has brown and mint spots on the cup.

name: Monk
bio: Monk manages a karaoke lounge. This keeps him up late sometimes, but he doesn't mind burning the midnight oil. The only thing that does bother Monk is heckling. His karaoke lounge is a supportive environment for all 'Mallows. So come on down and sing your heart out!
appearance: Monk is a black cat with a golden holographic belly with a moon and holographic inner ears. He has a long tail and tall, pointed ears with white whiskers, black eyes with white rings around them and a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Mont
bio: Mont isn't like most psychics—he's a dessert psychic! From brownies to baklava, this mystical 'Mallow can see into the future of any sweet treat. Though that future usually involves his stomach, he has yet to be wrong!
appearance: Mont is a red monster with light pink and purple striped horns that droop downwards. He has a light pink tuft of hair on the top of his head and a fuzzy belly with rounded purple eyebrows. He has purple heart-shaped blush, a wide smile with two squared teeth poking from the top, and black eyes.

name: Monty
bio: Monty loves to work with his paws. He builds his own sets and paints outdoor scenes for all his pals' short films. The painting almost look like real life! Monty even got his budMateoto help him make props. Monty can't wait until he's working as a production designer on a professional film set!
appearance: Monty is a black dog with tall, pointed ears - the right one is flopped over. He has a white muzzle and stripe on his face and a round white belly with black spots. His nose, mouth and eyes are all black, although his eyes are rimmed with white.

name: Mony
bio: Meet Mony. She loves adventures and fruity drinks! Every year she and her friends migrate south for a tropical vacation to soak up the sun. She always packs extra sunscreen, her favorite striped swimsuit, and an interesting book to read on the beach! Want to join?
appearance: Mony is a bright orange butterfly with black antennae. She has black wings with a pattern of orange sections and white dots. She has a white belly with silver sparkles that is striped in orange. She has round eyes with short lashes, pink cheeks and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Mooncake
appearance: Mooncake is a green alien. His eyes are white with black pupils and green eye lids with a black smile. He also has two green legs with antennae.

name: Moonie
bio: Moonie is practicing for his scuba diving certification! He has two training dives left before he can scuba dives around coral reefs anytime. Moonie can't wait to see all colorful and beautiful underwater life, and made a driver's promise to interact with it carefully and respectfully.
appearance: Moonie is a water bear, also known as a tardigrade: microscopic aquatic animals less than a millimetre long. He has a sparkly rainbow body and six short, chubby legs, which rest over his belly. Each leg ends in three cyan claws. His belly is white and segmented with thin lines. He has round, black eyes with lashes, a light blue muzzle and a smiling mouth.

name: Mopes
bio: Mopes had an important work meeting this morning. It took a lot of energy to participate so now he’s ready for a big lunch! Maybe Shepherd's pie? Eating a hearty meal helps Mopes cope with stressful things a lot better—like eating five chocolate churros while waiting for the bus home!
appearance: Mopes is a seaweed green alligator with olive spines on the top of his head and back. He has a large snout with sharp, white teeth, a mint fuzzy belly and black eyes that sit atop his head.

name: Mopey
bio: Meet Mopey. Mopey has an imagination like no other! Mopey is always writing down her ideas, so that one day she can make a whole book out of them. Right now, the only 'Mallow she shares her ideas with is her sister,Malia, but she'll tell you all about them too, if you'd like!
appearance: Mopey is a SeaCow, the combination of a cow and a manatee. She has the body of a cow with a tan manatee snout, flippers for arms, and a split tail fin. Her snout is spotted with brown and she has small, brown nostrils. She has a white body with patches of brown spread around her body. She has small, tan, triangular horns atop her head and round, black eyes with small eyelashes.

name: Morgan
bio: Morgan may be a monster, but underneath that steely exterior lies a heart of gold! Charity work is his favorite pastime. Morgan is also an avid swimmer and hot air balloon enthusiast.
appearance: Morgan is a black Squishmallow with slitted red eyes. He wears a red hood which covers his entire body. He has humanoid hands made from segmented steel and a red tip on each finger. On his chest, between his hands, is theSteel Forcelogo, accompanied byDorney Parkwritten in white beneath.

name: Morgana
bio: Morgana is the president of the #SorryYesSorry club! This group of like-minded high schoolers meets every Thursday to discuss positive accountability and action-based "I feel..." strategies. One thing they'll never be sorry for? All the cookies they eat at their annual Halloween party!
appearance: Morgana is a black bat with long, upright ears. Their inner ears are dark purple. They have black wings and a plaid purple belly. They have round, black eyes rimmed with white. Their red, smiling mouth is adorned with two pointed white fangs.

name: Moritz
bio: Moritz is a peach moth with fuzzy pink antennae and a fuzzy white belly. They have white wings with a pattern of pink and red spots. They have, round black eyes, a pink smiling mouth with blush.
appearance: Moritz is a peach moth with fuzzy pink antennae and a fuzzy white belly. They have white wings with a pattern of pink and red spots. They have, round black eyes, a pink smiling mouth with blush.

name: Mork
bio: As soon as the air gets cold. Mork starts craving hot chocolate! This year, he decided to make his own. It's been a little challenging getting the proportions right, and mixing in gummy worms wasn't the best idea after all, but Mork thinks he finally has the right balance. Want a sip?
appearance: Mork is a brown shark with two fins on each side, one fin atop his head, a dorsal fin on his back and a tail fin. His entire face is covered in green frosting. There is a swirl of white icing on his forehead with red candy as well as two on his belly with two peppermint in the middle. He wears a big red bow tie.  He has round black eyes, a small toothy smile and white icing gills on both sides of his body.

name: Morlai
bio: Morlai sings in opera houses all over the world. Her stunning mezzo-soprano just garnered her a record deal. She can't wait to get started! Morlai plans to sing all her favorite arias, and maybe even a few standards. What do you think she should call her first album?
appearance: Morlai is a coral aquatic mammal with small but wide flippers. She has a white snout which resembles an upside-down, rounded heart. Her snout is spotted with coral and has small nostrils the same color. She has round, black eyes and a white belly.

name: Morrison
bio: Once the leaves change color in the fall, Morrison goes out leaf-peeping! He loves leisurely hiking a path near his house and taking in all  the beautiful colors. Sometimes Morrison picks up fallen leaves and presses them in one of his big books of cauldron spells.
appearance: Morrison is a black cauldron. A bubbly orange potion brews inside him, with a black bat wing and the handle of a wooden ladle sticking out. An orange moon with green and purple stars on the side. He has round, black eyes with white rims and a smiling mouth.

name: Morton
bio: Morton works in construction! After a long day grouting brick, he enjoys returning home to a plate of coq au vin and his favorite romantic comedies. His co-workers love to join and even started a bit of a tradition--Rom-Com Thursdays!
appearance: Morton is a tan Shar-pei with short ears and a fluffy, curled tail. His ears are brown, with a cream belly. He has wrinkle markings over his face. His muzzle is brown colored, and he has black eyes, and a black nose.

name: Morty
bio: Meet Morty, he might look a little strange on the outside, but on the inside he’s just like you. Morty loves talking to his friends about his home, outer space. His favorite earth food is birthday cake ice cream.
appearance: Morty is a blue monster with round, black eyes, a smiling mouth and numerous white, pointed teeth. Both his horns and his belly are striped in cobalt blue and light purple. He also has a light purple patch around his right eye.

name: Mr. Orlen
bio: Mr. Orlen leads a jazz parade through his town every Halloween! All musicians are invited to come and join in. Mr. Orlen's parades always end with a big outdoor party in front of the town cemetery and the music and dancing go on all night!
appearance: Mr. Orlen is a red monster with white horns, a silver and black striped belly and a silver marking over his left eye. He wears a top hat with a purple stripe and a white button with a red thread. He has black round eyes with a winking expression, he has a wide mouth with sharp, white teeth poking out from under his mouth.

name: Ms. Miss
bio: Ms. Miss doesn’t get out of bed for less than ten turkey slices a day! This big city supermodel is the feline queen of the catwalk and even just launched her own line of beauty products. Look out for Pspsps—an eyeshadow palette inspired by the desert sunsets of her youth—in stores soon!
appearance: Ms. Miss is a lime cactus with two uneven arms on each side. She has green cat ears. Her body and arms have thin, dark green stripes. She has a cluster of green spikes on her head and a round, white belly. She has an orange cactus flower with an off white pistil on the left side of her head. She has closed eyes, black whiskers, and a happy, pink cat mouth.

name: Mully
bio: Say hi to Mully! Mully is a folk-music-loving mushroom. If you're ever feeling low, Mully will make you smile by strumming you a song on his banjo. If you're lucky, he might play you a tune on his harmonica too!
appearance: Mully is a light teal mushroom. He has a teal stalk with a white belly. He has a Light blue tie-dye cap with teal hearts. He also has a basic squishmallow face

name: Murray
bio: Have you met Murray? He dreams of being a master chef and is a bit of a mischief-maker. When Murray isn't assistingGinaor making his famous charcuterie boards, he's probably starting snowball fights with his cousinMisty.
appearance: Murray is a pale grey mouse with large, round ears. The inside of his ears and his nose are pale pink. He has a white muzzle, black eyes and two short, straight whiskers on either side of his face. He is dressed in a nutcracker outfit, which includes a black hat with gold embellishments, a red military-style jacket with a white shirt and gold detailing, a black belt with a golden buckle, and grey-blue pants.

name: Mustafa
bio: Mustafa isn't lonesome—he just likes to be alone! This quiet-as-a-mouse cow spends most afternoons finishing at the lake, and while he doesn't care to eat fish he catches, he does like to ask them how their day is going and send them off with a smile!
appearance: Mustafa is a white cow with grey spots all over his body. He has white inner ears and grey muzzle, white horns, and a long tail with a tuft of grey fuzz at the tip. On top of his head has a blue lid and a yellow straw above his head and dripping latte from his head. He has a light blue fuzzy sleeve with a yellow flower in the middle. His eyes are black, and his nostrils are grey.

name: Myla
bio: Myla is hosting holiday celebrations at her house! She loves decorating her apartment and having friends over. This year, instead of one Christmas tree, Myla bought lots of little pine trees so everyone could dress their own! Would you pass the tinsel?
appearance: Myla is a cupcake with swirled icing in layers of green and dark green. Red, white and yellow sprinkles decorate the two upper layers with as golden star on top. She has a red striped wrapper with a red ribbon above. She has closed eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Myrna
bio: Meet Myrna. Myrna is an ambitious go-getter who tends to take on more than she can handle. She will say yes to any plan and any friend in need, but sometimes all she really needs is boundaries and a nice nap. Can you help Myrna set some boundaries and take a relaxing nap?
appearance: Myrna is a griffon, a mythical creature that combines a lion and an eagle. She has a dark orange head which ends in a row of feathers. She has a fluffy puff on either side of her head and a sharp yellow beak. Her body is black with a white, fluffy belly, and her small, black wings are tipped with hot pink feathers. She has a long, black tail with a fuzzy, orange tip. Myrna's beak, wing tips and the orange puffs on her head and tail all glow under black light.

name: Myrtille
bio: Myrtille is a blue jar of blueberry jam with a blue floral cloth. They have a blueberry logo embroidered on their label with a white background in the center and pale blue edges. They have round, black eyes with lashes and a pink smiling mouth with blush.
appearance: Myrtille is a blue jar of blueberry jam with a blue floral cloth. They have a blueberry logo embroidered on their label with a white background in the center and pale blue edges. They have round, black eyes with lashes and a pink smiling mouth with blush.

name: Myrtle
bio: Myrtle likes pumpkin spice sorbet and caramel apple ice cream; she loves when fall flavors hit the store! When she was just a mini-monster Myrtle wanted to be a hair dresser and now she owns her own salon. Be sure to stop in for a fresh monster 'do.
appearance: Myrtle is a Frankenstein, with a green body, black hair with white streaks on her head his head and white bandages on her stomach. She has eyelashes and pink cheeks.

name: Na'lma
bio: Na'lma is one funny and outgoing 'Mallow. When she isn't taking care of her friends or making them laugh, you can find this amateur inventor building her own toys and gadgets. She hopes one day invent a cookies and cream milkshake machine whips up her favorite sweet treat in ten seconds flat!
appearance: Na'lma is a hummingbird with a magenta head and a green body and wings. She has round, off-white belly with the tips of her wings being tan. Her tail is short, and she has a long yellow beak, her eyes are black with lashes and she has a winking expression.

name: Nabila
bio: Have you met Nabila? This narwhal loves a good bargain and making someone's day. She is an expert when it comes to knitting and crocheting. Nabila uses her talent to make beautiful blankets, she donates many around the holidays for those in need.
appearance: Nabila is a narwhal with a purple, tie-dye pattern. She has a fin on either side of her body and a tail with two large flukes. A short, white horn with a silver spiral protrudes from her head and she has a plain white belly. She has closed eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Naddie
bio: Meet Naddie. This thoughtful turtle is a team player and wants to be known for his collaboration and kindness. His love language, is "acts of service" so he is always willing to lend a helping hand. Do you have anything, Naddie can help with?
appearance: Naddie is tie-dyed turtle with shades of light and dark green and a white belly. He has a simple face with black eyes and a smile. On his back is a forest green shell with yellow lines.

name: Nadine
bio: Meet Nadine. This fabulous fox is the knitting queen! Nadine loves knitting and watching movies when it gets cold outside because she enjoys feeling cozy. She also loves scary movies, but she doesn't like to watch them at night. Whenever she gets scared she hides under one of the blankets she made, they help her feel safe. Would you like Nadine to knit you something?
appearance: Nadine is a creamy white fox with large, triangular ears. Her belly, the insides of her ears and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all snow white. She has round black eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek. She has a pair of fluffy, white earmuffs with a pale pink band, as well as a matching pink scarf decorated with white snowflakes.

name: Nafese
bio: Nafese is an animal lover who couldn't hurt a fly, this is one 'Mallow who will stand up for everyone. Besides his kind and caring nature, Nafese is known for his super-speed. He might be one of the fastest 'Mallows around!
appearance: Nafese is a blue-green dinosaur. He has a pale mint green belly with stripes running across it. He has yellow spines running down his back. His eyes are round and black, and he has a smiling mouth.

name: Nahomy
bio: Nahomy is full of surprises. From elaborate pranks to well-timed frights, this spunky little artist loves making her besties laugh! As fun as her unexpected tricks can be, Nahomy always follows up with an unexpected treat. Like a random act of kindness or a surprise hug!
appearance: Nahomy is a lavender tadpole with a pastel purple belly. Her eyes sit on top of her head and are black rimmed in white. She has prominent nostrils above her smiling mouth. She has purple and lavender spots all over her body with a tadpole-like tail behind her.

name: Nakia
bio: Meet Nakia. This sleepy 'Mallow loves to nap in the long, soft grass of her favorite meadow. The sunshine keeps her nice and warm. When she's having a particularly good dream, her belly turns rainbow! She'll tell you all about it when she wakes up!
appearance: Nakia is a pink cat with rainbow inner ears, belly, and fuzzy tail. She has tall, pointed ears and a white muzzle. Her mouth and nose are pink, and her nose is heart shaped. She has 4 black whiskers, lime-green rings around her black, lashed eyes and a white shine inside them.

name: Nakobe
bio: Nakobe wrote a one-act play! He was inspired by an interview with one of his favorite playwrights who got their start writing one-acts. Next Nakobe is preparing for rehearsals, but he doesn't know any actors. Want to audition for Nakobe's stage play?
appearance: Nakobe is an orange axolotl He has 2 stubby arms, and mint gills with brown frills. He has a swirl of whipped cream on the top of his head with brown and yellow sprinkles and a mint and striped straw. His stomach has a green band around his body with a coffee bean emblem. He has round, black eyes and a cat-like smile

name: Nancy
bio: Nancy is a busybody and always on the move. If you took a look at her calendar, you'd see she's booked for weeks in advance! She loves to organize clubs, group meetups, and other fun events with her friends. Nancy tries to make every second count, what should she plan next?
appearance: Nancy is a grey ragdoll cat. She is mostly light grey, with a white belly and black, triangular ears. She also has a thick fluffy tail with brown fur. She has a black marking on her face which forms a mask, with a white stripe, shooting up from her muzzle, going through the center of it. She has round, black eyes with a pale blue iris, a pink, triangular nose and a black mouth.

name: Nanette
bio: Nanette is the captain of her high school football team! They used to be the cheer squad, but stepped up when the varsity team got like, lost in the woods for a week? Turns out, football’s pretty easy when you can back handspring into the endzone!
appearance: Nanette is a magenta bigfoot with a fuzzy mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and light pink belly and light pink pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush beneath and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face.

name: Naomi
bio: Naomi lives deep in the sea and travels very far to see her friends. While she resides in the deep dark ocean, she loves jumping out of the water to catch some rays! Her friends love her for her positive attitude, and sparkly horn. Are you ready to catch some waves with Naomi?
appearance: Naomi is a pale purple narwhal with two fins on each side and a dorsal fin on her back. A short horn protrudes from her head which is a sparkly purple with a darker purple spiral. Her belly is faintly striped with pastel rainbow colors. She has sparkling black eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Nash
bio: Nash thinks about life's big and puzzling questions. Like, if a tree falls in the woods when no one is around, does it make a sound? When Nash and his buddy, Orin, get together, they talk for hours, and sometimes they only end up with more questions! What do you wonder about?
appearance: Nash is a light green broccoli with very dark green leaves all around most of his top half. He has 2 stems with more leaves, one for each side of Nash. He has closed happy eyes and a smiling mouth, including pink blushes on his cheeks.

name: Nassim
bio: Meet Nassim. This mellow 'Mallow spends mornings drinking chamomile tea and meditating to the sounds and nature in the garden. Nassim is an amazing listener and gives great advice. Just say the word and Nassim will put the kettle on!
appearance: Nassim is a tan cow with closed eyes and a stripe of orange running through the center of their face. They have dark orange fuzzy hair. The inside of their ears are white and they have a pale pink muzzle. Their belly is peach and features splotches in a darker shade of the same hue.

name: Nastia
bio: Nastia didn't care much about school until a kindly language arts teacher complimented a smile she wrote: Sitting in class is like watching artificial grass grow. Encouraged by the compliment, Nastia began trying harder in English—then, Algebra II—now, everything!
appearance: Nastia is a turquoise capybara with darker turquoise short ears and an egg-shaped muzzle. She has a fuzzy teal sherpa hoodie with white laces. She has an off-white belly hidden below her hoodie. She has closed eyes with lashes, black nostrils and mouth.

name: Natalia
bio: Natalia is afraid of heights but she also wants to be a pilot! Even though being high up in a tree makes her nervous, she imagines how cool flying a plane might be.
appearance: Natalia has a red body and a green upper part. On top of her head is a straight piece of fabric representing a stem. Attached to the stem is a green, white, and red bow. She has black, round eyes, with a single eyelash each, along with a black, small smile. Under her eyes she has pink, round blush.

name: Natalie
bio: Natalie loves listening and dancing to music. Natalie has a record player that is very special to her, a gift from her dad! She loves having people over to listen to records and dance. What record do you want to hear next?
appearance: This narwhal has an array of colors; she is tie dye and has lots of pink, blue and yellow. She has a white, shiny horn with three colored rings of pink, blue, and yellow. On the bottom of her body, she has a white stomach. Her tail is elongated and is also pink, blue, and yellow.

name: Natasha
bio: Natasha is an independent filmmaker! To date, she's completed five short films, and is currently in pre-production on her first full-length feature. This is going to be a sci-fi movie so she needs lots of extras to play the aliens! Want to be in Natasha's new movie?
appearance: Natasha is a s'more. She has a cyan marshmallow sandwiched between chocolate and graham crackers. Atop her head is pink chocolate that melts downward. On her head she has some dark brown holes dispersed throughout it. There is purple chocolate that stretches around her body on the bottom. Under the patch of chocolate is another graham cracker with a scar on the right side. She has closed eyes with short black lashes, a smiling red mouth, and round blue cheeks.

name: Nate
bio: Nate is a yellow dog poking out of a half peeled banana. He has a yellow banana head with yellow fuzzy ears with a yellow muzzle. He has a yellow base below his body with yellow peels with lighter yellow. He has round, black eyes with a black nose and mouth.
appearance: Nate is a yellow dog poking out of a half peeled banana. He has a yellow banana head with yellow fuzzy ears with a yellow muzzle. He has a yellow base below his body with yellow peels with lighter yellow. He has round, black eyes with a black nose and mouth.

name: Nathan
bio: Who loves oranges and tacos and is ready to keep you company? Nathan! This Squishmallow may be an introvert but he's always ready to curl up for a movie or have an adventure in the latest video game (as long as there are tacos nearby)!
appearance: Nathan is a ginger tabby cat with a light brown body and darker stripes on his head and sides. He has a white belly and inner ears the same color. His nose and mouth are pale pink, framed by black whiskers, and his eyes are closed.

name: Nathaniel
bio: He loves to swim, rap, and is a big sci-fi  fanatic. He considers himself an aspiring artist who just happens to rap about nerd life. One thing specifically, dressing up in cosplay with his family. Would you like to hear what he's working on?
appearance: Nathaniel is a Black Cocker Spaniel with Black Fluffy Ears. White marking on his nose with white fluffy belly. He has Black Nose.

name: Natnat
bio: No one in the galaxy throws parties like Natnat! This little alien is pro at making every 'Mallow smile, and with her 'we got this' attitude. It's no wonder 'Mallows far and wide can't help but join in the fun. All this celebrating would make anyone tired, so Natnat keeps her energy up with a hot cup of green tea always in hand!
appearance: Natnat is a pastel blue alien with bluish-grey speckle. She has a white tummy and round, black eyes with lashes eyes. She has two antennae on top of her head that flop around dramatically. She wear a sunflower crown with green leaves.

name: Nattie the Axolotl
bio: (no bio given on tag)
appearance: Nattie is white with white arms at her sides. She has fluffy rainbow-colored gills and a glittery silver crown. She is also wearing a silver Hershey's Kisses' wrapper on her lower half.

name: Natty
bio: Natty enjoys finding new ways of filming a scene. Last week, Natty rigged her camera to the front of her bike and peddled towards her friendFitchwhile he was making a scary face. Natty thought this gave the scene a really cool effect!
appearance: Natty is a retriever mix dog breed with round black eyes with a white outline. She also has a black nose and a smiling dog mouth and a black belly with white fur on it.

name: Navina
bio: Painting is one of Navina's favourite forms of self-care. She likes to use beautiful, bright colours that look almost life-like. She loves creating art that almost comes alive when you look at it! What should Navina paint next?
appearance: Navina is an octopus with a rainbow tie-dye pattern and a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including blue, green, yellow and pink). A white horn with a rainbow spiral protrudes from her head. She has round, black eyes a smiling mouth.

name: Navina the Narwhal
bio: Painting is one of Navina's favourite forms of self-care. She likes to use beautiful, bright colours that look almost life-like. She loves creating art that almost comes alive when you look at it! What should Navina paint next?
appearance: Navina is a tie-dyed rainbow narwhal with two fins on each side. A long horn protrudes from her head, white with a silver spiral. Her belly is also white, decorated with flecks of silver. She has closed eyes with lashes sweeping downwards and a smiling mouth.

name: Naya
bio: Saxophones and seahorses are two things Naya loves. She just started playing the saxophone after begging her mom for weeks! Some of Naya's family play together in her garage so she wants to join the band.
appearance: Naya is a fox with a tie-dyed coat featuring rainbow colors, predominantly pink, yellow and blue. She has large, triangular ears, the inside of which are white with silver glitter. She has white markings on her face, including a round muzzle and fluffy cheeks. Her belly, which has silver glitter, and the markings on her tail are also white. She has closed, happy eyes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Nebula
bio: Meet Nebula. She loves painting and learning about microorganisms. Nebula's parents are scientists and they gave her a microscope kit to learn more about the tiny organisms in her world. Sometimes she paints the cool things she sees and shares them with her friends. Can you name a microorganism she should paint?
appearance: Nebula is a rainbow, tie-dyed unicorn with a pattern of stars covering her body. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly white horn with a darker pink swirl wrapped around it. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes and a vibrant rainbow mane.

name: Nedison
bio: Nedison builds houses! He believes every 'Mallow deserves to live in the house of their dreams, so Nedison and his team work hard to make sure that happens, Want Nedison to give you a tour of the latest house he helped build?
appearance: Nedison is a jar of orange peanut butter with a red cap and label. On the label, there are two peanuts. He also has two black closed eyes, and a pink smile.

name: Neely
bio: Neely really lives her dreams. Sometimes a dream moment will actually happen to her in real life! Neely even started writing a dream journal so she could keep up. Her favorite dream-turned-into reality moment was winning first prize at her school's science fair!
appearance: Neely has a brown cookie base with chocolate chips on top. She has strawberry ice cream on her right, chocolate on her left, and vanilla on the center. She has black closed eyes with short lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Neeona
bio: Meet Neeona. She and her best friendMellyhave known each other since they were little 'Mallows. They do just about everything together! Neeona loves making homemade pizza and always lets Melly sprinkle on the cheese and veggie toppings! Want a bite? They'd love to share!
appearance: Neeona is a light brown cookie with a golden centre. She is covered in dark brown chocolate pieces of various shapes and sizes. She has round, black eyes and a red mouth.

name: Nefen
bio: Meet Nefen. He loves climbing and doing stunts, one day he hopes to win an award for best stunt coordination! This year on Valentine's Day Nefen wants to go climbing and then get chocolate strawberry milkshakes. Would you like to join him?
appearance: Nefen is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. He wears a purple hat printed with white hearts atop his head, and a pink outfit with purple accents on his bottom half.

name: Neha
bio: Neha loves astrology—in fact, she runs an official Leo fan club! This dodo bird might be a proud Pisces herself, but she admires how bold and creative her favorite sign can be. Though she has plenty of Leo friends already, her horoscope predicts many more to come!
appearance: Neha is a purple dodo bird with darker purple fuzzy wings and a white fuzzy tail. She has a lavender belly and a white face with a long, orange beak. Her eyes are black, and she has orange rings around her eyes.

name: Nell
bio: Nell is shy but bold! Her creativity shines through in everything she does in her graphic design work. When she isn’t behind her computer you can find Nell practicing her  DJ skills with her friendSuneetha, although if she is hungry she will drop everything for a huge bowl of pasta!
appearance: Nell is a white cat with pointed, triangular ears. Each ear is covered by a patch: pink on the right and purple on the left. Her belly is the same shade of pink as her right ear. She has a small, white muzzle, framed by two black whiskers on either side. Her mouth and nose are hot pink. She has closed eyes with curled lashes sweeping downwards.

name: Nellie
bio: Nellie is a sweet but strong little parakeet, who loves being with her 'Mallow family and friends. Nellie keeps in touch with faraway loved ones with handwritten letters, detailing all she sees from her favorite window perch. When she's not enjoying her perch, Nellie tends to her veggie garden!
appearance: Nellie is a parakeet (budgie), a type of small parrot. She has a yellow head, a lime body and a yellow belly. Her wings are lime. She has a rounded, yellow beak with a pale blue cere above it, as well as round, black eyes and pink blush.

name: Nessie
bio: Meet Nessie. She is a 'Mallow Scout and is currently working toward her wilderness survival badge. Whenever she camps, she makes her special s'mores. Her secret recipe uses bananas and peanut butter instead of chocolate! She also loves telling campfire stories, so come, sit, and listen along!
appearance: Nessie is a green creature based on the Loch Ness Monster. She has fins on either side of her body and pale green spots along her back. Her belly has a cord texture with the appearance of horizontal stripes. She has round, black eyes, a smiling mouth, and pink blush.

name: Nestor
bio: Nestor don't need solo time. This chicken nugget is his best self when he's surrounded by all his nugget pals. They even started a friendship group called the Bar-B-Crew! Nestor's squad even speaks in code, and everyone has a nickname. What do you want your nickname be?
appearance: Nestor is an orange-yellow chicken nugget with Barbecue sauce on top. His paper bag has white and orange stripes. His face consists of black eyes and a black smile.

name: Nettie
bio: Nettie bakes bagels for her local bakery! She uses her winglets to swoop large trays out of the oven, and you ought to see Nettie glide over with the seeds and toppings. In fact, you can! Nettie works in front of a large window and often draws a crowd with her big moves.
appearance: Nettie is a sugar glider, a type of possum which can glide using wing-like membranes. She is primarily light goldenrod with a white lower face and belly. She has canary yellow markings in stripes covering each eye, a large stripe starting at her head and running down her back, on the tip of her tail and on the outer front side of her 'wings'. Her inner ears are also glittery gold. She has round, black eyes and a silver nose and mouth. She is also wearing a white and lavender bunny ears on her head.

name: Nia
bio: Nia is an excellent cook and specialises in vegan cuisine. She loves to sing whilst cooking and thinks her wonderful voice adds to the flavour of her dishes. When she’s not in the kitchen Nia enjoys swimming with her friends and making a splash!
appearance: Nia is a white pig with very pale purple splotches. She has curly ears, round, black eyes and a pink snout. Her inner ears and belly are patterned in pastel rainbow stripes.

name: Niala
bio: Niala is going to her bestieCoralie'sbirthday party, but she's feeling really shy and nervous. Big, loud gatherings are not Niala's cup of tea, but she wants to be there and showCoralieher love and support. Plus, Niala got the perfect present and she can't wait to watchCoralieopen it!
appearance: Niala is custard yellow cheesecake. at the top of her head she has strawberry syrup dripping down her with a strawberry on top. The bottom of Niala's body is fuzzy like resembling the graham cracker base. She also has two black eyes with two eyelashes on each side, a pink smiling mouth and candy pink blush.

name: Niamh
bio: Niamh reads celebrity magazines every chance she gets. Sometimes it's in line at the grocery store, or waiting for a beauty appointment. They're a little bit of a guilty pleasure for Niamh, but that doesn't make it any less fun!
appearance: Niamh is an lavender cup of boba tea with a silver lid and a hot pink straw. She has medium orchid tapioca pearls, closed eyes with lashes, and a blush color smile.

name: Nic
bio: Nic is a night owl who loves to listen to music and see the latest pop-up events with his friends. He goes hiking every weekend and shares his new music with his friends.
appearance: Nic is a squirrel with brown fur. He has three chocolate brown stripes on his head, and his nose and mouth are the same shade. His face and belly are white, as are the insides of his ears. He also has a bushy brown tail. He has the phrase "Hugs & Kisses" written in pink and blue on his chest and a large red heart beside it. In newer releases, the phrase is changed to "Hugs & Squishes". The 5" version swaps the phrase for a small, pastel pink heart which sits atop the larger red heart.

name: Nichelle
bio: Here comes Nichelle with fresh fruit and veggies for her daily juice. This 'Mallow fresh presses a kale, mango, ginger juice first thing in the morning to keep her energized for spin class. Nichelle started juicing some time ago and still loves all the health benefits.
appearance: Nichelle is an orange parasaurolophus with a yellow belly. She has two yellow stripes with dark orange outlines running down her back. She has a smiling mouth and round, black eyes. She also has a little tail and a dark orange head crest.

name: Nick
bio: Nick is the volunteer of the century. He travels all over the world and donates time and money to make the world a better place. He works around the clock day and night to bring you the jolliest day of the year.
appearance: Nick is an elderly white male with a large, round nose. He has a large white beard and eyebrows. He wears round, silver spectacles over his black eyes. He wears a classic red Santa outfit, including a cap and jacket with white trims and black belt with a gold buckle.

name: Nicky
bio: Nothing makes Nicky's heart smile like watching a holiday movie with friends and family! She doesn't like cooking, but she LOVES to bake! When she's not rewatching movies or baking you can find her daydreaming and staying up late drinking chocolate peppermint milkshakes!
appearance: Nicky is an angel, a brunette, Caucasian humanoid with silver wings. She wears a golden halo around her head and white and pale blue clothes. She has messy bangs with a silver star clip and long, curled hair. Her eyes are closed and have curled lashes. She has pink blush and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Nico
bio: Food, art and dinosaurs are some of Nico's favorite things. He loves art class because he gets to be crafty and creative. When he's not working on a new art project, you can find him learning a new recipe in the kitchen or sharing some cool dino facts with his friends.
appearance: Nico is a orange axolotl with black eyes, and a cat-like smile. He has 2 stubby arms, and gills.

name: Nicolas
bio: Nicolas is a former model, ex international diplomat, and three-time film producer. Despite the places he's been and the 'Mallows he's known, Nicolas is happiest at home with his bestieDookdookby his side. They're working on a duets album right now, and hope to one day tour it across the country!
appearance: Nicolas is a lavender bat with triangular ears and wings on either side of his body. His inner ears. wing membrane and fuzzy belly are grey. He has round, black eyes, a lavender muzzle and a curved smile which shows two pointed, white teeth.

name: Nicole
bio: Meet Nicole. She loves the color purple and laughing in the sun. Nicole is a fashionista and always looks very put together. She's a hard worker at a wholesale company and supports her team 100%.
appearance: Nicole is an aqua caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears and her belly, as well as the spiral on her horn, are striped in rainbow. The horn itself is a shimmery white. She has round eyes with two curled lashes and a light pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Nicolette
bio: You may not remember Nicolette, but she absolutely remembers you! Nicolette has a gift of memory and can recognize a friend or acquaintance from the North Pole and back!
appearance: Nicolette is an old lady who wears a red dress with white sleeves and gold buttons. She also wears a white pair of glasses, has white hair, and a red headband.

name: Nicolita
bio: Meet Nicolita! This charismatic unicorn is a total social butterfly. Whether playing softball with friends, helping patients at the local hospital, or entertaining guests with her world-famous charcuterie board, you can be sure where Nicolita goes, other 'Mallows follow.
appearance: Nicolita is a black unicorn with grey accents. She has a grey fuzzy belly, and her unicorn horn and inner ears are a glittery silver. Her mane that goes from the top of her head to her back and her fluffy tail are black. Her eyes are black with yellow rings around them, her muzzle is grey and her nostrils are yellow.

name: Nicota
bio: Welcome to Nicota's co-op market! Last summer, Nicota had the great idea of setting up tables and chairs outside the store, and now all 'Mallows come to sit at Nicota's market for a quick lunch or to meet up with other locals. Will Nicota see you there this afternoon?
