appearance: Nicota is a magenta cup of dragon fruit milkshake. On top of their lid, they have whipped cream with magenta sprinkles on top and a mint and white striped straw as well as a slice of dragon fruit on the right side of them. They have black eyes with lashes and a black mouth.

name: Niema
bio: Meet Niema. This narwhal has dreams of being the fastest swimmer in the ocean. She gets up early to practice almost every day. Her favorite thing to do after a hard practice is sauna and listen to her favorite songs, do you want to join her?
appearance: Niema is a pale teal narwhal with two fins on each side. A long white horn protrudes from her head. Rainbow stripes as her fluffy belly. She has black rounded eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Nightingale
bio: If you're looking for a best friend, you're going to love Nightingale. While he seems cool on the outside, he's kind and funny and can always make you laugh. One thing you can always count on is that Nightingale will always share the snacks.
appearance: Nightingale is a mostly tan cow with a patch of chocolate brown on his right ear. He has small, bright yellow horns and round black eyes. The inside of his ears and his muzzle are both white. His belly is also white and features splotches of chocolate brown.

name: Nikita
bio: Looking for some new music? Nikita is the owl for you! Discovering new music and sharing it with friends is Nikita's thing. She loves to go to live shows and wants to work in music when she grows up.
appearance: Nikita is a grey owl with white markings on her face and belly. She was small wings with white on the tips. Small, grey feathers decorate her chest. She has black eyes with a single curled lash on each, and a triangular golden beak.

name: Nikolai
bio: Don't threaten Nikolai with a good time! No actually, don't. As he'd love to accompany you to the super groovy dance party, he is a very serious guy now and his disco days are behind him. A rollerskate limbo contest, you say? That was his specialty back in the day!
appearance: Nikolai is a white bear with round ears. He is wearing his nutcracker outfit with the color of a black jacket with a pink and black plaid shirt with a black belt and silver buckle. He wears a black hat on top of his head with a white wavy pattern and red stars. He has mischievous eyes with a white muzzle and black nose and moustache.

name: Niles
bio: Beep. beep! Niles is the owner and operator of a car dealership for wacky and outlandish automobiles. From banana-themed limousines to convertibles the size of monster trucks, the only thing missing from his inventory is a clown car!
appearance: Niles is a tie-dye blue and purple Triceratops. He has a cyan pointed frill that adorns his head, two white horns on his head, and a wide, white horn on his snout. He has black eyes, and a black smile. He wears a pair of bunny ears with pink inner ears. He has an easter egg on the right side of his belly.

name: Nina
bio: Nina is obsessed with collecting shells and crystals, she finds many while she's exploring the ocean. She has lots of small and medium-sized shells but she wants to find a giant shell that she could sleep in, do you want to go on a shell hunt with Nina?
appearance: Nina is a combination of a cat, unicorn and mermaid, and has features of each. The top half of her body is pale purple and she has large triangular ears. The inside of these are rainbow and her horn. The spiral on her horn is yellow and her nose and mouth are a lavender. She has round, black eyes and two black whiskers on each cheek. The bottom half of Nina's body is covered in scales, which are patterned in pastel stripes.

name: Nissa
bio: Nissa prepares for the holidays far in advance! She always keeps an eye out for thoughtful gifts and spends time carefully wrapping each present. When this 'Mallow isn't out spreading joy, you can find her a boxing practice. Sit ringside for Nissa's evening class to watch her bob and weave!
appearance: Nissa is an off-white Yeti with gold horns and a white fuzzy tuft of her on her head. Her belly is in the form of a peppermint swirl colored in red, white, and green. She has a white face with two black eyes and a black smile.

name: Nitch
bio: Nitch sings baritone in the North Pole choir, and just landed his first solo! Now he's extra excited for the annual holiday concert. Nitch keeps himself performance ready with daily power naps and spicy hot chocolate before rehearsal to warm up his vocal cords.
appearance: Nitch is a Christmas ornament with a tie-dyed pattern, predominantly pink, blue, mint, purple and white. He has silver snowflakes with an ornament pattern on the top and bottom of his body. and a silver cap atop of his head. His eyes are closed with eyelashes and has a smiling mouth.

name: Nitro
bio: Meet Nitro. This hammerhead loves to tell stories and wants to be a director one day. He is most excited about filming a documentary and helping bring awareness to stores you might now know. Give him a camera and watch him go!
appearance: Nitro is a dark blue shark with two fins on each side and a hammer shaped head. They have a round, white belly with black gills on both sides. They have round black eyes and a small smile.

name: Niven
bio: Niven runs her daily work commute in an exercise ball! Sometimes she gets strange looks as she rolls through freeway traffic, but Niven knows exercise ball tech is the way of the future. Not only does Niven get a daily workout, she powers her own vehicle with 360° views of the city.
appearance: Niven is a creamy white guinea pig with lavender and pastel pink markings by her eyes and ears. She has pink inner ears and pink nose. She wears a red bandana with a white heart pattern. Her lashed eyes are black, and her mouth is curved.

name: Nixie
bio: Energetic Nixie loves some friendly competition! Nixie's favorite activity is playing sky-tag with her friendDesmund. With the help of her incredible agility and small size, she is known as the best sky-tag player around!
appearance: Nixie is a butterfly with a yellow body. Her belly is an even lighter shade and is striated with yellow lines. Her antennae stems and inner wings are shimmery gold. She has round eyes with short lashes and a red, smiling mouth, as well as a pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Nixy
bio: Meet Nixy. She's part of a rollerblade dance group with her friends! Every week they go to their favorite roller rink and practice their moves under the spinning disco ball. After, they order cheesy mozzarella sticks and hit the arcade! They have room for one more! Want to join?
appearance: Nixy is a black and purple caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a purple tail. Her bangs are shades of purple and lavender. The inside of her ears and her belly are purple. The horn is a glittery silver with a purple band. She has round eyes and a pink nose and mouth, all framed by two silver whiskers.

name: Noah
bio: Noah may be shy, but there’s one thing he loves to talk about – baking cupcakes! Baking yummy cupcakes and giving them to his neighbors helps him feel less shy; now Noah loves to share his cupcakes! Would you like to try one?
appearance: Noah is a seal with a pattern of blue waves. He has a shimmery blue pair of fins and a tail. His muzzle and belly are plain white. He has cheerful black eyes with a white shine with dual whiskers below each. He also has a small, black nose and a smiling mouth with a pink tongue.

name: Noam
bio: Noam is a blue leopard with blue and pink spots all over his body. His stomach is pure white. His ears are white and his muzzle is white. He wears a glittery pink heart headband. He has two round black eyes and a blue nose and mouth.
appearance: Noam is a blue leopard with blue and pink spots all over his body. His stomach is pure white. His ears are white and his muzzle is white. He wears a glittery pink heart headband. He has two round black eyes and a blue nose and mouth.

name: Noe
bio: Noe glows with quiet confidence. They're a 'Mallow of few words who hopes you won't mind saving conversation until it's really necessary. Noe writes in a daily journal to keep all their thoughts organized, and otherwise enjoys taking long naps and listening to talk radio.
appearance: Noe is a sea bunny, a type of marine slug. They are tie-dyed with pastel, rainbow colors. Their tall, fluffy, white 'ears' are actually rhinopores, a sensory organ that detects chemicals. They have a fluffy white belly and tail with a simple, smiling face.

name: Noelani
bio: Every time Noelani enters a room, she lights it up with laughter! This 'Mallow knows that even her messy eating habits can garner some giggles, and there's nothing she loves more than making her friends and family smile. Well, except for pickles—pickles are a close second!
appearance: Noelani is a teal axolotl she has a teal axolotl body with a fuzzy blue belly with black eyes, and a cat-like smile. She has 2 stubby arms, and shimmery rainbow gills with blue frills on each side. She also has shimmery rainbow wings on her back.

name: Nolan
bio: Nolan is one energetic dinosaur! You can find him trying new activities, especially outdoor ones like swimming and going to the beach. He would love to visit space one day; he isn't even afraid  of the asteroids his family has warned him about!
appearance: Nolan is an apple green ankylosaurus, a heavily armored type of dinosaur. He has two dark green spots on his broad pale green plate with four white spikes atop his head. He has a creamy white belly with round black eyes and a plain, smiling mouth.

name: Noland
bio: Noland lives by the bay! When he isn't lifting weights or listening to music, you can find him hanging with his bestie,Noro. These daydreamers like to imagine they're kings of the kingdom and that the whole bay is theirs!
appearance: Noland is a grey wolf with a shaggy black mane and tail. He has sharply pointed ears which are lined in white. He has a light grey face and inner ears. He has mischievous black eyes and a silver nose. Small white fangs protrude from his smiling mouth.

name: Nomi
bio: There's only one place you'll find this 'Mallows—on the golf course! Nomi just placed first in the last minor league tournament and is starting to make a name for herself. She can't wait for the next tournament to start but is working on perfecting her birdies for now. Wanna hit the driving range with Nomi?
appearance: Nomi is a yellow bigfoot with a yellow fuzzy mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. Her head is poking out of a half-peeled banana. She has white pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short dual lashes, yellow blush beneath and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face.

name: Noodles
bio: Noodles can't wait for the slumber party! Noodles loves staying up late to watch movies and is bringing board games and cupcakes. Noodles loves playing board games and could play them all night! Do you want to join?
appearance: Noodles is a white chick with black oval eyes, hot pink blush, and a wide orange beak. Noodles wears a pale yellow chicken onesie with a removable hood. Like otherClaire's exclusivesreleased around the same time, there actually exists two variants of Noodles' design.[1]The alternate version has a smaller beak and round eyes.

name: Nora
bio: Meet Nora the Fairy! This magical 'Mallow loves to write poems and notes to all of her pals. She leaves them in tiny message bottles around Squishville! So, if you’re having a bad day, a note from Nora and some magic pixie dust are sure to cheer you up!
appearance: Nora is a fairy with hot pink hair styled in space buns and a yellow star hairclip on the right side. She has pale skin and a pink mouth and is winking her right eye. Her dress has a purple bodice and a skirt with numerous metallic petals, including shades of purple, as well as yellow and lime green. Iridescent, dark purple butterfly wings sprout from her back. She also has hot pink ballet slippers.

name: Norbu
bio: Have you met Norbu? This octopus is a ham, just wait until you hear their jokes! Norbu says the funniest things that would make you laugh even if you're in a bad mood. Norbu is thinking about taking improv classes, would you like to join?
appearance: Norbu is a bright orange dumbo octopus, a type of umbrella octopus (meaning their arms are connected by a web of skin). Their tentacles flare out from their body in a flower-like shape and are orange on top, yellow on the bottom. They also have shimmering blood orange fins on their head which resemble pointed ears. They have round, black eyes with short lashes, pink blush and a smiling mouth.

name: Norma
bio: Meet Norma. Norma loves eggnog ice cream and happens to be the best carpenter in the North Pole! Norma helps build everything from toys to furniture, she once made a sled that looked like a mini version of Santa's sleigh.
appearance: Norma is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. She wears a striped red and white hat atop her head, and a teal outfit with red accents on her bottom half.

name: Norma Jean
bio: Norma Jean is a pink rhinoceros with a prominent square muzzle and curled ears. Her nose boasts a large white horn. The inside of her ears and his belly are also white, whereas her eyes are black.
appearance: Norma Jean is a pink rhinoceros with a prominent square muzzle and curled ears. Her nose boasts a large white horn. The inside of her ears and his belly are also white, whereas her eyes are black.

name: Norman
bio: Glass blowing can be difficult in the North Pole, but this Squishmallow makes it look easy. Norman is the best glassblower around! When he’s not working, Norman’s favorite thing to do is snowboard with his friends.
appearance: Norman is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. He wears a striped red and white hat atop his head, and a grey outfit with red accents on his bottom half.

name: Noro
bio: Do you like scary movies? Noro sure does! From ghosts in the closet to monsters on the roof, this boo-happy cthulhu has seen it all. He hopes to direct a frightening feature of his own one day and can't wait to hear the screams in the theater!
appearance: Noro is a dark green Cthulhu, a mythical cosmic entity with the head of a cuttlefish/octopus, dragon wings, and a humanoid body. He has a lime belly, darker green spots on his forehead and fins on the sides of his head with dragon wings and lime green webbing. His eyes are black, he has pink blush, and four tentacles that cover his mouth.

name: Nostalgia
bio: Nostalgia is a mug of maple latte. The top being cream, below is red with white dots and a brown maple leaf embroidered on it, and a red handle with white dots. They have latte inside of them, with swirls of cream. They have closed, black eyes with lashes, red cheeks, and a smiling mouth.
appearance: Nostalgia is a mug of maple latte. The top being cream, below is red with white dots and a brown maple leaf embroidered on it, and a red handle with white dots. They have latte inside of them, with swirls of cream. They have closed, black eyes with lashes, red cheeks, and a smiling mouth.

name: Nova
bio: Nova's favorite part of Spring is how beautiful the world looks. She loves the dreary, rainy days that bloom into a beautiful bursts of sunshine and color. Nova paints with watercolors and the colors of the spring inspires her work. Do you want to help Nova paint this spring?
appearance: Nova is a periwinkle purple bunny rabbit with long lop ears. She has a rainbow belly, a short, white fuzzy tail and a pink nose and mouth and her eyes are closed.

name: Novi
bio: Novi is a pizza lover, her nickname is Margherita and nothing makes her happier than extra cheese. She loves discovering new ways to make delicious, cheesy pizza inventions. Her latest obsession is pizza muffins. She could eat 12 at a time!
appearance: Novi is a teal blue frog with a lighter blue belly. Groups of light blue spots decorate the sides of her body and in a patch above her nose. Their eyes sit on top of their head, and are black with curled lashes. They have prominent nostrils above their wide, red mouth.

name: Noy
bio: Noy is best known for his snot bubble routine. It makes little 'Mallows roar with laughter every time! Though Noy considers himself a stand-up comic and even has an hour-long set ready to perform at a moment's notice, his cornerstone clowning is still his physical comedy shtick.
appearance: Noy is a bright pink blobfish with a white belly and coral-colored fins. He has black eyes, with cyan makeup and large, pink lips surrounding his smiling mouth. He wears a cyan fedora with a purple band, a light green and yellow striped ruffle between his head and body, a red clown nose, and yellow and purple buttons on his belly. He has curly purple hair.

name: Nya
bio: Need a good skincare routine? Nya is here for you! After struggling to find something that works, she created her own products for a healthy routine. She'll help your skin grow with her collections of creams, lotions, masks, & serums.
appearance: Nya is a leopard with a pale red-orange coat and a pattern of simple black spots covering her body. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a rose gold and mouth. She also has metallic rose gold inner ears. She is winking her right eye and has short, curled lashes.

name: Nyla
bio: Meet Nyla the book worm! This unicorn loves curling up with a good book. She loves popcorn and popsicles with a little spice! Nyla loves exploring around her and this year will take a hot air balloon ride for her birthday in June. Will you join the fun with Nyla?
appearance: Nyla is a baby blue unicorn with a a small tail and no mane. Her belly is covered in circular, teal sequins. Her horn and inner ears are shimmery silver, and her muzzle is white with royal blue nostrils. She has royal blue eyes which are closed and have long lashes which curl upwards. Over these she wears glasses with a teal frame.

name: Oakley
bio: Bring your tools to hang out with Oakley! She's a do-it-yourself master and total crafting pro. Last week, she made a coffee table, and this week, she finished a new kitchen table! Oakley is always looking for her next project - maybe you could make something together?
appearance: Oakley has a sage green, almost grey body with a fluffy white tummy.  Her ears are light grey on the outside and the same fluffy white on the inside. She also has a light grey tail with a white tip. She has a white face with fluffy cheeks and round black eyes, as well as an oval shaped nose connected to her dog-like smile.

name: Oatfae
bio: Oatfae loves predicting trends! This year, she, thinks burnt popcorn, curly hair, and 'having a secret will be in. Iced coffee will be out, while talking to yourself will be back. Oatfae seriously hopes she gets everything right, for she fears trend lists will soon be gone forever!
appearance: Oatfae is a red pomegranate. She has red skin with a pink front with three sections of pomegranate seeds. On top of her head she has a leaf shaped like a crown. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Obu
bio: This energetic frog loves everybody and everything, except loud noises. Obu gets startled and scared when she hears loud noises, so her job at the library is the perfect place for her. If Obu hears a loud noise, will you comfort her?
appearance: Obu is a crimson red frog with a yellow belly. She has a group of black spots that decorate her back. Her eyes sit on top of her head and she has prominent nostrils above her smiling mouth and a hot pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Oceana
bio: Oceana gets ready for Día de los Muertos by preparing a bright and colorful altar! She makes sugar skulls, picks marigolds, and her bestie,Friedabring stacks of papel picado to hang. Oceana invites you to help too—don't forget to bring the salt!
appearance: Oceana is a shark wearing sugar skull makeup. She has a yellow belly with a spider web pattern, and green floral rings around her eyes. She has various purple, orange, and green petal/tear-like patterns on her head. She has two black pectoral fins on her sides, two dorsal fins with one on top of her head and one on the back with a tail fin below her. Her eyes are black with an open mouth revealing a red inner mouth and sharp, white teeth.

name: Ocha
bio: Ocha is a black spider with eight creepy, crawly legs. Her legs are black, teal and grey and are different on either side. She has a teal fuzzy belly and wears a bow the same color. She has round, black eyes with short dual lashes, and a red, smiling mouth.
appearance: Ocha is a black spider with eight creepy, crawly legs. Her legs are black, teal and grey and are different on either side. She has a teal fuzzy belly and wears a bow the same color. She has round, black eyes with short dual lashes, and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Octave
bio: Octave spends most of his lounge time in the hot springs near his forest home. There, he gathers with friends and neighbors to talk or take naps. When the winter gets very cold, Octave rolls in the snow, then jumps into the hot spring. What an exhilarating experience!
appearance: Octave is a snow monkey with an off-white mane and tan face. He has small, tan ears and a cream body with an off-white belly. His muzzle is round and short with dark beige nostrils and curved mouth.

name: Octavia
bio: Meet Octavia. She has a helpful pep in her step just like her sisterJeanne! Octavia loves to paint nails and wants to open a nail salon that helps people. She wants to help people who cannot visit salons but doesn't know where to start. Will you help her?
appearance: Octavia is a light red octopus with a cream white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including hot pink, light pink, purple and coral). She has closed black eyes with short eyelashes and a smiling mouth.4

name: Oden
bio: You can spot one of Oden's giant sandcastles from way down the shoreline! They recently perfected their sandcastle technique by adding tiny shells and stones to hold towers in place. Today, Oden is working on a bridge and moat with twigs and seaweed. Want to see their latest creation?
appearance: Oden is a grey peccary with a lighter grey stripe around their neck. They have a dark grey (almost black) belly. Their eyes are open with a pink snout and they have a rusty grey tuft on their head.

name: Odessa
bio: Do you love glittery lights and cocoa nights? It's time you met Odessa! She lives on a farm and every winter she transforms it into a glistening winter wonderland. She hosts skating parties, hot cocoa tastings, and even a sugar cookie decorating contest. Grab your scarf and join the festivities!
appearance: Odessa is a Christmas ornament with a tie-dyed rainbow pattern, predominantly pink, blue and yellow. She has a pattern of linked, flowing swirls embroidered in white across her body, and a metallic pink cap atop her head. She is winking her right eye and has a smiling mouth.

name: Odette
bio: Odette is known for her best-selling guided meditation series "Cool Your Jets". When meeting fans, they beg her to recite famous lines like "count down from ten," or "now, exhale," or even "wiggle your toes." Odette tries not to let the fame get to her head, but when she does, she just listens to one of her tapes.
appearance: Odette is a bottle of olive oil. She has olive oil inside her which surrounded by a blue bottle with bubbles surrounding her body. She has a brown cork on top of her head and a olive sticker on her belly. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Odile
bio: Odile/Isis loves the color green, pineapple smoothies, and zoning out to music. She just bought a record player and goes to the record store almost once a week! What album should she get next?
appearance: Odile/Isis is a pale grey seal with dark grey spots and two flat flippers on each side. She has a round, white muzzle and belly. She also has round markings above her eyes resembling eyebrows. Her facial features, including nose, mouth, round eyes, short lashes and whiskers are all black.

name: Odion
bio: Please welcome Odion. Odion just transferred to a new school and is feeling a little shy, but he'd love to meet you! He's taking advanced computer science this year because it's his favorite subject. He even used to tutor computer science at his old school. Can you help find his next class?
appearance: Odion is a red bowl of ramen with white swirl patterns by the bottom and a yellow ring at the top. Inside are orange ramen noodles, cut scallions, and sesame seeds. He also has a red chili pepper and a pair of chopsticks at the top of his head. He has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush, and a smiling mouth.

name: Oha
bio: Oha feels under the weather. She went swimming all day yesterday, even after the temperature dropped. Now she's super sniffly! Oha loves cuddling under all her blankets but wishes she could have some company. Would you bring her some kelp broth?
appearance: Oha is a sea bunny, a type of marine slug. She is lavender. Her tall, fluffy, off white 'ears' are actually rhinopores, a sensory organ that detects chemicals. She has a fluffy lavender belly and tail with a simple, smiling face.

name: Oksana
bio: Oksana lives a super trendy lifestyle. When she isn't making soybean candles in her studio apartment, you can find her shopping for thrifted goods in her neighborhood. Oksana loves living in her close-knit community and would be happy to give you a tour!
appearance: Oksana is a brown chicken leg with bump-like marks on her body and an off-white bone sticking out of her top left. She has black eyes, a black mouth, and blush.

name: Olalla
bio: Olalla enjoys reading and writing. She is very good at writing history books and cares deeply about teaching and comic books. She also loves sports and is a hockey fanatic. Her perfect day would include reading and a tie-breaking hockey game, would you like to join her?
appearance: Olalla is a pink, tie-dyed owl with shades ranging from hot pink to coral to blush, as well as a paint splatter pattern on top. She has white patches surrounding each eye which are edged with rows of white and pink feathers. She also has a white belly with three rows of feathers outlined in pink. She has a gold beak and round, black eyes with curled lashes.

name: Olana
bio: Olana works as a pediatric nurse! She loves practicing medicine, and her sweet nature makes her perfect for treating little 'Mallows. Olana even has a technique for delivering a painless vaccine. What's her trick? Olana numbs her patient's arm with an ice wrap then finishes with a super fun bandage!
appearance: Olana the lamb is a grey lamb with a short tail and ears. Her inner ears and face are white with grey hooves with glittery tips holding a purple and blue easter egg with "EGGstra Cute" written on it. She has black eyes with lashes, pink blush, nose, and curved mouth.

name: Olav
bio: Olav takes spring cleaning seriously. He turns over his home dusting and mopping, and donating old belongings. You've never seen a more productive blobfish! Olav loves fresh starts, and the beginning of a new season really motivates him. How does spring make you feel?
appearance: Olav is a blobfish, a deep sea creature. He is bright pink and white with a tie-dye pattern with a plain white belly and baby pink colored fins. He is winking with lashes, a bulbous 'nose', and large, pastel pink lips surrounding his smiling mouth.

name: Oldin
bio: Oldin's got eight arms, perfect for playing the xylophone! He loves fashion, travelling, and rocking out with his friends in their underwater punk band! Tickets are free and everyone's invited, so come out and rock on!
appearance: Oldin is a gradient green and blue octopus with a white belly. He has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which are a different color (including green, light jade green, teal and yellow). He has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Olena
bio: Olena is hosting a slumber party and invited her friends! There is just one rule: you have to wear a costume. Olena is wearing her favorite dinosaur ensemble! She has movies, popcorn, and even a facemask station set up, do you want to join?
appearance: Olena is an orange and white cat. She has a white base with orange patches on each side of her face. She has oval-shaped, black eyes, a black nose and mouth, pale pink blush and two black whiskers. She wears a pale teal dinosaur onesie with shiny, aquamarine spikes along the back and a matching patch on the front.

name: Oleta
bio: Meet Oleta. She photographs food for commercials and is the best in the industry. Oleta's compositions are always colorful, balanced, and perfectly in focus. The next time you see a food ad, take a closer look — it could be Oleta's work!
appearance: Oleta is an octopus with a rainbow tie-dye pattern and a white belly. She has pink, white, and blue paint splattered throughout her body. She has a round body with eight short, hot pink tentacles. She has one winking eye and one black, round eye with two eyelashes on each, and she has a smiling mouth.

name: Olexa
bio: Meet Olexa. Rainy days suit this introvert just fine. Olexa loves bundling up on cold blustery days and reading books, watching an old black and white film, or just listening to some relaxing lo-fi hip hop while the rain pitter-patters on the rooftop. Would you like to join them?
appearance: Olexa is a green and orange pear with a white belly. They have black, round eyes and a smiling mouth. They have a brown stem and bright green leaf.[1]

name: Olga
bio: Original:Are you looking for a trivia partner? Olga is a history buff like you wouldn't believe. Olga comes from a family of librarians and learning new historical trivia happened almost daily. Can Olga join your team?
appearance: Olga is a teal octopus with a white belly. They have a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including dark teal, olive green, light grey and aquamarine). They have round black eyes and a smiling mouth and their 5" has eyelashes.

name: Olina
bio: Meet Olina. This outoging octopus loves to bake cookies for Valentine's day, especially chocolate chip. This year she wants to bake a giant cookie in the shape of a heart! Do you think she can do it?
appearance: Olina is a turquoise octopus with a sparkling white belly. The white patch on her belly has two hears embroidered on it, a small lavender one and a larger hot pink one. Her body is round with eight short tentacles. She also has closed eyes with short eyelashes, and a smiling mouth.

name: Olive
bio: Olive doesn’t forget anything! How? She is constantly creating scrapbooks for every holiday, birthday party, and travel adventure with her friends and family! She is the first to capture every special moment with her favorite Squishmallows.
appearance: Olive is a dusky pink owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. Small, pale pink feathers decorate her chest. She has dark grey eyes with short, straight lashes, and a yellow, triangular beak.

name: Oliver
bio: Oliver likes to make handmade Valentines for his friends with glitter and his paws. Spend some time with him and make your own Valentines together.
appearance: Oliver is a calico cat, meaning he has a cream body and brown and black patches. He has one brown patch over his right ear, and two black patches, one on his left ear and the other on his lower left body. He has closed or light brown eyes, black whiskers, and a happy, pink cat mouth. He has a red heart decorating his left ear.

name: Olivette
bio: Olivette is a teal owl with fuzzy wings, a short tail, and a white belly with orange feathers embroidered on it. They have a white face that curves inwards by the center top surrounded by white feathers. Their beak is triangular and orange, and they have black rounded eyes.
appearance: Olivette is a teal owl with fuzzy wings, a short tail, and a white belly with orange feathers embroidered on it. They have a white face that curves inwards by the center top surrounded by white feathers. Their beak is triangular and orange, and they have black rounded eyes.

name: Olivia
bio: Meet Olivia. She is a talented photographer and has been known to spend hours in the darkroom developing film. She loves taking portraits of her friends and their pets. When she grows up, she wants to travel the world as a photojournalist!
appearance: Olivia is a pink camera that has yellow on her top with a silver button. Her body has three buttons, which are yellow, blue, and rainbow. The area where the camera make the picture is yellow and sliver. She has two sliver lines on her bottom, on the first silver line there a pink, yellow, and blue square on the sliver line. Her face consists of one round black eye with the other winking and her mouth is a simple black smile.

name: Oliviana
bio: A superstar is born! Meet the queen of rock Oliviana. She loves to jam with her band, and shreds her electric guitar at big venue concerts Oliviana blings out her costumes with eye-catching studs, so she shines during her performance. You can't miss her on stage
appearance: Oliviana is a yellow, blue, and pink gradient colored alien. Her body is covered with a pink pattern of spots. She also has silver speckles on the tips of their antennae. She has a plain white belly with an embroidered rainbow constellation in the shape of a heart with smaller stars and heart inside. She has round black eyes with eyelashes and a smiling, black mouth.

name: Olivieri
bio: Olivieri is a waste-lifting weightlifter! This rip-roaring raccoon is an expert at using the junkyard to stay in shape. When be isn't deadlifting debris, you can find Olivieri and his bestieContessaenjoying the finer things life—like dancing at luaus, or driving through dumpsters!
appearance: Olivieri is a wine raccoon with velvet markings around his eyes. Above these are white marks which resemble eyebrows. His velvet belly is maroon, and there is a thin ring of white around his round black eyes. He has a white snout with a black nose and mouth.

name: Ollie
bio: Meet Ollie. She loves fairy tales, naps, and road trips with her family. Every year they pick a new destination by drawing names out of a hat. This year Ollie hopes she'll pick someplace magical and far away, maybe even a castle!
appearance: Ollie is a sliced orange, with a darker orange peel on the outside and a lighter orange on her face and belly. The markings on her belly represent the sections of an orange. The top of her head sports a bright green leaf. She has closed eyes with curled lashes, pink blushing cheeks and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Olma
bio: Can you guess how Olma makes her signature art prints? With fruit and veggies stamps! Cut apples, lemon slices, and celery ends are just the a few of Olma's stamping tools. She's working on a colorful collage right now. What fresh produce should Olma use for her latest work of art?
appearance: Olma is a cat with a strawberry body with seeds. She has a strawberry stem and leaves on top her head. She has a light pink belly and inner ears to match, as well as a white muzzle. Her nose and mouth are light pink colored, framed by black whiskers. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes.

name: Olti
bio: Olti is an astrophysicist! He loves saying his star sign is a "black hole" because he's not only mysterious and misunderstood, but supermassive as well. Just check out those triceps!
appearance: Olti is a hickory horned devil caterpillar with a segmented body. He has orange horns on top of their head with black tips and long tuft of  blue hair which spreads to his back. He has six teal spikes embroidered on each layer of his body and six on each side of their body and six on their back. He has a teal belly and have round black eyes and a smiling mouth with pink blush.

name: Omar
bio: Original/'Mallow Mash:Omar loves crystals, gems and jewelry and has an eye for finding the beauty in everything he does. He hopes to be a jeweler one day! /(even the super scary masks he enjoys making for the ’Mallow Mash).
appearance: Omar is a chocolate brown bear with round ears. He has a light brown belly, muzzle and inner ears, as well as pink blush on his cheeks. He has round black eyes, along with a black nose and cat-like smile.

name: Omari
bio: Omari loves to play games; card games, board games, video games, you name it! He just got a new set of playing cards, with cool holographic prints, he can't wait to try them out. Do you want to play a game with Omari?
appearance: Omari has a tie-dyed body which is predominantly turquoise, blue and green. He has a mohawk and small, fluffy wings that match the colors of his body. He has a white belly. His beak is golden with a bright, gold outline and a shimmery, paler gold inside. He also has black, round eyes.

name: Omega
bio: Omega is reading a book on brevity. He thinks it's a little short, and wishes the author would have elaborated further and use more flowery language. Omega just wrote a review about it on his blog, and after cutting down a bit, it's only a couple hundred words longer than the book itself—his shortest review yet!
appearance: Omega is a fish burger. He is made up of two buns with a fried fish patty, cheese, and lettuce in the center. He has two blue fish fins on each side with a long one at the back. The burger bun is brown striped in orange with sesame seeds on top of his head. He has round, black eyes and a black smile with dimples.

name: Omri
bio: Meet Omri. This amazing ornament loves to skate! Omri lives near a pond and when it gets cold enough they turn it into a skating rink. This year, Omri wants to add a fire pit to warm up and make s'mores. Do you want to join in the fun?
appearance: Omri is an ornament with a grey and green marbled pattern, adorned with a design of white snowflakes. They have a pattern of white geometric patterns, including lines and diamonds, above and below their face. They have round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Onea
bio: Meet Onea. She loves painting, hiking, and cupcakes with no frosting. Onea wants to climb every mountain and is training for her first hiking trip. She just brought a good pair of hiking boots, a warm tent, and waterproof backpack, do you want to join her?
appearance: Onea is Cotton Candy (pink-blue) Tie-Dye, has a teal beak and pink feathers on her belly. She has sleeping expression.

name: Onel
bio: Congrats to Onel on his new job as a paralegal. It's going to take some time before Onel introduces himself to everyone in the office, but once he's comfortable, this 'Mallow isn't as shy as he seems. Onel's always the first to sign up for karaoke!
appearance: Onel is an eel that has honey color skin with his belly being a light orange color. His dorsal fin (fin that runs all the way from his head to his mid-back) is a yam orange than his main color. He has four lines that go across along his back. His tail is in the shape of a lighting bolt. he has to black eyes and mouth with orange nostrils

name: Onica
bio: Onica as a fuzz-a-mallows. She is furry everywhere, except her belly and shell.Meet Onica. Her favorite time of year is summer. She loves the warm weather and going to her local state fair to load up on all of the wacky food with her dads! This year, she wants to try the hamburger with jelly-filled donuts for buns!
appearance: Onica is a pale blue turtle with a tuft of hair atop her head. She has a white belly and a simple face with round black eyes and a smile. On his back is an aquamarine, tie-dyed shell.

name: Oola
bio: Give Oola a call next time you wanna go shopping! She’s a pro thrifter and has endless patience for sifting through racks. If you ask Oola, she’ll tell you there’s something about the sound of hangers sliding that totally clears her mind and centers her. How does shopping make you feel?
appearance: Oola is a light pink cow with coral patches by the upper right of her head and her right ear and on the lower left side of her body. She has pale green inner ears and horns. She has a long tail with a tuft of pink fuzz at the tip. She has a watermelon embroidered on the right side of her body. She has a pink muzzle. Her eyes are black, and her nostrils are pink.

name: Opal
bio: Meet Opal; she's the only girl in a family with 4 older brothers who love her dearly. Last year, they gave her a pink sparkly dirt bike! She especially loves to ride after the rain so she can splash around in colossal puddles.
appearance: Opal is an octopus with a rainbow tie-dye pattern and a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including blue, green, yellow and pink). Her black eyes are closed, with short, spiky lashes, and she has a smiling mouth.

name: Ophelia
bio: Meet Ophelia. This sweet Squishmallow loves everything theatre, one day she wants to be an actress and direct her own plays. Ophelia loves being on stage and she knows that she would be a great director. She helps with the pageants her school puts on every spring.
appearance: Ophelia is a turquoise octopus with a lime green belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles. Her eyes are black with three short lashes and round and she has a smiling mouth. She wears an iridescent golden flower with a white center above her left eye.

name: Orazlo
bio: Orazlo works as a vet tech in the North Pole, He's responsible for keeping the reindeer fit and healthy all year round so they can be ready for the holiday season. With all his animal knowledge. Orazlo started invemting new sleigh gear for the reindeer. Think Santa will approve his designs?
appearance: Orazlo is an African-American elf with pointed ears and long, black hair. He wears a green Santa hat with a white pom-pom hat and a red spiked band around the base. He wears a red shirt with a green jacket which has a green collar with yellow linings with triangular points. He wears a Santa belt with a candy cane tucked in on the right.

name: Oriam
bio: Meet Oriam. For this 'Mallow nothing beats the quiet stillness of nature. Oriam loves going off the grid, hiking deep into the forest, and setting up camp beneath the forest canopy. Her favorite campground snack is peanut butter, banana, and toasted sandwiches.
appearance: Oriam is a brown cow with a patch of fuzzy, brown fur atop her head. She has an light brown muzzle and a dark brown belly. She has small, tan horns protruding from the top of her head. She has brown, anime eyes, brown nostrils, a small smile, and pink blush on her cheeks. In front of her belly she holds a yellow flower with a green stem being held by small, brown arms with light brown hooves.

name: Orin
bio: Orin is a silly orange; he responds to questions with more questions and on Fridays, he tries to do everything backwards. Thankfully his friends like his silliness and play along with his jokes.
appearance: Orin is a sliced orange, with a darker orange peel on the outside and a lighter orange on his face and belly. The markings on his belly represent the sections of an orange. The top of his head sports a short brown stem and a bright green leaf. He has round black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Orphie
bio: Meet Orphie. He's going to sleep away camp for the very first time! He's excited but a little nervous. He's never been away from his mom's this long, so he'll miss them a lot. But Orphie knows he'll make new friends and memories that will last for a lifetime.
appearance: Orphie is a yellow octopus with a shiny teal belly. He has a round body with eight short, teal tentacles. His eyes are black and round and he has a smiling mouth.

name: Orson
bio: Orson's a poet who swears by his merit, but sometimes he's knowingly too shy to share it. For brewing new rhymes, while chewing up time, and sipping on cola with nine twists of lime, will keep him quite occupied all of the day, with rarely a moment to bare his wordplay.
appearance: Orson is a cheeseburger made of a mint bun with sesame seeds on top with mold on the right side. Between the bread is a layer of cyan cheese, olive green meat, a purple slice of tomato and wavy purple lettuce leaves with lime green slime and a brown bun underneath. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Orzella
bio: Meet Orzella. She loves to quilt and spend time with her friendGrant. They have quilting parties and catch up on their favorite nostalgic cartoons. On the weekends Orzella loves to bake, if you're lucky you might get to try one of her famous blueberry Danishes!
appearance: Orzella is a marbled pink octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including light pink, yellow, pale lemon and hot pink). She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Oshun
bio: Meet Oshun. This flexible 'Mallow is a talented gymnast. You can catch her bouncing around the reef doing somersaults and cartwheels! She may not always stick the landing but she always has fun! For her next move, she wants to master the balance beam!
appearance: Oshun is an octopus with a pink and white marbled pattern and a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including rose pink, baby pink, jade green and light green). She wears a winking expression and a smile.

name: Osvaldo
bio: Osvaldo is a property developer! He specializes in countryside apartment buildings with shaded outdoor areas, unique Gothic flourishes, and strict anti-garlic ordinances. His latest units are available to lease now, but be warned—utilities are not included!
appearance: Osvaldo is a vampire with black hair and purple skin. His hair forms a widows peak on his forehead and he has a short ponytail at the back of his head. He has pointed ears, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth with white fangs. He wears a black jacket with gold buttons, purple pants and bow-tie, as well as a black vampire cape lined in red.

name: Ottie
bio: Ottie works at Peety's clothing boutique. She closes the shop nightly and leaves everything in tip-top shape for the morning. Ottie loves to help every customer and is skilled at creating outfits for every 'Mallow. Come by the shop and Ottie will put together some looks just for you!
appearance: Ottie is a brown cupcake with pink frosting, decorated with rainbow sprinkles. she has a heart shaped cherry on top. her bottom half is magenta with red vertical stripes. she has round black eyes with short lashes, a red smile and pink cheeks.

name: Ottilie
bio: Ottilie grew up in the city but her heart is in the wilderness! She's a proud park ranger of her region's national park. Ottilie flies around all day checking on various wildlife, monitoring air quality, and leading nature tours. So grab a hiking stick and let Ottilie show you around her beloved park!
appearance: Ottilie is a grey pigeon with big black eyes and a big beak. She has fuzzy grey wings. She has pink blush spots on her cheeks. Green and purple scalloped collar around its neck.

name: Otto
bio: Are you ready to pick out the perfect pumpkin? Make sure you visit Otto's farm — he grows the best pumpkins around! Otto wins the contest for the largest pumpkin almost every year. Last year his prize-winning pumpkin was bigger than a house!
appearance: Otto is a grim reaper who is entirely black save for his white skull face. His skull is humanoid, with round eye sockets, an inverted heart nose and four flat teeth. A pointed hood comes off his head and a ghostly tail trails behind him. He carries a scythe with a silver blade and brown handle.

name: Ova
bio: Meet Ova. She loves movie marathons, slumber parties, and roller coasters. She's scared of heights, so she might take some time to get on the ride! Will you help her get over her fear?
appearance: Ova is a bright pink walrus with holding a mint ice cream with chocolate sprinkles between her flippers. She has an off-white muzzle with a black nose and white tusks protruding from her mouth. Her belly is also white. She has closed eyes and straight, black whiskers.

name: Owen
bio: Owen is a gift of a friend; he has a heart of gold and hopes to positively affect others as a therapist in the future. He was adopted into the wonderful family ofHootandHolly, the three ‘Mallows in a pod.
appearance: Owen is a lime-colored owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on his face and belly. Small, green feathers decorate his chest. He has black eyes with short, straight lashes, and an orange, triangular beak.

name: Owyn
bio: Meet Owyn. He loves all you can eat buffet, singing his heart  out and making jewelry. He uses materials he finds on the coral reef to make earrings, necklaces, and bracelets for all of his friends. Want one of Owyn's cool and unique pieces? He'd love to make you something!
appearance: Owyn is a dark lavander purple octopus with a white belly. He has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including magenta,  purple, violet, and orange). Owyn has has two eyes with eyelashes which are closed and a smiling mouth. He also have a silver headband with pink fuzzy hairdo.

name: Oz
bio: Lights, camera, action, Oz is ready to take center stage! This succulent can't wait to show off his stuff. With his powerful voice and dance moves, this 'Mallow' is sure to keep you grooving to music all day!
appearance: Oz is a succulent plant inside of an orange pot that makes up his body. He has seven tall, green leaves coming out of the top of the pot with small, light green spots on them. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Ozu
bio: Give Ozu one word, and he can write a beautiful poem inspired by it! He sits outside the milkshake shop most days writing away. Stop by to share your favorite word and Ozu will spin you a poem in minutes. Who knows maybe he'll even treat you to a chocolate malt!
appearance: Ozu is a baby blue bear with round ears. He has a pale blue muzzle and inner ears. He has round black eyes, along with a black nose and cat-like smile. He wear a maroon vest with a mint and red houndstooth patterned neck scarf. He wears golden glasses the same color as the buttons on his vest.

name: PJ
bio: Look out world, because PJ is about to put his name on buildings near and far! An aspiring architect, PJ has a knack for creative design, organization, and knowing how to add a special touch to just about everything he does.
appearance: PJ is a white bear with grey markings on his ears, around his eyes and in a band around his body. His eyes and nose are black.

name: Pablito
bio: Pablito believes everything happens for a reason. Like when his phone was stolen he realized he was spending too much time on that thing anyways! Or that one day he was randomly struck by lightning and gained superhero strength and then realized the city was under attack and only he could save it. Stuff like that!
appearance: Pablito is a sloth with a blue body and a light grey patch on his face and has a white belly. The banded markings around his eyes and his muzzle are dark gray. He has closed eyes, a round nose and a cat-like smile, all of which are black.

name: Pace
bio: Pace entered a talent show at school! She's going to perform a scene from one of her favorite musicals and is rehearsing the dance moves every day with her best pals. Pace and her friends are going to lip sync the lyrics and wear matching outfits! Will Pace see you at the talent show?
appearance: Pace is a tan fox with enormous, triangular ears. Her inner ears are fluffy and pink. Her belly and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. She has round black eyes, a triangular nose.

name: Paco
bio: Paco is quite the entertainer among his friends. He loves to be up to date on current events and loves sports. His favorite sport is soccer and he hopes to become a sports broadcaster when he grows up.
appearance: Paco has a bright red body with a white belly and mohawk. He has small, fluffy wings that are rainbow striped. He has a broad yellow beak and large black eyes.

name: Paddock
bio: If you're in need of luck, Paddock could be the mallow for you. Though he doesn't call himself, good things tend to happen when he's around.
appearance: Paddock is a cobalt blue horse with a white stripe on his forehead. He has black eyes and a periwinkle blue mane and tail. His muzzle, inner ears and belly are white. He has a green four leaf clover emblem on the right side of his chest.

name: Paden
bio: Paden lives for Saturday morning cartoons. He wakes up extra early so he doesn't miss a single one! For Paden, watching cartoons is more than just fun, as he's also learning valuable storytelling skills for when he starts creating his own animated shows. Want to see Paden's story ideas?
appearance: Paden's body consists of a stack of three pancakes, each brown on the top half and blue on the bottom. A pat of yellow butter sits atop his head, which has a splotch of blueberry syrup, and a blueberry. He has round, black eyes, pink blush and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Paedra
bio: Paedra is a beautiful panda-corn who also happens to be the best big sister. She almost always has a solution to any problem. Though she isn't much older, she is very wise and helps her siblings learn through stories.
appearance: Paedra is a white panda with pale turqoise markings around her eyes. Her nose and mouth are the same color. Her ears and the band around her belly are fluffy, with a tie-dyed pattern including shades of turquoise, purple and dark blue. She has black eyes ringed in white and a shimmery, slate blue unicorn horn in the centre of her head.

name: Paige
bio: Many are sweet, but Paige is quite spicy. She is the little firecracker of her friend group, and loves to show it. Paige always takes the spotlight with her supportive Squishmallows pals front and center.
appearance: Paige is an orange pumpkin with carved features like a jack-o-lantern. She has triangular eyes and a broad grin with three prominent square teeth. There is a green stem on her head and a triangular, leaf-like pattern.

name: Paige the Owl
bio: You can't miss Paige singing along to every song on the radio! Her beautiful voice is just as contagious as her bubbly personality. Get ready to inspire Paige's next album with all of your future adventures
appearance: Paige is a pink with prominent ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. Small, pink feathers decorate her chest. She has round black eyes, with lashes and a pink triangular beak.

name: Paislee
bio: Want to paint with Paislee? Paislee is a very talented artist, and has created all kinds of colorful murals all over her city! Paislee's paintings are almost as big as they are beautiful. Tag along to help Paislee with her newest creation?
appearance: Paislee is a pandacorn in the style of a Hug Mee with a pastel purple stripe across her body, pastel purple ears, eye markings, arms, legs, nose and mouth. She has a silver, glittery unicorn horn, and black lashed eyes. She wears a Santa hat with grey and white patterns, and a red scarf with a similar pattern.

name: Paisley
bio: Paisley loves makeovers, this year she had a spooky slumber party for her birthday. Can you guess what they did? Movie marathon and makeovers of course! One day maybe Paisley will get to do makeovers for the movies.
appearance: Paisley is a rainbow tie-dye pegasus with a pink fairy floss mane. Her muzzle, her belly, and the insides of her ears are all white. The white patch on her belly has two hearts embroidered onto it, a small blue one and a larger hot pink one. She also has shimmery, silver wings and round, black eyes with short curly eyelashes.

name: Paislynn
bio: Meet Paislynn. It may seem basic to some, but she really loves fall. Hearing the crunch of leaves under her feet, wearing warm cozy sweaters, and the feeling that comes from being with friends are just a few of her favorite things.
appearance: Paislynn is a latte in an orange takeaway cup. She has a white lid with a brown straw poking out, and a bright orange body with a brown band around her middle. A pumpkin design decorates a brown stripe in the middle. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, pink blush and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Palasha
bio: Meet Palasha. She loves to paint. Palasha isn't very good at painting yet, but no matter how silly her work might be, she still enjoys it. To protest perfection, she paints cards for her friends and family and has her own gallery showing each month. Do you want to see her work?
appearance: (Might work on this sometime later)

name: Palmer
bio: Have you seen the latest Mallow sculpture? It was designed by your guy, Palmer! He's an eclectic kind of goat, creating amazing statues and sculptures. When he's looking for some inspiration, he heads to the beach at sunrise to surf and meditate.
appearance: Palmer is a mint goat with numerous white markings. These are found inside his ears, in a triangle pattern on his forehead, on his muzzle, his belly and on the underside of his tail. He also has a fluffy white goatee. He has two mint colored triangular horns and round black eyes.

name: Palmina
bio: Meet Palmina She loves to be organized and having her desk picture perfect. One day she wants to be a set designer, she loves to help with the school play. This year she bought her owl toolkit, she wants to be prepared for anything.
appearance: Palmina is an alicorn a combination of a unicorn and pegasus, with a pink and orange tie-dye pattern. She has a fluffy, pink mane and tail. She has a white belly with a heart constellation and muzzle. Her horn, inner ears and wings are all white. She has round, black eyes with long lashes.

name: Paloma
bio: This pegasus loves to create art by welding! She works with her brothers in their family welding business, and although she is still learning how to use the big lasers, she loves to weld together scraps and make beautiful art from nothing.
appearance: Paloma is a dark pink pegasus with a lighter pink mane. The insides of her ears, her muzzle and her belly are all white. She also has shimmery silver wings and round, black eyes with curly eyelashes.

name: Pam
bio: An aspiring florist, Pam is a natural at creating the most beautiful bouquets. Make sure to place an order with her before Valentine's Day!
appearance: Pam is a tan dog with a white belly. She has black markings around her eyes, as well as a black muzzle and ears. She has a grey nose and mouth and black eyes ringed in white. She has the word 'Love' embroidered in red on her chest, accompanied by hot pink and purple hearts.

name: Pama
bio: Pama reads so many books that there are stacks of them everywhere in her home! Pama prefers classic novels and short stories, but she will read anything if you recommend it. This 'Mallow even has a collection of encyclopedias she will sometimes open up and read just for fun!
appearance: Pama is a strawberry cake pop with a yellow stick that sticks out of her top. She has three layers of batter each layer having a different shade of pink, the bottom being a reddish pink, the middle is hot pink, and the top is a light pink color. She has pink and white sprinkles on her head and a pink strawberry. She has black eyes with lashes, a black smile, and light pink blush.

name: Pammy
bio: Pammy is a small town pig who recently moved to a new city, but she's still a little nervous to venture out. She's thinking about learning pottery to meet new 'Mallows or maybe a dance class. Could you show her around?
appearance: Pammy is a lavender-coloured pig with dark purple purple splotches and round, black eyes. Her belly, snout, and the insides of her ears are all white. The white patch on her belly is also embroidered with two heart outlines, a large blue one and a smaller red one.

name: Pandora
bio: Ever since Pandora’s parents invited a magician to perform at her last birthday party, she’s dreamed of nothing other than learning how to do magic. When Pandora grows up, she plans on performing in front of large crowds and dazzling them with her slight of hand!
appearance: Pandora is a pale pink pegasus with a fairy floss mane. The insides of her ears, her muzzle and her belly are all white. She also has shimmery silver wings and round, black eyes with curly eyelashes.

name: Pania
bio: Meet Pania. She likes to run and do obstacle courses, she is all about testing her limits as an athlete. Pania wants to be a track coach when she grows up so she can inspire others to work hard and set goals.
appearance: Pania is a teal fox with long, protruding, triangular ears. The inside of her ears are a shiny silver and her belly and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. She has closed black eyes with eyelashes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek. She has a long, fuzzy tail.

name: Panja
bio: Meet Panja. She helps her besties,GinaandRuby, whip up the best hot cocoa in the North Pole. Panja and her squad sing holiday tunes while they make tasty treats and pick out gifts for friends, they may not always be in tune but they sure have a great time.
appearance: Panja is a white unicorn with a fluffy grey mane and tail. Their belly is patterned with a red and white swirl design which resembles a peppermint. Their horn is shimmery red with a white spiral. Their inner ears and muzzle are both sparkling silver, and they have bright red nostrils. Their closed eyes are adorned with short, curled lashes.

name: Paolo
bio: Paolo recently read in a fitness magazine that "abs are made in the kitchen, not the gym." While he's not quite sure what planking next to his paprika has to do with anything, at least he can open the freezer for a nice, refreshing breeze!
appearance: Paolo is a pomsky. His face is a black and his lower body is a white. He has triangular shaped ears with white inner ears with white eye brows and a long patch. He has a white fuzzy belly. He has round, black eyes and a white muzzle with a black nose and mouth with a pink tongue sticking out.

name: Parson
bio: Parson participates in the student leadership program at their school! They write their own speeches for orientation and mentor a group of young 'Mallows who will one day be leaders themselves. Parson loves to build confidence in others and help them grow into the best they can be!
appearance: Parson is a giraffe with a teal body covered in orange spots. He has a light blue mane running down his back. He has two white horns. The inside of his ears, his muzzle and his belly are all white and the nostrils are little teal hearts.

name: Parviz
bio: Meet Parviz he is an expert toymaker by day and a professional cartoon watcher by night. If you couldn't tell, Parviz is a very smart 'Mallow! Parviz has some ideas on toy styles that he'd like to discuss. Have you seen any good toy designs lately?
appearance: Parviz is a light grey penguin of the Hug Mee line with a white face and grey flippers. He wears a green and yellow dragon costume with silver horns and has a yellow belly with wings on his back. He has an orange beak and feet with pink cheeks.

name: Pat
bio: Pat broke his three-decade no-crying streak last year when his favorite football team finally won the league championship. Life hadn't been super easy at that point and the joy of seeing #27 make the game-winning touchdown reminded Pat just how great the world can be!
appearance: Pat is a tan Boston cream donut with chocolate and white icing. He has some custard cream on top of his head. He has round, black eyes and a red smile.

name: Patchouli
bio: Patchouli is a brown and white rat  with large, round glittery pink ears. He also has a white belly and has closed mischievous eyes with black whiskers on each side. He has a pink nose with a black mouth and a buck tooth sticking out. On the back he has a long pink tail. He is also eating a pizza slice.
appearance: Patchouli is a brown and white rat  with large, round glittery pink ears. He also has a white belly and has closed mischievous eyes with black whiskers on each side. He has a pink nose with a black mouth and a buck tooth sticking out. On the back he has a long pink tail. He is also eating a pizza slice.

name: Patricia
bio: Patricia is trying on new outfits for a big event next weekend! What do you think of this blue and purple jumper? Nothing energizes Patricia like a shopping spree with her 'Mallow pals. Her bestie,Cristina, is picking out some jewelry to complete Patricia's look!
appearance: Patricia has a purple and blue chip bag with red on the bottom, her middle has word that spelled CHIPS. She has potato chips in her bag. Her face consists of black simple eyes and a smile.

name: Patricio
bio: Patricio delivers the news he's a paperboy! He's saving up for a big trip because he wants to fly around the world. Where do you think he should start first?
appearance: Patricio is a vampire with pale blue skin and black hair with bat ears. He has a big red bowtie on his charcoal black belly. He has two bat wings on each side. He has round, black and a red smile with two small white fangs. In candy form he looks the same but with a Hershey's milk chocolate wrapper around his body.

name: Patrick
bio: Meet Patrick, this Squishmallow is one happiest you'll ever meet. He gets a little grumpy when his belly isn't full but once he eats he's back to his happy Squishmallow self.
appearance: Patrick a purple tie-dye (with the mixture of pink and blue almost likeTheo) sloth with a white face and sequin belly which has a combination of purples. He has a teal silver snout and markings around his eyes, as well as a black nose with cat-like mouth.

name: Patterson
bio: Patterson tried out for his school's football team today! He fumbled the ball once during tryouts, but otherwise did a good job. Patterson hopes to start playing now as a freshman so he can make the varsity team. Can you imagine Patterson sporting one of those leather jackets?
appearance: Patterson is a grey moose with a lighter grey muzzle, inner ears and belly. He has dark red antlers and a red and dark-green colored plaid-patterned scarf. He has dark brown nostrils and black eyes.

name: Patty
bio: Patty's family has the most popular booth at the springtime farmer's market; she loves to help them out, but when the work is done, she loves to stomp in puddles.
appearance: Patty is mostly comprised of pastel pink, with patches of lavender purple on her lower left side and on her right ear. She has small, triangular horns and round black eyes. The inside of her ears, muzzle, and her horns are all white.

name: Paul
bio: Paul loves to play ball! Since bellyball is his favorite sport, Paul is very excited to be starting an official Bellyball League. Hopefully, his friends will join so that they can see Paul's incredible curveball!
appearance: Paul is a light blue koala with enormous, round ears. His belly and the insides of his ears are white. He has a large black nose, as well as round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Pauletta
bio: Pauletta loves a good mystery novel. In fact, she's writing one of her own! It's about a pair of missing diamond earrings and Pauletta can't wait to finish it. All she needs now is to figure out where they went!
appearance: Pauletta is a lavender fox with tall, pointed ears and a dark purple fuzzy belly. She has lilac fur markings over her eyes and muzzle with lashed closed eyes, and a purple nose and curved mouth. She has purple and white glittery hearts on her belly.

name: Paulette
bio: Paulette expresses her emotions through the flowers in her crown. Though she felt could only use black roses in the past, she's proud to to have entered her daffodil and peony era. April showers bring May flowers, and no one knows that better than the 'Mallow who weathered the storm!
appearance: Paulette is a tie-dye fox with enormous, triangular ears. Her inner ears are fluffy and pink. Her belly and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. She has round black eyes and a triangular nose. She wears a flower crown on her head.

name: Paulie
bio: Who is creative, loves to dance and while he DJs, and tries to make a difference in the world? Paulie! This Philanthropic pup hopes to make the world a better place through music and being kind. Maybe one day he'll start a nonprofit that focuses on music and giving back
appearance: Paulie is a black Schnauzer with fuzzy ears and a white bearded snout with bushy two eyebrows. He has a short, curled fuzzy tail and a white belly. His eyes are rimmed in white and nose and curved mouth are all black.

name: Pauline
bio: Pauline may seem gruff now and then, but her troll buddies know that just means it’s close to suppertime. A hangry troll is one thing, but a hangry Pauline—watch out! Luckily, the local bistro is familiar with Pauline’s highs and lows and always saves a meat pie for her. Meet Pauline tonight for a cozy meal!
appearance: Pauline is a baby blue troll with small dark spots by her head and side. Her ears are large and triangular with mint inner ears, fuzzy belly, and tuft of fur on her head. She has round black eyes, pink blush, and a black smile with sharp teeth poking from the bottom of her mouth.

name: Paulita
bio: Paulita is the nap queen. She loves to take naps almost all day and then spends her free time singing, painting, or eating her favorite food: chicken nuggets.
appearance: Paulita is a pink tabby cat with a pastel pink body and darker, candy pink stripes on her head and sides. She has a white belly and inner ears to match. Her nose and mouth are hot pink, framed by black whiskers, and her eyes are closed.

name: Paulton
bio: Meet Paulton. This chocolate bar is the perfect mix of sweet and spicy. Paulton is a digital diva who brings joy to his friends, especially at work. When he's not putting out fires you can find him unwinding with his plant haven or on his way to brunch.
appearance: Paulton is a brown chocolate bar with four carved squares which is light brown and the rest of the chocolate being dark brown. There is a red rapper on the outside of the chocolate bar with round, black eyes and a smiling mouth and a folded part of the rapper which is silver.

name: Pavlo
bio: Meet the great and powerful Pavlo! The most powerful thing about Pavlo is his stomach! He can eat anything and everything even when he's full he goes back for seconds. It's no wonder his favorite restaurants are buffet style!
appearance: Pavlo is a Llama with a rose pink body. Both the insides of his ears are silver and the back of his are also rose pink. He has a pair of sunglasses with pink, teal, blue and yellow stripes. At the bottom left of his belly there is text reading "XOXO" in white surrounded by teal and yellow hearts.

name: Pawel
appearance: Pawel is a grey Squishmallow with a pink tuft of fur on his head, and pink inner-ears. He has a pink patch on his belly covered with grey spots, eyes that are round and black, a black nose, and a smile.

name: Pax
bio: Pax spends hours in the studio working on his music. His dreamy soundscapes will transport you out of this world with soothing synths that he mixes with nature sounds that he records on his hikes. So relax, put your headphones on, and your mind at ease!
appearance: Pax is a guinea pig with small, round ears. He has two large patches of color on either side of his head: grey on the left, bright orange on the right. His inner ears and nose are pink. He has closed, black eyes and a black mouth.

name: Paxton
bio: Meet Paxton. He loves Malloween but this perky pumpkin is afraid of the dark! Paxton has a pirate ship night light that makes spooky pirate ships sounds. One day he hopes to overcome his fear of the dark, would you help him conquer his fear?
appearance: Paxton is an orange pumpkin. His left eye is carved and is a triangular eye closed upwards. He also has a carved mouth with jagged teeth on the bottom lip and rounded chunks cut from the top. He wears a black eyepatch over his right eye and a black pirate's tricorn with a white skull emblem on the front.

name: Pearl
bio: Pearl loves strawberry milkshakes and watching the sunset. She sings her favorite songs in the shower and dreams of one day performing on stage.
appearance: Pearl is a mermaid with curled lilac hair and pale skin. She has a shimmery, orange tail which is covered in sequins and has a pattern of silver stars. She wears a starfish clip in her hair and a mint green bikini top. She has round, black eyes with long curly lashes, a small nose and a pink, smiling mouth.

name: Pearson
bio: Meet Pearson! Pearson lives with his grandparents and loves mac n cheese, motorbikes, and fly fishing. Even though he doesn't like fish, Pearson loves to spend time with his grandma because she taught him how to fish! He's not old enough to ride motorcycles yet but one day he will!
appearance: Pearson is a white bear with a rainbow tie-dye pattern on his ears, around his eyes and in a band around his body. His nose, mouth and eyes are all black, and his eyes have a white ring around them.

name: Pedi
bio: Meet Pedi. This octopus’s has a taste for food and adventure. Pedi hopes to travel the world as a chef someday. She wants to learn how to cook with new or different ingredients and seeing exciting things along the way. Do you have a recipe to share with Pedi?
appearance: Pedi is an octopus with a rainbow tie-dye pattern and a white belly. Her colors are predominantly purple and blue, with splashes of red and yellow. She have a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including red, yellow, blue and deep purple). She have round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Peety
bio: Watch Peety strut on by wearing her own unique designs! This pretty pig owns a boutique in town lined with all her stylish creations. Peety's style is whimsical, timeless, and flattering on all 'Mallow shapes and sizes. Let Peety show you around her store!
appearance: Peety is a pastel pink pig with darker pink patches splotches. She has curly ears with a darker patch on the right one. Small, silver wings sprout from either side of her body. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes. Her inner ears, snout and belly are all white.

name: Pei
bio: Pei is an amazing navigator and understands the world unlike any other. Their sense of direction and advice is almost mystical. With a map in hand and a mind full of ideas, Pei leads all of their friends in the right direction.
appearance: Pei is a white bear with a rainbow tie-dye pattern on their ears, around their eyes and in a band around their body. Their nose, mouth and eyes are all black, and their eyes have a white ring around them. They have metallic silver wings and a matching unicorn horn in the centre of their head.

name: Pell
bio: Pell loves to shop and he's a serious impulse buyer! This 'Mallow can't help but pick up an item or two at the register, or dig through the crates at the front of the store for any fun-looking knick-knacks. Check out his collection of trading cards!
appearance: Pell is light blue with white horns and a white chin. He has a brindled/speckled stomach with white and grey splotches.

name: Penelope
bio: Loveable, cuddly and oh so cute, Penelope is the perfect Valentine. She loves to share her sweets with those around her, and is great at making them herself.
appearance: Penelope is a white bear with bright red markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band around her body. She has a red nose and mouth as well as round, black eyes ringed in white. She has a heart emblem on the right side of her body with a small purple heart, a medium pink one and a large, pale blue one.

name: Penelope the Pandacorn
bio: Penelope loves to travel; every winter her family goes on beach vacations. In the summer, she tends to her bamboo garden daily.
appearance: Penelope is a panda with black ears, a black stripe running across her body, eye markings, and paws. She has glittery silver wings, inner ears, and horn on her forehead. Her black eyes have lashes with a white rim around them and her nose and curved mouth are black.

name: Penny
bio: Penny is the total opposite of her brother,Scout. Her paintings are pure perfection and she never colors outside of the lines. Last year her painting won first place at her school's Easter Art competition. She's ready to win again!
appearance: Penny is a white bear with baby blue markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band around her body. She has a blue nose and mouth as well as round, black eyes ringed in white.

name: Peony
bio: Peony is a very sweet and shy 'Mallow. But if you want to get a conversation started, just ask about the book she's currently reading! Peony reads every chance she gets and never leaves her home without at least one paperback in her purse. Want to start a book club with Peony?
appearance: Peony is a stack of three pancakes pink, purple and teal with lighter bottoms on each pancake. She has whipped cream on the top and strawberry syrup with rainbow sprinkles. Her eyes are black with lashes, pink blush, and a plain black smile.

name: Pep
bio: Meet Pep. He's a delivery driver who loves to sing while he's working. He may be tone deaf but that doesn't stop him! Pep loves blasting music so he can sing and dance along on his route. Next time you see him, give him a wave.
appearance: Pep is a cheesy yellow pizza slice. He is decorated with various toppings represented by large, red circles and small green cubes. He has a brown crust which appears as a stripe at the base on the front, and covers his back half. He has round, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Pepper
bio: Pepper loves waltzing in the ballrooms of sunken cruise ships; sometimes, she even imagines she was a glamorous passenger on board—Princess Flipperina of Whales!
appearance: Pepper is a taffy pink walrus with flippers on each side of her body. Her muzzle and belly are white, as are the tusks which are protruding from her mouth. She has black closed eyes, straight whiskers and a pink nose. She also has some magenta hair.

name: Percy
bio: Ready, set, action! Percy loves to come up with extreme storylines for his action figures. He's also interested in robotics, and is learning how to code!
appearance: Percy is a pegacorn, a combination of a unicorn and pegasus, with a rainbow tie-dye pattern. He has a fluffy mane and tail which are brightly rainbow colored. The insides of his ears, his muzzle and his belly are all white. He also has shimmery pink wings, a matching horn and round, black eyes with curly eyelashes.

name: Perkin
bio: Everyone in town knows Perkin! He lives a quiet life, but you can usually find him out in the evenings after the sun has set. Don't be alarmed by his glowing red eyes, because Perkin is as pleasant as any 'Mallow you'll meet. So if you see him around, go ahead and say 'hello'!
appearance: Perkin is a black mothman, a humanoid cryptid creature that resembles a large bird. He has short, fuzzy antennae that protrude from the top of his head and bat-like wings on either side of his body. His antennae and belly are dark gray and fuzzy, and he has round, black eyes rimmed with red. He has a small gray smile and two dark gray cheeks.

name: Perl
bio: Having a party? Call Perl to organize it! It's true—she loves to plan any party, no matter the size. Just make sure to give Perl a budget. She's been known to take events to an above and beyond level. Aren't ice sculptures appropriate for every event?
