appearance: Perl a is a tan colored donut with pink icing with a swirl of white icing. Sprinkles in hot pink decorate her face. She has sparkly cherry jelly pouring out coming out from her head. She has a cherry on the right side of her head. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, a black, smiling mouth.

name: Perni
bio: Meet Perni. This 'Mallow is an expert bird watcher. He keeps a journal and writes down all the different types of birds he sees on his hikes. He keeps native plants around his house to attract his favorite bird of all, the humming bird! Grab some binoculars and join him!
appearance: Perni is a dark blue Hug-Mees with a patch of longer dark purple fur like a fringe. He has a white muzzle, belly and inner ears. He has thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and are shiny silver. Thin dark blue lines mark the sections. He has arms and legs and has a distinct head and body.

name: Perry
bio: Hang 10 with Perry for the day and you’re sure to become an avid surfer! When he’s not surfing you can find him relaxing near the beach enjoying frozen yogurt and waxing his board for the next wave.
appearance: Perry is a mint green dolphin with two fins on each side and a dorsal fin on his head. He has an ivory belly and the standard Squishmallow face of round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Persefanie
bio: Meet Persefanie. She loves bubbles, bicycles, and beach volleyball. Persefanie spends her summers at the beach perfecting her serve and playing in the sand, she just added streamers to her bike and has a little bell to let others know she's passing by. Will you play volleyball with Persefanie?
appearance: Persefanie is a white bear with black markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band around her body. She has widely spaced, green, cartoon-style eyes. She also has a white muzzle with a black nose and mouth.

name: Persephone
bio: Psst—remember to say you were with Persephone last night at Goths Who Code! Her dad would have a total cow if he found out where she actually was, volunteering at the local flower garden. A pink robe is one thing—tending to living things? Gosh he'd just freak!
appearance: Persephone is a grim reaper with a pink cloak. Her skull is humanoid with round eyes with lashes, a black nose and four teeth with pink blush. A pointed hood comes off her head and a ghostly tail trails behind her. She carries a scythe with a silver blade and a rose gold handle with flowers.

name: Pete
bio: Pete signed up for a 5k race—but didn't realize it was a mud run! Since a harrowing 2nd grade field trip to the swamp, he's been terrified of what lies beneath the mucky wet dirt. He's hoping he can overcome his fear with positive affirmations, courage, and running so fast that the mud man can't get you!
appearance: Pete is a ginseng pig with darker stripes around the front of his body. He has tan ears with white inner ears with two roots on each side of his body and a white belly. On top of his he has two green leaves. He has round, black eyes a white muzzle and two tan nostrils.

name: Peter
bio: Yes, you guessed it! Peter is quite the cuddly pig. He loves the winter time, and cuddling up with other pigs in a blanket. When he’s not getting cozy, you can find him at a wrestling match or giving piggy back rides to his friends. Peter loves making new friends and is very good at keeping the old ones, too.
appearance: Peter is a pastel pink pig with white details inside his ears, on his snout and on his belly. His ears are triangular and flop forwards. He has two round, black eyes and distinct pink nostrils.

name: Peterson
bio: Peterson drives a big pickup truck—the same one he's been driving for years. Sometimes it goes on the fritz and Peterson has to make repairs, but this cookie doesn't mind one bit. His truck helps everyone around town with moves of all sizes, making Peterson's pickup truck as beloved as he is.
appearance: Peterson is a golden-brown gingerbread boy wearing a red and green trapper hat. He has squiggles of white icing running down either side of his body. He has a pale colored belly with a squiggle of icing and red gumdrop buttons decorating it and a green peppermint. He also wears a large, red bow tie above his buttons. He has round eyes and a red, smiling mouth and squared cheeks.

name: Petey
bio: Meet Petey. This playful pirate is always ready for fun. He tends to get distracted very easily but he makes an excellent first mate! His favorite kind of adventure? Sharing the code for the latest scary movie with his friends.
appearance: Petey is a Caucasian boy with ginger hair. He has a smiling face and round, black eyes. His pirate costume is mostly black and includes a black tricorn with yellow trim and a skull on the front. His clothes are black with a blue and white striped belly.

name: Petina
bio: Lasagna and painting are two of Petina's favorite things. She started painting as a mini 'Mallow to map out her feelings and discovered how good it made her feel. She looks forward to sharing art and lasagna with her foster family wheneverTerrycomes to town.
appearance: Petina is a pale grey turkey with fluffy, red and orange wings and an extravagant tail. Her tail is black at the bottom with red and pale grey bands towards the tip. Her belly is a darker grey than the rest of her body. She has a round, yellow beak with a red wattle below, as well as round, black eyes.

name: Petina the Polar Bear
bio: Petina plays the trumpet and loves baseball. When she grows up, she hopes to be a team manager one day! Her favorite stadium snack is caramel popcorn with chocolate drizzle, do you want to go to a baseball game with Petina?
appearance: Petina is a white bear with round ears that are shiny rainbow inside.  She has closed black eyes with eyelashes, right above pink blush on her cheeks, and a gray nose.

name: Petra
bio: Petra loves gel pens, striped socks, and scary movies. She has movie marathons with her friends and even started a movie club at school. Maybe one day she can direct her own scary films.
appearance: Petra is a pastel pink pig with white details inside her ears, on her snout and on her belly. Her ears are triangular and flop forwards. She has two round, black eyes with curled lashes and distinct pink nostrils.

name: Petrina
bio: Meet Petrina. Lasagna and painting are two of her favorite things, Petrina says good food and art are necessary for her self-care routine. Her dream is to travel and paint after a leisurely lunch, where should she go first?
appearance: Petrina is a mint owl with prominent silver ear tufts which resemble horns. She has white markings on her face and belly, as well as fluffy white wings. Small, mint feathers decorate her chest. She has closed eyes with numerous short lashes, and a triangular, pale gold beak.

name: Petula
bio: Petula's personality is just as beautiful and bold as she is! She's the perfect 'Mallow to ask for fashion or makeup advice because she's always on top of the latest trends. She loves bringing out the beauty from within, do you want to get glam with this unicorn?
appearance: Petula is a faded blue, almost grey unicorn. She has a fluffy, bright, rainbow mane and tail. Her belly is patterned in pastel rainbow stripes. Her inner ears and muzzle are white, and she has a light pink horn with a hot pink spiral. In herclip form, her horn is hot pink with silver sparkles. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and white shines.

name: Peyton
bio: Peyton is an environmental advocate who wants to help the world go green! She dreams of becoming an environmental lawyer who will protect endangered animals, combat pollution and save the worlds coral reefs. She's a great friend to take on your next beach cleanup!
appearance: Peyton is a pastel pink fox with large, triangular ears. Her belly, the insides of her ears and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. She has round black eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek.

name: Phaedra
bio: Phaedra is an actress! She just signed on to play "Maritza Cactus" in Squishmallows docudrama "The World According to Squish" and can't wait to start filming. Maybe she'll even get to meet the spiny legend herself and ask what makes her prick!
appearance: Phaedra is a peach leopard with peach spots all over her body. Her stomach is a fuzzy white ombre. Her ears are silver and her muzzle is white. She has two round black eyes with eyelashes and a peach nose and mouth.

name: Philip
bio: Philip is an artist at heart who draws his inspiration from everyday life - from photography to watercolors to pottery. He has been known to feature his friends in his artwork, so put on your best smirk and prepare to become the next Mona Lisa!
appearance: Philip is a light brown horse with a white star marking on his forehead. He has round, black eyes and a chocolate brown mane and tail. His muzzle, belly and the inside of his ears are white.

name: Philipe
bio: Meet Philipe; he loves taking long road trips up the coast with his friends in his bright blue convertible! They have perfected their road trip playlist and always playing funky tunes! Come join! They make tons of pit stops load up on yummy saltwater taffy and fun souvenirs!
appearance: Philipe is a blue tie-dye axolotl. He has fuzzy dark blue, blue, and light blue gills on each side of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a pale blue belly, as well as round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Philippe
bio: Philippe enjoys a good game of hopscotch with his friends, especiallyMarco. He also enjoys taking pictures of his family and friends, which he will be doing this Valentine’s Day. Join him!
appearance: Philippe is a green frog with a white colored belly. His eyes sit on top of his head, and are black rimmed in white. He has prominent nostrils above his smiling mouth, and a pale pink, sparkly heart on each cheek.

name: Philomena
bio: Philomena believes everyone deserves more sleep—that's why she's running for mayor! This siesta-loving politician hopes her platform of guaranteed nap time and memory foam for all strikes a chord with voters. If elected, Philomena promises to put tiredness to rest!
appearance: Philomena is a mauve purple toad with an off-white belly. Her eyes sit on top of her head, and are black rimmed in white. She has prominent nostrils above her smiling mouth, and a pale pink blush on her cheeks. Her back is covered in darker purple splotches.

name: Phobia
bio: Phobia isn't afraid of anything! Why should she be? It's not like she cares or whatever. Ya, this girl is tough! And definitely doesn't cry. And definitely doesn't need anyone. Except for maybe someone to talk to. Or understand her. Or even just tell her everything'll be okay. But that'sit!
appearance: Phobia is a witch with purple hair tied into pigtails. On her head, she wears a witch hat with a moon buckle and a purple band. She wears a purple gingham shirt with purple stitched fabric on her shirt and wears black pants. She has round, black eyes and a red smile.

name: Phoebe
bio: Phoebe is the fraternal twin sister ofFifi. While her sister likes to travel the world, Phoebe prefers discovering the world through the books she reads. She read over 1,000 and is the perfect buddy for story time!
appearance: Phoebe is a hot pink fox with large, triangular ears. Her belly, the insides of her ears and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. She has round black eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek.

name: Phoenix
bio: Phoenix is a kind-hearted and clever unicorn. When she's not spending time with her unigals, she volunteers her at the hospital. She loves playing boardgames with patients and is always up for a challenge. Are you ready to get your game on with Phoenix?
appearance: Phoenix is a unicorn patterned with splotches of bright, fluorescent colors. While pink is the most prominent color, she also has blue, orange, purple and green patches. Her mane, tail and belly are white. Her muzzle, inner ears and horn are shimmery and pearl-colored, and the horn also has a dark pink swirl. She has closed, happy eyes with curled lashes.

name: Phyllis
bio: Have you met Phyllis? She is captain of the swimming team and can't wait to get back in the pool. If she could, she would turn into a mermaid!
appearance: Phyllis is a peach and is indeed peach colored. She has a split down her left side which forms her two halves. A single green leave sticks up from the top of her head. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Phylo
bio: Phylo is an amazing painter. He spends hours in his studio painting abstract shapes and landscapes, He loves to create vibrant colors and textures! When he's not painting, you can find him out dancing with his friends or ordering yummy take-out.
appearance: Phylo is a black dragon  with a circular-shaped white face. His eyes are surrounded by blue flower-details, and all around he is decorated with intricate purple, teal, and pink  sugar skull-style designs. His wings are black and purple with pink and teal dots, and rounding the top of his white face cutout is a 3 leafed pink and yellow flower.

name: Piaxa
bio: Meet Piaxa. She may be out of this world but she is one curious creature. Piaxa loves to spend hours reading in her blanket forts. She loves to read mysteries, adventure books, and even comics, do you have any recommendations to share?
appearance: Piaxa is a tie-dye pink, purple, blue and black alien with stars. She has 2 black, round dots on her antennae that resemble eyes. She has 2 black, round eyes with rings around them and a smiling mouth. She also has a blue belly with a made-up constellation on it.

name: Pierogi
bio: Pierogi is not only a plumber—he's also an amateur magician! This wannabe wizard loves performing tricks for his customers. Though they don't always go according to plan, Pierogi the Magnificent never fails with his signature spell: Abracaday, leak go away!
appearance: Pierogi is a pale-yellow monkey with rounded ears on the sides of his head and a long tail. His inner ears and heart-shaped face are a lemon yellow, with his head poking out of a half-peeled banana with a yellow base and lighter yellow peels. He has black eyes and a black smile with a yellow-orange nose.

name: Pierre
bio: Mozart, Beethoven, and Bach are some of Pierre's favorite composers.  One day he hopes to have one of his own compositions played at the Sydney Opera House.
appearance: Pierre is a light blue Hug-Mees with a white belly and nose.  He has white around his eyes and in his ears.  He has arms and legs and his eyes are open.  He has a distinct head and body.

name: Pierre the Snake
bio: Meet Pierre. They love slithering along the paths by their house looking for rare flowers, plants, and trees! One time they even found a carnivorous plant! Want to tag along with Pierre?
appearance: Pierre is a green snake with a white lower jaw and belly. Their belly is light yellow with green stripes, and resembles a rattlesnake. They have a large hood which is covered in dark green scales. They have round black eyes and a black, smiling mouth. A thin, pink, forked tongue pokes out from their mouth.

name: Pike
bio: Pike organizes a toy drive in his community every year. He makes sure every little 'Mallow gets a few new toys during the holidays, and he even helps with the gift wrapping—that's Pike's favorite part! Want to volunteer at the toy drive this year?
appearance: Pike is a green Christmas tree with yellow, blue, red, and white decorations scattered on his body. He wear a red Santa hat, have rounded black eyes, and a red smile.

name: Pilar
bio: Ready for a relaxing afternoon with your friend Pilar? Lace-up your shoes and off you go! Pilar likes to start off with a little hacky sack or disc golf followed by a snack, what do you want to do first?
appearance: Pilar is a light green grasshopper with green wings. They have a yellow belly with green stripes, pink cheeks, and two antennae with fuzzy yellow tips. Their eyes are black circles, and they have a simple black smile.

name: Pink Caticorn
appearance: This Squishmallow is a pale pink caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears and her belly, as well her horn, are white. The swirl on the horn is a blossom pink, as are her nose and mouth. She has closed eyes and two black whiskers on either side of her face.

name: Pinxelle
bio: Pinxelle is a bit shy, she enjoys keeping to herself. She has a small group of friends, they've known each other since they were mini 'Mallows. Even if they become busy, they make time for each other and always have each other's backs.
appearance: Pinxelle is a planet with an off-white base streaked with brown and orange stripes. A shimmery, silver ring runs on a titled angle around her center. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Piper
bio: Are you ready to meet Piper? Piper is the queen of ice skating; she is known for her fun dance moves and outrageous outfits! She especially likes to dress up for her birthday on December 15. She flies down the hills on her fluffy belly and holds the world record for creating the best igloo in all the world. If she’s not playing in the snow, you can find her having cocoa with her friendPuffor scoping out new books to read in the local library. She is incredibly wise and intuitive and is always the first to come up with new ideas in class!
appearance: Piper is a bright pink penguin with a white face and belly. She has a large orange beak and closed eyes with very short lashes.

name: Pippie
bio: Meet Pippie! If you're ever feeling low, Pippie's warm and kind personality is sure to turn your day around! Do you want to know what secret ingredient makes Pippie so sweet? Smiles!
appearance: Pippie has a tan crust with orange pumpkin filling visible between the gaps in the upper crust's crisscross pattern. They also have a dollop of whipped cream on top. There is embroidery of a pumpkin near the top of their head.

name: Plath
bio: Plath's favorite TV drama just got canceled after two seasons, Bummer! On the bright side, Plath is a talented creative writer and can write her own fan fiction to keep the story going. At least until her favorite characters get married. Plath can't wait to write that episode!
appearance: Plath is a lovebird. She has an orange head, a lime body and a yellow belly. Her wings lime. She has a rounded, red beak with a yellow cere above it, as well as round, black eyes with lashes and pale pink blush.

name: Platt
bio: Platt drives around his town this time of year to look at all the holiday lights and decorations! They put him in a great mood, and he loves to see all the thought and creativity his neighbors put into dressing their homes and front lawns. Wanna go look at holiday lights with Platt?
appearance: Platt is a red candle. On top of his head He has a yellow flame which is melting pink wax from on top of his head. He has a pink sticker with a peppermint on it. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Pleyton
bio: Meet Pleyton! Even though this 'Mallow is cold-blooded, his favorite places are cold and snowy. While all his friends are heading to the beach, he headed to the mountains with a warm jacket and lots of layers! No matter where he goes, Pleyton make sure to bring his bestie —Amalie! Want to come on a chilly adventure with Pleyton?
appearance: Pleyton is a yellow snake with a white tummy with three gold lines. On his back, he has many gold dots and a pointy tail with gold dots. His face consists of two black round eyes, two dots that point down as his nose, and a red wavy mouth with a pink forked tongue.

name: Plum
bio: DJ Plum thinks EDM is the genre to beat, while her bestieSargesays jazz is the cat’s meow! On their radio show, “Bebops & Beep Boops”, they synthesize their musical interests. Last episode, Plum discovered that fist-bumping to a syncopated clarinet solo is difficult—but not impossible!
appearance: Plum is a grey leopard with blue spots all over her body. Her stomach is fuzzy and grey. The inside of her ears are shiny silver and her muzzle is grey. She has two round black eyes with eyelashes and a blue nose and mouth.

name: Polaris
bio: Polaris is tired of being confused for Santa Claus! Just because he has a white beard and enjoys the occasional Christmas cookie does NOT mean he is Jolly St. Nick. Even if he was, Polaris is sure Santa wouldn't appreciate being interrupted at dinner with "wah, wah, Santa may I have a toy train set" either!
appearance: Polaris  is a bluish-grey Kirin, a hooved mythical creature from East Asian folklore, with a grey belly and has a snowflake. His inner ears and muzzle are an grey. He has a grey mane, tail, goatee, and diamond marking on his forehead. He has silver holographic deer-like horns and black eyes.

name: Poleena
bio: Have you ever walked into a room and forgotten why? This happens to Poleena all the time. She's constantly forgetting where she put her keys or where she last saw her eyeglasses, (they're on her head). She may be forgetful, but she always remembers to have fun!
appearance: Poleena is a pink-purple dinosaur. Her belly is tie-dyed with red, pink and purple hues, though some editions have a solid, metallic pink belly. She has pink spines running down her back. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Polly
bio: Polly likes pancakes, strawberry ice cream and going to the amusement park. When they go, her whole family wears matching t-shirts and they pack a huge picnic lunch. Polly wants to visit amusement parks all over the world, where should she go next?
appearance: Polly is a white panda with purple markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band around her body. Her eye markings have spikes resembling eye lashes on the outside. She has black eyes ringed in white, and a purple nose and mouth. She has metallic silver wings and a silver unicorn horn in the center of her head.

name: Pollyanna
bio: Pollyanna suffers from VHABF: Very Happy and Bubbly Face! She’s trying to toughen up her countenance for the cutthroat world of corporate finance—grinning isn’t exactly a good negotiation tactic—but thinks her “intimidating” face might look a little ridiculous. “Serious business gal” is one thing—“Medusa” is another!
appearance: Pollyanna  is a magenta cow with black patches by the upper right of her head and on the left side of her body. She has creamy white inner ears and muzzle, grey horns and a magenta tail with a black, fuzzy tip. She has angry eyes and pink nostrils.

name: Pommie
bio: Grab your tiara and get ready for awards season! Pommie hosts unforgettable award show parties all winter, and while getting dressed up isn't required, it is encouraged! You can except bite-sized appetizers, nomination ballots, and cheerful shouts during the ceremony. Will you RSVP?
appearance: Pommie is a orange drink that has a brown label with a red apple and a green leaf. There is white whipped cream with orange sprinkles on the top of it with a cinnamon straw on the left side. Pommie has black rounded eyes with a black smile.

name: Ponder
bio: Ponder studies philosophy. He loves having deep conversation with his fellow classmates, and anyone he might meet at the student café. Ponder hopes to continue in academia and even teach his own philosophy class some day!
appearance: Ponder is a panda with a white body with ruby red ears, and ruby red markings on his eyes. He wears a fuzzy maroon sherpa hoodie with white laces. He has black eyes, rimmed in white a maroon nose and mouth.

name: Ponderosa
bio: Have you ever met a seafaring unicorn? Now you have! Ponderosa flies ahead of her ship to watch for land, bad weather, and scout for danger. On her down time, she enjoys rootbeer floats and sharing stories with the crew.
appearance: Ponderosa is a purple unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has purple nostrils. She has a short, shimmering white horn with a purple spiral detail. Her eyes are closed and have short lashes.

name: Poodle
bio: Order up! Poodle is roller skating waitress. Though serving shakes on skates can be difficult, Poodle is a total pro. In fact, she just learned to go backwards! Would you like fries with that?
appearance: Poodle has a pink and magenta can with bubbles on the right side and on bottom and top there white. Her soda lid is pink and magenta, and she has closed eyes and a red smile.

name: Pooja
appearance: Pooja is a white tiger with pink stripes all around them. They have a white belly and black rounded eyes with short lashes! They have a white muzzle and a pink nose and mouth.

name: Pookems
bio: Pookems is a world champion speed-typer! Fans say she makes record time when she has a witty viral movie review churning or some craaaazy tea to drop in the groupchat. Like last week when her nemesis had the audacity to ask if she wanted to grab coffee sometime—her thumbs actually broke the sound barrier!
appearance: Pookems is a blue yeti with a round pale grey face. She has pink horns on either side of her head and a puff of fur on her forehead. She has round black eyes, as well as a pink smiling mouth. She also has a fuzzy pink belly.

name: Poplina
bio: Poplina is super sweet and just a little shy. Although it may take her a minute to open up to new 'Mallows, once she does, you'll get to know her very quickly. Poplina has all sorts of stories, did you know she's been to eight countries?
appearance: Poplina is a purple drink. Her colour is lighter at the top, fading into a darker shade of purple as it goes down the squishmallow.  She also has bluish-purple colored tapioca pearls, and a white lid with a pale blue straw. She has a smiling mouth, and she is winking.

name: Poppy
bio: Put on your dancing shoes because Poppy is here to show off some moves. Poppy and her dance partnerMaddoxare the king and queen of the dance floor. Gliding and grooving around, they are a sight to see. Poppy chooses the music based on her mood.
appearance: Poppy is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. She wears a pastel pink hat printed with white polka dots atop her head, and a pale blue outfit with yellow accents on her bottom half.

name: Posey
bio: Mini-golf and frisbee are two of Posey's favorite games, she could play for hours! Last year she had a mini-golf birthday party, they played mini-golf until it was almost dark. That was the best birthday ever.
appearance: Posey is a baby blue dog with upright, triangular ears. Her body is covered with a pattern of silver star silhouettes. She has white markings around her eyes and a black nose. She has closed, happy eyes with short lashes and a pink blush. She wears a pastel rainbow bow on her left ear.

name: Powell
bio: Powell can't wait for their favorite winter sport—ice fishing! The ice is almost thick enough for Powell and his family to drive over and set up the shanty. Powell brought his fishing spear and hopes to catch lots of yummy fish for himself and the whole fam!
appearance: Powell is a bluish-grey platypus with a fuzzy blue belly. He wears a plaid blue trapper hat. He has a blue duck-like bill. He has round, black eyes. He also has a blue round tail for swimming and keeping balance.

name: Poxiana
bio: Poxiana is all ready for the slumber party. She has her toothbrush, a sleeping bag, and a sleeping mask that all match her costume. She loves all things unicorn! She can't wait to see her friends and all their costumes. What costume will you be wearing?
appearance: Poxiana is a blue penguin with a white face. She has closed, happy eyes, pink blush, and a tiny orange beak. She is wearing a pink unicorn onesie with rainbow metallic details, including a patch at the front, ears and a horn. The costume also has a multi-colored mane with purple, ice blue and hot pink sections.

name: Preeti
bio: Look—no bones! When it comes to bending over backwards, Preeti is a total pro. In fact, this super flexible slug is a limbo world champion. With no knees or vertebrae holding her back, it's easy to see why! How low can you go?
appearance: Preeti is a slug with a royal blue color body and a pale blue belly. She has two dark orange antennae which stand up on her head. On her back, she has three dark orange stripes. She has round, black eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Preeto
bio: Preeto has being dreams for a big city: Preeto Town! He envisions a samosa stand on every corner, a replica of the park from his favorite romance novel, and even a limbo hall dedicated to his best friend,Preeti. Invest now, and you can totally be mayor!
appearance: Preeto is a slug with a sage green color body and a pale green belly. He has two seaweed green antennae which stand up on his head. On his back, he has three seaweed green stripes. He has round, black eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Prescott
bio: This panda loves to show her love by giving thoughtful. handmade gifts! Every Valentine's Day. Prescott gives her family themed presents that she's been working on for months. Last year, everyone got hand-knit socks and an invitation to a family ice skating party! Would you hit the ice with Prescott?
appearance: Prescott is a white bear with periwinkle markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band that says XOXO in silver with two magenta hearts in the two O's around her body. Her eyes are black with eyelashes and her nose and mouth are periwinkle ,

name: Prescott the Penguin
bio: Come chill with Prescott! Prescott loves the cold, so winter is her favorite season. She and her friendsPiperandPuffall like to wear their matching parkas and have photoshoots together in the snow!
appearance: Prescott is rainbow, tie-dyed penguin with a white face and belly. She has a yellow beak and feet, and black eyes with lashes. She wears a red beanie with a grey and white pattern on it trimmed with white fuzz and a white pom pom on top.

name: Prim
bio: Prim loves looking at the sky, she is fascinated by life above her head! Each dawn, Prim wakes up early so she can watch the little bit of night sky turn into the next beautiful day. At night-time, it's almost impossible to get Prim to go to sleep because she's obsessed with the stars!
appearance: Prim is a rainbow, tie-dyed unicorn with a pattern of stars covering her body. She has a plain white belly. Her horn, inner ears and muzzle are all shiny silver, with pink nostrils and a swirl on her horn. She has closed eyes with short eyelashes and a candy pink mane.

name: Primrose
bio: Primrose is in that awkward in-between stage—no longer an egg, but not yet a moth! With play dates becoming slumber parties and her favorite astronaut doll seeing fewer missions than usual, Primrose is beginning to understand that some things are meant to change, but others never will.
appearance: Primrose is a cream-colored caterpillar with silver dots on the sides of her segmented body. She has a light pink velvet belly and antennae. She has round black eyes with lashes, a black smiling mouth, and a pink blush.

name: Prince
bio: Original:Prince is considered royalty on the playground. You can’t miss him doing flips and tricks across the monkey bars with his adventurous Squishmallows pals. Want to join in on the fun?
appearance: Prince is an orange-yellow or tan dog with a white belly. He has black markings around his eyes, as well as a black muzzle and ears. He has a grey nose and mouth and black eyes ringed in white.

name: Prior
bio: Prior loves lavender candles, pop music girl groups, and his little sister,Primrose. Though he sometimes gets annoyed withPrimrosewhen she begs to go to the mall with him—or when she steals his favorite cherry apple chapstick—Prior remembers just how tricky the larva stage can be. At least she has a fabulous older brother to help her through it!
appearance: Prior is a cream moth with a pink velvet belly and antennae. He has velvet pink wings with golden oval shaped eyespot. He has round black eyes, a black smile and pale pink blush marks.

name: Priscilla
bio: Have you met Priscilla? This perky peacock is always ready to lend a helping hand, there’s not much she can’t do! Priscilla loves to spend time with her friends and finds many new activities for them to try.
appearance: Priscilla is a bright blue bird with stubby wings and an extravagant feathered tail. Both her belly and the tips of her tail are a light sky blue. Three cobalt feathers sit atop her head. She has a small, yellow beak and round black eyes with thick lashes.

name: Prital
bio: Meet Prital! Prital owns a small business specializing in organic, loose leaf teas, and she creates unique blends with herbs picked fresh from her garden! Her favorite fusions include lavender and sage. Get ready for afternoon tea with Prital!
appearance: Prital is a gargoyle, a dragon-like creature. She is light grey with a darker grey belly. She has black horns with wing-like ears sitting below them. Her wings are also black. She has a grey muzzle, round, black eyes, and small, white fangs.

name: Priya
bio: Ready for a fun adventure in the clouds? Join Priya andCorinnatheir next quest! Priya's dad built them a clubhouse that looks out to the stars, so by day they watch for monsters in the clouds and by night, they go on space adventures with their telescopes.
appearance: Priya is a red panda with a light purple body. They have white markings on their muzzle, eyebrow-like ovals above their eyes and fluffy cheeks. Their eyes are black and their nose and mouth are periwinkle. The inside of their ears are shimmering lilac. They have a fuzzy, rainbow colored belly.

name: Priyanka
bio: Priyanka has a very special Valentine this year: Mother Nature! She thinks there's no one more deserving of love & affection and can't wait to spend the day of performing acts of service to demonstrate her gratitude. There's going to be a beach clean-up, a tree planting—even a sustainable sunset dinner for two!
appearance: Priyanka is a jackalope. She has a rainbow tie-dye body and long, vertical ears with light pink inner ears. She wears a red headband with white hearts. She has two silver antlers with two points each between his ears. She has a pink, fuzzy belly and tail. She has round, black eyes and a pink nose and mouth and has red heart blush and a pink heart above her right cheek.

name: Prometheus
bio: Prometheus is best friend's with a volcano! Though she's not a mountain of many words—or really any at all—Prometheus just likes having someone to talk to. The mean bullies at school might not appreciate fun facts about airplanes, but his introverted, igneous-producing bestie always will!
appearance: Prometheus is a white axolotl with silver gills with a brown frills on each side of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a white belly. He is sandwiched between two graham crackers and chocolate. The chocolate above is melting from his head. He has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Prue
bio: Prue founded her school's recycling club and has been an environmentalist since before it was cool! Prue swings by science classes to talk about energy saving habits and motivates other 'Mallows to get involved. Will you join her campaign?
appearance: Prue is a soft serve ice cream. Her ice cream is green, and teal, with a different color on each layer of the swirl. She has a brown waffle cone with a diamond pattern embroidered on it. She has closed eyes with lashes and a red smile with pink blush.

name: Puff
appearance: Puff is a cobalt blue penguin with a white face and belly. He has a large orange beak and closed, happy eyes.

name: Puff the Dragon
bio: This Squishmallow's tag did not include a bio.
appearance:
Puff is a light green dragon with a darker green snout. Its cat-like ears have a light green outside and a dark green inside. It has 3 stripes of dark green on each side near the bottom. Its has dark green spikes and horns. Its outer wings are light green and inner wings are dark green. Its wings are curved.
This squishmallow is based off 'Puff the dragon' from 'Puff the magic dragon' cartoon.

name: Purpo
bio: Purpo studies the deep sea and even just won an award for his research. Though other scientists might take a break after such an achievement, Purpo is headed straight back to work. This curious 'Mallow knows 80 percent of the ocean floor is undiscovered and won't stop until he gets to the bottom of it all!
appearance: Purpo is a neon purple gummy bear with a dark purple tummy. He has neon purple ears with dark purple inner ears and a neon purple tail behind. He has round dark purple eyes, a lavender muzzle and a dark purple nose and mouth.

name: Pyle
bio: When the sun goes down. Pyle, the tax accountant becomes DJ Pyle Remix, the hottest record-spinner in town. From disco to dubstep this far-out fungus loves helping 'Mallows dance the night away, In fact they sometimes boogie 'til breakfast! Got any requests?
appearance: Pyle is a mushroom with a lavender stalk and a dark cyan cap. The top of their cap is blue with cyan spots, and the underside is a less saturated blue. Their stalk makes up their body and includes a round, fuzzy teal belly. They has round, black eyes and a magenta, smiling mouth

name: Pyper
bio: This Squishmallow was not given a bio on their tag.
appearance: Pyper is a calico cat with a hot pink and black markings on their ears. They have a hot pink tail with a black tip. Their paws are white as they hold aHershey's Kisswith heart pattern on it. Their eyes are black and rounded with lashes and a pink nose and curved mouth and black whiskers on the side of their face. Their left eye has a pink heart on it.

name: Quartz
bio: Are you ready for a gouly adventure? Grab a flashlight and pack a bag, it's time to join Quartz on a ghost hunt! Quartz wants to befriend a ghost and hopes one day soon she can meet one.
appearance: Quartz is a pale purple owl with prominent silver ear tufts which resemble horns. She has white markings on her face and belly, as well as fluffy white wings. Small, purple feathers decorate her chest. She has closed eyes with numerous short lashes, and a triangular, pale gold beak.

name: Quayn
bio: Quayn is the queen of her local theme park! This social media manager loves riding the dynamite rollercoaster and meeting her favorite mascot. Princess Doctor. When Quayn isn't taking a splash on the Abandoned Well log ride, you can find her hosting a podcast with her bestie,Brooke. Remember to rate and review
appearance: Quayn is a lavender Hippocampus, a mythical creature with the upper body of a horse and the lower body of a fish. Her peach belly is made magenta sparkly gills. She has a lavender muzzle and nostrils with a magenta mane going from the top of her head to her back, with a rainbow dorsal fin and tail fin on her lower back. She has a white marking on his face going up from her muzzle to her mane, her eyes are black and round,

name: Queller
bio: Get ready to take a bow, because Queller is performing one of her piano concertos tonight! This pro pianist can't wait to put on her coattails and give it her all on the keys. Queller loves playing classical pieces, but she's thinking about sneaking in a pop ballad at tonight's show!
appearance: Queller is a possum with a white head and a pastel blue body. She has light blue rounded ears and belly with a light blue triangular tuft of fur on her head and a long pink tail. She has black whiskers and closed eyes with lashes, alongside a black mouth with a pink nose.

name: Quest
bio: Quest isn't a know-it-all—she just knows it all! Legend has it this owl has been giving advice for centuries. From princesses unsure of frogs and chefs unsure of ingredients, her ancient wisdom has led few astray. Need help? Just ask!
appearance: Quest is a black owl with black ear tufts and tail. She has white markings over her eyes with teal tips with a teal, fuzzy belly with a feather pattern embroidered on it. She wears a golden crown with black eyes with lashes, and a teal beak.

name: Quigley
bio: You're invited to Quigley's farm! Quigley's days are spent outside tending his vegetable patch and fruit orchard — he eats right off the land! This 'Mallow works hard but always finds the time to enjoy the sunset from his back porch.
appearance: Quigley is a squirrel with light brown fur. He has three orange stripes on his head, and his nose and mouth are the same shade. His face and belly are white and has a bushy orange tail. He has two black eyes, one open and one winking.

name: Quincy
bio: Known by his friends as "Question King Quincy", Quincy is one of the most inquisitive mallows around. Quincy asks some of the hardest questions and hopes that one day, he'll be able to answer them!
appearance: Quincy is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. He wears a purple hat printed with dark pink hearts atop his head, and a pink outfit with grey accents on his bottom half.

name: Quinick
bio: Quinick makes jewelry for fun, but his sibling,Nassim, is encouraging him to start a website for all of his shiny creations. Now Quinick is starting this little side business! All of his designs are minimal, dainty, and only use the best metal and stones. Would you like to request a custom piece made by Quinick?
appearance: Quinick is a brown cow with closed eyes and a wide orange stripe running through the center of his face. He has orange, fuzzy hair atop his head. His muzzle, inner ears and horns are all light tan in color. His belly is peach and features splotches in a darker shade of the same hue.

name: Quinn
bio: Quinn loves iced tea with lemon, sugar cookies, and making eggplant parm. She is an introvert and a foodie who loves to read about food from all over the world. Do you have any good food stories to share?
appearance: Quinn is a peach/light orange kangaroo with tall, upright ears. She has a round snout which is peach on top and white on the lower half. Her ears and belly are also white, and she has a fluffy pouch on her belly. She has round, black eyes and an orange nose.

name: Quinn the Fox
bio: Quinn loves to play hide and seek! She is fun and mischievous, and loves to skip through warm sunny meadows with her friends.
appearance: Quinn is a fox in the style of a laying Hug Mee. She has a tan body with black, tall, pointed ears and legs. She has a big fox tail with a white tip and a short tuft of fur at the top of head. Her inner ears, muzzle, eye markings, and whiskers are all white. She has eyelashes and her eyes closed, she has a black nose and curved mouth.

name: Quito
bio: Quito wants to take a photo with you! He's traveling the world snapping selfies with every friend he makes. Quito used to be less sociable, but being behind the camera has made him want to jump in front of the camera! Do you sometimes feel like a shy quokka too?
appearance: Need help with this

name: Rachel
bio: Meet Rachel; she's outgoing, sweet and here for fun. Rachel loves hanging with friends, getting lost in a good show, and spending the weekend on the water. Catch this mushroom on the boat jamming and surrounded by friends or curled up on the couch watching TV.
appearance: Rachel is a mushroom with a light pink stalk. She has a tie-dye top with shades of hot pink, pale pink, white and lemon yellow, decorated with hot pink spots. Her stalk makes up her body and includes a tie-dye belly that matches her top. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a smiling red mouth.

name: Rada
bio: Meet Rada. Rada is passionate and driven, and one day wants to be the CEO of her own company. She has everything ready, except a business idea. Have any suggestions?
appearance: Rada is a yellow and teal claw machine game. She has a light yellow body with a teal bottom and a white and teal striped top. On the bottom, she has a two purple and red round buttons on the right and a red and grey joystick on the left. In the middle, she has a light blue, rectangular window with a grey claw in the top right and various prizes on the bottom. Above the window, she has round, black eyes, and a smiling mouth.

name: Rafa
bio: Happy Hanukkah from Rafa! Rafa loves spending time with his family around the holidays and learning about his family's traditions. One thing he especially loves about Hanukkah is all the delicious food he gets to eat. What's your family's holiday tradition?
appearance: Rafa is a light-skinned human boy with brown hair and a simple, smiling face. He wears a dark blue kippah with a silver Star of David design. He also has a blue shirt and navy pants. His shirt is decorated with a row of 9 candles in various shades of blue which represent the 9 candles of a Hanukkah menorah.

name: Rafa the Dinosaur
bio: Rafa is always hungry, good thing they're an adventurous foodie! Rafa loves trying new food or making fun food combinations. Rafa's favorite type of food right now is dim sum. What's your favorite food?
appearance: Rafa is a teal dinosaur Laying Hug Mee's with their arms and legs. They have a blue spines running down to the tail. They had rounded black eyes and smiling mouth

name: Rafah
bio: Rafah just moved to a new town, got a new job, and a new apartment, Suffice to say, he's a little overwhelmed. This is Rafah's first big life shift and he's really feeling it. Want to grab a couple of seaweed lattes next week? Rafah could really use a buddy right now.
appearance: Rafah is a cream with peach lobster claws. He has cream antennae, and a peach tail. He has eight cream legs. He has a white belly and three cream stripes. His face consists of black eyes and simple black smile.

name: Rahima
bio: You've probably never met a 'Mallow as strong as Rahima. She's training for the biggest competition around, where she hopes to compete in the weightlifting category. Even though her muscles might intimidate you, she's as sweet as she is strong.
appearance: Rahima is a tan camel with tan fur on her head and white fur in a heart-shaped patch on her chest. She has a cream muzzle and inner ears. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes and two narrow nostrils connected to a smiling mouth. Her back is covered by an orange saddle with a red rim and patterns of white, black and blue diamonds.

name: Raina
bio: Meet Raina. She enjoys working with numbers and solving puzzles. She creates a plan of action and uses that to get things done. Even her garden was designed with a beautiful blueprint in mind! If you need a plan, she's you gal!
appearance: Raina is a teal blue penguin with a white face and belly. She has a large yellow beak and round, black eyes with short lashes. She has large, fluffy wings that are purple and blue. She wears a sparkly silver tiara and round, carnation pink glasses.

name: Rainbow Llama
appearance: This Squishmallow is tie-dyed in rainbow, predominantly pink and blue with some yellow. They have a round, white face with black eyes, nose and mouth. They also have two curved lashes on each eye. Their inner ears and the fluff atop their head are all white.

name: Raine
bio: Congratulations to Raine! This amateur geologist just discovered a previously unidentified semi-precious gemstone and can't wait to name it after his favorite food. Look out Topaz and Opal— here comes Stale Buttered Toast!
appearance: Raine is a dark blue octopus with a white belly. He has a round body with eight short tentacles, each of which is a different color (including dark blue, navy, lavender and powder blue ). He has round black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Raisy
bio: Meet Raisy. Last week, she dozed off and had a crazy dream, she dreamt that she discovered a new galaxy and that 'Mallows could fly around in space! She flew off into the stars and then she woke up. Maybe one day it can come true!
appearance: Raisy is a bowl of ramen, a type of Japanese noodles. Her body is made up of an off-white bowl with red rimming the brim and base. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, pink blush and a red, smiling mouth. The top of her head reveals a traditional style ramen with orange noodles and other ingredients like naruto and sliced egg. A pair of chopsticks sticks out from the right side of her head.

name: Rajani
bio: A penny saved might be a penny earned, but what about a penny pressed? Ask Rajani! This cthulhu is crazy about coins and has enough pressed pennies to fill eight binders. Her favorite collectible cent would have to be the one from the chemistry museum—it went in copper-colored, and came out green!
appearance: Rajani is a lavender Cthulhu, a mythical cosmic entity with the head of a cuttlefish/octopus, dragon wings, and a humanoid body. She has a pink belly, and darker purple spots on her forehead. She has wings with her inner wings being a glittery silver color. She has a short tail with two short fins on her head. She has black eyes, pink blush, and four tentacles that cover her mouth.

name: Raleigh
bio: Raleigh likes to say he has the eye of the phoenix! That's when you understand on a very simpatico, karmic, kumbaya level that every ending is just another story's beginning, brother. Just ride the waves and let it hang. Just ride the waves... ride the waves...
appearance: Raleigh is a tan bobcat. He has a tan body and brown spots. He has brown fuzzy ears with white inner ears. He has fuzzy white belly and a white patch on his mouth. He has black whiskers, round, black eyes rimmed in brown, a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Ralphie
bio: You can find Ralphie most afternoons on “Rock Around the Block,” a television dance show for teens! While his Twisted Mule might be the talk of the school, Ralphie really comes alive dancing The Litterburg. All you need is a metal trash can, and ample neck and spine flexibility!
appearance: Ralphie is dark grey rat with large, round pink ears. He also has a light purple belly and has black mischievous eyes with black whiskers on each side. He has a pink nose with a black mouth and a buck tooth sticking out. On the back he has a long pink tail. He is also holding a grey garbage can.

name: Rambly
bio: Rambly is a crafty cat and her medium of choice is paper! This Halloween, she's folding up a whole bunch of paper lanterns with spooky cutouts in seasonal colors. But year-round, Rambly's favorite paper craft is origami—check out the peace sign she just made!
appearance: Rambly is a black cat with grey inner ears and belly. She has a long black tail and a black witch hat with an orange stripe and golden buckle on her head. She holds an orange origami peace sign in her paws, as mentioned in her bio.  Her eyes are black with white rings around them, white whiskers, a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Ramon
bio: How do you like your eggs, Ramon's making breakfast! Ramon has a big family who loves to eat and even though he's the youngest, he is an excellent cook.
appearance: Ramon is a golden colored lion with round ears and a white belly. He has a fluffy brown mane which covers his head. He has round black eyes and a black nose, which has a brown marking on top and a white muzzle beneath.

name: Ramona
bio: Meet Ramona, the hopscotch queen! She loves milkshakes (of every flavor) and wants to be a bus driver like her dad when she grows up.
appearance: Ramona is a red panda with, unsurprisingly, a red body. She has white markings including on her ears, on her muzzle, eyebrow-like ovals above her eyes and fluffy cheeks. She has round, black eyes and a hot pink nose and mouth. Her belly and the insides of her ears are pale pink. She has a heart emblem featuring a pale blue and red heart on the right side of her body.

name: Ramsey
bio: Firetrucks, lemonade and video games are some of Ramsey's favorite things. Though he's not allowed, he could play video games all day! Ramsey wants to be a firefighter when he grows up, he lives near a fire station and loves to wave when the trucks drive by.
appearance: Ramsey is a brown Bighorn Sheep with a dark brown belly. His belly has a white mountain logo, a reference to the US state of Colorado (where Learning Express Ft Collins is located). He has large horns which curl around under his ears and are striped in gold and green, which are the colors of CSU. His muzzle and ears are white and he also has a white patch on his backside. His eyes, nose and mouth are black.

name: Randall
bio: Geology student Randall was a little confused when he went to a heavy metal show and saw a rock band playing. Though he was disappointed they never talked about iron or copper, Randall loved the music— in fact, he just bought their CD! Rock out with Randall!
appearance: Randall is a mushroom with a pink stem and blue cap with white spots. He also has a yellow, fuzzy belly. He has black eyes and a black smiling mouth.

name: Randy
bio: If you can't find Randy, look up! Randy is a rock climbing expert, capturing scenic beauty from elevations above. But if you're lucky he'll invite you to be his next adventure buddy!
appearance: Randy is a grey raccoon with black markings around his eyes. Above these are white marks which resemble eyebrows. His belly and snout are also white, and there is a thin ring of white around his round black eyes too. And he has a letter on his belly "XOXO" with a purple heart

name: Raquel
bio: Raquel is a dreamer. She dreams of a colorful world full of happiness and peace! Some may say her head is in the clouds, but this pegacorn promises her dream will become reality with extra hard work, patience and acceptance.
appearance: Raquel is a pegacorn, a combination of a pegasus and a unicorn. This means that she has a unicorn hornandpegasus wings, all of which are metallic pink. Her inner ears also match. Her body is musk pink and she has a white muzzle and belly. Her fluffy mane and tail are white. She has closed eyes with long, curled lashes.

name: Rashad
bio: Rashad loves basketball, music, and taking midday naps. Rashad is the founding member of the music club at school and wants to own his own record label one day. They meet on Saturdays, do you want to join?
appearance: Rashad is a sky blue dinosaur with a white belly. He has lime green spines running down his back. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Rattles
bio: Rattles loves being a dance instructor. He is great at helping others to feel confident as he teaches them how to twist and turn on the dance floor! When he's not dancing, Rattles can be a bit clumsy. He's had to replace his cell phone three time already this year! Will you attend Rattles' next class?
appearance: Rattles is a western diamondback rattlesnake, a species of snake found in northern Mexico and the southern U.S. He is light brown in color with lighter brown spots. His belly is cream colored and has the phrase Diamondback embroidered on the left side. He has large amber eyes with slitted pupils, darker on top and lighter on the bottom. His nose, or upper jaw, is pronounced and has long, white fangs. He has an open mouth and a protruding, forked tongue.

name: Ravalia
bio: Ravalia is the life of the party - just like her famous fruit punch! She loves to add fresh fruit, tiny umbrellas and serves with the funkiest straw she can find. Try a batch at the next game night and get ready for charades and a good time!
appearance: Ravalia is a zebra with a rainbow body covered in black stripes, aside from on her pure white belly. Her muzzle is black with light purple nostrils and mouth and her ears are rainbow with light purple inside. Her fluffy mane is light purple and she has round, black eyes with purple irises and star and dot highlights.

name: Ray
bio: Ray is a princess movie superfan! He keeps begging his favorite animation studio to create a radioactive princess but so far no luck. However so far no luck. However, as Queen Grand Slam from "Diamond  in the Rough" famously said: "it takes a few strikes to hit a home-run, Baseballina!"
appearance: Ray is a black cat and has triangular ears with teal out lines in the inner ears. He has a ribcage outlined in teal on his belly. He has a round teal skull which is outlined, with round teal eyes a teal nose and two fangs.

name: Ray-Ray
bio: Ray-Ray is a teal bison with cream inner ears and nose with teal nostrils. His horns are sparkly teal and he has a soft tie-dye beard and head. He has, round black eyes and a cream muzzle.
appearance: Ray-Ray is a teal bison with cream inner ears and nose with teal nostrils. His horns are sparkly teal and he has a soft tie-dye beard and head. He has, round black eyes and a cream muzzle.

name: Rayen
bio: Rayen has an eye for design. Many other 'Mallows try to keep up with her latest fashion trends. She hopes to use her sketches and designs on the runway one day! Can she design something for you?
appearance: Rayen's body consists of a stack of three pancakes, each brown on the top half and cream on the bottom. A pat of yellow butter sits atop the left side of her head, melting into a dark brown shape resembling a flower. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes, pink blush and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Rayford
bio: Who loves ska music? Rayford does! Turn the volume to 11 and join him in his second favorite pastime: cooking! There's nothing he loves more than making a 5-course meal for others with his very best friend, Corlita!
appearance: Rayford is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy turquoise beard. He wears a pointed rainbow, tie-dye hat atop his head, and a dark blue outfit with mauve accents on his bottom half.

name: Raylor
bio: Meet Raylor. This perky pup loves hiking in the mountains, going on camping trips, and playing in the snow. Raylor recently moved from the city to a mountain town and can't wait to live his new life.
appearance: Raylor is a light grey dog with darker grey patches. He has patches of mottled grey and brown covering his ears and in large sections around his eyes. He has a white muzzle, with a stripe on his face and circular markings resembling eyebrows. He has round, black eyes ringed in light blue, and a black nose and mouth. His belly is white and fluffy.

name: Rayn
bio: Nothing puts Rayn a better mood than the lights and sounds of an arcade. It's her favorite place to be. Rayn can play pinball for hours and had a high score on three machines! The whole arcade is decorated for Valentine's Day. Come join Rayn for fizzy pink lemonade!
appearance: Rayn is a sugar glider, a type of possum which can glide using wing-like membranes. She is primarily rose red with a white lower face and belly. She has red markings in stripes covering each eye, a large stripe starting at her head and running down her back, on the tip of her tail and on the outer front side of her 'wings'. Her inner ears are red. She has round, black eyes and a red nose and mouth. On her tummy there is a gold heart with a pink word that says "Cutie"

name: Rease
bio: Meet Rease. This sweet and swirly 'Mallows knows how to brighten any space. She has an eye for interior design. She loves bright pops of color and incorporating natural elements like flowers and crystals! She decorated her friendMaudi'sperfume shop and it looks great!
appearance: Rease is a tan pastry with white icing dripping from the top of her head, with a pink and blue swirl and rainbow sprinkles decorated on top. She has pink blush, a black mouth and round eyes with lashes.

name: Rebecca
bio: Rebecca has a dream—to be the first supermodel in space! If her doctorate in astrophysics wasn't enough, 'astronaut eggshell' is totally her color. This supernova-loving superstar can't wait to pilot a rocket and serve face, face, face across the galaxy!
appearance: Rebecca is a black Jersey Devil. She has red horns on her head and black pointy ears with red inner ears. On the back of Rebecca she has a black devil-like tail. She has, round black eyes rimmed in white and a red smile with two fangs. She has red bat wings on each side of her body.

name: Reed
bio: Reed redecorates constantly. He rearranges furniture and decorations all to give his apartment a fresh look and vibe! Reed asks that you please take off your shoes when entering his home, but he'll provide you some comfy slippers. Want to see his new photo wall?
appearance: Reed is a rooster with a brown head and a dark blue body and wings. His comb and wattle (the crest on his head and shape beneath his beak) are bright red, as is the mask around his eyes. His rounded beak is bright orange, matching the feathers on his wingtips. He has round, black eyes and has no tail.

name: Reese
bio: Reese loves ants on a log with crunchy peanut butter and playing in the mud. Spring is her favorite season; it rains and provides plenty of mud puddles for her to jump in.
appearance: Reese is a Hug Mee pig. She has a white body with very pale purple splotches. Though her arms have the same pattern, her stubby legs are plain white. She has pink inner ears and a snout the same color with black nostrils.  She has two flowers decorating her plain white belly, a larger pink one and a smaller blue one.

name: Refalo
bio: Refalo forgets how he started restoring vintage lunch boxes, he just knows he hasn't stopped working on them for decades! There's a whole community of collectors who need help refreshing chipped paint or rusty handles. Refalo owns a few vintage lunch boxes himself, but he prefers repairing them for others.
appearance: Refalo is a blue pufferfish with bumps all over to represent a pufferfish's spikes. He has two blue pectoral fins, a dorsal fin at his back and a tail fin by his bottom. He has a teal belly, pink blush, black eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Regan
bio: Regan is the king of hip hop, aspiring to one day make it as a producer in the music business. He's made a few albums at home with his friends, and hopes they'll be out on the airwaves soon!
appearance: Regan is a bunny with turquoise fur and long, floppy ears. His inner ears and belly are covered in thick, long, white fur. His eyes are closed and he has two black whiskers on either side of his pale pink nose.

name: Reggie
bio: There goes Reggie! He's a world-class figure skater all over the world. Reggie performs freestyle movements of jumps, spins, and flips. His dream is to one day compete in the global figure skating competition. Will you be there to cheer on Reggie?
appearance: Reggie is a Wood color Ram. He has two large horns which curl around under his brown ears which has white insides. He has a pure white face with round black eyes with short lashes, a white nose and a pink mouth, and pink blush on his cheeks.

name: Regina
bio: Meet Regina. She loves the world of theatre and wants to be a set designer when she grows up. She enjoys working on the set and making sure everything looks perfect. One time, this silly Squishmallow build a castle out of soda cans!
appearance: Regina is a white and brown dog with upright, triangular ears. Her main body and inner ears are white, whereas she has two large brown patches which cover from her ear to her eye on either side of her face. She has round, black eyes, a black nose and mouth, and is poking out her pink tongue.

name: Reginald
bio: Captain of the lacrosse team, Reginald is a fearless leader. He loves to spend time with his teammates on and off the field, especially when it involves watching one of his favorite movies!
appearance: Reginald is a white and brown dog with upright, triangular ears. His main body and inner ears are white, whereas he has two large brown patches which cover from his ear to his eye on either side of his face.  He has round, black eyes, a black nose and mouth, and is poking out his pink tongue.

name: Regz
bio: Meet Regz. He loves loading up on art supplies and green tea mochi and drawing colorful, kooky characters in his sketchbook! When he grows up he wants to animate his very own cartoon show about an alien rock band from outer space! With Regz, you never know what he'll draw next!
appearance: Regz is a dark grey dog with a fluffy black belly. He has upright triangular ears with black insides. He has a pronounced snout with classic bulldog jowls and a rounded black nose. He has round, black eyes ringed in white.

name: Rei
bio: Have you ever met a Pegasus who loves avocados? Well, now you have! Rei is the life of the party and spends her free time at the beach. She loves blowing bubbles at sunset and then dancing and singing with her friends in the moonlight.
appearance: Rei is a lavender purple pegasus with a candy pink mane. She has a white muzzle with hot pink nostrils. The insides of her ears and her belly are patterned with pastel rainbow stripes. She also has shimmery fuchsia wings and closed, happy eyes with short eyelashes.

name: Reid
bio: Some days you just need a little advice, and that is Reid's secret weapon. They're a guidance counselor! Reid helps their students with challenges both at school and at home even if they all need is a friendly listener. Rumor has it, Reid might even give you a sticker or two
appearance: Reid is a pterodactyl, an ancient flying reptile. Their body is patterned in a blue and green tie-dye. Their beak and outer wings are Teal. The inside of their wings is silver. They have round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Reina
bio: Meet Reina; this fabulous butterfly loves fashion, fun and drawing. Her love for fashion inspires many of her beautiful creations. She is outgoing and loves to spend time with friends, maybe one day you will see her artwork on the cover of a magazine.
appearance: Reina's body is light aqua and she has a powder blue belly with thin aqua stripes across it. Her wings and antenna are a combination of vibrant aqua and sparkly candy pink colors, the former being the pom poms and the outside of her wings, the latter being the stalks and inner wings. She has black eyes with two short eyelashes on each, pink blushing cheeks and a smiling mouth.

name: Reishi
bio: Reishi always puts others before himself—literally! How else is he supposed to know if the rope bridge is rickety or the stew is too hot? He's lost a few friends over the years and wishes he knew why... here's hoping he finds them one day!
appearance: Reishi is a teal bottle of potion. He is made of teal liquid with mint and purple bubbles and pink stars. He has a black label with two mushrooms a gold moon and stars. He has a tan cork and a black string with a gold moon tag. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Relinda
bio: Meet Relinda. She loves flowers! She inherited her love for flowers from her grandmother who has a giant garden. Relinda plans to become a florist; she loves to create  beautiful bouquets, arrangements, and so much more! Would you like to see some of her work?
appearance: Relinda is a Turquoise sheep featuring a floral pattern of purple, lilac, and teal flowers and leaves on her belly and the inner parts of her ears. The outside of her ears are fluffy. She has a pink heart-shaped nose, a w smile, and round black eyes. She also has a turquoise tail with white on the inside portion.

name: Rell
bio: Meet Rell. He loves juggling fire, dipping double chocolate cookies in ranch dressing, and riding around town on his unicycle! Rell might fall sometimes, but he always gets back up. Actually, Rell is a pretty good unicycle teacher. Want to sign up for a class?
appearance: Rell has a white beard and his large nose is the only visible part of his face. He's wearing a blue pointed hat with a white star pattern and a white pompom at the tip. He has a grey belly and a white & red striped body.

name: Rembrandt
bio: Rembrandt is a green velvet Santa Bag with a thin golden string tied in a bow by their top. Their top reveals multiple gifts with a candy cane with yellow and red stripes. They have round, black eyes and a black smile.
appearance: Rembrandt is a green velvet Santa Bag with a thin golden string tied in a bow by their top. Their top reveals multiple gifts with a candy cane with yellow and red stripes. They have round, black eyes and a black smile.

name: Remmy
bio: Remmy has the reputation of being a "Gnome-It-All." She is an expert in trivia and quiz games, but Remmy really shines in the Squishmallows Spelling Bee. She's won 6 years in a row and nobody has even come close to beating her!
appearance: Remmy is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard. She wears a grey hat printed with red hearts atop her head, and a pink outfit with red accents on her bottom half.

name: Renaldo
bio: You can catch Renaldo zipping up and down the field!  This nimble 'Mallow is an amazing soccer player!  He and his team celebrate after every game with an extra-large and extra cheesy pizza!  Want to join?  Come play with Renaldo and Kick the Sky!
appearance: Renaldo has a black body with green accents and red eyes.

name: Renard
bio: Renard is a natural-born leader who has a knack for bringing others together. They love planning summer picnics and organizing freeze tag games in the park. Everyone is invited and encouraged to bring a friend. Renard always brings plenty of food for everyone so come join!
appearance: Renard is a bunny with a marbled pattern of orange-brown and cream. Their fluffy ears are orange with a cream underside and they have a fluffy white belly. They have a white muzzle with a pink nose and mouth, as well as round black eyes and two black whiskers on each cheek.

name: Renata
bio: Renata is a ballet dancer who  loves to show off her skills. She's been dancing since she was just a mini mallow. Her favorite snack after a weekend performance is a big plate of cheesy ravioli and chocolate milk.
appearance: Renata is a bunny tie-dyed in purple, pink and blue. She is also patterned in stars in the same color scheme. She has long, floppy ears and a fuzzy, white belly. Her eyes are closed with short lashes and she has a purple nose and mouth.

name: Renate
bio: Meet Renate. She wants to be a surgeon when she grows up. Even though being in the hospital can be scary sometimes, she wants to be a superhero to some lives. Who knows, maybe she can make medical history? Paging Doctor Renate!
appearance: Renate is a purple koala. She has furry, round ears that are multi-colored, mainly pink, purple, and yellow. She has an oval nose which is black, and a small smile. She has round, black eyes with curled eyelashes. She has a silver heart on her belly with an off-centre pink outline and "be kind" written in a purple font. She has also been released with a white belly and rainbow letter design.

name: Renne
bio: Renne is one fun 'Mallow. She loves calligraphy, drawing, and playing lacrosse! Her favorite colors are purple and blue and she loves a good movie night. What can Renne draw for you?
appearance: Renne is a latte in a white takeaway cup. She has a white lid with a brown straw poking out, and an off-white body with a brown band around her middle. A flame-like logo design decorates her middle. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, pink blush and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Renskof
bio: Renskof reports on local politics. Who was elected the city's new comptroller? Ask Renskof! He knows all about the politicians in this city, including what they like to eat for lunch. Actually, Renskof spends most of his time interviewing them at a local diner!
appearance: Renskof is a maroon cat with pointed, triangular ears with pink inner ears. He has a white belly. His nose and mouth are pale pink and framed by two white whiskers on either side. He has round, black eyes ringed in white.

name: Reshma
bio: Grab a helmet and grab a basket, it's time for a ride with Reshma. This motorcycle 'Mallow loves long rides to the forest, beach, or mountains. Her favorite place to ride is to the strawberry fields. She picks a few baskets for her favorite treat: strawberry shortcake.
appearance: Reshma is a pale pink cow with patches of coral pink on her lower left side and on her right ear. She has small, triangular horns and round black eyes. The inside of her ears and her muzzle are tan colored, and her horns are white.

name: Ressie
bio: Meet Ressie. She spends most of her time reading books, from ancient history to chemistry, she just loves to learn! Recently, Ressie read a book about dinosaurs and now she likes to look for fossils at the beach. What's your favorite kind of book to read?
appearance: Ressie is a bright red apple, vaguely shaped like a heart. She has a brown stem with a bright green leaf. She has closed eyes, small pink blush and a smiling mouth. A cheerful, tan-colored worm is popping out from her lower right side.

name: Resul
bio: Resul runs his own hot dog truck! He drives to busy beach spots and performs some of his clown tricks while waiting for hungry 'Mallows to gather. Resul's truck is known for all of its exciting topping options, like grilled pineapple, coleslaw, and super spicy sliced peppers! What hot dog toppings do you like?
appearance: Resul is a yellow humanoid clown with purple makeup, red nose, and blue lipstick he has green, fuzzy hair. He has black eyes and a black smiling mouth. He wears a black top hat. A pink collar, a black and blue shirt with purple and green buttons with a purple strap and green button on his right, and a green strap and purple button on his left.

name: Reva
bio: Reva is a great athlete and is almost always outside. You can usually find her playing soccer with friends. While she's great at soccer and hopes to be a professional player one day, Reva is also great at tennis! She enjoys having one sport for fun and one for focus.
appearance: Reva is a tie-dyed red and pink strawberry with a sparkling green top. White seeds decorate her body and she wears a white flower with a pink center on the right side of her head. She has round black eyes with a white shine and curled eyelashes, pink blush and a red smiling mouth.

name: Revna
bio: Watch your words with Revna! She's a debate team champ, two years in a row, and is serious about speech. Revna loves structuring her arguments, creating a standout thesis statement, and sprinkling in a few jokes to keep the audience engaged. Will you watch Revna at her next debate?
appearance: Revna has a brown cookie base with chocolate chips on top. She has tie-dye mint chocolate ice cream in the center. She has black closed eyes with short lashes and a red smiling mouth. She wears a pair of red earmuffs with golden reindeer antlers.

name: Rey
bio: Meet Rey. This shy shark has an eye for fashion, fun, and capturing the "perfect moment" for all of his friends. Rey loves to take pictures and add funky filters before sending the photos to his friends. One day he will have a gallery full of colorful snapshots to explore!
appearance: Rey is a bright blue shark with two fins on each side, one fin atop his head, a dorsal fin on his back and a tail fin. He has a round, white belly. He has round black eyes, a small toothy smile, and gills on both sides of his body.

name: Reza
bio: Nobody loves animals more than Reza. From earthworms to elephants, she is a tender and caring 'Mallow who believes every creature has something wonderful to offer. One day she wants to run her very own wildlife sanctuary just like her parents.
appearance: Caddie is an off-white/cream cat in the shape of a Hug Mee. She has a yellow patch by her right ear and a teal left ear, tipped tail, and patch by the lower left of her body. She has a fuzzy belly, muzzle, a pink nose and mouth, black whiskers, and closed eyes in a happy expression.

name: Reza the Squirrel
bio: Reza laughs in the face of any to-do list! She's motivated by productivity and puts every minute of her day to good use, even if that means a quick power nap. So if you're ready to get things done, give Reza a call!
appearance: Reza is a tan is a squirrel with closed eyes with 3 eyelashes on each eye and a fluffy tail. She has a swirl of whipped cream on the top of her head with rainbow sprinkles. Her stomach is cream white with a brown band around her body with a coffee bean emblem.

name: Rhett
bio: Rhett has a nose for breaking news and investigating reporting. He's always the first 'Mallow on the scene of an important story! Rhett relies on verified facts and well-crafted soy lattes to keep him going for another 24-hour news cycle.
appearance: Rhett is a black dog with a grey fluffy belly which resembles roses. He has black, triangular ears with silver insides. He has a grey pronounced snout with a classic bulldog jowls and a rounded black nose. He also has two round black eyes rimmed in white.

name: Rheya
bio: Want to play a game of tennis or a game of catch? Rheya is your girl!  She's sporty, fun, and always on the go.  Last year, Rheya was voted "Most Athletic" by her entire class! Playing ball helps her de-stress and feel like her best self. Come along and join the game!
appearance: Rheya is a white corgi with a purple back going over her eyes, ears, and tail. Her ears are floppy, and she has white inner ears. She has XOXO written by her belly in purple with the Os being replaced with teal hearts. Her nose and curved mouth are black with black eyes and her tongue poking out of her mouth.

name: Rheys
bio: Rheys may have a blind spot directly to the front, but his peripheral vision is fantastic! His sense of hearing is also so sharp, he could probably hear you from a mile away! Rheys travels all the time with his best buddies searching for warm ocean water and tropical fruits. Mangos are his favorite!
appearance: Rheys is a blue and green tie-dyed shark with two fins on each side of his body and a hammer shaped head. He has a round, white belly with black gills on both sides. He has round black eyes and a small smile.

name: Rhiannon
bio: If it’s holidays, beaches and great food you’re looking for then Rhiannon is your girl! This travelling mallow is at her happiest when she is laying on a sun lounger, relaxing in the heat. Her Squishmallow friends miss her when she’s away and love to hear her tales when she returns.
appearance: Rhiannon is a bright pink fox. She has large, triangular ears, the inside of which are white with a silver shimmer. Her belly has the same pattern. She has white markings on her face, including a round muzzle and fluffy cheeks. The markings on the tip of her tail her tail are also white. She has closed, happy eyes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Rhoda
bio: Rhoda is an accomplished data scientist and loyal friend. Sometimes she worries about her friends and family more than she needs to, but it's only because she wants the best for them! Rhoda takes long showers when she wants to relax, and nothing resets her mood like eating a delicious burrito!
appearance: Rhoda is a yellow rose with 5 petals poking out with a light green stem. She has closed, black eyes with short lashes with a smiling, black mouth.

name: Rhys
bio: When Rhys is curious about something, he goes after it. That's how he ended up in glass blowing class! Rhys saw a documentary about it on TV and decided to sign up for beginner lessons. This hamster is really getting the hang of it, and just finishing his first vase!
appearance: Rhys is a creamy white guinea pig with small, round ears. He has two cyan large patches with pink and purple tie-dye. His inner ears and nose are pink. He has round, black eyes and a black mouth.

name: Riah
bio: Have you met Riah? This little mallow is like a ray of sunshine - she makes mallows smile wherever she goes! Riah is kind, considerate, and loves to give hugs to all her friends and family. Her favorite food is peaches and her favorite sport is Taekwondo.
appearance: Riah is a pale grey yeti with a round, white face. She has glittery silver horns on either side of her head and a puff of fur on her forehead.
