She is winking her right eye and has short lashes, as well as pink blushes and a smiling mouth. She wears a pink flower with a yellow center above her left eye.

name: Riba
bio: Riba always has  something on his sleeves, or in his hat. That's because he's a magician! He's the life of the party because he's always doing amazing tricks. In fact, he's been known to pull entire King size candy bars out from behind your ears! How sweet is that?
appearance: Riba is a bright orange pumpkin with a spooky carved face. His eyes and nose are triangular, and they have jagged teeth. He wears a black bowler hat tipped to the left.

name: Ricardo
bio: Ricardo spends most Christmases at his pet rock shop. He always feels bad for the rocks that didn't find their forever home that year and loves throwing big holiday bashes to make them feel better. This year, there'll be hot cocoa, tiny Santa hats, and even a Secret Limestone gift exchange!
appearance: Ricardo is a green bat with triangular ears and wings on either side of his body. His inner ears and wing membrane are red. He has a peppermint belly. He has round, black eyes, a green muzzle and a curved smile which shows two pointed, white teeth.

name: Richard
bio: Richard spends his days napping and his nights working as a security guard. His favorite color is orange and even though he looks tough, this lion is a big softy.
appearance: Richard is a tan or dark golden lion with a white muzzle and belly. The bright, almost fluorescent mane which covers his head is rainbow, with lots of yellows, oranges, blues, greens and purples. He has round black eyes and a matching nose and mouth.

name: Richie
bio: Richie sketches in the morning before class and even sometimes during lunch. He's been on a roll lately, finishing almost one drawing a day! Richie hopes to segue his talent into video game animation, and even create his own games. Want to see some of Richie's ideas?
appearance: Richie is a teal axolotl with silver gills on each side of his head. His gills are lined with teal frills. He has small, stubby arms and a white belly. He wears a red scarf with a snow-like pattern. He has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Ricky
bio: Living up to his species, Ricky knows how to make all the other Squishmallows laugh! Catch him at his next open mic night and see for yourself!
appearance: Ricky is an orange fish with two large white stripes, one above his face and one in line with his orange fins. These stripes are lined in black. His belly is also white and he has two black eyes and a smiling mouth with small dimples.

name: Rico
bio: Did you hear the news? It's Rico's half birthday! This bighearted lab loves celebrations of any size, especially when there's cake involved. For this year's party, he's bringing his favorite—double carob with peanut butter frosting! Would you like a slice?
appearance: Rico is a chocolate brown dog with dark brown ears and a light brown belly. His has floppy ears from his head. He has a dark brown patch with a rounded black nose and mouth and round black eyes. He has a scoop of ice cream on top of his head which has a swirls of chocolate syrup with rainbow sprinkles.

name: Rida
bio: Meet Rida; she plays the mandolin in a folk band with her friends. They travel cross-country on their tour bus and perform their songs for retirement communities. Rida always loads the bus up with snacks, drinks, and movies for the long ride. Do you want to join the tour?
appearance: Rida is a lavender-purple gradient butterfly, has pink antenna; she has a white lined belly, purple butterfly wings, round, black eyes a red, smiling mouth and purple blush on her face.

name: Ridelle
bio: Got a big event coming up? Let Ridelle roll out the red carpet for you! She's a special events planner who always goes the extra mile for her clients-- no detail is ever too small for Ridelle the most memorable events are personalized and fun!
appearance: Ridelle is a candy pink hippo. Her body is all candy pink. She has a large pink round snout with two small square teeth. She has a pure white stomach. She also has two pink ears with white insides. She has two round black ears as well.

name: Rider
bio: Cedar Point is home for Rider, where enjoying rides all day is just another perk. Whether taking it easy on the train, spinning on a flat ride, or being thrilled on the biggest and best roller coasters, Rider still races to get back in line to ride again and again.
appearance: Rider is a navy blue bear with round ears, the inside of which are red. They have a white belly and muzzle with the official Cedar Point logo decorating their belly. They have round, black eyes, along with a black nose and mouth.

name: Ridge
bio: Meet Ridge. This generous 'Mallow loves collaboration! His motto is "Teamwork makes the dream work"! Whether you're planning a party, building a tree house, or just fixing a leaky pipe, Ridge is always willing to lend a helping hand!
appearance: Ridge is a grey dog with a white belly, fuzzy eyebrows, neck fur, and marking between his eyes. He has a long grey tail and rainbow hair held up by a holographic teal band. He has black eyes, nose, and curved mouth.

name: Rie
bio: Meet Rie! Rie has a big family with 4 siblings, and more than 12 cousins! She loves spending time with her family and playing hide-and-seek with her younger brothers. Want to join the game?
appearance: Rie is a grey=brown otter with small, folded ears and an off-white marking across her face. She has a round, fluffy, white belly, with inner ears to match. She has round black eyes which rest between the two colors of her face. She has a large, black nose, a narrow smile and 3 freckles and 3 whiskers on each cheek.

name: Rienne
bio: Hosting a game night? Don't forget to invite Rienne! She loves games of all kinds, her favorites are trivia and charades. Rienne knows how to keep game nights fun and make sure everyone feels included.
appearance: Rienne is a light jade green arctic fox with long, triangular ears. The inside of her ears are iridescent rainbow and her belly and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. She has closed black eyes with eyelashes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek. She has a long fuzzy blue tail.

name: Riley
bio: A big hello from Riley the dragon! Riley enjoys the finer things in life. He loves visiting art museums with colorful paintings. When he isn't admiring the art world around him, he enjoys travelling to new places that inspire him. Are you ready to get artsy with Riley?!
appearance: Riley is a pale grey dragon with a white muzzle and inner ears. His belly, the inside of his wings and the horns on his head are striped with pastel rainbow colors. He has two large black eyes and pale grey nostrils.

name: Rilo
bio: Rilo heard there's a snowstorm moving into town and now he can't wait to shovel his driveway. Shoveling snow is Rilo's favorite winter activities. Once he even shoveled a snow maze in his backyard! Want to help Rilo sprinkle the sidewalk salt!
appearance: Rilo is a sasquatch with a teal toque on his head over his fuzzy, grey hair. He is wearing a teal bodysuit with pale blue colored belly with silver and blue snowflakes. He has a cream face with round, black eyes and smiling mouth with small white fangs.

name: Ringding
bio: Ringding practices close-up magic. He takes it super, duper seriously, so don’t laugh. Ringding was born to be a magician! He would show you his invisibility cape, but he misplaced it and now it’s really hard to find. Want Ringding to pull a quarter from behind your ear?
appearance: RIngding is a dark indigo mothman. He has short, fuzzy ears that protrude from the top of his head and bat-like wings on either side of his body. His ears and belly are purple and fuzzy and he has round, black eyes rimmed with red. He has a small purple smile and red cheeks.

name: Rinz
bio: Rinz is a real foodie who loves traveling to new places in search of delicious dishes. This 'Mallow will lace up his sneakers and go exploring for days! Next, this entrepreneur is getting ready to launch a new business. Want to pitch Rinz some ideas?
appearance: Rinz is a blue monster. He has black eyes with a right-eyed wink, a smiling mouth and numerous white, pointed teeth. His horns are gold, and he has a light blue puff of hair between them. His belly is striped in cobalt blue and light blue, and he has a light blue patch around his right eye.

name: Ripply
bio: Ripply's outlook is as bright as he is! Where ever he goes, good things just seem to happen. He loves the simple thing in life like tacos, long talks with friends, and sunny days at the beach. You can't help but smile when hanging with Ripply!
appearance: Ripply is a yellow sea slug. He has blue dots on either side of his body. He has silver wings with blue outline inside. His antennae are orange. He also has a fuzzy white belly. He has black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Risa
bio: Say hello to Risa, she's new in town and wants to make friends. Before her first day of school, she plans to bake chocolate chip banana bread for her new class. Do you want to bake yummy treats with Risa?
appearance: Risa is a calico cat with a cream body and rainbow patches with a tie-dye pattern. She has three of these patches, one over her left ear, one on her right ear and the other on her lower left body. She has round eyes with short curly lashes, black whiskers and a happy, pink cat mouth.

name: Rishi
bio: Rishi can't get enough colored pencils. For a long time. she would doodle silly squiggles but then she discovered coloring books! Now Rishi relaxes with a big bag of colored pencils and a new page from a coloring book, Rishi loves sending her pretty pictures to friends, so keep an eye on your mailbox!
appearance: Rishi is mostly pinkish-red with patches of brown on her lower right side and on her left ear. She has a swirl of whipped cream with caramel syrup with red, pink and brown sprinkles with a red and white straw. She has round, black eyes with a white muzzle with red nostrils. She has a strawberry embroidered on the right side of her body.

name: Rita
bio: Rita is one of the sleepiest mallows around, she just loves to take naps! What's her favorite part about naps? Her favorite fuzzy slippers and matching eye mask because they smell like lavender.
appearance: Rita is a pale pink unicorn with a fluffy pink mane and tail. Her belly and inner ears are patterned with rainbow stripes, mainly lavender, bright pink and yellow. Her horn and muzzle are glittery pink. Her horn has a hot pink swirl wrapped around it, and her closed eyes are adorned with short, curled lashes.

name: Rito
bio: Rito loves to cook and helps his mom cook for his family. He has fun trying new recipes and testing out new flavors.
appearance: Rito is a brown bunny in the style of Hug Mee. He has tall, brown bunny ears, a round brown tail, with brown arms and white feet. His inner ears are pink, and his muzzle and belly are white. He has a pink nose and mouth with black eyes and a carrot embroidered by his belly.

name: Ritter
bio: Ritter just got back from a trip in the rainforest! He was filming a documentary on various 'Mallow communities and their way of life. Ritter loves to travel and learn about the world, so being a documentary filmmaker is his absolute dream! Want to join Ritter at his next movie premiere?
appearance: Ritter is a sliced in half red tomato. His percicarp and locular gel is surrounded by red outer skin and has red seeds. On the top of Ritter's head, he has a green stalk with sepals. He has round black, eyes and a basic smiling mouth.

name: River
bio: Meet River. River is nervous about a family trip coming up. She's going to visit her extended 'Mallow family, far away from where she lives. River really doesn't like to travel and fears new places because she doesn't know what to expect. How does traveling somewhere new make you feel?
appearance: River is a blue-gray beaver with round ears. Her belly and inner ears are light gray. She has a rounded, triangular muzzle in white, with a black nose and mouth. Her eyes are closed and feature curled lashes. Each cheek has two curved, black whiskers. She has a large, flat, navy blue tail.

name: River the Narwhal
bio: Hi! My name is River! My mini and I love to swim in the ocean and surf the waves.
appearance: River is a blue and purple tie-dyed narwhal with silver horn on their forehead. They have two fins on their sides and a silver tail fin by their bottom. They have a mint belly with a pouch for their mini. the only difference is that their mini plush has an open mouth. River has black eyes with whine shines n them, pink blush, and a smiling mouth.

name: Rivka
bio: Rivka makes her own fortune telling cards! She cuts the cards from super-cute craft paper, then designs them. What do you think about a celestial theme? Rivka loves doodling stars and planets, but her favorite part is sprinkling lots of glitter! Your future is looking artsy with Rivka.
appearance: Rivka is a cow with a dark blue body, she has two spots by her top left and bottom right that are galaxy tie-dyed. Her inner ears, muzzle, and the three stars embroidered by her belly are a pale blue and she has dark blue horns, a long tail with dark blue fuzz at the tip, and black eyes.

name: Robb
bio: Ready to meet Robb? This orangutan's love for cleaning means his house is always picture-perfect. When he's not vacuuming or keeping the house tidy for his family, he's getting wild with his friends. In fact, he's known as 'Local Robb' around town because he's never met a stranger.
appearance: Robb is an orangutan, a type of primate. He has a shaggy, bright orange mane, though it is sandy colored around his face. He has a brown body and a tan belly. He has small, tan ears which sit low on his head and a cream-colored face. He has round, black eyes, a rounded triangular nose and a small smile with dimples.

name: Robbie
bio: Robbie loves to play soccer, card games and cross-country ski. You can usually find him spending time with his cousinsPuffandPiperon the soccer field. When he grows up, he wants to be a geologist or a professional soccer player.
appearance: Robbie is a black penguin of the Hug Mee line with a white face and belly. He wears a red winter hat and has a sparkly belly. He has a grey beak and feet.

name: Robert
bio: Meet Robert. He loves basketball and trampolines. Robert may not be the best basketball player on the court but his passion for the game keeps him going. Robert hopes that with practice one day he can change his luck. Do you want to play a pick-up game sometime?
appearance: Robert is a teal frog with a light green belly. His eyes sit on top of his head, and are black rimmed in white. He has prominent nostrils above his wide, smiling mouth.

name: Roberta
bio: Roberta is the world whistling champion! Her skills have opened doors for her in the entertainment industry—she's just been cast in an untitled indie horror film in the role of "Wind" and is about to go on tour for her next folk rock album "Gap Tooth Gust"!
appearance: Roberta is a pink colored donut with pink icing. Sprinkles in pink, purple, teal, blue and yellow with star sprinkles decorate her face, and she has a pink circle representing a donut hole at her center. She has round, black eyes, a red, smiling mouth, and pale pink blush.

name: Roberto
bio: Somersaults and crazy cool stunts are Roberto's hopes and dreams for the future, he wants to be a stuntman! He practices stunts and tumbling with his brothers. Roberto can't wait until the day he gets to do real stunts!
appearance: Roberto has a green body and tan stomach. He has black eyes and white around them. He has a tan nose and black smile, and he also has two white markings on each side of his body and three on his head.

name: Roboyo
bio: Every day is an adventure for Roboyo! She travels all over the galaxy searching for new swamp worlds to inhabit. All this moving around can be overwhelming but that's when Roboyo calls one of her besties to help put things into perspective. How does moving make you feel?
appearance: Roboyo is a lavender water alien. Her belly is galaxy printed covered with a white pattern of starbursts. She has purple antennae with dark purple dots and with mint and purple gills and a pink hair tuft. She has round, black eyes with lashes and an indigo mouth with pointy teeth.

name: Robyne
bio: Meet Robyne - this bubbly bunny loves grape juice, chocolate cake, and traveling the world. Robyne has a map of the world and all the places she wants to go, every time she goes to a new city, she adds a pin to the poster. Can you guess how many pins she added this year?
appearance: 2023 Robyne

name: Rocio
bio: Have you ever met a triceratops who can speak 7 different languages? When she was a mini mallow Rocio’s family moved a lot so she learned a new language for every new home. Now she loves to help others learn them too!
appearance: Rocio is a dinosaur patterned with green, tie-dye swirls ranging from pale apple to caribbean green in color. A ridge of jade green spines appears atop her head. She has two white horns on her head and a large white horn on her face. She has black, round eyes, a smiling mouth and a round, white belly.

name: Rocket
bio: Watch out for Rocket as he zooms by! Rocket is on the swim team, can you guess his events? He's great at open swim but his favorite event is the freestyle relay, he takes off like a rocket and that's how he earned his nickname.
appearance: Rocket is a dark blue hammerhead shark with four fins, one on each side, two on his back, and a tail fin. He has a round white belly. He has round black eyes, a small black smile, and gills on each side.

name: Rocky
bio: Don’t stop Rocky! He is on a roll. Rocky has been an adventure seeker since he was little and plans on climbing his first summit this year. Grab a hiking stick and bring the fun!
appearance: Rocky is a grey raccoon with black markings around his eyes. Above these are white marks which resemble eyebrows. His belly and snout are also white, and there is a thin ring of white around his round black eyes too.

name: Rodina
bio: Meet Rodina. Fun facts, cute cats, and the perfect panini are some of her favorite things. This laid-back 'Mallow loves any occasion where she can pet pets and discuss foods from distant lands - or better yet, try them with friends!
appearance: Rodina is a sky blue unicorn with rainbow colors marbled through her coat. She has a fluffy white belly. Her muzzle is white with pink nostrils, and she has shimmering, pale gold inner ears and a matching horn with a darker gold spiral.  She has closed eyes with blunt, downwards-facing lashes, and a fluffy rainbow mane and tail.

name: Rodry
bio: Rodry sits in his favorite tree at night to watch the fireflies. It's like having a personal light show in his backyard! Even when Rodry has company over, he only lights candles to keep the space mostly dim so the fireflies can shine bright. Join Rodry for a twinkling summer night!
appearance: Rodry is a yellow bearded dragon, a type of lizard. He has a white belly and three brown markings on his back, above his tail. He has fringes that protrude from either side of his head. He has round, black eyes, and a cat-like smile.

name: Roger
bio: Congratulations to Roger! This classically trained actor just booked his first role in a major motion picture. Roger can't wait to explore the motivations behind Mailman #2 and hopes his artful interpretation of 'Delivery!' impresses the director. Who knows—maybe he'll star in the sequel.
appearance: Roger is a ham. He has brown skin with rectangular prints all over his body. He has a pineapple on top of his head with a cherry on top. He has a white belly with a mistletoe embroidered on the right side of his belly. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Rolanda
bio: Rolanda is an uramaki. She has white rice covering her body with a piece of salmon on top of her head. In her belly she has imitation crab, avocado, cheese, salmon and tuna surrounded by seaweed. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red smile.
appearance: Rolanda is an uramaki. She has white rice covering her body with a piece of salmon on top of her head. In her belly she has imitation crab, avocado, cheese, salmon and tuna surrounded by seaweed. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Rolf
bio: Next time you visit a water park, think of Rolf! He is the lead safety inspector at the local water park, and it's his job to test all the rides for safety every morning. This means Rolf gets to jump, surf, and slide for work. It's an important job, and Rolf is happy to do it!
appearance: Rolf is a blue meerkat with navy blue inner ears, eye markings and tipped tail. He has a bluish-grey belly and face. He has rounded ears and a long tail, with three blue stripe on the back. He has black eyes with white rings around them, a black nose, and curved mouth.

name: Rolland
bio: Meet Rolland. He loves art history and can spend all afternoon with his head buried in an art book. He's taking a still life drawing class and is getting pretty good! When he paints he sometimes gets color everywhere, so make sure you're wearing apron before you join him!
appearance: Rolland is a white bear with a grey marble pattern on their ears, around their eyes and in a band around their body. Their nose and mouth are pale grey and their eyes are black.

name: Roman
bio: Need some help making the right decision? Roman is here to help! Roman wants to be a leader when they grow up and knows it's important to take care of the world we live in. They like to play fair, eat clean, stay green, and think about others.
appearance: Roman is a brightly coloured replica of planet Earth, covered in bright blue ocean and lime green continents. They have white continents on their top and bottom which represent the poles. They have a simple face with round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Romano
bio: You can't help but look at Romano when he enters a room. This 'Mallow has some serious screen-stealing presence! Different casting directors have approached Romano in the past, but he's never been interested in acting or modeling. Romano prefers a super chill life he has as a seaweed farmer!
appearance: Romano is a blue Hippocampus, a mythical creature with the upper body of a horse and the lower body of a fish. His belly, inner ears and inner fins are a marbled light pink and teal. He has a cyan muzzle and mane going from the top of his head to his back, with a dorsal fin and tail fin on his lower back. He has a light blue marking on his face going up from his muzzle to his mane, his eyes are black and round, and his nostrils are a dark blue.

name: Rome
bio: Rome starts every day with an ice cold shower. Though he's tempted to turn the temperature up, this airplane pilot knows there's nothing better than an early morning freeze to wake up the brain. And when he has to put it back to sleep? A late night hot tub soak, of course!
appearance: Rome is an tangerine creature based on the Loch Ness Monster. He has fins on either side of his body and pale green spots along his back. He has a peach belly has a cord texture with the appearance of horizontal stripes. He has round, black eyes, a smiling mouth, and golden blush.

name: Romelu
bio: Romelu has always been a star in the kitchen, but now he's a star on TV too! This reality TV chef might be best known for his elaborate meals and elegant presentation, but day to day Romelu prefers to cook simple favourites. Roasted willow branches, anyone?
appearance: Romelu  is an orange moose. He has large dark green antlers and nostrils. He has a peach patterned belly. His muzzle, and inner ears are all a light, sandy color. He has round, black eyes.

name: Romeo
bio: Romeo doesn’t understand why he received the 8th-grade poetry award? It’s not like he tries with that mushy stuff anyways. Even if he did, it’s not that hard to string a sentence together! Really, it’s almost as natural as the rising of the sun, that extraordinary stage-setter for our ordinary days. So what’s the big deal?
appearance: Romeo is a red bear with a pink belly and inner ears. He has white seeds around his body. He has green leaves on his head and a green stem. His muzzle is pink with a red nose and curved mouth with black eyes.

name: Romina
bio: She's loud, loveable, and knows how to have fun, Romina is one mallow you just have to meet. Her passion is life and trying to figure it all out, so if you're ready for a cool adventure, give Romina a call!
appearance: Romina is a bright rainbow galaxy printed alien. Her body is covered with a white pattern of stars. She also has pastel pink speckles on her body and antennae. She has a plain white belly and a simple, smiling face.

name: Romulus
bio: Romulus believes no stone should be left unturned—literally. You never know what you might find underneath! His favorite discoveries include: a real pirates' treasure map a portal to the 1920s, and a colony of black ants. His least favorite? A colony of red ants!
appearance: Romulus is a fusion of a beetroot and a bat. His body is shaped like a beetroot with maroon wings with maroon ears and pink inner ears and a pink belly. On top of his head he has two beetroot leaves. He has round, black eyes rimmed in white and a red mouth with white fangs.

name: Romy
bio: Romy has a fashion sense that is always outside the box but perfectly on trend. She even designs and tailors some of her clothes herself for a unique fit. Next time you have an event to get dressed for, give Romy a call she'll know just how to style you!
appearance: Romy is an orange seal. She has a pair of orange fins and a tail. She has white spots on her head and a peach muzzle with a tie-dye rainbow fuzzy belly. She has round, black eyes with eyelashes with dual whiskers and a basic seal mouth.

name: Ronalda
bio: Don't let her horn fool you—Ronalda plays the strings! This musically-gifted 'Mallow is the principal violinist for the Yeti Philharmonic. Though some call her elusive, Ronalda is just busy. Between leading symphonies and writing symphonies, who could blame her?
appearance: Ronalda is a pastel pink yeti with pastel purple horns, face, and fuzzy belly. She has a tuft of pink hair above her face and has a black smile and black eyes.

name: Ronan
bio: Meet Ronan. This fiery fellow knows a thing or two about campfires, he keeps the flames at the perfect height when he goes camping with his friends. They roast lots of yummy things over his perfect fire, including s'mores!
appearance: Ronan is a pale grey dragon with a white muzzle and inner ears. His belly, the inside of his wings and the horns on his head are striped with pastel rainbow colors. He has two large black eyes and pale grey nostrils.

name: Rondah
bio: Meet Rondah. She's an astrologist! She writes amazing horoscopes, that is unless Mercury is in retrograde! Then she gets totally turned around! When she's not reading the moon, sun, and stars, she likes making homemade candles or getting tacos from her favorite taco truck!
appearance: Rondah is an off-white cow with a patch of fuzzy, rainbow fur like a fringe and a rainbow belly. She has a pink muzzle and inner ears. She has thin, curved horns which sit wide from her head and are a sparkling pink. Thin pink lines mark the sections. She has round, black eyes, eyelashes, pink nostrils, and a small smile.

name: Ronello
bio: Watch out for Ronello on lane 10! He's on a bowling winning streak and has been known to swipe his tail in celebration. Ronello only plays with his own personalized blue bowling ball that has the perfect weight and fit for his hand. Want to play on Ronello's winning team?
appearance: Ronello is a light blue dinosaur with a white belly. He has sparkly, dark blue spines running down his back. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with sharp white teeth. He has two short arms with claws which hold a sparkling, deep blue heart.

name: Ronisia
bio: Ronisia lives her dream of being an astronaut! She focuses all her time and energy collecting data, learning about the universe, and sharing that knowledge with other 'Mallows. Would you want to explore space with Ronisia?
appearance: Ronisia is a unicorn with a purple galaxy tie-dye body. She has a purple mane and tail with a white unicorn horn on her forehead. Her inner ears, muzzle, and belly are white, with a heart constellation embroidered on her belly. Her eyes are black with lashes and her nostrils are purple.

name: Ronnie
bio: Ronnie loves building birdhouses, last week he made a purple two-story birdhouse with green shutters. His sisterBelanahelps him paint and make sure they are ready to move in. Do you want to buy a birdhouse from Ronnie?
appearance: Ronnie is mostly white with patches of brown on their lower left side and on their right ear. He has small, pale yellow horns and round black eyes. The inside of his ears are light pink and his muzzle is light brown.

name: Rory
bio: Meet Rory the unicorn. Rory loves having slumber parties with her pals. They love watching comedies and breaking out the karaoke machine. Can you guess Rory's favorite slumber party game? Hide and seek!
appearance: Rory is a pastel purple unicorn with white on her muzzle. Both her mane and tail are pastel rainbow colors. her belly is also striped with rainbow pastels. she have a shimmery, silver horn with a purple swirl, as well as silver inner ears. she have wide, cartoon eyes which are also light purple.

name: Rosa
bio: Fresh from the beach, Rosa is one of the chillest Squishmallows around. She swims, surfs, and sunbathes all day and doesn't get very far without her favorite snack, you guessed it, pineapple!
appearance: Rosa is a grey koala with huge, round ears. Her inner ears and belly are white, and she wears a shiny purple bow on her left ear. She has happy, closed eyes with three lashes on each, a large, black nose and a smiling mouth.

name: Rose
bio: Do you need a florist? Rose is the one for you! She creates bouquets and arrangements of all shapes and sizes. She started by making flower crowns for all her friends and now runs one of her family's floral shops. What kind of bouquet do you want Rose to make for you?
appearance: Rose is a mahogany brown horse with a dark brown stripe on her forehead. She has black eyes, a dark brown muzzle and a black mane and tail. The inside of her ears and belly are tan in color. She has a detailed red rose emblem on the right side of her belly.

name: Roseanne
bio: Roseanne started her own toy unboxing show! Check out her online channel for new videos posted every Friday. Roseanne loves unwrapping mystery toys, so she can decided to share the surprise for everyone!
appearance: Roseanne is a white and pink cat with pink and white sakura flowers embroider on her, She also has one flower on her back. She white with patches of pink, her right ear is pink while the left is white. Her face consists of round black eyes with two lashes and she has cat whiskers with her nose pink and happy pink cat mouth.

name: Rosemary
bio: Rosemary takes popping popcorn to another level. You will never catch this 'Mallow using a microwave! Rosemary only pops whole kernels in her best iron skillet and finishes it with a secret blend of spices. Rosemary loves all kinds of popcorn flavors, but if you ask her, caramel corn is her favorite!
appearance: Rosemary is a forest green bat with tall, pointed ears and bat wings. Her inner ears and wings are a holographic jade green with a dark green fuzzy belly. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with two fangs poking out at the bottom.

name: Rosemund
bio: Rosemund is a hard-of-hearing librarian. Though mischievous 'Mallows sometimes think that means they can chit-chat. Rosemund has a trick up her ear—her hearing aid! With its volume on high, Rosemund is able to hear the faintest turn of a page (the only noise she allows).
appearance: Rosemund is a Matcha Latte drink in a mint and cream mug. The mug has a large mint green stripe. the stripe and the lower half are both cream color. The matcha has a white latte art pattern on top. Rosemund has closed, happy eyes with short lashes, pink blush and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Rosie
bio: Meet Rosie; she’s visiting her family from the other side of the pond! Rosie loves crunchy biscuits, going to concerts with her friends, and spending time with her nanna. Rosie’s nanna makes the best tea and always has yummy treats ready when she comes over.
appearance: Rosie is a white pig with very pale purple splotches. She has curly ears and round, black eyes. Her inner ears, snout and belly are all pastel pink.

name: Roslyn
bio: Roslyn collects spiders just for fun! She thinks they make beautiful, low-maintenance pets. So far Roslyn owns five different arachnids. but Teri the tarantula is her prized spider. Sometimes Roslyn even lets Teri sit on her shoulder so they can watch TV together!
appearance: Roslyn is a witch with green skin and dark purple hair styled in pigtails. She wears a black witch hat with a hot pink stripe and golden moon decoration, a black corset top and purple and black striped bottoms. She has black round eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Rossi
bio: Is your closet a mess? Rossi will handle it from here! She's a professional organizer who loves to teach clients all her tips and tricks. Rossi's goal is to create a system that lasts, keeping every closet and room in order. Can Rossi help you get organized?
appearance: Rossi is a pastel purple cheetah with pink and darker purple spots all over her body. Her ears are round with silver, glitter inner ears and long tail. Her belly is white with a holographic and pink heart on it. She has a white muzzle with a purple nose and curved smile, and black eyes with lashes.

name: Rostam
bio: What makes Rostam as strong as a river? It's her graceful fencing moves! This badger knows when to parry and when to lunge. No one phase Rostam--she even practices meditation to keep herself centered. Be like Rostam and go with the flow!
appearance: Rostam is a badger with a white head and a pink body. She has round ears, with soda orange inside and a pure white muzzle. She has stripes running from her ears to her eyes, the same color as her belly and inner ears. She has round, black eyes and a black nose. She also has a large, fluffy, soda tail. She wears a magenta head band with white hearts.

name: Roth
bio: Have you seen Roth's house keys? He lost them again. Roth clipped a bell to them, but that hasn't helped. Even for such a thoughtful 'Mallow, Roth gets easily distracted and misplaces things. But eventually, he finds what he was looking for!
appearance: Roth is a dark orange lizard with black, organically shaped striped covering his body. He has a black belly. He has round, black eyes ringed in white, prominent black nostrils, and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Rou
bio: Meet Rou. She loves staying up late with friends and singing karaoke to their heart's content. They always order lots of sushi. Tuna is her favorite and she gets it extra spicy! Want to join them? Grab the mic!

name: Roven
bio: Say hi to Roven! Roven loves to play sports like kickball, dodgeball, and disc golf. Days in the park are so much fun for Roven, but sometimes they leave her a little breathless and she needs to use her inhaler. After a quick rest, Roven is ready to get back in the game!
appearance: Roven is a black elephant with an orange skull, spine, ribs, and inner ears. She has big, elephant ears, and a long tail.

name: Rowan
bio: Rowan is celebrating the holidays with his friendPablitothis year! He's been practicing his Spanish all November long and can't wait to impress his bestie's familia at the dinner table. Por ejemplo: "Abuela Griselda, can you pass los papas?
appearance: Rowan is a pink cup of latte with whipped cream on top decorated with pink and brown sprinkles and has a pink candy cane. They have a pink sleeve with a snowflake logo on it. He has brown floppy ears on their head. He has a brown patch on their right eye as well as round, black and a black nose and mouth.

name: Roxy
bio: Roxy loves to play in the dirt, sneak up on her friends, and plant flowers to make the world a prettier place. Join her to plant some pink tulips on February 14 and you’ll make her day.
appearance: Roxy is a calico cat with a white body and pink patches. She has one pale pink patch over her left ear, and two hot pink patches, one on her right ear and the other on her lower right body. She has closed eyes, a hot pink nose and black whiskers and mouth.

name: Roz
bio: Roz is as sweet as they come, but her feelings tend to get a little sour when she bottles them up. That's why she's super excited to start therapy this year! Though it might take a while for this jar of jam to open up, Roz can't wait to get started.
appearance: Roz is a maroon jam of raspberry jelly with a hot pink lid and label. She has a raspberry design embroidered on her label with a white background in the center and white edges. Her lashed eyes are closed in a happy expression, she has pink blush and a black smile.

name: Rozen
bio: Rozen is an entomologist—that means she studies insects! Her specialty is in spiders and hopes to one day meet the elusive eight-foot tarantula. Rozen heard it has a web the size of a football field and she can't wait to check it out!
appearance: Rozen is a dragonfruit red fox with large, triangular ears. Her belly and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. Her nose, mouth, inner ears and tail are light green. She has round black eyes with dual lashes, and a triangular nose. Her belly has black seeds.

name: Ruben
bio: Ruben doesn't buy into the whole "naughty or nice" thing! He believes everyone is fundamentally nice at heart but more than capable of a little naughtiness, especially when stressed. For example, his alter ego Mr. Hangry can be a real piece of coal on an empty stomach!
appearance: Ruben is a green cow with a red patch on the right side of his head. He has small, pink horns. The inside of his ears are pink. He has a red, pink and white peppermint striped belly. He has round, black eyes and a white muzzle with green nostrils.

name: Ruby
bio: Ruby enjoys long walks on the ice with her occasional hot cocoa beverage. Ruby is the North Pole’s Christmas coordinator. She plans all of the reindeer events leading up to the grand finale on Christmas day.
appearance: Ruby is a brown reindeer the color of mocha. Her muzzle is sand colored, whereas her inner ears and belly are a very pale brown. She has two chocolate brown antlers atop her head, and round black eyes. She has a scarf which appears knotted around her neck which comes in either green or red tartan.

name: Rudy
bio: Ready for takeoff with Rudy the rocket? He and his best friendDaxxonare explorers on a mission to defend the universe, or so they tell their friends. They share a love for adventure and being helpful, would you like to join them?

name: Rufus
bio: Rufus recently had a growth spurt and now he is very tall. Sometimes his friends tease him about being bigger than a moose! At first, he was worried, but now he knows his height can come in handy, especially reaching the snacks at the top shelf.
appearance: Rufus is a brown moose with a tie-dye body as well as a yellow belly. round, black eyes. He also has a soft furry yellow belly and with dark chocolate brown antlers. He also has tie-dye ears with yellow inside. His muzzle is also yellow

name: Rune
bio: Rune volunteers at her local high school. She loves interacting with younger 'Mallows and hopes to be a positive influence in their lives. Sometimes Rune helps with homework, oversees a soccer match, or just hangs out and listens to whatever students have to say—even if it's supper silly!
appearance: Rune is a calico cat with a white body and two different purple patches. She has one purple velvet patch over her left ear, the same color as her right ear, and on her lower right body she has a violet patch with silver spots around her ears and lower body. She has round, black eyes with dual lashes, a purple nose and black whiskers and purple mouth.

name: Rupert
bio: High up in the treetops, Rupert celebrates Valentine's Day in his own unique way by decorating his tree with red lights and pink hearts.
appearance: Rupert is a sloth with a dark red body and a white patch on his face and belly. The banded markings around his eyes and his muzzle are pale pink. He has round black eyes, a round, red nose and a cat-like smile. He also has a dark crimson heart outline emblazoned on the right side of his chest.

name: Rupi
bio: Rupi can see right through you—literally! This highly perceptive x-ray technician knows when you had a hard day and could use a big hug, just by looking at your freshly broken tibia. She can even predict your future—bed rest, elevation and a brief pause on your soccer career
appearance: Rupi is a white dog with a yellow belly with two, triangular ears. She has a rounded black nose and mouth. She also has two black with lashes eyes both rimmed in white with the left one having a black patch.

name: Rusty
bio: La, la, la! That's Rusty warming up his vocal cords during a singing lesson. This rat dreams of singing in his favorite opera, but auditions make Rusty freeze with stage fright. He practices every day so he can conquer his audition fears. Give Rusty an encourage hug before his next tryout!
appearance: Rusty is a grey rat with large, round pink ears. He also has light grey belly and has black rounded eyes with black whiskers on each side. He has a pink nose with a black mouth. On the back he has grey spots on his back with a long pink tail.

name: Rutabaga
bio: Have you ever met a caterpillar who can't live without chocolate? Peanut butter cups and chocolate chip cookies are two of Rutabaga's favorite treats. And if you're making cookies Rutabaga has just one rule to follow: always add more chocolate chips!
appearance: Rutabaga is a caterpillar with a segmented body. Their head is green, followed by yellow, then blue in a repeating pattern. They have a white belly and shiny golden antennae. They have round, black eyes with short lashes, a smiling mouth and a pink blush.

name: Rutanya
bio: Rutanya can be very quiet and shy. Please give her some time to open up and get comfortable, as she prefers to take in the world her own way. Sometimes, he observations even end up in a sketch. Ask Rutanya about her drawing journal. It should make a great icebreaker!
appearance: Rutanya is a pastel blue cow with blue patches by the upper right of her head and her right ear and on the lower right side of her body. She has white inner ears and muzzle, dark blue horns and a long tail with a tuft of blue fuzz at the tip. She has a blueberry embroidered on the right side of her body. Her eyes are black, and her nostrils are light blue.

name: Ruth
bio: Ruth loves the beach and exploring the ocean. She knows how to sail and takes her family sailing during the summer. In the winter you can find her dreaming of her next tropical sailing trip.
appearance: Ruth is a pastel pink unicorn. Her ears, belly and nose are all pale purple, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly pink horn with a darker pink swirl wrapped around it. She has black, oval-shaped eyes with short eyelashes.

name: Ruthie
bio: Ready to go dancing with Ruthie? Ruthie has been a dancer practically since she was born, her family jokes she was dancing as soon as her feet touched the ground! She knows dance of all types, her favorites are salsa and jazz.
appearance: Ruthie is a unicorn with a pastel rainbow tie-dye pattern. While blue is the most prominent color, she also has white, pink, green and yellow on her. Her mane, tail, muzzle and belly are white. Her inner ears and horn are shimmery and pink, and the horn also has a dark pink swirl. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes.

name: Rutie
bio: Do you know how Rutie conquers his fear of rollercoasters? By riding them! He's a brave rooster with a strong stomach, and no matter how scary a roller coaster looks you can be sure Rutie is ready for the experience. Look out for Rutie next time your at an amusement park!
appearance: Rutie is a Wood color rooster with white small fluffy wings and a pure white floral belly. He has a red comb on the top of his head. He also has a yellow beak with a red wattle with a winking eye.

name: Ryan
bio: Original:Ryan is not your average husky, while he enjoys playing sports and spending time with friends, he also loves to spend time learning about robots and technology. One day he hopes to be a famous inventor, so watch out!
appearance: Ryan is a dark grey dog with triangular ears. He has white markings on his face and belly, as well as inside his ears. He has round, black eyes, a large nose and a smiling mouth.

name: Ryder
bio: Ryder loves marshmallow eggs as much as his sisterCandyloves jellybeans - and that's a lot! While his sister loves to compete, Ryder prefers to be behind the scenes, He helps the younger bunnies find eggs and even shares his basket with anyone who hasn't found many.
appearance: Ryder is a bunny with tie-dyed pink, blue, and purple fur and long, floppy ears. His inner belly is covered in fluffy white fur. His eyes are closed and he has two black whiskers on either side of his pale pink nose.

name: Sabado
bio: Sabado participates in “Fib Friday” where he and his friends communicate only through lying! Last week, he said he finished his autobiography (wrote a good social media caption). This week he says he’s training for a marathon (went on a brisk stroll). Next week, he might not lie at all (he totally will)!
appearance: Sabado is an opened red bag of hot cheese puffs. With silver on the bottom and on top. He has a yellow logo with red cheese puffs and a chili pepper. He has red cheese puffs in the bag. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Sabine
bio: Sabine has a huge jewelry collection, you'd think she was royalty with all that sparkle! Are you ready for her secret? She makes it all herself! Sabine enjoys arts and crafts, and she loves making custom accessories for her friends. What can Sabine make for you?
appearance: Sabine is a fox tie-dyed pink, ranging from petal pink to hot pink. The mask marking across her face, her belly and inner ears are all white. She has a round, black nose and oval eyes with a white shine. Her16"form (pictured right) has round eyes without the shine. She has long, curly lashes and is poking out her hot pink tongue. Her tail is hot pink and fluffy.

name: Sabino
bio: Peach pie with ice cream and pecans is Sabino’s favorite treat. He learned how to bake just so he could eat pie whenever he wants. Sabino is a doorman and if he works late, coming home to bake a pie helps him relax. Would you like to try a slice?
appearance: Sabino is a sugar glider, a type of possum which can glide using wing-like membranes. He is primarily bluish grey with an off-white lower face. He has shimmering, metallic ocean blue markings in stripes covering each eye. He also has a large navy stripe starting at his head and running down his back, on the tip of his tail and on the outer front side of his 'wings'. His inner ears are sky blue and he has a fuzzy, cobalt blue belly. He has round, black eyes and a candy pink nose and mouth.

name: Sabrina
bio: Sabrina is one of a kind! This caticorn has travelled the globe and seen amazing things. She wants to travel to every single country and she will even send you a postcard!
appearance: Sabrina is a pastel pink caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears and her belly, as well as the spiral on her horn, are striped in rainbow. The horn itself is a shimmery white, and her 2 inch version has a rainbow horn. She has closed eyes and a pale pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Sachie
bio: Meet Sachie. When he isn't taking piano lessons or perfecting his smoked salsa recipe, you can find him hanging with his family. They've got a super fun vacation planned. Sachie can't wait to bring his camera to document the whole thing!
appearance: Sachie is a whale shark, the largest variety of shark. He has a grey gradient, paler at the top and darker towards the bottom. He has wavy white stripes running horizontally across his body, accompanied by white spots. He has a fin on each side of his body, one atop his head, one on his back and a pointed tail. He has a large white belly which covers his mouth and has silver sparkles. He has a winking expression, a small smile and black gills.

name: Sadie
bio: Sadie is a great swimmer and loves climbing trees, too. Her favorite way to spend weekends is sleepovers with friends.
appearance: Sadies fur has a tie-dye pattern which is predominantly purple and blue. She has purple markings surrounding her closed eyes, and her face and belly are all white. She also has a black nose and smiling mouth.

name: Safa
bio: Safa is the ultimate fan 'Mallow. She once got so excited about meeting her favorite author at a book signing, she puffed up and had to get out of the line! It was pretty embarrassing. But after Safa collected herself, she got the autograph and even a picture. Who do you stan?
appearance: Safa is all yellow with bumps all over. She also has orange flippers and matching tail.  She has a cream belly and she has black eyes and a smile with pink cheeks.

name: Safiyah
bio: Do you know Safiyah? She loves everything bright and colorful! Safiyah is going to school to be a hair and make-up artist, but when she’s not studying or practicing you can find her making colorful tie-dye clothing creations. What colors should Safiyah tie-dye for you?
appearance: Safiyah is a zebra with a rainbow body covered in black stripes, aside from her belly, which is white. Her muzzle is black, but her nostrils are hot pink, just like the inside of her ears. Her fluffy mane is rainbow colour. She has round black eyes ringed with white.

name: Sage
bio: Sage likes to keep things nice and tidy, and lives by the motto "a place for everything and everything in its place". Sage also volunteers for highway cleanups because a clean neighborhood is good for everyone! After a long day, Sage loves to calm down with a cold root beer float,

name: Sager
bio: If you're looking for Sager, you can probably find her curled up on the couch with her best friend,Cooper! Sager waits all week for her favorite show, so that she can turn down the lights, grab some ice cream and a cozy blanket, and catch up with all her favorite characters. Wanna tune in and chill out with Sager?
appearance: Sager is a dog with a hot pink body. Her muzzle and belly are white, and she has a fuchsia patch around her right eye. Her fluffy ears are the same color, and she has a fluffy white belly. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a hot pink nose and mouth.

name: Sakina
bio: Sakina loves daydreaming and waiting to see what the universe will bring. Last week, she dozed off and had the craziest dream, she dreamt that she discovered a new galaxy where all the ‘Mallows could fly! She flew off into the stars and suddenly woke up. Have you had any crazy dreams?
appearance: Sakina is a mushroom with a tan stalk and a red cap with white spots. Her stalk makes up her body and includes a round, pink belly with an embroidered five-petal, yellow flower on it. She has closed, black eyes with eyelashes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Saku
bio: Saku released a new album this morning! This rockstar knows how to surprise her fans and keep them guessing. She writes and produces her own music, and even directs the music videos! Saku hopes you love listening to her new record as much she loved making it.
appearance: Saku is a cheesy yellow pizza slice. She is decorated with various toppings represented by large, red rentangles, small green cubes and yellow pineapples. She has a brown crust which appears as a stripe at the base on the front, and covers her back half. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Salami
bio: Salami is the leader of The Cold Cuts, a high-school greaser gang that provides outcast students fresh mortadella sandwiches and a table to sit during lunch. Often misunderstood himself, Salami believes no book should be judged by it's cover. He also believes no 'Mallow should be judged at first glance
appearance: Salami is a maroon dragon with glittery red wings, fins and black horns. He has red inner wings and a black fin from the top of his head to his tail. He has a red muzzle and a shiny red belly with maroon nostrils with white fangs. He has mischievous eyes.

name: Saleema
bio: After a long day at work. Saleema turns her eyes to the skies! Accompanied by her favorite R&B throwbacks, she loves to watch the glowing sunset turn into a glimmering map of constellations. There are so many things to she wonders about the stars, like what is their surface temperature? and do they like '90s slow jams?
appearance: Saleema is a purple paddle fish. She has two fins on each side of her body with blue tips. On her back she has a long teal fin with a teal tail below. She has a round teal belly. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a long purple nose which resembles a platypus duck-like bill.

name: Salem
bio: Salem isn't a big fan of... oh, what's the word... "feelings". It's not that she doesn't have them! It's just that she'd rather swim in a piranha infested lake than let anyone know she's capable of vulnerability. Which she isn't by the way! She's never cried a day in her life! Did someone say she has? Who was it?
appearance: Salem is a black moth with shiny purple antennae and a teal belly. She has teal to blue ombre wings with a pattern of three teal spots and blue lines. She has mischievous, black eyes with lashes, and a smiling, pink mouth.

name: Salim
bio: Salim collects blues records! He has so many that he stores them all in different places. Of course, Salim keeps his favorites at home on the music shelf, but he also gave a large chunk to his buddy who owns a record shop. Who knows? Maybe Salim will even sell a few!
appearance: Salim is a green pickle with embroidered markings all over his body. He wears a maroon beanie. He has a green stem poking out of his beanie, and round, black eyes with and a black smiling mouth.

name: Salita
bio: If you're a fan of hugs, snuggles and cuddles then Salita is the 'Mallow for you! For her, a big ol' hug is a perfect way to greet your friends. If hugs aren't your thing, Salita has a pretty good elbow tap on deck. Though she loves hugs, she respects her friends' space first!
appearance: Salita is a snail with a blue body and a plain white belly. She has two sparkly teal antennae which stand up on her head. Her shell has a fluro rainbow tie-dye pattern which includes shades of hot pink, orange, sky blue, apple green and purple. She has round, black eyes with many curled lashes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Salome
bio: Salome learned in meditation class that sometimes the quickest way to inner peace is a nice, long scream. She's been practicing it recently in stressful situations—like at her cubicle, or in line at the grocery store—and has really noticed the difference that it makes!
appearance: Salome is a black bat with tall, bat ears and bat wings. Her inner ears are pink and have a pink spine and ribs embroidered in the middle of her body. She has black eyes with white rings around them, a red smiling mouth with two sharp fangs below their mouth.

name: Salvador
bio: Jump in line and get ready for some fun, Salvador is here to play! Salvador lives for speed and spins, especially when it comes to games. The faster he spins, the more fun he has, are you ready to give it a try?
appearance: Salvador is a trompo, or spinning top in English. He is wider at the top and narrows to a small point at his base. He is decorated in brightly colored stripes, including red, orange, yellow, lime green, cobalt blue and purple.

name: Sam
bio:
Sam is the friend for you, but only if you can keep up! He is a runner, and can race circles around his friends at the park. He absolutely loves the outdoors and is always on the move. His birthday is June 19th, a wonderful time for a camping trip. You can find him snowboarding in the winter and on jet skis in the summer time. 
You can't say no to his puppy eyes! He brings out the best in everyone he meets, and is quite the companion. He is fast and furious, which makes sense. He hopes to be a race car driver when he grows up!
appearance: Sam is a golden brown dog with floppy, chocolate colored ears. He has round white markings above his eyes which resemble eyebrows, as well as a white muzzle and belly. His eyes, nose and mouth are black.

name: Samantha
bio: Look over here! It’s Samantha! The star of her own video series, Samantha is looking for a companion for Valentine’s Day to make crafts, gifts and tasty treats to give to her adoring fans.
appearance: Samantha is a grey owl with prominent eart tufts and an off-white belly. She has a red heart and orange markings on her belly. Her face consists of two grey anime eyes and an orange beak.

name: Samanthé
bio: Samanthé is smart, diplomatic - but can sting you with her sass! She loves music, especially soca music so she can snap her pinchers! She travels the world and speaks 6 languages. While she doesn't love crowds of people, she will always be there when you need her the most.
appearance: Samanthé may resemble a crab from the front due to her large claws and six legs, but she is actually a scorpion - she has a long, segmented tail with a stinger on the end. She has a salmon colored belly divided into four sections by horizontal lines. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Samir
bio: Who's that 'Mallow leading the pack? It's Samir! This wonderful whale never planned on being in charge but his kindness and consideration have helped him become an excellent leader. If you need some advice on making the best choice, give Samir a call!
appearance: Samir is a blue whale. He has a fin on each side of his body and one atop his head, as well as a fluke (tail fin). His white belly is divided by broken, pale grey lines. He has large black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Sammy
bio: Hopscotch and hula hoops are some of Sammy's favorite things - every spring Sammy hopes to host the largest hopscotch contest! One day Sammy wants to turn their hopscotch dream into a game show, who do you think will be the champion?
appearance: Sammy is a bunny with teal fur and long, floppy ears. Their inner ears and belly are covered in thick, long, white fur. Their eyes are closed and they has two black whiskers on either side of their pale pink nose.

name: Samsara
bio: Samsara paints the windows of all the businesses in her town. She likes to keep her art festive and on theme for each season. Samsara is getting pretty popular with her neighbors and was even interviewed for the local paper this month. Looks like this artist is making a name for herself!
appearance: Samsara is a teal chipmunk with rounded ears and a long tail. There are three black markings on her head with one on her forehead and two on the sides. She has a teal mark by her mouth and inner ears, with a teal fuzzy belly. Her tail is teal and has black stripes. She wears a black choker with a rose in the middle. She has mischievous eyes with a black nose and curved mouth.

name: Samson
bio: Samson just got a haircut! He's leaving the self-sustaining commune he grew up on to attend a big-city university and felt like it was finally time to say farewell to the fro. Though he'll certainly miss The Celestial Collective, Samson knows they're always only a quick horse-and-buggy ride away!
appearance: Samson is a tan highland cow with a patch of longer light pink fur like a fringe with white icing on his face. His belly is light pink quilted. He has a tan muzzle and white inner ears, which aren't fluffy. He has thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and are white. Thin brown lines mark the sections. He has round, black eyes, brown nostrils and wears a teal bowtie.

name: Samuel
bio: Samuel is quite musically talented. He can pick up any instrument, and make you want to move your feet and dance within three seconds! He loves performing for others, and his favorite instrument to play for everyone is the guitar!
appearance: Samuel is a tan colored scarecrow dressed in a bright green outfit. He has straw for hair, round, black eyes, a triangular orange nose and a smiling mouth which is stitched closed. His outfit is made up of a jade green witch hat with an orange band, and a lime green outfit with a tan collar. He wears a rope belt around his waist and has a jade green patch stitched onto the left side of his shirt.

name: Sanda
bio: Sanda joined the chess club! Her favorite piece is the knight because it can make an L-shaped move. Sanda even has a couple checkmate wins using the trusty knight! She would love to play chess with you anytime—just don't take your queen out too early
appearance: Sanda is a margherita pizza slice. She is decorated with three basil leaves and six mozzarella slices surrounded by pizza sauce. She has a tan crust which appears as a stripe at the base on the front, and covers her back half. She has round, black eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Sandina
bio: Sandina has a favorite invention-her mobile phone! She always keeps it on her with the volume set to high. This milkshake doesn't want to miss a thing! Sometimes, Sandina's friends have to remind her to put the phone down and be in the moment with them. Thankfully, Sandina has an app for that.
appearance: Sandina is a light pink cup of strawberry milkshake. On top of their lid, She has whipped cream with pink, yellow, purple, and light blue sprinkles on top and a pink and white striped straw. She has black eyes with lashes and a pink mouth. She has a pink strawberry on the right side of her cup.

name: Sandra
bio: Sandra can say "hi" in three languages! This multilingual 'Mallow teaches at the local university and would love for you to drop in to one of her classes. Sandra knows the best way the learn new language is by having fun. That's why she incorporates jokes into every lesson!
appearance: Sandra  is an orange tie-dye carrot with a pattern of dark orange, horizontal bars. She has two yellow-green leaves and one dark green leaf protruding from the top of her head. She has round, black eyes with straight lashes, a smiling mouth and a pale pink blush.

name: Sandrine
bio: Sandrine sneaks out to her garden at dusk to avoid the sunlight and her neighbors. She might be a mystery to most of her community, but everyone knows Sandrine's home by the colorful blooming flowers that surround it! Do you think gardening is her way of connecting with others?
appearance: Sandrine is a lavender moth with a white fuzzy belly and fuzzy maroon antennae. She has red wings with purple, white and maroon wave-like patterns and four off-white eyespots with a purple circle inside surrounded by an olive-green outline. She has black lashed eyes, a black smile and pink blush marks.

name: Sandro
bio: Smells like a summer barbeque! That means Sandro is grilling up some kebabs, tomatoes, and even pineapple! Everything tastes better fresh off the grill. Do you know Sandro's secret to the perfect barbeque? Home-dried wood chips!
appearance: Sandro is a tan Chow Chow with short ears and a fluffy, curled tail. Their inner ears are pink, with a cream fuzzy belly. They have fur markings over their face. Their muzzle is cream colored, and they have black eyes, a black nose, and curved mouth with their blue tongue sticking out.

name: Sandy
bio: Sandy spends the day watching people have fun and walking on the beach. Sometimes she likes being surrounded by her flock of friends, other times she prefers to be on her own. One thing to know about Sandy, this hungry bird never gets tired of looking for French fries!
appearance: Sandy is a white bird with round, black eyes. She has a pale grey belly and fluffy wings the same color. Her short, pointed beak is yellow with a dark orange tip.

name: Sanjay
bio: No one throws a party like Sanjay! He had a whole petting zoo at his last event, and once he installed tire swings on every tree in his backyard. Sanjay is happy to plan everything and loves having his friends and neighbors over for a good time. Will you RSVP to the next bash?
appearance: Sanjay is a scoop of cherry ice cream with darker brown chocolate syrup, red white, and light blue sprinkles and star, and a cherry on the top of his head. They are placed on top of a tan waffle cone with a diamond pattern and his scoop overflowing on top of it. He has black eyes, a black smile and pink blush on their cheeks. He has a blue bowtie with white stars.

name: Santiago
bio: Santiago is a very special squirrel–he loves deep sea diving! Even though he's not the fastest creature in the sea, Santiago loves discovering everything the ocean has to offer. When Santiago isn't diving, you can usually find him in the middle of a card game. He's great at almost every game, so have your poker face ready!
appearance: Santiago is a squirrel with electric blue fur. He has three darker blue stripes on his head, and his nose and mouth are the same shade. His face and belly are white, as are the insides of his ears.

name: Santino
bio: Santino makes the best blueberry pancakes, his dad taught him how to add the blueberries just right. When he’s not making pancakes for all his friends, you can find Santino playing soccer, he wants to be a professional goalie someday. Santino is also known to like surprises and often plans surprise parties for his friends. He catches his targets off guard by jumping through the air and giving them a hug in the face.
appearance: Santino is a brown platypus with a white belly. He has a darker brown, duck-like bill. His eyes are round and black. He also has a rotund tail for swimming and keeping balance.

name: Santos
bio: Santos wants to be an opera singer when he grows up. He enjoys wearing costumes and singing loudly, he knows how good his voice sounds with the right acoustics.

name: Sarah
bio: It’s squirrel time! Sarah is one of the finest stand-up comedians in the entire Squishmallow squad. Her laughter can be heard from miles away! Be sure to check out her special Valentine’s Day routine.
appearance: Sarah is a squirrel with pastel pink fur. She has three hot pink stripes on her head, and her nose and mouth are the same shade. Her face and belly are white and she has round, black eyes.

name: Sarakee
bio: Sarakee is an esthetician-- thats a fancy word for 'skin care specialist'! From avocado facial masks to bamboo  exofoiliants, this big-hearted panda takes pride in helping other 'Mallows feel secure in their own skin.
appearance: Sarakee is a white bear with rainbow markings on Their ears, around Their eyes and in a band around Their body. Their eyes are black and a nose is red , although Their eyes are ringed with white.

name: Sarge
bio: Radio host Sarge loves jazz, jazz and nothing but jazz! He and EDM DJPlumco-host “Bebops & Beep Boops” a show that combines their respective musical passions. This week they’re discussing which of the great jazz legends would have been into dubstep!
appearance: Sarge is a blue jaguar. He has large fuzzy blue ears with glittery silver inner ears. He has jaguar prints all around his body and a fuzzy cyan belly and a blue tail at the back. He has round, black eyes rimmed in pink and a cyan muzzle with a black nose and mouth.

name: Sassafras
bio: Sassafras bakes all kinds of doughy delights, but confetti cupcakes are her specialty. There's nothing like dessert from the kitchen of Sassafras, because she never writes down a recipe! This 'Mallow uses her keen sense of smell to know exactly when a baked treat is ready to pull form the oven.
appearance: Sassafras is a brown Saint Bernard with darker brown spots around their eyes and darker brown ears. She has a white belly, muzzle, and long marking in between her eyes. She has a red collar around her neck with a gold, barrel charm attached to the center. Her eyes are black with white rings around them, a black nose and curved mouth.

name: Satine
bio: Satine is a total brunch bun! She orders way too much food and packs whatever is left over to save for later. Satine hands out all morning with her orange juice and coffee, either reading the morning paper or chatting with a buddy. Join Satine and don't forget to bring your appetite!
appearance: Satine is a light pink bunny with long, lopped ears, a white, fluffy belly, with a darker pink nose, mouth, and two whiskers on the side of her face. She has black eyes with short lashes, her left eye is closed. She also has shiny inner ears.

name: Saul
bio: Saul wants to light up your day! He's a busy electrician helping every 'Mallow shine. You can find Saul running tech at the local theater hanging lamps and managing  the switchboard! Want to help Saul at his show tonight?
appearance: Saul is an orange pumpkin with carved features like a jack-o-lantern. He has yellow triangular eyes which it thinks its lighting up and a yellow broad grin with three prominent square teeth. There is a green stem on his head and a triangular, leaf-like pattern.

name: Sawtelle
bio: Sawtelle guides her clients through both big and small challenges as a life coach. She's always been the best advice giver, just ask her brotherPaden. Sawtelle reminds everyone to listen to their heart and take deep breaths every day. She is one sweet 'Mallow!
appearance: Sawtelle's body consists of a stack of three pancakes, each tan on the top half and pale pink on the bottom. A swirl of whipped cream sits atop her head which has a pink splotch on the top, and a strawberry with a green leaf. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes, pink blush and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Sawyer
bio: Find a penny, pick it up, and all day long you’ll have good luck! Sawyer loves to collect pennies, beads, and shiny knick-knacks he finds in the forest during the day. Join him on a treasure-hunting expedition!
appearance: Sawyer is a squirrel with brown fur. He has three chocolate brown stripes on his head, and his nose and mouth are the same shade. His face and belly are white, as are the insides of his ears. He also has a bushy brown tail.

name: Saxa
bio: Have you seen Saxa? This is one fancy pants 'Mallow! Saxa is expressive in both attire and attitude and always shows her true colors. She is honest but fair with her friends and family and gives great advice. Saxa is one iconic 'Mallow you won't want to miss.
appearance: Saxa is a pink stingray with a white belly. She has large fins on either side of her body which are triangular in shape. She has a long, thin tail and hot pink gills on the sides of her body. Her back is covered in large rainbow spots. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Sayed
bio: Springtime for Sayed is a lot of fun and a lot of hard work. This brisk bunny is training for track! Sayed wants to be the fastest sprinter around and practices running up the hills near their home. Rain or shine, you'll find Sayed putting in the work!
appearance: Sayed is a dark blue rabbit with long, fluffy, lavender lop ears. They have a lighter blue belly which is fluffy with a checked texture. They have a dark blue nose and mouth and round, black eyes with short lashes.

name: Sayonara
bio: Sayonara is a toasted, red and pink waffle. They have whipped cream pouring down their head and a swirl of whipped cream, with red, brown and pink heart sprinkles, on top. They have a winking expression with a black smiling mouth.
appearance: Sayonara is a toasted, red and pink waffle. They have whipped cream pouring down their head and a swirl of whipped cream, with red, brown and pink heart sprinkles, on top. They have a winking expression with a black smiling mouth.

name: Scarlet
bio: Original:Meet Scarlet. This sweet Squishmallow loves all things theatre and dance – she wants to be a costume designer AND a performer on Broadway. Her father taught her how to sew and every year she makes the costumes for her school plays. One day he’ll be front row for one of her shows!
appearance: Scarlet is a bright red strawberry with a green top. She has a pale pink belly and is covered in seeds the same color. She has round black eyes with perky eyelashes and a pink smiling mouth.

name: Scarlito
bio: Most owls are afraid to leave the nest—not Scarlito! This courageous young daredevil was born to soar. Though Scarlito has a lot left to learn, this natural flier is already reaching new heights!
appearance: Scarlito is a pastel purple owl with fuzzy wings, a short tail, and a lilac purple belly with darker purple feathers embroidered on it. They have an off-white face that curves inwards by the center top surrounded by white feathers. Their beak is triangular and yellow, and they have black rounded eyes with eyelashes.

name: Schifra
bio: Meet Schifra. Schifra is an art critic who calls herself a critic of the world. This squirrel has a opinion on everything and she loves to share it! She uses an old-school typewriter she found at a swap meet for her weekly column. Would you like to read it?
appearance: Schifra is a light blue squirrel with closed eyes with 3 eyelashes on each eye and a blue, fluffy tail. She has 3 teal stripes on the top of her head and her stomach is cream white.

name: Schwindt
bio: Schwindt is studying to become a doctor! When he's not in anatomy class, he enjoys tending to his garden. From gnat-infested gardenias to dehydrated daffodils, Schwindt's green thumb helps cure the bluest of plants. One day, he hopes to show his patients the same cure!
appearance: Schwindt is a white bear with mint markings with on his ears, around his eyes which one of them is shaped like a heart and is glittery with a band around his body. He has an aqua nose and mouth as well as round, black eyes.

name: Scooter
bio: Scooter is an elevator inspector with a secret--he's afraid of heights! Though his test rides can make him a bit nervous, his anxiousness ensures no bump or bang is left unchecked. Last week, he even summoned the courage to check floor 13!
appearance: Scooter has vanilla frosting with a swirl of orange caramel and raisins and walnuts on the middle layer. He is a carrot cake with two vanilla frosting on the top and bottom layer. He has a dollop of cream and a carrot on top of his head. his face consists of round, black eyes and mouth with dark orange cheeks.

name: Scout
bio: Scout loves to paint, but he's a bit messy. By the end of the day, all of the colors get on his white fur so that he looks like a painting himself!
appearance: Scout is a white bear with cobalt blue markings on his ears, around his eyes and in a band around his body. His eyes and nose are black, although his eyes are ringed with white.

name: Scrapper
bio: Scrapper is known as a daredevil; he creates the fireworks and lightshow for the Skeleton Squad and rides a motorcycle on stage. Scrapper also makes a mean devil's food cake and bakes one for the band at the start of every tour.
appearance: Scrapper is a black Squishmallow and has high, floppy ears which he holds above his head. He has a round skull with eye and nose cavities, and four prominent teeth. His skull, sternum and ribs are all orange.

name: Screech
bio: Screech tried to make the voice go away. That booming baritone from the sky that beckoned—nay commanded—him to cross a churro with a croissant and call it a churrsaint. He knew it'd be dangerous. He knew it'd change the world. But somewhere deep within him... he knew he had to!
appearance: Screech is a black with long, upright ears. His inner ears are lavender. He have black wings and a plaid his face being lavender and having two black skulls on his belly. He has a patch of pink on the upper left side of his forehead and has a scar on the right side. He has round, black eyes rimmed in white with a red smile.

name: Seamus
bio: Bring your binoculars and go bird watching with Seamus! He keeps a bird encyclopedia with him at all times and would love to tell you all about the birds you spot. Bird watching requires lots of patience and silence, and best of all, making bird calls! Want Seamus to show you how to whistle one?
appearance: Seamus is a mint cow with a dark seafoam green patch by the upper left of his head and his left ear. He has pale pink inner ears and muzzle, off-white horns, with a fuzzy, tea green belly and a long tail with a tuft of green fuzz at the tip. His eyes are black, and his nostrils are green.

name: Seanster
bio: Seanster is always in the mood for a snack! Even when he's in the middle of reading an epic novel, you can bet there's a bag of chips and dip nearby. Seanster and his bestie,Steph, are getting ready to go to a big concert tonight! Want them to save you a seat?
appearance: Seanster is a green stegosaurus with darker green speckles on his front and stripes on his back. He has orange spines running down his back and a white belly. He has a tail, black eyes, and a black smiling mouth.

name: Sebastian
bio: Sebastian loves to spend his time playing basketball and one day wants to go pro in the NBL (National Bunny League). You can find him in the kitchen - eating or helping his mom.
appearance: Sebastian is a periwinkle blue rabbit with long lop ears. He has a white belly and a hot pink nose and mouth. His eyes are closed, and two black whiskers appear on each side of his face.

name: Sebi
bio: Sebi never leaves the house without his microphone. He keeps his ears perked for any new or interesting sounds, then records them. Sebi saves all these clips on his computer so he can easily share them with his budMeggiefor one of her movies!
appearance: Sebi is a white pitbull with a black patch around his left eye. His ears are large and floppy, standing up from his head. His left ear is black and his right ear is white. He has a pronounced snout with jowls, with a rounded black nose and round black eyes and his pink toungue sticks out of his mouth.

name: Sedna
appearance: Sedna is a magenta Schnauzer with floppy ears and a short tail. They have white fluffy eyebrows muzzle, and a white belly with teal and red hearts embroidered on it. Their eyes are black, with a pale pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Sel
bio: Introducing Sel! Sel has a lot of interests, which makes having to choose which one to study in school even more difficult! To help her decide, Sel's plan is to pick one topic a week to learn about, and after a month, she'll pick her favorite! Which subject should she try out first?
appearance: Sel is a tan giraffe with light brown spots. She has holographic inner ears and horns with brown fuzz running from the top of her head to her back and at the end of her long tail. She has a white belly with a white muzzle and brown nostrils, her eyes with lashes are black and round.

name: Selassi
bio: Selassi plays fiddle for a bluegrass band. It took her many years to get the hang of such a difficult instrument, not to mention the challenge of Selassi's web paws! But this 'Mallow never gave up, and now she's one of the fastest fiddle players around. Come see Selassi at a show this weekend!
