appearance: Selassi is a forest green platypus with a fuzzy white belly. She has an emerald green duck-like bill. Her eyes are round and black with lashes. She also has an emerald green rotund tail for swimming and keeping balance.

name: Selema
bio: Selema studies French at the community center in town. She's swimming abroad next year with some of her 'Mallow pals and decided to learn the language for her trip. Selema practices vocabulary every day and even tests herself on flashcards. Join Selema tonight for a classic French movie!
appearance: Selema is a coral jellyfish with white markings on her bell. The end of her bell has a wavy design. Her tentacles are made from yellow and pink ribbons, and her oral arms are made from a multi-colored shimmery fabric.

name: Selene
bio: Selene dreams of being a marine biologist, she loves to learn more about her home and how to keep it clean. She spends her free time sun bathing and learning new languages. What should she learn next?
appearance: Selene is a pale pink shark with three fins, two on each side and one atop her head. She has a round, white belly. She has round black eyes and has a small, toothy grin. She has an emblem with three hearts on her chest, going from smallest to largest: hot pink, blue and purple.

name: Selly
bio: Meet Selly! Some might like gardening but Selly LOVES it! She even built a greenhouse in her backyard so that her hibiscus can stay warm all year. When she's not watering her plants, she's taking pictures of them! Want to see some photos of her camellias?
appearance: Selly is a Scottish Fold cat with a light grey belly and darker stripes on her head and sides. Her inner ears and nose are teal, with a black mouth framed by black whiskers, and round, black eyes. She has an embroidered sun on her belly in yellow.

name: Selma
bio: Meet Selma! Just like her brotherSkyler, this sweet skunk helps out in the garden but truly enjoys building mini towns with objects from the wild. When she grows up she wants to build her very own cottage with a garden filled with roses. Come help Selma on her next building project!
appearance: Selma is a black skunk with a white stripe down her forehead which extends into white fluff above her head. Her muzzle and belly are also white. She has black eyes rimmed in white with two delicate lashes. Her nose, mouth and the inside of her ears are peach pink.

name: Seluna
appearance: Seluna has a dark blue body with yellow stars and a yellow crescent moon by their right. They have black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Sena
bio: Have a produce question? Sena is here to help! She just opened a general store and gets her fruits and veggies fresh and local every day. She loves to support her community in any way that she can.
appearance: Sena is a bright pink unicorn with a white muzzle. Her belly and inner ears are striped with rainbow colors. Her horn is sparkling silver and wrapped in a bright pink spiral. She has a white mane and tail as well as round, black eyes with short lashes.

name: Seraphina
bio: What is Seraphina’s favorite Valentine’s Day candy? Definitely sour gummies! If you give her some she’ll be sure to share with you, and also tell you a joke.
appearance: Seraphina is a pink unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly pink horn with a darker pinkspiral. She has black eyes with short eyelashes. Her belly features a heart emblem with a pink, blue and purple heart, increasing in size as they go down.

name: Serena
bio: Have you ever seen a swan play hockey? You better catch a game soon; you might even see Serena score a goal! Serena and her friends love to glide across the ice, this year they hope to win the Squishmallow tournament.
appearance: Serena is a white bird with a glittering white belly. She has fluffy wings which are multi-colored in pastel shades. She has closed eyes with thick, curly lashes and a yellow beak. She wears a sparkly rose gold crown atop her head.

name: Serene
bio: Meet Serene, the calmest squirrel you'll meet! Just like her name, she is cool, collected and the perfect 'Mallow to help you take a deep breath. She meditates every day and loves to give her friends advice.
appearance: Serene is a squirrel with bright turquoise fur. She has three pink stripes on her head. Her originalBAM!release has a nose and mouth the same color, whereas subsequent releases have an aqua nose and mouth. She also has pink ears with hot pink inners. Her face and belly are white and she has round, black eyes with short lashes. The BAM! release has a fluffy, pink tail, whereas the newer version has a rainbow tail. Her Five Below edition has darker teal markings instead of pink, and her ears and tail are rainbow-colored instead of pink.

name: Serge
bio: Serge plays keyboard and adds all kinds of spooky sounds to tracks for his band. His favorite part of being in a band is playing with his friends and telling his mom about the crazy costumes he gets to wear.
appearance: Serge is a black Squishmallow and has fluffy wings on each side. He has a rounded skull with a prominent beak. His skull, sternum and ribs are all lime green.

name: Sergio
bio: Sergio is a race car driver! When he isn't tearing up the track, you can find him endorsing his favorite strawberry cereal. It's the perfect mid-race snack and the best kind of fuel for first-place finishes!
appearance: Sergio is a tomato red ankylosaurus, a heavily armored type of dinosaur. He has two brown spots on his broad maroon plate with four white spikes atop his head. He has a creamy white belly with round black eyes and a plain, smiling mouth.

name: Sertina
bio: Sertina plays the trumpet and loves baseball. When she grows up, she hopes to be a team manager one day! Her favorite stadium snack is caramel popcorn with chocolate drizzle, do you want to go to a baseball game with Sertina?
appearance: Sertina is a white bear with round ears that are shiny rainbow inside.  She has closed black eyes with eyelashes, right above pink blush on her cheeks, and a black oval-shaped nose.

name: Seth
bio: Seth loves the outdoors. He lives for swimming, hiking, and spending time in his tree house practicing yoga. He is the first to try a new sport or play a new instrument, and although he may not be the best everything he tries, he doesn't let that stop him from having a good time!
appearance: Seth is a red panda with a ginger colored body. He has white markings including on his ears, on his muzzle, eyebrow-like ovals above his eyes and fluffy cheeks. His eyes, nose and mouth are all black. His belly and the insides of his ears are chocolate brown.

name: Sevda
bio: Follow Sevda to the ice! Sevda dreams of becoming a world-class skater and is almost always at the rink, perfecting her routine. Sevda loves to help others learn her sport, so grab your skates and take a whirl!
appearance: Sevda is a drink with a gradient from pale green to teal, with dark green tapioca pearls. Her7.5"release is lime green with dark brown pearls. She has a cheesecloth with a white lid and a sparkly teal straw. She has closed, happy eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Seymour
bio: Seymour writes for a food magazine! This month's issue features lots of fun Halloween recipes, so Seymour has been tasting and writing about all the different festive dishes. Seymour's favorite dish so far is the pumpkin cheesecake. He loved the little whipped cream ghosts topping!
appearance: Seymour is a black spider with eight green creepy crawly legs. He has a green belly and a red smile. He has round, black eyes with white rims.

name: Shabnam
bio: Shabnam is a civil engineer who loves to travel! She's always planning the next adventure for her family. For Shabnam, nothing is more important than her loved ones, so it's no wonder she's known for being on of the sea's sweetest 'Mallows.
appearance: Shabnam is a candy pink sea slug. She has magenta dots on either side of her body. She has pink gold wings with white tips. Her antennae are candy pink with fuzzy pink tips. She also has a fuzzy pink belly. She has black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Shadi
bio: Shadi might look intimidating, but she's super sweet! She started a nonprofit when she was in school and is constantly proving her generosity through random acts of kindness. Just the other day, Shadi held a donation drive for her local animal shelter.
appearance: Shadi is a green cactus. her cactus part is green with a cluster of green spikes. Her flower is red with a gold center. She has pink cheeks and a pink smile. She has two eyelashes on each eye and her right eye is winking. Shadi's cactus pot is light brown with a red heart that says XOXO in white

name: Shagha
bio: Shagha not only folds the best-looking origami, she has the magic touch to turn it to life! Let her fold a few cranes for you and watch them fly. Shagha visits local grade schools to teach students how they can make origami too. Imagine a whole classroom of butterflies and jumping frogs!
appearance: Shagha is a purple Woolly Mammoth with large ears with a marble tie-dye pattern on her inner ears, and a trunk with curled ivory tusks. She has a darker purple tuft of her on the top of her head, a lavender fuzzy belly, and silver holographic wings. Her eyes are also black and rounded.

name: Shahzad
bio: Shahzad doesn't mean to breathe fire-- he's just a stage manager! Known for spitting flames in time of stress, his cast and crew work extra hard to alliviate his worries. Though Shahzad finds his involuntary infernos embarrasing, he loves the work that gets done to avoid them!
appearance: Shahzad is a gargoyle, a dragon-like creature. He has a gradient of three main colors: yellow,cyan and black. He has light-green horns with yellow wing-like ears sitting below them. The wings on his back also have a gradient. His snout and belly are yellow, and he has small, white fangs.

name: Shamarcus
bio: Shamarcus just released his debut memoir, "Mama I Have The Right Way". It details his experience learning to drive with his adoptive mother but also serves as an extended metaphor for what Shamarcus calls "the great stop-and-go of life". His next novel—"Grandpa Don't Drive at Night"—hits stores this fall!
appearance: Shamarcus is a pink orange monster with salmon and blue striped horns and a thick, pink unibrow. He has a two tufts of purple fur on top of his head, a black belly. He has black eyes and a wide mouth with two sharp teeth poking out at the top.

name: Shameik
bio: Shameik is an axolotl with a blue and purple gradient, starting with light blue on top of their head all the way down to a deep purple. They have pale blue gills with a blue frill on each side of their head. They have small, stubby arms and a white belly. They have round black eyes and a cat-like smile.
appearance: Shameik is an axolotl with a blue and purple gradient, starting with light blue on top of their head all the way down to a deep purple. They have pale blue gills with a blue frill on each side of their head. They have small, stubby arms and a white belly. They have round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Shane
bio: Once the weather warms up, Shane runs to the nearest lake to go paddle boarding! They love to feel the sun warm them up as they gently drift out. If it gets too hot, Shane jumps in for a quick rinse in the clear, fresh water, then gets back on their board! Wanna go paddle boarding with Shane this summer?
appearance: Shane is a peach-colored grasshopper with red wings. They have a tan belly with thin horizontal stripes going across it, and two antennae with fuzzy white tips that protrude from the top of their head. They have a round, black eye and a winking eye, a smiling mouth, and pink blush.

name: Shannon
bio: Order up! Shannon is a barista who loves to have fun at work, she specializes in moody drinks. She'll ask how your day is going and then if you want to order from the regular menu or if you want a moody drink. What kind of drink are you in the mood for?
appearance: Shannon is a pale yellow-coloured ice cream, topped with a pink sauce and rainbow sprinkles. Her scoop overflows from her cone, creating a wavy pattern. Her cone is tan with a brown diamond pattern. Both her eyes are closed with curled lashes. She has a smiling mouth and pink blush on both cheeks.

name: Shantika
bio: Shantika checks the mirror twice before leaving home. This beauty brand influencer can't afford to even have one eyelash out of place! Luckily, Shantika always wakes up camera-ready; now, she wants to update her look for the new year. What do you think about a nose ring?
appearance: Shantika is a black cow with teak patches by the upper right of her head and her right ear and on the lower left side of her body. She has black inner ears, muzzle, horns and a long tail with a tuft of teal fuzz at the tip. Her eyes are black, with lashes and his nostrils are black.

name: Shantira
bio: Shantira loves to knit, and has enough yarn to build a house! She makes sweaters, hats, blankets, and more. Last year she knit her two best friends a matching dinosaur footed pajama set.
appearance: Shantira is a pterodactyl, an ancient flying reptile. Her body is patterned in a light blue tie-dye. Her beak is light blue and she has a fuzzy white belly. Her wings are shiny aqua with large foil patches on the outside, and shimmery silver on the inside. She has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Shantrice
bio: Light roast, dark roast, or freeze-dried—as long as it's coffee, Shantrice fell in love with coffee while working as a barista in college. Now Shantrice wants to travel and learn about the magnificent bean Want to join her for an espresso tasting later?
appearance: Shantrice is a plum deer with a white face and belly. She also has white inner ears and light purple  speckles on her forehead. She has sandy colored antlers on top of her head. Her eyes, nose and mouth are all black.

name: Shany
bio: This sparkly Squishmallow loves everything pink and Valentine's day is one of her favorite holidays! She loves to pamper herself with pink sparkly bath bombs and heart shaped glitter cookies.
appearance: Shany is a calico cat with a white body and pink and blue patches, which are covered in sequins. She has one pink patch over her left ear, and two blue patches, one on her right ear and the other on her lower right body. Her tail is covered with blue sequins with a pink sequin tip. The sequins are reverseable, and the blue sequins turn purple, and the pink sequins turn silver. She has closed eyes, black whiskers and a happy, pink cat mouth.

name: Sharde
bio: Sharde is the sweetest Squishmallow with the biggest heart! She's the kind of friend you can count on. Sharde loves to dance at sunset and when she's with her Squishmallow friends she always has her camera on hand to capture the special moments. Fun fact about Sharde: when it comes to cheese, she loves it on everything!
appearance: Sharde is a pastel purple fox with large, triangular ears. Her multi-colored mane includes candy pink, lemon and ice blue. Her shimmery white horn has stripes in corresponding colors. Her belly, the insides of her ears and the banded markings on her eyes and the sides of her face are all white. She has round black eyes, a triangular nose and two angled whiskers on each cheek. She has a unicorn tail which is striped in rainbow.

name: Sharie
bio: Tap, tap, tap goes Sharie in her shiny tap shoes! One of the best in her dance class, Sharie loves to put on a good show and make the audience smile as she performs on stage.
appearance: Sharie's fur has a tie-dye pattern which is predominantly purple with traces of pink and blue. She has purple markings surrounding her round black eyes, and her face and belly are all white. Her snout is a pale grey with a black nose and smiling mouth.

name: Sharon
bio: Looking for a photographer? Sharon is the shark for you! She travels the globe taking photos for Squishmallows of all kinds but her favorite place to be is usually at home with her family or playing her brand new guitar!
appearance: Sharon is a turquoise shark with matching fins and a white belly. She has round black eyes and sharp teeth that poke through her smile.

name: Shasta
bio: Whoosh! There goes Shasta. She's busy seating guests for dinner on the beach terrace. Shasta is the general manager of a popular beach hotel and restaurant, and she couldn't imagine doing anything else. Shasta loves spreading good vibes, and her peachy attitude makes her a natural at hospitality.
appearance: Shasta is a orange bigfoot with a fuzzy mane on her head with long, shaggy ears. She has white pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with eyelashes, a wide mouth which stretches across her face and blushing cheeks. And she has pink and yellow tropical flowers with leaves on her head.

name: Shaun
bio: Original:Shaun is a high-spirited fitness fanatic who loves to stay active. Whether it's hiking, biking or rollerblading. You will always find him outdoors. He's the perfect friend to break a sweat and soak up the sunshine with!
appearance: Shaun is a grey Squishmallow with medium-length floppy ears. He has fluffy white eyebrows and a shaggy muzzle. His belly is also white. He has a large black nose and mouth, as well as large, round eyes.

name: Shauna
bio: Shauna and her friendLandonrule the stage, they've been dubbed the king and queen of karaoke amongst their friends. Shauna is a crowd pleaser and warms the crowd up with a new ballad every week. Can you guess her next song?
appearance: Shauna is a clam shell patterned with a rainbow gradient. The segments of her shell are separated with white dotted lines. She has a white belly with sparkly silver dots. She has round, black eyes with curled lashes, a pink, smiling mouth and blush the same color.

name: Shay
bio: Need a spot at the gym? Shay has limbs and jokes to go around! Lifting weights, reading plays, and a good joke are Shay's way of life. He loves to recite his favorite monologues and with some added humor for his friends.
appearance: Shay is a mint green squid with a triangular head. He has numerous legs which protrude from beneath him and curve upwards. He has a white belly and a plain, smiling face.

name: Shayna
bio: Shayna  is a parakeet (budgie), a type of small parrot. She has a light yellow head, a yellow body and a light yellow belly. Her wings are light yellow. She has a rounded, yellow beak with a yellow cere above it, as well as round, black eyes and pink blush.
appearance: Shayna  is a parakeet (budgie), a type of small parrot. She has a light yellow head, a yellow body and a light yellow belly. Her wings are light yellow. She has a rounded, yellow beak with a yellow cere above it, as well as round, black eyes and pink blush.

name: Shea
bio: Watch out for Shea! This wild 'Mallow can burst into any room and liven it up with jokes, gags, or just her toothy smile. And it's no wonder Shea never runs out of energy—she's always in the middle of a snack! Shea loves noshing on a tub of vanilla frosting to keep her comedy act going.
appearance: Shea is a pink Cthulhu, a mythical cosmic entity with the head of a cuttlefish/octopus, dragon wings, and a humanoid body. She has a light pink belly, darker pink spots on her forehead and fins on the sides of her head with dragon wings and sparkly pink webbing. Her eyes are black, she has pink blush, and four tentacles that cover her mouth. There is a daisy on the left side of her head.

name: Sheba
bio: Can Sheba clarify something? “Little Kathleen” was a sitcom role she played decades ago. And she’s happy that fans still appreciate her performance! But when you now work as an international diplomat and world leaders ask you to “say that line, that muffin line” during the middle of trade negotiations…
appearance: Sheba is a purple Bigfoot. She has highland cow ears and long white horns and has a shaggy mane. She has a purple body with a fuzzy purple cow print belly. She has dark purple heart shape feet with toes. She has round, black eyes and a wide mouth that stretches across her face.

name: Sheen
bio: Sheen puts the "trick" in trick-or-treat! While his sweet-as-pie sisterSheenabutters up homeowners, Sheen pilfers all the candy his little wings can carry. But fear not... he proudly distributes all their sweets spoils to 'Mallows in need... after taking his 10% commission, of course!
appearance: Sheen is an indigo bat with tall, pointed ears and bat wings. His inner ears and wings are a holographic gold with a black fuzzy belly. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with two fangs poking out at the bottom.

name: Sheena
bio: Sheena is one of Halloween's most infamous trick-or-treaters! She distracts homeowners with her batting eyes while her brotherSheenpockets fistfuls of candy. Though some call Sheena a "thief" or an "outlaw", she doesn't mind. After all, she always donates her loot to local schools, shelters, and senior homes!
appearance: Sheena is a pink bat with tall, pointed ears and bat wings. Her inner ears and wings are a holographic silver with a pink fuzzy belly. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth with two fangs poking out at the bottom.

name: Sheila
bio: Sheila might have moved from the outer boroughs to the big city, but that doesn't mean she's giving up her big brown SUV! This radio DJ needs the trunk space for her coats and the sound system to get her Friday nights on. Besides—who's trying to wear stilettos on the Z train?
appearance: Sheila is a stack of three chocolate pancakes with a darker brown bottom on each pancake. She has whipped cream on the top with chocolate syrup and chocolate syrup with sprinkles. Her eyes are black with lashes, pink blush, and a plain black smile.

name: Shelbs
bio: Shelbs is always trying to get a workout in! If she's hanging with friends, it's probably on a pull-up bar. If she's smiling for a photo you can be sure she's stretching that smile from ear to ear. And if she's watching her favorite soccer team on TV? Nervous pacing around the living room does just the trick!
appearance: Shelbs  is a peach cup of peach milkshake. On top of their lid, She has whipped cream with peach sprinkles on top and a red and white striped straw. She has black eyes with lashes and a pink mouth. She has a peach on the right side of her cup.

name: Shelby
bio: Shelby loves to hang out with friends and family. She loves going to the park to climb around but when she is not playing, she loves to take naps!
appearance: Shelby is a sloth with a white face and a rainbow, tie-dyed body. She has a belly made of pink reversible sequins, pink banded markings over her eyes and a pink muzzle. She has black eyes with lashes, a black, heart-shaped nose and an open mouth.

name: Sheldon
bio: Sheldon enjoys spending time by himself and learning more about the ocean he lives in! He loves learning about all the plants, other sea creatures, and making friends with the people he meets along the way. Fun fact about Sheldon: he wanted to be ajellyfishwhen he grew up!
appearance: Sheldon is a musk pink seahorse with darker pink fins, gills and snout. He has a white belly and on the outer part of his snout. Dark pink lines cross his belly and edge his snout.

name: Shellie
bio: Meet Shellie. This silly skeleton plays the drums and loves to make noise. She used to bang on pots and pans as a mini-mallow and now tours all over. Her favorite thing about touring with the Skeleton Squad? Seeing new mallow fans everywhere she tours.
appearance: Shellie is a black Squishmallow and has rounded ears. She has a round skull with eye and nose cavities, and four prominent teeth. Her skull, ribs and sternum are all purple, as are the insides of her ears.

name: Shelly
bio: Shelly runs a frightfully fabulous jewelry store! from spiderweb wedding rings to skeleton-bone brooches, her drop-dead gorgeous designs are the talk of the graveyard. Check-out Shelly's earthworm earrings—they're a real scream!
appearance: Shelly is a stack of three pink pancakes with a lighter pink bottom on each pancake. She has whipped cream on the top with a strawberry cut in the shape of a heart and chocolate syrup with red, purple, and white heart sprinkles. Her eyes are black with lashes, pink blush, and a plain black smile.

name: Shena
bio: Shena is looking for someone to play catch with so grab a glove! She's working on her curve ball because she wants to try out for the softball team this spring. Though she's great at bat, she wants to become the best pitcher around. Will you help her?
appearance: Shena is a rainbow, tie-dyed dog. Her regular version is predominantly pink, green and yellow, whereas theCracker Barrelversion has a circular pattern with more blue. She has pink, floppy ears and a circular patch the same color over her right eye. Her rounded triangular nose is the same color, and she has round, black eyes. She also has a white muzzle and belly.

name: Shep
bio: Shep drives a long-haul truck for a delivery company. He maintains his truck himself, including always rotating his tires! Shep loves his life on the road and is looking for a like-minded 'Mallow to join him on his far-off adventures. Do you enjoy long-distance road trips?
appearance: The horns can be shiny silver or soft cream-colored

name: Sherman
bio: Sherman may be a modest 'Mallow, but his trophy shelf tells a different story. He's actually the top swimmer in his country! As much as Sherman loves racing in the pool, he's thinking about becoming a lifeguard. Please be safe when swimming in deep water!
appearance: Sherman is a sloth with a tan body and a white patch on his face and belly. The banded markings around his eyes and his muzzle are cream. He wears a brown sherpa hoodie with white laces. He has a white belly hidden under his hoodie. He has round black eyes, a brown round nose and a cat-like smile.

name: Shevra
bio: Do you know any good jokes? Shevra is one Squishmallow who loves to laugh. She's always kind and has a smile that will cheer you up. Give her the gift of a laugh and she'll light up the room!
appearance: Shevra is a round, yellow sun surrounded by yellow and light orange rays. She has closed, happy eyes with straight lashes, a big smile, and a pink blush on each cheek.

name: Shimi
bio: Nothing makes Shimi happier than adventure on the open seas! She's an expert sailor who has traveled to all the continents, including frozen lands. Brrr! All Shimi needs is her ship, the wind, and a good friend to keep her company. Want to set sail with Shimi?
appearance: Shimi has a tie-dyed body which is predominantly pink, purple and white. She has a mohawk and small, fluffy wings that match the colors of her body. She has a white belly with three hearts which are lavender, pink and purple. Her beak is golden, with a white outline and the top of her beak is purple. She also has black, round eyes with two eyelashes on each side.

name: Shirley
bio: Shirley is a car mechanic! She and her cosmetologist bestie Betsy own Due for a Change, a hybrid auto shop-salon. As much as Shirley loves getting her hooves dirty under the hood, she appreciates Betsy’s hot stone manicures after a long day of work. Stop by for the Wednesday special—a shave and smog check!
appearance: Shirley is a purple goat with numerous white markings. These are found inside her ears, on her muzzle, and on the underside of her tail. She also has a fluffy white goatee. She has two grey horns and mischievous black eyes. She has a white belly and wears a purple bandana with a black pattern.

name: Shon
bio: Shon coaches the football team at her local elementary school. All students are invited to try out and give it their best effort! Shon focuses on discipline and good sportsmanship in each practice, and most of all, having fun. She hopes to see you at next season's tryout!
appearance: Shon is a purple creature based on the Loch Ness Monster. She has fins on either side of her body, two small horns and off-white spots along her back. Her light purple belly has a cord texture with the appearance of horizontal stripes. She has round, black eyes, a smiling mouth, and pink blush. on top of her head, she wears a green flower.

name: Shondie
bio: Meet Shondie. She is always trying out new hobbies. First it was baking sourdough bread, then it was tie-dying all the clothes in her closet. Now she's trying her hand at beekeeping. So far she's doing pretty good! Do you have a hobby she should try out next?
appearance: Shondie is a tie-dyed rainbow unicorn with a white mane and tail. Her inner ears, nostrils, and horns are a shimmery blue color with a white muzzle and belly. Her eyes with lashes are closed in a happy expression.

name: Shoni
bio: Meet Shoni. Don't be surprised if he asks you for directions. This 'Mallow is always getting lost and turned around! But Shoni doesn't mind. He loves all the new places he gets to see and the new friends he meets on the way! Who knows where he'll go next!
appearance: Shoni is a pale teal dodo bird with a white mask marking and lighter teal belly. He has black eyes with orange rings around them and a triangular, white beak with an orange tip. He has fuzzy, teal wings with white on the end and a fuzzy, white tail.

name: Shoshana
bio: Shoshana has a beautiful voice and dreams of being a superstar. She is learning how to dance so she can sing and dance her way to the stage, do you want to practice with her!
appearance: Shoshana is a rainbow, tie-dyed unicorn with a pattern of stars covering her body. She has a peach pink belly. Her horn and inner ears are shiny silver, and she has a round, white muzzle. She has closed eyes with short eyelashes and a white mane.

name: Shozo
bio: Meet Shozo. Shozo is a planner who helps 'Mallow everywhere feel safe. He works in logistics and planning to make sure fire drills, tornado drills, and other weather emergencies are handled. Snowstorms or flash floods? Shozo's got it handled!
appearance: Shozo is a sushi roll, mostly black because of hisnori(seaweed) wrap. On the top of his head, you can see the white rice, salmon and a green blob of either wasabi or avocado that make up his filling. He has round, black eyes outlined in white, pink blush and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Shun
bio: Have you ever had a song stuck in your head that you can't remember? Sing that tune to Shun and get ready for the magic! Shun is like a 'Mallow jukebox and can help you with any musical request you might have.
appearance: Shun is a white sushi almost resembling a Gunkan Roll. Their body has a light grey rice pattern and on the top they have green cucumber and red fish roe wrapped in black seaweed. They have black round eyes with a white dot on the top right, and a black smile with red blush. On the 7", they have pink blush and no white dot on the eyes.

name: Shyla
bio: Shyla operates a spooky animal hospital in town. where she treats her patients like they're her own family. The busiest day of the year is the day after Halloween when Shyla heals tummy aches and tooth pain from too much candy. Will you help Shyla's patients get well?
appearance: Shyla is a purple witch with long-length white hair. She wears a plain black witch hat. She wears a black cape with a green buckle and a black outfit with green laces at the front. She has closed eyes with eyelashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Sid
bio: Meet Sid. He adds chocolate milk to his marshmallow cereal and hot sauce on his omelets. Sid listens to opera to entertain himself and make time go faster while sitting in traffic. What song would you like Sid to sing?
appearance: Sid is a teal snail with two glittery teal antennae on top of his head. His stomach is cream white. The shell on his back is tie dyed pastel rainbow colors with two light pink swirls on either side, and he has a pointy tail sticking out from the bottom.

name: Sienna
bio: Sienna hosts the best dance parties around! This caring caticorn invites her whole Squishmallows Squad for a night of sweet dance moves in snazzy outfits. The decorations are always extra sparkly--her favorite color is rainbow! Will you join Sienna for her next bash?
appearance: Sienna is a hot pink caticorn (cat with a unicorn horn.) She has triangular ears and a tail. Her multi-colored bangs include yellow, mint and wisteria purple. The inside of her ears and her belly are pastel rainbow. The horn is a white with multi-colored bands in pink, yellow and blue. She has round eyes with curled lashes with a yellow star on her left eye and a pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Signora
bio: Fashion designer Signora believes when you look good, you sleep good! That's why she just launched a line of high-end pajamas. From tailored silk sweatshirts to hand-embroided eye masks, her collection is elegant. cozy, and, oh-so couture
appearance: Signora is a squash colored snake with a cream lower jaw and belly. Her belly has brown stripes dividing it horizontally. She has brown spots on her back and a short tail. She has round black eyes and black nostrils and mouth. A thin, red, forked tongue pokes out from her mouth.

name: Sigrid
bio: Congrats to Sigrid! She just became her airline's first female airline pilot. Sigrid flies all around the world but most of her routes are to mountainous northern regions. When Sigrid's not working her dream job, she rounds up her best buddies for an island getaway!
appearance: Sigrid is a light blue cat with a white round belly. She has a darker face and open eyes. The insides of Sigrid's triangular ears are a light pink color. She has black eyes rimmed in white and two dark whiskers on each side.

name: Sigzby
bio: Meet Sigzby. This super special ‘Mallow is rarely seen in the wild, that’s because she’s nocturnal! When everyone else is sleeping, she’s up rock climbing, making origami, or practicing her ballet moves! When the sun comes up, you can find her snoozing in her favorite tree!
appearance: Sigzby is a black based cat with silver spots all over her body. She has shiny silver inner ears with fuzzy black edges and a fuzzy, grey belly. She has round black eyes, with gold circles around them, two silver whiskers on each side of her grey muzzle with black nose and mouth.

name: Silky
bio: Have you ever met a lucky filly? Silky might be your first! She loves having her mane braided and her favorite food is biscuits with strawberry jam. Silky dreams of winning the Kentucky Derby one day, maybe her lucky name can help! Will you cheer her on?
appearance: Silky is a ginger brown horse with a white stripe on her forehead. She has black eyes and a ginger mane and tail. Her muzzle and belly are white, and the inside of her ears are tan. She has a purple jockey shirt and cap motif embroidered on the right side of her chest.

name: Silver
bio: Silver specializes in horoscopes and has their own weekly column in the local paper. They reference a huge astrology book with all the planetary meanings and explanations to help them write the weekly horoscopes. Will you let Silver read your birth chart?
appearance: Silver is a can of gummy worms. They have three stripes of color on the main part of their body, the top being pink, the middle being green, and the bottom being purple. On the green stripe, there is a label colored in white that reads "GUMMY WORMS". On the top of their head, it is yellow, with 3 gummy worms poking out with the colors of blue, pink, and green. On the pink stripe is a smiling face with open eyes.

name: Silvia
bio: Silvia may look like a sleepy Squishmallow but that’s because she works late at night! Silvia is an orthopedic surgeon and works nights at the hospital. She loves helping people as long as she’s had enough sleep!
appearance: Silvia is a pastel purple unicorn with white on her muzzle, belly and inside her ears. Her multi-colored mane includes candy pink, light turquoise and lavender. She has a shimmery, golden horn with a hot pink swirl. Her eyes are closed and she has long, curled lashes.

name: Silvina
bio: Silvina is a writer and loves the finer things in life like designer shells and tropical trips. She loves basking in the shade with a cool breeze to help her get started on a new book. Whenever she travels it gives her inspiration to write a new book.
appearance: Silvina is a light pink snail with two glittery magenta antennae on top of her head. Her stomach is cream white. The shell on her back is tie dyed pastel rainbow colors with two dark pink swirls on either side, and she has a pointy tail sticking out from the bottom.

name: Silvy
bio: As a high school guidance counselor, Silvy asks a lot of questions. Sometimes, she even answers a student's question with another question! Silvy says that taking the time to think about what you like and what you want are very important. What questions will you ask Silvy?
appearance: Silvy is a lavender bear with a fuzzy belly and inner ears. She wears a green headband tied into a bow with yellow floral print. Her muzzle is a lighter purple with a lavender nose and curved mouth with black eyes and eyelashes.

name: Simon
bio: Want a buddy to just relax with? Simon is your perfect match. If you can’t find him, he is probably at the store buying another video game! In fact, he is the greatest gamer on the block. Fun fact about Simon? He loves virtual reality. If it were up to him, he would teleport in a second!
appearance: Simon is a sloth with a light brown body and a cream patch on his face and belly. The banded markings around his eyes and his muzzle are very pale blue. He has round eyes, a round nose and a cat-like smile, all of which are black.

name: Simone
bio: Grab your spectacles and get ready for a musical journey, Simone is about to go on stage! Simone is an opera singer with a magical voice. You're always in for a treat if you can catch her while she's in town.
appearance: Simone is a pink-red shrimp. She has 8 little arms, a shimmery tail and 2 shimmery antenna on top of her head. Her belly is light pink and striped with her bright red/orange body color. Her face features 2 round black eyes and a small happy smile.

name: Simonette
bio: Simonette is always there for others but struggles to prioritize her “me time”—that’s why she created an imaginary friend named Bimonette! Just like Simonette, Bimonette loves meditating, working on her novel, and eating soup in silence. They actually have plans every day this week—per Bimonette’s request!
appearance: Simonette is an ice cream sandwich. She has two monster cookies one on top and one on the bottom with rainbow M&M like candies. She has vanilla ice cream in the center of her. She has round black eyes and a red smile.

name: Sinclair
bio: Sinclair and his cousinAustinlove to talk about outer space, but they always disagree on whether aliens exist. Austin thinks they do but Sinclair needs more proof. He wants to join Austin on a space adventure to find out, are you ready for liftoff?
appearance: Sinclair is a piece of avocado toast. He is shaped like a slice of toast and has a green avocado-spread design on most of his body, including his face. On top of the avocado part are small pieces of ground black pepper & red pepper flakes. He has round, black eyes, and a red smile.

name: Sinead
bio: Sinead loves the ocean and dreams of exploring the sea. There's just one problem, Sinead doesn't know how to swim! Maybe one day Sinead will explore the ocean, for now, it's time for swimming lessons!
appearance: Sinead is a white bear with dark grey markings on her ears and around her eyes. She has a black nose and mouth and closed, happy eyes with straight lashes. She wears a purple inflatable ring around her middle which has a colorful spotted pattern.

name: Siobhan
bio: Meet Siobhan. Did you know he used to be afraid of water? Now he loves going on night swims with his friends. His favorite part is how the stars in the sky makes the water sparkle all around him! Want to join him? Dive in!
appearance: Siobhan has a black color on his body with bright pink gills on either side of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a yellow spider web belly. He has round black eyes with yellow flowers on each one of the eyes and a yellow cat-like smile. On top of his there are teal, pink,yellow flower with decorations on it. and his belly has pink bumps around the belly.

name: Sissy
bio: Grab some flour and put on your apron, Sissy could use some help in the kitchen. Sissy loves to try new things, this week she's baking brownies for a school project. Can you help her gather all the ingredients?
appearance: Sissy is a hot pink strawberry with white seeds. She has three narrow, pale green leaves atop her head. She has large, black eyes with spiky lashes and a wide smile. She also has a pale pink blush below each eye.

name: Sissy the Panda
bio: If you want to find Sissy, it's likely she's surrounded by comic books and board games. This quirky 'Mallow is always looking for more to add to her collection. She loves browsing stores and specialty shops on the hunt for the perfect trinkets. Would you like to join her?
appearance: Sissy is a white panda with teal markings on her ears, around her eyes and in a band around her body. Her arms and paws are also teal and hold a brown iced tea (or coffee) in a clear takeaway cup between them. She has black eyes ringed in white, and a teal nose and mouth. She wears large glasses with sparkly golden frames.

name: Sister
bio: Sister is a lavender bee with shimmering silver wings. Her belly is striped in purple and lavender, and has has two black antennae. She has round eyes, a smiling mouth with pink blush. She wears a purple flower on her forehead.
appearance: Sister is a lavender bee with shimmering silver wings. Her belly is striped in purple and lavender, and has has two black antennae. She has round eyes, a smiling mouth with pink blush. She wears a purple flower on her forehead.

name: Sivi
bio: Meet Sivi. She is sweet, warm, and generous. Her favorite part of the holidays is seeing the smiles on her friends' faces when they unwrap something special she's made for them. She crafts handmade cards and necklaces. She'd love to make you something special, too!
appearance: Sivi is a cup of a brown hot chocolate with whipped cream on top decorated with green and red sprinkles and chocolate pouring out. She has a candy cane on top alongside a holly. Her bottom half is red, she has black eyes with lashes, pink blush, and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Skeeter
bio: Have you seen Skeeter? This super-fast skeleton runs around like a flash of lightening at all the Skeleton Squad shows! Skeeter is friends with the Squad and makes sure all their favorite snacks are backstage: caramel apples, apple cider witches brew, and sour gummy candy.
appearance: Skeeter is a black Squishmallow and has long, upright ears. They have a rounded skull with eye and nose cavities and four teeth protruding below. Their skull, inner ears, ribs and sternum are all yellow.

name: Sketlana
bio: Watch out for Sketlana! This queen of the bass knows a thing or two about bringing the house down. Sketlana plays bass and ukelele and is known for her spooky scream in Skeleton Squad. Fun fact about Sketlana: she designs all the costumes for the band!
appearance: Sketlana is a black Squishmallow and has a silver horn with a hot pink swirl. She also has a hot pink mane along their back. Her skull is rounded with lashed, circular eyes, a hole for each nostril and four teeth. The skull, sternum, ribs and inner ears of this character are all hot pink.

name: Skip
bio: Congrats to Skip who just bought a new house! At first he thought it was haunted because he kept hearing funny noises, but when Skip finally went to investigate, he found a bird's nest in his A/C unit! Skip didn't have ghosts—he has new neighbors! Would you like to meet them?
appearance: Skip is a muted blue bigfoot with a black fuzzy mane on his head and long and muted blue bat ears. He has a white face and muted blue belly, and black pads on his feet which are shaped like hearts. He has black eyes with, pink blush beneath and a wide mouth which stretches across his entire face.

name: Skully
bio: Star gazing, salami and sci-fi movies are some of Skully's favorite things. This creepy cat loves to think about what other living things could exist in space, they are positive that there's more life out there!
appearance: Skully is a black Squishmallow and has triangular ears. They have a rounded skull with eye and nose cavities and two fangs protruding below. Their skull, inner ears, ribs and sternum are all white.

name: Sky
bio: Sky shreds on the tennis court. Her backhand is almost stronger than her forehand! Sky is ready to make tennis her career, but first she has to graduate high school. There's only one semester left before Sky graduates—she's thinking about going to prom in a neon tennis outfit!
appearance: Sky is a teal squid with a triangular head. She has 10 legs which protrude from beneath her and curve upwards. The legs are four different shades of blue, ranging from a dark teal to light blue. She has a white belly and a plain, smiling face.

name: Skyler
bio: Skyler is obsessed with gardening - he helps his grandmother and has developed quite the green thumb! He may give you a fright when you first meet him, but this skunk is a softie at heart.
appearance: Skyler is a black skunk with a white stripe down his forehead. His muzzle and belly are also white. He has black eyes rimmed in white, and a black nose and mouth. The insides of his ears are pale pink.

name: Sloan
bio: Sloan is a private chef--- she's also a private investigator! This sneaky skunk works night and day learning what customers like to eat. Through in-depth interviews and the occasional dumpster dive, Sloan is able to create the most of custom cuisines. Bon appetit!
appearance: Sloanis a purple skunk with a white stripe down her forehead. Her muzzle and belly are also white. She has black eyes and a black nose and mouth. The insides of her ears are also white.

name: Smithereens
bio: Smithereens is a black cow with a purple patch by the upper right of their head and their right ear and a teal one on the lower left side of their body. They have purple and grey inner ears and muzzle, black horns and a black tail with tuft of black fuzz at the back. They have mischievous eyes and black nostrils. They have a purple heart on their left cheek and a melting purple and teal ombre heart on the right side.
appearance: Smithereens is a black cow with a purple patch by the upper right of their head and their right ear and a teal one on the lower left side of their body. They have purple and grey inner ears and muzzle, black horns and a black tail with tuft of black fuzz at the back. They have mischievous eyes and black nostrils. They have a purple heart on their left cheek and a melting purple and teal ombre heart on the right side.

name: Snell
bio: Welcome to Snell's jewelry store! She buys and trades jewelry from all over the globe to have perfectly crafted accessories in her shop. Snell even wears some of the unique item, like a glazed kiwi barrette and strawberry brooch pin. Want Snell to make a little gift bag  just for you?
appearance: Snell is a pink smoothie cup with a lighter pink lid and a yellow and white striped straw poking out of it and a kiwi slice. She has darker pink and white dots all over her body and has a white belly with a pink strawberry embroidered on it. She has black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Snowball
bio: This Squishmallow was not given a bio on their tag.
appearance: Snowball is a laying lamb with a tie-dyed, rainbow body. They have a short tail, floppy ears, and white hooves with yellow toes. They have round markings over their eyes and a white muzzle with a pink nose and curved mouth and black lashes eyes closed in a happy expression.

name: Sofia
bio: You’ve never met a unicorn who loves dogs more than Sofia. This artist loves to paint and draw dogs of all shapes and sizes. Maybe one day you’ll see her work in a gallery or in a museum!
appearance: Sofia is a white unicorn with a fluffy pink mane and tail. Her belly is patterned in tie-dye, a mix of pink, blue and yellow. Her horn, inner ears and muzzle are all glittery pink. Her horn has a hot pink swirl wrapped around it, and her closed eyes are adorned with short, curled lashes.

name: Sol
bio: You can always find Sol at the game store on Fridays. They compete in all tabletop games! But did you know Sol has a secret? They can't see very well with their eyes, so Sol relies on their intuition. it's worked for them so far--Sol is the all-time strategy board game champion!
appearance: Sol is a periwinkle skunk with two ears on either side of their head, their inner ears, fuzzy belly, head stripe and muzzle are all white. They have round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Soledad
bio: Soledad loves being creative. She enjoys drawing, painting, and decorating with glitter. She just learned how to paint animal faces, can she practice face painting with you?
appearance: Might need help with this.

name: Solenn
bio: Solenn brings sunshine on even the gloomiest days! She's a pillar of strength for her squad and her family, but Solenn doesn't let that kind of pressure gets her. When Solenn needs to recharge, she walks to her favorite park and spins on the tire swing!
appearance: Solenn is a salmon sushi made up with white grain rice. With a black nori seaweed wrapped around her in the back of her she has an orange salmon on the back of her. She has a black rounded eyes with one lashes and a red smiling face.

name: Solina
bio: Meet Solina. She's naturally charming. Maybe it's the sparkle in her eye, or that she's great at keeping secrets! Whatever it is, she's the type of 'Mallow you just want to be around. She's always doing something fun, like salsa dancing lessons. Want to join?
appearance: Solina is an owl with prominent ear tufts. Her body is tie-dyed in purple, pink and blue with a galaxy pattern scattered over it. She has white patches surrounding each eye which are edged with green feathers. She also has a fluffy white belly with three rows of feathers outlined in pink. Her small beak is pale pink. She has short, curly lashes and is winking her right eye.

name: Solomon
bio: Solomon hates Valentine's Day cards! They're way too small for all the love he has to write about and don't even include space for sonnets or footnotes. Thankfully, pamphlets do!
appearance: Solomon is a mushroom with a grey stalk and a brown cap. The top of his cap is brown with fuzzy pink hearts, and the underside is a less saturated brown. His stalk makes up his body and includes a round, fuzzy pink belly. He has round, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth with pink heart blush.

name: Sonja
bio: Congratulations to Sonja—she just placed first in the country freeze-dancing competition! Her precise posing impressed the audience so much, a local department store offered her a job as a mannequin. Sonja can't wait to model their spring collection and put her freezing skills to the test!
appearance: Sonja is a pink mallard duck. She has a hot pink head and a pink body separated by a white ring marking with fuzzy wings and a white belly. She has a yellow beak, black eyes rimmed in white and two pink and white Sakura flowers on her head.

name: Sophia
bio: Ready to flip? Sophia is perfecting her back handspring and she'd love a tumble buddy to practice with! Off the mat, this 'Mallow invents helpful gadgets out of household objects; maybe, Sophia will invent a new gymnastics move!
appearance: Sophia is a white dog with cyan patches over her right ear, around her left eye and on her belly. Her belly has a cyan flower on the right. Her ears are large and floppy, standing up from her head. She has a pronounced snout with pale blue outlines and classic bulldog jowls, with a rounded black nose and round black eyes.

name: Sophie
bio: Inspired by the flowers near her home, Sophie is an aspiring fashion designer. She loves creating new looks and staging fashion shows with her friends.
appearance: Sophie is a creamy white sheep. Her face and inner ears are an even whiter white. She has round black eyes with short lashes. Her mouth, nose and the blush on her cheeks are pale pink.

name: Soraya
bio: Meet Soraya. Her laugh is so contagious so you can't help but join in when you hear it. Soraya has a carefree attitude, and that's what makes her so easy to love. She rarely gets upset and can help calm anyone down.
appearance: Soraya is a cheetah-corn, a combination of acheetahand aunicorn. However, she has the triangular ears and cat face, including whiskers and a pale pink nose and mouth, typical of acaticorn. She has a pastel, tie-dyed coat including colors like yellow, blue and white and is covered in white spots with a pale pink outline. Her horn and inner ears are shimmery white, and her horn has a pink swirl wrapping around it. She has a pale grey belly.

name: Soupy
bio: Soupy loves climbing stairs! He loves been leaping steps since he was a little 'Mallow and now he's enrolled in the city's yearly run-up race. Soupy can't wait to climb the top of his city's tallest building—it's 85 flights! Do you want to join the stair race with Soupy?
appearance: Soupy is a lavender goblin. He has sparkly purple horns on his head and lavender pointy ears. On the back of he has a lavender devil-like tail. He wears a blue jacket with a light blue outfit with a snowflake in the middle and an arctic blue belt with a silver buckle. He has round, black eyes and mouth with pale purple blush.

name: Sozo
bio: Sozo isn't crying—he's just cutting onions! This award-winning pastry chef loves incorporating his favorite vegetable into his culinary creations, like red onion tartlets, or caramelized onion croissants! He's even hard at work perfecting a green onion donut. Think he can do it?
appearance: Sozo is a neon yellow gummy bear with a dark yellow tummy. He has neon yellow ears with dark yellow inner ears and neon yellow tail behind. He has round golden eyes, a pale yellow muzzle and a gold nose and mouth.

name: Sparky
bio: Changes overwhelm Sparky. He just moved to a new town for his first year of college and it feels like two changes in one! After talking to his family today, he decided to deal with these changes very slowly and take it easy on himself. Want to stay in today and watch movies with Sparky?
appearance: Sparky is a cyan dinosaur. He is holding a pink mug with a red of hot chocolate with pink and red hearts with a creamy white belly. He has fuzzy peach hair which runs down his back. He has round, black eyes and an open mouth with pointy teeth.

name: Spencer
bio: Looking for a happy helper? Add Spencer to your squad! Spencer is a greeter at the store and LOVES his job. He is always willing to lend a paw or make someone smile! To let go and have fun, Spencer loves to shop for toys at Five Below!
appearance: Spencer is a golden or tan colored dog with large, floppy ears. He has a light yellow muzzle. His eyes, nose and mouth are all black. He wears a white and blue shirt with the Five Below logo emblazoned across the front.

name: Spice
bio: Spice loves everything pink—like strawberry cupcakes and sparkly rhinestones! When she isn't writing in her diary or dancing to pop music, you can find her at the mall. She loves meeting up with her best friend,Sugar, to get extra-large cinnamon buns from the food court!
appearance: Spice is a Devil's Food Cake with a light brown base and chocolate frosting with red sprinkles on her head. She has a layer of chocolate in the middle of her body. She has red devil horns, wings, and a tail with pink blush, a red smile with fangs poking out from the bottom, and black eyes with a winking expression.

name: Spotts
bio: Spotts invests in maintaining a super cozy home, and only goes out if she really needs to. She likes to keep this to herself, and is also a pretty skillful home cook. Tonight Spotts is baking a turkey meatloaf with a side of sweet potato mash. There's nothing like dinner for one!
appearance: Spotts is navy blue with darker black splotches all over her body. She have black fluffy ears that have a white middle, and a fluffy white tummy. She has round black eyes with eyelashes and a black round nose with a cat-like smile.

name: Sprout
bio: Sprout doesn't understand why she's known in business negotiations as The Puppy-Eyed Piranha? Sure, she might start tearing up if you don't accept her as counter-offer... but it's just because she's thinking about all the sick kittens she has to get home to tend to. So can you please just sign the on the dotted line?
appearance: Sprout is a vegetable burger. She is made up of two buns with a vegetable patty, tomato, lettuce and onion in the center. She has two green leaves above her head. The burger bun is green with sesame seeds on top of her head. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a black smile.

name: Squaz
bio: Meet Squaz. He loves toy cars, biking, and cheese! Sometimes Squaz gets angry or sad and doesn't know what to do. But if he has his cheese, and a good friend, he will make it through anything.
appearance: Squaz is a blue mouse with large, round ears. The inside of his ears and his nose are pink. He has a light blue muzzle and belly, and his black eyes are framed by two short, straight whiskers on either side of his face. In front of his belly he has two small arms which hold a triangle block of yellow cheese with a small bite taken out of it.

name: Stacy
bio: Stacy is a shy squid; she prefers to be home with her friends or even by herself. Big groups of Squishmallows make her a little nervous, so she loves to learn and explore through books. She's quiet at first, but all her friends know she can be very silly.
appearance: Stacy is a light blue squid with a triangular head. She has 8 legs which protrude from beneath her and curve upwards. She has a white belly and a plain, smiling face.

name: Stahl
bio: Stahl blows bubbles so artfully, he turned it into a live show. He uses dish soap and thick rope to lasso the biggest bubbles you've ever seen! You can watch Stahl's soapy creations hover over an audience--- but be careful don't sit under a bubble before it pops!
appearance: Stahl's body is a tie-dye blue and green with glittery dark blue spines running down his back. He has a plain white tummy with soft ridges in it, as well as round black eyes and a simple smile.

name: Staley
bio: Gather 'round! Staley lights up any campfire with his howling harmonica — you can't help but sing along! After s'mores, Staley and his squad make up scary stories until everyone is so nervous that they burst out laughing. Do you have a scary story to share?
appearance: Staley is a rainbow gradient pumpkin with carved features like a jack-o-lantern. He has triangular eyes which are closed and a broad grin with four prominent square teeth. There is a green stem on his head and a triangular, leaf-like pattern.

name: Stanislav
bio: Stanislav loves taking bubble baths—or, as he calls them in October, cauldron soaks! He always practices his evil laugh as the tub fills up and even uses a "Toil and Bubble" bath bomb to make the bubbles black. The label said it might turn him into a frog, but thankfully, that was just some funny advertising!
appearance: Stanislav is a teal half-peeled banana with four peels hanging off from the center of his body all the way around. He has spots on his lower body. He has a scar on the left side of his face. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth. He has purple goo dripping on top of his head.

name: Stanley
bio: Original:Need a friend who will support and protect you? Well, then you’ve got a friend in Stanley. He has been practicing karate since he was small. He even has his black belt test next month! When he’s not kicking a punching bag, he is writing poetry.
appearance: Stanley is a white bear with black markings on his ears, around his eyes and in a band around his body. His eyes and nose are also black, although his eyes are ringed with white.

name: Star
bio: Star braves the unknown every day when exploring outer space! This galaxy adventurer stays optimistic and hopeful no matter what each daily mission brings. Being a space explorer isn't always easy, but Star has the strength and true superhero qualities to succeed at anything!
appearance: Star is a cyan bear with silver sparkles and golden stars on their body. They have rounded ears with silver inner ears, and a white fuzzy belly with a short bear tail. Their muzzle is white with a black nose and curved mouth with two rounded black eyes.

name: Starla
bio: Meet Starla. She loves iced tea, board games, and exploring. Starla is an ocean studies major and wants to keep the ocean clean and safe for everyone. Starla’s parents taught her to care about environmental issues and to keep it safe for all creatures.
appearance: Starla is a pastel pink seahorse with darker pink fins, gills and snout. She has a white belly and a pale pink snout with a darker pink in the center.

name: Starling
bio: Starling babysits three young 'Mallows in her town. They're growing up so fast and Starling knows the time she gets to share with them now is very special. Her favorite part of babysitting is playing homework trivia after school. Starling learns so much from these youngsters!
appearance: Starling is a grey owl with black ear tufts and tail. She has white markings over her eyes. She has a white belly with a teal feather pattern embroidered on it. She has golden stars on the left side of her body and the right side with a golden moon. She wears a black crown with black eyes with lashes, and a teal beak.

name: Starry
bio: Starry's motto is honesty is the best policy. She loves astrology and stargazing, and is always looking for new ways to reach her dreams.
appearance: Starry is a blue purple tie-dye unicorn has a sparkle on her black eyes she has pink pastel mane with a golden horn and wings. She has purple, indigo, and white stars on her cheeks.

name: Stasia
bio: Every team needs a cheerleader! Stasia is the cheerleader for her family's swim team and always motivates them to do their best! Stasia does all kinds of impressive routines on the sidelines while she cheers. You can join the cheer team, too - if you want!
appearance: Stasia is a lavender Sea Cow with light pink and dark purple spots. She has a white manatee snout, pink horns, white inner ears, purple flippers and tail fin. She has black eyes with lashes.

name: Steele
bio: Meet Steele! This whale shark is happiest when in motion. He was born deaf and loves to dance and feel the vibrations of the drums and bass. You can catch Steele and friends at a heavy metal show or dancing beneath the strobe light to their favorite DJ. Make sure to wave hello!
appearance: Steele is a whale shark, the largest variety of shark. He has a blue gradient, darker at the top and lighter towards the bottom. He has wavy teal stripes running horizontally across his body, accompanied by teal spots. He has a fin on each side of his body, one atop his head, one on his back and a pointed tail. He has a large white belly which goes up to his mouth. He has a round, black eyes, a pink, open smiling mouth and two black gills on either cheek.

name: Stefana
bio: Stefana is a playful, curious Squishmallow who loves flying and meeting new people. She always looks forward to her next trip around the globe, and makes a unique cross-stitch after each adventure as a way to capture her favorite memories.
appearance: Stefana is a purple pegasus with a pale pink mane and tail. She also has pink, sparkly wings. She has a white muzzle, belly and inner ears. She has round black eyes with short, curled lashes.

name: Stella
bio: Stella’s a good friend because she’s always honest and super adventurous; Stella and her family hike in the forest all the time.
appearance: Stella is a white unicorn with a rainbow mane, belly and tail. Her horn and inside of her ears are a bright, metallic pink. She has closed eyes with eyelashes; she is also blushing.

name: Steph
bio: Steph gets extra accordion air thanks to her little parachute arms! She loves playing an instrument almost as fun as she is. After a long work week, you can find Steph spreading her laughter and making everyone around her smiler. How does she her energy up? Rocking out to industrial music!
appearance: Steph is a lavender flying squirrel which can glide using wing-like membranes. She is primarily lavender with a white lower face and belly. She has lavender wings with pink tips and white insides. She has a fluffy brown tail at the back. Her ears are pink. She has round, black eyes and a pink nose and a black mouth.

name: Stephy
bio: Scrapbooking is how Stephy likes to spend her time. She loves to celebrate her family by creating beautiful scrapbooks for each of them. Last week she started one for her quince, one of her favorite days ever. Do you want to scrapbook with Stephy?
appearance: Stephy is a purple caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears and her belly are striped in rainbow. The colors on the spiral of her horn are pink, blue and yellow. The horn itself is a shimmery silver. She has closed eyes and a pale pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Stetson
bio: Stetson runs a sleepaway winter camp for younger 'Mallows. The campground has several acres of land, a giant log cabin called Main Hall. and fruit orchards! Every season ends with a camp-wide scavenger hunt, and Stetson even makes the treasure maps himself Want to register for the next winter camp?
appearance: Stetson is a gingerbread moose. He has a squiggle of white icing running across his pale brown belly with red candies. He has white dots of icing around him. His antlers are brown with white squiggles of icing on them and two brown ears. He also has a red bowtie with a pale brown muzzle

name: Steve
bio: Steve is working hard towards getting a black belt in karate! When this determined 'Mallow isn't practicing his fierce martial arts moves, he's powering up with yummy snacks! His favorite? French fries and cinnamon sugar soft pretzels dipped in ice cream!
appearance: Steve is a white bird with round, black eyes. He has a pale grey belly and darker grey wings. His short, pointed beak is yellow with a pink tip. He's holding a container of french fries in his wings, with some of them also hanging out of the sides of his beak.

name: Stevie
bio: Stevie is the sheriff of Frontier Town. He can be tough to get close to and can have a mean streak, but don't let his gruff demeanor fool you. He watches out for everybody and makes a great friend. He can usually be found helping others with his best buddyMidnight.
appearance: Stevie is a green Cactus with a brown sheriff hat and black moustache. He also wears a patterned red bandanna around his neck. On his belly is a big "Steel Vengeance" print.

name: Stevon
bio: Meet Stevon, he's a certified scuba instructor. He loves how quiet the world becomes when he's swimming under water and the way kelp beds sway softly with the current. It's truly a magical experience he loves to share with other people. Want to learn? He'd love to teach you!
appearance: Stevon is a golden dog with floppy ears. His ears and belly are fluffy with light golden fur. He has a patch on his muzzle and forehead the same color. He has round, black eyes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Stew
bio: Stew plays drums in his band, The Brite Shells! He also sings backup vocals and plays around with different, silly voices when he sings. Stew loves to socialize and knows just how to talk to a shy ‘Mallow and help them break out of their shell.

name: Stix
bio: Meet Stix. This mischievous mallow lives to keep the spirit of Malloween alive. 365 days a year, Stix maintains a costume and mischief shop filled with goblins, goons, and games for the perfect fright night.
appearance: Stix is a black Squishmallow with white bones. They have a round, humanoid skull with flat teeth and cavities for the eyes and nose, as well as a sternum and ribcage.

name: Stockard
bio: Stockard is a voice actress! She's provided the screams for many a final girl, from Mary-Sue Kofax in "Clean Up On Aisle 13" to Wendy Watanabe in "El Creepo 2: Wendy Watanabe's Revenge". The secret of her shrieks? Let's just say she's seen a few things...
appearance: Stockard is an indigo moth with sparkly purple antennae and a purple belly with a yellow sun surrounded by stars. She has indigo and purple tie-dye wings with white inner wings with a pattern of white spots. She has mischievous eyes with lashes and a pink smiling mouth.

name: Stokely
bio: Unlike most bears, Stokely doesn't hunt for salmon in freezing rivers—he sips espresso in cozy cafés! An artisan craftsman, Stokely loves the finer things in life. Though some think him ferocious, Stokely is as refined as they come. Just look at his music library!
appearance: Stokely is a Kodiak bear with fuzzy rounded ears and fuzzy, tan belly. He has a small, bear tail behind him and his inner ears and egg-shaped muzzle are tan. His eyes and nose are black, and his mouth is open, revealing sharp, white teeth.

name: Strobe
bio: Do you mind if Strobe sits with you for lunch? She's new to this planet and could really use a friend to talk to about music and even get an explanation on sporks. Strobe DJs on the weekends and loves it when her music is the life of the party. Get ready to boogie with Strobe!
appearance: Strobe is a lavender monster with teal horns, fin-like flaps with lavender lines on the sides of her body, and a teal belly with pink hearts. She has three pink hearts on the right side of her face. She has closed eyes, a pink mouth with pointy white teeth.

name: Stu
bio: Meet Stu. He might look prickly but he's actually a big softy! He loves giving back during the holidays. Every year , he holds a toy drive at his local fire station and makes stockings filled with peppermints and chocolate for friends in need. Want to lend a helping hand?
appearance: Stu is an Emerald Green cactus. He has two uneven arms on each side of his body, and he also wears a red Santa hat with white snowflakes. He also has a red smile, a cluster of green stripes, and a white belly.

name: Stump
bio: Stump is the main bouncer for the Skeleton Squad and knows a thing or two about keeping the squad safe. When the band isn't touring Stump teaches a spooky self-defense class, costumes are encouraged!
appearance: Stump is a black Squishmallow and has triangular ears. They have a rounded skull with eye and nose cavities and two fangs protruding below. Their skull, inner ears, ribs and sternum are all electric blue.

name: Sue
bio: Sue really misses her grandmother and all the fun times they shared together. She knows Nana Susie in a better place now—and that it’s just a “see you later!”—but it’s still been hard not having her around. Thank goodness she returns from her island vacation later next week!
appearance: Sue is a lavender cow with a magenta patch by the upper left of her head and on the left side of her body. She has pink inner ears and a white muzzle, pink and lavender horns and a lavender tail with pink fuzz at the tip. She has mischievous eyes, and her nostrils are magenta.

name: Suey
bio: Suey is organizing the yearly Spring Fling Dance! She wants to fill the gym with lots of bright balloons, twinkle lights, and bouquets of her favorite flower, daffodils! Tickets go on sale next week, but Suey is still looking for a DJ. Hey, how are your turntable skills?
appearance: Suey is a candy pink cup of milkshake with a tan band around her with a pale purple flower with emerald leaves. On top of her lid, she has whipped cream with cyan and purple sprinkles on top and a pale purple straw. She has a winking expression with lashes and a red mouth and pink blush. She wears a pair of white bunny ears with pink inner ears

name: Sugar
bio: Sugar enjoys slam poetry, bitter black coffee, and her favorite heavy metal bands. Though her bestieSpicedoesn’t fully understand her hobbies—like shredding on the electric guitar or tending to her menagerie of crows—she supports her, nonetheless. One thing they can always agree on? Cinnamon buns!
appearance: Sugar is an angel cake with an off-white base and pink frosting on her head with a white frosting swirl and a golden halo with a heart design on the center. She has pink frosting in the middle of her body with pink sprinkles by her bottom. Her angel wings are a glittery silver, her blush is pink, she has a red mouth and two eyes with lashes that are closed in a happy expression.

name: Suki
bio: Suki is T-Y-R-E-D of Mr. Hatchetman saying, “Suki, put that phone away—this is English class!” It’s like he doesn’t even know that in the 21st centurion, she could be applying for job on that phone. Or learning about nuclear psychics. Or even… typing English. So get with the thymes, Mr. H!
appearance: Suki is a calico cat, she has a cream body and grey and tan patches. She has one tan patch over her left ear with her left ear grey and her right ear is tan and a tan patch on the lower right side, and two grey patches, one on her right eye and the other on her lower left body. She has round black eyes rimmed in teal, black whiskers, and a pink mouth and nose with a white muzzle.

name: Summer
bio: Summer is a Cali girl at heart. She is sweet and friendly, and loves nothing more than soaking up the sun on the beach with her friends.
appearance: Summer is a yellow pineapple decorated with some pineapple spikes in darker yellow. She has five bright green leaves sprouting from her head. Her eyes are large and black, with white pupils and short lashes. Summer’s mouth is a smiling black one with pink blushing cheeks. Additionally, she he has a hot pink flower on her head.

name: Suneetha
bio: Meet Suneetha, the burrito loving bird with a passion for hip hop music! She loves nothing more than to practice her DJ skills with her friendNell, but sometimes the Squishmallows neighbours aren't too keen! When she's relaxing Suneetha loves to watch Squish 1 racing and imagines playing a gig at a race one day!
appearance: Suneetha is a pink bird with two fluffy wings and a shimmery white belly. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes and a triangular yellow beak. She wears a sparkly silver crown atop her head.

name: Sunny
bio: Original:Need to know if it's going to be raining next week or if you should pack a jacket? Ask Sunny! She's always had a knack for knowing just what's going to happen next when it comes to the weather, and looks forward to becoming a weather reporter when she's older.
appearance: Sunny is a yellow insect with shimmering silver wings. Her belly is striped in black and she has two curled black antennae. She has round eyes, a smiling mouth and pink blush on each cheek. Her Queen Bee form has 2 curled up eyelashes, and a crown on top of her head. Her newest form is the same as the Queen Bee form, but her coat is a yellow and white tie-dye pattern.

name: Sunshine
bio: New:At the end of a storm, there is always a rainbow. Sunshine tends to show up just when things are looking the darkest and brightens up your day with all the colors of her rainbow.Old:Always looking at the bright side might bother some, but Sunshine lives for hope and happiness. This cheery mallow is on a mission to spread love, smiles, and make some friends on the way, can Sunshine join your squad?Appearance[]Sunshine is a rainbow with five colors: red, yellow, green, blue and purple. She has an off-white base beneath (her 8" version has the words “Good Vibes Only” on it). A fluffy, white cloud sits at each side of her, and an orange sun with yellow rays peeks above the right side of her head.Gallery[]Sunshine now has all black eye and the clouds are made of fur and the sun on her head has colors swapped and she has words on her tummy that says Good Vibes OnlySunshine clip onGold sunshineSunshine is pinkSunshine with star tummy
appearance: Sunshine is a rainbow with five colors: red, yellow, green, blue and purple. She has an off-white base beneath (her 8" version has the words “Good Vibes Only” on it). A fluffy, white cloud sits at each side of her, and an orange sun with yellow rays peeks above the right side of her head.

name: Suri
bio: Suri has one older sister and one younger sister—and she loves being in the middle! Suri learns so much from both of her siblings, and even better, gets to borrow all their jewelry and accessories—like the beaded bracelet she nabbed from the living room table. Shh!
appearance: Suri is a lavender cow with a tie-dye patch by the upper right of her head and her right ear. She has cream inner ears and muzzle, cream horns, with a long lavender tail with a tuft of pink fuzz at the tip. Her eyes are black, with lashes and her nostrils are purple.

name: Susan
bio: Susan used to love mergers and acquisitions; now, she loves long walks on the beach. This former business 'Mallow took a much-needed vacation years ago and hasn't looked back since. Though she sometimes misses the view from her high-rise apartment, Susan much prefers the view from her hammock!
appearance: Susan is a yellow cup of Mai tai with a gradient from light yellow to orange. On top of her head is pale yellow slush. There is a pineapple slice on the right side of her head and a cherry on the left. She has round, black eyes with short lashes, and a smiling red mouth.

name: Susie
bio: Susie might be small, but she's got a big voice! Susie is a talented singer, who spends her days singing with the choir team and practicing for the school's talent show. If you need a friend to rock out with, Susie is the perfect buddy to provide backup vocals!
appearance: Susie is a light blue penguin with a white face and belly. She has a large orange beak and closed eyes.

name: Suzanne
bio: Do you hear that muttering? It sounds like Suzanne is talking to herself again. This 'Mallow often thinks out loud. Suzanne tries to keep her thoughts to herself when she's with company, but it's a tough habit to break! Do you mind if Suzanne recites her grocery list?
appearance: Suzanne is a teal stingray with large triangular fins, long tail, and white belly. She has darker teal gills and a spotted back with yellow, red, pale blue, pale pink and lime spots. Her eyes are black with eyelashes and her smile is black.

name: Suzette
bio: Suzette got tired of always throwing her gum away, so she invented a new kind of gum that can be digested like any other candy. This sweet development won her and her business partner Nannette, first prize at the candy innovation awards! Wanna try a piece?
appearance: Suzette is a pink bat with long, upright ears. Her inner ears and wings are shiny pink. She has a fuzzy pink belly. She has a winking expression and short, curled lashes. Her black, smiling mouth is adorned with two pointed white fangs.

name: Suzmac
bio: Suzmac is a plastic surgeon, but not a very profitable one! He thinks everyone is beautiful as is and makes sure to flatter their features as much as possible during consultations. Suddenly that crooked nose doesn’t seem so bad after all, and those smile lines are just evidence of a life lived happily!
appearance: Suzmac is a blue snake with an off-white lower jaw and belly. His belly has blue stripes. He has a large, shiny indigo hood which is speckled with darker blue. He has round black eyes and black nostrils and mouth. A thin, pink, forked tongue pokes out from his mouth.

name: Suzy
