bio: Meet Suzy Strawberry; her favorite season is spring. Suzy loves to garden and shows off her beautiful flowers in her flower shop; what should she grow this spring?
appearance: Suzy is a strawberry with a red body and a green top. She has a small stem. On the right side of her head is a white flower. Suzy has black eyes with white circles inside and very light pink cheeks. She has light pink legs and arms.

name: Svenja
bio: Meet Svenja. This outgoing 'Mallow spends all year looking forward to the fun and festive holiday parties she'll be invited to. Each year, her ugly holiday sweater collection grows! She's won the ugly sweater contest four years in a row! Think you can beat her?
appearance: Svenja has a pale purple body with silver gills on her head. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly. Around her belly, she has a green wreath with a red bow and various ornaments around her. She has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Svetlana
bio: Boogie boarding and sunbathing in her hammock are Svetlana's idea of a good time, especially with a good book. She loves a laid back afternoon with an adventure book and a smoothie to keep cool. What should she read next?
appearance: Svetlana is a combination of a cat, unicorn and mermaid, and has features of each. The top half of her body is baby blue and she has large triangular ears. The inside of these are white, matching her horn. Her shimmering horn has a multicolored spiral. She has a white muzzle with a pink nose and mouth.. She has round eyes with short lashes and two black whiskers on each cheek.

name: Swann
bio: You won’t find anchovies on Swann’s pizza—this ‘Mallow is one picky eater! He stays away from teeny fish, raw tomatoes, and all mushrooms. Swann will try any food once, but it’s not easy to please his palate. Want to know Swann’s favorite meal? Potato pancakes!
appearance: Swann a grey body, flippers, snout, and tail. His inner ears are pink and they have a cow-print belly with darker grey spots. He also has a dark grey cow spot by his left ear, and he has black, round eyes.

name: Sweetpea
bio: Sweetpea is the sweetest peacock in the savannah— Sweetpea is a computer scientist who— Sweetpea is a friend to all and a… Sweetpea isn’t really sure who “Sweetpea is” yet. Sweetpea is fine with that for now. Sweetpea is Sweetpea. Sweetpea is.
appearance: Sweetpea is a pink peacock with fluffy stubby wings and an extravagant feathered tail. Both their belly and the tips of their tail are a purple. Three pink feathers sit atop their head. They have a small, yellow beak and round black eyes with thick lashes.

name: Swerl
bio: Swerl has more fun watching basketball then playing it. She's such a loyal fan of her local basketball team. they made Swerl her own jersey! Swerl wears it proudly to all the home games, and even though she isn't the fastest to jump and cheer, she the loudest!
appearance: Swerl is a purple snail with a face that consist of simple black eyes with two lashes and a red smile. She has a white tummy and purple antennae on her head. She has a rainbow shell covered with two pink swirls and silver hearts, and she has a pointy purple tail.

name: Swish
bio: Swish is a swordfish but don't let that scare you! He's friendly and laid back. He only ever uses his sword to stir sugar into his coffee! He goes to his local bakery every morning for his favorite blueberry scone and coffee and works on his daily crossword puzzles!
appearance: Swish is a dark blue fish with two fins on each side and a dorsal fin on his head. A large rostral bone - the 'sword' - protrudes from the center of his face. He has a bright yellow belly and round, black eyes.

name: Sy
bio: Sy is crazy about cosmetics. In fact he just launched a line of bioluminescent makeup! This inventive anglerfish hopes his colorful array of products bring a little light (and a whole lot of glitter) to the darkness of the deep sea.
appearance: Sy is an anglerfish with a pink, tie-dyed body in a paint splatter pattern. He has baby pink pectoral fins, and a belly with a long rod on his forehead and a glittery pink heart-shaped lure. He has black eyes, and a wide mouth with four fangs poking out of the top.

name: Syana
bio: Syana is a talented DJ known for creating the best mashups to move and groove to, especially the throwback classics. They love throwing pool parties and cookouts and make sure to turn the speakers all the way up. Grab your swimsuit and dancing shoes because everyone is invited!
appearance: Syana is a fox with a bright gradient, starting with hot pink on their head before shifting to purple and then dark blue at their base. They have a white mask marking across their face and a white belly. Their inner ears are sparkly and bright pink. They have a round, black nose and oval eyes with long, curly lashes, and are poking out their hot pink tongue. Their tail is coral pink with a white tip, and they have a triple heart emblem with blue, violet and pink hearts on their belly.

name: Sybil
bio: Sybil collects antique Easter eggs! Her cherished "Red #4" is currently on loan to the Kitscheum Museum and it got Sybil thinking about sponsoring a wing one day. Maybe she could even include her collection of vintage Easter basket grass!
appearance: Sybil is a green bee with shimmering silver wings. Her belly is striped in green and off-white, and has  has two brown antennae with yellow fuzz. She has round eyes, a smiling mouth with pink blush. She wears a flower crown on top of her head.

name: Sydnee
bio: Meet Sydnee. This squirrel wants to be a super-spy when she grows up! Sydnee loves to watch spy and undercover agent movies with her dad, they even have their own secret code words. Sydnee wants her dad to build a super-secret tree house, would you like to help?
appearance:
Sydnee is a squirrel with periwinkle blue fur. She has three darker blue stripes on her head, and her nose and mouth are the same shade. Her face and belly are white and she has closed, dark blue eyes with thick, curled lashes. Her colorful, fluffy tail is pink, pale blue and green.
Her purple version has the same features, except her fur is purple & has dark purple stripes atop her head.

name: Sydney
bio: Meet Sydney. From solving crimes to swimming with manatees, this mushroom really does it all! You can usually find her at concerts, vibing to her favorite music with friends. So if you need a concert buddy, you know who to call!
appearance: Sydney is a mushroom with a tan stalk and a light green top with green spots. Her stalk makes up her body and includes a round, light green belly with a green embroidered leaf on it. She has round, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Sylvie
bio: Sylvie just adopted a pet flea named Heath, who she found camped out on a wool sweater at her favorite flea market! She loves sneaking him into the local art house theater to watch the kind of indie films that make them ponder the meaning of life—right now, they're leaning toward "companionship".
appearance: Sylvie is a white milk carton. She has a brown band around her middle reading "MILK" in a white font, accompanied by a chocolate bar. Beneath that she has a cow print pattern, brown on light brown. Her top section is also brown and has a small straw striped in white and yellow coming out from her head. She has round, black eyes and a red smile.

name: TJ
bio: Want to know a secret? TJ is a spy! From holiday caroler Trina Jinglebell to mad scientist Tammy Jurassic. TJ has a disguise for every occasion. Later this week, she's even going undercover at a supervillain convention—as The Jitterbug, of course!
appearance: TJ is a pink squirrel with a white face and white fuzzy belly. She has three darker pink stripes on the top of her head and a big, fuzzy tail behind them. Her round eyes are small with golden inner ears. Her nose and mouth are pink with black eyes as she wears round, purple glasses.

name: Tabitha
bio: Early mornings and asking "why" fuel this tabby cat! Tabitha is a curious cat who loves to write and one day wants to be a journalist. She prefers behind the scenes to the spotlight, and is always thinking of her next story angle.
appearance: Tabitha is a purple tabby cat with a lilac body and darker purple stripes on her head and sides. She has a white belly and inner ears to match. Her nose and mouth are pale pink, framed by black whiskers, and her eyes are closed.

name: Tadd
bio: Tadd has to squint a lot when he takes notes in class. So his teacher recommended Tadd to see an eye doctor in case he needs glasses. Now Tadd can't wait to be able to see all the faraway things! Want to help him pick out a snazzy pair of glasses?
appearance: Tadd is a tan colored donut with cream frosting with a swirl of orange icing. Sprinkles in orange and white decorate his face with pumpkins. He has round, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Tadita
bio: Meet Tadita. Tadita is a Talk Show Host who loves to spice things up! Call in your question, and Tadita will give you the sassy truth! She might call you out if you are doing something wrong, but she will always do it with love.
appearance: Tadita is a blue cell phone with a light blue screen on the top half of her body. On the bottom half, under a black line, she has thirteen cell phone buttons that are light blue, a red button in the top left, and a green button in the top right. Above the screen, she has three light blue, horizontal lines and a short antenna protruding from the top right of her head. On the screen, she has round, black eyes, a smiling, red mouth, and red blush on her cheeks.

name: Taghi
bio: Taghi is a hardworking engineer who knows the secret to life is all about balance. That's why you'll find this 'Mallow in hip hop dance classes four nights a week! Taghi gives his best effort in all he does, so it's no wonder this terrier can already pop and lock with the best of them.
appearance: Taghi is a white dog with a violet belly with two, triangular ears with inner ears purple on the left and pastel blue on the right. He has a rounded black nose and mouth. He also has two black eyes with the right one rimmed in white with the left one being regular and having a pastel blue patch.

name: Tahoe
bio: No hill is too steep for Tahoe! In fact, this cat prefers to bike on an incline. She leaves home every morning to go on a hilly 5-mile bike ride and can see the whole neighborhood from the top! Think you can pedal it out with Tahoe?
appearance: Tahoe is a tortoiseshell cat with splotchy white, grey and orange fur. Her left ear is grey and her right is orange. She has a white belly and muzzle with pink inner ears. She has a pink nose and black mouth, framed by black whiskers, and round, black eyes.

name: Tai
bio: Tai performs tricks up high on aerial ropes and silks then safely glides down. This acrobat loves to stun her audience and  always waits for the final moment to extend her little parachute arms! today Tai and her acrobat team are dressed up as bunnies for Easter. Will you be there for tonight's big show?
appearance: Tai is a sugar glider, a type of possum which can glide using wing-like membranes. She is primarily peach with a white lower face and belly. She has orange markings in stripes covering each eye, a large stripe starting at her head and running down her back, on the tip of her tail and on the outer front side of her 'wings'. Her inner ears are glittery purple. She has round, black eyes and a brown nose and mouth. She is also wearing a white and light green bunny ears on her head.

name: Tajo
bio: This fuzzy 'Mallow may be a Tasmanian devil, but don't let his name fool you! He's one of the sweetest guys around. Tajo is very active and loves to hike, climb and swim. He's studying to become a conservation scientist so that he can help protect forests and national parks!
appearance: Tajo is a Tasmanian devil with a black body and a patch white fur on the front of his neck. He has round ears that protrude from his head with pink inner ears. He has a brown muzzle with a black nose and smiling mouth. He has round, brown eyebrows and round, black eyes with brown rings around them.

name: Talford
bio: Talford is an expert at playing hide and seek. When he's not hiding in the branches of a tree or a shrub, he loves to do arts and crafts with his friends. Making friendship bracelets is his favorite! Do you want to make some?
appearance: Talford is a dino in the shape of a Hug Mee with a tie-dyed green body. He has orange spines on the top of his head and back. He has a white belly with a teal and orange heart embroidered on it. His eyes are black, and his nostrils are a dark green.

name: Talia
bio: Talia loves to garden, she even tries to teach her cousinsBopandButtonswhen they visit. Talia has one of the prettiest gardens around.
appearance: Talia is a bunny in the shape of a Hug Mee with a tie-dye rainbow body. She has white inner ears, belly, and muzzle with a short bunny tail. Her belly has a carrot embroidered on it, her nose and mouth are pink, and her eyes are black.

name: Talib
bio: Meet Talib. This pizza-loving pterodactyl is cooking up something special. He combined his love for woodwork and food and built his own pizza oven! Now Talib can make specialty pizzas for all of his friends and other pizza enthusiasts. Would you like a slice?
appearance: Talib is a pterodactyl, an ancient flying reptile. His body is patterned in a blue tie-dye with hints of purple and he has a plain white belly. His beak and inner wings are bright blue. His outer wings are aquamarine with large foil patches. He is winking his right eye and is holding a slice of pizza to his mouth to chomp on.

name: Talisa
bio: Looking for some help with your website? Talisa is the caticorn for you! As a web developer, she can create the perfect website for your needs. Last week she finished working on a video gaming website for one of her friends, do you want to check it out?
appearance: Talisa is a white caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She is covered in a swirling tie-dye pattern consisting of hot pink, lime and electric blue and has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears are light pink and her belly is white. Her large horn is shiny and silver. She has round eyes with curled lashes and a hot pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers.

name: Tallulah
bio: Tallulah is a rare find, and has magical powers because of the horn on her head. She's a great magician and loves to show off her tricks. P.S. You can rub her tummy for good luck on February 14th!
appearance: Tallulah is a light purple unicorn. Her ears, belly and nose are all pale pink, and her nose has light purple nostrils. She has a short, sparkly pink horn. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes. An emblem of three hearts, increasing in size, appears on the right side of her belly, featuring pale pink, ice blue and purple hearts.

name: Tally
bio: You won’t be able to contain your excitement when Tally walks into the room. She continues to lift the other Squishmallows up with her role as a health and fitness coach. Need some motivation? Schedule a one-on-one with your favorite pal.
appearance: Tally is a grey tabby cat with a pale grey body with a white belly and darker stripes on her head and sides. Her nose, mouth and inner ears are pale pink, framed by black whiskers, and her eyes are closed.

name: TamTam
bio: Tamtam plays drums in "No Grown Ups Allowed!" It's a rock band where no grown ups are allowed! And you know grown ups better not try it, because Tamtam has a black belt in taekwondo and will totally karate chop you if you have a 401k and try to join her band! Because WHAT? Say it with her!
appearance: TamTam is a white panda with black ears, eye markings, nose, mouth and stripe across her body. She has two bat wings on each side of her body. Her eyes are black and rimmed in white and she has a black nose and mouth with white fangs.

name: Tammy
bio: Tammy loves meditating at the laundromat. Gazing into the hypnotic swirls of a washing machine always puts her mind at ease. especially after a long day of work. This sales representative even found a way to bring her happy place to the office—with detergent-scented candles!
appearance: Tammy is a is a basil green platypus with a fuzzy white belly. She has a navy-blue duck-like bill. Her eyes are round and black with dual eyelashes. She also has a navy-blue rotund tail for swimming and keeping balance.

name: Tandy
bio: Tandy is an aspiring screenwriter! When she's not typing away at a local coffee shop, you can hear Tandy on a podcast about her favorite TV show "Most Northwest Mountains." hosted by her favorite chocolate bunny bestie,Dinora. Tandy's the best at answering any story structure questions!
appearance: Tandy is a brown chocolate bunny. She has purple inner ears and a bowtie with a darker brown belly with thin blue and yellow icing swirled on it. She has dark brown whiskers and eyes with a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Tangerine
bio: Tangerine and her best friend Posey love to play mini-golf. Their favourite restaurant has mini-golf, horseshoes, and a Ferris wheel! After a day of putting, Tangerine loves to watch the sunset on the Ferris wheel, maybe you can join them one day.
appearance: Tangerine is a pale blue husky with a fluffy white belly and cheeks. The inside of her triangular ears are also white. She has a wide, black nose and closed, happy eyes. She has short, thick lashes. She has an iridescent rainbow bow on her left ear.

name: Tangie
bio: Grab your wings and get ready for flight school, the bat class is all here! Tangie is learning how to fly, she can't wait to soar through the night sky. She hopes to be the fastest bat in the class, do you want to race?
appearance: Tangie is an orange bat with long, upright ears. Her inner ears, wings and belly are all shiny bronze. She has round, black eyes with short lashes. Her red, smiling mouth is adorned with two pointed white fangs.

name: Tanja
bio: Meet Tanja. She is always laughing at the most inopportune moments. She can't help it! Something about a quite room tickles her silly bone! But her laughter is contagious and even gets Santa and his elver cracking up! Think you can keep a straight face around Tanja? Good luck!
appearance: Tanja is an arctic blue deer with a white face and belly. She also has peach inner ears. She has gold colored antlers on top of her head which are also glittery and outline on her face and belly. She has closed, black eyes with lashes, a black oval nose, and a black smiling mouth. she also has a golden snowflake on her belly.

name: Tank
bio: Because of his size, Tank may look like a menacing mallow, but he lives by the motto: "peace, love, and minding my own business". This hammerhead hippie wants to live in harmony and just enjoy life.
appearance: Tank is a grey shark with two fins on each side and his head has a hammer shaped structure. He has a round, white belly with black gills on both sides. He has round black eyes and a small smile.

name: Tanner
bio: Tanner is a concert fanatic! What’s his favorite music style? Jazz! Come be front and center at Tanner’s next gig on trumpet. Don’t miss him and his band perform and travel through the world of music.
appearance: Tanner is a light teal penguin with a white face and belly. He has a large orange beak and closed, happy eyes.

name: Tansy
bio: Tansy visits every art gallery in his city---even the artists know him by name! This 'Mallow counts down the days to new exhibits, and the multimedia and installations are his favorite! Will you join Tansy for a gallery tour?
appearance: Tansy is a sugar glider, a type of possum which can glide using wing-like membranes. He is primarily brown with a cream lower face and belly. He has grey markings in stripes covering each eye, a large stripe starting at his head and running down his back, on the tip of his tail and on the outer front side of his 'wings'. His inner ears are glittery gold, He has closed, black eyes and a brown mustache,

name: Tanya
bio: Tanya is busy creating a whole new world of magical things. She loves to create stories through Claymotion characters and base them off of her friends. Someday you might even get to see one!
appearance: Tanya is a Hug Mee unicorn with a lavander belly, pink fur and feet. she has black round eyes with 2 pink nostrils with a pink smile underneath. she has a lavander fuzzy mane and a golden horn to show she is a unicorn, she also has two hearts on her belly, a small teal one and a large hot pink one.

name: Tara
bio: Shh! Tara is librarian in training thanks to her favorite childhood series, 'The Boxcar Children'. She loves volunteering on the weekend to read books at her local library.
appearance: Tara is mostly light purple, with a light pink belly, inner ears and mane and tail. Her horn is shiny gold, her eyes are black, and her snout is white.

name: Taryn
bio: Taryn loves Valentine's Day; the cards, the hugs, and getting her favorite candies! Each year she gives out hand-made cards to all her friends, this time she made a few extra (just in case!). Do you have a valentine for Taryn?
appearance: Taryn is a pale pink sloth with a white face. She has a tie-dyed, fuzzy belly which has a combination of pink, fuchsia and purple colors. She has a glittery silver snout and markings around her eyes, as well as a silver, heart-shaped nose. She has closed eyes with short, curly lashes.

name: Tasha
bio: Tasha loves hot pink with sparkles and goes bowling with her dad every weekend. She even has hot pink shoes and a sparkly bowling ball that match! For good luck she rubs the bottom of her shoes three times and then blows a kiss while her ball rolls down the lane. Believe it or not, that gives her good luck!
appearance: This Squishmallow is covered in black and white stripes. Their belly, muzzle and the inside of their ears are pure white. They have round, black eyes, a cat mouth and a triangular, pale pink nose.

name: Tatiana
bio: Tatiana loves dancing, baking, and exploring with her friends. She wants to save the world one day at a time. Catch her with her friends out in the wild or in the library reading up on her next big adventure!
appearance: Tatiana is a bright teal dragon with cobalt blue spikes along her back. Her snout, belly and the inside of her ears are white, and her horns are tie-dyed blue and purple. The metallic lining of her wings is chrome colored.

name: Tavio
bio: Tavio loves magic tricks and scary movies, this year he wants to have a scary magic birthday party. He wants a hypnotist or a scary magic show, and a giant magician hat pinata
appearance: Tavio is a forest green tamale with several dark green vertical lines. The bottom corners are wrapped in yellow strings. He has two black, round eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Tawna
bio: Tawna might have a shy exterior, but she's actually quite a trickster. Last week, she came into the office extra early and switched the name plates on everyone's desk! It took the whole morning to get the mix-up sorted out. Yikes! Want to help Tawna plan her next office prank?
appearance: Tawna is a chickenburger made of a tan bun with sesame seeds on top. Her face is on the top bun, a pair of black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth. Between the buns is a layer of bright yellow cheese, a chicken patty, a red slice of tomato and wavy green lettuce with a brown bun underneath.

name: Taylor
bio: Looking for someone to design your next red carpet outfit? Taylor is the Squishmallow for you! This seamstress has a passion for fashion and can create your dream outfit for any occasion.
appearance: Taylor's fur has a pastel rainbow tie-dye pattern. She has grey markings surrounding her round black eyes, and her face and belly are all white. Her 16" form has sequins covering her face and belly. Her snout is a pale grey with a black nose and smiling mouth.

name: Taysha
bio: Taysha just developed an app! It helps 'Mallows who have trouble getting motivated by sending cheerleaders directly to their doorsteps. Turns out, Taysha's idea worked a little too well—one of her clients was so motivated, they created a competing start-up!
appearance: Taysha is a mint butterfly with black antennae. She has black wings with a pattern of yellow sections and silver dots. She has a yellow belly that is striped in yellow. She has round eyes with short lashes, red cheeks and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Tazik
bio: Here's comes Tazik! This magnificent 'Mallow loves going to the skate park with friends. Last week he got a cool new skateboard to match his rainbow 'doo!
appearance: Tazik is a light purple monkey with curled ears which sit low on his head, in line with his face. He has a head of fluffy, pastel rainbow hair held up with a sparkling silver headband. He has a rounded white face, with the same color as his ears and belly. He has a light purple nose, along with black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Tazlow
bio: Meet Tazlow, they're an avid hiker and nature conservationist. They have a deep appreciation for all the natural beauty in the world and work hard to protect it. Want to know the trail with the best view on 'Mallow Mountain or tips on going green? Tazlow is the 'Mallow for you!
appearance: Tazlow is an owl with a marbled pink and orange print. They have a white mask and belly marking with gold feathers. They have a gold, triangle beak and one round black eye with lashes, and another eye that's closed in a wink. Their tail is short and feathered.

name: Teddy
bio: Teddy is a basketball coach and his favorite color is orange. After championship games he takes the team out for orange cream soda floats . Teddy has a lucky bandana that he wears all season, can you guess what color it is?
appearance: Teddy is a black dog with tall, pointed ears. He wears a paisley patterned bandana around his neck, which is usually bright red but appears dark orange in some older releases. He has a white muzzle and stripe on his face and a round white belly. The insides of his ears are pale pink. His nose, mouth and eyes are all black, although his eyes are rimmed with white.

name: Teegan
bio: Meet Teegan, they love blueberry everything! Blueberry muffins, pancakes, and especially blueberry lattes. Would you go blueberry picking with Teegan?
appearance: This Squishmallow is a bright aqua triceratops. They have a darker teal frill surrounding their face, and a smiling mouth and round, black eyes. The 16" Sleep-A-Mallow version of Teegan from theValentine Squadalso has an embroidered emblem of a red heart shot through by an arrow.

name: Tegan
bio: Introducing... Tegan! Start following this 'Mallow now before she becomes a big dance star. Tegan started the latest glow-in-the-dark dance craze after sharing her dance routines online. Tegan wears twinkling shoes and holds glowsticks, but her signature move is spinning a light-up hoop!
appearance: Tegan is a black Squishmallow with bright blue horns. Her skull is rounded with circular eyes, a hole for each nostril and four teeth. Her skull, sternum, ribs and inner ears are all electric blue.

name: Tenise
bio: Meet Tenise, he just moved to the big city from the jungle! Change can be scary, but he's already made so many new friends! He works at a bakery and brought a little of the jungle with him! He makes the best banana coconut cakes in town. Try one, he's got extra!
appearance: Omari has a blue body with an orange belly. He has a green fluff atop his head and his wings are a fluffy blue, light blue, and yellow. His teardrop shaped beak is grey with a black tip and he has a white mask around his round, black eyes.

name: Tenson
bio: Tenson loves to decorate his yard, especially for Halloween! He goes all out and puts a haunted house in his backyard. It has spooky lights, monster sounds, and even a giant jack o'lantern mirror maze!
appearance: Tenson is a gnome with a orange hat with a bat pattern on their head. They also have a white beard, a nose and orange belly, with a black shirt.

name: Tenzing
bio: If you love to climb rocks then Tenzing is the one for you! Tenzing loves to scale the seawalls whenever she goes, her most recent adventure was climbing a sunken ship. Go ahead and ask her about all the cool things she's seen, Tenzing is full of stories.
appearance: Tenzing is a sea bunny, a type of marine slug. She is bright orange with flecks of brown. Her tall, fluffy, bright orange 'ears' are actually rhinopores, a sensory organ that detects chemicals. She has a fluffy white belly and a simple, smiling face.

name: Ter
bio: Nothing spells happiness for Ter like rest and relaxation. She's one busy 'Mallow, but she makes sure to put a spa day on her calendar. With her favorite aromatherapy candles and cucumber slices on her eyes, she can truly feel at peace. What's your favorite way to relax?
appearance: Ter is a narwhal tie-dyed in cool rainbow shades with two fins on each side. A long horn protrudes from her head, silver with a rainbow spiral. She has a plain white belly. She has closed eyes with lashes sweeping downwards and a smiling mouth.

name: Terell
bio: Meet Terell. Ever since Terell found his lucky clover, good things seem to happen wherever he goes! Maybe it’s the clover and maybe it’s his optimistic outlook. He sees the bright side of life and is great at helping others see it too! It’s hard not to feel lucky when hanging with Terell!
appearance: Terell is a mushroom with a light green stalk. He has a gradient top from lime-green to green decorated with glittery green embroidered shamrock spots. His stalk makes up his body and includes a green belly. He has round, black eyes and a smiling red mouth.

name: Teresa
bio: Who loves the color purple, eating delicious food, and helping people? Teresa! This busy unicorn is studying to be a doctor by day and a foodie by night.
appearance: Teresa is a light grey unicorn with white on their muzzle, belly and inside their ears. Their multi-colored mane includes candy pink, light turquoise and lavender. They have a shimmery, golden horn with a hot pink swirl. Their eyes are closed and they have long, curled lashes.

name: Terrence
bio: Terrence is the life of the party! This hard-of-hearing socialite thrives on the dance floor where he can feel the bass beneath his fins. He once signed the word "swim" while chatting with his friendSteeleacross a party and it started a new dance craze—The Breaststroke Shuffle!
appearance: Terrence is a yellow hammerhead shark with two fins on each side of his body and a hammer shaped head. He has a round, white belly with black gills on both sides. He has round black eyes and a small smile.

name: Terry
bio: Gobble gobble, it's time for Terry's famous garlic mashed potatoes! Every year Terry visits his old foster family to meet the current foster mallows. He knows it's not always easy growing up that way but he tries to show the mini mallows that one day they'll be okay!
appearance: Terry is a brown turkey with fluffy wings and an extravagant tail. His tail is dark brown at the bottom with orange and brown bands towards the tip. His belly is sand colored. He has a rounded triangular beak with a red wattle below, as well as round, black eyes.

name: Tess
bio: Tess received a mysterious Valentine's Day message from her utilities provider! It says "please call us immediately" and Tess can't wait to find out why. Maybe one of their employees thinks she's  real swell, and wants to send her a bouquet of roses or something!
appearance: Tess is a cupcake with swirled layers of lavender and brown icing and red and pink heart sprinkles on top. She also has a pink heart on the right side of her icing. Her wrapper is red with pink stripes and the top of her wrapper is brown. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red smile.

name: Tetero
bio: Tetero molds sugar skulls at home with sugar and meringue powder. He has a knack for painting them in bright and shiny colors, and loves to gift them to friends during Dia de los Muertos celebrations. Tetero is reminded of his mother this time of year, since they used to always paint sugar skulls together.
appearance: Tetero is a black dinosaur with a purple belly with a sugar skull design. A ridge of black spines appears atop his head. He has two yellow horns on his head and a large yellow horn on his face with some sugar skull designs on his forehead. He has black, round eyes with teal flowers and a white smiling mouth.

name: Tew
bio: Tew thrives in cold temperatures. He keeps his A/C on all year 'round! But don't worry when you come visit, he'll give you a big, cozy sweater in case you get too chilly. Even cold foods are Tew's favorite. Today he's preparing a watermelon and tomato gazpacho
appearance: Tew is a water bear, also known as a tardigrade: microscopic aquatic animals less than a millimeter long. He has a pale purple body and six short, chubby legs, which rest over his belly. Each leg ends in three dull purple claws. His belly is white and segmented with thin lines. He has round, black eyes, a purple muzzle and a smiling mouth.

name: Tex
bio: Introducing Tex the taco! Cheese, onions, and a little extra spice are some of Tex’s favorite things. Tex is a chef and loves to use new ingredients to mix things up. This tasty taco knows how to throw a party, especially when his favorite toppings are in town!
appearance: Tex is a taco with a smiling face. His body consists of a taco shell, which is pale yellow in color. Green lettuce, dark red tomato slices and yellow grated cheese fill the shell, spilling out at the top.

name: Thandie
bio: Do you hear that beautiful music? it's Thandie playing her harp! Every year, Thandie and her gold harp head up to the North Pole to play a holiday concert celebrating the winter season. One time, she even got a standing ovation for her graceful harp skills!
appearance: Thandie is an African-American angel, a brunette, Caucasian humanoid with silver wings. She wears a golden halo around her head and white and bluish grey clothes with a golden lace with a silver star. She has messy bangs and long, curled hair. Her eyes are closed and have curled lashes. She has pink blush and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Thayer
bio: Are you ready for Thayer, this mischievous mallow has some tricks up his sleeves! Thayer loves pranks, scary movies, and anything blue-raspberry. One day he wants to host a prank channel where the contestants dress up as giant blue-raspberries and play games. TBD if his mom will let him!
appearance: Thayer is a dragon with a tie-dye pattern that is green, brown and white. He has a cream snout, belly and inner ears. His wings, ears and small parts of his body have silver glitter on them. His spines are silver and he has two black eyes.

name: The Fly
bio: SCI12 #29 Squishdate 07.31.2023
appearance: The Fly is a blue fly with big purple bug eyes. They have a black belly with thin yellow horizontal stripes, and black antennae with yellow pom-poms at the tips. They have shiny rose gold wings. They have the words "The Fly" embroidered around their belly from 2021 to 2023. In 2024 The Fly was re-released without the words and a new bio.

name: Thekla
bio: Thekla loves puzzles and games, she started a club at school where they try to learn a new game every month! They try games from all around the world, some can be quite hard. Do you want to join her game club?
appearance: Thekla is a grey bear with round sparkly ears. She has a fuzzy white belly, and round, black eyes, along with a black nose and mouth.

name: Thelma
bio: Thelma wants to have a good day. So she's focused on taking it easy, and making fun plans that will keep the good vibes going. Want to join Thelma for smoothies and a nature walk later?

name: Theo
bio: Theo loves cars, trucks, and anything that can move fast. He spends his time fixing cars and dreams of racing them someday!
appearance: Theo is covered in a tie-dye pattern consisting of mainly blue and purple, with traces of pink. He has a pink horn with a darker pink swirl which matches the nostrils in his white muzzle. His inner ears are white, as is his belly. He has round, black eyes with short lashes.

name: Theodore
bio: Oh, hul-ohhhh! 'Tis Theodore! This total bookworm is perfecting his pro-nun-see-a-tion to emulate his favorite literary heroines. Though Theodore has yet to find a dashing suitor or cottage in the countryside, at least it sounds like he has!
appearance: Theodore is a dark brown quail with wings on each side. He has a white patch surrounding each eye with red on each side. He has a tall brown tuft of feathers on top of his head. He has a light brown belly with five rows of feathers out lined in white. He has round, black eyes and a dark grey beak

name: Theotto
bio: Theotto lives out in the marshes! He spends most of the year in hibernation, waiting for the perfect weather. With his large size and quiet demeanor, Theotto is one of the most beloved neighbors in the community. This charming 'Mallow invites you to his yearly autumn equinox party!
appearance: Theotto is a teal Cthulhu, a mythical cosmic entity with the head of a cuttlefish/octopus, dragon wings, and a humanoid body. He has a light blue belly, and darker teal blue spots on his forehead. He has wings with his inner wings being a glittery blue-green color. He has a short tail with two short fins on his head. He has black eyes, pink blush, and four tentacles that cover his mouth.

name: Thiago
bio: Have you asked Thiago for his Halloween salsa recipe yet? It includes diced pumpkin, pickled squash, and super-spicy ghost peppers. Thiago loves serving it with multicolored tortilla chips and sometimes even dishes out to plate trick-or-treaters
appearance: Thiago is a yellow turtle with a tuft of cyan hair atop his head and a white flower with a cyan sugar skull design on his forehead. He has a cyan belly with a colorful spine rib with a white flower with golden leaves and a dot arch above his belly. He has two yellow flippers on each side of his body. He has round black eyes with orange flower rings. and a smile. He has an orange shell on his back.

name: Thomas
bio: Thomas wants to be just like his big brotherNicwhen he gets older, this year he gets to help DJ the Squishmallow Valentine Dance Will you be his valentine?
appearance: Most of his body is a cyan color, he has a white belly with black open eyes and a dark teal nose and mouth. He has two white ears and 3 blue stripes on his head. He also has a very large dark fuzzy blue tail on his back. He also has 3 hearts 1 teal, 1 purple and 1 red which is larger than the others.

name: Thompson
bio: Thompson is one cheerful armadillo. He always has a smile on his face. He's a night owl who loves listening to music, especially punk rock! Thanks to his older brother, that's his favorite style of music. He cherishes his older brother and learns everything from him!
appearance: Thompson is a brown armadillo with an iridescent brown scale patch from his back to his forehead. He has black eyes, a cream white belly, and a pink nose and inner ears.

name: Tia
bio: Say hello to Tia! Tia is always on top of the latest streetwear and fashion trends, and even learned how to sew so she could make her own clothing line! She loves using recycled fabric to make unique clothes that are comfy too. What should Tia call her fashion line?
appearance: Tia is a sugar glider, a type of possum which can glide using wing-like membranes. She is primarily sky blue with a white lower face and belly. She has dark teal markings in stripes covering each eye, a large stripe starting at her head and running down her back, on the tip of her tail and on the outer front side of her 'wings'. Her inner ears are glittery gold. She has round, black eyes and a silver nose and mouth.

name: Tibby
bio: Tibby loves tree climbing and playing sports outside. She has a curious personality and loves to try new things. Her friends say the best thing about Tibby is her big heart.
appearance: Tibby is a purple Caticorn with a white unicorn horn on her head. She has dark purple, iridescent inner ears, feet and toe pads. Her lower face and feet are white. She has a long purple tail with white stripes along it. Tibby has black eyes, black whiskers, a black cat-like smile with her tongue sticking out and a purple nose.

name: Tie-Dye Valentine's Day Frog
bio: This Squishmallow does not have a bio.
appearance: This Squishmallow is in the standard frog style. They are tie-dyed blue, pink, and yellow, with heart embroidery on their white belly.

name: Tiff
bio: Tiff has dreams of being an actress, she loves playing new characters and being part of a new story. When it's time to get into a new role, she sits at her vanity to read her lines in a mirror. What's her next role? Helping her family with the chores.
appearance: Tiff is a teal bird with stubby wings and an extravagant feathered tail. Both her belly and the tips of her tail are a light sky blue. Three aquamarine feathers sit atop her head. She has a small, yellow beak and round black eyes with thick lashes.

name: Tiffany
bio: Tiffany's favorite Valentine's drink is chocolate milk with red heart sprinkles. She loves to play tennis and is looking for a doubles partner. Could it be you?
appearance: Tiffany is a calico cat with a cream body and pink and purple patches. She has one hot pink patch over her left ear, and two purple patches, one on her right ear and the other on her lower right body. She has closed eyes, black whiskers and a happy, pink cat mouth. Her tail is purple with a pink tip. She has a double heart emblem on her left side which features a small, pale pink heart on top of a larger hot pink heart.

name: Tilly
bio: Tilly never misses a local baseball game and loves to watch them from high in the sky--- it's the best view! Since baseball is her favorite sport to watch she's learning how to play and someday hopes to be a pitcher. Could you help Tilly throw her first pitch?
appearance: Tilly is an orange peel colored bat her wings, body and ears are all orange peel color. her belly and inside of her ears are peach colored she also has two white fangs on her smile

name: Tilman
bio: Tilman loves to race his friends through the snow during the day and loves curling up by the fire at night with frozen treats. He's fiercely loyal to his squad and wants to be a lawyer one day!
appearance: Tilman is a light grey dog with triangular ears. He has white markings on his face and belly, as well as inside his ears. He has round, black eyes, a large nose and a smiling mouth. Each version of him wears a different accessory - either a Santa hat, a red and white striped scarf, a red trapper hat with a snowflake print, or a dark blue winter hat with a blue puff on top.

name: Tim
bio: Ever seen Tim before? You might not recognize him now, but you will!  He is one of the greatest leading guitarists of today. Want to join Tim on his next tour bus? He gets to travel all over the world alongside his younger brother,Jim! What’s his favorite kind of music to perform? Alternative rock! He loves celebrating birthdays, which is why his January 1st birthday is always poppin'.
appearance: Tim is an alpaca with a bright blue body. Both the insides of his ears and the facial markings around his eyes and muzzle are white. He has round, black eyes, and his nose, mouth and the blush on each cheek is pale pink.

name: Timmy
bio: Who's there? It's Timmy! He hosts the most entertaining pumpkin patch parties every Halloween. The only thing Timmy enjoys more than hosting parties is telling knock-knock jokes! In fact, Timmy asks that you tell him your funniest knock-knock joke to RSVP. Do you have a joke for Timmy's party?
appearance: Timmy is an orange pumpkin with thin vertical stripes. He has closed eyes with short lashes and a smiling mouth. There is a brown stem on his head and a triangular pattern of bright green leaves.

name: Tina
bio: Tina’s style is one for the books. Her patterned clothing isn’t the only thing that stands out about this spunky Squishmallow. She is known for her unforgettable hair styles that leave every Squishmallows excited for their next hairdo!
appearance: Tina is an orange tiger covered in black stripes, save for her inner ears, muzzle and belly. She has round ears and a long, thin tail. She has two black eyes and a black nose and mouth.

name: Tinley
bio: Hats off to the chef, Tinley is in the building! Tinley loves to cook and just became the head chef at a new restaurant. She dedicated her first dish to her noni, she calls it Noni's Pasta, you should try it!
appearance: Tinley is a tie-dyed, rainbow axolotl with main colors of pink, yellow and blue. She has shimmery white gills with a pastel pink frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly, as well as round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Tinsel
bio: Have you ever wondered why winter cheer is so important? The long dark nights and dreary days  can makes some 'Mallows blue, and Tinsel is here to help. Even if the holidays are hard to handle, Tinsel wants to be the reason that other 'Mallows smile.
appearance: Tinsel is an ornament with a blue and white tie-dyed pattern, adorned with a design of white snowflakes. They have a pattern of silver, intersecting waves with dots in the center above and below their face. They have closed eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Tinsley
bio: Every Christmas, Tinsley gifts an original painting to each of her loved ones depicting her favorite memory with them from the past year. AlthoughSurfing with My sister and Frolicking with My Friendcame out splendidly, Tinsley has a feelingGhost Hunting with my Great Auntmight be her finest work yet.
appearance: Tinsley is a latte in a red takeaway cup. She has white whipped cream with brown, yellow and red sprinkles with a candy cane on the right side. She has a glittery light red band with a snowflake logo sticker. She has a winking expression with lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Tito
bio: Tito is known for being quiet but when he has something funny to say, all his friends crack up. Tito wants to be a counselor when he grows up to help kids who are quiet like him.
appearance: Tito is a black bird with a cream belly and white markings around both of his eyes. He has a plume of white feathers atop his head and fluffy, bright red wings on either side. He has a very large beak striped in pale green, yellow and red.

name: Titus
bio: Titus has been a lighting designer since before lighting was invented! He's learned to love newfangled gadgets like "spotlights" and "electricity" but does miss lighting hundreds of candles before performance. Or punching a hole through the ceiling. Or hiring swarm of fireflies from the local bayou!
appearance: Titus is a white lion with round ears and a grey muzzle and belly. He has a fluffy white mane which covers his head. He has round black eyes rimmed in light blue and a cat-like smiling mouth with nose.

name: Tizziano
bio: Tizziano is a whale shark, the largest variety of shark. They have a purple gradient with wavy pink stripes running horizontally across their body, accompanied by pink spots. They have a fin on each side of their body, one atop their head, one on their back and a pointed tail. Their have a large white belly which covers their mouth. They have a round, black eyes, a small smile and black gills.
appearance: Tizziano is a whale shark, the largest variety of shark. They have a purple gradient with wavy pink stripes running horizontally across their body, accompanied by pink spots. They have a fin on each side of their body, one atop their head, one on their back and a pointed tail. Their have a large white belly which covers their mouth. They have a round, black eyes, a small smile and black gills.

name: Toba
bio: Call Toba the next time you're feeling down in the doldrums. This angel knows just how to help you shift perspective and lift your spirits! Toba loves bike rides, reading books by new authors, and is always ready to listen no matter what you have to share.
appearance: Toba is an angel, a grey Caucasian humanoid with grey wings. They wear a gold halo around their head with two stars and white and teal clothes with a white bow and a gold star on their chest. They have grey bangs. Their eyes are closed and have curled lashes. They have pink blush and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Tobey
bio: Do you want to go on a berry-picking adventure? Tobey is the ‘Mallow for you! Tobey loves all berries but his favorite is the blueberry. He loves fresh blueberries to make muffins, pancakes, and even blueberry cookies!
appearance: Tobey is an axolotl with a blue gradient, starting with light blue on top of his head all the way down to a deep indigo. He has shimmery silver gills with a dark purple frill on each side of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a white belly. He has sparkling blue eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Tobias
bio: Tobias signed up to be on the school's cheer team, but he's nervous about tomorrow's audition. He's hoping years of dance practice will make him in the squad! Tobias shines with school spirit and his strong tail can help with cheer pyramids. Think Tobias will make the team?
appearance: Tobias is a tie-dye purple and blue seal. He has a pair of tie-dye fins and a tail. His muzzle and belly are plain white. He has his eyes closed with eyelashes with dual whiskers and a basic seal mouth

name: Todd
bio: Have you ever wondered how to play the harmonica? Todd is a harmonica hero - he can play almost any song he hears! Watch for him on the newest game show 'Play That Tune' to see if he's the next big harmonica sensation!
appearance: Todd is a creamy white colored chicken with a pure white belly. He has small wings with brown feathers on the tips. He has a red comb on the top of his head. He has round, black eyes and a bright yellow beak.

name: Tolef
bio: Tolef wants to win the upcoming snowman building contest! This smart cookie knows he needs a creative idea that will blow the rest of the competition out of the snow. Want to brainstorm snowman ideas with Tolef?
appearance: Tolef is a brown bear with round ears. His body is covered in white frosting with two squiggles of red icing on each side of his body. He has a white belly with two peppermints, with two swirls of green icing on each side of his belly and an arch of red icing above his belly with a green bowtie. He has red inner ears with white icing on the outer side. His muzzle is tan with a black nose and curved mouth with black eyes.

name: Tom
bio: Tom really knows how to light up a room! He spends all year looking forward to whipping out his Christmas decorations! He loves matching his tinsel to his ornaments and dawning the perfect sparkling star and lights! Want to borrow some of his decorations? He'd love to share!

name: Tomar
bio: Square dancing and sugar cookies are two of Tomar's favorite things. Her perfect day would be a huge square dance with all her friends, followed by baking cookies. Do want to come along?
appearance: Tomar is a chocolate brown horse with a dark brown mane resting on her forehead. She has black eyes with curly lashes. Her inner ears, muzzle and belly are all white. She wears a tie-dyed, blue and purple bow on her left ear.

name: Tomara
bio: Blackberry jam on peanut butter toast is Tomara's favorite breakfast food, she could eat it every day! Tomara can't wait until the school trip to a blackberry farm, she hopes they'll even get to pick some! Do you want to pick blackberries with Tomara?
appearance: Tomara is a tie-dyed, blue and purple penguin with a white face and belly. She has a large yellow beak and round black eyes with short lashes. She has large, fluffy wings and wears a sparkly silver tiara.

name: Tommy
bio: Tommy loves to play pool and card games, someday he wants to open up an arcade! Tommy wants to add his favorite food to the menu: loaded baked potatoes with cheese, sour cream and extra bacon. Would you visit his arcade?
appearance: Tommy is a black dog with tall, pointed ears - the right one is flopped over. He wears a royal blue, paisley patterned bandana around his neck. He has a white muzzle and stripe on his face and a round white belly. His nose, mouth and eyes are all black, although his eyes are rimmed with white.

name: Tomos
bio: Rainy days makes Tomos jump for joy! This frog never minds getting caught without an umbrella—he always has his hat on! There's nothing cozier than a rainy night in autumn with a hot cup of tea. Will you stay in with Tomos?
appearance: Tomos is an apple green frog with a cream colored belly. His eyes sit on top of his head, and are black rimmed in white. He has prominent nostrils above his smiling mouth, and a pale pink blush on his cheeks. He also wearing a black witch hat.

name: Toni
bio: Meet Toni. She is an amazing gardener and loves to spend her time in the fresh air and playing in the dirt. When she grows up, Toni wants to study plant medicine. Do you want to garden with Toni?
appearance: Toni is asnow leopard. Toni's coat is powder blue and is covered in light grey spots with a teal outline. She has a white belly and muzzle, with a teal nose and black mouth. She also has sparkling blue inner ears.

name: Tony
bio: 3-2-1-DRIVE! Tony spends his time racing cars, trucks, and one day wants to be a professional monster truck driver! His birthday is September 17 and this year wants to have a monster truck themed party.
appearance: Tony is a zebra with a white body covered in black stripes, aside from on his belly. His muzzle, eyes and mane are all black, with black inside his ears and white nostrils.

name: Tonya
bio: Tonya practices internal medicine for 'Mallows of all ages—it's a dream come true! When Tonya was a little piglet, she got sick for a whole month. But instead of letting that bring her down, she was inspired to be a doctor! Will you let Tonya check your vitals?
appearance: Tonya is a teal hog with mint color details inside her ears, on her snout and on her belly. Her ears are heart-shape and flop forwards. She has two round, black eyes and distinct green nostrils with two white tusks. She also has dark green hair.

name: Topher
bio: Topher works at his university's library as part of a work-studying program. He's majoring in English literature, so working at the library was a no-brainer for him! When Topher isn't reading another poetry anthology, he's giving library tours to freshmen. Want to see the collection of first editions?
appearance: Topher is a clownfish with a yellow body and green stripes with purple outlines. He has a silver belly, a tail by his bottom, and yellow pectoral fins on his sides. He has black eyes and a dimpled smile.

name: Tori
bio: Tori is known for being a multitasker. She can do algebra homework, clean her room, and talk on the phone with a friend all at the same time! How does Tori accomplish so much? Her eight tentacles, of course! When Tori needs a break, she loves to lay out and soak up some vitamin D by the store.
appearance: Tori is a light blue octopus with a pink flower with its pistil being a darker pink heart. She has eight, short tentacles, being colored from light blue, blue, dark pink, and pink. She has a white belly, black eyes with black lashes, and a black smiling mouth.

name: Torize
bio: On cold rainy days, there’s nothing Torize loves more than bundling up with his best friendDelindy. You can usually find them sitting next to the fire;lace playing board games or working on arts and crafts projects. For their next project, they’re making friendship bracelets!
appearance: Torize is a pumpkin pie with bright orange filling and a tan pie crust and base. He has a dollop of cream with brown speckles on top. He has round, black eyes with short lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Toro
bio: Toro owns Udderly Enlightened—a bookstore where ‘Mallows can learn and share ideas! At their bi-weekly salon talks, attendees discuss topics such as activism, self-expression, and telling your friends you love them. Sign up for the “Coolest Turtleneck” contest for a chance to win any pre-loved paperback of your choosing!
appearance: Toro is a pastel blue highland cow with a patch of longer navy fur like a fringe. Their belly is also navy and fluffy. They have a tan muzzle and white inner ears, which aren't fluffy. They have thin, white, curved horns which sit wide from their head. Thin brown lines mark the sections of their horns. They have round, black eyes and navy nostrils.

name: Torrence
bio: Wanna to take a trip with Torrence? Torrence's goal is to tour all the parks on her map, and she's looking for a travel buddy! This dragon can hike her way to a high peck and then safely flying back down. Come adventuring with Torrence!
appearance: Torrence is a black dragon with a silver nose, with orange inner ears and her white belly. Her horns are silver and, the inside of her wings and the spines on her back are all orange. She has two large black eyes.

name: Tortellini
bio: Tortellini works in the revenue department of a local dental practice! She calls herself the Anti-Tooth Fairy because she doesn't give money for teeth—she takes money for teeth! Think she should retire her classic chipmunk costume this Halloween and go as the ATF instead?
appearance: Tortellini is a green alien. She has a lime green belly and a yellow belt with a Saturn buckle. She wears a purple cape with yellow moons and stars. She has two alien antennae and lime green spots on her head. She has round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Tortuga
bio: Tortuga is a cruise director! When he isn't leading a conga line on the lido deck, you can find him working on his debut novel. It's about a haunted cruise ship that is definitely not inspired by the one Tortuga works on. At least, that's what he tells passengers...
appearance: Tortuga has a turquoise body, with a pale green belly with cyan spots. He has an embroidered snout with two teeth at the front and a further two on each side of his jaw. His round, black eyes sit on knobs atop his head. A row of cyan spikes run along his spine.

name: Tovah
bio: It's not that Tovah doesn't like indoor cats she just doesn't get them! The very thought of trading her adventures in the big city for scratching on a post all day gives her a total hairball. This sassy secretary has nine lives and intends to live each to the fullest!
appearance: Tovah is a lavender cat with a violet face. She has triangular ears, which are also violet, and a tail. The inside of her ears are sparkly light pink. She has round, black eyes rimmed in cyan and a black nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers. She has a glittery pink heart on the right side of her tummy.

name: Tove
bio: Tove looks forward to spring every year when her soda shop gets the busiest! She even keeps the store hours flexible so 'Mallows can enjoy a cherry limeade anytime they like. Tove lives above the shop and can easily fly down whenever a customer walks in. Come try her homemade black cherry fizz!
appearance: Tove is a mint mothman, a humanoid cryptid creature that resembles a large bird. She has short, fuzzy ears that protrude from the top of her head and bat-like wings on either side of her body. Her ears and belly are white and fuzzy and she has round, black eyes rimmed with pink. She has a small pink smile and two pink cheeks. She wears a flower crown atop her head.

name: Tovinda
bio: (no bio given on tag)
appearance: Tovinda is a cream colored squishmallow with pointy ears that are pink inside. She has a pink nose and mouth, with black eyes and eyelashes and grey whiskers. She has a silver horn with a brown white and pink mane. She is also wearing a 'Reese's peanut butter cup' wrapper on her lower half.

name: Townes
bio: Townes guides tours all over the city. There isn't a single place he doesn't know about, even if it's just a little factoid. Townes hosts groups of up to 20 'Mallows, so keeping his voice loud and clear is super important. Actually, he's ready for a spoon of honey to soothe his throat!
appearance: Townes is a green cup of smoothie with a mint lid and a green and white striped straw poking out of it and a cucumber slice and a mint leaf. He has darker green and white dots all over his body and has a mint belly. He has closed eyes and a red smile.

name: Tracey
bio: 3-2-1-Drive! Tracey spends her time racing cars, trucks, and one day wants to be a professional monster truck driver! Her birthday is September 17 and this year she wants to have a monster truck themed party.
appearance: Tracey is a zebra with a white body covered in black stripes, aside from on her belly. Her muzzle and ears are both black, with an hot pink color inside her ears and nostrils. Her fluffy mane is the same color. She has round black eyes ringed with white.

name: Trance
bio: Trance is one silly dragon you'll be glad to know! Every Valentine's Day he puts on a silly show and dresses up like a giant heart. He dances around the class and says a silly poem, ready for a hug from Trance?
appearance: Trance is a grey hug mee dragon with a grey nose and white belly. The insides of his ears are also white. His spines and the inside of his wings are a sparkly blue and the horns on his head are a grey. He has two large black eyes. On the right side of Trance's belly says XOXO in light blue and two teal hearts.

name: Treat
bio: Treat is an Executive Assistant—to the Easter Bunny! He spends much of the year planning his boss’s extremely complex spring business trip, but the perks of the job make it all worth it. Like an unlimited supply of chocolate creme eggs and excellent dental insurance!
appearance: Treat is a chocolate possum with a brown head and a dark brown body. They have brown round ears with lavender inner ears with a tuft of dark brown fur. They wear a lavender bow tie and has a brown belly with a swirl of yellow icing above and pink below. They have round, brown eyes and a nose and mouth with whiskers.

name: Trenton
bio: Congratulations to Trenton! This amateur director just took top honors at the local film festival. The critics loved his documentary about documentaries and can't wait to see what's next. According to Trenton, it's going to be a movie about movies!
appearance: Trenton is a green praying mantis with a pale-green belly and darker green antennae with fuzzy yellow tips. He has dark green front legs, baby pink blushes on his cheeks and black eyes and a black smile. On the back of Trenton he has shiny emerald green wings.

name: Tres'zure
bio: Tres'zure loves to plan events for her friends, especially for their birthdays. She and her friendKimiaplan a wonderful birthday experience for all their friends. Tres'zure's favorite part is creating the vision board and making memories with her friends.
appearance: Tres'zure is a mint green coloured cat with darker mint green markings on her forehead and sides and a white belly. She has pink inside of her ears, with a silver bow attached to the left ear. She has black eyes with short, curled lashes, and a pink nose and mouth.

name: Trey
bio: 'Home run hitter' is this Squishmallow's nickname, Trey is a baseball superstar. He plays every chance he can, and one day hopes to be in the big leagues!
appearance: Trey is a forest green triceratops with his full body textured, except for his scales. He has two white horns on either side of his head and one on top of his mouth. His stomach is cream white and he has a pointy tail at his backside.

name: Treyton
bio: Jazz music, prank videos, and grilled cheese sandwiches are some of Treyton's favorite things. One day he accidentally called his saxophone a grilled cheese sandwich, and then he decided to keep the name. What would you name an instrument?
appearance: Treyton is a yellow axolotl with shimmery white gills on each side of his head. His gills are lined with bright yellow fluff. He has small, stubby arms and a white belly. He has round black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Triana
bio: Triana just got a new bike and she's ready to ride. She loves biking down the boardwalk with her friends. She still needs to get a new bell but she wants a cool sound, what sound should it make?
appearance: Triana is a green, white and red flag with a matching bow and she has black eyes with one eyelash and she has pink cheeks and a simple black smile.

name: Trilly
bio: Trilly splurged on a big makeup kit! She loves the color palette and can't wait to play around with different looks. Trilly doesn't need a special occasion to get dressed up she has fun expressing herself though makeup every day! Will you let Trilly give you a makeover?
appearance: Trilly is a purple hermit crab with a tie-dyed rainbow shell. She has two purple claws and six purple legs. She has a white belly, light pink blush, round black eyes, and a simple smile.

name: Trina
bio: Trina loves to color and go on adventures with her brotherTristonand their friends. She wants to be a deep sea diver someday and tries to help her brother get over his fear of swimming.
appearance: Trina is a pale pink bird with a white belly. She has a triangular orange beak and a fluffy, pink crest of feathers atop her head. Unlike more recent chicken characters, she does not have fluffy wings. She also has round, black eyes with short lashes.

name: Trinity
bio: Meet Trinity, she loves tapioca pudding, tortellini, and tamales. Trinity loves baseball even more than her brotherTreyand wants to be a team manager when she grows up.
appearance: Trinity is a tie-dyed dinosaur with a blend of peachy pink and golden yellow colors. She has a scaly texture covering her body and a round, white belly. A ridge of peach spines appears atop her head. She has two white horns on her head and a large white horn on her face. He has black, round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Trish
bio: Trish wants a hug when she's having a bad day. Will you help cheer Trish up?
appearance: Trish is mostly rainbow, with a white belly, inner ears and rainbow mane and tail. Her horn is shiny silver, and her eyes are black, and her snout are white with pink nostrils and a smile. in her belly she has 3 hearts first one is hot pink, and the second is teal, and her third one is lavender.

name: Tristan
bio: Want to get in shape? Schedule a session with Tristan, an amazing personal trainer! He’s training for a bodybuilding competition right now, and after that, a marathon! His goals might sound like a lot, but Tristan will be the first to admit the importance of rest. In fact, it's almost his naptime.
appearance: Tristan is a green dinosaur with a white belly. A ridge of dark green spines appears atop his head. He has two white horns on his head and a large white horn on his face. He has black, round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Triston
bio: Triston is rarely seen without his twin sisterTrina. They join the same clubs at school and even have the same class schedule. One place you won't find him - the pool (he is afraid of swimming).
appearance: Triston is a yellow bird with a pale lemon belly. He has a triangular orange beak, a fluffy yellow crest of feathers atop his head and matching wings. He has round, black eyes and wears a rainbow bow-tie outlined in pale purple stitching.

name: Trixie
bio: (Unknown)
appearance: Trixie is a tie - dye space colored unicorn with a white muzzle and pink nostrils. Her multi-colored mane includes light pink, light blue and light lavender. She has a shimmery, silver horn with a grey spirals. Her belly and the insides of her ears are white . She has large, black eyes with curly winged lashes.

name: Troy
bio: Grab your clubs and get ready to hit the green with Troy! He spends his free time perfecting his swing and improving his putting game. One day he hopes to win the tournament!
appearance: Troy is a grey raccoon with black markings around his eyes.  Above these are white marks which resemble eyebrows. He has white spots all around his body. He has triangle ears with light grey insides, as well as a white muzzle and belly. His facial features are all black, including his oval-shaped eyes with white rings around them and his round nose and smile.

name: Troye
bio: Troye is super happy for the "Silent Night" people—really, live your life—but you will not catch him sleeping in heavenly peace! He's talking sleigh, toy store, 'nother toy store—jingles, you might even see him getting down with Mrs. Claus at Frostbite, the coldest club in town. And then after at Dasher's, okay!
appearance: Troye is a mint troll with small dark spots by his head and side. His ears are large and triangular with mint inner ears and a tuft of fur on his head. He wears a bluish-grey jacket with a light blue outfit with a snowflake in the middle and an arctic blue belt with a silver buckle. He has round, black eyes and pink blush.

name: Truce
bio: Truce is an elementary school teacher by day and a business mediator by night! Fair arbitration definitely comes in handy for crayon related disputes, but her teaching credential somehow proves even more effective in corporate negotiations. If Party A has two apple trees, and Party B has 3—then who owns 51% of the orchard?
appearance: Truce is a light green cow with patches of blue, green and purple tie-dye on her lower left side and on her right ear. She has white, triangular horns and round, black eyes with lashes. The inside of her ears is white and her muzzle is also white with green nostrils.

name: Trudy
bio: Trudy is always up on the latest trends, which is why her friends love when she does their hair! When she’s not in the salon, you can catch her reading a magazine, shopping or enjoying a beautiful walk in the park.
appearance: Trudy is a black bug with a bright red belly. She has two curled antennae atop her head. Her wings stick out to either side of her and are red with black polka dots. She has round black eyes rimmed in white with short lashes, as well as a red, smiling mouth and pink blush.

name: Truman
bio: Truman is a dentist who loves to travel. This turtle swims around the world offering dental care to all 'Mallows in need. Truman knows having teeth cleaned isn't easy for everyone, so he makes sure every cleaning is quick even fun! Want to hear one of his classic knock-knock jokes?
appearance: Truman is a navy blue turtle with grey scales atop his head. He has a bluish-grey belly and two flippers on each side. He has a simple face with round black eyes and a smile. On his back he has a dark blue shell with light blue spots.

name: Tuck
bio: Are you ready to meet the best dressed horse at the Kentucky Derby? Tuck is one stylish pony! He loves to dress up and his motto is 'dress to impress'. Tuck matches funky patterns with florals, stripes with gingham, and almost always has a fresh red rose on hand.
appearance: Tuck is a dark brown, almost black horse with a white stripe on his forehead. He has black eyes and a black mane and tail. His muzzle and belly are white and the inside of his ears are tan. He has the state of Kentucky embossed on the right side of his belly in bright blue.

name: Tucker
bio: Tucker hurt his friendMedina's feelings yesterday, but that wasn't his intention. Now he wants to make it up to her by preparing her favorite food - tacos! Tucker thinks a big hug and homemade meal are the perfect apology. How do you make up with your friends?
appearance: Tucker is a red and blue cup of slushie. on top of his head is blue raspberry slush. there is a red straw poking out from his left side. he has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Tudor
bio: Congrats to Tudor, who just received his lifeguard certification! Now this turtle is ready to patrol the beach and keep every 'Mallow in the water safe. Tudor loves to spend his days outside, so even when he's off the clock you can find him tearing up turf on his mountain bike!
appearance: Tudor is a dark magenta turtle with off-white scales atop their head. He has an off-white belly and two flippers on each side. He has a simple face with round black eyes and a smile. He has a maroon shell on his back.

name: Tula
bio: Tula loves rock climbing and reading, but not at the same time. She and her best friendVanessago climbing on the weekends, they have matching helmets and support each other as they climb. After a long day, she can't wait to curl up and read her latest book.
appearance: Tula is a tie-dyed pink and blue bear with round ears. She has a round, pastel pink belly. Her inner ears and her egg-shaped muzzle are both white. Her eyes, nose and mouth are all black, with two short lashes on her eyes and a white shine on her nose.

name: Tulio
bio: Tulio has a big goal, to go to every baseball stadium ever! He’s not sure yet how many he can get to, but so far he’s visited 4. Do you want to go with him to a game soon?
appearance: Tulio is a pink tamale with several dark pink vertical lines. The bottom corners are wrapped in yellow with darker yellow lines. He has two black, round eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Tulip
bio: Tulip is hosting an easter-themed car wash! It's in support of vitamin C deficient carrots and includes scrubbing, buffing, waxing and egging. Throw in an added donation and Tulip will even help wipe the whites off your windshield.
appearance: Tulip is a purple bird with an eggshell colored in yellow, teal and green with pink dots. They has a triangular yellow beak. Their eyes are round, and black and each has two short eyelashes. They has purple feathers the same color as their hair tuft.

name: Tulsa
bio: Tulsa is a versatile vaudeville performer! From torch songs to flaming poi balls—fast footwork to feels of strength—The Terrific Tulsa can fill the bill with whatever might be needed that night. Just give him some energizing ginger ale and 30 minutes to rehearse
appearance: Tulsa is a yellow horse with spots around his body with a white stripe on his forehead. He also has a tan muzzle with dark brown nostrils. His mane and tail yellow, and his fluffy belly is white.

name: Tuluck
bio: Tuluck volunteers at his local elementary afterschool program. He's known as a homework wizard! No other 'Mallow can solve homework problems like Tuluck. This keeps him super busy, bouncing around and helping all the students. Tuluck wouldn't have it any other way!
appearance: Tuluck is a bright blue cow with a large, slightly darker blue patch over his right ear. He has cream-colored horns and round, black eyes. His inner ears and muzzle  are pale pink, and his belly is light blue. His belly is patterned with blue splotches, the same color as the patch on his ear.

name: Tundar
bio: No matter the occasion, Tundar loves putting together little gift bags for friends! He fills them with candies, cool shells he found, and always includes a personal card. So be sure to keep in touch with Tundar. He'll send you a super sweet goody bag all the way from the sea!
appearance: Tundar is a lavender turtle with purple scales atop his head. He has a galaxy belly with stars and two flippers on each side. He has a simple face with round black eyes and a smile. On his back he has a galaxy shell with stars and starbursts.

name: Turk
bio: Turk wants a hug after winning his cross-country races! He tries to run faster each time to beat his own records. Will you give him a hug after his next race?
appearance: Turk is a tan lion with a white muzzle. The colorful mane which covers his head is a fluoro rainbow, with lots of colors. He has a pure white belly with a red heart and a teal hear. He also has a black nose and mouth.

name: Turktina J.
bio: Turktina just started high school and cannot believe there's already another Turktina! And the totally messed up thing is that the other Turktina is a junior—what a little overachiever!—so now the "real" Turktina has to be Turktina J. It does sound pretty cool, though...and what the "J" stands for will be a total mystery!
appearance: Turktina J. is a tan turkey leg with bump-like marks on their body and a gravy covered bone sticking out of their top right. They wear a red sweater with red and white snow flakes with a white fuzzy band above. They have black eyes, a black mouth, and red blush.

name: Twyla
bio: Twyla is a tooth fairy in training, and wants to be the best one ever! She is still learning how to collect teeth with her magic tooth wand but one day she'll get to leave behind all kinds of wonderful prizes for the teeth she collects.
appearance: Twyla is a fairy with sky blue hair styled in space buns and a pink star hairclip on the right side. She has pale skin and a pink mouth, and is winking her right eye. Her dress has a pink bodice and a skirt with numerous shimmering petals, including ice blue, sky blue, pale pink and lavender. The bodice has 'Tooth Fairy' embroidered in white, as well as a pocket for storing teeth. Silvery butterfly wings sprout from her back.

name: TyRee
bio: Who loves animals and working on the farm? TyRee does! She wakes up early and talks to them throughout the day, sometimes they even help her with silly pranks. Do you want to visit TyRee's farm?
appearance: TyRee is a Pandacorn with marbled patterned ears, eye markings, stripe across her center, and unicorn horn. She has holographic feathered wings, black eyes with white rings around them, and a pink nose and curved mouth.

name: Tycho
bio: Tycho is a sustainability engineer, creating products, buildings, and systems to meet a set of sustainability standards. Even her fun hobby is good for the earth! She makes eco-friendly soaps for her friends and family that have zero waste, are non-toxic, and smell like vanilla lavender. What scent should Tycho make next?
appearance: Tycho is a parakeet (budgie), a type of small parrot. She has a white head, a sky blue body and a pale blue belly. Her wings are pale grey striped with darker grey. She has a rounded, yellow beak with a pale blue cere above it, as well as round, black eyes and pink blush.

name: Tyler
bio: Meet Tyler. He loves playing in the dirt, soccer, and eating cold pizza for breakfast. Tyler wants to be like his dad and study plants when he grows up. He loves learning about plants and how they can survive in so many different climates.
appearance: Tyler is a grey dinosaur with two small arms sticking out from his front. Each arm has small, white claws on the tip. Tyler's belly and spines along his back are blue. He has round, black eyes and a wide, toothy grin like a shark.

name: Tyree
bio: Original (10"):Have you met Tyree? This perky pup works at a hair salon and plans to do hair for the movies one day! After a long day he loves to curl up with pizza and a good book, do you want to join him?Alternate (7"):Who loves animals and working on a farm? Tyree does! She wakes up early and talks to them throughout the day, sometimes they even help her with silly pranks. Do you want to visit Tyree's farm?
appearance: Tyree is a white and brown dog with long, floppy ears. His base color is white, with two large brown patches which cover from his ear to his eye on either side of his face. He also has brown patches on his side and a black back. He has round, black eyes, a black nose and mouth, and is poking out his pink tongue.

name: Tyrone
bio: Click, clack, click, clack! That's the sound of Tyrone typing away at his computer. This data analyst loves making percussive melodies with his keyboard and even just joined a friend's office-themes rock band. Tyrone can't wait to make music with his stapler-playing bestie!
appearance: Tyrone has an indigo body and antennae, with a lighter blue belly and wings. His face is purplish-blue, and he has pink cheek spots. His eyes are black and he has a black smile.

name: Tyrus
