bio: Meet Tyrus. He's an excellent sushi chef! He makes his famous Tyrus Roll for all of his friends. He rolls up rice and seaweed paper, and then fills it with avocado, spicy salmon, and his super-secret sauce! If you ask him nicely, he might give you his recipe!
appearance: Tyrus is a teal dinosuar with a white belly. He has a wacky rainbow hair. Tyrus has black eyes and a smile on his face.

name: Tzeitel
bio: Tzeitel is like, so totally excited for freshman this year! She's been practicing her cool girl lingo all summer long and can't wait to chillax, chill, and/or kiki with her fellow teenaged classmates. Fo shizzle they betta be as tubular as Tzeitel, okurr!
appearance: Tzeitel is a purple tuxedo cat with pointed, triangular ears with light pink inner ears and a white belly. Her nose and mouth are pale pink and framed by two black whiskers on either side. She has closed, black eyes.

name: Ukee
bio: Ukee's booming voice can be heard from anywhere in the kitchen and beyond! This chef is serious about good food, so you better keep your wits about you, if you're on the cooking line when Ukee's around. He can spot an over cooked egg from miles away!
appearance: Ukee is a clown with a pale, off-white face. He wears a black bowler hat with a red stripe, a white buttoned shirt with cyan buttons, a red collar, two cyan straps with a white button at the ends, and a red and black gingham patterned clothing below the shirt. He has curly cyan hair, peach make up, a large red nose, and white lips, his eyes are also black and round.

name: Ulana
bio: Ulana dealt with a lot of life changes last year that left her feeling tired and a bit down. So, she started a positivity routine! Ulana writes a daily gratitude list and lights wishing candles. Today, Ulana is grateful for her 'Mallow pals and wishes for her basil plant to grow big and strong!
appearance: Ulana is a turkey with a dark orange head and brown body. She has a brown fuzzy belly, and fuzzy wings, red caruncle, a yellow beak, and black eyes. Her tail has white-tipped feathers, with brown, orange, to red-orange patterns.

name: Ulga
bio: Meet Ulga! This magical ‘Mallow is a magician’s assistant! You can catch her on stage taming fierce tigers then making them disappear in a puff of sparkles and smoke! With Ulga, you never know what magical tricks and surprises lay in store!
appearance: Ulga is a white cow with black patches on top and bottom. Ulga has a fuzzy white belly with black spots on it. Ulga's horns, inner ears, and snout are all silver.

name: Ulysses
bio: Joy to the world” this… “peace on Earth” that… whatever happened to fun? Why can’t Ulysses place 20 identical boxes under the tree—one with a flat-screen television, the rest with old socks—and then let his friends pick their presents? Maybe he could even fill them all with flat-screens… that’d be pretty fun too, huh? Heh... heh...
appearance: Ulysses is a black Christmas tree decorated with pink gold and gold Christmas ornaments across his body, a golden star on top of his head. He has golden tinsel layered on his body. He has mischievous black eyes and a black smile.

name: Uma
bio: If you're in need of a card for someone special, you have to go to Uma's shop. She makes the most beautiful cards! Uma has cards for everything; from birthdays to bad days and everything in between. What kind of card should Uma make for you?
appearance: Uma is a rainbow unicorn with a pink, scaly bottom and tail. She has a pink, fuzzy mane with a teal, glittery unicorn horn and shell bikini. Her inner ears and muzzle are an off-white. Her nostrils are a hot pink, and she has black closed eyes with eyelashes.

name: Umberto
bio: Umberto teaches "Advanced Clownery" at the local college. This semester, his students are learning how to ride a unicycle and juggle bowling pins— at the same time! Umberto promises that if everyone passes their final exam, they can pie him in the face!
appearance: Umberto is a white humanoid clown with purple makeup, blue nose, and red lipstick he has pink, fuzzy hair. He has black eyes and a black smiling mouth. He wears a black and green striped party hat with a pink fuzz at the top. A black collar, a green and purple shirt with pink and blue buttons with a pink strap and blue button on his right, and a blue strap and pink button on his left.

name: Unai
bio: Unai teaches meditation and is known for their cozy techniques. A fluffy cushion and warm shawl helps them feel the most recharged after each practice. Unai also believes in the healing power of naps, and even wrote a book about it! Where's your fave spot for a quick nap?
appearance: Unai is a multi-colored mushroom. They have a galaxy body featuring shades of purple, pink and blue with white stars over the body. Their belly is white and fluffy, and they have a purple cap with white spots. They have a winking expression and a smiling red mouth.

name: Uri
bio: Uri loves peppermint mocha drinks and cinnamon sugar cookies, especially when it's hot out! Winter flavours are their favourite. Uri makes extra dough and strores the finished cookies in the freezer for an extra yummy treat.
appearance: Uri is a teal penguin with a white face and a shiny, silver belly. They have closed, happy eyes and a bright yellow beak. They wear a striped red and white scarf around their neck.

name: Ursula
bio: Are you ready to make an investment? Ursula is the cat for you! She helps the Squishmallows with a lot of their investing and performing questions - by day she manages investment portfolios and by night she is working on her karaoke career!
appearance: Ursula is a white caticorn, a cat with a unicorn horn. She has a rainbow colored mane. The inside of her ears and her belly are dark grey. She has a silver horn with glitter and a pink swirl, as well as a pale pink nose and mouth. She has closed eyes and two black whiskers on either side of her face.

name: Val
bio: Val is a pink whale. They have a fin on each side of their body and one atop their head, as well as a fluke (tail fin). Their white belly is divided by broken, pink lines. They wear a pair of pink heart sunglasses with black shades. They have closed, eyes and a black smiling mouth with pink blush.
appearance: Val is a pink whale. They have a fin on each side of their body and one atop their head, as well as a fluke (tail fin). Their white belly is divided by broken, pink lines. They wear a pair of pink heart sunglasses with black shades. They have closed, eyes and a black smiling mouth with pink blush.

name: Valentina
bio: Valentina lives with her cousinBubblesand helps manage the family business, the Hippity Hop Hat store. Valentina loves styling her squad with hats of all shapes, sizes, and colors. Her specialty? Designing giant Easter egg hats! Would you let Valentina design a hat for you?
appearance: Valentina is a pale grey rabbit with long lop ears. She has a white belly and tail. She also has round, black eyes and a grey nose and mouth.

name: Valentine
bio: Valentine believes breakfast is the most important meal of the day. That's why she starts every morning with 3 chocolate chip pancakes, 2 plates of scrambled eggs, and 1 big glass of orange juice! Valentine calls it her '3,2,1 Special' and can't get enough of it Maybe that's why she's such a morning 'Mallow.
appearance: Valentine is a red bat with long, upright ears. Her inner ears and wings are metallic red. Her belly is fuzzy maroon. She has a winking expression and short, curled lashes. Her black, smiling mouth is adorned with two pointed white fangs.

name: Valentino
bio: Valentino is a scare-acting coach! He helps aspiring monsters hone their craft with classes like Vocal Safe Screeching, Finding Your Perfect Hiding Spot, or—his personal favorite—Advanced Silent Stalking. Students have gone on to play roles like The Mud Man and Scarecrow #2 in award-winning films and corn mazes!
appearance: Valentino is a neon blue candelabra. On top of his head he has a yellow flame that is melting neon green wax. He has two stubby arms both with yellow flames and are melting neon green wax. He has two scars one on his face and the other below. He has a fuzzy purple belly. He has round, black eyes with a smiling mouth and pointy teeth.

name: Valerie
bio: Valerie is dressed like a royal performer in her crown and robe. She swoops in to help other performers get ready for the show. Valerie knows the first rule in the show biz, that the show must go on. She's willing to pitch in and do what she can to help others.
appearance: Valerie has a light purple/blue-ish body with a white belly and beak. On her belly is a big "ValRavn" print. She also has two golden spots on her wings. Her head is of a dark navy blue, her eyes are yellow and she wears a golden crown.

name: Vance
bio: Vance keeps 13 fidget spinners on him at all times—each with its own purpose! For example, the red spinner helps him bring a stop to negative thoughts and the blue spinner helps him stay calm in stressful situations. Then, of course there's his diamond encrusted gold spinner... that one just looks cool!
appearance: Vance is a tan pop tart with light purple icing decorated with teal, purple and white sprinkles on his front. He wears a pair of purple earmuffs. He has round, black eyes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Vanda
bio: Vanda is writing a sitcom! It's called "Pain in the neck" and all about navigating life in the big city in your early centuries. Subway delays, bad bosses, Van Helsing chasing you through the streets—but at least you have your friends!
appearance: Vanda is a vampire with black hair and neon blue skin. His hair forms a widows peak on his forehead and he has a short ponytail at the back of his head. He has pointed, elvish ears, black eyes and a pink, smiling mouth with sharp white fangs. He wears a purple jacket with gold buttons, black pants and a pink bow-tie, as well as a black vampire cape lined in pink.

name: Vanessa
bio: When she's not climbing with her friendTula, you can find Vanessa practicing for her latest choir concert. She loves to sing and has a new solo to practice, her first one this year! Will you help her practice?
appearance: Vanessa is a red panda with a blue body as an ironic surprise; she has white markings including on her ears, on her muzzle, eyebrow-like ovals above her eyes and fluffy cheeks. She has round black eyes and a bright blue nose and mouth. Her belly and the insides of her ears are rainbow, tie-dyed inside her ears and in in stripes on her fuzzy belly.

name: Varity
bio: Who loves pink, playing tag, and learning from podcasts? It must be Varity! This husky loves pink, from her backpack to her breakfast. She also loves to play games and learn. Each week Varity sends cards to her friends with some of the fun facts from her favorite podcasts.
appearance: Varity is a peach pink dog with triangular ears. She has white markings on her face and belly and sparkling silver inner ears. Her eyes, nose and mouth are black, and she wears red glasses with heart-shaped frames. Her belly is decorated with a twin heart emblem, a small blue heart on top of a large red heart.

name: Vas
bio: Meet Vas. They express themselves through fashion and art! Whether its a sequin jacket or a disco ball earrings, everything Vas wears make them shine inside and out! Vas loves their LGBTQ family because there is space for everyone! How do you express yourself?
appearance: Vas is a rainbow frog with a golden belly. Thier eyes sit on top of their head, and are black rimmed in white. They has prominent nostrils above their smiling mouth, and a pale pink blush on their cheeks. They wear a golden crown on their head.

name: Vee
bio: Meet your new magical friend, Vee! Whether it's curled up with a good book or cheering on her favorite team, Vee ALWAYS dresses to impress.  Vee loves fashion and lollipops. However, her true passion is for sports and hopes to one day be a fantasy sports telecaster!
appearance: Vee is a cream-colored owl with shimmery, golden ear tufts and white markings on her face and belly. Small, gold feathers decorate her chest. She has black eyes with short, straight lashes, and a gold, triangular beak.

name: Velocity
bio: Blink and you might miss Velocity! This record-smashing sprinter doesn’t slow down for anything, not even post-race interviews. Reporters have tried everything, from motorbikes to megaphones, but by the time they get a word in, she’s already in another race… or time zone. Better keep up!
appearance: Velocity is a purple unicorn with black accents. She has a black belly, and her sparkly unicorn horn and inner ears are black. Her mane that goes from the top of her head to her back and her fluffy tail are black. She has mischievous eyes and her muzzle is black and her nostrils are purple.

name: Venus
bio: Venus isn't just a supermodel--she's a superhero, too! When this spectacular sheep isn't strutting down the runway, you can find her safeguarding the community. One time her worlds collided when she had to save her favorite fashion designer,Sophiefrom a cyborg octopus
appearance: Venus is a cream white sheep with a charcoal black face and ears. She has black eyes rimmed in white and a charcoal black heart-shaped nose and mouth. She has a fuzzy charcoal black belly with cream colored horns and a white tuft of hair.

name: Vera
bio: If you're in need of some good news, Vera has got your back! Vera wants to be a reporter and looks for one good thing to report each day. Some days it can be hard, but Vera loves to deliver good news. Do you have any to share?
appearance: Vera is a rainbow with five colors: red, yellow, green, blue and purple. Each end of the rainbow has a white cloud with a flat base, and an orange and yellow sun peeks out from behind the arc of the rainbow. The background has an gradient effect with pale yellow at the top and bright yellow towards the bottom. Vera has a winking face with a little shine in the open eye.

name: Vermicelli
bio: Are you superstitious? Vermicelli sure is. This bundle of nerves forgoes umbrellas, avoids ladders, and skips right over every sidewalk crack. Though he sometimes feels silly being so cautious, Vermicelli isn't taking any chances. He even dyed his black cat white!
appearance: Vermicelli is a cerulean blue snake with a lighter blue lower jaw and belly. his belly has black stripes dividing it horizontally. He has shiny, royal blue spots on his back and a short tail. He has round black eyes with lashes and black nostrils and mouth. A thin, pink, forked tongue pokes out from his mouth.

name: Vern
bio: Meet Vern. This speedy 'Mallow loves going on space road trips with friends! They load up their spaceship with candy and salty snacks, and always make the perfect playlist. Today, Vern is traveling to a galaxy five light-years away. Ready to blast off into the stars?
appearance: Vern is a cyan robot. He has a monitor with teal edges to display their face. They have silver antennae with red earpieces. Their body also has another display with red edges with two meters inside. Their face on their monitor has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Veronica
bio: If you like adventure, pretzels, and crossing books off your reading list, Veronica is the Octopus for you! With a book or two in each tentacle, you can be sure she’s on some amazing adventures.
appearance: Veronica is a tomato red octopus with a white belly. She has a round body with eight short tentacles. Her eyes are black and round and she has a smiling mouth. Variations include sequin belly, anime eyes, snowflake patch, heart patch, and strawberry patch.

name: Veronika
bio: Veronika wasn't elected sorority president on looks alone! This corporate communications major is tough as nails and can't wait to bring C-suite sensibilities to Neigh Eta Zeta. For starters—Shoulder Pad Sundays, a ban on "um"and an IPO launching in the fall!
appearance: Veronika is a pink horse with light pink hair-like bangs on her head. She also has a dark pink muzzle with black nostrils. Her mane and tail are light pink, and her belly is also white. She has round, black eyes with lashes.

name: Vickie
bio: If you love decorating cupcakes and watching cheesy TV shows, Vickie is the Squishmallow for you! She loves to wear her cupcake apron and talk to the TV while she's baking - she LOVES the drama of her favorite shows.
appearance: Vickie is a fox with a pink to blue gradient. Her BAM! version is pastel, whereas other12"versions are darker, with a hot pink to teal gradient. She has white markings on her belly and face, and glittery inner ears. Her eyes are closed with curled lashes and she has a triangular nose and two whiskers on each cheek.

name: Victoria
bio: Victoria is a cup of candy pink boba tea filled with strawberries. They have closed black eyes with eyelashes and a pink smiling mouth. They have a white colored lid with a pink outline below and a magenta straw poking out from the right side.
appearance: Victoria is a cup of candy pink boba tea filled with strawberries. They have closed black eyes with eyelashes and a pink smiling mouth. They have a white colored lid with a pink outline below and a magenta straw poking out from the right side.

name: Vie
bio: If there's a photo booth nearby, you can bet Vie is already in front of the camera! She is a big photo booth enthusiast, and don't even ask her how many photo strips she has collected already-because it's a lot! Ready to capture the moment with Vie?
appearance: Vie is a berry smoothie cup with a white top and a white belly. Her body is colored purple with darker purple and white dots to represent the blended berries. She has a red and black raspberry by her top, and she has black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Vig
bio: Little Vig can’t wait to grow their froggy legs! They know there’s so much to explore on land, but for now, Vig loves spending time with their siblings and finding sunny spots in the lake to swim. Will you visit Vig after they hop out of the water?
appearance: Vig is a swamp green frog with a lime-colored belly. Their eyes sit on top of their head and are black rimmed in lime. They have prominent nostrils above their smiling mouth. They have spots all over their body with a tadpole-like tail behind them.

name: Viggy
bio: Viggy just got his braces removed! Now he's going to devour all the crunchy, chewy foods he wasn't able to eat for a few years—starting with popcorn! Viggy's favorite flavor is caramel with peanuts. This Halloween is going to be the best yet. Want to snack on sweets with Viggy?
appearance: Viggy is an purple, orange, and green pumpkin with curving jack-o-lantern face. He has black eyes and a nose and a zig-zag mouth. He has a black trangle-like leaf on his head with a black vine on his head as well.

name: Vilmos
bio: Vilmos keeps his crops growing year 'round. This longtime farmer recently started a lavender patch and it's been growing like crazy! Now Vilmos wants to dry the yield and sell it at the Saturday market in town. Would you like to buy some lovely dried lavender?
appearance: Vilmos is a light blue dinosaur with a galaxy tie-dye belly. A ridge of galaxy spines appears atop his head. He has two white horns on his head and a large white horn on his face. He has black, round eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Vince
bio: Vince is no ordinary vampire, this goofy guy is full of jokes and considers himself a scholarly creature. He tries to apply his favorite subject, history, to the jokes he tells and if his jokes don't impress you then his latest research on historical mallow mysteries will!
appearance: Vince is a vampire with black hair and light teal skin. His hair forms a widows peak on his forehead and he has a short ponytail at the back of his head. He has pointed, elvish ears, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth with sharp white fangs. He wears a purple jacket with gold buttons, black pants and a red bow-tie, as well as a black vampire cape lined in red.

name: Vinny
bio: Did you see a flash of green go by? It was probably Vinny! This terrific turtle practically lives in his roller blades, he skates everywhere he goes. Vinny loves maths and science because they help him calculate how fast he's going. Do you think you can skate faster than Vinny?
appearance: Vinny is a mottled green turtle with shades ranging from sage to bottle green. He has a scale texture on his body and a white belly. He has round black eyes, rimmed in white, and a pale green smiling mouth. On his back is a dark green shell with sections outlined in lighter green.

name: Violet
bio: Violet is the bright, spirited queen of the sea who has a passion for adventure and exploration! She loves to joinKaion his quest for sunken treasure and uses her degree in archaeology to identify where the treasure originated!
appearance: Violet is, as her name suggests, a purple octopus. She has a round body with eight short tentacles. She has a smiling face with black eyes and a white belly.

name: Violet the Penguin
bio: (no bio was given on tag)
appearance: Violet is a black long penguin with a white face and belly. She has a large yellow beak and closed eyes with very short lashes, she also has black and white flippers, cheeks. and a yellow tail.

name: Virgil
appearance: Virgil is a vampire with black hair and pale blue skin. His hair forms a widows peak on his forehead and he has a short ponytail at the back of his head. He has pointed, elvish ears, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth with sharp white fangs. He wears a maroon jacket with grey buttons, black pants and a black vampire cape.

name: Visconti
bio: Visconti reports on frozen treats for the local newspaper. Whether interviewing the creator of pickle-flavored gelato or investigating the details of a chilling sorbet scandal, this award-winning journalist always gets the scoop. Look out for her cold, hard facts, hot off the press
appearance: Visconti is a macaron with tan colored nuts on top and a yellow fuzzy macaron shell with chocolate cream inside with strawberry pink frosting on top of her head. She has round, black eyes with two lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Vitto
bio: Choo, choo! There goes Vitto chugging along in one of his trains. This giraffe is CEO of 'Mallow railways and is always expanding the railroad tracks. According to Vitto, trains are the only way to travel His favorite part is looking out the window and observing all the scenery.
appearance: Vitto is a turquoise giraffe with Egyptian blue spots. Blue fuzz is running from the top of his head to his back and at the end of his long tail with turquoise horns. He has a white belly and inner ears. He has a white muzzle with pastel blue nostrils, his eyes are black and round. He big blue bow tie on his chest.

name: Viva
bio: Meet Viva. she has some serious self-care tips! She loves to pamper himself by spending time with her friends, watching her favorite sports, and catching up on sleep. Viva's favorite way to treat herself is with confetti birthday cake.
appearance: Viva is a mermaid with curled hot pink hair and peach skin. She has a shimmery, purple tail which is covered in sequins and has a pattern of silver stars. She wears a starfish clip in her hair and a purple bikini top. She has round, black eyes with long curly lashes, a small nose and a pink, smiling mouth.

name: Vivie
bio: Vivie loves salt, sand and sunny days; she's been known to spend all day at the beach eating tacos, building sandcastles and playing in the waves. Sometimes she covers herself in kelp and pretends she's a sea monster to make her friends laugh. Grab a bathing suit and come swim!
appearance: Vivie is a rainbow axolotl with a pattern of swirling colors. Her color palette is predominantly cool colors (blue, green, purple, etc.). She has shiny, purple gills with a matching frill on each side of her head. She has small, stubby arms and a white belly.

name: Vlad
bio: Vlad is a home-body during the day but at night he’s the lead singer in a mallow metal band, the Skeleton Squad. When he’s not on tour or in practice you can find him napping the day away. Wanna know his guilty pleasure? Spaghetti and meatballs, but hold off on the garlic bread!
appearance: Vlad is a vampire with pale skin and black hair. He wears a black tuxedo along with a white shirt and a big red bowtie. His mouth is open to reveal his red tongue and white fangs.

name: Voodie
bio: Meet Voodie. Spooky dance parties are her favorite! She's always the first one on the dance floor showing her off her moves! She doesn't care if she's on the beat, she just likes to have fun! Want to join her? Two is better than one!
appearance: Voodie is a Caucasian girl with long, purple hair, round black eyes and a smiling face. Her clothes are black and golden - a black outfit with an golden centre, and a black witch's hat with an golden band with the stars on it.

name: Wade
bio: Original:Wade is a pretty big guy, and at first glance gives many 'Mallows a fright! He tries not to take it personally but one day Wade hopes his looks won't make other 'Mallows so scared of him. Fun fact about Wade: he plays the violin.
appearance: Wade is a brown wolf with a shaggy mane and tail. He has sharply pointed ears which are lined in pale gold, the same color as his face. He has round, black eyes and a brown nose. Small white fangs protrude from his smiling mouth.

name: Wakisha
bio: Wakisha practices business law and is about to get started on her next big case. Today she's meeting and interviewing potential jurors. It's a vital part of legal process, and one of Wakisha's favorite steps. Do you think you would make a good juror?
appearance: Wakisha is a hot pink demon with bat-like wings with fuzzy lavender inner wings. She has two lavender horns on each side of her head and a fuzzy black belly. She has round, black eyes, with one of them winking. She also has a smiling mouth with two prominent white fangs.

name: Walden
bio: Walden paints landscapes and still lifes, sometimes finishing his projects once a day! Walden believes art can be inspired by anything in our daily lives and he's teaching a Painting 101 class all about it this fall; would you like to sign up for an art class with Walden?
appearance: Walden is a black bear; he has two round eyes with a gold muzzle, a black nose, a black mouth, two black ears with golden insides and a lime green belly.

name: Walker
bio: Have you ever seen a goat play the banjo? Walker can't, but he's learning how! He wants to start a Squishmallow jam band, do you want to join?
appearance: Walker is a grey goat with numerous white markings. These are found inside his ears, in a triangle pattern on his forehead, on his muzzle, his belly and on the underside of his tail. He has two grey triangular horns and round black eyes.

name: Walley
bio: Walley snoozes on their porch hammock most afternoons, or sometimes you can catch them reading a book. It’s like a tropical vacation every day on Walley’s hammock and they always have a fresh fruit smoothie nearby. If you’re in the neighborhood, make sure to say “hello” to Walley!
appearance: Walley is a tie-dye brown palm tree with four light green leaves and a cream colored fuzzy belly. they have two black eyes and a basic smiling mouth

name: Wallis
bio: Wallis spends his summer afternoons at the park! This mallow loves to fly a kite, or lie on his favorite woven blanket watching birds and devouring potato salad. Wallis even sticks around after the sun sets and waits for the stars to come out—he can name all the constellations!
appearance: Wallis is a charcoal bigfoot, with a tie-dye black mane, fuzzy ears, belly, and feet. He has a wide mouth and a white tooth poking out below his right eye partly covered. He has two black feet with black heart-shaped pads and toes. He has round black eyes rimmed in white.

name: Wally
bio: Wally may seem rough on the edges, but he's really sweet once you get to know him! His adventurous spirit can't be matched by anything else on the planet. He loves exploring and his favorite quests to go on always include his best friends!
appearance: Wally is a blue narwhal lying flat on his belly. He has fins on each side and a defined tail fin. His belly is white and he has black eyes with a white shine. His horn is sunset colored, though in some releases his horn is silver.

name: Walsh
bio: Walsh is as sweet and sensitive as they come! He loves expressing his feelings in poetry and always seem to find just the right words. Need some help writing a song or writing a letter to someone special? Walsh is the 'Mallow for you!
appearance: Walsh is a red rose with 5 petals poking out with a green stem on the bottom with a red big heart and a smaller pink heart. He has round, black eyes with short lashes with a smiling, black mouth.

name: Walt
bio: Walt is always on the move! This nomadic pumpkin can't wait to stay in one patch for very long—he want to see the world. If you want to keep up with Walt, check out his travel blog!
appearance: Walt is a neon green pumpkin with thin vertical stripes. He has round, black eyes with a smiling mouth. There is a black stem on his head and a triangular pattern of black leaves.

name: Walter
bio: Walter is a very intelligent scientist who is passionate about inventing new spells that he can teach to his friends. When he's not casting a spell, you will find him baking sweet treats in anticipation for Halloween!
appearance: Walter is a dark brown bear with a black witch's hat on the left of his head, with one round ear sticking out. He has a light brown belly and muzzle. He has round black eyes, with a black nose and mouth. His appearance is very similar toOmar the Brown Bear, the only difference being that Walter lacks pink blush on his cheeks.

name: Wamina
bio: Meet Wamina. She is a special education teacher who loves teaching her students new ways to express themselves. On the weekends she likes to explore the mountains, hiking with friends, and enjoying the fresh air. Will you go on an outdoor adventure with Wamina?
appearance: Wamina is a blue frog with a yellow colored belly and pink colored head. She has black eyes which sit on top of her head and has a black, smiling mouth. She has a yellow ring atop her head between her eyes. Her yellow belly and ring on her head both glow under black light.

name: Wanda
bio: Original:Wanda loves all things strategy - chess, dominoes, and making the perfect sandwich. When she visits her grandparents, they take her to play games in the park and afterwards, she makes them her famous sandwiches.2024 Edition:Wanda loves all things strategy - chess, dominoes, and making the perfect panini. When she visits her grandparents, they take her to play games in the park and afterwards, she makes them her famous caprese panini.Appearance[]Wanda is a green watermelon with darker green stripes. Her front half is pastel pink, with a white ring. Her chest is covered in black seeds. She has round eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.Other Editions[]Alternate NamesImageNotable ChangesCollection/SquadSize(s)Valentine WandaTBAWanda's top half is covered in chocolate with sprinkles and heart sprinklesValentine 20258"
appearance: Wanda is a green watermelon with darker green stripes. Her front half is pastel pink, with a white ring. Her chest is covered in black seeds. She has round eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Warner
bio: Who can't sit still and loves to try new things? It's Warner! This elephant loves to use his imagination and do things differently with the games, foods, and even the toys he plays with. He wants to be an inventor when he grows up.
appearance: Warner is a light blue elephant. He has large, floppy ears with white on the inside, and an embroidered trunk. He has round, black eyes too.

name: Warren
bio: If you're always in a mood for a laugh, Warren is the 'Mallow for you! This boar tests all his jokes on his buddies before performing his stand-up act at a comedy club. Warren jokes a lot about himself and his wacky childhood. Did you know he has 10 siblings?
appearance: Warren is a light brown boar with sand color details inside his ears, on his snout and on his belly. His ears are triangular and flop forwards. He has two round, black eyes and distinct brown nostrils. He also has brown hair.

name: Wasabi
bio: For Wasabi, going to work is like pulling teeth—literally! This darling sea cucumber specializes in tooth extractions, or as he calls it, 'porcelain pulls'. While he understands most patients dread the procedure. Wasabi hopes their 'Wasabi took my teeth' shirt sends them off with a smile!
appearance: Wasabi is an emerald green sea cucumber. He has three light green legs on each side of his body and dark green spots. He has light green legs on his head. He has a mint green belly. He has round black eyes and a black smile.

name: Waverly
bio: Grab your boots and basket, it's time to visit Waverly's garden! She grows fruit and veggies for her own backyard. Fill your basket with yummy produce, just be careful not to step on anything in the garden.
appearance: Waverly is a blue butterfly that has black antennas with a blue top. Her wings are dark blue on the inside and black with white spots on the outside. She has a white belly striped in blue. She has round eyes with short lashes, pink cheeks and a red, smiling mouth.

name: Waylon
bio: Meet Waylon. He loves to dance, sing and change up his look with the latest make-up palette. When hanging with Waylon, know you can be your silly wonderful self. He accepts everyone for who they truly are and knows that what makes us different also makes us special.
appearance: Waylon is a multi-colored Easter egg. His face is teal. The top half of his body is an eggshell consisting of light teal and purple waves. The bottom half of his body is an eggshell with yellow, pink and light teal waves. The pink wave is decorated with large yellow dots. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Waymond
appearance: This Squishmallow is a black rockhopper penguin with a round, white belly. The plume of feathers above each eye, known as a "supercilium", is represented by yellow and orange fluff which resembles oversized eyebrows. They have round black eyes with a white ring around them and a triangular yellow beak.

name: Weaver
bio: Are you overwhelmed by too many options at the store? Call Weaver! They work as a personal shopper and can find anything you need. Weaver always researches products before buying them and is sure to find the best deals. Meet Weaver at the mall this weekend!
appearance: Weaver is a toasted, golden-brown waffle. They have brown syrup pouring down their head and a swirl pat of whipped cream, with a strawberry on the left side of them, on top. They have a winking expression with a black smiling mouth.

name: Webb
bio: Wondering how to spend your weekly allowance! Call Webb! They understand all the business trends and make sure to keep up to date with the latest news. It's no wonder Webb's been so successful advising 'Mallows on what to do with their money!
appearance: Webb is a fuzzy yellow duck with a pure white belly. They have a wide orange beak, a fluffy white crest of feathers atop their head and yellow wings. They also have round, black eyes.

name: Wellesley
bio: Wellesley is the editor-in-chief of a magazine—a magazine about Wellesley! Featuring such columns as 'What Wellesley Wears' and 'What Wellesley Eats.' Wellesley loves keeping his readers up-to-date on the wonderful world of Wellesley. Not enough Wellesley? Check out the podcast!
appearance: Wellesley is a bright orange fawn with brown antlers and tan speckles on his forehead. He has white inner ears, face, and fuzzy belly. His tail is short with a white underside. His eyes, nose, and curved smile are black.

name: Wen
bio: Wen loves roller skating, shopping, and hiking. Her favorite color is pink so she wears her pink hiking boots on all her hiking adventures. Wen likes to treat herself with Italian food and garlic bread after a long hike. Are you ready for a hike day with Wen?

name: Wendy
bio: Welcome, Wendy! Wendy's birthday is May 17. You can always find her out on the basketball court (she won the MVP award last year) or in the science lab since chemistry is her favorite subject. She wants to be a famous scientist when she grows up; she also likes to paint pictures of her inventions.She's an all-around green gal and she's also very eco-friendly, always doing her part to clean up her community. Her favorite food is sushi, especially the avocado rolls and her favourite hobby is gardening with her family!
appearance: Wendy is an apple green frog with a cream colored belly. Her eyes sit on top of her head, and are black rimmed in white. She has prominent nostrils above her smiling mouth, and a pale pink blush on her cheeks.

name: Wesley
bio: Wesley grew up with his aunt, and loves making paper airplanes. His aunt is a musician and he gets to travel the world for her tours. Wesley makes each of the band members a good luck airplane to throw at the start of all their shows.
appearance: Wesley is a brown-grey wombat with small, round ears. He has round, black eyes and a large grey nose. He also has a white belly.

name: Wexla
bio: Have you met Wexla? This wonderful witch wants to be an engineer when she grows up. She plans to design tall, spooky buildings that are also eco-friendly.
appearance: Wexla is a Caucasian girl with hot pink hair. Her hair is styled into pigtails and she has bangs. She wears a black and hot pink outfit, including a black corset top with pink and black striped bottoms, and a black witch hat with a pink band and gold buckle. She has round eyes with short, curled lashes and a smiling expression.

name: Whim
bio: Whim lives life on the edges. She has no routines, no schedules, and never wears a watch. Whim might have chocolate chip pancakes for dinner tonight or go for a walk only making left turns. Do you want to hang out with Whim the rebel?
appearance: Whim's fur has a tie-dye pattern which is predominantly rainbow. She has pale pink markings surrounding her round black eyes with short lashes, and her face and belly are all white. Her snout is a pale pink with a black nose and smiling mouth.

name: Whiskerina
bio: Whiskerina is one creative fox! She's a welder by trade and creates amazing art sculptures. Her current project is for her best friends' garden, she's welding a giant flytrap! What would you like Whiskerina to weld for you?
appearance: Whiskerina is an artic fox with a blue and white tie-dyed body. She has a long tail with a white tip, triangular ears and white inner ears with white banded markings that go over her eyes. Her belly is white, she has black eyes with lashes, a black nose, and black whiskers on the side of her face.

name: Whitney
bio: Whitney is no ordinary witch - she lives for the virtual world! Whitney designs video games and while her sisters are a little girly, she considers herself a little more warlock at heart. Her latest creation takes you on an adventure of zombies, gremlins and danger, with a big boss fight at the end! Would you play her game?
appearance: Whitney is a Caucasian girl with ginger hair. Her hair is styled into pigtails and she has bangs. She wears a black and purple outfit, including a black corset top with purple and black striped bottoms, and a black witch hat with a purple band and gold buckle. She has closed eyes with short, curled lashes and a smiling expression.

name: Widow
bio: Widow thought she was allergic to self-confidence but turns out it was just a bunch of histamine hocus pocus! She can't believe she thought holding her head high was bad for her health but can't wait to make up for missed time. First stop: fedora hat store!
appearance: Widow is a black cup of milkshake. On top of her head is swirled orange whipped cream with black and white sprinkles. There is a striped black and white straw poking out from the left side of the whipped cream. She has a black band around her body with grey sticker with a black spider. She has a winking expression with lashes and a pink mouth.

name: Wilbie
bio: Wilbie loves to make interesting sandwich combinations and then sharing a picnic feast when he's done! One of his favorite sandwich creations includes brie cheese, apples, and spicy pepper jam. What ingredients can Wilbie add to your sandwich?
appearance: Wilbie is an orange mammoth with a fuzzy patch of darker orange fur atop his head. He has large, floppy ears with marbled pink inner ears and an embroidered trunk and curled, ivory tusks. He has a fuzzy white belly and round, black eyes.

name: Wilde
bio: Wilde sleeps soundly even after the sun rises. They love dreaming through early daylight hours and say that's when they get their best ideas for a song. Sometimes Wilde records a song they heard in their dream as soon as they wake up, which could be late afternoon. But a good song can happen at any moment!
appearance: Wilde is a maroon beetroot with a smiling mouth, wide open eyes with eyelashes, and pink blush. They have 2 leaves on top which are colored mainly green with red stripes. They also have lighter stripes around Their front.

name: Wilfred
bio: Meet Wilfred. His energy, joy, and smile can be quite contagious, so get ready for some fun! Wilfred loves playing catch, quality time with his friends, and late night snacks. Want to make his day? Ask him for a big bear hug!
appearance: Wilfred is a brown cow with a patch of longer sandy fur like a fringe. He has an off-white muzzle and inner ears, and a fluffy, golden-brown belly He has thin, curved horns which sit wide from his head and are shiny and metallic. Thin brown lines mark the sections. He has round, black eyes, brown nostrils and a small smile.

name: Wilka
bio: Wilka is an engineer working for her local electric company. She goes on site to support super important projects that need her experience and wisdom. Wilka loves it when she gets to work outside, and thinks she looks pretty good in a safety helmet!
appearance: Wilka is a pink cat. She has triangular ears and a tail. The inside of her ears is white. She has closed eyes and a pale pink nose and mouth, all framed by two black whiskers. She has a pink bow that fades to yellow.

name: Will
bio: Will's favorite thing to do is play in the snow; building snow forts, decorating snow dragons, and especially snowball fights. He builds a huge snow castle to play in, it even has a moat!
appearance: Will is a dragon with a tie-dye pattern that is green, brown and white. He has a cream snout, belly and inner ears. His wings, ears and small parts of his body have silver glitter on them. His spines are silver and he has two black eyes.

name: Willett
bio: Willett finds playing cards all across town and collects them in hopes to complete an entire deck! He already has two jokers and almost the entire suit of diamonds. If you can find a playing card in the wild, will you make sure to give it to Willett?
appearance: Willett is an orange monster with a red tuft of hair on their head and a heart marking over their right eye. His horns are teal, and his belly is striped horizontally with red and teal stripes. He has a winking expression and a wide mouth with a row of sharp teeth poking from under his mouth.

name: Willis
bio: Willis is the ultimate comic book fan! He has an impressive collection of hardcover editions and single issues decorating the bookshelves in his home. When Willis isn’t catching up on his reading, you can find him exploring a new fantasy video game. He loves those epic soundtracks!
appearance: Willis is a blue and green arcade game with a red and white lever and two red buttons. The game is green and has a black background, the game has a heart, key and ladders. His top is green and his body is blue, also his bottom has gray and green lines. His face consists of black round eyes and a red smile.

name: Willoughby
bio: Want to know why Willoughby is so good at dodgeball? He's scared of getting hit! Whether dipping, diving, or flying through the air, Willoughby will do anything to avoid the ball. Though some call him dodgy, that's the name of the game!
appearance: Willoughby is a Sage green opossum, the American of a possum. He has a white head with a triangular tuft of green fur atop it. He has a viridian body with a green belly. His triangular ears are also green. He has a light pink nose, while the rest of his facial features, including curled whiskers, are black. His tail is light pink.

name: Willow
bio: Willow the Pegasus is a flying ball of energy! She's ready to get up early for her favorite fitness class and spend the rest of her day helping her friends and finding adventures all over town. You can find her lending a helping hand to all her neighbors on the weekend.
appearance: Willow is a pegasus with a purple and pink tie-dye pattern. She has a fluffy mane and tail which are lavender colored. The insides of her ears, her muzzle and her belly are all white. She also has shimmery lilac wings and round, black eyes with curly eyelashes.

name: Willow the Deer
appearance: Willow is a tan deer with a cream belly, spots, and face. She has holographic horns and inner ears with a white snout and a short tail with a white tip. She has brown eyes with lashes, a black nose and a cat-like smile.

name: Willy
bio: Willy was the runt of the litter-but that doesn’t hold this mallow back! He is fascinated by storms and wants to be a weatherman when he grows up! He loves bow-ties and he has a weather bow-tie collection he can’t wait to show off!
appearance: Willy is a grey wolf with large, triangular ears, the inside of which are white. He has white markings on his face, including fluffy cheeks, as well as a white belly. His eyes, nose and mouth are black.

name: Wilma
bio: Wilma is an excellent mixologist – she makes the best apple cider around! She makes big batches every year starting in September for her apple cider stand. Would you try Wilma’s apple cider?
appearance: Wilma is a Caucasian girl with long, orange hair, closed eyes and a smiling face. Her clothes are black and purple - a black outfit with a purple centre and black laces at the front, and a black witch's hat with a purple band.

name: Wilmot
bio: Wilmot is reading five different books. Not because he loves to read in particular, he just has trouble finishing one before picking up another. Wilmot even turns off a movie if he's too sleepy, then never goes back to see the ending. Do you ever have trouble finishing things?
appearance: Wilmot is a hoagie. His bread is blue with streaks and mold and a white wrapper beneath. He has light green cheese, purple tomato, and red lettuce. His eyes are black with a wide red smile with pointy teeth.

name: Winger
bio: Winger is a powerful griffon whose job is a flight instructor. He teaches others to look out for one another and to be aware of obstacles that could get in the way. He glides effortlessly in the sky while keeping an eye out to make sure you're safe and secure.
appearance: Winger has an orange body with wings and a tail and with a yellow belly and head. On his belly is a big "GateKeeper" print. He has a light yellow beak. He has also red eyes framed in black.

name: Winifred
bio: Winifred is a jeweler and creates stunning one-of-a-kind pieces that sparkle and glow. She gets to know her customer before designing something special for them and loves to see their reaction. Would you like her to make something for you?
appearance: Winifred is a colorful lizard with a tie-dye pattern of green and red circles on a white base. She has a hot pink frill atop her head.  She has round, black eyes with a white shine and curled lashes. However, her 7.5" does not have the white shine. She has a smiling mouth.

name: Winnie
bio: Winnie is not your ordinary walrus, she loves making ice cream sundaes and sand castles (not at the same time). When she's not making her specialty gummy bear sundae you can find her creating her next sand castle masterpiece!
appearance: Winnie is a purple walrus with flippers on each side of her body. Her muzzle and belly are both white, as are the tusks protruding from her mouth. She has closed eyes, straight whiskers and a dark purple nose.

name: Winnie the Witch
bio: Winnie is a baker, and loves to decorate cookies with her sisters. Her favorite way to decorate is using purple, green, and orange sprinkles. She once tried to bake a GIANT jack 'o lantern cookie but her oven was too small. One day she wants to bake the biggest cookie in the world.
appearance: Winnie is a Caucasian girl with long, black hair, closed eyes and a smiling face. Her clothes are purple and orange - a purple outfit with an orange centre and black laces at the front, and a purple witch's hat with an orange band.

name: Winona
bio: This is one excited Squishmallow, she's learning a new language AND getting a sister! Winona's new sister is deaf, so their whole family is learning how to sign; will you help her practice?
appearance: Winona is a llama pegacorn with a tie-dyed pattern of blue and pink spots. Her face and inner ears are white. She has round black eyes with thick, curly lashes and pink blush on her cheeks. She has a silver nose and mouth. She has a silver (or gold) horn with yellow, pink and blue lines, and matching silver wings.

name: Winsey
bio: Meet Winsey. His love language is cooking! It's how he shows he cares! Come check out one of his famous, backyard cookouts jam-packed with funky music, dancing, delicious food, and great company! Everyone's invited so grab a plate!
appearance: Winsey is a slice of bright red watermelon. He is spotted with black seeds and has two stripes at his base, one white and one green, that make up his rind. He has round, black eyes with short lashes and a pink, smiling mouth.

name: Winstey
bio: There’s never a dull moment around Winstey! This chomping champ loves to entertain his fellow ‘Mallows—especially his brotherKobester.The “Can Winstey Chomp It?” game used to be hit at parties… until he chomped his brother’s toy train. Now he sinks his teeth into less sentimental items, like furniture or the TV remote!
appearance: Winstey is a black piranha. He has a tall fin in the center of his head and two round fins on each side of his body which are teal. He has a sparkly teal belly with shiny gills. He has round, black eyes and a pink open mouth with pointy teeth.

name: Winston
bio: Winston is an aspiring chef who takes his cooking creativity to the next level. His friends inspire his latest culinary delights and he is always ready to whip up his famous mac and cheese.
appearance: Winston is a pale teal owl with prominent ear tufts and white markings on his face and belly. Small, teal feathers decorate his chest. He has black eyes with short, straight lashes, and a pink, triangular beak.

name: Witt
bio: Witt hosts games night every Friday in their tabletop game store. New players are always welcome since it's a great way to meet 'Mallows and make new friends. Witt even has seaweed soda on tap free for all players! Come join Witt this Friday for lively game play and community vibes!
appearance: Witt is a cyan and mint dumbo octopus, a type of umbrella octopus (meaning their arms are connected by a web of skin). Their tentacles flare out from their body in a flower-like shape and are light blue. He also has cyan fins on his head which resemble ears and have silver inner ears. They have open black eyes with lashes on both eyes, pink blush and a smiling mouth.

name: Wolfe
bio: Wolfe is a number wunderkind! He recently completed his first mathematical proof and can't wait to share his findings at DidYouKnowCon. Did you know that if you multiply the length of a seagull's beak by the span of its wings, you can figure out the speed in which it'll steal your French fries?
appearance: Wolfe has a neon green body with a white belly and a white tuft of hair. He has small, fluffy rainbow ombre wings that are rainbow striped. He has a broad yellow beak and large black eyes.

name: Wolfgang
bio: After retiring from his classical conductor career, Wolfgang traded his baton for a shovel! Now the only thing he keeps time for his extravagant flower garden, and although his new muses are a lot more quiet, he still arranges them like his orchestra. This spring, his azaleas are first chair!
appearance: Wolfgang is a vampire with black hair and grey skin. His hair forms a widows peak on his forehead and he has a short ponytail at the back of his head. He has pointed, elvish ears, black eyes and a red, smiling mouth with sharp white fangs. He wears a black jacket with a purple bow and a black cape lined in purple.

name: Woodward
bio: Woodward is sophisticated interior designer. He believes less is more, minimalism is here to stay, and carpet is so last century! While his clients sometimes gasp when he declares "color is for clowns", that's when his outlandish design partnerFerrazcomes in. Together, they make the perfect team!
appearance: Woodward is is a snowshoe cat with a fuzzy white belly with a chocolate muzzle and inside his ears. He has a cream lower body. White whiskers frame his face, featuring a pink nose/mouth and a creamy white patch. He has round black eyes rimmed in cyan.

name: Wooster
bio: Wooster teaches agricultural science at the university in town. His classes focus on fermentation and living bacteria. Wooster hopes you enroll in his class next semester, when he'll be demonstrating how to marinate and ferment napa cabbage until it becomes kimchi. Yum!
appearance: Wooster is an olive aquatic mammal with small but wide flippers. He has a pale green snout which resembles an upside-down, rounded heart. His snout is spotted with olive and has small nostrils the same color. He has round, black eyes and a pale green belly. He wears a seaweed green sherpa hoodie with white laces.

name: Woxie
bio: Try not to cover your eyes, Woxie is watching another spooky movie! This bigfoot can't get enough of scary stories and even writes some her own. Woxie loves getting cozy for a Friday night double feature, and always wraps herself up in a big blanket she actually knit herself.
appearance: Woxie is a hot pink Bigfoot with a tie-dyed, fuzzy, purple mane and ears in many shades. She has a light purple belly, heart shaped pads and toes on her feet. She has a peach face with black eyes, pink blush, and a wide smile with two rounded teeth poking out at the top of each side.

name: Wren
bio: Who's that butterfly covered in flour? It's Wren! She works at a bakery and gets up very early to bake yummy bread, rolls, and croissants for breakfast.
appearance: Wren is a rainbow, tie-dyed butterfly, mostly blue, pink, and yellow. She has a pink belly with thin, hot pink stripes across it. Her wings and antenna are a combination of pale pink and silver. Her antennae end in fluffy pom-poms. She has black eyes with two short eyelashes on each, pink blushing cheeks and a smiling mouth.

name: Wu
bio: Meet Wu. This bubbly bunny loves to play in the rain, watch comedy specials, and take  long walks in the forest. Their favorite thing to do is jump in the puddles withGiovanaduring spring showers.
appearance: Wu is a pastel rainbow rabbit with long, fluffy, pastel rainbow lop ears. They have a white tummy. They have a melon-colored nose and mouth and round, black eyes with short lashes.

name: Wyatt
bio: Meet Wyatt. Wyatt loves shooting hoops at home with his big sister,Wendy! These two ‘Mallows play pickup basketball all the way until dinner time. This year, Wyatt became a mathlete, so playing a fun game is just what he needs to stay sharp in between competitions.
appearance: Wyatt is a green frog with a cream colored belly and a laughing expression. His eyes sit on top of his head, and he has squinting eyes. He has prominent nostrils above his black, open, laughing mouth and pink blush on his cheeks.

name: Wylie
bio: In the wee late night hours, tune into the classical radio station to hear Wylie's soothing DJ voice! She knows so much about classical music history and its composers, Wylie can't help but discuss each piece before playing it. Do you like classical music too?
appearance: Wylie is a is a tan Poptart with purple icing decorated with multi-colored sprinkles. She has closed, black eyes and a pink smile with sparkly purple jam pouring out coming out of her head.

name: Wyndmoor
bio: Wyndmoor and his family build gingerbread houses every holiday season. But for some reason, Wyndmoor's ginger homes always fall apart during mid-construction. Do you think Wyndmoor isn't using enough icing? At least the broken pieces make for a tasty snack!
appearance: Wyndmoor is a teal moose. He has large, shiny red antlers which stand tall on his head and curve inwards. He weas a red scarf with pink swirls. His belly and inner ears are teal. He has a pale blue muzzle. He has round, black eyes and teal nostrils.

name: X. Axis
bio: X. Axis comes in peace! This intergalactic pop princess has brought the boogie from Planet Funk and is here to spin you into orbit. While her real name might be Rochelle and she might actually be from the suburbs, it's like that one song of hers goes: "They said 'be you,' so I became X!"
appearance: X. Axis a white humanoid clown with pastel rainbow curly hair. She wears a pastel pink and purple striped party hat with a light blue pom pom on top. She has a blue star on her left eye with pink clown makeup on her right. She wears a clown nose, pink lipstick, and has a neutral expression. She wears a purple neck frill with polka dots, a pastel rainbow tie-dyed shirt with white buttons and purple overalls with blue straps.

name: Xam
bio: Welcome to Xam's nature center! Let this gentle 'Mallow teach you all about caring for the local ecosystem, while you also make new friends from the community. Xam tends to his melon trees most, and loves to have dishes of fresh sliced muskmelon for visitors.
appearance: Xam is a blue Kirin, a hooved mythical creature from East Asian folklore, with a light blue belly. His inner ears and muzzle are an off-white. He has a light blue mane, tail, goatee, and diamond marking on his forehead. He has dark blue holographic deer-like horns and black eyes.

name: Xander
bio: Roar! Xander's here! But don't be frightened, this lovable T-Rex has a heart of gold! Xander loves spending time with his friends and family, especially his twin brotherChuey. Together they want to travel the world and see what adventures they find.
appearance: Xander is a grey dinosaur with a scaled texture on his body. He has two small arms sticking out from his front, each with small, white claws on the tip. His belly and the spines along his back are mint green. He large cartoon eyes and a wide, toothy grin like a shark.

name: Xandra
bio: There's no Squishmallow more well traveled than Xandra! She used to be a professional scuba diver and traveled to over 50 countries before she hung up her snorkel to work in the city. Unlike her hermit neighbors, Xandra is an outgoing and friendly crab who loves to party with her friendCarlos.
appearance: Xandra is a mint blue crab with a round, white belly. She has two large claws which are teal in color and six smaller legs beneath them. Each set of legs is a different shade, changing from teal to olive green. She has round black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Xavier
bio: Meet Xavier. He loves rock climbing, board games, and desert. He knows the best spot in town for tiramisu! He's always game for a late-night snack run or staying up to tell funny stories under the stars. Just be sure to bring a flashlight, he's a little scared of the dark.
appearance: Xavier is a mushroom with a light blue stalk and a blue, paint-spattered top with white spots. His stalk makes up his body and includes a round, white belly. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Xenia
bio: Roller skates and basketball are two of Xenia's favorite things. She may not be the best player on the team but she does her best to have fun. When she's not on the court you can find her at the skate park with her friendAngelie.
appearance: Xenia is a fox striped in bright, rainbow colors, including a lot of hot pink. She has a white mask marking across her face and a white belly. Her inner ears are sparkly silver. She has a round, black nose and oval eyes with a white shine. She has long, curly lashes and is poking out her hot pink tongue. Her tail is multi-colored and fluffy.

name: Ximena
bio: Scrapbooking is how Ximena likes to spend her time. She loves to celebrate her family by creating beautiful scrapbooks for each of them. Last week she started one for her quince, one of her favorite days ever. Do you want to scrapbook with Ximena?
appearance: Ximena is a red, yellow, and green fruit. She has black, round eyes with eyelashes and a smiling mouth. She has a brown stem and a sparkly, pale green leaf atop her head.

name: Xin
bio: Xin collects cuckoo clocks from all over the world! He hangs them on the walls of his office and kitchen - he's close to having 200 clocks. Wait until it's the next hour because you'll hear all of Xin's clocks ring and sing at the same time!
appearance: Xin is a bunny with teal fur and long, floppy ears. The underside of his ears are a shiny teal with silver sparkles. His belly is covered in fluffy, sage green fur. His eyes are closed and he has two whiskers on either side of his aquamarine nose.

name: Xiomara
bio: Grab your goggles and a notebook, it's time for Xiomara's class! Xiomara is a chemistry teacher and loves to have fun in class. Last week she made bath bombs and slime, what will she do next?!
appearance: Xiomara is a dark grey/black based cat with silver leopard spots all over. She has pink inside her ears and a grey belly. She has round black eyes, with a white circle around them, black whiskers and a pink nose and mouth.

name: Yael
bio: Yael works at the local crime lab! She loves getting out of that stuffy, serious place to go testify in court but always gets embarrassed when she has to swear to tell the truth. There's something real funny to hear about the word "solemnly" and she can't help but start giggling!
appearance: Yael is a tan chicken nugget with Barbecue sauce on top. Her paper bag has white and blue stripes. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth. She wears brown glasses.

name: Yalitza
bio: Yalitza might be an easy-going yoga instructor, but when it comes to tenses, she gets super tense! This limber lemon bat is obsessed with grammar and enjoys staying up-to-date on the latest standards. Need help with they're vs. their? Call Yalitza and she'll be there.
appearance: Yalitza is a lemon-themed fruit bat. She has yellow inner ears and wings with a dark green leaf on her head. Yalitza's belly resembles a lemon wedge with yellow pulp. She has round, black eyes and a red smiling mouth with two small white fangs.

name: Yam
bio: Yam and her friends love making world jumbles! They think there's nothing more MANAGZI than sitting on the OFOLR scrambling STELTER and even refer to each other using ZARCY weird codenames. For example—Yam is MAY!
appearance: Yam is a tan danish. They have blueberry jam filling on the belly with a swirl of white icing. They wear a blue and green floral headband tied into a bow. They have round, black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Yamaris
bio: Yamaris is a muralist! Her annual Easter unveiling is always the talk of the town and this year isn't any different. "Bunnies In Space" depicts the rabbit species and the martian species and seeks to dismantle the illogical illusion of "the other"!
appearance: Yamaris  is a teal cow with a pink floral patch by the upper right of her head and her right ear and one on the left side of her body. She has white inner ears and muzzle, white horns, with a fuzzy, and a long tail with a tuft of pink fuzz at the tip. Her eyes are black, and her nostrils are green.

name: Yancy
bio: Meet Yancy. This 'Mallow is a firecracker on the roller rink. She and her friends created a skating team and they meet every week to practice their moves. After practice, they order the team favorite: an extra-large pineapple and cheese pizza. Would you like a slice?
appearance: Yancy is a gnome with a large nose and a bushy white beard which is tied into two pigtails with pink bows. She has a dark pink hat spotted with white atop her head and a pair of bunny ears which are pink with white inners. She wears a pink outfit with off-white accents on her bottom half.

name: Yanet
bio: Yanet is a narwhal with a purple body. She has a fin on either side of her body and a tail with two large flukes. A long, sparkly pink horn protrudes from her head and she has a pink belly. She has sparkling black eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.
appearance: Yanet is a narwhal with a purple body. She has a fin on either side of her body and a tail with two large flukes. A long, sparkly pink horn protrudes from her head and she has a pink belly. She has sparkling black eyes with curled lashes and a smiling mouth.

name: Yang
bio: Yang cleans! He especially loves scrubbing to the soundtracks of his favorite comic-book movies and sometimes even pretends he's a superhero himself. "Bleach Boy" has the greasiest elbows in Grime City, and he's not afraid to use them!
appearance: Yang is a salt shaker. He is a light blue bottle of salt inside of him with grey lid on top of his head. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with red heart blush.

name: Yara
bio: Yara is an avid hiker. She loves discovering new places off the beaten path. For every place she goes, she collects a wildflower and keeps it dried and pressed in her journal! Daisies, poppies, and bellflowers, just to name a few! Grab your journal and join her on your next adventure!
appearance: Yara is a yeti with a rainbow gradient pattern and a round, white face. She has glittery silver horns on either side of her head and a puff of fur on her forehead. She has short lashes and wears a winking expression, as well as hot pink blush and a smiling mouth.

name: Yareli
bio: Yareli plans every moment of her day. She feels relaxed when knowing what's happening next, and having a locked down routine helps making this possible. Sometimes a change in plans will happen anyway, so Yareli is working to accept these changes and goes with the flow. She is a mature llama!
appearance: Leslie is a llama who iscontourline in pastel rainbow. She has a round, white face with black closed eyes with short lashes, nose and mouth. Her inner ears are white.

name: Yasmin
bio: Yasmin has always enjoyed lending a helping hand, even as a mini mallow she would volunteer to pass out the snacks in school. Now that she's older, she started a club that volunteers every month, do you want to join?
appearance: Yasmin is a hedgehog with a tie-dyed body, including shades of purple, pink and blue. Her body is decorated with dark purple spines. The markings on her face and belly are creamy white. Her snout and ears are wisteria purple, and she has a black nose and eyes.

name: Yasmina
bio: Yasmina loves wearing wigs! While box braids are beautiful and pixie cuts are precious, her favorite style would have to be the bob. Yasmina has seven in purple (one for each day of the week) and they always make her feel like a high-fashion super spy!
appearance: Yasmina is a tie-dye teal lizard with on an apple green base. She has a hot pink frill atop her head. She has round, black eyes with a and triple curled lashes. She has a creamy white belly with sparkly rainbow dots.

name: Yekaterina
bio: Yekaterina works as a tax accountant for the local insurance company. After a long day in the office, she enjoys unwinding at home with a bowl of tuna salad and her beloved cat, Ms. Floof. These besties don't need much, as long as they have each other!
appearance: Yekaterina is a purple bigfoot with a tie-dyed purple, pink, and blue mane. She has a white face, a darker purple belly, cyan heart-shaped feet and toe pads and a white face with black, lashed eyes, a long black mouth that extends across her face, and pink blush. She wears a green and yellow striped party hat with hot pink pom pom on top, a pink ruffle between her head and body, a red clown nose, and yellow and green buttons on her belly.

name: Yelena
bio: Yelena is a chorus girl turned professional wrestler! She's happy to have found a new use for her high-kicks and loves performing moves like "Jazz Fists or "Step, Kick, Kick, Kick". Yelena the Curtain even has a signature catchphrase— "that's a showbiz, lady"!
appearance: Yelena is a charcoal black swan with two fluffy black wings and a grey belly. She has round, black eyes and a triangular orange beak. She wears a sparkly black crown atop her head.

name: Yesenia
bio: Yesenia loves to spend her day by the pool. She loves to play water games like volleyball and dive for rings and things at the bottom of the pool. When she needs a break she has a cooler full of smoothies and snacks, do you want to join?
appearance: Yesenia is a bright yellow dog with orange patches on her left ear and the right side of her face. Her ears stand up but have a floppy tip. She has large, closed eyes with tiny lashes set in a happy expression. She has a small, black nose and mouth and pale pink blush. She wears an inflatable ring which looks like a blue and red donut.

name: Yin
bio: Yin cooks! She considers a clean kitchen her personal artistic canvas and loves taking before/after photos to see just how much "love" went into herpièces de rèsistance. Though most "afters" just require some all-purpose cleaner, her infamous Baked Alaska required an entire kitchen renovation.
appearance: Yin is a pepper shaker. She is a light blue glass bottle with pepper inside her and a grey lid on top of her. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a red smile with pink heart-shaped blush.

name: Yollie
bio: Yollie is the sweetestYetiaround! This gal loves going to the cabin with her best friendsRiahandGabby. She loves snow cones and making Snow-mallows in the winter. Join Yollie on her next trip to the cabin!
appearance: Yollie is an aqua yeti with a round, white face. She has glittery silver horns on either side of her head and a puff of fur on her forehead. She is winking her right eye and has short lashes, as well as pink blushes and a smiling mouth. She has a silver snowflake above her left eye.

name: Yong
bio: Yong works in television publicity! His most recent credits include the elephant sitcom 'You Can't Choose Your Herd' and the racetrack drama 'Beige Bronco Blues'. After a long day at the studio, Yong unwinds with a gourmet shrimp cocktail and his favorite spot on the couch. That's a showbiz, bunny!'
appearance: Yong is a brown chocolate bunny. He has long brown inner ears and a mint bowtie with a tan belly with thin blue. They have dark brown whiskers and eyes with a pink nose and curved mouth. He wears a yellow straw hat with a mint band.

name: York
bio: Congrats to York, who just landed a new music gig! This 'Mallow plays steelpan drums and will be touring the tropical islands with a new band this winter. York loves playing music more than anything in the world, but skipping the cold months by travelling to sunny islands isn't so bad either!
appearance: York is a magenta Highland Cow with long, curved silver horns. They have darker magenta fur on the top of their head and a fuzzy belly with a holographic purple and white heart embroidered on it. Their inner ears and muzzle are pink, and their nostrils are magenta, their eyes are black and rounded.

name: Yosef
bio: Yosef is a burgeoning pop star! Although singing into a giant canyon hoping his voice echoes into the ears of a record producer on a hiking trip is not an orthodox means of self-promotion, it's definitely one way to get noticed. Now, if only the mountain goats would stop critiquing his falsetto...
appearance: Yosef is a cream yak with brown ears and white nose with cream nostrils. His horns are glittery and he has fuzzy belly and a large tuft tan fur on his head. He wears two strings on each side of his. He has two large black eyes.

name: Yoshimi
bio: Yoshimi is a purple wolf with large, triangular ears, the inside of which are dark purple. He has a rainbow tie-dye mohawk on his head. He has white markings on his face, including fluffy cheeks, as well as a dark purple belly with a pink melting heart. His eyes, nose and mouth are black.
appearance: Yoshimi is a purple wolf with large, triangular ears, the inside of which are dark purple. He has a rainbow tie-dye mohawk on his head. He has white markings on his face, including fluffy cheeks, as well as a dark purple belly with a pink melting heart. His eyes, nose and mouth are black.

name: Ysabel
bio: Ysabel narrates the football game play by play to her teammates on pep squad, and sometimes she can't help but make some jokes too! Nothing puts Ysabel in a better mood than when she got the whole squad laughing, lifting everyone's sprits for the next cheer.
appearance: Ysabel is a dog with a brown colored body. Her muzzle and belly are white. She has a white stripe on top of her forehead.  Her fluffy ears are the same color with a dark chocolate brown underside. She has round, black eyes and a black nose and mouth with white eyebrows

name: YuanYuan
bio: YuanYuan knows the recipe to her dad's special chili sauce. She learned exactly how he makes it and wants to start filling jars with this delicious recipe so she can share it far and wide! YuanYuan built a website to take orders and sell the sauce. Can she put you down for a small jar to start?
appearance: YuanYuan is a purple squishmallow with pointed ears and a light blue mane. She also has a aqua/water pattern teal belly, wings and inner ears. She has a white nose with teal nostrils and closed eyes with long eyelashes.

name: Yukon Striker
bio: Meet Yukon Striker! Yukon has a fondness for gold, enjoys soaring over the wilderness of Frontier Canada and taking dives at 90 degrees. He's a rugged bird but a true and loyal companion. SCI 12 #25 / Squishdate 10.28.2021
appearance: Yukon Striker is a bald eagle with a white head and a pointed yellow beak. Yukon Striker has a white ruff around their neck, separating their white head from their brown body. They have flat brown wings and a brown coloured belly. Yukon Striker looks very similar toEdwardthe Eagle.

name: Yummy
appearance: Yummy is an orange firefly with white patches on their face and belly. They have fluffy, cat-like ears and yellow wings intersected by orange lines. They have round, black eyes, a smiling brown mouth and large pink cheeks.

name: Yuri
bio: Meet Yuri. Yuri loves plants and has a growing collection of indoor plants including a cactus named Fred. Yuri lives in a city where there aren't a lot of trees so Yuri tries very hard to keep the plants alive and happy. What plant should Yuri get next?
appearance: Yuri is a white yeti with a furry belly. They have a grey face with a simple smiling expression and grey horns either side of their head. A puff of white fur sits like a fringe over their forehead.

name: Yus
bio: Who is that lamb waiting for an adventure? It's Yus! She lives in the mountains and when she hears the sounds of spring, she loves to join in. Yus loves to sing and hear her songs echo through the mountains. She's looking for a partner to harmonize with, is it you?
appearance: Yus is a lamb in the style of a Hug Mee. She has a white face, inner ears, and belly, the rest of her body is tie-dyed with pink and yellow except for her limbs and ears, which are pink. Her ears are fuzzy, and she has a short tail behind her. She has black eyes, pink nose and mouth, with a blue flower embroidered on her belly.

name: Yvonne
bio: Yvonne loves carving funny phrases into her Halloween pumpkins, like ‘Merry Christmas’ or ‘Happy Independence Day.’ While she might not have any other jokes up her sleeve, Yvonne doesn't mind much. To her, pumpkins celebrating other holidays is the funniest thing ever!
appearance: Yvonne is a purple haunted house. She has a black roof decorated with white fish scale like design decorating it with a chimney on the right side. She has a green window with a hand peaking out and a green door. She has a spider web on their forehead and a spider on the left side of her face. There is a bare tree on the right side of her body with a black jack-o-lantern below. She has round, black eyes and a black smile.

name: Zachariah
bio: Zachariah is a grey Persian cat. They have pointy grey ears with pink inner ears. They have a white fluffy beard that nearly covers their belly. They have, round black with blue rings, and a white patch with a pink nose and mouth with black whiskers.
appearance: Zachariah is a grey Persian cat. They have pointy grey ears with pink inner ears. They have a white fluffy beard that nearly covers their belly. They have, round black with blue rings, and a white patch with a pink nose and mouth with black whiskers.

name: Zachary
bio: Zac is a biology enthusiast with a brilliant mind. He is currently a medical student who dreams of becoming a heart surgeon. When he's not studying for exams, he likes to stay active and play flag football with his friends!
appearance: Zachary is a dark green zombie with a red wound on the left side of his head dripping blood. He has one large, black scar on the right side of his head and a hashtag wound on his white belly. He has a skeletal face with round, black eyes, prominent cheekbones and four protruding teeth.

name: Zaid
bio: Zaid loves solving problems! Sometime he uses the scientific method, or discusses possible solutions with classmates. Getting into the lab and conducting experiments is Zaid's favorite part of his science major, but the lab coats and googles are pretty cool too!
appearance: Zaid is a jar of pickles. He is a green glass jar with eight pickles on the front and back in his jar surrounded by pickle juice. He has a pickle green lid on his head and a band with a pickle logo in the middle. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth

name: Zaine
bio: Zaine is the youngest of eight sibling! He likes to stay up after everyone else has gone to bed, writing songs on his ukulele and just enjoying some alone time. Zaine’s favourite midnight snack is chocolate covered ants. Want to try some?.
appearance: Zaine is a tan tarsier. He has brown ears with tan in the inner ears. His tummy is white and he has a tan markings. His eyes are black with orange around his black eyes. He has a white muzzle with a pink nose and mouth.

name: Zal
bio: You probably don't run into Zal unless you're out late. Zal is the overnight baker at the vegan cake shop in town and it keeps him pretty nocturnal. But thanks to Zal's headlamp, he can always see no matter how dark it gets! Now if only he could turn it off while he's sleeping...
appearance: Zal is a cyan anglerfish. He has a blue belly and fins on either side of his body. He has a long appendage protruding from his forehead with a shiny, silver end representing the light anglerfish have. He has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth with four sharp, white teeth sticking up from his mouth.

name: Zan
bio: If you need a little magic, Zan is the mallow for you! This whimsical wizard knows a thing or two about magic and loves to help out his friends. The best way to repay him for his time? Walking his broom when he's out of town!
appearance: Zan is a gnome with a purple hat with a bat pattern on their head. They also have a white beard, a nose and purple belly, with a black shirt.

name: Zanda
