bio: Zanda fell in love with public art and graffiti as a young 'Mallow, so it was a dream come true when he was commissioned to paint a mural for his town. Zanda wants to keep this art piece a surprise, so he's going to finish it in one night! Get ready for the exciting reveal tomorrow!
appearance: Zanda is a charcoal black axolotl who has tie-dye gills with black frills on each side of his head. He has small, stubby arms and a tie-dye belly with a silver moon and two stars embroidered on it. He has mischievous black eyes and a cat-like smile.

name: Zaneeta
bio: Zaneeta loves calling ‘Mallows “ma’am.” She thinks it’s the funniest word in the world and will “yes ma’am,” “no ma’am,” or “thank you ma’am” just about anyone in her life. Her great uncle Zaneeto, her baby niece Za-Za—even her pet shoe, Zapeeta!
appearance: Zaneeta is a silkie chicken. She has fuzzy white wings on each side of her body. She has a tuft fuzzy hair on top of her head. She has a fuzzy white belly, She has round, black eyes and a grey beak with light pink blush.

name: Zap
bio: All aboard for Albacore! Zap is the conductor of a high-speed locomotive that brings handcrafted sushi rolls to rural communities. Make sure to try her sashimi—it's off-the-rails!
appearance: Zap is a cup of matcha latte with a brown band around her lower body with a matcha leaf design on front. Her top has a white ring and whipped cream decorated with green sprinkles. She wears a green bow and a brown straw on her head. Her eyes are closed, she has lashes, pink blush, and a red mouth.

name: Zapo
bio: Zapo starts every day with a mindful morning routine. It includes an outdoor yoga session, a meditation on his goals for the day, and a cup of fresh green tea. Zapo calls it his "positivi-tea" because he always thinks about what makes him happy as it steeps!
appearance: Zapo is a neon orange gummy bear with a reddish-orange tummy. He has orange ears with reddish-orange inner ears. He has round, dark orange eyes, and a reddish-orange dark orange nose and mouth.

name: Zaria
bio: This Squishmallow was not given a bio on their tag.
appearance: Zaria is a grey cat with black tiger print on their body. They have a white belly and muzzle with pink inner ears, nose, and smile. They wear a white bunny ear headband and pink inner eyes; their eyes and whiskers are black.

name: Zarina
bio: Zarina has memberships to all the museums in her city! Whenever she has a free day to herself, she swings by to check out the new exhibits. The natural history museum is her favorite, and she almost has all the collector pins! Would you like to join Zarina on her next museum visit?
appearance: Zarina is a banana slug with a yellow body and a light yellow belly. She has two antennae which stand up on her head. On her back, she has seven darker yellow spots. She has round, black eyes and a black, smiling mouth.

name: Zaya
bio: Meet Zaya. She loves traveling and photography. Her dream is to be a model and travel the world with her best friends! She works at a clothing store right now and takes photography classes at night so she can one day achieve her goal.
appearance: Zaya is a baby pink bear with round ears. She has a round, white belly and muzzle and sparkly silver inner ears. She has round, black eyes with short lashes and a bright pink nose and mouth.

name: Zayla
bio: Zayla is the ultimate big sister! She knows exactly how to turn a bad day around, and can make even the shyest 'Mallow feel welcome. When Zayla isn't out and about supporting her loved ones, you can find her cuddled up in a beanbag chair reading another mystery novel.
appearance: Zayla is a cheeseburger made of a brown bun with sesame seeds on top. Her face is on the top bun, a pair of black eyes and a red smiling mouth. Between the bread is a layer of bright yellow cheese, dark brown meat, a red slice of tomato and wavy green lettuce leaves with a brown bun in between. She has a white wrapper below her body with red and light blue stripes.

name: Zaylee
bio: Zany Zaylee is here, are you ready for some fun? Zaylee loves to do silly things like speak in her own language with her friends, walk sideways on the playground, and drink milkshakes through a crazy straw. What should she do next?
appearance: Zaylee is a snow white creature with a fuzzy rainbow mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has an off-white face and belly, and grey pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush beneath, and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face.

name: Zazzie
bio: Zazzie lives on a farm! She loves to play hide and seek with her sisters because there are so many places to hide. Zazzie can be kind of a trickster and will jump out of a hiding spot to scare the seeker, or turn off the lights and make spooky sounds! Think you can keep up with Zazzie's tricks?
appearance: Zazzie is a blue-violet cat with pointed, triangular ears. She has a fuzzy wool like purple belly and inner ears. She has round, black eyes with white rims and dual whiskers on each cheek are white, whereas her nose and mouth are pale pink.

name: Zeena
bio: Zeena is a true story-teller. She loves to share tales with her friends and family, and has even won a few prizes at school for her work. Look out for her books in the future!
appearance: Zeena is a hot pink unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly pink horn with a swirl wrapped around it. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes.

name: Zeke
bio: Zeke is in charge of the special pit crew that keepsTracey's race car maintained and running smooth. He absolutely loves noodles, nachos and watching the cars he works on zoom past him on the race track!
appearance: Zeke is a zebra with a white body covered in black stripes, aside from on his belly. His muzzle and ears are both black, with an electric blue color inside his ears and nostrils. His fluffy mane is the same color. He has round black eyes ringed with white.

name: Zelia
bio: Meet Zelia, she's got a huge sweet tooth. Lucky for her, her friendTeniseis a baker! Zelia is a talented soccer player and plays every Sunday in the park. After she treats her and her teammates to one ofTenise's delicious coconut cakes made special with extra icing!
appearance: Zelia is a giraffe with a light teal body covered in shiny gold spots. She has a teal mane running down her back and a fluffy, teal tail. The inside of her ears are teal and her muzzle, belly, and horns are all white. She has small teal nostrils and round, black eyes.

name: Zelic
bio: Zelic is a green monster with round, black eyes, a smiling mouth and white fangs. His horns are striped in dark blue and light green. He also has a light green patch around his right eye. Two green bat swings sprout from his back. His has a Twizzlers wrapper around his lower half.
appearance: Zelic is a green monster with round, black eyes, a smiling mouth and white fangs. His horns are striped in dark blue and light green. He also has a light green patch around his right eye. Two green bat swings sprout from his back. His has a Twizzlers wrapper around his lower half.

name: Zelina
bio: Día de Los Muertos is one of Zelina's favorite days of the year. Besides the yummy food and wearing makeup, it's a special time to remember and celebrate the lives of family members who passed. This year, she's adding a candle for her mom, would you like to learn more?
appearance: Zelina is a black cat with complex embroidery meant to resemble sugar skull make-up. Zelina has white ribs, a white face, and yellow inner ears. Zelina has floral and dot patterns of all different colors all over her body.

name: Zelma
bio: Meet Zelma. She's a quintessential extrovert. Anytime she's out and about, she runs into someone she knows. Last week she saw a teacher from nursery school! She loves salsa dancing, vintage clothes, and taking care of all her plants at home.
appearance: Zelma is a purple hippo with a marbled pattern and a scaly texture. Two square teeth poke out from beneath her snout, and her round black eyes rest atop it. She has small, curled ears with white insides and a fluffy white belly.

name: Zendi
bio: This Squishmallow doesn’t have a bio.
appearance: Zendi is a black bat with tall ears and pink inner ears. They have grey wings with a pinkBubble Yumwrapper on the bottom of their body. Their mouth is red with two white fangs and eyes that are black with white rings around them and are winking.

name: Zerbe
bio: Zerbe is a big city bird watcher. Sure, it's a little challenging looking for birds around skyscrapers, but he realized that by dropping some plain popcorn at the park, all the will come to him Zerbe has already seen thirteen pigeons just today!
appearance: Zerbe is a dark brown bear with a black witch's hat on the left of his head with a mint band and grey buckle. He has one round ear sticking out. He has a mint and black gingham belly and a grey muzzle muzzle. He has round black eyes, ringed in white with a black nose and mouth

name: Zerdan
bio: Meet Zerdan. This methodical mutt loves to play games, especially chess! Zerdan wants to be a chess champion and plays whenever they can, one day Zerdan hopes to become a Grandmaster! Zerdan is hoping to play their first match soon, would you like to play?
appearance: Zerdan is a dog with a patchy brown body. Their muzzle is white with a black nose, and they have a white patch around their right eye. Both their floppy, black ears and white belly are very fluffy.

name: Zergman
bio: Zergman wants to be a professional trampoline jumper. Do you know if that already exists? If not, he can’t wait to be the first to turn trampolining into a career! Zergman wants to practice playing popcorn, but he needs a jumping partner. Ready to reach for the sky?
appearance: Zergman is a violet chinchilla with an amethyst pattern on his cheeks and belly, as well as inside his ears. Three violet whiskers of various lengths sprout from each cheek. He has a grape embroidered on the right side of his belly. He has round black eyes and a violet nose and mouth.

name: Zhen
bio: Zhen collects vintage toys. He loves anything made from wood or metal and is extra interested if it has some wear and tear. Today Zhen picked up a large top with a pull string to make it spin! He could spin this top all day. It might be his new favorite in the whole collection!
appearance: Zhen is a green frog holding a blue easter egg covered with pink and white lines on it, The words say "Hey there hopstuff". On his sides there are lime dots. His face consists of eyes that are black and rimmed in with yellow, his nose is made of two upside down curves, and he has a simple black smile with pink cheeks.

name: Zinabell
bio: Meet Zinabell. Catch this 'Mallow rocking the newest and hippest fashion trends! Every week she dyes her hair a new color of the rainbow! When she grows up she wants to style for high fashion runway shows and photoshoots!
appearance: Zinabell is a brown cow with marbled darker brown spots, inner ears, and brown tail. She has maroon hair held up by a gold headband. She has closed eyes with lashes and a peach muzzle.

name: Zinx
bio: Have you met Zinx? Zinx has a hilarious sense of humor and is always cracking jokes, they love making their friends laugh. Zinx is the kind of ‘Mallow to be voted the most loveable class clown. Get ready for some jokes that are out of this world.
appearance: Zinx is a blue and green tie-dyed alien with a light green belly. They have round eyes and a smiling mouth. They have alien antenna with dark blue spots on top, matching the spotted pattern on their body.

name: Zipp
bio: Meet Zipp. He's training for an endurance race that will take him all the way through the jungle! When he's not training, he's loading up on nutritious snacks! Jicama and mango with spicy chili pepper are his favorites! Can you keep up with Zipp? He'd love a training partner!
appearance: Zipp is a blue parrot with a mohawk and small, fluffy wings that match the color of his body. He has a light blue tie-dye belly with white and blue paint splatter. He has a yellow beak and black, round eyes with two eyelashes on each.

name: Zita
bio: Zita plays soccer every Saturday morning with her cactus Squad! These ‘Mallows love starting their weekend with a friendly scrimmage, but the best part might be brunch afterwards. Would you like to share a stack of pancakes with Zita?
appearance: Zita is a green cactus. Her body and arms have thin, light green spikes all over her body. She wears a bow which resembles the Mexican flag. She has round, black eyes with lashes and a smiling mouth

name: Ziv
bio: Meet Ziv. He loves gardening and forest conservation! Everyday, he plants a tree to give the forest a little extra help to grow. He's planted 400 trees already! When he grows up, he wants to be a climate scientist and help protect the whole world! Grab a seed and join him!
appearance: Ziv is a sugar glider, a type of possum which can glide using wing-like membranes. He is primarily tan with a white lower face and belly. He has stone grey markings in stripes covering each eye, a large stripe starting at his head and running down his back, on the tip of his tail and on the outer front side of his 'wings'. His inner ears are also glittery holographic. He has round, black eyes and a golden nose and mouth. He is also wearing a golden crown on his head

name: Zobey
bio: Zobey is great company to be around (even if he doesn't look like it at first!). He can be a sarcastic 'mallow, but you can count on him when you need to. He's very laid back and always loves to share a few chill jokes with everyone around him.
appearance: Zobey is an aqua octopus with a white belly. He has a round body with eight short tentacles; he also has round, black eyes and a smiling mouth.

name: Zoe
bio: Zoe lives and breathes food. It makes perfect sense since her family owns multiple restaurant businesses in the area. She aspires to become a restaurant owner one day with her cousins,AstridandAce.
appearance: Zoe is a pink unicorn with a matching fluffy tail. Her ears, belly and nose are all white, and her nose also has pink nostrils. She has a short, sparkly lilac horn with a dark pink swirl wrapped around it. She has round, black eyes with short eyelashes.

name: Zoey
bio: Zoey is the best at snow forts. She lives in North Pole, and likes to visit her friendVioletto have winter adventures together!
appearance: Zoey is a white polar bear with a pink bow. She has a large grey muzzle and closed eyes with very short lashes with black nose and mouth, she also has a white tail poking out.

name: Zoeyana
bio: This unicorn loves Halloween, from the costumes and the decorations to the treats. She is so excited to go toHolly's Halloween party! Last year, she had a costume contest, party favors, and even a piñata!
appearance: Zoeyana is a ghost unicorn with a white body. She has a pink mane, and in front of that, a sliver horn. She also has a pink belly that says “Boo!” in a white font outlined with hot pink.

name: Zola
bio: Ready for a beauty nap? Snuggle up with Zola! She loves hosting slumber parties and can't wait for you to join. It's not a slumber party without makeovers, her trusty white noise machine and her favorite eye mask.
appearance: Zola is a pegacorn, a combination of a pegasus and a unicorn. This means that she has a unicorn hornandpegasus wings, all of which are metallic silver. Her inner ears are pink. Her body is purple and she has a white muzzle and a purple belly. Her fluffy mane and tail are white. She has a blue mask with closed eyes with long curled lashes.

name: Zosia
bio: Zosia started with just one caravan, and loved it so much, she bought another! Now she owns a whole campsite of caravans that travelers can book a stay in. Best part is, each caravan has its own unique theme and design Zosia decorated herself. Call Zosia to reserve a cute caravan for your next trip!
appearance: Zosia is a white cup of yogurt parfait with two red stripes across the middle. The top reveals granola crunch, a strawberry, blueberry, and a spoon. She has black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth.

name: Zozo
bio: Meet Zozo. She loves art and filmmaking and is really quite silly. Zozo loves to have fun with her friends and use her imagination. She loves creative and makes her own videos, drawings, and even toy designs. Do you want to see her portfolio?
appearance: Zozo is a bigfoot with a rainbow multi-colored fuzzy mane on her head, and long shaggy ears. She has a white face and a blue belly, and white pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with eyelashes and a wide mouth that stretches across her face with a small, white round tooth poking out of her mouth by her left eye.

name: Zuli
bio: Zuli has a daily routine and they don't like to fly out of it. Keeping things exactly the same is important to them--maybe a little too important. Zuli just doesn't like to try new things like oatmeal cookie coffee creamer; yikes! Would you help Zuli move out of their comfort zone?
appearance: Zuli  is a dragonfruit-themed fruit bat. They have green pointy inner ears and wings with light green leaves on their head. They have a plain white belly with black seeds. They have round, black eyes with lashes and a red smiling mouth with two small white fangs.

name: Zumir
bio: Zumir makes sweets at a busy candy shop just outside town. He starts early in the morning and lets all those sugary smells flow into the neighborhoods close by. Wouldn't that give you a candy craving? Zumir makes all kinds of treats, but mint chocolate truffles are his specialty!
appearance: Zumir is a green moose. Zumir has large bright red antlers which stand tall on his head and curve inwards. Zumir's white muzzle has red nostrils and inside his ears it a red color, his tummy has a peppermint pattern. Zumir has black eyes.

name: Zumirez
bio: Stand back; Zumirez baked a big batch of nachos and he just pulled them out of the oven! This 'Mallow is a lifelong vegetarian so his nachos are loaded with three bean chili, fresh avocado chunks, and lots of gooey cheese. Grab a napkin and dig in with Zumirez!
appearance: Zumirez is a lavender bat with long, upright ears. His inner ears, wings and belly are all purple. He has round, black eyes. His purple smiling mouth is adorned with two white, pointed fangs with pink blushing cheeks.

name: Zuni
bio: Visiting your local pharmacy? You may just run into Zuni when you're there. She's a pharmacy tech and loves helping 'Mallows with all their pharmacy needs. Zuni has a great memory and even knows all her costumers by their first name!
appearance: Zuni is a giraffe with a peached-colored body covered in tan spots. She has a light brown mane running down her back. She has two white horns. The inside of her ears are sparkly pink , her muzzle is white and her belly are all sparkly pink and the nostrils are little pink hearts.

name: Zuzana
bio: Zuzana plays the guitar and has a big tour coming up. She can't leave without extra rhinestones and a big box of her mom's chocolate chip cookies, she can't go without them!
appearance: Zuzana is a pink planet with a darker shade of pink on the left side of her head and on the bottom right. She has a shimmery ring around her with sparkles on the right side of her body. She has black round eyes with curled lashes and a smile.

name: Zyan
bio: Meet Zyan! This charistmatic 'Mallow makes everyone she talks to feel special. That's because they are! Zyan knows that everyone has something unique and important to offer. Whether it's a silly joke, a random fact, or a new perspective. Zyan wants to hear all about it!
appearance: Zyan is an candy pink creature with a fuzzy mane on her head and long, shaggy ears. She has a white face and belly, and white pads on her feet which are shaped like hearts. She has black eyes with short lashes, pink blush beneath and a wide mouth which stretches across her entire face. She has a 2 wacky hot pink hair on the top of her hair.

name: Zyta
bio: Time for Zyta takeover! This 'Mallow hosts the liveliest party and is always the center of attention! Zyta strikes up conversation easily and is always looking for more friends to add to her squad. Stick with Zyta for fun times!
appearance: Zyta is a bright yellow pineapple decorated with a crosshatch pattern in darker yellow. She has five glittery pale green leaves sprouting from her head. She has large black eyes with a short lashes and a smiling red mouth with a pink blushing cheeks. She has white fuzzy belly with a hot pink flower on her head.
